name: Georgian Boutique Apt City Centre
description:
Stunning, spacious ground floor apartment minutes from Princes Street. Your own ‘home from home’ in an historic property, we strive to offer you the highest standards of comfort and attention to detail.

The apartment is completely self-contained with no shared facilities. It has its own front door onto the street so there is no shared lobby or stair.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cool central Loft, sleeps 4, 2 double bed+en-suite
description: Upper level of duplex. Boho rustic-chic former warehouse Loft located in lively University quarter of City centre for exploring historic Old Town and at heart of Fringe, Jazz and International Festival venues. Great location for exploring, eating out and good pubs all year round (NB owner’s suite on lower level).

name: Edinburgh Holiday Let
description:
Self contained studio 6 minutes by train to Edinburgh's city centre .Located between the city and the vibrant seaside suburb of Portobello . The Brunstane Studio is the perfect place.
King sized bed with topper. Free Wi-Fi (7EN74N49) and parking.

name: Double room - spacious Leith flat
The Four Sisters Boatel
description: A first for Scotland, The Four Sisters Boatel is a luxury, four star, self catering, canal barge, accommodation located in the very heart of Edinburgh city centre and has been awarded 4 stars by the Scottish Tourist Board.

name: Lovely central apartment sleeps 5
description: Lovely characterful Victorian tenement apartment  belonging to an artist and a musician.

name: Beautiful Apartment in Edinburgh
description: The apartment is situated in Stockbridge, an area with a wealth of shops bars and restaurants. There are excellent bus routes to the city centre but the apartment is close enough to walk to all the major sites. The accommodation is spacious and suitable for large family groups who wish to stay in a home rather than an hotel. For guests arriving during the football and rugby seasons the TV offers Sky sports channels, for guests that love 2nd hand shops, look no further than Stockbridge's array.

name: PERFECT LOCATION,FREE PARKING,WIFI
Epicurean Clerk - Huge, Central
description: Even Edinburgh locals are surprised by the size and preserved state of Epicurean Clerk, a traditional flat in the center of Edinburgh. It's just a 15 minute walk to the Royal Mile and a 20 minute walk to the castle. The flat has all the original features with a modern twist and is unusually spacious for an Edinburgh flat.

name: Vibrant Cottage Style Flat Near Leith Links Park
description: Colourful, cozy flat with leafy outlook, central but quiet opposite Leith Links park and a 10 min walk to The Shore with its many great restaurants bars and shops. There is free parking in front of the house. 3 bus stops are just 1 min walk from the flat with buses going to the centre and other points of interest such as the Botanics or Portobello beach every few minutes. It's easy exploring Edinburgh from here!

name: Relaxing Top-Floor Flat –Views, Comfort & Location
description:
Hi! I'm one of Edinburgh's most experienced and highly rated Airbnb hosts. Come and stay in my cosy private apartment,

Licensed and safety checked by Edinburgh Council.

name: NewTown Heart of the Burgh - Studio
description: Our cosy wee flat is tucked away in the heart of Edinburgh’s New Town. Here, you’re ideally placed to explore worlds old and new right from the doorstep or retreat from the bustle when you need it.

name: Stunning 2 bedroom flat @ the Shore
description: This stylish 2 bedroom apartment in a converted seed mill makes a perfect base for vacations or business trips to Edinburgh. Situated in the historic port area of Leith, a charming neighbourhood with excellent amenities and city centre links.

name: Nice Central Double room including basic breakfast
description: This is a spacious, comfortable double bedroom. It's a cosy room, a warm and pleasant space with touches of luxury. A lovely central location from which to enjoy Edinburgh.

name: Bright Central Double room
description: This is a bright, beautiful double bedroom with an exceptionally comfortable kingsize bed.  It's a spacious yet cosy top floor corner room with views across the city to the Firth of Forth and the hills of Fife.  A warm and pleasant space with touches of luxury.  A lovely central location from which to enjoy Edinburgh.

name: Large Room in Quirky Wee Apartment - Arthur's Seat
description:
Your Room is both Large and Cosy. With Two Sofas and a TV, you effectively have your own Private Sitting Room. *Netflix and Disney+

10 mins walk to the base of Arthur's Seat - 15 mins to the Royal Mile.

*I will need your Arrival Time to Confirm your Booking* so please provide this on or before booking. *No Late Check-in

Please Note: this is an old and personalised apartment. If you prefer modern minimalism it probably isn't for you.

Please Read the Full Listing before Booking, Thank you.

name: Double bedroom in central Edinburgh
description: Double bedroom in central Edinburgh

name: Double Room in Central Edinburgh. Private Shower
description: Newington is a favoured residential district of Edinburgh, lying around two miles south of the City Centre. It offers a wide selection of amenities, including essential and specialist shops There is also a good choice of bars,. The property is close to the University of Edinburgh.,The royal Holyrood Park and Arthur’s Seat. Regular bus services run from Newington to Centre. The Queens Hall and Festival theatre are close by.

name: Beside The Castle with great views
description: Please note that any smoking, vaping , candles or charging of vape batteries is not allowed inside the premises for safety reasons.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Drummond apt in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town!
description:
2 bedrm,2 bathrm sittingroom,kitchen
Drummond apt. boasts a good kitchen handy for longer stays however step outside and there are coffee shops galore and restaurants close by so short break stays won't need to cook!
The sitting room is part of the kitchen with a reclining sofa for 3 people and two armchairs.
Twin room and bathroom, sitting room/ kitchen lower level and internal stairs lead to King size bed on mezzanine floor and through this room is an office /sitting room and shower room.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright, quiet & central - 1 block from tram stop
description:
Quirky, quiet flat close to Princes Street with plenty
bars, cafes, shops, restaurants nearby

Enjoy 4m high ceilings and big windows

Tea, coffee, muesli and porridge always available

Tram stop McDonald Road

5 mins walk to Calton Hill for beautiful views over the city
10 mins walk to Princes Street/ Waverley Train Station
15 mins walk to Old Town

This is a fully furnished home, not a holiday flat, and yours for the duration of your stay!

name: Parliament Square - Royal Mile
description: Beautiful very well located apartment on the Royal Mile. 2 large bedrooms and spacious lounge to sit and watch the world go by.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Large room in disabled friendly flat - Bruntsfield
description: In fantastic Bruntsfield with its individual shops and green spaces.  Room is large and airy and inhabitants - humans and dogs - love to meet new people .  We have a son in a wheelchair so the flat is very accessible. Ask if we can give you any more info!  Hope to see you soon.

name: Home from home by Holyrood Park -parking & garden!
description: On the doorstep of Arthur's Seat and Holyrood Palace gates, yet in the heart of the city, this beautiful home is the perfect base to explore the hustle and bustle or just relax. With great transport links, free parking and a scenic walk to the Royal Mile, it's perfect for whatever you have planned!

name: City centre. Walk to Castle, Museum etc. Own bath.
description:
The Space
Situated in a quiet Mews courtyard, this is a small sunny room on the ground floor of my house. It has a small double bed UK size 4ft across. There is hanging and cupboard space. Own bathroom on 1st floor. Varied breakfast is provided, cheese, eggs, bread, yoghurt, cereal etc.

name: City centre, lovely reviews, near tram & train.
description:
Warm, cosy and comfortable, our main door home is the perfect city centre base located in the New Town of Edinburgh, a world Heritage Site.

The flat is accessed via the original, fifteen external stone steps from the pavement via a secure and lockable cast iron gate.

Our flat was the original kitchen in the house and we have exposed the original fireplaces, originally used for cooking and laundry.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Writers View - Royal Mile near Castle
description: Spacious, fun view, bright and sunny.  Quiet, traffic free square visited frequently throughout the day by Edinburgh walking tours. World Heritage Old Town central location on Royal Mile. Close to Castle, station and shops. Street performances, bars and restaurants close by. Living room, kitchen/dining, double bedroom plus two singles room. Top floor, no lift, shared entrance behind Deacon Brodies, opposite Writers Museum .
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Sunny Room in house with beautiful views
description: Lovely double room available in 4 bedroom detached modern house which is located in a quiet cul-de-sac.

name: Booklover's Bed With a View
description: Within an ancient tenement on the cultural fault-line between the medieval Royal Mile and the 18th century New Town. With remarkable views over Princes Street you can't be more central.  A comfortable pied-a-terre at the heart of Scottish history.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Private Bedroom in Edinburgh
description: A private bedroom with shared bathroom in a quiet flat.

name: Flat, private parking, walking distance Royal Mile
description:
Convenient for the University, the Royal Mile and Festival/Fringe venues. Allocated off street parking is available if booked in advance. The Royal Mile is just a 15 minute walk away. Princes Street is a 20-25 min walk for shopping and sightseeing or you can hop on the bus. The building is set back from the road overlooking Holyrood Distillery. Holyrood Park is 200m away with Arthur’s Seat and the Salisbury Crags to enjoy.

Great space for visitors to Edinburgh at any time of year!

name: Royal Mile Apt1- Historic Old Town Centre
description:
Ideal for vacation or corporate stays. Close to all tourist sites & financial centre. Great transport including bus and tram service from airport to the nearby rail station.
Central, fully equipped, 1st floor, 2 bedroom, sleeps 5 - no lift.
Other 1 bed apt in the same building - reference 1830150 - Title: Royal Mile Apt4
Edinburgh Council License No. EH-70561-P

name: Lovely Quiet Apartment in Gorgie, near City Centre
description: Top floor (third floor) apartment, one (double) bedroom, non-smoking flat available. Nice kitchen/dining/living area, bathroom (with shower over bath). Fully furnished with sheets and towels supplied. Gas central heating, double glazed windows and maintained shared garden. The apartment is at the rear of the building so there is no main road noise. We are on Gorgie Road, very close to the old Gorgie City Farm. It's a 15 minute bus to the city centre or 30 minute walk.

name: Castle view apartment in city centre | 1 bed
description:
Our lovely apartment is on the top floor of a secure Art Deco apartment building in the city centre. It is spacious and homely and offers amazing views of Edinburgh Castle.

There are good local amenities on your doorstep, perfect for city living!

There is lift access to the apartment and we offer a personal check in.

Licence No: EH-68981-F

name: 5* Beautiful City Centre Apart close to Castle
description: Beautiful  decorated basement flat with its own private entrance and patio in the very centre of Edinburgh on a quiet Georgian street tucked behind princes street. It is perfectly located to walk to most of the major attractions and literally a minutes walk from the tram and airport bus stop.

name: The Park - Holyrood Road Apartment with parking
description:
This apartment is situated just off the Royal Mile and has views to the Salisbury Craggs.

It also has a free car park space which can be seen from the apartment.

Luxury Apartment Near the Scottish Parliament
With prime location adjacent to the Scottish Parliament and the Royal Palace of Holyrood, this apartment offers an exceptional base for exploring some of Edinburgh's finest attractions.

name: Gorgeous Apartment with Stunning Views, Old Town
description: Beautiful, sunny, contemporary and very stylish apartment located in the centre of Edinburgh with spectacular views over the Holyrood Park and Arthur's Seat. Only a few minutes away from the Royal Mile.

name: Beautiful Grassmarket Apartment
description:
This stylish and contemporary, first floor apartment for two guests is located in a secure, quiet, 200 year old Close on the vibrant and historic Grassmarket, and is just a few steps from all of Edinburgh's major attractions and transport links.

A lovely and spacious apartment sleeping two guests in the bedroom in a lovely King Size bed. Ideal for couples. The apartment is arranged on open plan so please note that the bedroom area is open to the living / dining area, separated by the wardrobe.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish Central, Five Bed TownHouse +fast wifi
description: Built in the 1860s, our soaring Victorian mansion is ideal for a relaxing stay being a very large, elegant and historic, three story town house (sleeps large groups)  in the very heart of Edinburgh, eliminating the need for taxis. Princes St, George St (the Moulin Rouge district of Northern Europe!) and Haymarket Railway station, all ten minutes on foot. With latest broadband upgrade super fast wifi too.

name: EDINBURGH ROYAL MILE APARTMENT
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Walter Scott Suite Luxury apt stunning Castle view
description: The apartment block was one of the first flats to be built by James Craig in 1790. large lounge with a beautiful fireplace, large marble dining table for 6 people, well equipped luxury kitchen and large family bathroom with underfloor heating and separate bath and steam shower. The second bedroom is a single but also accommodate a separate "trundle" bed at a squeeze - suitable for young families or “cosy-couples”. The kitchen is fully equipped to a chef's standard, with a choice of three ovens.

name: Overlooking Leith-Links home of golf, free parking
description:
Our stunning main door Georgian pad overlooks Leith Links (the home of golf). The apartment has two bedrooms; one large master ( kingsize bed) and a second bedroom ( twin beds), a stunning open-plan lounge with Georgian fire place and mantle, with a remote controlled gas fire inset.

There is a newly fitted, spacious bathroom with designer lighting, underfloor heating and a stunning large walk in shower cubicle with pull-down seat if required.

name: FUNKY 3BR apartment in quiet central neighbourhood
description: Unique and family friendly three bedroom apartment, located on a quiet street, centrally located in Edinburgh's New Town.

name: 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Apartment, Royal Mile
description: This 1st floor 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom apartment  (sorry no lift) offers wonderful views of the rear of Royal Mile, which makes it super quiet! This apartment is wonderfully decorated and has one bedroom is a king size bed and the other bedroom is a twin room. You would never beloieve you are only a few seconds away from historic Royal Mile! After booking, we will send you key safe arrival instructions.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 2 Bedroom 1 Bath Apartment, Lawnmarket, Royal Mile
description:
The apartment is a great space for the Festival and also very close to shopping opportunities, bars, pubs, and public transport. The cozy atmosphere of the neighborhood and the apartment itself will make your stay an amazing experience.

Located in the Lawnmarket area of Royal Mile, minutes away from the Castle!

On the 1st floor, sorry no lift!

description:

description:

On the 1st floor, sorry no lift

description:
4 bedroom apartment, Next to the Castle!
Located just a few steps from the Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile, close to all attractions Edinburgh's famous Old Town has to offer. This fantastic apartment will make your stay unforgettable! The apartment is a great space for the Festival and also very close to shopping opportunities, bars, pubs, and public transport. The cozy atmosphere of the neighborhood and the apartment itself will make your stay an amazing experience.

name: Royal Mile 4 Bedroom and 3 Bathroom Apt for 10 per
description: Modern and spacious apartment. This is a stunning 4 bedroom apartment located on the world famous Great Mile in Edinburgh City Centre. The spacious apartment can accommodate up to eight (+2)* guests. Two additional guests could be accomodated on two fold up beds. On the 3rd floor, sorry no lift.

name: Royal Mile 4 Bedroom 4 bathroom Apartment
description:
4 bedroom 4 bathroom apartment sleeps up to 20, on the Royal Mile and a few minutes from the Castle
Located and close to all attractions, restaurants and bars on Edinburgh's famous Old Town has to offer. This fantastic apartment will make your stay unforgettable! The apartment is a great space for the Festival and also very close to shopping opportunities, bars, pubs, and public transport.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Ocean's 2 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Ocean Serviced Apartments offer a Two Bedroom Serviced Apartment, sleeping 4 persons.

This comfortable apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, open plan kitchen and lounge area. The beds in this apartment can be set as king size or single beds, based on your preferences. A FREE underground parking and a complimentary WIFI will be provided. Our building is located at the sea front, approximately 2.5 miles from the city centre. A direct bus to the centre stops just outside our building.

name: VINTAGE apt,pvt GARDEN,wifiNEW TOWN
description: Unique vintage apartment with very peaceful private walled garden, super comfy memory foam bed double bed, all 10 minutes’ walk from city centre, close to tram line, buses & attractions. Travel crib (babies) & high chair available. Parking nearby. Free Wi-Fi.

name: Double bedroom in quiet flat close to city centre
description: A cosy double bedroom in a warm and friendly ground floor flat in the popular neighbourhood of Marchmont, with cafes and pubs, shops, museum, cinema and theatre all within walking distance.  A light homemade breakfast is provided.

name: Bright, spacious Victorian flat,
description: Our bright spacious apartment is located in the heart of Morningside.  Free on street parking round the corner in Balcarres Street.  It has a large kitchen dining room with utility room off it, 4 large double bedrooms, 1 bathroom (just refurbished with walk in shower, bath, toilet and sink, new pictures still to be posted) large hall with another WC with toilet and sink. Bus stop outside to the city centre in 15 minutes, buses every few minutes, or 25 minute walk.

name: Fab Festival Flat,under the castle,
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Double room,Private  Bathroom , Free Parking,
description:
Double bedroom with your own private bathroom. Toiletries and hair dryer, Towels provided.
Free parking available ( I will give you a permit)

name: Smart Apartment by Edinburgh Castle
description: Lady Wynd is situated the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town, just off the  Grassmarket. It lies in the shadow of Edinburgh Castle, The apartment is close to a rich variety of restaurants and bars.and most of Edinburgh highlights are a short walk
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Home from Home at Number 2
Ocean's Family Apartment
description:
Ocean Serviced Apartments offer a Two Bedroom Serviced Apartment, sleeping 5 persons.
This comfortable apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, open plan kitchen and lounge area. The beds in this apartment can be set as king size or single beds, based on your preferences. A FREE underground parking and a complimentary WIFI is provided. Our building is located at the sea front, approximately 2.5 miles from the city centre. A direct bus to the centre stops just outside our building.

name: Central Garden Flat + Car Parking
description:
Terrars Croft is a garden apartment on the edge of peaceful Holyrood Park.
All of Edinburgh city centre with its historic and cultural locations are a short walk.
After a day of sight seeing you can return to your own apartment and garden to relax and unwind.
If you require a active break, the apartment is on the cycle path and minutes from the Royal Commonwealth pool.
The added bonus of Terrars Croft is your own car parking space, where you can safely park up and and enjoy the City.

name: The Broughton Road Residence
description:
Broughton Road Apartment is a bright first floor apartment in a traditional stone built building, located 1 mile from Princes Street the heart of Edinburgh. This self-catering apartment is fully furnished and decorated to a 3 star standard to make your stay in Edinburgh as comfortable as possible.

The apartment is a pleasant walk to many other major Edinburgh attractions such as the Royal Scottish Museum and the National Gallery of Scotland.

name: Double Room, Central Edinburgh B&B
description:
Very central, friendly Franco/Scottish family B&B. Double Room with shared bathroom. On separate floor of the house from your host so nice and private.

There are steep stairs and a very cuddly cat so this house is not suitable for the disabled or elderly or those with cat allergies. Linen, towels, hair-dryer provided. Wifi, TV in each room. Very close to city centre, University, theatres, cinemas and restaurants, yet in a nice quiet street.

name: Courtyard setting near Airport-1
description: Addiston Mains is a home away from home and although it is really handy for the airport, city and travel to other parts of Scotland it retains a relaxing and comfortable country feel with a modern style. The many repeat visitors is testimony to that.

name: Central, elegant, bright loft with stunning views.
description: My apartment is on two floors: upstairs is the open plan living space topped by cupolas that flood the area with light; downstairs are the four bedrooms. The apartment sits in a quiet residential street, yet there are bars, restaurants, cafes, a cinema, theatre, bus and tram stops a few minutes away. It's just twelve minutes walk to Princes Street or the historic Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle. Calton hill is a couple of minutes from our door and from the top you can see all Edinburgh.

name: Central Royal Mile Apartment 3 bedrooms 2 bathroom
description:
3 bedrooms with total 3 double beds
two shower rooms
kitchen/living room 2 in 1 type
No lift access second floor
3 double beds , no sofa beds
Fully furnished.
central location.
Suitable for short and long stay.
June to August short term holiday letting.
Sep to June long term lease only. Requirement is 2 single occupancy or a couple plus a single or a family due to the HMO rule of Scottish Law. a lease will be signed for long staying.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Private room in central, spacious and comfy flat
description: Fantastic main door flat over two levels within easy walking distance of the city centre and right on the airport bus route.  Lots of great communal space, private bathroom and access to a shared garden (great when it's sunny!)

name: 51 18 Caledonian Crescent
description: This beautiful third floor apartment is set in a unique welcoming development, to the west of Edinburgh city centre

name: Refurbished Flat in a Georgian Era Building in New Town
description: A stunning apartment in the heart of Edinburgh's New town, perfectly located for accessing shops, restaurants and the most popular tourist attractions including Edinburgh Castle. Tastefully modernised retaining original 18th century features, the apartment provides modern luxuries and comfort for the perfect stay in this beautiful city.

name: Historic City Centre/Royal Mile. Free parking
description:
This is a comfortable and well equipped modern 1st floor apartment with free secure underground parking in a superb location at the heart of Edinburgh's old town.

Tucked away just a few steps off the Royal Mile in a quiet and well kept courtyard development, the apartment is close to the majority of visitor attractions, and suits couples, families, business travellers and groups of friends.

name: Jeffrey St (Flat 14), Royal Mile, Old Town
description: A bright, centrally located one-bedroom apartment (sleeps 1–3) off the Royal Mile, with spectacular views of the city and surrounding area from a rooftop terrace and within easy walking distance of the major tourist attractions, festival venues, etc. This property is on the fourth (top) floor; there is no lift.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Royal Mile- lovely 1600's Close
Fabulous City Center Apartment Edin
description: Ground floor apartment with its own private entrance. Consists of 1 Quad bedroom with en-suite, 1 Twin bedroom with en-suite, 1 Double bedroom and a separate main bathroom. This apartment can sleep up to 8 people or 9 with the addition of a guest bed (£25 supplement applies)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 2 bed / 2 bath central apartment - high spec
description:
The apartment block was one of the first flats to be built in the New Town by James Craig in 1790 and sits directly adjacent to the Edinburgh town house of Sir Walter Scott!

Larger parties can enquire about our other apartment in the same building - The Walter Scott Suite. It has the same high spec and stunning views of Edinburgh Castle. Combined, both properties can accommodate up to 8 / 10 people comfortably.

name: Warrender Apartment Edinburgh
description: Warrender is part of the Victorian apartments built in the 1900’s near the Meadows and Bruntsfield Links. With its framed views of Edinburgh Castle, café culture and family vibe it is a great location to visit the vibrant city centre.

name: Twin Room, Central Edinburgh B&B
The Hart Street Residence
description: This bright and spacious central apartment for 4, boasts a king size bed in the master bedroom and double bed in the second bedroom. It is situated on the second floor of an attractive Georgian town house in Edinburgh’s historic New Town, just 10 mins walk to the city centre.

name: Classical Apartment on Royal Mile
description: Romantic apartment in the heart of the Old Town of Edinburgh, very much the perfect base from which to explore the city
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The David Hume Residence (Edinburgh)
description: Situated at the top of the famous Royal Mile, 100 metres from the entrance to Edinburgh Castle is the newly-refurbished David Hume Residence. It is in a grade A listed building within the Edinburgh Old Town UNESCO world heritage site, and is named after the famous Scottish Philosopher who took up residence in the culturally significant Riddell’s Court in 1751.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central Georgian Home with Parking, Art & Antiques
description:
Luxury self catering apartment in a B listed Georgian building with many beautiful period features.
Furnished and decorated to a high standard.
Centrally located, within walking distance of all Edinburgh's City centre attractions.
Free parking in our private gated lane.

name: VERY central 1 bed apt - Wi-Fi and PS2!
description: A cosy haven to come home to in a bustling neighbourhood, minutes walk from the City Centre!

name: The Lochend Park View Residence
description:
The Lochend Park View Residence with lift and private balcony is bright and spacious, enjoying good views to Lochend Loch at front and from the back to the City of Edinburgh.

The apartment is located in a quiet cul-de-sac two miles from the city centre and close to the local amenities on offer on Easter Road and Leith Walk. There is a huge cosmopolitan variety of small local retailers, cafes and restaurants. A Sainsburys supermarket is nearby at Meadowbank Retails Park.

name: Edinburgh Waterfront Apartment
description:
Available is a spacious apartment with two double bedrooms, bathroom with bath and shower, balcony and free parking.

The apartment is situated by the beach with good local amenities and excellent transport links to the centre of town (3m/5km).

Bedding includes 1 bedroom with king size bed, 1 bedroom with double bed and 1 x single bed.

(optional sofa bed and cot available on request)

name: The Royal Mile Apartment, Edinburgh
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely double bedroom near the sea
Grassmarket & Castle Views in Central Edinburgh
description: This spacious and bright one-bedroom apartment is located on a peaceful side street, off the famous and historic Grassmarket, in the centre of Edinburgh's Old Town. Fully licensed property - licence number EH-69130-F
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Penthouse room on the seafront in Edinburgh
description: Lovely, bright, quiet room on the top floor of a modern apartment block on the seafront in Granton Harbour 3 miles north of the centre of the city. Well connected by buses and walking routes, free parking, magnificent views. Continental breakfast included and free wifi. We also live in the apartment. Guests use the main bathroom and we use our own ensuite. Guests have access to the kitchen, dining and living areas. If we have visitors they will also use the main bathroom. We have a friendly dog.

name: Charming & central double bedroom
description: Beautiful sunny flat in popular vibrant Stockbridge village in Edinburgh.  Close to Botanic gardens, restaurants and independent shops.  River walk at end of street and swimming pool/gym opposite.  Walking distance to centre of town.

name: High St Flat - Amazing Views!
description: Wonderfully spacious studio flat right on the High Street with spectacular views over Edinburgh. Unbeatable central location on the Royal Mile. Fantastic choice of restaurants and bars nearby.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central yet quiet with parking
description:
City centre location. Secure Parking. Quiet bedrooms. Two bathrooms. All mod cons. Perfect place to stay to explore the city.

I love the location of this flat - so central - on The Royal Mile, next to the Scottish Parliament and with views over Holyrood Park. There is no traffic or street noise. The flat is always warm and has a small balcony.

name: Portobello Edinburgh Seaside Flat
Spacious  3 bedroom flat walk to all attractions
description:
Sunny, spacious, Victorian flat in the centre of Edinburgh with fabulous views of the historic Bruntsfield Golf Links The flat is within walking distance to all attractions. Edinburgh castle and the Royal Mile are 20 minutes on foot.
The flat is on a quiet street in the centre, yet feels like if you were in the country.
This allows you a taste of both worlds, both the bustling and cultural side to Edinburgh and the relaxing and cosy feel of being at home, perfect after a day sight seeing.

name: Picardy Place Apartment, Edinburgh.
description:
A contemporary, spacious apartment with high standard and beautiful furnished.
Bright and comfortable this third floor apartment, (no lift),
Also offers a stunning view from all the windows to the Carlton Hill Monument.
Situated opposite to the Edinburgh Playhouse Theater and within few munites walking away from Price Street and the main Attractions , easy to find and also near in 5/7 minutes walking distance from Waverly
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

Great View flat in centre 3 bedroom flat
