The flat is within walking distance to all attractions. Edinburgh castle and the Royal Mile are 20 minutes on foot.
The flat is on a quiet street in the centre, yet feels like if you were in the country.
This allows you a taste of both worlds, both the bustling and cultural side to Edinburgh and the relaxing and cosy feel of being at home, perfect after a day sight seeing.

name: Central apartment with castle view
description: A cosy bright apartment, centrally located in the heart of old historic Edinburgh beneath the castle. All the main tourist and festival attractions are within walking distance: the Castle, the Royal Mile, National Museum, National Gallery, Princes street and much more. Free wi-fi is available.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central, Spacious, Accessible Apt, with parking.
description: Large, modern, luxury 3 bed apt, comfortably sleeping 6 guests; with private parking. This fresh, clean apt in the heart of the City provides a peaceful retreat amongst all that the City has to offer. We provide a friendly welcome and a flexible service. With everything you could want only a short walk away, some things to mention, Holyrood Palace, The Parliament, The Castle, The Playhouse Theatre, Botanic Gardens and Princes Street.

name: carlton · CITY RETREAT EDINBURGH city centre
description: Excellent location 10 mins to  city center by foot exclusive area see details superb property 150sq meters. 5 minutes from the playhouse and close to Waverley station .Carlton Hill and Aruther Seat and Scottish parliament close .

name: Apartment with City View near to Edinburgh Centre.
description: Superb views of Edinburgh Castle & Skyline can be enjoyed from this sunny, modern, well equipped clean 2 bed apartment with parking & wifi. All linen & heating inc. Great location for exploring one of the Best Cities in the World & on an excellent bus route. Opposite many shops inc. M&S.

name: Basement garden flat nr Leith shore
Super King room in the heart of town
description: Super King sized comfy bed private room in a 3-bedroom quiet apartment right in the city centre. Within 5 minutes walk to Waverley Station and close to all the attractions! Full access to the kitchen! Wifi is of course included :)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cozy double room in the heart of Edinburgh
description: Double room in a 3-bedroom quiet apartment right in the city centre. Within 5 minutes walk to Waverley Station and close to all the attractions! Full access to the kitchen! Wifi is of course included :)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Elegant, Central, Five Bed Townhouse fast Wifi
description:
Large private house.

Walk to the centre of Edinburgh from the House within 6 minutes.

Close to Haymarket train Station.

Table football in large living room.

Latest broadband upgrade to super-fast wifi throughout the house.

name: New Town 2bed in fantastic location
description:
Our Georgian flat in superb New Town location. Fully refurbished with space for 4 people to enjoy the magic of Edinburgh.

Easy access from airport train & bus stations.

A quiet retreat with great cafes, pubs, restaurants & attractions close by. Cosy and comfortable with art and prints to enjoy.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely central double room + bkfst
Stunning New Town Apartment
3 b/r flat to let in Newington (MS)
description:
Please note that the apartment is on third floor and there is no lift.
Thanks

name: Heart of old town - entire flat
description: Situated just off the Royal Mile on Cockburn St. Great for access to all festival venues, 5 minutes walk from Waverley train station. A modern clean flat in a traditional tenement, this cozy space has the best of both worlds. Wifi, TV etc, featured in the hit movie 'Hallam Foe'! Please note that during August I am looking for bookings of 5 days or more.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Modern room (1 double bed) in 2 bedroom apartment
description: A modern apartment in the heart of Leith, with all the local trendy amenities Leith has to offer.  It is very accessible as there are buses to the city centre from outside the apartment (but this does mean there is traffic noise heard from the apartment). The tram to the city centre and airport is two blocks away, which is a 5 minute walk.

name: Ideal House, Leith, Edinburgh
description: The perfect base for a large group visiting Edinburgh, our beautiful home is in the heart of Leith, next to plenty of cafes, bars and restaurants and with excellent transport links to the city centre.

name: Botanic Gardens double bed en suite
description: Lovely garden room at the edge of the Botanics, with private bathroom and shower.  We're non-smokers, and we have a golden retriever.

name: Lovely sunny double room on Rankeillor Street.
description: Lovely sunny/peaceful double room. Newington is right at the heart of the festival area with great restaurants, coffee shops and bars as well as parks if you want to get away from it all. In August the room is available for the festival period.

name: Stay in the city, 5 minutes to Princes  Street
description:
2nd floor apartment in the heart of the city centre, a few minutes walk from St Andrews Square. Surrounded by highly rated bars and restaurants as well as being directly on the tramline connecting you to the airport.

NOTE: If booking to stay in September scaffold is erected on building exterior to provide access to repair roof Monday to Friday. No work taking place on scaffold, it is only for access. Roof is 2 floors above the flat. Windows are not obscured but some scaffold can be seen.

name: Beautiful room in the Dell!
description: Enjoy the beauty of historic Colinton Village and Dell. This  beautiful house is  in a unique and amazing space, with its beautiful river walks and wildlife yet minutes from the lovely village -visit  Robert Louis Stevenson statue and trail.

name: Luxury Holyrood flat, free parking
description: Lovely, bright, modern 3rd floor flat (top, no lift) with views of Arthur's seat. 15 minutes from Edinburgh centre by bus, sleeps 6. 1 parking space off road.

name: Holyrood Park apartment
description:
Our self-catering accommodation is on the top floor of a Victorian building in Edinburgh on Royal Park Terrace enjoys uninterrupted views of Arthur's Seat and Holyrood Park from!
We do not have an elevator in the building and there are 3 flights of stairs making us unsuitable for those with mobility issues.
We recommend that you travel lightly!
4 people only including babies and children

name: LARGE COLOURFUL ROOM CENTRE OF TOWN
description: Set in the heart of the city, this 18th-century apartment has great, colourful open spaces with plenty of room to breathe. It is a short stroll from the beautiful Calton Hill and its magnificent views. Restaurants, bars and boutiques in the vicinity.

name: Stunning Penthouse, Free Parking!
Old Town flat with open views
description:
Available now on long term let.

Traditional top floor flat in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, with stunning view's of the South of the City including Arthur's seat and Salisbury Crags. Surrounded by all the museums, theatres and a host of excellent restaurants and bars.

On the same street that Charles Darwin lived when studying in Edinburgh, the property has been let out to students during term time and performers during the festival month of August for the last few years.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Vibrant Flat with Fantastic Views by the Royal Mile
description:
Things I love about my flat - the views and the location.
This is a very spacious 1 bedroom property, approximately 90 sq meters.

This place may not be suitable for those who are sensitive to city centre sounds: sirens, revellers, traffic etc. The noise from other dwellings in the stair can be annoying at times. I would recommend ear plugs if you are a light sleeper.

The flat is up 2 flights of stairs.

The entire apartment is available to guests.

I am available by phone, text and email. I will get back to you ASAP and in any event within 24 hours

Old town

The train station is a 5 minute walk away and there are regular buses available on the Mound and trams on Princess Street, which you can see from the lounge window.

The flat has superfast fibre internet. There are Ethernet ports throughout the flat. This would make an excellent let for visitors on business. The secondary glazing makes this a peaceful f
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The York Place Residence
description:
This is a fantastic apartment sleeps six guests in three bedrooms, and is right in the heart of the city centre. The local area, the New Town, is awash with restaurants, bars and shopping, and the Old Town is just a few minutes away.

The living area is open plan, with feature fireplace and expertly furnished. Cable TV, DVD player, DVDs, CD/Radio player and WiFi are all available for guests use. The adjoining kitchen comes with all mod cons, breakfast bar and coved dining area.

name: Charming Renovated 19th-century Coach House
description: Self catering apartment on two floors. This imaginatively converted 19th century coach house has a hall, kitchen and shower room on the ground floor with stairs up to a large, bright living space with dining area and south facing double bedroom.

name: Walk along the Royal Mile from an Elegant Apartment
description:
Enter into a magical courtyard off the Royal Mile guarded by four blue and gold dragons and you step back in time to a mystical period. The property dates from 1790 but has been sympathetically upgraded. The wonders of the Edinburgh Festival and Fringe are right on your doorstep, or, if you prefer, close the door and people watch from your bedroom or living room which look straight on to the Royal Mile. You really couldn't get a better position to enjoy the Castle, the Palace, Arthurs Seat or the wonders of the Old Town of Edinburgh.

Entire property.

I will be in the local area and always on hand if you have a question or an issue.

Set in the heart of Old Town, the flat is steps away from the vibrant boutiques, craft shops, pubs, and restaurants that line the area’s quaint streets and alleyways. It’s an ideal stepping off point for visiting many museums and historic sites.

This apartment is based on the Royal Mile where tour buses leave on a
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: V. comfortable double bedroom, ensuite shower/wc
description:
Quiet, comfortable,double room with bay window, sofa and central heating. Take a bus to the city or a wander in our greenbelt area. Comfortable sitting room, freshly ground coffee, free wifi, free parking, and a warm welcome await you.

City of Edinburgh Short Term Let Licence Number: EH-70247-F
Energy Efficiency Rating: Band D

name: Spacious Old Town home with 2 Bathrooms/Parking
description:
Fully licenced central two bedroom flat on lower ground floor with street level windows and parking.
Contactless self check-in with lockbox.
Free car park spot available but must be reserved at the same time you book my apartment. I cannot guarantee the space will be available at later date.

PLEASE NOTE THIS IS NOT PARTY APARTMENT.STRICTLY NO STAG,HEN OR ANY KIND OF PARTIES!!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Royal Mile One Apartment, city centre
description:
Lovely city centre apartment just off the Royal Mile in a quiet setting with parking and option for either single or double beds. Just a short walk from the superb green space, Arthur’s Seat, which is perfect for a leisurely stroll or a quiet picnic spot. Great location to explore the cities famous cobbled streets of the Royal Mile towards Edinburgh Castle.
There is also a private parking space and beds can be double or singles. Treats & activities available at Carfrae Farm.

name: Small double bedroom en-suite
description:
Sonas Guest House is a converted 19th century Victorian Villa, built in the 1870's for the directors of the Railway, many of its original features have been retained.
We offer warm, cosy accommodation with the luxury of bath and/or shower en-suite. We offer single, double, twin, and family rooms which feature free WiFi, flat screen TV, hair dryer and refreshment tray.

We have free Private Parking for cars, SORRY WE DO NOT TAKE MOTORBIKES! There is a no smoking policy throughout the guest house.

name: Quiet Royal Mile Flat, own door on secluded square
description:
The ground floor apartment has its own front door so no need to share any communal areas with other people.

Picture yourself in the centre of the Old Town just 2 minutes walk from the historical Royal Mile yet in a quiet square away from the busy crowds.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: City Centre Suite, Edinburgh
description:
Studio Apartment Located in Edinburgh’s Historic Newtown
•Studio, sleeps 2 persons
•Open plan bedroom & breakfast area
•Separate W.C/ Shower room
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Free Private Parking: Holyroodhouse Palace Apt.
description:
####BOOK WITH CONFIDENCE!####
License and planning granted to continue LEGALLY as a holiday let. Not all have this, so check before booking!

Cozy, comfortable home. Traditional Scottish flair mixed with modernity and everything you need. One bedroom flat (sleeps 4) in superb central location, opposite Holyroodhouse Palace, private car parking and WiFi. Airport bus stops a 10 minute walk away, most attractions within walking distance.

name: Courtyard setting near airport-2
description:
What guests value about staying here is the peaceful location and tranquility of country life. Space to breathe and choose your own pace.
Guests from across the spectrum of society come and enjoy our modernised, stone farm buildings. From workers, to students, to families and international travellers we have enjoyed meeting many global and local travellers who have rested, recharged and refuelled in their own unique ways.

name: charming flat in stockbridge
description: Beautiful sunny flat in popular Stockbridge village in Edinburgh with restaurants and independent shops.  Walking distance to centre of town. River walk at end of street, close to cycle routes, & swimming pool and gym opposite.

name: Double/twin bedroom en-suite
description:
Sonas Guest House is a converted 19th century Victorian Villa, built in the 1870's. Conveniently situated on the south side of the city - 20 minutes walking distance from Royal Mile - this charming guest house is located on a quiet side street yet is only a two minute walk to the main road where several buses are available to speed you into the town centre.
So leave your car in our free private car park and forget about the hassle of driving.

name: New Town Apartment - 5 Bedroom
description: Situated in The New Town , this Garden level apartment has its own private entrance. The sleeping arrangement consists of 2 Triple bedrooms each with en-suites, 1 Double bedroom with main bathroom opposite and 2 single box rooms. Can sleep up to 10 people or 11 with the addition of a guest bed (£30 supplement applies. )
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Modern Cozy Garden flat City Centre
Charming flat in Georgian house
description: Comfortable light one bed/sitting room flat down steps from street level with own kitchen, shower room and dry storage cellar opposite the entrance door to the flat at basement level with washing/drying machine. Situated centrally in the upmarket and lively Stockbridge area. Easy access to the city centre by foot/public transport.

name: Castle View
description: Bright, modern and cosy one bedroom apartment with stunning views of Edinburgh Castle from bedroom and kitchen.  Situated in the heart of old historic Edinburgh within walking distance of all city centre attractions. Well equipped kitchen and comfortable bed.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Serenity Single Room in the Dell
description: Enjoy the buzz of Edinburgh but stay in peaceful Colinton village & Dell. We have a lovely single room especially for you! Feels like the country, yet we are close to the airport, city, hills and sea. Relaxation therapies available in house. Well-behaved dogs welcome. Dog walking service available.

name: Edinburgh Palace Apartment near Royal Mile
description: The Edinburgh Palace Apartment is in a superb location, on the ground floor in a quiet area close to Edinburgh's main tourist attractions such as the Palace of Holyroodhouse and the Royal Mile just a 5 minute walk away. Free private parking, king size bed with quality Sealy mattress, dressing table and large wardrobes. New modern walk in shower room and heated towel rail. Kitchen with all facilities and free welcome pack. Bright and welcoming livingroom with seating, dining table and  smartTV.

name: Royal Mile Apartment Edinburgh
description:
A great one-bedroom apartment at the heart of Edinburgh, Old Town and the Royal Mile itself! The flat is located on the third floor of a historic building offering great views of Edinburgh High Street. Quiet and spacious bedroom to the rear guarantees a relaxing stay.
Guests should expect to walk up and down stairs during their stay.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Shaftesbury Park - Your home from home
description: Shaftesbury Park is a comfortable artist-owned traditional ground floor flat in a Victorian terraced house with fast wifi and its own little garden. It lies two miles southwest of Edinburgh Castle in a leafy conservation area and is only a short bus ride from all major visitor attractions. A well-stocked delicatessen is just across the road and provides delicious croissants and wines. Active guests love the 30min walk along the scenic Union Canal which takes them straight to the city centre.

name: Incredibly central 18th c 3bdr flat
description: Stay in an historic flat in the very heart of Edinburgh right on Calton Hill! Great view, Princes Street 3 minute walk, Waverley train station 6 minutes. Charming "farm" style kitchen, very comfy sitting room, rear picture window with great view. Sleeps up to 6 in 3 bedrooms. Owner runs travel company and frequently abroad. Agents speak English and Portuguese
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious Canalside Apartment
description: Light and airy third floor flat with 1 bedroom, lounge and large eat-in kitchen. Excellent views across the city skyline. Walking distance to city centre.

name: Large Duplex Flat with Roof Balcony
description:
Former Crabbies Ginger Ale Warehouse converted in 2003 and comprising of Spacious Lounge, 2 very Spacious Double Bedrooms plus Roof Balcony. The flat is very comfortable and quiet on 4th floor but please note there is no lift although the stairs are fairly shallow.
Private off-road parking available if arriving by car. Secure bicycle storage available also.

name: Stylish & Spacious Grassmarket 2bed/2bath
description:
**Nov 2022 - renovated bathrooms**

Spacious, clean and modern 2 bed, 2 WC apartment in the heart of the Old Town. Nestled in between the Grassmarket and Royal Mile, within a courtyard behind the main street with beautiful stone walls.

If you're visiting for the Edinburgh festival, 75% of venues are within 7 minutes walk so you can see an afternoon show and retreat to your private hideaway to relax, shower, eat and check email before heading to your next show.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy Edinburgh cottage, near Portobello beach
description: This two-bedroom detached cottage is a cosy retreat from the hustle and bustle of the city but is a short walk to Portobello promenade and beach. The cottage sleeps up to 4 people in a double and twin bedroom with shower  bathroom. The ground floor is open-plan living & dining opening onto a patio and sunny enclosed garden. The separate kitchen is fully equipped and also opens onto the garden. There's a downstairs toilet next to the entrance vestibule and off-road parking infront of the cottage.

name: Quartermile Luxury Apartment
description:
A modern one bedroom apartment located in the prestigious Quartermile development in Edinburgh's old town. This safe, quiet development provides a mix of beautiful apartments, cafes and restaurants, allowing you to experience modern luxury whilst enjoying all Edinburgh's centre has to offer on your doorstep. Interior design quality throughout.
Smart TV, WiFi internet access with high-speed fibre optic are provided.
Newly refurbished bathroom with walk in shower
Fully equipped high spec kitchen

name: Views, Hammock, Sofa bed,Platform bed & Open Fire!
description: Have a wee dram of whisky by the Open Fire, Relax in the Hammock or take advantage of the location!  1 Double Bedroom with the option of Sleeping 2 more on a comfortable double sofabed in the living room, this flat offers great Value!  Located just 5 mins from the City Centre by bus or 15 mins by foot you are perfectly situated to explore the citand also have the advantage of Free Parking outside. Access to Hollyrood park is just 5 mins on foot and leads onto Edinburghs own mountain Arthur's Seat.  Ajoined to Hollyrood Park is the Palace, Parliament and the historic Royal Mile!

name: Victorian self contained apartment
description: This self-contained apartment is in a converted section of our large Victorian family home. It is full of character and one mile south of city centre, with a bus stop right outside. Handy for George Square, Gilded Balloon, Pleasance etc.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Murrayfield Indaba
description: A real wee gem - a calm and peaceful oasis in the midst of Murrayfield … you’ve got to stay here for your next big visit to either of the Murrayfield stadiums, for the festival or just visiting the city. Right next to both the murrayfield stadiums (but you’d never believe it) or near tynecastle stadium and just a 10 min bus  or 20 minute walk into central Edinburgh (we’re so close you can actually just see the castle from here) - walk to local pubs, restaurants and shops

name: Charming Rm w/ Private Bath, Stockbridge Edinburgh
description:
Double room, with private bathroom, in a beautiful flat in the Edinburgh suburb of Stockbridge.

The Sunday Times readers named Stockbridge as the best place to live in the UK!

Walking distance of the city centre, Festival, Castle, Murrayfield, Princess St, best restaurants & bars in Edinburgh. Well serviced by buses.

Next to a lovely park, the Botanical Gardens & Water of Leith path.

For cat lovers, you will be sharing with me and my lovely, friendly cats, Whisky and Mac.

name: Stylish Apartment near Royal Mile with Netflix!
description:
Now with Netflix free of charge!

Lovely 1 bedroom apartment for up to 4 to sleep. Unlimited Wi-Fi internet access. Walking distance to the Royal Mile and very close to the city centre.

Easy self check in system in place, to provide guests with maximum flexibility with check in/out times.

In the apartment can sleep 2 people in the bedroom, but can easily accommodate 2 more guests in the big and comfortable double sofa bed located in the living room area.

name: Delightful Georgian Pied-à-Terre in Central New Town
description:
Diligently owner-managed and lying off a private courtyard, this delightful city-centre main-door flat is spacious, bright and sunny. Descend a stone stairway, and once inside everything is geared to your comfort, enjoyment and wellbeing, helped by us being Edinburgh locals who can step in and assist should the need arise. A sense of scale and serenity pervades the softly lit interior, where lovingly decorated rooms effortlessly blend every modern convenience with authenticity and traditional finishes. The updated kitchen and bathroom combine to offer all the comfort and features of home.

BEDROOM
Warmly lit by a floor-standing lamp, supplemented by reading lights within easy reach over the lovely Kingsize (5ft/152cm) bed. A huge built-in wardrobe with three mirrored doors provides great storage & hanging space, and the room is a short hop from the bathroom.

BATHROOM
The tiled bathroom features a full-width walk-in shower with powerful fixed & hand-held s

name: fabulous double en suite annexe
description: This annexe double bedroom is quite unique! The bed is a queen double or can be separated into twin beds. It has an en suite shower room with toilet. There are two comfy chairs as well as a desk. It is tucked away in a very large and beautiful flat that is the second (top) floor of a converted Methodist Church Hall. You have access to kitchen facilities, shared with one other guest.

name: Large, sunny Edinburgh Apartment
description: This spacious and sunny apartment has 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a generous sized kitchen and a large sitting/dining room overlooking the Bruntsfield Links.  Perfect for walking to the University part of town. On good bus routes.

name: Super 2 bedroom 2 bathroom cityflat
description:
This spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment (with lift access) is in a waterside development just a 15 minute walk from Princes Street and 10 minute walk from Haymarket train station. The Dean Village is a few minutes walk away and approximately a 10 minute walk away is an excellent selection of bars and restaurants in the city’s West End.

The bathroom only has a hand-held shower.

name: Royal Mile Old Town Edinb'gh Castle
description: Fabulous 2 bedroom apartment, completely renovated to luxurious standard, in the best location. Views onto Royal Mile. Every modern convenience.  Designer fabrics, wallpapers, free wifi, internet tv, underfloor heating.  Extremely comfortable.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious City Centre Apartment
description:
Located in the New Town, just a 10 minute walk from Princes Street, our 3 bedroom apartment is on the top 2 floors of a 200 year old townhouse. There is 1 double bedroom, a single bedroom and upstairs a triple bedroom with 1 double and 2 single beds.

Please note that the apartment is up two floors so there are stairs to climb - about 45 in total - so the apartment is not suitable for the elderly and infirm.

name: Royal Mile near Edinburgh Castle
description: Fabulous 2 bedroom apartment, luxurious standard, in the very best Royal Mile location beside Edinburgh Castle. Views directly onto the Royal Mile. Every modern convenience.  Designer fabrics and wallpapers, free wifi, internet tv, underfloor heating.  Secure entry. Cosy & comfortable. 200 yards from Edinburgh Castle.  An ideal base for exploring Edinburgh's main city attractions.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Fabulous Georgian family Townhouse
description:
This fine Georgian upper townhouse makes a perfect base for exploring Edinburgh. It has every comfort to be your home-from-home.

Please note: this is a traditional Edinburgh Georgian “double upper” and there are 5 short flights of stairs (48 steps) to the front door. Sadly, it is not wheelchair accessible.

We have a 5 night minimum stay policy during Christmas, New Year & during the festival in August.

name: Beautiful, Spacious, en-suite, twin room
description:
Lovely, spacious, twin room with private en-suite facilities.
Recently refurbished en-suite and quality carpets throughout.

name: Dovecot Mews Apartment
description: This Mews Apartment is bright & modern. Fully equipped kitchen. Open plan dining & living area. Free wifi &  sky TV including movies and all sports channels. There is a private driveway for parking 2 vehicles.

name: Fantastic Loft Style Apartment
description: Light and spacious apartment on a quiet street seconds away from Leith Walk and only 15 minutes walk from Princes Street. Uniquely converted to make the most of light and space this flat is one of a kind.

name: Stunning Castle View Apartment in The Old Town
description: Marvel at the stunning castle views from this cosy, classic Edinburgh apartment. Large sash windows, Scottish-themed decor, and a mix of vintage furniture ensures that everyone who enters this home has a true Edinburgh experience. We look forward to welcoming you for your stay in one of the best locations in Edinburgh! In the heart of the Old Town you will have Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile on your doorstep, and bars and restaurants galore. Licence no EH-69315-F
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Grand, spacious and central ground floor flat
description: This is a generously proportioned traditionally featured Edinburgh tenement flat. Close to the city centre and the tram line which goes to Murrayfield, a great place from which to enjoy Edinburgh

name: Under the Castle, Grassmarket
description: Bright, modern, cosy and quiet one bedroom apartment. Amazing views from building's walkways. Situated in heart old historic Edinburgh within walking distance of all city centre attractions.  Well equipped kitchen and very comfortable bed.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Rose St 3, city centre, 2 mins to Princes St
description: Rose St is just a stone's throw away from Princes St, the famous main street of Edinburgh with shops and restaurants on one side and the lovely Princes St Gardens on the other. Edinburgh Castle dominates the city above the Gardens.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Rose St 4, City Centre, 3 mins Princes St and tram
description: Rose St is just 40m away from Princes St, the famous main street of Edinburgh with shops and restaurants on one side and the lovely Princes St Gardens on the other. Edinburgh Castle dominates the city above the Gardens.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful, Spacious, Twin Room.
description: Large spacious twin room with own use, separate private bathroom /toilet/shower room.

name: V Central Holiday Flat, castle view
description:
Outstanding castle views. Extremely central base to explore Edinburgh.
Short walking distance to most tourist attractions and Festival venues.(e.g.Grassmarket with bars and restaurants - 1 minute walk. Princes St & gardens - 5 minutes walk.)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely ensuite room in Georgian flat nr Botanics
description: Single room in garden flat with ensuite bathroom. Very near Botanic Gardens and on 4 bus routes. Princes St is within walking distance. I share the flat with my Labradoodle pup, Charlie. No smokers please. Wifi available and use of kitchen. Laundry facilities available for stays of one week or more (or £15 for each wash/dry). There is also a laundrette nearby. 10% discount on prices for Scottish Gaelic speakers or learners.

name: Cosy Garden Room with Ensuite
description: Spacious king size bedroom with private ensuite and toilet. Welcome to our charming Victorian tenement flat, just a 20-minute walk from the city centre and 11 minutes from McDonald Road tram stop. Great for longer stays. Read our fantastic reviews and the full description before booking!

name: Lovely Victorian spacious flat close to centre
description: Sleeping 5 with capacity for an additional child in this 2 bedroom cosy Victorian flat only 10min walk to Royal Mile & 15min Princes Street. Easily reached from Airport & Train Station. High speed WiFi. Vibrant local area with shops & places to eat. Be reassured – assessed annually by VisitScotland (search Rossie Place Home). Our former home – not a flashy hotel look with minimal furnishings. Authentic Edinburgh flat.

name: Greenhill Garden Studio
description:
Self-Catering studio 40m2 apartment with free parking situated in the garden of established stone-built Bruntsfield home. The apartment is set within a leafy street of Victorian villas, next to the Meadows park. Within walking distance of Edinburgh’s historic city centre and Princes Street. Free off-street parking and wifi.

Perfect for visiting any of the Edinburgh Festivals, but allowing you to wander back via the parks for some urban tranquility with good cafes and bijou shops!

name: Abbey , Nice Edinburgh CityCenter Apartment
description:
AbbeyHill Arc1 City Centre Apartment.

This is a nice and quiet two bedroom Self Catering Apartment for up to 6 People, private parking possible, on the 4th floor with dramatic views over the Holyrood Park and Arthur's seat .

name: Castle View Apartment - great reviews
description:
Modern and cozy one bedroom flat in the heart of the city, lovely outlook to the castle.

Secure entry system

Fibre Internet WiFi (50mb/s)
Sonos music
PS3
One bedroom, king size bed
Sofa bed in lounge
Fully fitted kitchen
Washer & Dryer
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy Double Room
description: This is a small yet functional double room that looks out onto London Rd. There can be street noise as it is next to a road. This room has a shared bathroom with us (the hosts). We have another room that has ensuite. Check out our reviews and our other room!

name: Bethlehem way, Edinburgh , Scotland
description:
Whether you're in Edinburgh on business or leisure, Bethlehem way is the ideal base. Bigger, flexible and more relaxing than a hotel room, 2 bedroom apartment, all fully equipped for everything you need for a worry free experience.

The Licence number for the premises is EH-74471-F

name: Beautiful city centre apartment
description:
Beautifully furnished two-bedroom apartment in a central, but quiet, location, and within walking distance of most tourist attractions. If the hills are too much, a good bus service is nearby. The apartment is very comfortable - a real home from home. I live in the same building, so I'm available if you need help or advice.

PARKING: you MUST let me know if you plan to bring a car BEFORE booking. The available parking won't suit everyone.

name: Light spacious room in residential crescent
description: I'm walking distance from the city centre and also from Murrayfield  rugby stadium. I'm close to tram, bus and train links, while also being located in a  quiet residential street. My room is bright and spacious. Guests receive a warm welcome.  A wide selection of teas and coffee (instant and cafetiere)  are provided and you have a microwave, fridge, toaster, kettle and dining table. I'm a basement flat  down a short flight of steps. Family and gay friendly. No parking.

name: Lovely room in central, historic flat.
description: My flat is a spacious and homely ground floor flat located in the historic, residential neighbourhood of Marchmont.   There are lots of great little shops and cafes on the doorstep.  It is a 20 minute walk into the centre of town and the main train and bus stations, through The Meadows.  The location of the flat is perfect for getting to all the central Edinburgh Festival venues and for the University of Edinburgh campus in George Square.

name: Lovely apart in Grange nr Marchmont & Morningside
description: This is a beautiful and spacious drawing room flat with 2 bedrooms (1 double and 1 twin - which can also be a double)  on the 1st floor of a  Victorian house located in the Grange area of Edinburgh with stunning views. With traditional features and modern appliances  this apartment is a home from home.  There is free on street parking and a private garden for guest's use. Its a pleasant walk to city centre and there is an excellent bus service to the city centre just outside the apartment.

name: Modern 2 Bedroom Apt & Free Parking
description: Just been refurbished! Modern 2 Bedroom 1st floor flat with private parking near to city centre set in mature gardens by a nice park. Bus stop 100m from door with frequent service to city centre day and night in just 10 min. 5 min drive to City Bypass and all main routes.

name: Garden Flat in Edinburgh
description: Traditional colonies garden flat in heart of Edinburgh's Leith Links area offers a vibrant but private haven for visitors to Scotland's historic capital. The city centre is a twenty minute walk, with a good bus service available.  The property has 2 double bedrooms making it a relaxing space for families, couples or group of friends.

name: Nice Central Flat Walk to Princes StreetRoyal MIle
description:
Bright comfortable flat ideal for seeing The City by foot.

Holyrood Park and Scottish Parliament are just 10 minutes walk. The Royal Mile starts there and heads up hill to the Castle.

Quietly located, with shared rear garden space getting midday sun. Close to bus stop, good supermarket, and local services. Deli, coffee shop, off licence, food takeaways, real ale pubs. Walk to Waverley train station in 21 minutes with nice view over Arthurs Seat.

Wifi and towels provided.

name: Fabulous 4 Bedroom Festival  Meadows Flat
description: Centrally located on the edge of the Meadows, this  lovely 4 bedroom flat offers spacious, high quality accommodation for big families or groups of friends during the festival or throughout the year.

name: City Apartment
description: Welcome to my City Centre 2 bedroom flat located in the vibrant city of Edinburgh. This charming Airbnb offers a comfortable and inviting space for your stay in the heart of the city.

name: Elegant New Town Georgian city centre flat
description: Spacious, elegantly furnished apartment superbly located just one block from the central bus station and the airport-linked tram stop. Bars and restaurants are steps away and there's the magnificent private oasis of Queen St Gardens across the road.

name: Royal Mile apartment - Old Tolbooth
description: Old Tolbooth Wynd offers modern living and secure parking in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town. Located in an historic close on the famous Royal Mile, this spacious 1st floor, two bedroom apartment comfortably sleeps 4 people. Bedrooms are situated at the rear of the apartment overlooking the quiet courtyard area. The Royal Mile is just yards away however the street is residential meaning a quiet and peaceful nights sleep.

name: Spacious and comfortable Edinburgh flat
description:
Spacious and comfortable flat in old whisky wine warehouse ideally located for easy access to the vibrant Shore area of Leith with its fantastic selection of restaurants and attractions as well as being a short bus ride to the centre of Edinburgh.

Licence No. EH-76820-F

name: Spacious Edinburgh apartment - perfect location
description: My apartment is located in Comely Bank. It's the perfect base whilst visiting Edinburgh. A short walk takes you into the city centre and you have Stockbridge on your doorstep with bars, restaurants and shops. The flat itself is recently decorated and spacious.

name: Broompark, Liberton
description: The countryside within the city. Spacious modern house on ground and first-floors with 3 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms (sleeps 1-8) in idyllic country-park location less then 5km from Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile and Edinburgh city centre. Private parking

name: Modern,Spacious City Apartment Free Parking & WiFi
description:
NEW CARPETS AND FRESHLY DECORATED JAN 2025


Brand new St. James Quarter shopping centre is just 20 minutes by walk.

City Apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, Balcony, Lift, Free Wi-fi & parking. Beautiful views of Lochend Park, Arthur’s Seat and Carlton Hill.
Meadowbank shopping centre with Sainsbury's 5 minutes walk away.

Genius 1500 pocket sprung and hypo-allergenic mattresses -hotel style zip and link beds so can be make up with 2 single beds or 1 king size bed in each bedroom.

name: MODERN 3 BED - CITY-CENTRE sleeps 7
description: The 3 bedroom apartment is ideal for up to 6 guests and is centrally located - an excellent base from which to explore Edinburgh with everything very close at hand. Reserved one free car parking space provided.

name: Airy Apartment in Converted Warehouse
description: Located in the heart of the Old Town, a perfect pied-a-terre to explore the city and surroundings
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: City Haven Apartment ,Free parking
description:
This cozy apartment , a haven in the city, in the fashionable Canonmills area, of Edinburgh city centre near to all attractions.
Stylishly furnished, great location , supermarkets, cafés, bars, all within a 2 minute walk. Quiet peaceful development.

name: Basic Private room (x4)
description:
PLEASE NOTE: Check-in at or after 18 always applies with no exceptions
If you need to check-in earlier or leave your bags before 6PM please look elsewhere as I may not able to accommodate the request.
Budget and basic room ideal for visiting Edinburgh as it is only a short bus ride from city center. Free street parking and easy access from and to the airport. An excellent base for exploring this beautiful city

name: 1 Bed 1 Bath ROYAL MILE RESIDENCE
description:
Perfectly situated on Edinburgh's Royal Mile, the Royal Mile Residence is suitable for every occasion, whether it is a business trip, special event, family holiday or romantic break with amazing views across Edinburgh.
Please note that this particular apartment is a lovely penthouse on the 5th Floor (sorry no lift!)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Large room with 2 double beds + offstreet parking
description:
Our large family home is in a quiet suburban area, 5km west of Edinburgh city - 12 mins drive and 25 mins by bus to the city centre, 15 mins drive from Edinburgh airport.
Free off street parking + Wi-Fi. Use of our large kitchen and garden space. Guest room has 1 double bed and 1 double futon bed with a bathroom next door. We can comfortably host 3 friends or a family of 3. Breakfast is included in the price. No smoking allowed inside. We also have two friendly cats - Molly and Tiger. Fáilte!

name: Cosy Double in Stockbridge
description: This lovely cosy double room is in Stockbridge area which has a very cosmopolitan and bohemian atmosphere.  It is one of the most popular area in Edinburgh There are many fine dine restaurants bars and cafes. The flat is situated 15 minute walk from the west end of Princes street.

name: City Centre Main Door Apartment Gr8 Reviews
description:
After another fantastic year on Airbnb we are delighted that our property in the centre of Edinburgh is still on and available! With so much going on in Edinburgh; being in the heart of this amazing city allows you to experience the vibrance of history & culture from every angle. From the buildings, Theatres, amazing Restaurants & Edinburgh Festival; there is always something to do!
The Flat is perfect for Concerts & Rugby at Murrayfield Stadium; the Castle & Royal Mile is 10minutes away.

name: Cosy Top Floor Home by St Mark's Park / Broughton
description:
Welcome!

My bright and comfy home is one of the few top reviewed listings in the area, recognised by guests on their ratings, reviews and reliability with a rating above 4.90.

My top third floor flat (no elevator) is located in Broughton Road, just 30 mins walk to Princes St, Holyrood Palace & Royal Mile. Close by you will find St Marks Park, the Water of Leith walkway, the Botanic Gardens and many cafes/restaurants nearby.

MacDonald Road Tram stop is a short walk from my home.

name: Have a beautiful park view and walk everywhere
description: A true place of relaxation, opposite a beautiful park on which you can ponder and also a south facing back huge back garden where you can chill ..and next block to a great deli/coffee shop which serves breakfast, cake and all the rest . 5-10min walk to Royal Mile, Edinburgh University, Summerhall and Festival. Spacious double private room, shared use of bathroom, lounge & kitchen. Easy going host who shares the property.  Wifi

name: Half a mile from Holyrood Palace & Royal Mile!
description:
*FULLY LICENSED *

Cosy, chic and central one bedroom apartment with all modern amenities sleeping up to 3. Minutes walk away from the City Centre, The Royal Mile & Arthur Seat, Waverley train station and the tram terminal on York Place.

Set in a quiet street within a bustling area with lots of local amenities. Fantastic transport links to all parts of Edinburgh & surrounding areas on the doorstep.

The Royal Yacht is a short bus ride away or a nice walk on a sunny day!

name: Central New Town Apartment - Licence EH-69656-F
description: Located in the UNESCO world heritage site of Edinburgh's New Town, the apartment which was once Drambuie's HQ, offers an oasis in the heart of the city centre.  Only a few minutes walk from Waverley station and the tram stop from the airport.  This recently refurbished apartment offers the perfect central relaxing accommodation for a family or friends uniting for a special occasion. The apartment also boasts a free luggage store to make early arrivals or later departures easy for you.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Top Royal Mile Old Town 2 Bedroom
description: Fabulous 2 bedroom apart, luxurious standard, in the best location. Newly renovated in 2018 and with views directly onto Royal Mile. Every mod convenience.  Designer fabrics, wallpapers, free wifi, internet tv, underfloor heating.  Secure entry. Cosy & comfortable. 200 yards from Edinburgh Castle.  Please note this apartment has excellent views and is very peaceful at night.  This apartment is on the 5th floor and access is by stairs.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Peaceful Room, Relaxing home, Garden and Sea Views
description: Bright, quiet, double bedded room in friendly, charming flat with sunny garden overlooking beautiful coastline. Sociable spaniel in residence. Quick bus direct to New Town/Old Town/Royal Mile and direct bus to airport v nearby.  Enjoy tea in the garden after visiting Edinburgh's sights. Very happy to help to make your visit smooth & successful with whatever information I can provide so you can get on with making the most of beautiful Edinburgh.  Visitors must be fully Covid 19 vaccinated as I am

name: The Castle Esplanade Residence
description: This fabulous 1876 mid Victorian, two bedroom, period apartment has amazing views and is located in the heart of the Old Town, just metres from Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish New Town Home
description: This luxury two-storey Georgian period home-from-home offers an incredible central base from which to explore the best of Edinburgh's many cultural attractions, shopping, restaurants and nightlife.

name: City Studio in Trendy New Town
description:
Check out the virtual tour at YouTube - search for City Studio Dundas Street to take a walk through the apartment!

Located in the UNESCO world heritage Georgian New Town, this is a really cool and quirky studio apartment, refurbished and really comfortable for 1 person or a couple.

Based in the heart of trendy New Town, it has a fully equipped kitchen with oven, hob, dishwasher and Nespresso machine, a separate lounge with smart TV, a bed area and a bathroom with power shower and bath.

name: Sunny flat by the Shore
description: My bright 1 bedroom flat in the fashionable, lively Shore area of old Leith is whisper quiet, being off the main street.  Only seconds away from some of the best pubs and restaurants in Edinburgh and 10min bus / 30min walk to the city centre.

name: City retreat mews edinburgh Centre
description:
This modern mews is located in a quiet lane 5 minutes from St Andrews Square and city centre .
3 bedrooms 3 bathrooms . Lounge with dining area .The rooms can be set up as follows
New York room can be 4 single beds or 2 single beds and 1 grande double
French room can be 2 single beds or 1 grande double
Swiss room can be 2 single beds or 1 grande double.

Very adaptable comfortable accommodation . Tastefully decorated in the hub of Edinburgh .
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Royal Mile by Castle in Old Town
description: Fabulous apartment, luxurious standard, best location. Views onto Royal Mile. Every mod convenience, comfortable beds. Designer fabrics, wallpapers, free wifi, internet tvs. Secure entry. Cosy & comfortable. 200 yards from Edinburgh Castle.  The second bedroom can be configured with a king size double bed or two single beds.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Coates Gardens Residence
description:
This apartment is situated in the affluent West End, near Haymarket train station. A short distance from Princes Street and walkable to the Royal Mile, this is a great apartment for a family looking for a quiet area to rest at night without having to travel a long distance to reach the city centre.

The spacious living room and dining area has plenty of space for all guests to relax after exploring Edinburgh.

name: Charming Georgian flat in great location
description: Charming double bedroom in a beautifully renovated Georgian flat. Located in the iconic Edinburgh New Town. Access to large and sunny kitchen. The flat has a quiet, friendly and charming ambiance. Great location for the Edinburgh Festival (less than 15 minutes walk away) and the Christmas market. Regular buses outside. Restaurants, antique shops and cafes near by.  Very convenient for the Botanical Gardens and the Water of Leith.  Included in your stay is a lovely Scottish continental breakfast.

name: Auld Pottery-Charming & Central Licence EH-68325-F
description: The Auld Pottery is a one bedroom charmer with a very convenient, central location! Just minutes from Haymarket station; the Edinbugh International Conference Centre and an easy stroll to the Grassmarket and Edinburgh Castle. Enjoy a city break right in the heart of it all in this recently updated unique quirky space.

name: Lauriston Gardens City Centre Flat
Super Edinburgh Family Home
description: A beautiful family home in the heart of historic Edinburgh, within easy walking distance of all major Festival and Fringe venues. On the doorstep of the Meadows, and a stone's throw from Bruntsfield and its boutique shops and cafes.

name: Artists Mews House near City Centre
description:
Stay in an architecturally designed, unique Georgian mews house in Stockbridge. Quiet, comfortable and entirely self-contained, the space is filled with natural light, original artworks, wood and stone.
With private access to river gardens leading to vibrant Stockbridge, the house is a perfect base to explore Edinburgh or use as a sanctuary for rest, work or a longer stay. Recommended by The Times, Condé Nast Traveller, House & Garden and Elle.

name: Spacious 2 Bed Trinity Flat
description: This bright and spacious 2 bedroom flat represents the best of both worlds in Edinburgh. Located in the beautiful and tranquil area of Trinity next to Victoria Park and close to Newhaven Harbour. It is a short distance from the heart of Edinburgh.

name: Kell's Place
description: This gorgeous city centre flat is a quiet space, jam packed full of charm and has everything travellers need to experience this beautiful city. It sleeps 2 comfortably with the chesterfield opening out to a sofa bed if a twin is preferred.

name: Top Royal Mile Lawnmarket Old Town
description: Fabulous 2 bedroom apart, luxurious standard, top location. Views onto Royal Mile. Every mod convenience, comfortable beds, 1st floor. Designer fabrics, wallpapers, free wifi, internet tvs. Secure entry. Cosy & comfortable. 250 yards from Edin Castle
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central & Spacious Edinburgh Flat, Sleeps 4
description:
Situated 5 minutes' walk from Holyrood Palace, the Scottish Parliament and Arthur's Seat and 10 minutes' walk from Princes Street and St James Quarter NEW shopping center, our lovely flat is the ideal base for a stay in Edinburgh.

SLEEPS 2 PEOPLE IN DOUBLE KING SIZE BED & 2 PEOPLE IN SEPERATE BEDS IN LIVING ROOM (1 DOUBLE BED, 1 LARGE SINGLE)

name: Double ensuite room in quiet area near Old Town
Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment with parking space
description: Sunny self contained 2 bedroom apartment forming part of a large detached house in the highly desirable leafy Grange area, voted "poshest street in Scotland"  2 years running. Dick Place is a lovely quiet residential street, very  close to the city centre, university & main Festival venues.  The local area offers a wide range of shops, bars and restaurants,  with the Royal Mile and city center a 15/20 minute walk and a 10 minute stroll to the main Festival venues at George Square.

name: Prime flat in heart of Old Town.
description:
Our bright and bonnie flat combines the features of a historic building with all the conveniences of a modern apartment. The city's main attractions are moments away as are a host of traditional and contemporary places to eat and drink.
(License No. EH-70172-F)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish Very Comfy Apt with Parking & Super Host
description: The 2 bedroom, 1 and a half bathroom flat within a Victorian house has benefited from a complete renovation. Located in the Blacket conservation area, it is a quiet neighbourhood. The apartment is a 20 minute walk to the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, the Royal Mile and a 5 minute walk to Holyrood Park, the location of  Arthur's Seat. Parking on private drive. Internet. Use of private garden. The underfloor heating is set at a temperature of 22 degrees centigrade.

name: Royal Mile 4 Bed Luxury (incl Sauna & Jacuzzi)
description: Luxury apartment on the Royal Mile in the heart of the Edinburgh. Recently refurbished (minimalist design), includes: Sauna, Jacuzzi, 60" TV built in to wall, Underfloor heating, Granite kitchen, Oak flooring. Place of historical interest.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Castle view&Grassmarket Studio Flat
description: Just imagine, you are staying in Edinburgh Old Town - the most central and vibrant location, close to the Grassmarket, which offers a host of cosmopolitan bars, restaurants. All popular landmarks are nearby. Fantastic view of Edinburgh Castle just you enter the main gate. Everything you may need to relax are here: WiFi, very comfortable king size bed, silence, fully equipped kitchen with premium coffee machine. Safe stay - access to the building only by code. Late check-in is possible. Welcome!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Heart of the Old Town, Bright and Homey 2-Bed
description: Cosy apartment at the Heart of Edinburgh
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Walk the Royal Mile from an Artsy Flat
description:
Throw open the curtains to the historic streets of Edinburgh in this centrally located apartment. Retreat to this characterful haven after a day's sightseeing. Just a short walk to all the main sights like Edinburgh Castle, the Palace of Holyrood, the Scottish Parliament and Arthur’s Seat.

The cosy interior is decorated with a mix of new, vintage and up-cycled pieces. Expect all the comforts of a boutique hotel: Egyptian cotton bedding& plenty of space to relax and plan your next adventure.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful Apartment, Super Central
description:
Beautiful apartment in the pulsing heart of Edinburgh's lively and vibrant Old Town. 3 minutes walk from Waverley and Airport Bus, 1 minute walk from Royal Mile.

The floor in this flat is the original parquet from the National Portrait Gallery, which I spent 20 weeks reclaiming and laying, as such I ask guests to take their outdoor shoes off indoors.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lochrin Apartment by Edinburgh City Apartments
description:
* IMPORTANT - please consider how you book. I'm a small business owner who offers cheaper rates and perks to those who book direct (e.g. early check in, later check out - all subject to availability but can be confirmed before booking)

This is a STUDIO apartment which means it is one room for living/sleeping/eating. 3 is the maximum number of guests however you need to decide if this is comfortable for you.

name: Double bedroom with dedicated large bathroom
description:
A very charming double bedroom, on the first floor of the duplex apartment and large private bathroom.
The flat is on the 3rd floor of the building with no lift.

name: Private annexe at seaside, Portobello
description: Fantastic, clean, two bedroom, homely space close to Portobello beach (one block away) and only a short bus journey from the city centre, free car parking

name: CoDE Pod Hostels - THE LoFT - 4 Pod Mixed Dorm
description: CoDE - THE LoFT is a boutique hostel on Rose Street North Lane, in the vibrant and beautiful city centre of Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 3 bedroom balcony flat
description:
3 bedroom apartment 20-25 mins walk from Princes St , 15 mins walk from Royal Mile/Holyrood Palace and with lots of bars, cafes, bakeries etc on the doorstep

This is my own much-loved home. I live here permanently but travel quite a lot for work and am always away for 8 weeks over the summer. If you want a true 'home-from-home' experience in the original spirit of Airbnb look no further!

I ask all my guests to please respect my neighbours and be quiet on the stairs after 11pm

name: Double Room in Spacious Flat
description: Victorian Terraced house split over two floors with a double bedroom for welcome guests. Situated on a quiet residential street in Leith it is close to a variety of well established pubs, bars and restaurants with an excellent bus link, and nearby tram to the city centre.  The tram runs from Edinburgh airport to the Foot of the Walk , only a 10 minute walk from our home located near Leith Links Park.

name: Castle View Apartment @ The Old Town
description:
Castle View Apartment is a luxurious and spacious property with an exclusive 5 star factor. With gorgeous views of Edinburgh Castle and a central location, it is the perfect city centre apartment for enjoying all that Edinburgh has to offer.

-Booking Requirements-
One member of the booking party must be over 30 years. We require names and ages of all guests, as well as proof of address and ID of the lead guest. This is required within 2 days of booking.

name: A fabulous Town House (licence no: EH-70296-F)
description:
Recently extended and refurbished we now provide six bedrooms and six bathrooms/shower rooms. A new ground floor en suite bedroom along with extended open plan kitchen dining lounge area.

Please note although we do have parking for up to two cars it is limited and the footpath must not be blocked.

Within a 15 minute walk of most Edinburgh has to offer.

name: Very Central Fresh Spacious Rooms
description: Our huge apartment has fresh, cosy rooms with loads of character & space & sits in the very heart of old Edinburgh. Its a vibrant area with bars, restaurants, the university and museum on our doorstep. Walk everywhere - the Royal Mile  is 5 mins away

name: Classic Marchmont Charm @ The Meadows
description:
Our 'Classic Marchmont Charm' exudes all that is lovely about Marchmont. This property is only a short walk from The Meadows, a fantastic outdoor space for children to play, for reading a book or picnicking on a sunny day.

- Booking Requirements -
One member of the booking party must be over 25 years. We require names and ages of all guests, as well as proof of address and ID of the lead guest. This is required within 2 days of booking.

name: The Causewayside Apartment @ Newington
description:
***** THIS PROPERTY CAN ACCOMMODATE 4 ADULTS AND UP TO 2 UNDER 10s ON THE SOFA BED. PLEASE ENQUIRE BEFORE BOOKING *****

Book a delightful holiday apartment in Newington, Edinburgh. Ideal for families or couples exploring the city’s iconic landmarks.

This simple tasteful property is positioned in a great location, only 5 minutes away from the Meadows. The space is decorated and furnished with style and an artful eye. The home style atmosphere will make you feel welcome and relaxed.

name: Luxury 4* Hopetoun Apartment
description: Luxurious Apartment situated in Edinburgh City Centre.  Awarded 4* by the Scottish Tourist Board - 'Visit Scotland'.  Situated in one of the best locations for everything you will want to see and do in Edinburgh.

name: Central, modern, spacious with parking & Wi-Fi.
description:
NEW FLOORING & FRESHLY DECORATED JAN 2025

New photos coming soon!

St. James Quarter shopping is just 15 minutes by walk.

Modern, specious, apartment, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2nd floor, set quietly within an exclusive modern development. The apartment benefits from lift, secure entry phone ,free Wi-Fi, parking, balcony. Sleep up to 4 guests. Genius luxury 1500 pocket sprung and hypoallergenic mattresses -hotel style zip and link beds so can be make up with 2 single or 1 super king size bed.

name: Retro Inspired Home in the Heart of the Old Town
description:
Relax in a '60s-style leather armchair or take a nap in the calming, comfortable bedroom. You won't believe this cozy, quiet retreat is in the heart of the Old Town! Step outside to castle views, the Grassmarket, or stroll to the Royal Mile.

The spacious, cosy interior is decorated in our individual style, a mix of new, vintage & up-cycled pieces. Expect all the comforts of a boutique hotel such as Egyptian cotton bedding, with plenty of space to relax & plan your next adventure.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish Cottage in the heart of Georgian Edinburgh
description: Beautiful south facing coachman's cottage in an attractive mews quadrangle.  The property overlooks a peaceful communal garden providing a tranquil oasis in the heart of Edinburgh's Georgian New Town. Very short walk to Princes Street. Sleeps 4 in 2 bedrooms.

name: Brunswick Road apartment
description:
2 bedroom 2 bathroom city centre apartment with free parking, wifi and on site gym.

Rooms can be set up as twin beds in each room or a King Size bed in each room.

This modern apartment are located near the Playhouse and Omni Centre and sleeps 4 people comfortably .

name: Townhouse
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

name: Double Room in Detached home
description: Spacious room with double bed to let on ground floor of detached family home, overlooking the front garden. The house is situated in a very quiet residential area. Street parking. Easy bus into west end only 10 mins from back gate or 20 mins walk into town

name: Luxury Thistle St New Town Apartment
description: Thistle Street, built in 1780 is the oldest street in the New Town of Edinburgh and is part of UNESCO's World Heritage Area. This luxury 1 bedroom apartment located in the heart of Edinburgh's New town can sleep up to four people and is only a 250 meter walk from Princes Street. The central location makes it a perfect place to view Edinburgh whether you are a young couple, visiting for business or looking for a central base from which to explore.

name: Penthouse, en suite, terrace  near centre
description: Bright, spacious, peaceful room, en suite, with sunny terrace + sun recliners, 2 comfy armchairs inside for relaxing, west facing for sunsets on terrace  - if you are lucky!   Kettle, fridge, crockery etc.. Close to city centre, free parking. One minute walk  to well stocked local shop + buses direct to :- centre, old town, new town, theatres, galleries, train station, + airport shuttle. Interesting nearby walks, to hill and pond. Easy and interesting walks into town and festival venues.

name: Edinburgh View Studio Apartment
description: Welcome to Edinburgh View Studio, a centrally located self-catered studio apartment, showcasing magnificent panoramic views across Edinburgh, the historic capital city of Scotland.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Castle View - Grassmarket Apartment
description: Castle View - Grassmarket Apartment is a lovely one-bedroom apartment located in one of the most vibrant and picturesque areas of Edinburgh – the Grassmarket! The property offers a stunning view of Edinburgh Castle! We hope you will have a wonderfully memorable time!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: No19 The Apartment. Licence No: EH-70229-F
description:
Neighbouring property to No19 The Loft in the very heart of Edinburgh's Newtown just the shortest of strolls to George and Princes Street.
Bright and spacious high Georgian high ceilings five bedrooms apartment.
Located on third and fourth floor of a Queen St Newtown building circa 1776 (ish).
Please note whilst we do have lots of character we do not have lift access, so do bear this in mind if concerned about the climb.

name: Dreamy New Town (en-suite) Room with a Super King
description: Beautiful en-suite room in a 200 year old flat with all modern comforts. I'm an artist so you will see some of my paintings on the walls. The flat is grand, quirky and relaxing. High quality pillows, duvet, linen and towels. The bed frame and mattress came together from Loaf, a top end UK based manufacturer. Two flights of stairs up to the flat.

name: Entire Flat in the Heart of Leith
description:
A beautiful converted church hall in Edinburgh’s Leith Shore area, the flat is light, airy, spacious, comes with a dedicated free parking space and is within minutes walk of a huge number of cafes, restaurants, bars and riverside walks.

We look forward to hosting you!

name: The Traquair Park Residence
description:
This modern and spacious property sleeps up to 6 people, and has ample parking for up to 3 vehicles. The comfortable living room provides plenty of space to relax, whilst the open plan kitchen and dining area is an ideal location for catching up with friends or family, or discussing plans for your next day of exploring all that Edinburgh has to offer.

The fully equipped kitchen comes complete with a dishwasher, washing machine, microwave, and all the other modern facilities you could expect.

name: Historic Apartment in Old Town
description: A great two-bedroom apartment at the heart of Edinburgh, Old Town and the Royal Mile itself! This is a very recent listing with some brand new furniture as well.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Grassmarket Snug, 5 minutes from the Castle
description:
A modern and central studio apartment in the heart of the Edinburgh Old Town

Newly renovated in 2025

Short Term let License Number: EH-69545-F

name: Outstanding City Centre Apartment
description:
Large City Centre apartment in one of the best locations in Edinburgh. Furnished to a high standard and within walking distance from everything you could need to enjoy Edinburgh, e.g. transport from the airport, grocery stores, independent coffee shops, bars, restaurants and of course, the castle!

Feel free to send me a message and I'll be glad to help!

name: Large Comfortable House
description: This house is all on one level. It is a large 1920's house in a quiet suburban area close to bars, restaurants and local amenities. It is a 10 minute bus journey to the city centre. Visitors parking permits will be provided (free of charge) in order that you can park close to the house. There are always plenty of parking spaces available.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Lovely room in central apartment ❤️
description:
Beautiful spacious single bedroom in a traditional Edinburgh tenement. Light and airy flat with modern facilities, including free broadband wifi.

Perfect central location, 10 mins walk to Haymarket station/ tram and airport express bus. Shops and supermarkets right on the doorstep. Safe residential area with easy access to city centre, Edinburgh, Napier and Heriot Watt Universities. Bus stop is outside building, with excellent direct bus connections across the city

This is a comfortable and spacious first floor 2-bedroom apartment located on a quiet street in Edinburgh's city centre, putting it in the perfect position for exploring both the Old and the New Town. Enjoy a marvelous view of Edinburgh Castle at the building's entrance.

- Ideally located on a quiet street in the city centre - Cambridge Street.
- Beautiful interiors and finishes.
- Fully-equipped kitchen.
- Restaurants, shops and sights nearby.

- Luxurious apartment located in Edinburgh's prestigious New Town.
- Area is quiet yet centrally located.
- A wide selection of restaurants, shops and bars to be found nearby.
- Beautifully decorated with a fully equipped kitchen.
- Ideal for both family and business trips.

name: Attached Apartment for up to 2 people
description: This modern apartment comes supplied with all essentials, towels and bed linen supplied for up to 2 guests.

description: Saxe Coburg Place is renowned as being one of Edinburgh’s most perfect Georgian Squares. Quietly situated in the Stockbridge area of the New Town these elegant buildings are grouped round a pretty central garden. Located a twenty minute walk from the city centre Stockbridge has a very distinct character and offers a wonderful selection of shops, cafes, bars and restaurants. Local businesses include an excellent cheesemonger, butcher, wine merchant and fishmonger.

It is also easily accessible from the Edinburgh business quarter and the International Conference Centre.

This two bedroom cottage has one double room with a double bed and one twin room with two single beds. There is a kitchen which is fully equip with utensils, dishwasher, washing machine, fridge freezer, etc.

This price includes all of your gas and electricity, WiFi, parking, linen and towels.

Our cottage is dog friendly. It has an enclosed, private garden and is surrounded by fantastic walks for you and your four legged friend.

STL License no: EH-78684-F

LICENSE NUMBER - EH-71130-P.

Arrive, relax and enjoy! It really is a home away from home.

The open spaces of Bruntsfield Links and the Meadows are a short walk away. Frequent buses run from close to the apartment into the city centre.

name: Historic Georgian Flat with Community Garden
description:
It's filled with light and spacious for a one bedroom apartment.

It's filled with fun things that I have collected over the years, so it comes with bags of my personality!

It's quiet - especially the bedroom which is located at the rear.

I like cooking, so the kitchen is well-equipped.

Bring your tunes - there is a nice Sony bluetooth speaker to connect with!

Access all areas - I keep the cellar and a filing cabinet in the bedroom locked for my own bits and pieces though.

On arrival, I prefer to meet my guests in person to get you settled and share my local recommendations that fit with your plans and timing.

New Town is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and carefully protected from new development. It supports a lovely mix of residential property and boutique retailing, including tons of coffee shops, private galleries, restaurants, and interior design shops.

Bus stop round the corner and tram stop 5 mi

Dean Village was the centre of the milling industry from the middle ages and this beautiful apartment is part of Westmills an old mill redeveloped as housing in the 1970s. The area is very picturesque and its peaceful green and leafy ambience belies its proximity to the city centre.

Murrayfield Stadium, which hosts the Six Nations rugby and headline concerts is also close by.

There are a range of independent shops on Easter Road including an Italian deli selling all homemade food and a fantastic bakery There are also a number of restaurants within walking distance of the flat and a couple of relaxed bars which serve food.

It has an ample double bedroom, a smaller camarote style box-bedroom with double bed and a comfortable double sofa-bed in the living area.

name: Large Georgian flat  by new St James Quarter
description:
YOU NEED TO KNOW that building construction work on Edinburgh's new concert hall is ‘scheduled’ to finally start in spring 2026 (funding issues) and might cause disturbance at the flat. The site is close to our building. They will work from 8am until 6pm, and from 8am to 1pm on Saturday and Sunday. (Occasionally there will be noise before 8am). If you feel you cannot tolerate the disturbance and it will impinge on your stay please look elsewhere.
St James Square is just off Princes Street.

description:
Four gorgeous bedrooms all with king-size beds. Decorated with a sumptuous feel throughout and with luxury linen and fabulous fabrics you will feel truly relaxed after a day sight-seeing. The drawing-room will transport you to a by-gone era of glamour. Indulge in a spot of shopping and follow it with afternoon tea in your own space.

George Street is in the very centre of Edinburgh close to all the major attractions and offers a great range of shops, restaurants and nightlife. There is always something to do and you will not have to travel far for entertainment.

Edinburgh is a city rich in history and culture and yet compact enough to be explored on foot. The castle dominates the city skyline and there are numerous museums and galleries including the Scottish National Gallery and the National Museum of Scotland

Princes Street and the Royal Mile are packed with a wonderful selection of shops, cafes and pubs, catering for all ages and tastes. Eating out

Our cosy and welcoming family flat in the fashionable southside is ideally placed to explore Edinburgh on foot. The historic old town is a short walk away and the Meadows, Edinburgh University and Holyrood Park are on our doorstep. It's perfect for families.

Our traditional ground floor flat is tastefully furnished with high ceilings, period features and a bright well maintained garden. There are loads of great restaurants and bars nearby.

Two spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a living room and kitchen/dining room. The accommodation is split across 3 levels with one dedicated parking space for guests with other parking options nearby.

There's a fully-equipped kitchen and basic amenities.

This is the perfect spot for couples, groups or families.

Licence: EH-68508-F

name: Peaceful Private Twin Room Edinburgh
description: We’re on a regular bus route which takes you straight into Edinburgh city and all its many attractions,  journey taking about 20-25 minutes. After a day of sightseeing and immersing yourself in the hustle and bustle of all  Edinburgh has to offer, you can escape back to my home where you’ll find quietness, a peaceful garden view or space to sit quietly collecting your thoughts.

name: Unique City Centre Apartment
Clean, comfortable and central
description:
This is a great flat in a well maintained early Georgian tenement block. The flat is clean and comfortable with a new kitchen, two new bathrooms and many original features.

The flat is in a quiet residential stair, if you are going to be arriving after nine at night, or leaving very early in the morning, please check with me before booking.

name: " Feel Like Home "- Cosy Room in the City Centre
description:
Hello dear visitors! ;-)
Welcome, and we already want to say a big thank you for choosing to preview our little but cosy scottish flat, in which we have a stunning room for your accommodation:
A warm and modern double bedroom with a bed that will make you sleep like you are on the clouds. We mean it! The comfort and relaxing atmosphere is guaranteed.
Inside the room, we got an antique wardrobe for your belongings, a foldable wooden table with a chair, and, of course,unlimited superfast WiFi.

There is a well equipped kitchen and spacious living room/diner. Tables in both support two workspaces if required.  You can walk/cycle to almost all of Edinburgh's tourist sights. Easy connection to all bus routes while the airport tram stops 5 minutes away.

description:
A beautiful one-bed basement apartment in a Grade 1 listed home in the historic heart of Edinburgh. Fully self contained with self check-in. The composer Chopin lived next door on his only trip to Scotland in 1848. All the comforts of a 4-star hotel with own living space. Kitchen, bed sitting room,beautiful bathroom, outdoor seating area. Own entrance. No cleaning charge. On-street parking free at weekends. Approved for short term lets: Licence no: EH-69591-F

"Rare gem" Tracey, Australia.

name: Curated Luxe Stay | Central | For Upto 6 Guests
description:
Timeless elegance, modern comfort, and warm Scottish hospitality come together to create something truly special—and deeply personal.

Inspired by years of travel, the décor blends global influences with a sense of place, shaping a space that’s as characterful as it is comfortable—with a distinctly Scottish charm. It’s a place that feels like coming home for all.

Our dedicated Guest Relations Manager serves as your private point of contact for a truly tailored Edinburgh experience.

description: Perfect for families, friends, or colleagues, this bright, artful space welcomes you with three good-sized bedrooms so everyone has space to relax. With a central location just moments from Arthur’s Seat, Crags views, and hidden access to Holyrood Park (One Day filmed here!). Milton Street is full of personality, charm, and character — a fully licensed home in a great central location to visit all the sights & explore the city; experiencing a traditional Edinburgh tennamment, feel right at home.

name: Stunning Edinburgh Castle Apartment
description: Situated in the heart of the historic Old Town, at the top of the Royal Mile, with stunning views across to Edinburgh Castle. This fantastic location allows you to enjoy everything that Edinburgh has to offer, all within walking distance.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Hopetoun Grande: Georgian Penthouse
description: A bright, spacious and fully refurbished three bedroom apartment with great big Georgian windows and high ceilings right in the centre of town. Within walking distance to the Playhouse theatre, high street, Botanical Gardens, train station and tram.

name: Trendy & Stylish Apartment in Edinburgh's New Town
description:
✔ Warm & Inviting flat nicely based in Stockbridge
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 2-minute walk to Stockbridge Market
✔ 6-minute walk to Inverleith Park
✔ 9-minute walk to the Royal Botanic Garden
✔ 5-minute walk to Circus Lane
✔ 24-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 1-minute walk to Raeburn Place bus stop
✔ Ideal for those seeking quirky restaurants, shopping & entertainment options

name: Converted factory with parking
description: The bright ground-floor duplex is located in wonderful Stockbridge, 20 minutes from Princess Street and the train station. It is part of a converted factory building and benefits from its parking space and quiet location.

name: Premier City Centre Location - Bright & Spacious
description:
Uniquely placed in the heart of Edinburgh allowing short walks to all major attractions, this is a fantastic 2nd floor city centre apartment (flat) situated in the heart of Edinburgh's bustling, tourist, shopping and night life.
