We have flexible accommodation to suit up to 5 people. We have a large bedroom with 2 single beds (these can also be put together to create a super king bed). The 2nd bedroom has a double bed. A further fold out bed is available on request for the large bedroom.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Big Double Room in city centre
description:
This lovely comfortable apartment is perfectly located to enjoy all that Edinburgh has to offer.

Large room with double bed with king size duvet and heated mattress.

Flat is 5min from the Trams stop Picardy Place going to/ from the Airport.
10 min walk from Bus station.
15 min walk from Waverley train station on and 100 Airlink Bus to the Airport.

Please note we are on 3d floor.
Non smokers and no pets allowed.

name: Clean and Central 2 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Clean and central 2 double bedroom apartment which is a 10 minute walk to the centre of Edinburgh.

The apartment has two double bedrooms and comes with everything needed for a calm and comfortable stay in Edinburgh . Placed within 10 -15 minutes walk to The Scottish Parliament, Arthurs Seat, Edinburgh Festival Venues, The Royal Mile, Princess Street, Calton Hill & central Edinburgh, the apartment is suitable for couples, travellers, friends and families.

name: Lovely twin room with private bathroom
description: The room is in our modern and spacious house located in the South of Edinburgh, just 25 min from the city center with regular  24/7 direct bus service. Close to the bus stop and local amenities. Free private parking on premesses

name: The Bruntsfield Snug
description: You'll love staying in our welcoming, stylish home from home. Enjoy the unique decor of tartan blankets, plump cushions, soft lighting, plants and paintings. Scottish posters and prints lend a characterful atmosphere and the cosy interior will help you enjoy your get away with friends or family. Bruntsfield's independent cafes and shops are a few steps away making this a perfect retreat. We've been listed as one of Airbnb's best places to stay so you'll always receive a warm welcome here.

name: Double bedroom leith Edinburgh on the tram route
description:
The flat is on the 3 rd floor with out lift. The bedroom is quiet and comfortable. Wifi is available and free.towels provided
living/ kitchen is spacious. The flat is 10 minutes walk from the city centre. From the airport take the tram to Balfour street stop will take you around 45 mn. Then accross the road and you are In Dalmeny street walk to find 57 Leith is a lovely area with many great restaurants, nice coffee shops,and a bakery open all night ,supermarkets.street free on weekends to park

name: Cosy near centre Edinburgh apartment
description:
Lovely 1 bedroom apartment for up to 4 people.

Easy self check in system in place, to provide guests with maximum flexibility with check in/out times.

6-7 minutes away by bus from Princes Street, well located for exploring the Royal Mile and other main city attractions. The apartment enjoy an enviable quiet location, close to bars and restaurants.

name: 3 bed Old Town Apartment
description:
This 3 bedroom apartment is set right in the heart of the old town . Entrance to the first floor apartment is through a private stairway, which gives added security & a sense of privacy.

Please note some nights there is expected to be a lot of noise in the area due to events at nearby venues so take this in to account when booking. During the month of August Edinburgh is VERY busy with the Fringe Festival so expect noise and lots of people!
And of course expect regular city noise!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful apartment in Old Town
description:
Two floor apartment in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town. There is a stunning examples of exposed stonework, red brick features, hand made kitchens and stylish contemporary furnishings and Italian designer lighting.

Expect noise some nights as this is a busy part of Edinburgh and it is located beside historical ghost tour vaults.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious Duplex ground floor apartment Old Town
description:
Duplex apartment in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town. The property has a master bedroom with ensuite on the lower ground floor. On the ground floor is a double box room with shower room right next to it. It is very spacious.

In the city centre so expect noise and it located beside historical ghost tour vaults.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Double room w/ private bathroom in Georgian flat
description: Comfortable, bright, spacious room and private bathroom in characterful home in elegant Georgian Square. Situated in vibrant Stockbridge, one of Edinburgh's most popular neighbourhoods, full of independent shops, bars & cafes, just 15 minutes walk from City Centre. Stockbridge was listed as top spot in Scotland in the Sunday Times 2016 " Best Places to Live" guide.

name: Elegant Georgian 2 bedroom flat
description:
An elegant 1825 garden flat minutes from the fashionable Stockbridge. The four poster bedroom has an ensuite bathroom and the second bedroom an ensuite shower room. The apartment has been decorated with a stylish mix of antiques and modern flair.
Licence No. EH-67897-R

name: Private room in modern apartment
description: It's a private room in a modern apartment sitting  right next to the lochend park. The place is perfectly located for an easy access to the city centre.

name: Central, comfortable 1BD Apartment
CoDE Penthouse Apartment with Roof terrace
description: CoDE - THE LoFT offers this hidden gem Penthouse apartment with private access to the roof terrace right in the centre of Edinburgh!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: City Centre One Queen/Bed Available
description:
Property Overview.

Top third floor two bedroom shared apartment with elevator and stair accessibility. Beautifully presented accommodation in fully factored development.
Living room with views to the south and west from balcony. Ample free parking, power shower, queen size bed.

name: The Rose Residence
description: A great two-bedroom apartment at the heart of Edinburgh! This is a very recent listing with some brand new furniture as well. The flat is located on the first floor with entrance from ground level so virtually no steps to climb!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Countryside in the middle of town
description: Lovely quiet little house on slopes of Arthur's Seat.  Pretty garden.  Free street parking.  Bedroom has twin single beds, breakfast included. Good bus  to town, and help and information about getting around from host. Almost in Duddingston Village which has a 900 year old church and a 800 year old pub

name: (2) Walk to Princes Street. Friendly apartment
description:
Double room with built in wardrobe and workspace in modern 3 bedroom flat.

Apartment serviced by regular cleaner.
Location next to Holyrood Palace and park.
Unlimited broadband.
Free on street parking.
Private bike shed.
To share with friendly young professionals.

name: Double Bedroomed Flat Edinburgh With parking
description: Large  Double bedroom flat, set within a listed building, an old printing factory. Clean, bright and quiet.  Located just off easter road.  Popular local area with plenty of shops, supermarkets, bakeries and coffee shops.  15 mins walk to Royal Mile. Great for couples, business travellers and solo guests.  The perfect base to explore the city. We also have tropical fish & ask our guests to feed them…

name: Single room in peaceful haven
description: A single room in a Victorian terraced house.  The neighbourhood is quiet and not far from the King's Buildings,Blackford Hill, Arthurs Seat and a shopping centre.  Street parking available. I have friendly cats and, being a traveller myself, can help in most situations.  Plenty of fun events during the festival - a good place to relax after all that fun!

name: A Room In Leith / Vegetarian Cooking Kitchen Only
description: Spacious Double Room in well equipped apartment. Situated in the historic shore district. 5 minutes walk from many Restaurants, Bars, Supermarkets & Delis. Great public transport links within 2 minutes walk which take 15-20 minutes to city centre.

name: Superb location 2 bedroom apartment
description: Lovely two bedroom second floor apartment with period features and superb location overlooking bowling green & 15 minute walk to Princess Street.  Close to popular restaurants, bars and boutique shops in Stockbridge, parks & open spaces.  Easy access and excellent public transport to all amenities.

name: Courtyard setting near Airport-3
description:
This is a large double bedroom suite with relaxing sitting area, double bed and dressing table in the sleeping area, dressing room and shower room. It is part of an old steading has access to on to grassy areas that over look a paddock.
The access to all of central Scotland is ideal from this property particularly Edinburgh Airport and the M9/M8 links and the city bypass.
although we are close to Edinburgh city this old farm maintains a rural feel and offers a home away from home feel.

name: Beautiful loft room with view of Arthur’s Seat
description:
Bright, loft room with a view, available in traditional Edinburgh tenement near to Holyrood Park/Royal Mile (approx 5 min walk).

This room boasts modern Scottish decor, central heating, a bath and shower and unlimited hot water.

name: Stockbridge, historic
description: A twin bedded room within a spacious flat in the centre of edinburgh but surrounded by greenery and right next to the Water of Leith walkway. All amenities are within walking distance ie pubs, restaurants, shops etc. A 10 minute walk to town. A great time to visit edidnburgh is August when the festival is on there is something for everyone

name: Luxury West End Boutique Apartment
description: In the cobbled West End village with charming boutiques & restaurants, this cosy, newly refurbished apartment, offers stylish accommodation, in the heart of the historic city of Edinburgh. A perfect location for the Edinburgh Festival venues and walking distance to the city's main attractions & transport links.

name: Beautiful Old Town Flat
description: Two bedroom apartment in the centre of Edinburgh Old Town. Perfect location for exploring and minutes walking distance to the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, Grassmarket and other major tourist spots. Please kindly be aware that the flat is strictly non-smoking and is at the top of 3 flights of stairs!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Castleview and Secret Garden Studio
description:
This is a spacious studio situated right at the heart of Edinburgh Old Town in a quiet private garden courtyard with stunning view of Edinburgh Castle! Free WiFi included.
Guests should expect to walk up and down stairs during their stay.

name: Double room with private shower/WC | car parking
description:
Ideal location for city breaks, en-route to the highlands, Edinburgh festivals, Hogmanay, Rugby internationals and Royal Highland Show.

Our spacious bungalow awaits your visit to wonderful Edinburgh. We are very convenient for town - just a short hop on the regular bus service, or 10 minutes by taxi or car. Off-street parking provided.

Double bedroom with TV | private wc and shower room.


Welcome!

name: Idyll To Chill Beneath the Crags!
description: Cozy, quiet and quaint private apartment over two floors with double beds in bedrooms 1 & 2, bedroom 3 set up as office/changing room adjacent to bedroom 1, living room listed as sleepable option via fantastically comfortable oversized leather sofa.  Bedroom 1, office and living rooms and downstairs hallway window offer STUNNING views over the world famous Salisbury Crags and the morning sunrise. Sizable/well equipped kitchen, bathroom w/bathtub and electric shower, WiFi, storage/drying space.

name: Gorgeous 2 bed, 2 bath + private residents parking
description:
Light, bright 3rd (top floor) apartment (no elevator) has 2 double bedrooms (master en-suite) and family bathroom with shower over full sized bath. Fully furnished with everything you will need for your stay in Edinburgh.

Home from home, ideal for longer stays. Free private parking, washer dryer, dishwasher, fast Internet, quiet area. Walking distance to the city centre. Great transport links including tram line.

NO GROUPS LOOKING TO PARTY OR COME AND GO LATE AT NIGHT DISTURBING NEIGHBOURS

name: Stylish City Apartment, Haymarket, Walk to Castle
description:
Excellent location! Spacious, bright Top Floor 1 Bedroom flat next to Haymarket train station (minutes walk)

15 minutes walk to Princess Street making it an Ideal location.

Recently refurbished to an excellent standard.

4K Smart TV & fast Wifi.

Excellent amenities. Large choice of nice bars and restaurants within minutes walk. Newsagents & Super Markets also within minutes walk.

Self check in / out - Keysafe at main door.

No smoking
Quiet time between 10pm and 8am
No parties

name: Thistle Street [401]
description:
Located in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town, Thistle Street offers the best of city centre living. This lively and vibrant cobbled street has pretty Georgian architecture and an excellent range of restaurants, cafes and bars as well as designer shops. Most of Edinburgh’s sights are within easy walking distance and a number of bus routes pass close by should one wish to go further afield.

The two bedroom apartment is on the first floor of a stylish conversion of an old auction house.

name: 3 Bedroom Ground Floor family house Bruntsfield
description: This is a spacious 3 bedroomed family home with parking, private garden and a few minutes walk from the vibrant area of Bruntsfield with fantastic bars, cafes, bakeries,  boutique shops and parks.  The city centre is 20 minutes walk away or a quick easy bus ride away.

name: Central Edinburgh Royal Mile flat
description:
Spacious High Street apartment with great views. Stunning unbeatable accommodation on Edinburgh's historic Royal Mile. A central location for anyone wanting to make the most of their stay in Edinburgh during the many festivals or at any time, etc.

If you are travelling to Edinburgh by car please be aware that city centre parking is restricted and expensive.

Please note the apartment is situated up a steep spiral staircase (69 steps) so is not suitable for those with mobility issues.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Pavilion at Lamb's House
description: The Pavilion is a newly-built, self-contained 3-storey house, sitting within the curtilage of Lamb's House in Leith. It has been built in the style of the early 18th century with particular attention to detail, including an eye-catching "ogee" roof.

name: A Charming Room in Central Edinburgh
description:
This is a lovely, spacious, recently modernised flat in the vibrant Easter Road area of Edinburgh, close to the city centre .The charming room is a double bedroom with a standard double bed in it.

The bed is a Natural Cashmere Backcare mattress, and it has over 1200 springs which makes for the utmost comfort; a mattress topper, a new pure Chinese cotton Duvet, a quality 100% cotton sheet and bed linens! This will result in you having a lovely sleep and sweet dreams!

name: Cosy flat w/garden off Main Street
description: Charming traditional Victorian stone built ground floor flat, featuring a small private garden, where roses bloom. Set amongst the highly sought after Abbeyhill Colonies in Edinburgh City Centre. Comfortable. Carpeted throughout.

name: Prime City Centre Location - 4 Bed Penthouse
description:
Welcome to our 4-bedroom Georgian-style penthouse apartment located in the heart of Edinburgh's vibrant city centre.

The location of our penthouse couldn't be more perfect. You'll be just a short walk away from some of Edinburgh's most famous landmarks, including the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle. You'll also be surrounded by a plethora of restaurants, cafes, and bars, offering everything from traditional Scottish fare to international cuisine.

name: Nice quiet room in central flat
description:
This is a lovely quiet, cosy wee room with a decent sized single brass bed and a nice view over the back gardens.

There is a shared bathroom, which I keep as clean as can and a kitchen you are welcome to use if you want to cook or have a cup of tea.

The flat is in a quiet residential stair. If you are arriving after 9.00 pm, or leaving very early in the morning, please contact me before booking.

name: Quintessential Edinburgh flat on the Meadows
description: Located on the fringe of the Meadows park and just a few minutes walk to the historic Royal Mile and all the major Edinburgh festival venues, its a delightful apartment to relax in and enjoy the best the city has to offer. The flat has been renovated and has all modern features you would expect such as high speed broadband but retains its period feel too and with a really nice private patio, you can enjoy breakfast as it’s a wee sun trap in the mornings, with views to the park which is adjacent.

name: Comfortable room in Waterfront area.
description: Situated in Edinburgh's popular waterfront area "The Shore".   A fully licensed comfortable room and private bathroom in modern apartment just 2 minutes walk from the waterfront and 10 minutes from the Royal Yacht Britannia. Easy access to historic city centre and all attractions, just 10 minutes by tram which stops outside my apartment apartment.  Excellent choice  of cafe's, wine bars, restaurants and bars all within a few minutes walk from this apartment.

name: 3 Bedroom Apartment - Historic Old Town
description: Newly Renovated and in one of Old Town’s most famous medieval closes just off the Royal Mile and 50 meters from Waverly Station. 5 minute walk to the Castle and Princes Street and festival venues. On your door step are many restaurants, cafes, pubs, shops and galleries.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: ✰ Modern ✰ Spacious ✰ Bright + Lift + Free Parking
description:
∙ Quiet & Safe Neighbourhood
∙ Great views of Carlton Hill
∙ Fully equipped Kitchen + basic supplies
∙ 590 Sq.ft. - 55m2 of spacious modern floor space
∙ UK size Double bed
∙ Onsite secure parking for one car
∙ 25 min walk from Princess Street
∙ Close to Broughton Street, with coffee houses, bars and restaurants
∙ Lift access
∙ The Scottish Fine Soap Company Products
∙ Easy 24hr Checkin

name: Cosy Old Town Apartment
description:
A stylish one bedroom apartment situated at the foot of Edinburgh Castle Rock in the historical Old Town. Quietly hidden in a secure complex this home from home is a perfect retreat from Edinburgh's busy streets whilst still being centrally located.
The apartment is fitted with a modern kitchen and sitting area, linen bedding and a shower room.
The historical Grassmarket and surrounding Old Town is a great place to explore offering plenty of places to eat and drink.

name: Double rooms near central Edinburgh
description: 2 double rooms with private bathroom in bright, sunny home with beautiful views of Arthur's Seat hill.  2 miles from city centre with good bus routes. In a quiet area with free on-road parking. Great base to explore beautiful, historic city and for the many events and festivals. Convenient for Edinburgh University

name: Spacious Georgian New Town flat c/w parking
description:
Your time in Edinburgh is limited, so make sure you stay in a superior apartment, and in the best location.
Our guests tell us our New Town apartment is amongst the very best, and provides levels of character and convenience that are truly unique.
Three spacious bedrooms, full size sitting room and dining kitchen.
Set in a quiet cobbled street, yet only meters from vibrant Broughton Street, and a 3 minute walk to Princes Street, our guests love it

name: Stylish 1bed flat on Royal Mile Edinburgh OldTown
description:
Edinburgh Royal Mile 1 Bedroom Third floor Apartment based in the historic Old Town, a short walk from Edinburgh Castle. Ideal base to explore the rest of Scotland with luggage storage options.

Train station is about 5 to 10 minutes walk. Fully functioning kitchen and washing machine available will make your perfect city break in Edinburgh or travel light in a long Scotland Tour.

We share our joy of camping and can provide equipment book with us for a memorable and spontaneous trip
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Large room in bright New Town flat
description: Spacious double room located in a large, bright flat in central location of New Town, Edinburgh.  It is 5 mins walk from Princes Street.  It has access to large private, secluded gardens.  You'd be very welcome to use lounge, kitchen & dining room.

name: Private family semi-detached house STL 494242
description:
Prime location in the beautiful village of Currie, Edinburgh enjoying the ambience of the countryside but close enough to explore the city centre or Heriot Watt University/Orium. With Luxury sitting room with 50" LCD TV with WiFi. One king size and one twin bedroom. Large shower room new modern kitchen/dining area. Garden to front and close to Pentland Hills great for cycling /fishing .Excellent local Inn,shops and coffee shops. Frequent bus service to the city centre.
STL Licence held

name: West End Georgian flat - 10m Walk Princes St WI-FI
description:
AUGUST 2025 - AVAILABLE - BOOKING FOR AUGUST JUST CANCELLED
AVAILABLE AGAIN PRIOR TO REFURBISHMENT
Free Weekend & Overnight parking at property
Free parking approx 0.5mile/15 Min walk from flat
Buckingham Terrace is in the sought after West End area 9 Min walk to Princes St and same distance to Stockbridge (Pubs,cafes,shops). The property is an airy 3rd floor flat flat needing TLC in parts (kitchen & bathroom) but its all about location and this is about as central as you can get.

name: Nice Room in Modern Apartment
description:
Bright Double Bedroom within modern apartment.
The city centre and tourist areas are around 30 minutes by bus.
It is important that you provide some basic details about yourself and the person you are travelling with along with the reason for your visit.
It is my home and it is nice to know a little about you before welcoming you here.
I cannot accept bookings where a guests profile has absolutely no information and no other details are provided.
Please respect check-in and check-out times.

name: Peaceful Apartment
description: Peaceful and comfortable apartment, beautiful colours and oak floor with fully equipped kitchen and very comfy kingsize bed. Located just off centre by Bruntsfield and Viewforth and close to the beautiful canal in a quiet tucked away street with shared garden.

name: Cozy flat in nicest area 10 min to city centre
description: Beautiful quiet one bedroom  flat with garden! 10 minutes from venues in George Street.  Stockbridge is nicest area of Edinburgh close to great galleries , pubs and shops. Cooking utensils , washer dryer, fast speed wifi , GCH, HD TV all for your comfort ! Perfect for couples , has extra sofa bed.

name: Pleasance Apartment, Holyrood
description:
This central, modern apartment suits couples, groups and families.

Features one bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room.

It's a short 5 min walk from the Grassmarket and Royal Mile with restaurants, cafes, supermarkets and bus routes close by.

We have enjoyed managing this holiday let for 10 years now. We hope you'll love it, too.

PLEASE NOTE: This is a traditional Scottish building so there is no lift/elevator. The flat is on the 3rd floor

name: Sunny & Spacious Central Apartment
description: Superb location, 1st floor apartment at the corner of cosmopolitan Broughton Street. Short stroll from Princess Street, St Andrew Square, St James Quarter - perfect base to explore city and most of Edinburgh’s tourist attractions, 3 minutes from tram stop – direct connection to the airport and Murrayfield Stadium. FREE WiFi. SELF CHECK-IN. SERVICED BY PROFESSIONAL CLEANING COMPANY. You will need previous positive reviews from other hosts to book this accommodation

name: The Castle View Penthouse, Grassmarket
description: Bright, spacious  Penthouse flat in Edinburgh's vibrant Grassmarket area and ideally located for Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile & Central Edinburgh.  Top floor (3rd floor) providing stunning views of the Castle.  2 bedrooms (1 x King size, and 1 x double bed plus 1 x double sofa bed).

name: Royal Mile - Pretty Courtyard Home in Old Town
description:
A spacious 1st floor apartment set in a pretty courtyard steeped in history. The apartment is ideally located within easy walking distance of Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace and Fringe and Festival venues.


- Central location in the Old Town with a short walk to Waverley Station and airport links.
- Located in a quiet area - just off the Royal Mile
- Fully-equipped kitchen.
- Restaurants, shops and sights nearby.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy flat in fabulous West End
description: Bright one-bedroom, 2nd floor flat located in the heart of Edinburgh's West End, forming part of the renowned New Town area of the city centre. This West End location offers quality shopping, restaurants, bars and bistros of Edinburgh`s city center

name: Central 1-bed little gem + private outdoor space
description:
A delightful garden-level apartment for two in Edinburgh's prestigious New Town. Perfect for city breaks, business trips, and visiting Edinburgh for festivals. It's also great for visiting the many art galleries and private galleries on Dundas Street.

- Charming holiday home in the best location.
- Restaurants, shops and sights nearby.
- Fully-equipped kitchen.
- Beautiful interiors and finishes.
- Private outdoor space.

name: Stylish double room with en suite bathroom
description:
A stylish double room with en suite showroom in a beautiful 1825 Georgian townhouse overlooking The Meadows. A 15 minute walk from the Royal Mile, 20 minutes from Princes Street.

PLEASE NOTE: We are no longer able to offer guests breakfast. There are lots of local cafés offering a great range of hot and cold breakfast options.

This is one of two rooms available for bookings. The other can be seen here:
https://www.airbnb.co.uk/rooms/6206603?s=51

name: Castle View Free Parking 3Bed Waterfront
description:
This stunning top-floor flat boasts an impressive 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, providing ample space for a family or group of friends. The living space is superb, offering a light and spacious atmosphere that is perfect for entertaining and relaxing.

One of the standout features of this flat is the breathtaking view of Edinburgh Castle. Whether enjoying a morning coffee or evening cocktail, the view is sure to impress and provide a stunning backdrop to any occasion.

name: Royal Mile, Edinburgh - the heart of the city!
description:
This newly renovated 3-bedroom apartment is in the centre of Edinburgh's stunning Old Town. Located on the city's best-known street, The Royal Mile, it is just minutes walk from the castle and other key attractions. The perfect location for exploring Edinburgh.

The flat has three bedrooms and two bathrooms: one king-sized bedroom, one double and one twin. Two bathrooms, one of which is en-suite. Spacious sitting room and dining area which looks onto the Royal Mile. Separate kitchen. Free Wifi.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central Edinburgh Luxury Flat With Castle View
description: Our large, comfortable one bedroom apartment has a wonderful lounge with three Georgian windows looking out towards Edinburgh Castle and Princes Street gardens. Situated on the first floor of a period city centre building, this is the perfect flat for Edinburgh on your doorstep. The flat has a short term let license no: EH-61227-F

name: new town 1st floor flat city centre
description: Beautiful flat with original features situated in the elegant new town area of Edinburgh's city centre.Everthing is in walking distance with Broutghton St up the road with cafes,bars,delis leading up to Princes st.

name: A Cosy Room in Central Edinburgh
description:
This is a lovely, spacious, recently modernised flat in the vibrant Easter Road area of Edinburgh, close to the city centre . The Cosy room is a double bedroom with a small double bed. It can host up to 2 persons.

The bed is a Natural Cashmere Backcare mattress, and it has over 1100 springs which makes for comfort; a mattress topper, a new Duvet, a good quality 100% cotton sheet and bed linens! This will result in you having a lovely sleep and sweet dreams!

name: Fab Double Room+ Private Bath in City Centre
description: Beautiful  sunny double guestroom with your own private bath, shower and loo in this gorgeous large 200-year old historic flat with loads of character. You will be sharing the flat with myself and I will be delighted to give you any local advice or foodie tips. Just five minutes walk from Broughton Street shops, cafes and nightlife and tram stop, Waverley station, Princes Street, George Street and a scenic stroll to the Botanics, yet on a very quiet  cobbled street.

name: Lovely double bedroom en suite;15 mins to town
description: Lovely spare room with a double bed and en suite. Recently redecorated. Situated within a detached bungalow in a quiet residential area only a 15-20 minute bus journey into the centre of Edinburgh.  Free on street parking outside the door. This room previously had a sofa bed in it so the reviews might not make complete sense!

name: Double bed in a detached bungalow
description: Double bed in a private upstairs room with views to Arthur's seat and the castle.  Lovely quiet street with plenty of free parking.  There is a bus stop a 2 minute walk away and it takes 15-20 minutes for the bus to get into the centre of Edinburgh.  Guests can help themselves to tea/coffee etc and make use of the dining kitchen and the lounge.

name: Large one bedroom Edinburgh flat
description: Perfect for 1-2 people. Family friendly. Basement of owner's house, we are here to help! Located in fashionable Leith, on park, with Michelin star restaurants, gastropubs and coffee shops. 15min by Tram to Edinburgh centre. Outside space. Easy parking

name: Edinburgh Castle Suite @ The Old Town
description:
One of our most stylish and design-led properties, The Edinburgh Castle Suite does not disappoint, both with its stunningly fashionable interior and its unbeatable view of the Castle will leave you thrilled.

-Booking Requirements-
One member of the booking party must be over 30 years. We require names and ages of all guests, as well as proof of address and ID of the lead guest. This is required within 2 days of booking.

name: 3 bedroomed near city centre
description: Countryside in the town, this beautiful house is 10 minutes from Princes Street with easy access to local amenities and free 'on the road' parking.  Lovely garden / kitchen conservatory overlooking the river, fully modernised and flexible, relaxing accommodation with excellent amenities and facilities.

name: Lovely Old Town Flat, Close to Castle & Princes St
description:
Fantastic top floor flat located opposite the Royal Lyceum Theatre and the magnificent Usher Hall. All the city's attractions are within easy walking distance. The Edinburgh Castle is a stone's throw away. The lively Grassmarket, Princes' Street and EICC are only 5 min walk.
This flat is ideal for visitors who want to be located in the heart of one of Europe's most beautiful cities.
The flat has 2 double bedrooms, double sofa bed, kitchen, 2 bathrooms and a large lounge with dining, sleeps 5

name: Edinburgh City Centre Spacious Elegant Near Castle
description: Located in the very centre of Edinburgh, we invite you to stay in a main door, ground floor, spacious Victorian flat. Tastefully decorated and a fabulous location - directly opposite The Royal Lyceum Theatre and 5 minutes walk from Usher Hall. Also an easy commute to Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh Castle, Royal Mile, Grassmarket, all walkable in around 15 minutes. Many of the historic attractions can be walked to, and from, here. Additionally, surrounded by wonderful restaurants and bars.

name: Double room
description:
Available for single person occupancy only. Lovely double room in Victoria flat in Newington. 15 minute walk to city centre. Close to shops, bars, restaurants, Holyrood Park and the Meadows.

Price is inclusive of 5% tourism tax imposed by City of Edinburgh Council.

name: Bright Sunny Double Room in Edinburgh
description:
Sunny double room in a 2 bedroom apartment in Leith, Edinburgh, at the edge of Leith Links park with distant view of sea. Hosted by myself this is a friendly stay in my home rather than a commercial airbnb.

Close to The Shore for great restaurants and bars, with supermarket next door and 2 min walk to bus/trams taking you to city center in 10-15 minutes. Free parking on the street nearby. On 3rd Floor with no lift or elevator (old list building 1819). Friendly cat resident.

name: Romantic room in historic New Town Georgian flat
description:
Centrally located to Edinburgh's most beautiful locations. Only ten minute's walk to the city center, 20 to the old town, and the Botanical Gardens and Stockbridge are just around the corner. With regular busses less than a minute's walk away and supermarkets close by, everything is on your doorstep. Waverley station is around 20 minutes walk, and it's all downhill. It's a huge Georgian flat with you, my only guests.
Close to some wonderful restaurants and bars too, you'll love your stay!

name: Beautifully Modernised New Town Home: Sleeps 5
description: Experience the spirit of Edinburgh at your pace, style and comfort at our marvellous apartment which features an open plan living/dining room.

name: Stylish apartment under 10 mins walk from Holyrood
description:
A stylish ground-floor flat in the heart of historic Edinburgh, a short walk from the famous Royal Mile. With its own, easy to access, main-door entrance and vestibule, all the rooms are quietly located to the rear, overlooking gardens. Only two steps to manage with bags or mobility issues.

The ideal base to explore the city in a popular area with cafes, bars and shops nearby. Holyrood Palace and Park, Arthur's Seat, the Scottish Parliament, Royal Mile and Calton Hill are just short walk.

name: Edinburgh Stockbridge Apartment
description:
Situated in Stockbridge, a fashionable 'village' in the centre of Edinburgh. This one bedroom apartment is ideal for a couple/family (cot available) with 1 Kingsize bedroom.
Stockbridge has the best cheese shop in Edinburgh, organic food shops, Waitrose, delicatessens ,restaurants, bars and the Royal Botanic Gardens- the best place for lunch al fresco, 5 mins walk away. There is a newly renovated Victorian swimming pool 500 metres away. EPC rating D

name: Excellent Large Double Bedroom + Ensuite Bath Room
description:
Very comfortable, quiet and spacious King Size Room with Ensuite Shower and Toilet, small sofa and table and chairs in charming former Crabbies Ginger Ale Warehouse, converted into flats to a high standard in 2003
Please note there is no lift here and I’m on the 4th Floor but stairs are fairly shallow
Well maintained Courtyard gives access to main stairwell with secure door entry system Room has King Size Bed and plenty of wardrobe space

name: Excellent 2 Bed Flat in Edinburgh
description: Ground floor flat situated in the Leith area of Edinburgh 5 min walk to local bars and restaurants by the shore .10 min bus ride to City centre with a variety of direct buses.flat situated in a quiet residential area

name: GRASSMARKET BUDGET GROUND FLOOR APARTMENT
description:
Bijou budget apartment in the Grassmarket, one of the most popular and lively parts of Edinburgh, at the heart of the Old Town, an area busy with restaurants, cafes, bars and pubs so be prepared for some potential noise if the streets are lively.

You will be in the City Centre in a prime location, only a short walk to The Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle. Easy to get to and from the airport, bus station, and train station.

Maximum 2 guests. Minimum 3 night stay.

name: Old Town Rooftop Apartment
description: Stylish and comfortable central apartment right in the centre of the Old Town of Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Royal Mile Apartment - 2 Bedroom
description: Accommodation comprises a lovely dining lounge with great views right onto the Royal Mile. Master bedroom with double bed, second bedroom/boxroom with 2 single beds. Fantastic apartment, making it one of the best locations for holidays all year round.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stunning  central New Town flat - 3 bedrooms
description:
Drummond Place is in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic New Town and is an exceptional grade A listed apartment which has been carefully remodelled and refurbished recently and is very spacious. This stunning apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, huge living room, dining space and modern kitchen. Sleeps up to 6 guests in luxurious comfort. Quality linen and towels, and free WiFi.

Only a 20 minute tram from Murrayfield Stadium

name: Room to rent in cosy flat w/garden
description: Bedroom in a charming traditional Victorian stone-built ground-floor flat, featuring a small private garden, where roses and other flowers bloom. Set amongst the highly sought-after Abbeyhill Colonies in Edinburgh City Centre. Cosy & Comfortable. Please take your shoes off before entering. Carpeted throughout.

name: Cosy house in central Edinburgh
description:
Cosy 2 bed mid-terraced property offering two double rooms and traditional decor. Private garden at the front and rear.

The house is situated on a quiet cul du sac, close enough to all central amenities (1.5km or 15 minute walk to Waverley station, 6 minute/600m away from Leith Walk/trams). However very peaceful at night due to it's locality away from the main roads and crowds.

There are great transport links (tram bus and train) a short walk away from the property.

name: 2 Bedroom Flat with a lovely view
description: Stylish 2 Bdrm 1st Floor flat in Canonmills. Sleeps up to 4 (plus children). Beautiful view of Carton Hill and Arthurs Seat.  Next to the lovely Royal Botanical gardens, quiet street but close to cafe's. Walk to town or take the bus- stop for 23, 27, 9 & 8 is close by

name: Edinburgh Castle Hideaway, Lawnmarket, Royal Mile
description: Exceptional, main-door first-floor Georgian Apartment modernised and located right at the top of Edinburgh's Royal Mile, less than 1 minute walk from Edinburgh Castle and right in the heart of the action!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Gorgeous Modern Home on the Royal Mile
description:
This apartment has been finished in a modern quirky style whilst still embracing the warm comfort of Scottish tradition. With attention to detail, each room has its unique features hosting quality furnishings.The kitchen has a mediterranean feel reflective in the tiles and is well equipped with utensils and (URL HIDDEN) has a gas hob, oven, dishwasher, fridge, washing machine and tumble dryer. We supply tea, coffee machine, milk, sugar, biscuits, juices, olive oil etc. The bathroom has a modern feel with a shower fitted out with stylish Roca design, dressing gowns, slippers and towels are supplied as well as shampoo and conditioner and a hair dryer. The lounge has a wonderful bright, sunny and airy feel and has a delightful arched window which looks directly onto the Royal Mile via a lovely, cute little wrought iron balcony.It has a TV and Wifi.
The bedroom is extremely cosy and decorated in warm luxurious colours which is comforting to retire to, also with a TV.
<

name: Modern Town-house in an historic Capital City.
description: The comfort and convenience of a complete modern Town-house within the historic city of Edinburgh. Well placed on a quiet street neighbouring Holyrood Park with easy access (walk, cycle, bus) to Edinburgh's major attractions.

name: Lovely Double Room quiet, central
description:
This is a lovely double room in a quiet central location. The room has its own ensuite bathroom, floor to ceiling window and a pleasant garden view to the rear of the building.

The flat is in a quiet residential stair. If you are arriving after 9.00 pm, or leaving very early in the morning, please contact me before booking.

name: Bright and artsy room central flat
description: Spacious very central flat with all conveniences, perfectly located for sightseeing,  on the first floor. Original 19th-century building with 4m ceilings. Lively area with shops & restaurants. Close to festival venues, National museum, Royal mile, old city center, University area, the green Meadows, and the towering Arthur's Seat rock.

name: 🔑 Spacious Central Retreat | 2BR, Garage & Garden
description:
Located in the prestigious West End, this spacious apartment is perfect for those seeking luxury, homely comfort and convenience for their stay in Edinburgh. It offers self check-in, a garden and patio and a private garage with a Type 2 EV charger.
Close to the central shopping precinct and some of the city’s best restaurants, bars and concert venues, it is ideal for exploring Edinburgh in style.
There are two double bedrooms with the master bedroom having space for an optional extra single bed.

name: Quiet, Boutique Style Flat in New Town with Private Parking
description:
My ground floor home is one of the few 'Airbnb's Guest Favourites' listings in the area, recognised by guests on their ratings, reviews and reliability.

My newly renovated flat is located in the exclusive and popular New Town. The quiet relaxing area features classic Georgian architecture in the locality along with cobbled streets and is home to clusters of small specialty shops, cafes, galleries, museums, and restaurants. River and park walks close by along with the botanic gardens.

name: Entire flat in Edinburgh near city centre
description:
Cosy and very well located flat in Edinburgh (10 minutes to city centre) with 1 double bedroom, a living room, kitchen and bathroom. The flat is very bright and has 2 balconies.

The flat is perfect for a single person visiting Edinburgh for business or festival. Couples are welcome. The flat is available for a long or short stay.

Supermarkets such as Sainsbury’s, Lidl, home bargains, B&M are literally around the corner

name: Central Apt for the Fringe- 5 mins from Haymarket!
description:
Our stylish and homely 1 bedroom apartment in central Edinburgh is the perfect base for solo, couple and business travellers! The property boasts a fully functional kitchen, comfy double bed and open plan kitchen.

The location doesn't get much better! Only a short walk from Edinburgh Castle and a 10 minute walk to Haymarket station, you can get to any of the cities best attractions in minutes.

name: Large triple room near city centre. Free parking.
description: We live in a tranquil central location in Edinburgh overlooking Roseburn park. The house is 2 minutes from Murrayfield Stadium and is close to tram/bus routes. There is free parking at the property and the room has a patio door with access to garden. We also provide breakfast. PLEASE NOTE: shower facilities are upstairs and may not be suitable for older guests. ALSO, COOKING is not allowed. PLEASE DO NOT BOOK WITHOUT A PROFILE PICTURE. We need to recognise you for security reasons.

name: Double Room in New Town 10 min walk from centre
description:
Double Room available in garden flat in New town . Close by is bars/cafes and also 10 mins walk into Princes Street . Outside Garden space also available. Sharing with owner and a labrador.

Also 5 min walk to Stockbridge where there is a variety of local bars, good quality restaurants , cafes and shops.
Licence Number : EH-83041-F

name: Lochrin Apartments by Edinburgh City Apartments 2
description:
** CONTACT BEFORE REQUESTING TO BOOK**

This apartment is perfect for those visiting for longer period of time. Theatre workers, performers, those coming to visit local family or those working for an extended period of time in Edinburgh.

Bedroom 1 - Super King
Bedroom 2 - Single

A cot can be provided but no additional beds are offered for additional guests.

name: Well Positioned 1BD Flat, Heart of the City Centre
description: Step inside this charming 1 bedroom flat, perfectly located in the heart of Edinburgh on the historic and cobbled Thistle Street. Stylish and comfortable, this space offers an unbeatable location for exploring the very best of the city. You'll be within walking distance of Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street Gardens, and an array of boutique shops, cosy cafés, and renowned restaurants. This is your ideal home base for experiencing the charm, culture, and history of Edinburgh.

name: Edinburgh City Centre Apartment
description:
This main door flat in a cul-de-sac off Forrest Road is just 200 yards from the National Museum of Scotland and within easy walking distance of many historic Old Town sites such as the Royal Mile, St. Giles, Castle and the Grassmarket and also Princes Street and galleries. It is perfectly located for many Festival and Fringe venues, theatres and concert halls and the cafes, bars and restaurants in the Forrest Road area.

This really is one of the best areas in the city to stay!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 3BR Royal Mile Retreat: Historic Edinburgh Comfort
description:
Stay in the heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town with our stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment on The Royal Mile.
Perfect for families, friends, or business traveller's, this spacious property offers modern amenities and breathtaking views.
Explore Scotland’s capital with the best attractions just steps away. Whether for work or leisure, this is your ideal base to experience the magic of Edinburgh.

Book now for an unforgettable stay!
**New Edinburgh Gin Distillary is on the same street!**
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Gorgeous Grassmarket one bed flat
description: In the heart of Edinburgh's old town and completely refurbished in 2016, our flat is the ideal Edinburgh base. Situated right under the Castle walls, with a view from the living room windows of the fireworks over the castle at Hogmanay and over the festival, it sleeps 4 in modernised, stylish comfort.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Sunny cottage with private garden, close to city
description: Bright, fully-equipped cottage with easy access to the city centre and Old Town. Excellent links to public transport and walking distance to supermarkets, shops and cafes. Great base for exploring the Pentland Hills and Arthur's Seat. Just 300 metres to beautiful Braid Burn for forest walks, 10 minutes by bus to the Royal Infirmary of Edinburgh and a short walk to the University of Edinburgh King's Buildings. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers. A home away from home.

name: Absolutely lovely and unique place
description:
Cosy room in Georgian House, colourful and characterful. Tranquil setting but only 10mins bus ride from Princes St. Continental breakfasts if wished and dining /sitting room with microwave is available for your use.
Your own door into house and ample parking space.

name: The Edmonstone's Close Residence (Edinburgh)
description:
Situated in a quiet Close just off the The Grassmarket is this delightful studio apartment. With all of the main attractions outside your door, you’re perfectly placed for a visit to Scotland’s capital. The Edmonstone’s Close Residence sleeps up to four guests, and is equipped with everything you need for your holiday.

The lovely living space has been recently renovated, and features modern furnishing including cozy sofas, dining area, and modern art.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Heart of Edinburgh City Apartment
description: A newly renovated, very central 1 bedroom 1st floor flat. Step outside and you are in the hustle and bustle of Edinburgh with everything on your door step - museums (free), cinemas, Princes street (and its famous Gardens! ) lots of shopping, and excellent transport

name: Guest suite near Botanic Gardens -own entrance
description: The room is  self contained with its own entrance, within a Listed Georgian townhouse built in 1810 in a quiet residential street at the foot of the Historic New Town. It has a bedroom with a double bed and memory foam mattress , WIFI  and a separate shower room.  We are a short walk from Princes Street,the Old Town,the Botanic Gardens and Stockbridge with its restaurants and thrift shops and Broughton with its trendy bars and shops. Great bus service .Self check in. Enhanced cleaning protocol

name: 5*Beautiful&Vintage, spacious in chic location!
description:
Gorgeous flat in Stockbridge Village nearby Edinburgh's Best bars/restaurants including Michelin star chefs pub. Fabulous supermarket close by and walkable to city centre or on a main bus route. Sleeps 4. Newly renovated and very comfortable apartment with all mod cons! Recently voted The BEST area to live in Scotland!

This is a 2nd floor apartment.

name: Large modern apartment
description:
You won’t find a larger one bedroomed apartment within this prestigious and popular development. Situated on the second floor and tastefully furnished by designer Cate Warren, the bright open plan living area has floor to ceiling windows providing an abundance of natural light.
Historic tourist attractions such as the Grassmarket and Edinburgh’s Old Town with its Castle are only a few minutes walk away.

name: George IV Apartment
description:
Central 119 sqm four bedroom apartment just off the Royal Mile in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town

Edinburgh Castle is minutes away and on your doorstep are many restaurants, clubs, pubs and tourist attractions
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish garden flat with own entrance, Stockbridge
description:
License Ref: EH70011

Self-contained, stylish and comfortable garden flat with private entrance and garden space in charming heritage area in Stockbridge colonies. Over 300+ 5 star reviews.

Decorated to a high standard and fully equipped for a comfortable stay.
Newly renovated bathroom with power shower.
Smart TV and high speed broadband.

Walking distance to Princes Street / Waverley Station and many of the city's attractions. Botanic Gardens close by.

name: Historic flat on Royal Mile
description: This 3rd floor flat is situated in a building towards the bottom of the Royal Mile, which is a World Heritage Site.  Completely refurbished to a very high standard, it is the perfect place, steeped in history, to enjoy this beautiful city.

name: Beautiful and Bright Leith Flat
description:
Well presented apartment situated in the lively area of Leith. Leith is known for great independent bars and restaurants, a wonderful place to stay!

Located near some of the best bus routes in the city, It takes 5 minutes to reach the centre and all the attractions of the city

name: Fabulous Georgian Home by Princes Street
description:
Welcome to our super spacious Georgian three bedroom flat in the heart of Edinburgh's City Centre - just 50 metres from Princes Street, George Street and Princes Street Gardens.

Our historic listed home is perfectly located on Frederick Street for shopping, restaurants, bars and Edinburgh's best tourist spots as well as the renowned Edinburgh Festivals and New Year's Street Party celebrations. Welcome treats, bedlinen, towels and cooking essentials are provided.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Sunny house with garden close to the city centre
description: My place is close to the amenities of Morningside and the green spaces of the Hermitage and Blackford Hill. You’ll love my place because of the location, lots of local bars, shops and restaurants as well as being very close to the centre of the city. My place is good for couples and families (with kids).

name: Minimalist Victorian flat
description: Experience the perfect blend of modern comfort and traditional charm in our stylish flat, nestled within a classic Victorian tenement. The space features a cosy double bedroom, a bright living room with a TV and king-size sofa bed, and a versatile dining area that doubles as a workspace. The fully equipped kitchen includes a washer-dryer, and the compact shower ensures a refreshing start to your day. Ideal for an individual, a couple, or a small family seeking a delightful short-term stay.

name: Luxury and spacious Georgian period apartment
description:
This beautiful city centre apartment offers 3 double bedrooms and a large open plan living and dining room. The apartment overlooks Calton Hill and is a 10 minute walk from Princes Street and Waverley Station.

I am currently based between London and Edinburgh I use air b and b while I am out of the city. I hope you look forward to a lovely stay in my apartment.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh very central  2 bedroom flat.
description:
Quality Georgian flat with two small double beds. Excellent location within Newtown World Heritage Site. Minutes walk from city centre in picturesque quiet street. This is a comfortable characterful 2nd floor flat with quirky features. It is 200 years old furnished with antiques and fine carpets.
Please do not book if you prefer a minimalist, uncluttered interior.

name: Quirky Old Town Family Flat with little yard
description:
Your chance to have your own front door in Edinburgh! The flat is on a quiet street but only a few minutes from lively Tollcross shops, sociable pubs in the Grassmarket, the huge and leafy Meadows park - oh, and a real ale pub round the corner!

Ideal for small families, this flat has a double bed and a single bed, as well as two bathrooms.

name: Charming 1BR, Near Castle
description: Top floor spacious 1 BR, centrally located next to the Castle and Palace and with fantastic views.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Holyrood Park Residence
description: Immerse yourself in the midst of history in this cosy slice of Scottish heaven. Located a stone's throw from Edinburgh's bustling, historical Royal Mile, this stunning 3 bedroom apartment is just waiting to be your home away from home. Your worries will be swept away by the fresh, soothing decor and charming decorative highlights.  Located on the fifth floor with lift and on-site parking, the Holyrood Park Residence sleeps up to 5 guests in style, with every inch lovingly designed to ensure that

name: Spacious city centre 2 bedroom flat
description:
Superbly located flat on the top (4th) floor of a traditional Edinburgh tenement with a large newly renovated kitchen/dining/lounge with wood burning stove.

Newly developed master bedroom provides that touch of luxury with pendant lights and wood burning stove.

Offers a comfortable and clean base from which to explore the beautiful city of Edinburgh.

name: City centre, Festival, Canal
description: Great city centre apartment. Nicely decorated with lovely furnishings & induction cooker. Double & twin bedroom, & WIFI. Tollcross area near the canal & new bars at Fountainbridge. Short stroll to Grassmarket,  perfect for sightseeing, Festival venues & rich theatre, cafe & restaurant culture. Built late 20th C and recently remodelled.  Maximum 4 people including children. Sorry, no smoking. No allocated parking - Google parking near Tollcross for local car parking availability and charges.

name: Edinburgh Central Apartment
description:
A 3-bedroom self-catering apartment is located in a very nice area of the city centre of Edinburgh.
It is within walking distance of many attractions in Edinburgh. Families and children are welcome. It is located on the ground floor, and it has easy access.

name: Edinburgh Apartment - Thorntreeside
description: This modern Edinburgh apartment is conveniently situated in a quiet cul-de-sac with free parking (with provided permit) and excellent transport links to the City Centre and Leith. Two bedrooms, sleeps up to 4 (No Under 2s). Free Wi-Fi.

name: Charming Leith Retreat - walk to the shore
description: This is a charming, traditional, Victorian Edinburgh tenement flat. It is a lovely, bright, modern and clean 1st floor home, it has a spacious bedroom an equal sized living room with open plan kitchen and a modern luxury bathroom with rain shower.  Elliot Street is located in the bustling area of Leith which is a 10 - 15 minute walk to the city centre or a 15 min walk to the Shore - perfectly located to show all that Edinburgh has to offer.

name: VERY POPULAR, CENTRAL  5-BEDROOM APARTMENT.
description: Our spacious, central  apartment in the historic Georgian New Town has 5 bedrooms, each with a double bed, and 3/4 additional single beds available,  gives flexibility for informal and formal living for families or friends. The comfortable flat - not overly modernised, has high ceilings and an elegant living room with a dining table for 10/12 guests. It  is near food shops, tourist sites and buses. Welcome!

name: Modern Grassmarket Apartment
description: Enjoy a very warm welcome to Modern Grassmarket Apartment - a charming two-bedroom apartment with newly upgraded bathroom. Located in the very heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town – the Grassmarket! Ideal base to explore the city. Comfortable and relaxing place to retreat to after a day out and about. Centrally located, but very quiet. Private entrance. Garage car parking available (small and medium-sized vehicles only). *No parties* We hope you will have a wonderfully memorable time!

name: 2 Bed Apartment - Great Views
description:
A beautiful 2 bed apartment

- 5 mins from Royal Mile & Palace
- Close to shops and buses
- Well maintained, small block
- 2 good sized rooms
- Cozy & Comfortable
- Own balcony with amazing views

Perfect place to explore Edinburgh

name: 3 BED CENTRAL LUXURY WITH JACUZZI
description:
This luxury high-end apartment is very central - located off Edinburgh's most famous street and less than 10 minutes' walk from Waverley Railway Station.

Includes: Jacuzzi, 60" TV built in to wall, Oak flooring, Granite worktops, Digital Shower.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Picture Perfect View of Forth Road Bridge
description:
Stunning location next to shops and bus stop. Can simply relax and enjoy the unique location with a beautiful view of forth road bridges or use as a base to head into Edinburgh or over to Fife.

I live with a small toddler and 3 bunnies and a parrot.

We are a quirky bunch but we have a warm welcome and a positive outlook. We want to ensure you have a memorable stay.

Come as a stranger, stay as a guest and leave as friend

name: Rose Street Residence
description:
This large and central 5 bedroom apartment is perfect for groups who wants to be in the centre of town.

It is easy to walk to sights like Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile. The small city centre of Edinburgh is beautiful and well worth exploring
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Luxury apartment perfect location
description: 13 Montgomery street at elm row end. With lovely views from the south facing bay window onto elm row and leith walk. And only a 5 minute walk to princes street and new town. Everything on your doorstep. Luxury 2 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with easy walk to attractions.

name: Relax in a Bright, Stylish City Centre Apartment
description:
Relax and unwind in this stylish apartment in the heart of the New Town. It boasts bright, comfy rooms with period detailing along with a cool, contemporary design.

Expect all the comforts of a boutique hotel with plenty of space to relax and plan your next Edinburgh adventure.

Thistle Street is nestled between the most famous streets in New Town (Princes Street, George Street, and Queen Street), featuring independent boutiques, chic bars, and some of the best restaurants in Edinburgh.

name: Vibrant Apartment Close to Edinburgh Castle
description: Kick back on one of the sofas in this stylish, historic apartment in the city's Old Town near Edinburgh Castle. Head out to explore the area's eclectic mix of cafes, restaurants and bars, or stay in and cozy up in one of the individually styled bedrooms. The spacious interior is decorated in our individual style with a mix of new, vintage and up-cycled pieces. Expect all the comforts of a boutique hotel such as Egyptian cotton bedding, with plenty of space to relax and plan your next adventure

name: Central Holiday Cottage with Garden & Free Parking
description:
A beautiful cottage with a garden situated in a quiet and safe area of the city. This property is both homely and comfortable, and is finished with modern fittings.

- Only a short distance to the heart of the city.
- Free parking
- Wood burning stove
- Spacious open plan living and dining area
- Fully equipped kitchen

name: Bright & Stylish West End Apartment
description:
Modern and stylish Edinburgh apartment. Fully equipped with wifi and kitchen for guest use.

Perfect location to explore the city, only a short 10 minute walk from the centre.

Double bed in the bedroom.

Travel cot provided for small children.

STL License - EH-69834-F

name: Double ensuite room in family home
description:
A beautiful family home for 3 generations of the same family in the heart of the city. We offer a cosy double ensuite room on the ground floor of the house.

Please note: this is a family home, not a B&B.

Lewis, Kate and their two young kids live on upper floors. Catherine (grandma) and Beau (the cat) live on the ground floor.

Breakfast is self-service. We provide: bread/toast, cereals, yoghurt, fruit, coffee, tea, fruit juice.

We look forward to welcoming you!

name: The Wee Thistle, Grassmarket
description: The Wee Thistle is a cosy apartment located in the historic Grassmarket area of Edinburghs Old Town. The private and quiet courtyard complex, which has a stunning view of the Castle, is the perfect base from which to explore what Edinburgh has to offer. All the main attractions, a wide selection of great bars, restaurants and cafes are all on your doorstep and only a short walk away.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Ultra Luxe Home near Princes Street
description:
✔ Striking house ideally located in West End
✔ 3 bedrooms
✔ 3.5 bathroom
✔ Fully equipped kitchen
✔ 2-minute walk to West End tram stop
✔ 4-minute walk to Johnnie Walker Princes Street
✔ 14-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 15-minute walk to the National Galleries of Scotland
✔ 16-minute walk to the Scott Monument
✔ 20-minute walk to National Museum of Scotland

name: Charming Victorian Flat Center
description: Our 3 bedrooms flat is in the heart of the city centre convenient for all the attractions  Edinburgh city. ideal for festival just round every corner and meadows, Arthur's seat opposite our flats 3-2 minutes walk shortcuts ,coffee shops and restaurants Next door 3minutes -2Universities ,royal mile castles &palace ,princess street garden trains station Carlton hills only 10-15 minutes walk .,bus stop short ride in your doorstep , I live this plc for almost 19yrs. No Breakfast

name: Spacious 2BD flat close to City Centre: great area
description:
Recently refurbished apartment right at the doorstep to city center. Fantastic spot for a city getaway.
Surrounded by trendy bars and cafes Cannonmills flat with easy access to public transport. You can also enjoy a short walk to Princess Street (~15min) or to Botanical Gardens via beautiful Water of Leith.

name: Spacious comfortable Haymarket room
description:
Private room, in a centrally located, ground floor family flat. No keypads or lock boxes. We will be here to welcome you when you arrive. You are welcome to come and go as you please, but keep in mind we have two children who tend to be up by 7.30am so you might struggle to sleep in. The room has a King sized double bed, a single bed (best suited for a child) and we can provide a cot. Shared bathroom and kitchen facilities.
Happy to store luggage on the day of your departure.

name: Twin Room with private external bathroom
description:
We are acting similar to a hotel.
This room has 2 single beds with a private bathroom next door to your room.

This room has the following Amentities - Free Wi-Fi, Freeview TV, Handsoap, Showergel, Hair Dryer, Tea and Coffee making Facilites.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Old Charm Apartment near by King’s Palace
description: This Apartment is perfectly located within walking distance to the city centre and the buzzing Leith shore whilst still being in a quiet area of town. Holyrood palace and Arthur's seat walking distance. The flat has a light, modern & homely decor. There's a spacious bedroom with comfortable king size bed & plenty of storage available for you to use during your stay, a small bathroom -shower, living room with sofabed & separate kitchen. 1 min walk to supermarket. Cute and cosy home away .

name: Cosy Flat
description: Welcome to our charming Victorian tenement flat, just a 20-minute walk from the city centre and 11 minutes from McDonald Road tram stop. The flat features 3 bedrooms (one with ensuite), a shared bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and a cosy lounge—perfect for relaxing after exploring the city. Located in the neighbourhood of Abbeyhill, close to shops and cafes, it’s an ideal base for your trip. Read our fantastic reviews (private room listings) and full description before booking.

name: Georgian 3-Bedroom Apartment in Edinburgh
description:
This stunning 2-floor apartment blends Georgian elegance with modern comforts.
- Spacious 3 bedrooms, accommodating up to 6 guests
- Two super king-size rooms and one twin room
- 2 en-suite bathrooms plus a family bathroom
- Separate kitchen/dining area
- Superb views of the Castle and Firth of Forth
- Ideal base for exploring Edinburgh, just 1 minute from George Street
- This flat will comfortably accommodate 6 people with 3 bedrooms.

name: Beautiful, Spacious  Edinburgh Apartment, sleeps 4
description:
Bright and spacious flat, perfect for up to 4 guests with two large double rooms and a spacious kitchen. Situated in the Shandon area of Edinburgh, it’s a quiet top floor flat directly beside a large park.

Easy access to the city centre, just a 25-minute walk along the canal, leading straight to the meadows and castle. Alternatively, multiple bus routes nearby and the airport is just 20 minutes by taxi.

Free parking available at the weekends, 10 pound per day during the week.

name: The Park @ Holyrood
description: A luxury apartment in the unique award winning 'The Park' apartment block on Holyrood Road. The location is prime and most of the Historic attractions are within walking distance. The Palace of Holyrood House and The Scottish Parliament are a few minutes walk. You can use the Marriot Hotels leisure facilities, next to the apartment. The charge is £7.50 for the pool/sauna and £7.50 for the gym, per person. You just need to tell them you are staying at The Park apartments and pay at the reception.

name: Scandi-chic apartment in stunning Stockbridge!
description: Newly licensed, this property is everything you could want for a home from home. Beautiful modern design, cosy and in the trendy Stockbridge area. Ground floor but there is 1 step at the building entrance.

name: 16th Century Dovecot Cottage in Private Garden.
description:
In central Edinburgh yet tucked-away in a gorgeous garden, this quirky, sophisticated dovecot is stunning. Serene & secluded, it's quietly thrilling.
Tiny little bedroom in the tower; double bed surrounded by cedar-wood, lit ancient nesting boxes & garden view.
Sleek wood-lined bathroom. Rustic-chic kitchen. Pull-out sofa-bed.
Mysterious cavern beneath a glass floor panel.
A relaxing peaceful hideaway with a tranquil garden terrace.
Heated floors. Central heating. Wood-burner. Private parking.

name: Large, 5 Bed Ensuite Home, Right off George St
description: A lovely 2nd floor spacious apartment with 5 bedrooms 4 bathrooms (2 ensuites) suitable to be let by families or groups of friends. The key attraction to the flat is large communal living room kitchen where everyone can feel at home and it couldn't be more centrally located!

name: Fantastic City Centre mews house w secure parking
description:
Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at "West End stop" and arrive at Murrayfield in just 20 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to the heart of the action.

This stunning mews property is situated on a quiet street in the trendy West End of Edinburgh and just a short stroll to Pr

name: Warm & Welcoming Flat near Edinburgh Castle
description:
✔ Cosy studio ideally nestled in Edinburgh’s Old Town
✔ 1 double bed
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 4-minute walk to Princes Street Gardens
✔ 7-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 10-minute walk to National Museum of Scotland
✔ 1-minute walk to West Port bus stop
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming family house 2 minutes walk to beach.
description: A wonderful Edwardian family home set 300m back from the beach with four large double bedrooms, well appointed with plenty of space to relax and a private back garden to enjoy. On street parking. Easy access into Edinburghs city centre in under 25 mins via bus or train. Stroll along prom for a refreshing pint or glass of wine while savouring the sea views.

name: A Central Cosy & Warm Nest with Fast WI-FI
description:
Welcome!

My fully renovated flat is located on the ground floor of a traditional Victorian building - so no effort required to carry your luggage inside my home, and it is located fifteen minutes’ walk to Holyrood Palace & Royal Mile and just 20 minutes’ walk to Princes Street.

Enjoy a fast wifi connection and a desk space with reading lamp for remote work, plenty of USB charing points, wireless phone chargers, a Nespresso coffee machine, Amazon Prime & more.

name: Duke's Pad - Kingsize Bedroom, City Centre
description:
Please be aware before booking I have a very friendly cat (his name is Duke and he is a pedigree Ragdoll cat, he is a house cat) - he is very vocal and can be noisy especially in the morning...

The Space: You'll have shared bathroom and kitchen access. The bedroom is private and the door has a lock. The kitchen and bathroom are fully fitted. Your room has a king sized bed, a hanging rail and lots of space.

name: Bright arty ensuite room in village-y Stockbridge
description: A spacious, bright double room and ensuite in our quirky, cosy home comes with bags of character and comfort. Situated in Village-y vibe Stockbridge, close to Edinburgh's city centre, we are surrounded by trendy cafes, award winning restaurants, artisan delis, pubs, bars, galleries and independent shops. Not to mention the fishmonger, butcher, baker and candlestick maker! There's a swimming pool, gym, and sauna at the end of the road and we're a stone’s throw away from the botanical gardens.

name: Double room with private bathroom
description:
This is a lovely bright room with a large private bathroom across the hall. The double bed is very comfortable. The house is a delightful terraced mill cottage in a very quiet cul-de-sac, but close to the city centre, local amenities and transport.

Please note there are two steps at the front door, which may present difficulties for persons with mobility problems.

name: Ground Floor flat in Fountainbridge
description:
A tastefully decorated 2 bedroom flat 10-15 mins walking distance to Princes St and George Street.

Close to Haymarket Train Station, with stops for Trams and Buses from the airport nearby.

name: Unique Stylish Apartment by the Shore
description: Stay in a stylish flat near The Shore in Leith, blending mid-century charm with modern comforts. This welcoming space features bright colours, unique artwork, and cosy furnishings, perfect for relaxing after exploring Edinburgh. Enjoy a lounge, a modern kitchen, or a bath with a shower. Get the bus from outside or take a short walk to the tram, providing easy access to the city centre, airport, and The Royal Yacht Britannia. Leith’s funky bars, cafes, and top restaurants are just steps away!

name: *ROOM ONLY* Comfy Double ensuite
description:
Please note: Room ONLY listing, breakfast not provided or use of kitchen facilities (for insurance purposes). Check in strictly 6pm-11pm (unless otherwise agreed - pls msg in advance).

Double room in new build property/development.

Popular venues on bus route / easily accessible: Royal highland centre > Airport > Murrayfield stadium > Zoo > Haymarket/Waverley station > Royal mile / Edinburgh castle / city centre.

Closet storage, private ensuite, linen / towels, central heated for a cosy stay!

name: Large 4 Double Bedroom City Centre  Flat
description:
This really large 3/4 bedroom flat (Note 4th double bedroom is in the living area ) It is located in a highly safe and very desirable area just a short walk from the City Centre. It is located almost directly opposite Bruntsfield Links . Full of
lots of charming little shop, cafes and bars. It’s a great place to hang out ! Licence Number EH-69555-F. ** The 2 mattresses identified in reviews as inadequate have now been renewed as of 10th June 2025 **

name: Holyrood Road (Park Apartments) [379]
description: This 3 bedroom apartment is located in the stylish Park Apartments which have the benefit of a parking space for one car. Located on Holyrood Road, just a stone’s throw away from the Scottish Parliament and Holyrood Palace, the apartment is ideal for those wishing to make the most of their time in Edinburgh as most of the tourist attractions are a short walk away and the energetic can reach the top of Arthur’s Seat in about 20 minutes.

name: On Royal Mile, unusually spacious apartment
description:
1/5 Parliament Square is located precisely in the centre of Edinburgh's Old Town. On the famous Royal Mile, it is 300m from Edinburgh Castle and overlooks St. Giles Cathedral. Most of Edinburgh's historical attractions are just a short walk away.
This luxurious apartment sleeps five in two bedrooms.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Fabulous 2 Bed Apartment By the Sea
description: Gorgeous 2 Bedroomed Apartment on the sea front. Spectacular Views with free allocated parking space. Only 15 minute drive to Edinburgh. Fast Rail and road links to Edinburgh City Centre, Fife and the North.

name: Greyfriars (Flat 6), Old Town
description: A bright, centrally located second-floor, one-bedroom apartment (sleeps 1–3) on the second floor of an architecturally significant building (B-listed) on Forrest Hill, a quiet lane off George IV Bridge, close to the historic Royal Mile. This property is on the third floor; there is no lift.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful + Quiet 2Bed Central Apartment
description:
The ‘Barony' is a 2 bedroom apartment in a historic building in Edinburgh city centre. Located on a quiet street within minutes of shops, attractions and restaurants this is a convenient and peaceful base for your visit to Edinburgh.

WiFi is available. Towels and bed linen are provided.

name: King's Stables, Grassmarket, Old Town, Edinburgh
description: A bright, centrally located ground-floor, one-bedroom mews house (sleeps 1–3) in a peaceful location beside the famous Grassmarket, with spectacular views of Edinburgh Castle and within easy walking distance of the major attractions, venues, shops, and more. There are about 20-25 steps to the apartment via Webster's Land. This property is on two floors, with an internal staircase leading down to the bedroom and shower-room. This property is not suitable for children.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming flat, Edinburgh Old Town near University
description: "Incredible, absolute joy to stay at, ridiculously convenient, warm and homey!" Close to Edinburgh Castle, the National Museum of Scotland and The Royal Mile, our cozy flat is tucked away in a cobbled street in the bustling Old Town centre.  Explore the city then come back for peace and warmth in this authentic yet well equipped 18th century apartment.   "Great wifi, the property is secure, I felt safe here. Very quaint. If you want to experience the heart of Edinburgh, it's the place to be!"
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Old Town Nook by The Castle*
description:
Neighbouring stoic Edinburgh Castle and gothic St Giles Cathedral, we are nestled amongst the cobbled streets of the UNESCO world heritage site off the Royal Mile.

Situated in a listed stone building in the heart of Old Town, the Snug is a 1st floor Two bedroom chic apartment in the perfect bolthole for city slickers, couples and families.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely Central Edinburgh Apartment
description: A Victorian second floor flat set within the historic Abbeyhill colonies in the City Center.  The bright apartment is peaceful despite being located in the hip, central Easter Road area & only 10 mins walk to Holyrood Palace/Royal Mile. Tea, coffee, linen & fresh towels are included.

name: Leafy & Spacious Artists Home. Super Central.
description:
Our beloved 'A-listed' family home is a delightful mix of elegant Georgian architecture & textural, eclectic interior.

Our flat is right in the city centre (Princes Street & The National Gallery are at the end of our road) so perfect for those who want to explore the sights knowing there's somewhere airy & comfortable to come back to unwind.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cozy Edin apt - walking distance to city centre
description:
If you want to feel at home away from home then our cozy one bedroom flat will be perfect for you. The flat is situated in a quiet residential area only 1.5 miles away from the majestic Edinburgh castle, the vibrant Royal Mile and the Old Town.

The flat is clean, bright and fresh and has a modern decor throughout.

There are fabulous coffee-shops, restaurants and bars within a short walking distance including a cinema and a gym.

name: Smart ground floor 2bd parking
description: Quiet self contained ground floor flat with fitted kitchen, attached to owners home. Private parking, access to south facing garden. Within walking distance of city centre, galleries of Modern Art, lively Stockbridge area with restaurants, bars, independent shops and busy Sunday market.
