Close to Royal Botanic Gardens and Inverleith Park .Murrayfield stadium is within 30 minutes walking  distance from the flat.

name: Stylish Central Edinburgh New Town Flat
description: Set in wonderful Stockbridge in the heart of Edinburgh's stylish New Town with its independent artisan shops, restaurants, cafés & bars. This contemporary flat overlooks the beautiful Water of Leith & is in easy walking distance of the city center.

name: Updated Rural Chic Country Barn
description:
The hayloft has a double bedroom with en-suite toilet and wash hand basin. There are two bedside tables and a wardrobe and soft Egyptian linen. The twin room has two single beds and a large cupboard for clothes.
The Bathroom has a large bath with centre taps and an over bath shower.
Light streams into the principle living space, which accommodates the Lounge, Kitchen and Dining area. The high ceiling and exposed original timber beams create an impressive and airy space to relax and enjoy views of the Pentland Hills to the South. There is a wood burning stove, which heats the room well in the colder months.
On ground level a separate Laundry Room houses the washing machine, freezer and a molly maid rack for drying clothes and space to store bikes.

Guests will have exclusive access to the Hayloft ,laundry and private enclosed garden. There is off road parking for two cars.

If we are at home we will offer whatever help we can during your stay.

name: Beautiful apartment in historic centre
description: Our lovely apartment nestles right at the foot of Edinburgh Castle, down a little atmospheric cobbled lane just beside the Grassmarket, which is in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town. In mediaeval times the lane was part of the stables area for the King of Scotland's horses.

name: Cumberland Street Apartment in Georgian New Town
description: This luxury apartment, situated on Cumberland Street (a quiet residential area) in Edinburgh's New Town, is only 10 minutes walk to the city centre,

name: Commercial Street, Leith Waterfront
description: A bright, stylishly modern third-floor, two-bedroom apartment in a waterfront warehouse conversion in Leith. This is a quiet, peaceful apartment that's convenient for all that Leith has to offer and well placed for transport connections to central Edinburgh. This property is on the third floor.

name: Lochrin Apartment by Edinburgh City Apartments
description:
** IMPORTANT**

Firstly, please consider how you book. I am a small business owner and offer the best rates to guests who book directly. This can also usually include free early check-ins and later check outs. These are subject to availability but are not available to guests who book via Airbnb.

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE use the “contact” function BEFORE requesting to book so I can confirm availability and suitability for your stay.

name: Edinburgh New Town Apartment  Free Parking & Wi-Fi
description: This luxury apartment is situated in a quiet residential area in  Edinburgh's New Town, is only 10 minutes walk to the city centre, .Private off road parking space is available directly outside apartment ( Parking is at guests own risk)

name: Spacious room in the heart of Edinburgh
description:
A large spacious double bedroom with comfortable King Size bed. Room also contains table and chairs, wardrobe and WI-FI access. The room is very quiet and peaceful looking out on to the communal garden below. The bathroom is not ensuite but is conveniently located next to the bedroom.

The flat is in Stockbridge, one of the most fashionable parts of Edinburgh with its many bars, cafes and restaurants only a stones throw away. The city centre is 20 minutes walk away or 10 mins on bus

name: Royal Mile 2 bedroom 2 bathroom by Castle
description: Fabulous and spacious 2 bedroom apartment, decorated and furnished to a luxurious standard, in the very best location beside Edinburgh Castle. Views directly onto Royal Mile. Every modern convenience.  Designer fabrics, wallpapers, free wi fi, internet tv in living room and each bedroom, underfloor heating.  Fully double glazed throughout.  Secure entry. Cosy & comfortable. 200 yards from Edinburgh Castle.  A great place to stay during the Edinburgh Fringe.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely one bedroom flat near Haymarket
description:
Clean, tidy and colourful modern decor makes our flat a cosy home. Centrally located: 10 - 15 minutes walk to Haymarket Station, 20 - 30 mins to Princes Street. Great restaurants, takeaways, supermarkets, pub, cinema and gym all within walking distance. Plenty of buses and tram to major tourist interests, Waverley station and the airport.

Comfortably accommodates two people.

Wifi throughout the flat. Check in/out can be flexible, we will try our best to accommodate whenever possible :)

name: 4 Bedroom City Centre Penthouse Sleeps 8
description: With open outlook to Calton Hill it is a short walk from main tram stop in York Place, Waverley Station, the Bus Station, the Playhouse Theatre, the Omni Cinema, cafes and restaurants. This is an ideal location to explore the city!!!

name: the wendy house- very quiet leafy private Edinburgh
description:
The “Wendy House” is a self contained studio for 2 accessed from an outside stair and is very private and only for your use.

The Wendy House is 'Covid 19' compliant and friendly and we will respect social distancing at all times with you - starting when we first greet you.

The space has a new double bed and a newly installed shower room. There is tea, coffee, milk, bread rolls and yogurt in a small fridge - so you can breakfast in the space or in the garden as you wish.

name: Big Double Room in City Centre / Newtown
description:
This is a classic early Newtown Flat built in the 1790s

Big double room in my Central Flat is just off Princes St
Minutes on foot from all the fantastic sites and facilities Galleries bars and restaurants the city has to offer
It has a very comfortable Double Bed and a large leather Sofa

Great for access to the Airport and Train or Bus Stations

Please note - there are no lifts in Edinburgh Newtown Flats
The flat is on the first floor so pack appropriately
There is no bell boy
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Large grange apartment
description: This apartment is a large Victorian period place with high ceiling and decorate cornices . Double glazed with working shutters . Rooms are spacious with TVs . Wifi throughout the place . Large spacious living room with a 70"tv . This apartment is in the city centre and is waking distance to Holyroad  park . Large variety off restaurants and specialist wine shops nearby . Easy access to city , very peaceful quite location .

name: Soul Tent
description: Soul Tent is situated 4.5 miles from Edinburgh Castle. It is situated beside a beautiful forest and green space with outdoor and indoor amenities. It is on a central bus route and is walking distance to local amenities. You have access to my house, bathroom, shower etc. Please note that I have 2 dogs that stay in the house

name: Beautiful Central Apt Old Town
description: One Bedroom Apartment Nestled in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town, behind Edinburgh Castle, the Grassmarket area is one of the most vibrant, picturesque and convivial areas of the city. A paradise of independent merchants, designers and art
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Double room in a quiet area-one female guest only
description:
FEMALE GUESTS ONLY

No parties or extra guests please

I'm renting out a spacious modern double room in a new build top floor flat (3rd floor) In a quiet residential location that is not far from the town centre.

Please note there is no lift so my room may not be suitable for guests with lots of or large luggage.

I also live here 😊 and will be sharing the common areas with you.

name: Conveniently located Contemporary Apartment
description: Spacious, light, cosy ground floor flat under 10 mins walk from Princes St.  Tucked away in a quiet area the Mews is nestled between the elegant buildings and shops of the New Town and Stockbridge with its bars, cafes and its popular Sunday market.  You can walk to most of Edinburgh's attractions.  The Water of Leith and the Botanical Gardens are nearby.

name: Bright & spacious, close to centre
description: Second floor apartment (third floor in US parlance) with two well-proportioned bedrooms (one double, one twin) and a large sitting/dining room in a quiet neighbourhood. Fully equipped kitchen and small bathroom (shower and bath). Five minutes' walk to shops, the Meadows and bus routes; 20-25 minutes' walk to the Royal Mile, Princes Street and Waverley Station; 20-30 minutes' drive from Edinburgh Airport. All bedding and towels provided; one extra single bed available if requested in advance.

name: Converted Flat in Historic Building in New Town
description:
✔ Vintage flat ideally located at the heart of Edinburgh
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 6-minute walk to Scottish National Portrait Gallery
✔ 9-minute walk to St James Quarter Shopping Mall
✔ 13-minute walk to Stockbridge Market
✔ 15-minute walk to the famous Edinburgh Castle
✔ 12-minute walk will take you to Edinburgh Waverley Train Station

name: Modern Waterfront Park Duplex with Patio & Parking
description:
Experience the beauty and history of Edinburgh from this modern open plan duplex, situated in the desirable coastal urban district of Granton Waterfront.

This idyllic location is surrounded by nature and has direct transport links to the city centre, Waverley Station and Edinburgh Airport. Lots of extras as well as free secured underground parking is included in your stay.

The property is licensed to operate as a Short Term Let

name: Edinburgh City Centre Apartment
description:
Nestled in a charming street, this stylish city centre apartment offers the perfect base for discovering Edinburgh. A short walk from the castle, train station, tram stop, & bus routes, surrounded by vibrant bars and restaurants, you’re in the heart of it all.

The apartment has an open plan living space with washer, dryer, TV & DVD player, electric stove, comfy sofas and a dining table to seat 4. Two double bedrooms that are very well presented, bathroom with shower. Hairdryer provided.

name: Double Room at the Shore, Leith, Edinburgh.
description:
Our place is good for couples and solo adventurers.
We have WIFI you are welcome to use. Leith is close to the city centre, the room is situated on the Shore area which has a beautiful waterfront with lots of bars, cafes and top restaurants.
Excellent bus service to centre Edinburgh or a 10 minute walk to the shopping centre and local attractions.

name: Private En-suite Room in Unique Harbourside Cottage
description:
This historically listed cottage directly opposite Newhaven Harbour once belonged to the adjoining church (now a popular indoor rock-climbing centre). The property has undergone a modern renovation offering luxury amenities such as underfloor bathroom heating and a walk-in shower.

The shoreside neighbourhood of Newhaven is the closest place to Edinburgh's city centre where you can enjoy coastal views from one of several trendy brunch spots and seafood eateries. Your cosy seaside retreat awaits!

name: Central 2bedroom flat &Parking, near transport hub
description:
Bright, modern ground floor flat close to Haymarket Station with parking

The master bedroom has an ensuite shower room . There is a family bathroom with over bath shower.

Handy for all transport links, just round the corner from Haymarket Station

name: Incredible City Centre New Town Flat: Private Room
description: Lovely, cosy double bedroom available in my beautiful Georgian New Town flat (where I live). Albany Street, situated in the very heart of the city, is just a stones throw from Queen St/George St/Edinburgh Castle and a short 5 minute walk from Waverley Station. The tram stop is just 3 minutes walk away.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 5 bedroom 3 bathroom,  Central Penthouse,  Parking
description: Home from home, bright, spacious 5 Bedroom duplex Penthouse located in the West End, only 5-8 minutes walk from the Haymarket tram and train station,  25 min. walk to Princess street and Grassmarket.  This large Apartment is on the 3rd and 4th floor (no lift) Fully furnished throughout with TV and free WiFi.  Stunning views where you can see Edinburgh Castle and Murrayfield Rugby Stadium.  Several shops, cafes and restaurants nearby.

name: Large bright city Luxury Apt
description:
Edinburgh city centre
Lovely bright room in spacious flat in the Meadows , George Sq, Summerhall , Pleasance Venues area but only 10 minutes walk to the city centre and to the many attractions that Edinburgh has to offer.
Marchmont has some lovely coffee shops and a short walk across the Meadows and you are close to many interesting bars and restaurants .
The Museum of Scotland is 10 minutes walk as is The Royal Mile and of course Edinburgh Castle .

name: Beautiful City Centre New Town Flat: Private Room
description: Cosy double bedroom available in my beautiful Georgian New Town flat (where I live).  Albany Street, situated in the very centre of the city, is just a stones throw from Queen Street/George Street/Edinburgh Castle and a short 10 minute walk from Waverley Station. The tram stop is just 3 minutes walk away.

name: Comfy room. Great reviews. Best city in the world!
description:
Quiet single-bed bedroom in third floor tenement flat overlooking private gardens in central neighbourhood. Futon available for second guest as listed. Kitchen facilities available for self-catered breakfast.

Third floor accommodation in flat; NO lift. Shops, other amenities very close. About 25 minute walk to city centre; very accessible to Edinburgh universities. Excellent public transportation: frequent and convenient.

Check-in after 9PM only by arrangement when making reservation.

name: Burnets Apartment - FREE WIFI
description:
5 minutes walk from Waverley railway station, this centrally located two double bedroom modern apartment, is decorated to an extremely high standard. The Burnet's holiday apartment is comfortable, spacious and comes fully furnished. Towels, Linen inc

NOTE: This apartment is closed until 1st June 2022
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Old Gardner's Quarters - sleeps 2-6
description:
Welcome to Edinburgh, and one of the most unique properties in the city! This fully renovated Georgian townhouse is located in a leafy circus by the Union Canal, around 10 minutes walk from the city centre and the perfect location for city explorers or festival goers.

You'll be spoilt for choice with great food and drink around the corner, and the views out to the gardens on both sides will make you feel like you're a million miles away from the hustle and bustle of this historic city.

name: Lovely bright flat, very close to city centre
description:
Lovely, bright 2nd floor flat ideally located 15 mins walk to the city centre and 2 mins to buzzing Leith Walk where you can catch a bus to almost anywhere. Overlooks well manicured garden grounds

The flat offers a:
Well equipped modern kitchen
Dining area for 4
Sprung sofa bed for extra guests
Large flat screen TV
Wifi
Luxurious bathroom with large walk-in shower
Spacious bedroom with very comfy king size bed & great storage
Linen, towels and some courtesy essentials (WC roll, milk, etc)

name: The Lothian Road Residence (Edinburgh)
description: Perched above the city, The Lothian Road Residence is a fantastic (not so) little pied-à-terre perfect for your next jaunt to Edinburgh. With three double bedrooms, stripped wooden floors, and views of Edinburgh Castle, this apartment is simply not to be missed.

name: Central Ground floor New Town Apartment, sleeps 4
description: My place is in Edinburgh's New Town and is close to Broughton Street with all the great shops, restaurants and bars. You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood and it's a handy location from which to explore the city on foot. My place, which is on the ground floor, is good for couples, business travellers, and families (with kids).

name: Charming 2 Bed House With Parking In Stockbridge
description:
Beautiful two bedroom, two bathroom mews house with private garage for parking. Located on a quaint, cobbled street tucked away in the heart of Stockbridge, Edinburgh. The house has been refurbished to a high standard.

It is well located and is just a 2 minute walk from the fantastic cafes, restaurants and shops of leafy, bustling Stockbridge and a 15 minute walk from central Edinburgh.

The house is a real "home away from home" and is light, warm, cosy and comfortable.

name: Double Room Private Bathroom
description:
Quiet, cosy, double room with private bathroom in a city centre Victorian cottage.
It is your own little self contained private suite separate from the main house. (Sadly no kitchen facilities) On main bus and tram routes. 10 minute walk to Princes street. Easy access to main train stations and quick easy travel access to the airport. As reflected in the pictures this room is an attic space with coombed ceiling, so please be aware!

name: Light and spacious Stockbridge flat
description: Fully furnished Edinburgh flat, within the beautiful and lively Stockbridge area. The flat has a pleasant aspect overlooking a park and is in a lovely Victorian building just a few blocks from great cafes, bars, parks and galleries.

name: Spacious, 3 bed funky apartment in Old Town
description:
This 3 bedroom apartment is in the centre of Old Town Edinburgh, within walking distance of all major tourist attractions and near bars and restaurants. It is located on a cobbled cul de sac just off the busy Cowgate area.
The apartment is very light and airy and offers plenty of space for a comfortable stay in Edinburgh. The apartment is a mix of old and new and has a double bedroom and 2 kingsize bedrooms. Please note that 6 is the maximum to stay and the sofa cannot be used as a bed.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Advocates Penthouse - FREE WIFI
description:
Located at the heart of Royal Mile, this apartment offers attractive views to Princes Street. Advocate's Penthouse apartment is a new build property located on the second floors.
The accommodation is made up of two bedrooms, one en-suite, family bathroom, fully fitted kitchen and spacious living room & dining area.

NOTE: This apartment is closed until 1st June 2022e.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright Apartment overlooking Holyrood Park
description:
3 bedroom Modern , bright apartment overlooking Holyrood Park in the East of the city centre .
Being so central a short walk and you are at Holyrood Palace, the Scottish Parliament and of course The Royal Mile itself which is the main artery from Holyrood Palace to Edinburgh Castle

name: Comfortable double room
description: My house is located near Craigmillar Castle, favourite house of Queen Mary Stuart, 3 miles from city centre. Double room is on first floor with private bathroom. You can use full fitted kitchen, cosy and comfortable living room. On the summer you can seat in my lovely garden and enjoy your coffee and sun:) On downstairs live my flatmate.  Also I have two lovely and friendly cats:) I rent this room when Im away.

name: Charming Victorian flat near city centre
description:
Tastefully decorated first floor Victorian one bedroom flat with wi-fi. Within walking distance of the city centre and places of interest such as Holyrood Palace, Scottish Parliament, Arthur's Seat, the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle you will stay in a great location.

Fresh linens and towels provided.

name: Double bedroom for 1 person
description:
Double room for single occupancy available. Shared bathroom (with one other person). Use of shared ktichen and sittingroom. Access to wifi amd private garden

Double room available to rent to one person. Apartment shared with another person.

name: Modern Quiet Royal Mile Apartment + Free Parking
description:
The two bedroom 'Tolbooth' is a modern and well-equipped apartment in a quiet courtyard in the historic Old Town, only 1 minute walk from the Royal Mile and 5 minutes walk from Waverley train station.

WiFi and Netflix included. Towels and bedding provided.

Secure underground car park.

Some reviews unfairly give a lower rating due to the lift/elevator being out of service. The lift is not as amenity on this listing and is not part of your booking.

name: Rm4-Best Area-Classic Flat-15min Walk to Centre
description:
The room has a double bed, desk, and a wardrobe to keep your things organised. The room gets plenty of natural light, making it a great place to be.

The apartment is perfectly situated between the city centre and trendy district of Leith. Countless bars, restaurants, cafés, supermarkets etc, right on the doorstep.

New Windows have been installed since the complaints about noise, so now its as quiet as can be!! :-)

Bedding, towells, some basic toiletries and tea and coffee provided.

name: Peaceful and stylish Bruntsfield flat
description:
Our place is close to the city centre, the Meadows, Bruntsfield Links public golf course, plenty of restaurants and cafes. A well-served bus stop is two minutes from the front door.

Our place is in a quiet neighbourhood not far (~25 min. walk) from the city centre and Festival attractions, which means you can look forward to relaxing away from the hubbub at the end of your day.

name: Rm2-Best Area-Classic Flat-15min Walk to Centre
description:
The room is small, but has a double bed, desk, and a wardrobe to keep your things organised. The room gets plenty of natural light, making it a great place to be.
The flat is perfectly situated between the city centre and trendy district of Leith. Countless bars, restaurants, cafés, supermarkets etc, right on the doorstep. Ideal for couples, though the room is rather small, solo/business.

The flat has a living room with TV and HIFI.
2 shared bathrooms, shared kitchen and spacious shared lounge.

name: Wonderful home in Edinburgh New Town
description: Beautiful Georgian top floor flat suited to couples/families. Perfectly located in Edinburgh New Town, walking distance to everything, but away from the crowds. The immediate neighbourhood has numerous cafés, bars, restaurants, and independent shops. Bedroom with comfortable double bed, huge kids room with full sized loft beds, en suite family bathroom, shower room, spacious dining kitchen and a large living room. Plenty of period features and personal touches.

name: City Centre Kingsize Bedroom and Private Bathroom
description:
We live in a Georgian garden flat and it is in the centre of Edinburgh's New Town. You will be a 10 minute walk from the Tram Stop at York Place, 5 minutes from Broughton Street, Edinburgh Playhouse, St James's Quarter and directly and a 10 minute walk from St Andrews Square, Waverley Station/Airport Bus, Multrees Walk, George Street. In the opposite direction a 15 minute walk from the botanical gardens.
You will be able to walk everywhere you want along with bus stops easily accessible.

name: Flat in South Edinburgh close to City Centre.
description:
The flat is located on Blackford Hill which is beside the Observatory. The flat has panoramic views of Edinburgh and is very welcoming. Suitable for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.
The flat comprises of a bedroom with twin beds, lounge with television, kitchen with fridge, combi oven/microwave with single ring on top and shower room. The flat is great for people visiting Edinburgh who would like to spend time both in the city centre sightseeing and enjoy outdoor activities.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Castle Apartment Grassmarket Licence No EH-69794-F
description: My Grassmarket apartment is immediately next to Edinburgh Castle (as you can see from the window view), the Royal Mile and the Old Town. The Grassmarket is full of traditional pubs, restaurants, coffee bars and boutique shops. It is also central for Princes Street, the main shopping areas, museums and the main city centre tourist attractions. The location is ideal for the Festival, Hogmanay and both tourist and business visits. It is well served by both public transport and bus tours.

name: The Murray's
description: Double bedroom with private bathroom to rent in house in a quiet residential area, 4.5 miles from Edinburgh city centre and main tourist attractions. There is a direct bus which takes between 25 to 50 mins depending on traffic. Pentland Hills Regional Park, Roslin Chapel and the Scottish Borders are also easily accessible.

name: Edinburgh Castle a 20 minute walk.
description:
Central location near to Haymarket Station, Airlink service to Edinburgh Airport, EICC and only minutes walk to Princes Street and Edinburgh New Town. Private en-suite. Many restaurants, bars and other sites of interest such,as art galleries, within 10 minutes walking distance.

Breakfast provided, consists of cereal, fruit, yoghurt, fruit juice, coffee/tea.
A family home which has all the bumps and history associated with children
Not a hotel so standards will not be perfect, though we try.

name: City centre room available
description:
City centre room available with lovely tree views and a super comfy king size bed
NO SMOKING
Please note that the apartment is not suitable for guests with large amounts of luggage as its in an historic building with no elevator on the third floor.

name: Very comfortable large Double Bedroom
description:
Very comfortable, quiet and spacious King Size Room, shared bathroom,small sofa and table and chairs in charming former Crabbies Ginger Ale Warehouse, converted into flats to a high standard in 2003.
Please not there is no lift here and my place is on the 4th floor but stairs are fairly shallow Well maintained Courtyard gives access to main stairwell with secure door entry system. Room has King Size Bed and plenty of wardrobe space.

name: Large ensuite room in central Edinburgh's New Town
description: Spacious, light room with its own entrance, in the basement of the property situated in Edinburgh's New Town. The room has a large kingsize sleigh bed and newly refurbished shower room. The Royal Terrace is a world heritage site positioned in the city centre. Minutes away from local cafes, restaurants, bars, Edinburgh Station, tram stop and the main shopping area. The famous landmarks of Edinburgh Castle, Calton Hill, Arthur's Seat and Holyrood Palace are all within walking distance

name: Modern 4-BR Central Apartment on Castle Terrace
description: Comfortable, light-filled apartment close to Edinburgh Castle, Filmhouse, Usher Hall, International Conference Centre, Princes Street, Grassmarket, Old Town, and the National Museum of Scotland. Perfect for couples, business travellers, and families with kids.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: cosy single room
description:
This is a small single room with a single bed, bedside table, chest of drawers, wardrobe.

My place is close to Royal Commonwealth Pool. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings and vibrant area. My place is good for solo adventurers and business travellers.

Price is inclusive of 5% tourism tax imposed by City of Edinburgh Council

name: Sunny King Size Room at Edinburgh's seaside
description:
Our place is close to Portobello Beach and only 15-20 min to city centre.You’ll love our house because of log fires in the winter and relaxing in the garden during the summer. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
We live in a large detached Victorian house in a very quiet street. We are offering a bright, clean room in our 5 bedroom home with a private bathroom (bath and shower).

name: Fabulous Flat on Royal Mile
description:
Lying in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town on the historic Royal Mile, this property is in the hustle and bustle of the city with restaurants, bars and top attractions right on your doorstep. Visit Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, Mary Kings Close, and Arthur's Seat and pop home for lunch in-between.
Split over two floors, this unique flat has an airy living/dining room, kitchen and 2 large bedrooms, 1 with an additional pullout sofa bed -available on request.
Licence number:- EH-70098-F
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Location, Location! Spacious Old Town Bank St Apt
description:
Our flat is located in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, a short walk to the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle and down The Mound to Princes Street and The New Town.

You will be able to explore, be entertained and enjoy everything that Edinburgh's city centre has to offer.

This is a two bedroom home (both bedrooms have a UK size double bed) with a large living room & separate kitchen with dining table.

Perfect for couples, families, solo adventurers and business travellers.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: ✰ Spacious ✰ Contemporary ✰ Lift + Free Parking!
description:
∙ Quiet & Safe Neighbourhood
∙ Great views of Carlton Hill
∙ Fully equipped Kitchen + basic supplies

name: Festival let, 4-31 August
description:
Hi folks, I have a whole flat in Leith to let for most of the Festival (4-31 August).
This is a 3rd-floor flat in a quietish cobblestone street just near the bottom of Leith Walk. There are buses at the door (35, 36), and it’s also only a few minutes’ walk to the tram now too (Foot of the Walk, 10-15 mins to city), as well as to shops (Lidl, Tesco), and bars and restaurants (The Shore is just down the road).

name: Clean room with private bathroom
description:
Scottish Government Short-Term Let Licence number EH-71495-F.

This clean & modern flat on the first floor of an apartment development is well connected for all that Edinburgh offers and for the city living experience. It offers a peaceful, quiet and chilled stay. This is a no-smoking property.

A double bed in your own dedicated room is provided, alongside a private bathroom with towels (not ensuite) and access to tea & coffee facilities, a fridge, microwave and kettle in the shared kitchen.

name: Clean, quiet and classy. Comfort in the Capital
description:
Located in Meadowbank, the flat is very central. It is a short walk from many of Edinburgh's historic landmarks as well as its exciting nightlife.
It is ideally located for accessing the venues during the Edinburgh Festival in August.
The room has blackout blinds and curtains so you can have it as dark as you like for sleeping. It features a double bed with a memory foam mattress.
A continental breakfast will be available for you.

name: Pleasant and comfy double room nr zoo and airport
description:
A clean and tidy family home, we're only 3 miles from the airport, just off the Glasgow Road - a main artery in to the city. We’re just 5 mins walk from the nearest city-bound bus stop, and well served by public transport.

Our home is ideally situated for the airport and Edinburgh Zoo, as well as Murrayfield stadium.

Guests staying longer than 10 days receive discount (calculated by AirBnB). This discount reflects the fact that guests are responsible for the day-to-day cleaning of their room.

name: Family-friendly 3-bedroom self-contained flat
description:
This family-friendly ground-floor apartment sleeps 7 people in 3 bedrooms. The famous sights of Edinburgh are easily accessible, or take a walk off the beaten track and discover Leith. Spacious open-plan living space with well-equipped kitchen. 3 comfy bedrooms - one with triple bunks (sleeps 3) , one double with ensuite and another nice double bedroom.

Direct tram from Edinburgh Airport. Easy access to public transport. No designated car parking space. Self contained with own entrance.

name: Modern 2 bed apartment - central
description:
Bright and spacious 2 bedroom apartment with unrestricted on street parking. 4 miles from city centre.

Sleeps 4 people, 2 bedrooms (king size and double bed).

Fully equipped kitchen and very bright, dual aspect lounge.

Easy access to all city centre attractions.

name: Modern apartment in central Edinburgh
description: Modern flat in the award-winning Quartermile development, within walking distances to Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle and Prince's Street. The area is also in the heart of festival activities.

name: Luxury bedroom in Victorian house & free parking
description: Stunning bedroom (bigger than most in Edinburgh)  in a stylish Victorian house. Shared bathroom with toilet, shower, sink and huge bathtub at the end of the hall, and there are two other shared toilets downstairs. Direct bus route for many buses to the city centre (12 mins). You'll love this place because of the architecture, high ceilings, traditional furniture and quiet atmosphere.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Single, comfortable bedroom in lovely coloney flat
description:
Single accommodation in a shared flat, ideal for exploring historic Edinburgh, 15 minutes walk from Princess Street, Carlton Hill and Royal Mile. Access to large kitchen/diner and double shower room.
PLEASE NOTE ALVA PLACE IS ONLY ON ONE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND THE NEXT ROAD DOWN IS ALVA PLACE TOO. MY FLAT IS IN THE ROW WHICH HAVE STEPS GOING UP TO THE FRONT DOOR AND THE HOUSES OPPOSITE ARE ON MARYFIELD.

name: Double bedroom private en-suite with shower.
description:
My place is private and secluded yet close to the city centre.
The flat has a relaxing atmosphere with spectacular views. I like to think I offer more than just a bed for the night.

description:
Based in the conservation area of Edinburgh, a beautifully renovated property which is only 10 minutes from the bustling City Centre.
The flat is opposite the beautiful Royal Botanical Gardens, in the heart of the new town, and a stone throw away from Stockbridge - an area which was recently voted the best location of Scotland to live in .
Whether you're a travelling family, a couple on a city break, friends getting together or a business guest you will feel right at home (no parties allowed)

name: Walk Everywhere -Top Rated Flat on The Royal Mile.
description:
→ Super central location, everything is walkable from the flat, you won't need a car or transport to see Edinburgh

name: Bedroom, stylish & bright apartment
description:
Bright and stylish apartment in a stunningly refurbished, quiet apartment, with modern bathroom and kitchen. My apartment is 20 minutes from the city centre, and served by frequent buses.

PLEASE NOTE - Airbnb have blocked the ability to deactivate Instant Book. Please contact me before booking to ensure I can be around to welcome you - and do not use the instant book feature before speaking to me. Thank you for your consideration.

name: King Size Bedroom en-suite with 2 beds in New Town
description: King size Bed En-Suite in 3 bedroom apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a beautiful, two-story, Georgian building in the Stockbridge area of Edinburgh's beautiful New Town. If you get tired of the many restaurants, cafes, pubs of Stockbridge, the city centre of Edinburgh and all of its attractions are 10 minutes stroll away. To reach the Old Town approximately 20 minutes walk. For the airport, the Airlink Bus and Tram stops are less than 15 minutes (or a very brief taxi journey) away.

name: Elegant en-suite w/private entrance
description:
licence No.EH-67995-P
A large double bed room with a modern ensuite shower room with underfloor heating. Sophisticated mix of antiques and modern design. Guests have use of their own front door from the basement courtyard for privacy. Nespresso machine in the bedroom. An easy 5 minute walk to city centre and 2 cafes a minute away. Part of family home.

name: Cosy, comfortable and homely Edinburgh flat.
description: Welcome to my one bedroom flat! It is in Edinburgh’s Meadowbank area, only 20 minutes walk from the city centre or 10 minutes by bus. The whole flat will be yours when you stay here. It sleeps 3 people –  there is a double bed in the bedroom and also a large couch in the living room. There is a fully equipped kitchen and a lovely bathroom with a powerful shower. You will  have access to my library of books, fast broadband Wifi, TV with Netflix + Amazon Prime and a Gooogle home with Spotify.

name: Fab Located Cosy Warm Home in the Heart of Leith
description:
Stay in the trendiest neighbourhood in town with all its bars, restaurants and cafes. Our super clean and cosy ground floor flat is located on Buchanan Street, 2 minutes walk from Balfour's tram stop (great for transfers to the airport). Welcome treats, linen & towels are provided.

Get connected with our super fast WIFI (up to 130 Mbps) and enjoy the wonderful dining spots around our vibrant neighbourhood. As your host, I am ready to help you with any request you may have during your stay :-).

name: Spacious Apartment in Edinburgh's New Town
description:
✔ Charming flat ideally located in the New Town
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom

✔ 13-minute walk to Princes Street
✔ 14-minute walk to Dean Village

name: Bright Basement Flat - New Town - Close to Centre
description:
This modern and well equipped apartment is the ideal base for those seeking a city break in beautiful Edinburgh. The apartment comprises of one spacious double bedroom, a shower/bathroom, laundry cupboard and kitchen/livingroom.

The back garden is a communal area and as such guest access is not permitted.

name: City centre, spacious double room
description: The central location is perfect for seeing the historic and cultural attractions of Edinburgh with galleries, shops, restaurants and bars in close proximity.

name: Salmond Place, Edinburgh
description: One bedroom flat, 15 mins walk from Princes Street, with a private South West facing garden. The flat has TV, Wifi, washing machine, electric shower, gas central heating, outside storage for bicycles in the back yard. A sofa / bed is in the living room that can sleep an additional guest. On street parking outside the flat with no charges. Convenient and close to Calton Hill, Holyrood palace / park, Scottish Parliament, Omni Centre & Central Edinburgh. Tenement entrance to the flat.

name: New Town Lovely Large Bedroom with 2 beds

If you get tired of the many restaurants, cafes, pubs of Stockbridge, the city centre of Edinburgh and all of its attractions are 10 minutes stroll away. To reach the Old Town approximately 20 minutes walk. For the airport, the Airlink Bus and Tram stops are less than 15 minutes (or a very brief taxi journey) away.

name: Royal Mile Holiday Apartment
description: Nestled within the heart of Edinburgh’s old town and situated directly on the Royal Mile is this stunning 2 bedroom apartment. Step out into the beating heart of Edinburgh’s most historic area, where world famous landmarks, such as The Scottish Parliament and Holyrood Palace, are only minutes walk away.

name: The hidden Jewel
description:
The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place. Bus stop is only 1 minutes walk.
Within walking distance there is 24 hour Asda.
Fort kinnaird shopping centre.
Limited car parking spaces but can use street parking.

name: Huge Apartment on the Park!
description: The apartment is a very spacious ground floor, overlooking Bruntsfield Links and the Meadows parkland.  Situated in a great neighbourhood with easy access to the heart of the city.  It has its own front door onto the street so there is no shared lobby or stair.

Beautiful first floor apartment In the Old Town Edinburgh - Edinburgh Museum visible from the Lounge - Meadows Park 1 Min walk away with lovely cafes and places to eat. This Apartment recently been refurbished.

Three double bedroom with Hand made solid vintage beds in each room.

Restaurants and cafes walking distance a truly an amazing experience to be living here.

Edinburgh Castle a short walk away with Greyfrairs bobby at 2 mins walk.

Also has free on street parking and good bus service into town.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Bright Cosy & Stylish Home Close to Calton Hill
description:
Planning for a touristy visit to my home town? Live like a local in one of the most central & trendiest areas in the city with a great choice of cafes & restaurants nearby.

Coming on business? Work from my spacious bureau desk with the fastest internet in town and plenty of USB sockets and & a wireless desk lamp!

Bringing a car? Save £££ & park for free in my residents' only parking :-). Using public transport instead? My home is less than 5 min walk to Leith Walk & MacDonald Road tram stop.

name: Modern, Central 1 Bed Flat in the heart of Leith.
description: Modern, fully equipped flat, just off the vibrant Leith Walk and a five minute walk away from the City Centre. Great public transport very close to the tram and several bus stops. Whether you plan to stay just a couple of days, or you plan to stay long term, this flat will be a great base to discover the city from. A King size bed and a big, comfy sofa bed in the living room makes this listing ideal even for 4 persons.

name: Retreat for 2 in heart of Edinburgh with parking

Cosy flat with fabulously comfortable beds - ideal for a couple or 2 friends. It is self-contained with its own entrance.

Accommodation:
- Large bedroom which can be made up as 1 super-king bed or 2 single beds
- Smaller living/dining room
- Hall - fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster.
- Large bathroom - shower over bath.

2 minutes walk to Bruntsfield with bars, cafes & shops. Walkable to city centre & train/tram Haymarket. Earlier check-in often possible. No smoking/vaping inside.

name: Quiet corner in the Grange
description:
The house, so close to town and so quiet at the same time, is between Morningside (Waitrose, The Merlin, The Canny man, Dominion Cinema), the Meadows, and Edinburgh University Kings buildings.
The morning light by the breakfast table is something we are not tiring of.
Comfy beds and no traffic ensure good nights.
Free parking
The place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families (with kids), and pets. Different sleeping arrangements can be accommodated on request.

name: Central Morrison St Apartment sleeps 16 guests
description: The Apartment is a 5 minute walk from princess street, the castle & the grassmarket. lots of pubs, restaurants and food shops only 1 minute away. there is even a cinema across the road if you are looking for a quiet night. the cities biggest nightclub is a 4 minute walk away.. You’ll love my place because the location is prime for all of edinburgh's attractions. It is a very spacious flat that will be comfortable for 16 people to stay in.. also can have 5 king size beds for couples if required.

name: Grindlay St - Fantastic 2BR in Theatre District
description: Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at "West End Stop" and arrive at Murrayfield in just 30 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to the heart of the action.

name: Gorgeous bedroom in Victorian house & free parking

description: Located in Gorgie and 5 mins walk to Murrayfield Stadium tram stop, our beautiful 1 bedroom flat is a PERFECT base for exploring Edinburgh. It is spacious enough to fit 3 to 4 guests.Great location and easy access to local amenities: 7-10 mins into citycenter on Lothian bus 30; 8 mins to Haymarket station on bus 2, 3,33,25. Bus 2 right outside the door takes you straight to the old town castle. Tram stop is nearby. Sainsbury, Aldi and McDonald's are round the corner. Only weekend free parking.

name: Self contained flat attached to terraced property

Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers who want a quiet space within easy reach of the city centre.The apartment comprises of a lounge with Sky t.v. ,a dining room with table and chairs, a fully equipped kitchen and a double bedroom with an en-suite shower room.

* Private Garden & Main Door

This wonderful property is modern, homely and in a beautiful, tranquil location.

description:
Bright, stylish double room with a view of Arthur’s Seat. Just two minutes from Portobello Beach and its charming promenade cafés, plus excellent bus links to central Edinburgh. Enjoy a clean, welcoming home with a friendly atmosphere—shared with two very sociable cats!

Perfect for a relaxing stay by the sea while staying close to the city.

name: Central Yet Quiet Apartment. Sleeps 3.
description:
Perfect base for exploring Edinburgh! City centre is a 15 minute walk. Lidl and Tesco across the road. Free Netflix! Free weekend & evening parking.

Ground floor. New bathrooms, double bedroom, kitchen and living room with foldable single bed. Sleeps 3 adults.

Free Netflix & Amazon Prime on a 40'' smart tv. Xbox 360. Free tea & coffee! Toiletries & towels.

The vibrant Canonmills & Broughton Street areas are nearby.

Easy access to York Place tram stop, Waverley Station and the Airlink bus.

name: Castle Lookout Apartment

Our beautiful, homely apartment is awaiting you and provides you with all the amenities you need for a comfortable and memorable stay. A great choice of bars, cafes and restaurants are right on your doorstep and you'll love how easy it is to get around and explore Edinburgh’s most popular attractions. Licence no EH-81146-F

name: Very central 2 bedroom flat. Sleeps 4-6

name: Traditional new town flat in the west end
description:
We are located in the heart of the West End and in the ideal location to explore Edinburgh. We are within walking distance from Charlotte Square, Princess Street, The Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle and many bars and restaurants on trendy George Street.

You’ll love my place as it has been newly renovated, it is immaculately presented with lots of light & it is the ideal base to explore Edinburgh.

My place is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

name: Cosy Victorian room near the city centre.
description: Traditional Victorian double bedroom near the city centre with great access to the local amenities. Please check the location before booking 🫶

You’ll love the house because of the location and the general look & feel. It is situated in a quiet mews which makes it really peaceful, but it's still very central and you can easily access all parts of Edinburgh through good transport links.

The house is good for couples, friends, business travellers and families

Licence Granted: EH-68377-F

name: Cosy Victorian flat near the Sea
description: My place is close to the Sea and some great cafes, bars and restaurants. You’ll love my place because of the cosynes. My place is ideal for solo adventurers, and business travelers. I love welcoming guests into my home, I like to talk and cook with my guests but happy to give my guests plenty of space when they require alone time. My place is 20 mins away from the city center by Tram, the Newhaven tram stop is 2 min away from my place. The airport is 40 min by bus or tram.

name: Spacious and quiet double room in the West End
description:
Our apartment is a large Victorian double upper in the UNESCO world heritage site, with a quiet and spacious bedroom overlooking private gardens. We are only 5 mins walk from Princes Street, the Usher Hall and Traverse Theatre and, in August, the Edinburgh Festivals. We are a stone's throw from the Modern Art Galleries (National Galleries) and Stockbridge's boutique restaurants, bars and retailers. There are bus & tram stops nearby and Haymarket Station is only 15 mins walk.

STL: EH-69321-F.

name: Amazing 3 beds apartment, Edinburgh City Centre
description: Impressive and stylish 3 bedrooms apartment located in the heart of Edinburgh's prestigious West End area, within easy walking distance to many of the capital 's finest shops and restaurants as well as its commercial and retail core in George Street and Princess Street.

name: Enjoy a Warm Welcome in an Elegant, Spacious Home
description:
Start a visit to Edinburgh in the surrounds of the beautiful Victorian architecture of Quendale Guest House. Relax in the seating area in the large bay window area of your spacious bedroom. Then, the city awaits.

Your room has a super-comfy, super-king sized bed and a compact en-suite shower room.

I offer self check in or can greet guests on arrival. During your stay I am on hand should you need assistance and I can also be contacted by phone.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Single room for female  -   friendly family home!
description:
No single male guests please as we are an all female household. Thanks.
Central, bright, friendly and clean single room in a family home. A short 15 minute bus ride to the city centre. This is a lovely area to explore on foot the water or Leith river, the Shore and Newhaven harbour. There is plentiful free street parking, and it is near the vibrant pubs and restaurants of Leith while also close to the city centre. We can lend you a bike.

name: Stunning Studio with Outdoor Hot Tub
description:
Our beautiful studio with spacious Hot Tub is close to Edinburgh Airport and only 5 miles from the West End. Perfect for enjoying all that Edinburgh offers, but with the peace and quiet of a rural location.
Own transport is recommended but public transport is nearby so leaving the car and hopping a bus/tram into town is easy. Plenty outdoor stuff close to hand if you don`t want to go too far.

name: Nature's hidden temptation
description:
A great three-bedroom apartment at the heart of Dean Village in a very quite residential area still just 10 minutes walk from Princes Street and Old Town! The flat is located on the first floor of a new building very convenient for families traveling by car as there is a private garage with the flat.
We accept up to 4 adults and two children under 16, please specify when booking(no extra charge for the children).

name: Guest Favourite Seaside Studio 2 min walk to beach
description:
This is a handsome 19th-century Victorian house situated on one of the most exclusive streets in Portobello. It offers unusually flexible accommodation, an enviable beach-side location and is close to all the towns amenities. The apartment is super clean and has been furnished with all the comforts of a home away from home.

This exceptional house has three apartments for short-term let and all of the apartments are well equipped and completely self-contained but can also be let together.

name: Light, spacious, double room off Leith walk.
description:
A light airy room in a conveniently situated flat just off Leith walk. Its just a 20 minute walk or 10 minute bus ride from the centre of Edinburgh. The flat is on a quiet street but close to an amazing selection of bars, restaurants and cafes, including Leith Depot, The Walnut, Victoria Bar, and Out of the Blue & Drill Hall Arts Cafe.

Within the flat is a well equipped kitchen which all guests are free to use. There is excellent free Wifi throughout and a smart tv in the living room.

name: A bright basement bedroom, 1 of 2 EH-77225-P
description:
Short term licence -house share:
EH-77225-P

A lovely private basement space within our home. We have 2 rooms available; this listing is for bedroom 1 which can accommodate 2 people. Booked together this space is ideal for either; friends, families, couples or individual travellers. Our home is in Trinity, a peaceful leafy suburb of Edinburgh. We are close to the city centre, many attractions and amenities.

name: This is it!  Privacy in a lovely Edinburgh house.
description: Close to the centre of Edinburgh & the waterfront at Leith and is ideal for single people, couples & children.  You can use one or two bedrooms (ask about second one) &  bathroom on top floor.  Breakfast is provided in the kitchen / dining room.  Buses stop 50m from our door every 10 mins during day & eves & it is a short journey to the centre of Edinburgh, botanical gardens, galleries & sea.  Picturesque Newhaven & Leith harbours are a short walk away.  Shops, restaurants, bars locally.

name: Lauriston Park
description:
Amazingly stylish 4-bedroom apartment in Edinburgh's city centre!

Explore Edinburgh from this fully equipped and comfortable apartment giving you the perfect base to do your sightseeing. The property is professionally cleaned and hotel-quality linens and towels will be provided. The Apartment equipped with Virgin Media Superfast 100M Wifi, as well as with over 100 channels, will have you well entertained during the stay.

The property is within walking distance of many attractions and eateries.

name: The Castle View on the Grassmarket
description:
Beautiful, bright, spacious Castle View apartment on Edinburgh's vibrant Grassmarket. Ideally located for Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile & Central Edinburgh.I

**New bathroom suite has been installed. Professional photos to be added to listing shortly **
EARLY CHECK IN AVAILABLE £15
LATE CHECK OUT IF POSSIBLE £15
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful, fresh apartment next to Meadows
description: My place is close to Summerhall and Victor Hugo Continental Delicatessen, the Meadows park and loads of festival venues. It is a short walk to the centre of Edinburgh where you can visit the Royal Mile and Princes Street gardens. You’ll love my place because of the locations, nearby pubs, bars and restaurants, nearby festival venues and the beautiful park. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

name: A double room available.
description: My place is close to the public transport (a bus stop is 5 minutes walk away). It is 30 minutes away by bus to the city centre. If you enjoy the nature, you will be situated 5 minutes walk from the Braidburn Valley Park. Bonaly Country Park, Swanston and Hillend are also within an easy reach. In terms of shops, there is a big Tesco/Aldi a 15 minute walk away and a local shop round the corner. I will provide some towels and an access to the internet.

name: Beautiful Duplex Apartment in Art Deco Building
description:
Perfectly located for the Edinburgh International Conference Centre!

This stunning, bright, spacious duplex apartment is perfect for any type of stay in Edinburgh due to its central location.

With swathes of natural light pouring through the almost floor to ceiling windows, it's the perfect place to relax after seeing the beautiful sights of Edinburgh!

The apartment includes a 6 seater dining table, Sonos system, 2 TVs and possibly one of the comfiest sofas you'll ever experience!

name: The Summer House
description:
A self contained studio flat close to Central Edinburgh. Set in a large private garden. We are close to nice boutique shops, as well as a Tesco, Sainsburys , M & S and Waitrose. We are in the beautiful leafy suburb of Morningside. The Summer House suits couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. Its a nice easy walk to town via the Meadows, or jump on a bus for a 5- 10 minute trip to town. Private and secure access is via my garage
(Tea and coffee are provided).

name: Beautiful Edinburgh Flat with 2 Double Bedrooms
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

name: Bright double bedroom in modern apartment.
description:
Our place offers a tranquil atmosphere, but you can reach the city centre by bus in 12- 20mins
Our flat is a modern spacious apartment with a supermarket nearby.
We offer a room only with a king bed, coffee/tea in the room. Private guest bathroom (not ensuit) (no kitchen facilities )
The neighbourhood is a friendly, quiet, eco built complex.
You can take the tram from the airport to MURRYFIELD STOP 15 min walk from our place
No parking , but limited free on street parking can be available.

name: A bright basement bedroom, 2 of 2 EH-77225-P
description:
EH-77225-P

A lovely private basement space within our home. We have 2 rooms available; this listing is for bedroom 2 which can accommodate 2 people and has a double bed. The rooms together are ideal for; friends, families, couples or individual travellers. Our home is in Trinity, a peaceful leafy suburb of Edinburgh. We are close to the city centre and many attractions and amenities. The shower room in this basement space will be shared with 2 other guests if both rooms are booked.

name: Spacious triple ensuite-breakfast & free parking
description:
Comfortable attic triple room with en suite. Smart TV/DVD, Kettle, refrigerator & microwave in room. Good location for touring and city bypass is only 5 mins away. Direct access to city, airport and train station, bus stops outside house. Supermarket opposite which has a cafe, Free driveway parking available. Continental Breakfast provided in room. Room has sloping ceilings so maybe a problem for tall guests.
Room is upstairs so not suitable for young children or disabled

name: 1 Bedroom Sunny Flat, Leith, Edinburgh - sleeps 4
description:
Entire Appartment: Super 1 Bedroom Flat overlooking Leith Links Park. Can sleep 4 (additional double sized sofa bed that pulls out easily in the Livingroom). This is a home from home.

Well located for exploring The Shore and Leith area, park and sea, with easy access by bus or tram in 10-15 minutes to the city centre and a direct link with the tram to airport and Waverly Train Station.

There is free and paid street parking next to the appartment and also a large supermarket.

name: Perfectly located Private room in Edinburgh
description:
Perfect centrally located large private double room in Edinburgh with Wifi, great access to public transport and the new tramline straight to the airport.

Situated in a lively area of Edinburgh, right next to the city centre, there are great bars, restaurants, coffeshops, supermarkets, independent stores and more within 5 min walk of the apartment.

The bathroom is small and clean, whilst the kitchen has recently been refurbished with all modern appliances.

I look forward to meeting you!

name: Boutique Apartment in Edinburgh's New Town
description:
✔ Splendid flat nicely nestled in Edinburgh’s New Town
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Completely furnished kitchen
✔ Lovely patio with table & chairs
✔ Princes St is an 11-minute walk
✔ 15-minute walk to Scott Monument
✔ Edinburgh Castle & St Giles are a 19-minute walk
✔ The National Museum of Scotland is a 22-minute walk

name: Room to rent
description: Room in a small flat near Edinburgh bypass.In close proximity to the Airport and about 35-40 min by bus to Princes Street,bus stop near the block of flats.

name: Montgomery Apartments - Stevensons
description:
The Stenvesons Apartment is located highly commutable area of west Edinburgh and is around 15 minutes from Edinburgh City Center and Airport by drive.

Bus stop with frequent service is just two minute walk from home.

Free Parking and WIFI

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families.

name: Prestigious property in the heart of the New Town
description: Approx 200m from George Street and Princes Street and  all the best shops, bars and restaurants. Heriot Row is an original “double upper” apartment which occupies the 2nd & 3rd floors of a Cat “A” listed stone building, offering magnificent views of the New Town. The apartment has been sympathetically renovated to an extremely high specification, whilst still retaining the original features of the property and is ideal for couples, business travellers, and families with children over 5.

name: Edinburgh Heritage
description:
Brand New Listing from a well-reviewed host!

Located right across Edinburgh Playhouse Theatre, 2 minutes walk from the Airport Tram stop, next to numerous bars, cinema, biggest shopping centre in Edinburgh, there is no better location you can get in you want to immerse yourself in the cultural life and historic heritage of the Scottish capital city. Exceptional views of the North Sea and Edinburgh's West in a cosy and friendly atmosphere.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright Comfortable Room with own ensuite
description: This is a 2nd floor Georgian flat in central Edinburgh (please note - no lift) - superbly located - a short walk from Waverley Station and a few minutes walk from the Tram stop at Picardy Place.  Light and airy with a spectacular view of Calton Hill from the sitting room and within short walking distance of restaurants, cafes, central shopping area, cinema and theatre .  The ideal place  for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

name: Cornerstone House, Sophisticated Gem in West End
description:
Built in the 1820's as part of the New Town and West End, the property is in Edinburgh's World Heritage site and is a Grade A listed building.

It has been renovated to maintain many of its original features whilst maintaining a contemporary feel. The whole apartment has an open feel due to the large, open door ways, extra high ceilings, wide hallway and wide plank French oak flooring throughout.

The huge, living / dining area is perfect for dinner parties and the beautiful, designer kitchen is also a great place to socialise while cooking.

4 very large bedrooms , 3 with super king size beds, one with a kingsize bed. One of the larger rooms has the alternative option of 2 single beds. Hotel quality bed linen and towels provided.

2 modern bathrooms, one en-suite from the master bedroom with a walk in shower. The other has both walk in shower, large standalone bath tub and has its own music system to help you relax while you soak.

name: High Street at the Heart of the Royal Mile
description: My place is close to The Royal Mile. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Double @Penthouse flat nr Sea, 25-30min to airport
description:
Our modern penthouse flat in north Edinburgh has scenic views over the city. We enjoy the best of two worlds: we are a stone's throw away from the tranquil sea & the city is only 3.5 miles away.
Stay in our cosy double room with a comfortable bed with shared guest bathroom. Free parking+lift available.

* Within 20 min proximity to airport by cab (£18-20).

*Morrison's supermarket, petrol station and Pure Gym is only 6 min away.

name: Fabulously spacious basement flat city centre
description:
Georgian basement flat of a townhouse designed by ‘William Playfield’. Very central location. The apartment is a 5 minute walk to The Playhouse Theatre and St James Quarter shopping centre.
Princes street and Waverley station are a 10 minute walk. Calton Hill is 3 minutes walk.
Apartment is very spacious and and has front and rear private courtyard spaces. The accommodation is very peaceful despite being centrally located so close to fantastic transport links, bars and restaurants.

name: Large and bright 2nd floor city centre apartment
description:
Prime location property comfortably accommodates 10 people** over 4 bedrooms.
This stunning property, just a 5-10 min walk from Waverley Station and Princess Street, located near to The Playhouse and Carlton Hill, with tram stop within 1-2 mins walk making it an excellent base to explore this vibrant and beautiful city.

name: Casa Vacanza
description: A cozy double bedroom, in a family home ideal for those traveling alone or as a couple, with an en-suite bathroom you will find: linens and towels, kettle, hairdryer, smart TV, bedside table and built-in wardrobe, makeup table, and a mini fridge. During the summer our garden in the back can be used as a place to relax, have a snack or simply sunbathe. The shared kitchen has other essential services.

name: Elegant central apartment, with lovely view
description:
A thoughtfully decorated 2 bed apartment right in the heart of old Edinburgh close to the historic Castle, the Witchery by the Castle, The Outsider Restaurant, The Royal Mile, and the Grassmarket.

You’ll love the great views of the Old Town, the central location, and lovely period features.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stay with Fiona  Comfortable room + quiet location
description: Lovely modern and comfortable double bedroom in quite location. Property is 2 minutes from very well serviced bus routes direct into town centre (within 20 minutes). Towels and all bed linen provided. Private bathroom with power shower and toiletries. Use of fully equipped kitchen and utility room with washing machine and tumble dryer if needed. Wifi throughout property. Friendly hosts with flexible check in/out times. Free parking is available directly outside the property.

name: 2 bedroom apartment in Elegant New Town home
description:
Spacious 2 bedroom suite with living room & bathroom forming the upper level of grade A listed Georgian town house. Relaxing base in City Centre, with beautiful views.
Convenient one minute walk from Princes Street, George Street and the West End. Perfect central location for Edinburgh Festival & Fringe events.
4 adult guests only to meet license requirements. Possible family accommodation for up to 6 (4 adults, 2 infants under 10)

name: Charming City Centre Mews House
description:
Charming Georgian Mews House in the City Centre.
Located in a quiet New Town Mews with direct access to Charlotte Square. One minute from shops & cafes in Princes Street and George Street.
Perfect for Edinburgh Festival or Christmas & New Year.

Kingsize bed (can divide into 2 singles) & 2 single sofa beds.

name: Heart of Edinburgh beautiful apartment
description:
Enjoy a stylish stay at this centrally located, tranquil Georgian apartment, just minutes from train, bus, and tram stops. You’ll have exclusive use of the entire apartment. Situated in the vibrant west end of Georgian Newtown, it offers independent shops, cafes, and restaurants right on your doorstep, with easy access to Princes Street, Stockbridge, and stunning views of Edinburgh Castle just outside.

This apartment is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families.

name: Private Large Bruntsfield Room
description:
A large, beautiful double bedroom in a 2 bedroom traditional victorian Edinburgh flat.
The top floor flat is situated in Bruntsfield, a leafy, lively and highly sought area of Edinburgh. The flat sits right beside the Bruntsfield links, a beautiful meadow of grass and a walkway which takes one across into the in the heart of Edinburgh's thriving festival community. LGBT friendly.

name: Luxury House in Edinburgh, Sauna & Garden Office
description:
Modern newish-build semi detached house.

Cozy warm rooms with 3 bedrooms: king size bed, bunk bed, double sofa bed (in the garden office).

Use of desk, hairdryer, towels and free WiFi.

Garden, kitchen, bathroom, living room and free parking.

Our place is good for couples, families, friends and business travellers.

Located in north Edinburgh 20 minutes by bus from City, 10 min from beach with pleasant running, roller-skates or bicycle track directed to the beautiful Crammond.

name: Comfortable double room, Murrayfield, Edinburgh
description: Our house is situated in a quiet cul de sac close to the city centre, Murrayfield stadium is a 5 minute walk ideal for rugby and concerts at the stadium and airport is approximately 4 miles away.  The bedroom has a very comfortable king size bed. The bathroom has bath with waterfall shower, sink, and wc and is shared with us  also a cloakroom toilet with handbasin.  Bathroom and toilet are situated next to the guest bedroom.

name: Appin Apartment
description: Welcome to my bright and spacious main door apartment located in a modern residential development in a close proximity of central Edinburgh. Free on street parking. With excellent bus links and nearby train station commuting into the town is not a problem. A five minute walk, local shopping area with a bakery, a Costa coffee outlet and an M&S food store. Two double bedrooms (one en suite), can sleep four. Wifi, firestick, Netflix, full modern kitchen & coffee/tea facilities

name: Meadowbank - Cosy Traditional Flat w free parking!
description: Beautiful traditional Edinburgh one bedroom apartment with lovely period features minutes walk away from Holyrood Park. The perfect base for your trip! A cosy home from home feel. One bedroom with a king size bed, plenty of space to relax in, a well equipped kitchen, and the apartment is centrally located on a quiet one way street with great bus links for the city and free on street parking, providing quick and easy access in and out of the city.

name: Quiet comfortable room near Leith
description: A private room and bathroom in my flat, which is 5 mins from the bottom of Leith walk. There are lots of great cafes and dining options. There are buses every few minutes to the city centre which takes 15 minutes.  You can walk in to town in 30 minutes. The shore  is a short walk which offers some of the best eating in Edinburgh. Pilrig Park is right by my place and the Water of Leith walkway is great to stretch your legs. My place is good for solo adventurers and business travellers.

name: Great Location! 2BD/2 Bath in Centre of Edinburgh
description: Find your new temporary home in our amazing Edinburgh apartment where comfort, convenience, and peace are in abundance.

name: Luxury City Centre Four Bedroom Townhouse
description:
Our house is right at the heart of Edinburgh's fashionable New Town with all that the city has to offer right on your door step. Set over three floors with lots of space the house is the perfect venue for a relaxed vacation experience for families, large groups and business travellers alike.

All the rooms at Mitchells have been finished to a high specification. A gentle palette of colours compliments the original period features which are offset by striking pieces of contemporary furniture.

name: Minerva's licence No EH-66524-F
description: My place is 5 mins walk to public transport to city centre and 10 mins from the airport, You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed and the ambiance .

name: Cosy 2BD Flat on Vibrant Leith Walk, Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our cosy 2-bedroom flat on vibrant Leith Walk, the heart of Edinburgh’s lively local scene. Enjoy easy access to independent cafés, restaurants, and shops, plus scenic riverside walks at nearby Leith Docks. Green spaces like Pilrig Park are close by, perfect for relaxing. With great transport links to the city centre, this flat is your perfect base for exploring Edinburgh in comfort and style. We can’t wait to welcome you!

name: Double bedroom in Leith, breakfast included
description:
This is a beautifully decorated bright spacious Victorian flat in Leith. The bedroom is very large with a comfortable bed. There is a spacious kitchen where you can enjoy your breakfast and make drinks.

Leith is a vibrant waterfront district with an abundance of great restaurants, cafes and traditional bars.

There are buses a few minutes walk from the flat that will take you to the centre in about 15 minutes. There is also a direct bus to the airport that stops a few minutes from the flat.

name: Quiet traditional cottage in central location
description: Welcome to your home from home. My traditional Edinburgh Colony cottage is located in a central but quiet neighbourhood within walking distance to the main tourism sites. With a main door entering onto our small garden, you can enjoy morning coffee in the private garden. We've restaurants, bars and cafes on our doorstep and the Edinburgh International Conference Centre and Haymarket Station are short walks away.

name: City Centre New Town 2 Bedroom Flat
description: Move into your city centre space in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic New Town. Fully equipped flat, private entrance and outside seating area on south facing courtyard. Enjoy being close to transport links, historic sites and entertainment. Two double bedrooms, two bathrooms, comfortable sitting room and dining kitchen. For convenient city mini-breaks and short stays, this beautifully finished 2 double bedroom traditional Georgian flat is the perfect base. 0.1m from tram stop at Picardy Place.

name: Gorgeous Flat near Edinburgh Castle
description: Even the rain can’t dampen the beauty of Edinburgh, so if you haven’t visited, embark on a new Scottish adventure! This inviting flat will be the ideal travel base. With its convenient location at the heart of the New Town, you will easily be able to explore Scottish National Portrait Gallery and Princes Street, and the tram stop will provide great transport links. The flat consists of 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a living room, a well-equipped kitchen and a dining area. Essentials are provided.

name: Private Entrance, City Centre, Apartment.
description:
The central location of the apartment makes it an ideal place to take in all the city sights, its proximity to the Royal Mile & Castle being only a 10 min walk.

With the additional benefit of being in a quiet neighbourhood only 2 mins walk to the large park "The Meadows", dog and children friendly.

The traditional 19th century property has been beautifully renovated to create a modern, yet cosy feel.

Edinburgh License: EH-70387-F

name: ⚓'The Shore' Apartment in the ❤ of Leith
description:
The Shore apartment has everything you need for a short stay in the city.

Situated bang on The Shore - one of the most popular areas of Edinburgh and voted one of the best places to live in the UK.

The city’s best bars, cafes and restaurants are on your doorstep. While the city centre/old town are only a short bus or tram journey away.

name: Bright Flat with Workspace in New Town
description:
✔ Cosy flat, ideally located in the new town
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 5-minute walk to St James Quarter shopping centre
✔ 8-minute walk to Scottish National Portrait Gallery
✔ 8-minute walk to Calton Hill
✔ 18-minute walk to Edinburgh Airport
✔ 7-minute walk to Waverley train station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming Duplex by Royal Botanic Gardens
description: My beautiful 3rd floor duplex in Goldenacre is available to rent to students for the 25/26 winter semester. Situated in historic New Town, close to Inverleith Park and the Royal Botanic Gardens. Centrally located for a pleasant walk into the City Centre, Stockbridge, or Leith. The flat is 4 bedrooms, with 3 double bedrooms and 1 single bedroom. There is also the possibility of an additional double bed in the living room, to make 5 bedrooms.

name: Charming Nest for Two with Castle View
description:
✔ Lovely flat perfectly positioned in Edinburgh’s Old Town
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Fully fitted kitchen
✔ Next to Edinburgh Castle
✔ National Museum of Scotland is a 7-minute walk
✔ St Giles is an 8-minute walk
✔ 15-minute walk to Scott Monument & the iconic Princes St
✔ Edinburgh Waverley train station is a 14-minute walk
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Room in Bright Spacious home in Edinburgh
description: My place is close to Morningside and Bruntsfield. You’ll love the litlle shops and cafes a short walk away.  Good for couples and business travellers.

name: New Town Large 2 Bedrooms Apartment
description: New Town Lovely 2 Bedrooms Apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a beautiful, two-story, Georgian building in the Stockbridge area of Edinburgh's beautiful New Town. If you get tired of the many restaurants, cafes, pubs of Stockbridge, the city centre of Edinburgh and all of its attractions are 10 minutes stroll away. To reach the Old Town approximately 20 minutes walk. For the airport, the Airlink Bus and Tram stops are less than 15 minutes.

name: Comfortable and bright art flat, lots of plants!
description: My flat is close to loads of cool and quirky bars and restaurants, has a tram stop nearby and is a very simple, one street route to the city centre, so no getting lost on your way! You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the art work, the vibrant surrounding area, and the relaxed and homey feel. Plus, if you fancy spending a night in, there's smart tv with Netflix etc. I've been hosting for 8 years to great reviews so you can trust you'll have a great stay. Happy booking!

name: Spottiswoode Apartment
description:
This spacious, characterful maindoor flat in the desirable Marchmont area is accessed via a gated private garden. Spacious lounge with quality furnishings around a traditional fireplace. Smart TV for streaming services. Full kitchen/dining room; master king-size bedroom; 2nd bedroom with double and single beds. Cot available. Shops, cafes, bars, restaurants close by. 5min walk to The Meadows; 20min to centre. Free parking weekends & weekdays 17.30-08.30

Licence EH-69603-F

name: Peaceful sunny & central artists flat with parking
description: Located just 15-20 mins walk to Holyrood Palace and the foot of the Royal Mile and Edinburgh's Old Town and right next to Queens Park, and the volcanic peak of Arthur's seat.   This artists flat is a little rough around the edges and rustic in nature but it's a special place  that's spacious, bright and peaceful, despite being close to town. You’ll love our  large shared garden , the cozy living room and the close proximity to the royal park and volcano in the front garden! great for dogs!

name: Edinburgh City Centre: Modern and Spacious Home
description: A large, beautifully renovated apartment ideally located in Edinburgh city centre, less than 5 minutes’ walk from Princes Street (with easy transport links to the airport and Murrayfield Stadium), the Castle and gardens, and the historic old town. Perfect for couples, business travellers and families looking for a surprisingly quiet home in the heart of the city.

name: Wonderful large room in fabulous main door flat
description:
My place is beautiful with many charming features from the 1800's when the Edinburgh New town was built. You will love the light and the spacious bedroom. The city centre is 20 minutes walk to the Castle , bus from outside the flat. There are many cafes, bars, shops etc on the door step. Please note Edinburgh is a city with restrictive parking. No need for
a car. weekend parking is free.
NOTE there are two renting rooms in this apartment
under separate listings if that is of interest.

name: Cosy Cabin (self-contained) Central Edinburgh
description:
Utterly private, beautifully built, warm and welcoming cabin in quiet suburban west central Edinburgh. City centre just 10mins away and walkable to Murrayfield stadium. 15mins from airport.

Situated in private garden- access via path to side of main house and rigged for self entry. Free car parking.

En Suite, with double bed and memory foam mattress. Wifi, smart TV with Netflix, apple+, Prime video, Disney etc. Fridge, tea and coffee. Fully licensed as a City of Edinburgh short term let.

name: Lovely garden bedroom - cute as a button
description:
My place is wonderful and you will love it.
