This is an 1800s property with wonderful original features and 16 ft ceilings DO NOT COME here if you want MODERN PRISTINE HOT HOUSES (you will not like it - go to the premier inn) . You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood, the light, the kitchen, the comfy bed, and the cosiness.
NOTE there are two renting rooms in this apartment
under separate listings if that is of interest.

name: Boutique Castle View Apartment.
description:
A boutique city centre studio apartment with unrivalled view of Edinburgh Castle. A cool and comfortable hideaway from the busy streets whilst still being in the city centre. Comfortably accommodating two people the apartment is fitted with a modern kitchen, sitting area, linen bedding and a spacious shower room that overlooks the Castle Rock.
The Grassmarket is a lively and historical area of Edinburgh that offers independent shops, pubs, restaurants and a friendly atmosphere.

name: Spacious, lovely top floor one bedroom flat
description:
Spacious and lovely flat in central location, at the heart of Gorgie. 10 minutes to Haymarket Station by bus, 18 minutes to Prince's Street. Supermarkets, restaurants, cafes and shops close-by. Direct buses from both Waverley Train Station, with plenty of buses to all major tourist interests,

Top floor flat in a traditional Victorian terrace (no lift). A cosy home with lovely and colourful decor, the flat comfortably accommodates four people with a double bed and one sofa bed.

name: Chic and Spacious House at the Heart of the City
description:
✔ Stunning house ideally located in New Town
✔ 3 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Fully equipped kitchen
✔ Edinburgh Waverley train station is a 13-minute walk
✔ 14-minute walk to Scott Monument
✔ 16-minute walk to Royal Mile
✔ 22-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ 23-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle

name: Family/ Qaud En-Suite room
description:
We are acting similar to a hotel.
This room is en-suite
This room can be arranged as 1 grand double and 2 single beds or 4 single beds Please let us know your bed preference before arrival and we will do our best to accomadate
This room has the following Amentities - Free Wi-Fi, Freeview TV, Handsoap, Showergel, Hair Dryer, Tea and Coffee making Facilites.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Newly build room with en suite bathroom
description: The room is in our modern and spacious house located in the South of Edinburgh, just 25 min from the city center with regular direct bus service 24/7. Free private parking on the premises.

name: Charming central canalside flat with secret garden
description: Cosy  apartment with shared  'secret garden' in quiet street beside the lovely Union Canal and nestled between Bruntsfield and Fountainpark-  5 minutes to upmarket independent restaurants, coffee stops and boutiques one way and 5 minutes the other way to an entertainment complex, gym, bars, fast food and eateries of all nationalities.  15 minutes walk to Murrayfield Stadium, 20 minutes  along the canal towpath to  the city centre  Ground floor, garden access, wifi and on street paid parking.

name: Private bathroom & parking direct to airport/train
description: Nice cosy double bedroom in city centre 2 bed modern flat with your own private bathroom and parking, 15 minutes walk from Haymarket train station and city centre, 5 minutes walk to bus stop/airport link/tram, Airlink 100 passes by every 10 minutes,  it is in a quiet residential development, local shops, cafes and restaurants are just around the corner. PS Kindly note that this place is not suitable for elderly(50+) couples, unless you are comfortable carrying luggage upstairs yourself.

name: The Bonnie Bide Awa' - spa bath/bathroom tv
description:
LICENSED SHORT TERM LET PROPERTY
Romantic Georgian apartment in the very heart of historic Edinburgh. Enjoy all the city has to offer from this unique base just metres away from Princes Street, Calton Hill and the Edinburgh Playhouse Theatre. After your busy day, come home and view the iconic Regents Bridge from the apartment lounge window whilst enjoying a courtesy coffee from the Nespresso machine, before relaxing in the double end jacuzzi bath with integrated TV. Enjoy your stay!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central main door flat over 2floors
description:
Fantastic main door flat (ground floor) over 2 floors. Heated floors on the lower ground level, TV, wifi internet.
Very comfortable and well equipped main door flat close to city centre and Haymarket train station. Close to main city centre attractions.

Please note if you intend to bring a pet - there will be additional £20 cleaning charge

name: Bright, large double bedroom
description:
This is a good sized double bedroom which is bright and warm in a second floor flat with security door entrance.
Nice south facing view over green park area.
It's well located for the airport and motorway access, free parking outside the building, easy access to public transport.
Buses 3 and 30 get you to the centre in 25 mins and by car in 13 mins.
Good local facilities including library, hairdresser, cinema, shops and the shopping centre Wester Hailes 10 minutes walking distance.

name: Lovely 2 Bedroom House
description:
Lovely cosy 2 bedroom house in quiet cul-de-sac close to major bus links into town and airport.
On street parking available and 2 minute walk to local shops. Major supermarket 5 minute drive.
Comfortable living room, dining area and kitchen with patio doors to back garden area
Master bedroom with luxury double bed with built in wardrobes
Second double bedroom with double bed and wardrobe
Main bathroom with power shower and bath

name: Central, 2 bedrooms
description:
The apartment is in the fashionable Stockbridge area, a great base only 5 minutes from the city centre and by the Water of Leith walkway and near Botanic Gardens. Ideal for a city break with access to the green outdoors.
Enjoy the modern apartment and experience life in Stockbridge by visiting boutique shops and unique, independent coffee shops & brunch spots! Celebration packages and activities available at Carfrae Farm or pop in and say hello on a day trip.

name: Explore Edinburgh from a Central Flat with Free Parking
description:
Bright spacious 1st floor flat. Kitchen has high-end appliances.

USB charging and hairdryers in every bedroom.

Free underground parking for 1 vehicle, max headroom 2.2metres.

All three bedrooms face the rear of the building so they are really quiet for a downtown city apartment.

Pack&play crib for baby or small child.

Located downtown for Festival, Holidays, Concerts, Shows and Rugby all available by public transport.

name: Sophisticated Edinburgh Apartment in City Centre
description: Welcome to our sophisticated and chic apartment in trendy Edinburgh, where you will feel comfortably at home and experience the city like a local.

name: Wardie Garden Cottage, nr Wardie Bay, free parking
description:
Bright, spacious one bedroom cottage close to the city centre.
Accommodates 2 to 4 persons:- one king sized bedroom, and an extremely comfortable king size sofa bed in the lounge.
Well equipped modern kitchen, and luxurious shower room.
Excellent bus routes just outside the apartment, with frequent buses, 15 minutes to city centre.
Good local amenities. Off road parking.
Coffee, tea and milk provided.

name: Rm3-Best Area-Classic Flat-15min Walk to Centre
description:
***All rooms are thoroughly cleaned, disinfected and sterilised before check-in.***

The apartment is perfectly situated between the city centre and trendy district of Leith. Countless bars, restaurants, cafés, supermarkets etc, right on the doorstep.
The apartment has a home cinema projector setup.
2 shared bathrooms, shared kitchen and spacious shared lounge.

New Windows have been installed since the complaints about noise!! :-)

name: Calming Ground Floor Mews Flat with Parking
description: Make yourself at home and enjoy the Houst experience at our charming ground-floor apartment in the heart of Marchmont, one of Edinburgh’s most desirable neighbourhoods. Just a short stroll from the scenic Meadows, the University, and the historic Old Town, you’ll be perfectly placed to explore the best of the city. With cosy interiors, a fully equipped kitchen, and all the essentials for a relaxing stay, it’s the perfect base to live like a local and experience authentic Edinburgh charm.

name: Stylish Central Apartment with Panoramic City View
description: Our stylish apartment with stunning panoramic views is the perfect base for your stay in Edinburgh. Conveniently situated in the popular Bruntsfield area, just a few minutes from Edinburgh Castle, Old Town and city centre by bus or a short walk, visiting the wonderful selection of bars, restaurants and cafes. Beautifully renovated, the apartment offers a stylish space with all the home comforts you could want including TV and WiFi. Ideally suited for couples, families, groups and individuals.

name: Lovely double room close to City Centre
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. Good and frequent bus services into city centre takes 15-20 minutes. Portobello Beach is a pleasant 20 minute stroll away through our Figgate Park. Convenient for mini supermarket Spar. The Kings Park is not far from my home where you can climb "Arthur's Seat" and visit Holyrood Palace (where the King stays when he is in Edinburgh). Dynamic Earth and Edinburgh Parliament are also close to the Palace.

name: 2 Double Bedroom Luxury Apartment at the Festival
description:
This beautiful home is close to The Meadows, The Royal Mile & Edinburgh Castle. This property has everything that you need for a beautiful stay.

The apartment is a 5 min Taxi ride or 15 min walk to Princes St, Waverley Station, Edinburgh Playhouse & the City Centre. A great location for all Edinburgh has to offer with local bars, cafes, restaurants, shops & art galleries all on our street

name: Quiet Single room
description: You’ll love our place because of it's easy proximity to the city centre and the bustling Leith community is on our doorstep full of great bars and restaurants. Several grocery stores nearby for those looking to cut down on eating out costs and local convenience store less than 1 minute away. Good transport links to all areas of city and guests report the bed is very comfortable and they get a good nights sleep!

name: Boutique City Centre Apartment, in a Fantastic Location
description:
Browse artisan shops, then sink into the corner sofa with a good book at this spacious boutique apartment on the oldest Street in the New Town of Edinburgh. Colourful prints, pastel bed frames, and French-style furniture make for an eclectic mix.

You will certainly feel at home here.

Guests will have the whole apartment to themselves. We don't keep our belongings here, it's a purpose holiday home.

24 hour Access code.

We will be available by phone or text anytime.

The apartment is centrally situated to cafes, restaurants and all the major tourist attractions and transport links. The castle and Old Town are a short walk away, as is Princes Street Gardens. It couldn't be better located to enjoy the city.

This is a fantastic location, difficult to rival.

The apartment is beautiful and in an amazing location to walk and explore the city by foot.

name: Peaceful Portobello Cottage
description:
A peaceful double room for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.
Portobello is Edinburgh's seaside suburb, this area is relaxed and welcoming with local amenities 7 mins walk down the high street and only 5 minutes walk from the beach. There you will find cosy pubs, restaurants and cafe's along the promenade.
Top tip- Turkish Baths ( ask for details)

Bus Stops are 3 minute around the corner to
Princess street- 3 miles
Holyrood Palace- 1.5 miles
The Royal Mile- 1.6 miles

name: Large elegant twin room stunning Castle views
description: For the last check-in, your flight must arrive by 6:15 p.m. Please allow enough time to disembark, clear passport control (which can be busy), collect baggage, and travel by public transport. The apartment is about a 20-minute walk to the Royal Mile and city centre, and offers a shared kitchen and bathroom. Check-in runs from 2–8 p.m. Profile photos and Airbnb reviews are required. Click on my image to learn more about me, and kindly provide similar details.  Read the house rules  & information.

name: Caledonian - Charming Central 1 Bed Flat
description:
Our place is close to Edinburgh Haymarket Railway Station, transport from the airport and the city centre. You will be able to walk home from the city centre in around 15 mins from Princes Street or jump on one of multiple buses that will take you one block away.

Our place is perfect for anyone looking for a wee home away from home with plenty of amenities close by including restaurants, bars and shops.

Our place is perfect for business travelers, solo adventurers or couples.

name: Superking/twin room in beautiful Victorian house.
description:
Spacious room with a comfortable superking-sized double bed which can also be configurated as 2 single beds.

It is up one flight of stairs in Quendale Guest House, a beautiful Victorian house.

The room is west facing so gets the evening sun and is at the back of the house so is quiet.

There is a sink in the room and a shower room with toilet directly opposite. The toilet is shared with one other single bedroom (the single room has its own en-suite shower).
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Central Room in Historic Tenement Near Old Town
description:
Please be aware that this shared accommodation. I live in the apartment and will be here for your stay.

When I'm not at work or out, I enjoy cooking and quiet nights in.

You will have a private bedroom and access to shared bathroom, kitchen and living room :)

Guest must be the one booking

Third floor city centre room in tollcross neighbourhood.

- 20 min walk to Edinburgh Castle
- 20 min walk to Princes Street
- 15 min walk to Royal Mile
- 12 min walk to Greyfriers Kirkyard

name: Spacious double bedroom in New Town apartment
description: Bright, spacious double bedroom in large Georgian family flat with lots of character.  Ideally located in the heart of Edinburgh New Town, close to Stockbridge, the Botanic Gardens and the Water of Leith.   In easy reach of Princes Street, the Old Town and Edinburgh tram stops.  Linens, toiletries and light breakfast included.

name: Modern City Centre Apartment 2 Bed 2 bath
description:
Newly Painted & Updated | Prime Location

Bright and modern Scandi-inspired 2-bed, 2-bath flat, perfect for professionals and travellers.

📍 Prime Location – Just a 15-min walk to the city centre/Old Town and 2 mins from Edinburgh’s best bars, restaurants, and shops. Easy access to the airport tram and transport links.

Enjoy a private balcony with breathtaking Calton Hill & city views – the perfect spot to unwind!

name: Unique place: huge rooms, garden..At city centre
description:
Great apartament at city centre, short distance walking to Princess Street or Grass Market.

The difference is in the space of the romos and the private garden. Also, I will try to personalize your stay.

Notice you can book only the huge room (suite) looking for my other ad of the same property.

Enjoy the ful apartment: rooms,garden,livin room,bath,kichen....

name: Sakura Edinburgh Guest House
description: Lovely twin bedroom with seperate  bathroom in our guest house in a fantastic central location in Edinburgh close to many visitor attractions including Edinburgh Castle, Museum, Arthur's Seat and the Meadows Park and great range of places for eating out close by. The room includes a desk and chairs as well as tea and coffee facilities as well as storage.

name: 1 Bedroom Flat in the New Town of Edinburgh
description: Stunning private flat contained in Georgian Townhouse. Lower part of a charming townhouse centrally location in Edinburgh super-fashionable Stockbridge with private gardens in the square and backs on to the Water of Leith river. We are happy to welcome well-behaved pets.

name: Georgian Apartment in Amazing Central Location!
description: A fully licensed beautiful Georgian apartment in the historic New Town area.  It’s a short walk away from the city centre’s attractions including the Christmas markets, Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, shops and many other must see’s and do’s.  Located minutes walk from Stockbridge - a bustling historic village in its own right.  Boasting many independent shops, restaurants, cafes and bars to be explored.  At the end of Cumberland st, sits one of Edinburghs most insta’d spots 🫶🏻

name: 2BD Historic Home in Heart of Edinburgh
description: Experience Edinburgh’s historic charm from this beautifully presented two-bedroom duplex apartment, just a minute’s walk from the iconic Royal Mile. Nestled in the heart of the Old Town, you’ll be perfectly placed to explore the city’s most celebrated sights—from Edinburgh Castle and Holyrood Palace to the cobbled closes and hidden courtyards that define the area. With sweeping views of Salisbury Crags and the city skyline, this is a memorable base to enjoy the spirit of the Scottish capital!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish 3 Bed Apt, Sparkling clean,  Free Parking
description:
Located on the edge of Holyrood Park with views of Arthurs Seat this stylish and modern flat is the ideal place to call home while you are visiting Edinburgh.

During your stay you can enjoy superior accommodation with your friends and family, while providing the perfect base to explore Edinburgh’s many tourist or Festival attractions.

Tourist attractions, bars and restaurants and Edinburgh Festival venues only 5 - 20 minute walk.

name: Spacious double or twin room in Edinburgh
description: Spacious private double or twin room in Edinburgh. Ideally situated for events at Tynecastle Park or Murrayfield Stadium. Traditional tenement flat with modern bathroom and kitchen fittings.

name: Kingsburgh Lodge Murryfield, close to city centre
description:
This beautiful private lodge is located on the grounds of a grand Victorian house built in the 1890's. The lodge has its own private, gated entrance and driveway to park your car. It boasts two bedrooms, each with spacious ensuite. The home is located between Haymarket and Murrayfield, 1 mile from Edinburgh city centre with great transport links into the city centre and to the airport.

You could not find a more beautiful and well recommended home to stay in for your visit to Edinburgh.

name: Sunny attic floor in family home
description:
This characterful accommodation has a double bedroom with an additional single room .A travel cot is available. Although there is a cozy book-lined sitting room with TV and WiFi and a kettle, there are no cooking or laundry facilities .But there are many neighbourhood cafes, and a launderette.

The property is cleaned scrupulously between bookings, and everything you need to touch will be sanitised. Breakfast can be provided on trays to eat upstairs.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Six Fifty-Five - bright, traditional apartment
description: This bright and spacious apartment (42 square metres of floor space) is in an excellent location. A short walk (approximately 15 minutes/one mile) through the historic Georgian New Town, with its shops, galleries and places to eat, including Michelin Guide restaurants, brings you to the world-famous Princes Street. The apartment is also only 0.5 mile from The Royal Botanic Gardens. Free on-street parking is available a short distance from the apartment - Warriston Road (5/10mins walk away)

name: Double room - central location on tram route
description:
Medium size double room for one guest in my home in central Edinburgh, 4 minutes walk from McDonald Road tram stop or 15/20 minutes from Waverley train. The room is bright, fresh, cosy and clean. I aim to offer value for money in a great location and take pride in ensuring you have an enjoyable stay.

Your stay will include fresh linen, bath towel, welcome snacks, memory foam pillows, hairdryer, GHD straighteners, guide books, USB adapter, heated blanket.

1 guest only as per my host licence

name: City centre double room in villa
description: Walking distance of the city, bed and continental breakfast, en suite bathroom all essentials include. 5 minute walk from Stockbridge markets/bars/restaurants, on the bus route if needed. Supermarkets close by with all essentials.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Beautiful Stockbridge Garden Apartment
description: This lovely three bedroom period apartment has its own main entrance at street level and is located in gorgeous Stockbridge - a much sought-after area of the city that is very popular with young professionals and families alike.  It is situated in a quiet residential street but is close to all amenities, including great bars, cafes and restaurants; as well as the Botanical Gardens, Inverleith Park; Waitrose supermarket and an M&S Food Hall.

name: Private cute mini guest house in the West End
description:
Renting out our wee summerhouse in our South facing back garden.

It has wifi,underfloor heating , private entry, totally privacy and sleeps one. Desk to work from and a chair.
Bed is a small double bed 120cm ( according to IKEA )

Size is about 4.5m2 in total so a small and quaint place.

Breakfast is not included but there are some light refreshments included.

Bathroom is in main-house, so only in use when we are in/awake or you can use the portaloo under the bed.

No smoking /vaping anywhere

name: Edinburgh City Deluxe apartment
description:
A bright and spacious apartment in the heart of a world heritage city.
Minutes from princes st, the royal mile, Edinburgh Castle, the palace of Holyrood, the Scottish parliament and numerous other tourist attractions. The property is 2.5 miles from Princess street , the historic royal mile and Edinburgh Castle.
charge.
Free WiFi is available but not guaranteed.

name: Modern Broughton Apartment - Walk to City Centre
description:
Welcome to this beautifully refurbished flat in the sought-after Broughton area, just a short stroll from Edinburgh’s city centre!

🌟 Recently renovated to a high standard
🛏️ Proper double bed with new comfy mattress – sleeps 2
📺 60" 4K Smart TV + fast Wi-Fi
🚉 15 mins from Waverley Station
🌞 Large shared garden with plenty of sunlight
🛋️ All new furniture and decor (March 2021)
📍 Close to shops, cafes, and local amenities
🎯 Ideal base for exploring the city

name: Artist Colony Garden Cottage | Walk to city centre
description:
Enjoy Edinburgh in a unique cottage flat that sleeps 4, ideally situated between the bustling city centre and cultural hotspot of Leith. There is an abundance of bus links to take you anywhere in the city, with Princes Street only 20-mins walk away.

The flat can be your home away from home, with all the creature comforts of a fully-stocked residence, but with hotel-quality linens. The main-door flat is accessible through a front private garden, with the added bonus of a private sauna.

name: Whole house, free parking, garden. No cleaning fee
description: My place is across the road from The Royal Yacht Britannia, Ocean Terminal shopping centre, restaurants,shops,cinema. Leith Docks, many more bars & restaurants at The Shore area of Leith, also Newhaven Fishing Village. Great views, parking, outdoor space, convenient location, great bus service across the road at Ocean Terminal, buses go directly to Princes Street & Edinburgh City Centre. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.Re-decorated and ready for your stay!

name: Superb apartment in historic centre
description: Our lovely apartment is situated in a historic listed building dating back to 1850. It has been fully modernised. It is right in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town, in a beautiful old street full of quaint shops, cafes and nice restaurants.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Gorgeous Quiet Garden Apartment, Sleeps 4
description:
Gorgeous well kept quiet and bright flat in a traditional ground floor Edinburgh apartment with doors out onto a pretty back garden. Only 15 mins walk from Haymarket Station

The garden backs onto the Edinburgh canal and it's only a 30 mins walk into the centre of Edinburgh. There are also many buses that pass close by, connecting you to old/new town Edinburgh. Lovely shops, cafes and pubs are all within a few minutes walk. A great place from which to explore the city and the Edinburgh Festival!

name: Sunny flat in stylish Stockbridge
description: My place is a first floor flat and sits on a very quiet street with minimal traffic. It is 10 minutes walk from the city centre and 1 minute walk from the wonderful Stockbridge, home to some of the best bars, restaurants and parks in Edinburgh. It is bright, spacious and free from clutter with plenty of storage. The location provides a perfect base to explore the real Edinburgh. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, two friends and business travellers.

name: Entire apartment in Edinburgh
description: Spacious apartment in the Gorgie area of Edinburgh. One large bedroom with double bed and optional single bed (as set up in photos) and second bedroom with king size bed. Modern kitchen and bathroom fittings.

name: Double Room   Edinburgh
description:
Great access to town. Quiet neighbourhood.
No working from home…. have a little shih shz dog very friendly. bedroom cosy and bright. Shared kitchen and bathroom. Easy access to town 10 bus. 25 mins walking.. great bus service all round Edinburgh. Close to supermarkets 2 mins walk Tesco & Lidel. No extra guests..

name: Luxury private home in Edinburgh
description:
This is one of the nicest houses in Edinburgh. It is located only 10 minutes from the center of town and is a perfect base to enjoy the city. There is a private driveway and free off-street parking for up to 6 cars. This beautiful home has a full kitchen and dining area, a spacious living room, and three modern en-suite bedrooms.

Dogs are welcome and the Hermitage park offers lovely walks.

name: Central Edinburgh, Cosy one bedroom flat
description: My place is in located in heart of Leith, lively district with a variety pubs, caffes, resteurants, galeries. It is only 25 minutes walk to city centre and plenty of buses or tram will take You there in no more than 10 minutes.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids). Apartament is very quiet and neighbourhood with small park just on the corner is perfect for some quiet time after busy day out in town.

name: Relax at an Airy, Art-filled Old Town Home
description:
Private Entrance - Bright period apartment in the shadow of Edinburgh Castle. Sleek, modern kitchen. 2 double beds in the bedrooms and one small double sofa bed .

The spacious flat has it's own separate entrance and is suitable for 4-5 persons. The 2 bedrooms are quietly situated at the rear. The master contains a king sized bed and modern ensuite with walk in shower. The other has a standard double bed and dressing area. We also have a small double sofa bed for occasional use.

name: Iconic Royal Mile Residence
description:
✔ Charming 2-bedroom flat, nicely located in the old town, has everything you need
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ 4-minute walk to Museum of Edinburgh
✔ Next to Royal Mile
✔ Edinburgh Waverley: 5-minute walk
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Walk to the City Centre from a Charming Flat
description: You can walk to the main festival venues, Edinburgh castle, the university or the Old Town, all will take you about 10 to 20 minutes. The Kings Theatre is a stone's throw away, as are cinemas, great coffee shops, restaurants, and supermarkets

name: Regent Place [412]
description: Regent Place is a pretty 2 bedroom colonies apartment sleeping up to 4 guests, situated just off London Road. The apartment is 10 minutes walk from the east end of the Royal Mile or 20 minutes walk from the east end of Princes Street. The area offers a great selection of shops, bars and restaurants and Holyrood park is on your doorstep. For guests wishing to travel further afield, there are very good bus links available from London Road.

name: Rustic Chic Victorian Edinburgh Flat
description:
Incredible Victorian flat that has been fully modernised and with an industrial design this flat is completely unique .

Recently fully refurbished to the highest standards , the photos are great but don’t do it justice the flat is outstanding please feel free to read the reviews .
Two secs from the kings theatre and just over a mile from the Edinburgh castle this apartment is ideal for exploring all the best that the city has to offer on foot.

!!NO PARTYS !!! thanks

Clinically cleaned daily!

name: The Lochside House Residence
description:
Lochside House is a charming Georgian cottage that has been extensively refurbished and extended to create a great mix of character and modernity.

Simply furnished, this B listed house is situated in the most enviable position, a quiet "country like village" yet within the heart of Edinburgh with lovely views of Arthur seat. Set within its own grounds, the back garden is completely secluded and enclosed. The property has unrestricted on street parking.

name: Royal Mile, City Centre Flat
description:
Our bright and sunny first floor apartment is in a fantastic location in the heart of the Old Town, in a traditional tenement building just off the Royal Mile.
A short walk from the train station and airport bus terminus.
Our apartment has been renovated which we have furnished to a high standard and we have catered for all your needs, making it feel like a home from home.
We are fully committed to Air BnB’s latest cleaning protocol.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright, Central, Traditional, 3 bed, 2 Bedroom Apt
description:
Sun kissed 1st floor 1850's bay window 2 bedroom apartment, located 2 min's walk from Haymarket train station, 15 min's walk from the city centre (Base of CASTLE) , Large supermarket 2min walk, quiet cobbled mews with private garden, central heating system, double glazed windows, separate kitchen, bathroom with bath and shower, separate toilet room.
T.V, Virgin Media WIFI, DVD with plenty of movies too, fully furnished, secure intercom communal door entrance.

name: Explore Edinburgh from a Grand Georgian Home
description:
Ground floor 1 bed Georgian drawing room flat in the heart of Stockbridge. Deluxe king size bed that can be made into twin beds if you would prefer. Separate bathroom with walk in shower and separate bath. Bright spacious living room with concealed integrated kitchen.
Perfectly located for exploring Edinburgh.

You have the flat all to yourselves.

We live just a few doors away from the flat so if you need anything during your stay, just let us know.

Stockbridge truly is a village in the heart of the city, with everything Edinburgh has to offer right on the doorstep.

Edinburgh is best explored on foot so bring comfy shoes and be prepared for some hills ! Taxis and buses are however plentiful with a bus stop right outside the flat taking you to Leith where you can visit the Royal Yacht Britannia. The heart of the city is a comfortable 20 minutes walk from the flat and to the North, Edinburgh’s stunning botanic gardens are only 15 minutes b

name: Single Furnished Room In Terraced Lower Villa
description:
*BOOKINGS SUBJECT TO SCOTTISH COVID 19 TRAVEL/QUARANTINE LAWS*
I don't accept 3rd party bookings or unregistered people.
Single Furnished Room in terraced lower villa on main route west side of city, 10 minutes to city centre.
Lots of public transport 15 minutes to city or 300 to airport from right outside property.
Friendly quiet neighbourhood,
Great shops and gym very close by.
I work Security on shifts so will start/finish early or late usually.

name: Relaxed inviting Flat-Fettes Village (SHARED FLAT)
description:
Peaceful quiet flat with a double bed & single in guest bedroom (suitable 1 or 2 adults) Near centre of Edinburgh
Longer term lets available & preferred! special discounts offered
Near Western Gen Hospital, BAA systems, Bot Gardens. private, estate near Fettes College(Harry Potter).
Private parking. 9 bus's to town Princes Street, 19,23,29,37,38,47, 113 and night buses
Stockbridge/Fettes area-great pubs, restaurants, shopping.
Check in 3 pm or as otherwise agreed
Check out 10 am or as agreed
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Double room in city centre, vegetarian flat
description: Double room  in homely and bright first floor flat. This property has a south facing balcony with views of Edinburgh skyline and the castle. The apartment is in a quiet location yet only a 20 minute walk to the city centre and 5-10 minutes to all major bus routes. A supermarket and Edinburgh's Botanical Gardens are close by. You would be sharing with me (a friendly female professional) and two sweet cats. I give guests plenty of space  but I am also available if you want to ask any questions.

name: Self Contained Flat with Private Garden in Stockbridge
description:
Lounge on a black leather sofa by a black fireplace in a flat full of curious angles and colourful accents. This fun and quirky space is a convenient base for exploring Edinburgh on foot. Return after a day's adventure to soak in a claw-foot bathtub.

This private & secure main door flat really is at the centre of all thats happening in the New Town of Edinburgh & beyond. It's very rare to get a self contained flat with an exclusive front & back garden in the heart of the historic New Town. This property is on two levels. Great for families with children who can have freedom in the exclusive, enclosed back garden. Also great for some Al Fresco dining when the weather is good. Games console & board games are provided too! A real home from home.

All internal areas. Exclusive front courtyard & back-garden.
No access to locked external cellars.

Contactable via email, or text.

The flat is in the boho district of Stockbridge. Walk to bo

name: Stylish Two Bed, Bruntsfield Apartment, Edinburgh
description: Make yourself at home and feel like a true local at our fabulous apartment in the iconic city of Edinburgh.

name: Bright Royal Mile Apartment
description:
✔ Delightful flat nicely nestled at the heart of the city
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 6-minute walk to St Giles' Cathedral
✔ 9-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ 10-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 14-minute walk to Princes Street
✔ 6-minute walk to Edinburgh Waverley Train Station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, WiFi are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Luxury room en-suite shower & free parking
description: Stunning bedroom (bigger than most in Edinburgh) in a stylish Victorian house. The bedroom has a balcony overlooking a big garden, a super-king-sized bed, an en-suite bathroom with shower and sink. Shared bathroom with toilet and bathtub at the end of the hall, and two other shared toilets downstairs. Direct bus route for many buses to the city centre (12 mins). You'll love this place because of the architecture, high ceilings, traditional furniture and quiet atmosphere.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: The Hart Residence
description:
Experience elegance in this seriously sophisticated apartment. The Hart Residence is a little slice of Georgian charm, ready and waiting to indulge you in one of Edinburgh’s most coveted locations. This two bedroom, two bathroom apartment welcomes up to four guests with open arms, and promises a perfectly pampered affair from start to finish.

After a long day soaking in the sights, the culture continues in this lovingly maintained example of Georgian architecture.

name: Cosy Retreat in Lovely Stockbridge with Balcony
description:
My newly renovated home is one of the few Airbnb's listings in the area with a review score above 4.85, recognised by guests for its quality and reliability.

Indulge yourself by staying in the trendiest neighbourhood in town. Enjoy your morning coffee from the balcony while savouring fresh pastries from our local bakeries. Two supermarkets, a pharmacy and Inverleith park are within walking distance.

As experienced hosts, we are very responsive and ready to help you during your stay.

name: Georgian Apartment in Carlton St, Stockbridge.
description:
Georgian Basement Apartment in Stockbridge with private courtyard.

An elegant and beautifully presented ‘A’ Listed Georgian terraced townhouse basement apartment located in Stockbridge, one of Edinburgh’s most sought after residential locations

name: The Royal Mile Residence
description:
This flat is very comfortable and situated on a central stretch of Edinburgh's famous 'Royal Mile'. This is a bright, 2nd floor flat with one bedroom containing one double bed and one sofabed in the lounge area. There is also a separate single camp bed. There is a shared patio to the rear of the flat with views to the North of the City.


This property has a travel cot. Due to safety reasons, we do not provide linens/bedding for the cot and kindly ask that you bring your own.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely double bedroom with full en suite
description:
STL License: EH-62991-F

A spacious, private double room in a family home equipped with full en suite, and king-size bed. Only a 20 minute walk into the historic centre of town. Tea and coffee facilities and a warm welcome.

Complimentary snacks provided.

Towels and shower toiletries provided.

No breakfast or meals. No access to kitchen, or parking.

We have another slightly smaller double room available at this location:
https://www.airbnb.co.uk/rooms/18265186

name: Comfortable double room with en suite
description:
STL License : EH-62991-F

Well-equipped private double room in family home with en suite shower. Separate private toilet just outside the room. A very comfortable double bed. Towels & shower toiletries provided. 20 minute walk from Edinburgh's historic old town.

Tea & coffee facilities with snacks provided. TV. Luggage storage. No breakfast or meals.
NO KITCHEN. NO PARKING.

We have another larger double room with full en suite available: https://www.airbnb.co.uk/rooms/18264171

name: The Cowgatehead Residence
description:
This is a beautiful one-bed flat on the 3rd floor, at the Victoria Street end of the Grassmarket. Right in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old-Town. Princes Street, Waverley train station and the Royal Mile are a 5/10minute walk away.

The flat sleeps 2 comfortably in the double bedroom with a standard size double bed. An additional 2 people can be accommodated in 2 x single camp beds.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stunning Mews apartment, Stockbridge
description: This is a one bed mews apartment in the heart of Stockbridge, a two minute walk from the thriving local high street filled with unique shops, independent new bars, cafes and restaurants. The apartment is beautifully converted and beautifully light and airy, and equipped with everything you need. The gorgeous and private Dean Gardens is a five minute walk away, key provided, well worth a visit for the tranquility and waterfall all tucked away moments from the centre of town.

name: The St Mary's Street Residence
description:
This flat is very comfortable and situated just a few yards off Edinburgh's famous 'Royal Mile'. This is a lovely, bright, 1st floor flat with one bedroom containing a standard size double bed and two single camp beds. The flat has a separate living room, separate kitchen, a bathroom with a shower and short bath. The TV in the living room is a Smart TV so you can watch all of your favourite shows!

Please note we do not provide hypoallergenic bedding at our properties.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming Central New Town Apartment
description: Bright and cosy apartment situated in a quiet & central location within walking distance from the city centre and Edinburgh's main attractions. This New Town flat is in a traditional tenement building just 15 minutes walk from Waverley Station and a stones throw from Stockbridge, the Botanical Gardens and some of Edinburgh's less-known green spaces, such as the Water of Leith and Inverleith Park. It's a fantastic base for couples and solo travellers to enjoy all that the city has to offer.

name: Inviting Apartment near Leith Walk
description:
✔ Beautiful flat, ideally nestled near Leith Walk
✔ 3 bedrooms
✔ 3 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ Charming balcony at your disposal
✔ Free parking
✔ 12-minute walk to Montgomery Street Park
✔ 17-minute walk to Edinburgh New Town
✔ 4-minute walk to McDonald Street bus stop
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Your Home in Edinburgh
description: This apartment is spacious and light with open views and offers all the amenities and comfort for a citybreak. The location in Stockbridge is perfect to enjoy Edinburgh's trendiest area and its pubs/bars and restaurants as well as the (free!) Botanic Gardens. It is ideally located for all city centre or further afield attractions - the castle, museums and galleries, as well as the villages of Fife and East Lothian. It is quiet and located on the third floor of a traditional Edinburgh building.

name: Excellent one bed, 1-minute from Edinburgh Castle
description:
Our wee flat is a 2 minute walk from Edinburgh Castle, a 7 minute walk from Waverley station, a 6 minute walk from the shops on Princes Street and a 4 minute walk from the Grassmarket which is buzzing with restaurants and bars.

The flat has everything you need to feel at home during your stay right in the centre of Edinburgh and we're delighted to be able to share it with people visiting this beautiful city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Balgreen Flat on the Tramline
description:
Balgreen Area of Edinburgh in quiet residential street.
2 bedroom flat in residential area free on street parking. Also 2 min walk to tram which takes only approx 10 mins to city centre.

name: Edinburgh: Luxury Victorian Mansion, entire flat
description:
Experience Edinburgh by staying in one of her finest Victorian mansions with free on-site parking!

Kingston House, adjacent to the golf course, is situated in the leafy quiet district of Liberton. This home is absolute luxury; very quiet & peaceful.

Large, double bedroom (super Kingsize bed) sleeps 2 & ensuite bathroom with bath & shower, wc, large living room, kitchen & bay windows, wifi, GCH. New boiler installed Dec 2018. All mod cons!
10-15mins to town by bus / driving.

name: Double/twin room in beautiful Victorian house
description: This room has a comfortable superking-sized bed which can also be split into 2 singles if desired. It is on the first floor of a beautiful Victorian guest house and has an en-suite shower room & toilet. The bedroom window is west facing so gets the evening sun. It is at the rear of the house so is quiet. There are tea/coffee making facilities in the room with a selection of hot drinks. Parking is in the surrounding side streets - not private spaces.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Unique spacious apt. nearby main attractions
description:
This spacious 2 bedroom apt. is very close to Edinburgh’s major tourist attractions.
The Castle, Royal Mile, Grass-market, cinemas, Usher Hall, Princes Street Gardens and Edinburgh International Conference Centre are within walking distance, as are restaurants, bars and food shops.
Buses and taxis are available near the front of the building.
It is a short walk to airport bus and tram connections, and the train station.
The apt. is ideal for groups, couples, business travellers, and families.

name: Historic Georgian Entire House - The Royal Mile
description: Welcome to Russell House, a historic listed building nestled in the heart of Reid's Court, Edinburgh. Built around 1790, this Georgian property offers a unique blend of classic charm and modern convenience. The court is named after the Reid family, esteemed smiths and coach makers of the 17th and 18th centuries, adding a rich historical context to this exceptional home.

name: Big Room in Central Edinburgh Flat
description:
Big room in my flat at the very centre of the city with all facilities for visiting for pleasure or work
It has exceptional access to the city's delights and ideal also for short work trips

Edinburgh Newtown flats do not have lifts - it was built in the 1790s
The flat is on the first floor so pack appropriately
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful 2 Bed Flat in Grand Home with Garden
description:
The garden apartment is a 1 bedroom private home complete with kitchen, bathroom and private entrance with patio. There is a microwave but no hob or oven available in the kitchen.

Located to the North of Edinburgh's city centre in a residential area, a 5 minute walk from the Royal Botanical Gardens, we are on the route of one of the city bus tours with easy access to the city centre and the shore.

The flat is suitable for families, couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.

name: Quite flat, Two beds, Central, Baby friendly
description: Quiet one bedroom flat, sleeps 2 adults (although also space for infant as well) - one king sized double. And sofa which can convert to a second bed if needed. 15 mins  from the city centre and even less to the closest tram to the airport or across town. Full access to sitting/ dining room (with double sofa bed), kitchen (gas oven, fridge), bathroom (great shower) and beautiful back garden. Option to have travel cot, playpen, highchair, toys if needed. Please see photo.

name: Cosy bedroom in a flat in heart of Leith
description: Bright and spacious cosy room in a flat in Leith, close to the historical central Edinburgh. The flat is located in a quiet courtyard in a historical building, a five-minute walk to local amenities, restaurants, the popular Scottish Whisky Society, a ten-minute walk to the Shore and Royal Yacht Britannia. Easy access to public transportation gives easy access to the heart of Edinburgh. Getting to the flat from Edinburgh Airport is easy. The tram runs directly from the airport to Leith.

name: Double room| Female ONLY | Parking| Beach|Cat
description:
FEMALE ONLY

My flat is a spacious flat in the east of Edinburgh. (Around 15-20 mins on bus), the flat is fully furnished with style and is in a very quite residential area with great links into the city centre.

The flat is situated in an excellent location with many historic areas close by, the city centre, Leith, Portobello, Arthur's seat and has connections to Musselburgh and east Lothian and the city bypass.

The bus stop is a stone throw away with one of the best bus services in Europe!

name: Perfect central stay, old Town 1 bed Apartm.
description:
Cosy Apartment with traditional/modern decor.

We would like to make you aware that there is some water damage on the wall due to water been leaking from outside. We are in the process of getting this fixed.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious, sunny, quiet double room with desk area.
description:
Friendly second floor flat, with great view of Arthur’s seat and Edinburgh. Retro styling, clean and tidy. The room has a desk and good storage. The flat is 2 minutes from a direct bus route into town. Walking to the old town will take around 35 minutes, and add another 10 to get to Princes St. Only 5 minutes from the flat is a walk up Blackford Hill with extraordinary views over the city.

You’ll be sharing the flat with me - a 39 year old graphic designer who lives and works at home.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Edinburgh Central Apartment Sleeps 6
description: Ideally located in the thriving neighbourhood of Leith, this spacious modern apartment benefits from a recent refurbishment and superb facilities. The property is within easy reach of all of Edinburgh’s world-famous visitor attractions, including Princes Street, the Royal Mile, and, of course, Edinburgh Castle.

name: The Cottage in the Sky
description: The Cottage in the Sky is  in the heart of the Old Town- only 2 minutes from the High Street, yet far removed from the bustle on the 3rd floor.  The Cottage is comfortable, elegant, and  cosy.  If you want a night  by the log stove, there's a wide selection of books & dvds. The Art is unique, as is the decor, which mixes global themes - at turns, Arabian Nights,  Medieval, Mogul Palace, Mexican, Baronial, Scottish Enlightenment. To quote one guest- 'a  slice of heaven, with  views to match. '
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Townhouse @ Stockbridge
description: Experience the epitome of elegance and comfort in this stunning townhouse, located in Edinburgh’s desirable Stockbridge area. Featured in design magazines, the home is adorned with meticulously curated art and beautifully designed interiors, making it the perfect backdrop for milestone birthdays, graduation celebrations, and corporate retreats.

name: Central & Quiet King Room w/ Free Parking
description:
Very warm & spacious apartment in a quiet, homely, modern development - offering quick access to world-famous attractions and rapid transport links.

Located close to the city centre, the apartment is only a 10-15min walk to the train station, the new St James Centre (shopping & restaurants) and the Royal Mile/Holyrood Palace.

The room has plenty of storage, your own bathroom & shared access to a kitchen, living room & balcony. A free off-road car park space is available.

name: Central, charming quiet double room with en-suite
description:
The ground floor flat is 5 mins walk from Haymarket station, and 10 mins from Princes street. As well as 5 minutes from Fountain Park entertainment complex and the E.I. C.C., and 15 minutes walk to Princes street, with lots of restaurant's and pubs & cafes near by.

Continental breakfast is provided,
(hot croissants (chocolate/hazelnut) pains au chocolat, assorted pastries, fresh toast butter/marmalade/preserves, variety of cereals, orange juice tea/coffee), served in the room until 10 am.

name: The Lauderdale Street Residence (Edinburgh)
description: Prepare to be charmed at The Lauderdale Street Residence. Located in beautiful, leafy Marchmont, guests are treated to plenty of space in this truly delightful ground floor apartment. Sleeping up to four guests in style, this light and airy property is the perfect pied-à-terre for your next visit to Edinburgh.

name: 3/4 Bedroom Townhouse with 3 toilets over 3 levels
description:
This bright and welcoming Townhouse is in the heart of the New Town. Steves house has just been granted a Short Term Let Licence for quests safety . New Wifi linked smoke and heat alarms as well as carbon monoxide detector throughout the house .As well as emergency lighting on all levels for your safety. Less than a minutes walk from piccardy place tram stop and within a 10 mins walk from Waverley Station. Bus station 3 minutes walk

Golf at exclusive Archerfield can be arranged on request

name: Apartment near Holyrood Palace
description: This lovely and centrally situated 2-bedroom flat is located in the centre of Scotland's historic and beautiful Edinburgh, and will be the perfect base for your trip! The apartment is perfectly located less than 10 minutes away from Central Edinburgh, and the Edinburgh Waverley Station provides quick and easy access in and out of the city.

name: The perfect haven on Rose Street
description: This charming two-bedroom top floor apartment sits a stone’s throw from the Castle, nestled between Edinburgh’s Old & New Town, right at the heart of the bustling city centre on Rose Street – famous for its wealth of places to eat, drink and shop.

name: Huge, central, comfortable, family townhouse
description: Welcome to our central, 4 bedroom Georgian townhouse over 3 floors, in a quiet residential street 10 minutes walk from Waverly Stn/Princes St. This is a family home in a great location perfect for exploring all of Edinburghs sights. We have two king en-suite rooms, double and twin. We host friends weekends, family holidays and multi generational family holidays often for milestone birthdays or anniversaries. Our home is available only during school holidays.

name: Peaceful  place to stay in Edinburgh
description:
Peaceful house on a friendly street which combines easy bus access to the bustling city centre with a calm retreat.
Local walks from the front door into an area full of history and nature.
Guests have a comfortable , bright double bedroom with a private small bathroom opposite.
Kettle ,range of hot drinks ,porridge pots, fruit and biscuits are provided.
Guests are welcome to sit in the front garden area .
I aim to balance respecting your privacy with a warm welcome .

name: Stunning City Centre Apartment
description:
Beautiful, modern apartment with a private main entrance, situated in Edinburgh's New Town
Minutes away from Princes Street and all the attractions the city centre offers. The apartment is part of an award winning private and personal development in a very central location.
Lovely sunny aspect. Gives peace and tranquility when you need to get away from the buzz of the city. The Edinburgh Airport Tram stop and the bus station are both literally at the top of the street. PERFECT!

FREE Parking!

name: Bright/stylish two bedroom apartment (sleeps 4)
description:
Two bedroom apartment in Victorian converted townhouse. Stunning original features. Both bedrooms have king-size beds. Very close to numerous local boutique shops, an amazing choice of restaurants and bars. Around a 30 min walk to Princes Street or the old town and just 100m from Bruntsfield Links (36 hole pitch and putt course)

Note - this is my home that I let out when I’m away so there are personal belongings around but you will have lots of space to yourself for you and your belongings

name: Locke Studio Twin at Eden Locke
description: Designed by New York architects Grzywinski + Pons, these studios are 29m² of carefully thought-out space – stunning design with uncompromising functionality.

name: Eden Studio at Eden Locke
description: Long stay or special occasion? Our 30sqm Eden Studios have lots of little extras to make your stay a special one.

name: Bold and Spacious Home near Haymarket Station
description:
✔ Stylish flat ideally located in West End
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 13-minute walk to Dean Village
✔ 14-minute walk to the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art
✔ 18-minute walk to the Edinburgh Castle
✔ 4-minute walk to Haymarket train station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Spacious Apartment next to West End
description:
✔ Modern flat ideally located in Haymarket
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 13-minute walk to Dean Village
✔ 14-minute walk to the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art
✔ 18-minute walk to the Edinburgh Castle
✔ 4-minute walk to Haymarket train station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and Wi-Fi are provided

name: Spacious + Modern 2Bed Royal Mile Apartment
description:
The 'Canongate' apartment is a bright, spacious and modern apartment on the famous Royal Mile in the historic Old Town of Edinburgh, only 10 minutes walk from Waverley train station.

WiFi available. Towels and bedding provided. No laundry facilities.

Please expect some city related noise due to the central location.

name: Bungalow near the beach.
description: 3 bedroom bungalow in East Edinburgh. The property has wifi smart tv all basic requirements for a successful stay. 10 minutes walk to Portobello beach. Portobello Beach offers the freshness of the seaside, whilst being very close to Edinburgh's city centre. There are views from the shoreline across the Forth to Fife's coast. ... The beach is used for swimming, sailing, rowing, stand up paddle boarding, wind surfing, canoeing and kayaking. Many bus services to city centre in 15 minutes.

name: Bright & Modern Flat
description: West of Edinburgh's city centre, with great connections to the airport & town. Perfect for solo adventurers, business travellers, families & couples.

name: Central Location: Spacious Private Room
description: Stroll or walk around into town with beautiful scenery. Great parks around to enjoy the sunshine when time permits :). Cozy,  clean and nice house to stay while away from your own home. The listing is about 6 mins walk to the Royal Infirmary, 20mins walk to the Craigmillar castle, 35 mins walk to the bottom of Arthur seat. You can also get the bus to other attractions e.g. Rossyln chapel, pentland hills, Princes street, National museum and galleries, Holyrood park, retail shops etc.

name: Beautiful Victorian Double-Room
description: A sunny double bedroom in a central, ground floor tenement flat with pretty front garden, owned by Liz and Iain Hawk.

name: Private Suite Room in New Town (City Centre)
description:
Bright, elegant and spacious room in East London Street in the heart of Edinburgh's new town. The flat is on the 2nd floor. The room is very large and the bed is extremely comfortable, with large wardrobe with lots of space and hangers. En-suite bathroom.
Fast Wi-Fi throughout the flat.

Guests will be given a key to come and go as they please

name: New Town double room with own bathroom and garden
description: Comfortable double room with private bathroom in very central but quiet apartment in the New Town, overlooking our private garden. The apartment is very accessible, only a few minutes walk from the train station, bus station and the tram connection to the airport. There is a well-equipped kitchen which you are welcome to use, or alternatively there are many restaurants, bars and shops a couple of minutes walk away.  All the major tourist attractions are also within walking distance.

name: Beautiful apartment in Colinton Village
description:
Stunning upper ground 2-bedroom apartment with parking nestled in the beautiful Spylaw Park on the banks of The Water of Leith and only a few minutes walk from the newly completed artworks at Colinton Tunnel. Colinton is a Conservation Village, childhood home of Robert Louis Stevenson and a perfect base to explore the city.
Only 20/25 mins by bus or car to the city centre.
Only 15 minutes drive from the Airport or get an airport bus which stops just a few minutes walk from the apartment!

name: Amazing Royal Mile Apartment.
description: Walking into this top floor apartment always feels like such a surprise. The location on the High Street is hard to beat, during the Edinburgh Festival it is unrivalled and at other times, there is such an incredible choice of things to do and see on the doorstep, that you'll be spoilt for choice.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Comfortable flat, central location with view.
description:
Very centrally located, generously sized, fully equipped 2-story apartment with private direct access, views of Holyrood park and Salisbury Crags enjoyable from the balcony, lounge and master bedroom.
A few minutes walk to Dynamic Earth, Royal Mile, Scottish Parliament Building, Holyrood Palace and many other tourist attractions.
The area is also host to an array of dining and shopping options. The flat is comfortable, newly decorated and the perfect location to explore the beauty of Edinburgh.

name: York Place: Luxurious  apartment For Two adults.
description:
This is a stunning self contained suite situated on York Place in the heart of Edinburgh. A quiet and peaceful oasis in the Georgian city centre. Newly renovated , but retaining original features. A spacious and elegant apartment.
The airport tram stops around the corner and the main train / bus stations are a few minutes walk. The apartment is close to all major attractions, and excellent restaurants - a perfect luxury holiday base for 2.
Secure parking on request- cost is £15 per 24 hours

name: Charming retreat in the shadow of Edinburgh Castle
description: Stylish apartment in the historic heart of old Edinburgh. A fantastic central base minutes from the Castle, The Grassmarket, The Royal Mile and Princes Street surrounded by exciting shops, eateries, bars, theatres, tours and markets.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Sea View Room
description:
Small double room in a quiet loft apartment at Portobello Beach. Located in an old building with narrow stair cases, 3 flights of steps to climb - not for travellers with suitcases. It has a vibrant social scene with a wide range of cafes, bars and shops, not to mention the famous golden beach only a couple of minutes walk away. Free street parking available.
Its proximity to the city centre, makes Portobello ideal for people who enjoy the outdoors but want the convenience of city living.

name: Guest Favourite Duplex w/ Office 2 mins to beach
description:
This is a handsome 19th-century Victorian house situated on one of the most exclusive streets in Portobello. It offers unusually flexible accommodation, an enviable beach-side location and is close to all the towns amenities. The apartment has been furnished with all the comforts of a home away from home.

This exceptional house has three apartments for short-term let and all of the apartments are well equipped and completely self-contained but can also be let together.

name: Stunning apartment off Royal Mile (Free parking)
description: This modern luxury spacious 3rd floor apartment with lift access is located in "The Park" on Holyrood Road and is in the heart of the most prestigious tourist destinations in Edinburgh.  The property is next to the Scottish Parliament and Dynamic Earth is opposite.  Holyrood Palace, The Royal Mile and Arthurs Seat are 2 minutes walk away.  There is a fully equipped kitchen with an LG true steam washer dryer.  There is an allocated parking space for guests to use during their stay.

name: Fab double bedroom and log fire lounge
description: Private double bedroom in old stone cottage. 15 mins from airport and 2 min walk to regular bus service, which runs day and night to the city centre. Out the back gate and you are on the beautiful tree lined Water of Leith walkway, out the front gate and up the road and you are up in the Pentland hills. Fabulous walks and running routes either way.

name: City Centre ,5*Ground Floor, near grass market
description:
Peaceful apartment just minutes from the popular Grassmarket area, our stylish one bedroom, ground floor apartment will be perfect for your trip to Edinburgh

This newly renovated apartment is extremely well located for the Edinburgh International Conference Centre & Edinburgh Castle as well as all the lovely cafes and bars in Grassmarket

Expect all the comforts of a boutique hotel, with plenty of space to relax and an extremely comfortable super king bed

Please note we have Netflix and on de

name: York Place, city centre, Apartment with  Parking
description: This recently renovated  garden level  apartment is part of a beautiful Georgian house in the city centre. Sophisticated secondary glazing keeps the apartment quiet and warm. Walking distance to all major attractions. Secure gated car park. Private front and rear entrance and sunny terrace. The tram to / from  the airport stops 2 minutes from the front door. Railway station is a 7 minute walk and  bus station is a 3 minute walk. Everything you need for the perfect  break in Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Superior Two Bedroom Morningside Apartment
description: The Apartment is located in the upmarket Morningside area of Edinburgh. Situated only a few minutes from the city centre's main tourist attractions, retail and restaurants. This modern 2 bedroom Apartment is in the heart of the city and offers the perfect blend of connectivity, comfort and amenities. The Apartment is ideal for those visiting the city for a few nights or longer term guests. You will find all the comforts of home mixed with the luxuries of a premium hotel in the perfect location!

name: Big and Spacious, Stockbridge Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our spacious family home, nestled close to Stockbridge and Edinburgh's vibrant centre. Enjoy a continental breakfast on weekdays and indulge in a hot breakfast with endless tea and Nespresso on weekends. Ideal for couples, solo explorers, business folks, students, and academics. Guests enjoy access to the kitchen, living spaces, and a private bathroom. Perfect for a memorable getaway.

name: Stylish Georgian garden apartment + secure parking
description:
Located 5 minutes walk from Holyrood Palace, Arthur’s Seat and Edinburgh’s Old Town this recently renovated Georgian garden apartment is the perfect home base from which to explore this historic city - the property dates from 1790 with scenic views of Arthur's Seat and is located in a private courtyard with secure, off street parking.

The property is fifteen minutes walk from Waverley train station.

Five mins walk to supermarkets, shops, cafes and restaurants.

name: Large double room in a family home
description: A great private room within a shared family home. We have a cat (Tigger) who does not have access to the guest bedroom.  There may also be friendly dogs that come to stay on occasion. There is a private parking area and a small garden that guests are welcome to use (for when the infamous Scottish weather holds up!). Please be aware this is a family home with a 12 year old living here permanently, and other family, friends  / children / young adults that visit regularly.

name: Old Town, near Uni/Festival/Royal Mile/Theatre
description:
City of Edinburgh Council Short Term Let Licence no. EH-70474-F

Spacious Old Town flat in a prime spot for the Fringe & graduations, being across from Bristo Square & McEwan Hall. Museum of Scotland (3 mins walk), Festival Theatre (5 mins), ‘Royal Mile’ (6 mins), Edinburgh Castle (11 mins).

Very close to lots of great restaurants, cafes & bars.

Bright & cosy flat with big kitchen, bathroom & wc. Double bedroom has a king size bed. Living room also has a comfortable sofa bed.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Quiet double room within easy reach of City Centre
description:
(During August minimum stay is 2 nights).
Private room in quiet apartment close to Edinburgh city centre, 15-20min by bus. Guests have a small private bathroom with shower. The small bright, airy room looks directly onto the back garden. Frequent bus service directly to the city centre. Walking distance (10-15min) to Murrayfield Stadium for rugby, concerts and frequent trams to city centre or airport. 3 min walk to Visa Application Centre. Tea/coffee, water and home made shortbread in the room.

name: Stylish Edinburgh flat in peaceful neighbourhood
description: Beautifully furnished and decorated ground-floor flat in Edinburgh's fashionable Leith. Filled with stylish flourishes, a fully-stocked cook's kitchen, it boasts a hidden library and direct access into a spacious back garden. The second bedroom is set up for children. With the Royal Yacht Britannia moored just a stone's throw away, it is perfect for anyone wanting to explore beautiful Edinburgh and Scotland.

name: Edinburgh 2 bedroom house free parking
description: Welcome to my comfortable home with a good sized lounge, fast wifi, and TV/DVD.  Fully equipped kitchen with fridge freezer dishwasher & washing machine. There are 2 bedrooms, a  double and one can be a triple. A shower room with power shower. A travel cot and high chair are available. I provide bed linen, towels and toiletries. Back garden with seating & table. Free Parking onsite. Direct bus to city centre. Nearby shopping and cinema complex. Very close to Heriot Watt Uni. Napier uni, Airport

name: The Rose Street Retreat
description: This cosy apartment is perfectly placed to experience what Edinburgh has to offer all year round and during Edinburgh’s International Festival and Fringe. The apartment is available for self catering weeks, short lets and city breaks. Rose Street runs parallel with Princess Street and Princess Street Gardens. Being in the city’s centre, it is surrounded by a wide variety of shops, restaurants, theatres and other entertainment venues. Rose Street is in a noisy bustling area with lots of activity.

name: Castle apt, modern, CENTRAL
description: City centre 1st floor 2 bedroom apt, nearby the lively Grassmarket area with lots of entertainment and restaurants.  The apartment accommodates 4 people. Refurbished to a very high standard, with solid flooring throughout. Newly installed triple glazed bedroom windows make for a peaceful night's sleep. Delightful bespoke kitchen, sunny sitting area. There is a fantastic shared roof top garden with views towards the castle. Nearby castle & Princess street.  In a popular, lively historical area. Please note we have Netflix & on-demand tv only

name: Modern & Stylish 2 Bedroom Flat
description:
Relax in the stylish 2Bed Room, 1Sofa Bed & 1bath Room apartment in the family-friendly neighbourhood of Medowbank. Its spectacular vews of Arthurs Seat, Calton hill & Edinburghs Beautiful city centre is an amazing added feature!

Enjoy taking a stroll around Hollyrood park before heading out to the city centre, less than 5 mins away.

✔ 2 Comfortable Bedrooms with King Beds & 1 Sofa Bed
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Smart TV
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi

name: The Muse
description: With its dark slate roof, city-centre position and picturesque cobbled street location, The Muse is a quintessential Scottish stay. Behind its grand Georgian  façade, this urban boutique bolthole has laid on a smörgåsbord of cosseting comforts: expect luxe rooms in chic muted tones, a classic brasserie style kitchen.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Main door flat, FREE parking, frequent bus to city
description: This main door 3 bedroom upper villa located west suburb of city, a quiet suburb residential area, FREE PARKING, with direct bus link to city center and Edinburgh Airport. Tesco, Aldi, M&S, ASDA supermarket are all within walking distance from this flat.

name: Cosy 1 bedroom flat on Leith Walk
description:
A cosy 1 bedroom flat in the heart of Old Leith. Ideally would suit a couple or one person. An open plan living room/kitchen has a sofa, TV, chest of drawers, bookcase and a dining table with 4 chairs. The bedroom is cosy and quiet with a double bed and wardrobe.
It's a 20 min walk to the city centre or the Shore. It's even quicker with frequent buses, bus stops just outside.
Right at the doorstep you'll find cafes, restaurant, bars, old pubs, antique shops and a great atmosphere!

name: Comfortable 2 BR in Leith
description:
Stylish 2-bedrooms appartment 5 min walk to the Center of Leith. It has a separate kitchen, living room with sofa bed, dining area and TV, separate WC and bathroom. 2 bedrooms contain comfortable double beds, blackout blind or curtains, mirrors and clothes storage.
20 min walk to the city centre, or 10 min to the Shore and Ocean Terminal. Swanky restaurants, cafes, pubs and antique shops - 5 min walk to Leith Walk. Supermarkets and shops are 5 min walk away.

name: Spacious flat 15 mins to Grassmarket & Royal Mile
description:
This bright and airy traditional tenement flat is located in the upmarket area of Newington.

Edinburgh city centre is around a half an hour walk or 10/15 minutes via public transport.

Our apartment has traditional features such as a real fire place, high ceiling and cornices. The flat has recently been modernised with a well equipped kitchen and modern bathroom.

We have all the cooking equipment you need to cook a lovely meal.

name: Funky Edinburgh Flat in Historical Leith
description: Welcome to my home in Leith, which I list on Airbnb when I am travelling for work. It has an international vibe and is filled with artwork from my travels.  Very cool Leith traces its roots back to Medieval times, full of history and great for exploring. A 10min tram ride takes you to heart of Edinburgh - the festival, the Castle, Scott Monument, Old Town, shops on Princes Street. A 10min walk takes you to the popular Shore area - hive of activity with best pubs, cafes, restaurants.

name: Bright, Stylish Entire flat at Royal Mile
description: This cosy flat is located at the very heart of Edinburgh at the Royal Mile, within walking distance to Princes Street, Edinburgh Castle, Calton Hill and all the most popular sights.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Quiet, top floor flat very central 37/5.
description:
The flat is situated 5 minutes from Haymarket station approx 1 mile. The local area is called Roseburn which has all amenities with in walking distance (Tesco, Scotmid and local shops). The flat is located on the 4th floor with an intercom system to have security and easy to let guests in and out. The flat is on the top floor which makes the location very quiet for being on a main road.
Please be aware that if you book 2 persons only 1 bed will be made up, if you require a 2nd bed put 3 people.

name: Exquisite Flat in the City Centre
description:
✔ Stunning apartment in Edinburgh’s New Town
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-appointed kitchen
✔ Next to York Place
✔ Scott Monument is an 8-minute walk
✔ 9-minute walk to Calton Hill
✔ 11-minute walk to Princes St
✔ St Giles' Cathedral is a 13-minute walk
✔ World-renowned attractions like Edinburgh Castle, National Museum of Scotland & Royal Mile are also within walking distance
✔ 9-minute walk to Edinburgh Waverley train station
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Own entrance Dbl Room w ensuite Shower Rm/Parking
description:
* We do not host smokers including e cigarettes *
* We do not host children as accommodation is not suitable*.

Purpose built accommodation situated in quiet cul-de-sac. Own entrance & off-street parking. Accommodation separate from the main house & offers a spacious private double bedroom with small dining area and ensuite shower room. 4 miles from the city centre with excellent bus routes nearby. Well situated for exploring further afield with good links to Central Scotland and Fife.

name: Silverknowes Garden Suite with private access
description:
Lovely guest suite with a bedroom, a lounge and and shower room. There is no kitchen but there is a microwave, fridge, kettle & toaster on the sideboard in the lounge.

Private Entrance into suite.

10 minutes from airport.

Bus stop into town at the end of the street.

Free parking.

10 minute walk to beach and golf course.

name: 3 bed in Queensferry, Edinburgh
description: Modern, fully contained 3 bed part house in South Queensferry. Exclusive use of front garden & electric charger (by advance arrangement). Jet747 airport bus (service every 20 mins) is a 4 minute walk away. Dalmeny station, with frequent trains to Edinburgh, is a 25 minute walk.

name: Stunning Victorian city flat with castle view
description:
Luxurious, fully renovated, two bedroom Victorian apartment in the centre of Edinburgh with an exceptional view of Edinburgh Castle.

Mixed with an idealistic balance of history yet gorgeous modern design, it's sure to suit any stay in this stunning capital.


The apartment is clinically cleaned on a daily basis!!!


This is not a!!! Party flat !!!



Third floor flat, so a level of fitness required to access the flat .

name: Beautiful, Airy 1 Bedroom Flat in Central Leith
description: Stylish, light and airy 1-bed ground floor flat in a well-kept tenement building in Edinburgh’s historic port of Leith. Recently refurbished, it combines original period features with modern comforts and contemporary design touches. Ideal for solo adventurers, business travellers and couples looking for a convenient and comfortable base in Edinburgh.

name: Luxury apartment close to shore
description: Brand new apartment just completed in March 2017, ground floor, luxury carpets and tastefully decorated.

name: Room double bed Self Serve Brekkie- STL EH-71270-F
description: Bright room with  UK double bed in family home - Wi-Fi, separate kitchen facilities, TV, bathroom  with shower and bath , O/R parking. Main route into city centre.  5 mins from airport/ 30 mins city centre.  Excellent bus service 100 runs 24/7.   Murrayfield Stadium/Zoo 5 mins away.  Long or short stays welcome.  Washing machine if required for stays over 3 days.  Cereals, bread, eggs, fruit, butter,coffee, tea etc available for breakfast if desired. Family home so no lock on bedroom door FYI .

name: Butterfly lovely entire apartment 2 bedrooms.
description:
Lovely ground floor 2 bedrooms


near Edinburgh city centre, Portobello beach and Arthur's seat,there are shops close to the flat,in 10 minutes you can find Morrisons shopping centre where also there is Sainsbury's bargains ,Poundland,lidl and so on . The buses 25,19,49 are frequently every 10 minutes to the city centre and it's a 2 minutes from the flat. So you can get to the centre very easy. There is also free parking on the street if you are coming by cars.

name: Henderson Row - Cosy New Town flat!
description:
Our apartment is cosy, yet light and bright with neutral Scandinavian decor throughout.

Our place is located in Stockbridge which is a central village within Edinburgh. It is an offshoot of the Georgian New Town.

We are surrounded by great amenities and supermarkets. There are amazing restaurants, wine bars, pubs and cafes all within 1-5 minute walk away.

We are around a 10-15 minute walk from the city centre and not much further from the Royal Mile and Castle

name: Comfortable and Cosy Edinburgh Apartment
description:
Set within a traditional Edinburgh tenement flat, this home offers an authentic stay in Edinburgh. Walk atop original wooden floors while admiring the original pieces of art before sitting down on the plush sofa to relax after a day of exploration.

Leith Walk has a wealth of independent cafes, bars, restaurants and shops, combined with charity and second hand clothes, books, music and furniture shops!

We’re also on the tram line so easy access direct from the airport ☺️

name: Beautiful, Georgian flat in the heart of Edinburgh
description:
