A stunning, spacious Georgian flat right in the centre of Edinburgh, overlooking a green square with lush trees. Excellent location for exploring the city. A short walk from Waverley train station.
This bright, huge flat is full of character and provides plenty of space for guests to relax. With a well-equipped kitchen, large living room, two bathrooms and two bedrooms, this makes a very comfortable base for any type of trip to the city. Plenty of great amenities within minutes of walking.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: A dedicated airbnb apartment
description:
This is how my first 4 guests described the apartment:

Guest 1 "The apartment is fully equipped and all new. The location is perfect. It is 10 minutes walk from the centre."

Guest 2 "Perfectly arranged, irreproachable cleanliness, everything is implemented so that you spend a very pleasant stay."

Guest 3 "He was attentive to our needs, also left us water in the fridge, milk and snacks."

Guest 4 "Everything was top quality - from wine glasses to towels."

name: Spacious 1 Bedroom Flat Central Location Edinburgh
description:
A newly renovated 1 bedroom flat; located in a quiet area of the city and within easy access to all major tourist attractions. Ideal for a couple/small family visiting Edinburgh for a long weekend or for an extended stay.
Nearby amenities and attractions inc. a 5 min walk to Meadow Bank Shopping Center (Sainbury's Supermarket). Holyrood Palace and Gardens 10 min walk. Scottish Parliament Building / Royal Mile 10 min walk. 15 min walk to Princess St. and Edinburgh Castle 25 min walk.

name: ✔ St Johns Apartment 2 ✔ Fast WiFi ✔ Free Parking
description:
★★★★★ "That's a very great place to stay in Edinburgh". "Such a lovely place and a great place to stay with friends and family. We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves!"

"First St Johns Hill Luxury Apartment 2" offers:
✔ Free parking
✔ City Centre location
✔ Fully equipped kitchen with dining table
✔ Hotel quality beds/mattresses
✔ Bed linen and towels provided for all guests
✔ Children and wheelchair friendly
✔ Cot, high chair, hairdryer and iron provided
✔ Large Smart TV with YouTube and Netflix ❤️

name: Beautiful Holyrood Park Apartment -Near Royal Mile
description:
Presented by Juniper Rentals:

This high end apartment is located in a prime (but quiet) city centre location only a few minutes walk from the Royal Mile! The apartment is in a prime location to explore Edinburgh's Historic Centre, situated in a traditional Edinburgh Georgian building backing onto Holyrood Park - a green oasis in the City Centre. With Holyrood Palace a stone's throw from our front door... when the King is in residence you are quite literally his neighbour!

name: Large comfortable double room
description: This is a good sized double bedroom which is bright and warm in a second floor flat with security door entrance. Nice south facing view over green park area. It's well located for the airport and motorway access, free parking outside the building, easy access to public transport. Buses 3 and 30 get you to the centre in 25 mins and by car in 13 mins. Good local facilities including library, hairdresser, cinema, shops and the shopping centre Wester Hailes 10 minutes walking distance.

name: Gorgeous double room-with own bathroom
description: My apartment is v. close to the centre of the Old town [Castle - 8 mins walk, Grassmarket - 3 mins]; the New town [Princes Street, 5 mins]. I think you'll also love it as it is also in the midst of a thriving local community with a rich selection of bars, cafes, restaurants, theatres and cinemas. IMHO, it is a fine neighbourhood. Walking round is easy, safe and pleasurable. The apartment is ideal for individual, couples and business travellers

name: ✔ St Johns Apartment 3 ✔ Fast WiFi ✔ Free Parking
description:
★★★★★ "Loved our stay. Amazing location and very helpful and friendly host.Thank you again" "It was very clean and had all amenities needed for two young families"

"First St Johns Hill Luxury Apartment 3" offers:
✔ Free parking
✔ City Centre location
✔ Fully equipped kitchen with dining table
✔ Hotel quality beds/mattresses
✔ Bed linen and towels provided for all guests
✔ Children and wheelchair friendly
✔ Cot, high chair, hairdryer and iron provided
✔ Large Smart TV with YouTube and Netflix ❤️

name: 2 bedroom Apartment, Free parking onsite
description:
Apartments are all 2 bedroom, each with an ensuite bathroom off the master bedroom, second bedroom also has twin beds.

All apartments have a lounge which benefits from free wifi, and sky sports/movies/freeview

Kitchens come equipped with full kitchen facilities oven/hob, microwave, kettle, pots/pans and cuttlery also washing machine/tumble dryer and a seating area.

All linen and towels are included in the price.

name: Private Twin room
description: ONLY 10  to 15 MINS FROM AIRPORT this lower villa is next to Queensferry Road where you can get direct buses into the town centre (approx 20 mins on the bus). Also only 15 mins drive to hot spots in Edinburgh such as The Zoo/ Murrayfield Stadium & Ingliston for various events. The  stunning Three bridges in South Queensferry can easily be reached by bus (well worth a visit). Edinburgh is not just about the castle it has stunning places to visit in and around this area.

name: Gorgeous Large Super Stylish City Centre Apartment
description:
Enjoy the real Edinburgh in this stylish city centre home! Next to major transport links, all you need is close by. Distinctively decorated, artwork adorning the walls, all modern touches including fast wifi, charging points, Alexa home device. Enjoy the rooftop views. Not for elderly, infirm, small children as must climb stairs. No Hen/Stag parties.

APPROVED EDINBURGH COUNCIL LICENCE - NUMBER EH-68703-F

name: Dicksonfield - Kath's two bed with parking
description: Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at "Balfour Str stop" and arrive at Murrayfield in just 38  minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to the heart of the action.

name: Fabulous Edinburgh Flat in the West End!
description: Located at the heart of Edinburgh's fashionable West End this stylish architect-designed one bedroom flat has recently been renovated to a very high standard and is ready to make your summertime stay in Edinburgh complete. Enjoy the best of what Scotland's capital has to offer with bars, restaurants, high-end shopping and festival city attractions on your doorstep.

name: The King's Chamber- Royal Mile close to Castle
description: This delightful newly renovated apartment is a historic gem within Riddle's Court, a 16th century merchant's house on the Royal Mile. The bedroom, with its painted beams, was once the location of a dinner party hosted by King James VI of Scotland. It is now a bright, warm and comfortable flat with a tasteful mix of traditional and modern furnishings. It is 2 minutes from Edinburgh Castle and is surrounded by shops, restaurants, cafes and bars and is close to trains, buses and trams.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish Waterside Location; Easy Access to Centre
description:
The flat comfortably accommodates 3-4 people, although there are 5 potential bed spaces.
It has a fine outlook: the front window looks onto the river and cobbled streets of Leith, Edinburgh's port city, now regenerated into an upmarket residential and recreational area. The sights of central Edinburgh are just a 20-minute ride away - buses leaving every few minutes from right outside the door; trams all the way to the airport a 2 minute walk away. This is a chic, comfortable apartment.

name: Stunning, 2 bed Garden Flat in the New Town
description: Bright, spacious, contemporary, 2 bedrm Garden Flat (one can be split into twin beds), plus cot  for a baby. 2 bathrooms (1 en suite) in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town. 12 min walk to train station and tram/buses giving access to airport. The flat is 5 mins walk to Stockbridge, one of Edinburgh's most vibrant suburbs and so is well served by quality restaurants, coffee shops, bars and small supermarkets at either end of the street! Garage space available by request. Licence No. EH-66872-F

name: Cosy 1 Bed Apartment Near Murrayfield
description: 1 bedroom flat situated within walking distance of City Centre located within Murrayfield area. Perfect for one couple looking to take full advantage of this Cosmopolitan European Capital. Flat located on the second floor. The apartment is less than 5 minutes walk away from the Murrayfield tram stop. You can walk to Haymarket in 10 minutes. Very handy for rugby games and any concerts at Murrayfield stadium. Access to the Water of Leith is less than 2 minutes walk, which takes you to Stockbridge.

name: A King Size Room in Central Edinburgh
description:
The spacious room is a king size bedroom that is the biggest bedroom in the property. The room is equipped with a wardrobe, with hangers, a TV, a desk, one chair, and a small sofa.

The bed is a Natural Cashmere Backcare mattress, and it has over 1400 springs which makes for the utmost comfort; a Downland mattress topper, a new Dunlopillo Anti Allergy Duvet, a quality 100% cotton sheet and bed linens! This will result in you having a lovely sleep and sweet dreams!

name: Elegant, bright,  4 bedroom, city centre apartment
description: A quiet, first floor, bright and spacious four bedroom apartment overlooking a picturesque garden crescent. Situated in the heart of the popular Stockbridge area of Edinburgh city centre, with an abundance of restaurants, cafes and boutique shops just around the corner.

name: Bright Single Room...🌞
description:
A lovely bright single room. The bedroom is located next to the bathroom which will be shared with me.
I'm located on the south side & on a great bus route which runs day & night & takes approx 20-25 mins to the city centre. I also have street parking & plenty of shops/amenities closeby. I'm located near to Rosslyn Chapel, Edinburgh Uni, King's Buildings, Dick Vets & the Royal Infirmary

name: Central Edinburgh accommodation, Marchmont
description: The room is located in the basement of the tenement flat, the flat is within walking distance of Edinburgh City Center, The High Street and Edinburgh Castle.

name: Central Edinburgh accommodation , Marchmont
description: The room is located in the basement of the tenement flat, the flat is within walking distance of Edinburgh City Center, The High Street and Edinburgh Castle.

name: Cosy Studio Apartment - Embrace Edinburgh's Charm
description:
Welcome to your serene retreat in the heart of Edinburgh, perfectly positioned to capture the essence of this historic city. Nestled in the vibrant neighborhood of Newington, this studio apartment offers a harmonious blend of modern conveniences and timeless charm, perfect for travelers seeking a tranquil space amidst the bustling urban landscape.

Property in LEZ Zone. Please ensure car is compliant if driving.

name: 3 Bedroom apt, Queensferry,10 miles from Edinburgh
description: 3 bedroom ground floor apt with amazing views of Forth Bridges. Queensferry is 30 minutes from Edinburgh city centre + easy access to Fife & Lothian. Dalmeny Train station is nearby (Edinburgh & Fife train line). Large lounge, dining area, kitchen (coffee machine, dishwasher, washing machine, elec cooker, fridge/freezer), 3 Bedrooms & bathroom (Bath & Shower), gas central heating & private parking. Pubs, bars, restaurants, beach, harbour, supermarket & bus stop all on your door step. Sleeps 6.

name: Double bed/private bathroom at the Shore, Leith
description: Bright, quiet double room available in the vibrant Shore area of Leith, many great bars and restaurants nearby, with some of Edinburgh's finest seafood restaurants in the immediate vicinity.  Close to main bus routes, though with so many options here locally, you might not even want to venture out of the area!

name: Scottish Apartment with Amazing  Castle Views
description:
Our refurbished apartment is centrally located, part of the iconic Art Deco building, Lothian House. It boasts panoramic views of the Castle and Arthur's Seat.

In the heart of Edinburgh, it is a short walk from Princes Street, the Old Town and West End. It is close to the main tourist attractions and Festival venues. It is an ideal apartment for couples, individuals and business travellers.

There are numerous supermarkets, cafes and restaurants on the doorstep.

name: Bright, cosy flat with fabulous city views
description:
My bright, airy, cosy top floor flat ( which has a lift) has fabulous views of the city and is only a short bus journey from the town centre.

The building is surrounded by gardens and has a veranda. There is off street parking available ( no parking fee) but there is no allocated parking.

Behind the building is a retail park so getting provisions is no problem.
The flat is well placed for getting to Stockbridge, Murrayfield, the Zoo, Cramond, and for heading out to the Forth bridges.

name: Charming Edinburgh Apartment
description:
A lovely, traditional, tenement flat built around the turn of the 19th century - recently restored to it's former splendour! Just a 10-15 minute walk from the city centre (Lothian Road). It offers great access to bus routes, shops, cinema & the beautiful Union canal - all within a few minutes walk.

The apartment is bathed with natural light for the majority of the day & enjoys the high ceilings & features that you'd expect from Edwardian architecture. Experience a true taste of Olde Scotland!

name: Edinburgh Lord Russell Apartment
description: Welcome to our cozy flat in Edinburgh! Located in a historic 160-year-old Scottish tenement, our charming spot offers a true taste of the city's heritage. Just a short walk from the lively city center, it’s the ideal base for exploring Edinburgh. The Meadows, a favorite local park, is steps away—perfect for a morning walk or picnic. Plus, gin lovers will enjoy being across from Pickering’s Gin distillery in Summerhall. Experience Edinburgh like a local with us, we can’t wait to host you!

name: Private Annex in Edinburgh's Corstorphine
description:
Our beautiful Annex is your own private space, attached to our family home.

Set in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Corstorphine; to the West of the city centre. With incredible bus links to the city centre, Edinburgh Zoo, Murrayfield Stadium, and Edinburgh Airport.

The Annex is peaceful, despite being close to all the amenities Corstorphine has to offer (think lovely independent cafes, restaurants and shops!). A fantastic base to explore Edinburgh and beyond.

name: By the Castle double/twin homestay
description:
This is a lovely quiet bedroom. It's a perfect base for the festivals, a city break or business trip if you're working in the nearby financial district.
The Lyceum and Traverse Theatres, the Usher Hall and cinemas are all on the door step.
The location is great with Edinburgh castle at the end of the street .
The bedroom has a double and single bed, maximum of 2 guests.
Adjacent modern bathroom plus a separate toilet with sink.
These maybe SHARED with one other double room.
This is a HOMESTAY.

name: Beautiful Stylish & Cosy Victorian Apartment
description:
Welcome!

My lovely apartment is on the ground floor and is newly renovated, it’s stylish and super clean and has everything you need for a cosy stay, but with all the comforts of home :)

name: Modern Flat Brunswick Road Area.
description:
City Centre 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom modern apartment with free secure parking and elevator. Private Balcony from lounge on Roadside.

Walking Distance to all main attractions.

Good area close access to shops, bars, and cafes.

name: Bright Victorian & Central Home by Calton Hill
description:
My victorian home is one of the few Airbnb's listings in the area with a review score above 4.85, recognised by guests for its quality and reliability.

This delightful flat has the fastest Wi-Fi speed in town and it’s superbly situated less than 10 minutes walk from MacDonald Road tram stop, 15 minutes walk to Princes St and 5 minutes walk to Calton Hill. Located very close to London Road Gardens, it benefits from supermarkets and pharmacies nearby, making it a perfect flat to live in.

name: Quiet Room Easy way to city & Airport
description:
This house is a bright, welcoming and warm place to stay.
The room is small, but cosy. Ideal for student or who travelling alone.
It is very great buses service.
( It is around to 30 minutes to Edinburgh Aiport and also 30 minutes to city center by bus.)
Facilities as superstores (Morrison, Lidl, Take away food...) only 5-10 min walk.
The local area is green and quiet.
A short walk to park and Silverknowes beach where you can have a nice walk or running to Island Cramond.

Private parking!

name: Quiet king-sized bed in centre - large en-suite
description:
A quiet and private bedroom with a king-sized bed on the lower ground floor of a Georgian townhouse (built by Georgian architect William Playfair) in the City centre (7 minutes' walk from the main train station and 2-4 minutes from the nearest tram stop) with its own entrance. The room has a large en-suite bathroom with a big bath and a powerful shower over the bath.

Another listing for 2 people at same address https://abnb.me/Qix8bWKPrzb

name: 50 m2 town house @centre of Old Town
description:
Our lovely one-bedroom Duplex is situated in the Old Town of Edinburgh, where the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle are close at hand.
This is rare main door terraced house with a size of 50 m2. Worry free if you have heavy luggages to carry.
It is right at the heart of the Edinburgh Festival theatres. 15min walk from Edinburgh Waverley station and 10 min walk to the Royal Mile. Surrounded by lots of local restaurants, cafes, bars and supermarkets, and right in the heart of all Festivals as well!

name: Elegant 2 Bedroom Central Apartment with Parking
description:
Beautiful, spacious two bedroom, two bathroom apartment, with private off street parking, located in the heart of Edinburgh's fashionable West End and just a short stroll from central Edinburgh.

The apartment is set in a Victorian mansion block with lift access and has recently been refurbished to a very high standard. It is light, warm, cosy and comfortable and is a real "home away from home" with everything you could need.

name: Spacious Home near The Meadows
description:
✔ Stylish flat nicely nestled in the vibrant Newington
✔ 5 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all the necessary appliances
✔ Holyrood Park is a 7-minute walk
✔ 15-minute walk to The Meadows
✔ National Museum of Scotland is a 16-minute walk
✔ Edinburgh Castle is a 25-minute walk
✔ Lutton Place bus stop is a 2-minute walk

name: Double Bedroom & Single Bed with  bathroom
description:
Well appointed, large house, brightly decorated .

Top floor with bedroom and private bathroom, mini fridge in bedroom. Access to kitchen to make tea/coffee (supplied).

20 mins to city centre by bus, 15 mins from the airport by taxi. 5 mins drive to Murrayfield Stadium, 15 mins drive to Edinburgh Zoo. The back gate opens on to Corstorphine Hill for good (dog) walking and deer spotting.

name: Double room in peaceful shared garden flat
description:
The flat comprises a large kitchen with dining table and garden views, a large sitting room and views to Arthur's Seat, two double bedroom (one to rent) and a large bathroom with bath and shower. The south west facing garden captures the evening sun and is equipped with decking area to relax during the day. On street parking is unrestricted.
As a private home Kirkhill Road B&B offers friendly and relaxed accommodation on a
small scale and personal basis. Pets welcome.

name: Spacious clean central 2bedroom flat.free parking
description: a traditional flat dating back to 1867,it has a period charm bright public rooms .smart tv link to your Netflix super fast internet .modern fitted kitchen ,2 double beds . bathroom & toilet newly fitted 2018 October in traditional theme with large hanging shower head & bath . gas central heating.5 minute bus journey into city centre from the main road buses come frequently.walking distance from the Royal botanical gardens,free parking 24hrs

name: Botanic Gardens Warriston Field Central but Quiet
description: Quiet leafy N.E. corner of The New Town, just a mile from centre and a mile from the beach, a small house close to Botanics, the cycle path and easy bus routes. Peaceful - no traffic noise, the city although walking distance is a distant hum. Off street parking usually available at house for a small charge on application, (street parking is metered, rather more expensive and 4hr max stay).

name: 1 Bright cosy double room now available (room 1)
description:
A lovely 3 bed house in carrick knowe. The rooms are very spacious and warm, with one bathroom split between two rooms.
Currently bedroom 1 is available.
The tenants have access to a comfortable living room and a lovely modern kitchen. Furthermore the property benefits from a large garden and a driveway that can fit at least 3 cars.
The property is located 5 mins recreational parks. It is also surrounded by excellent transport links to the city and airport.

name: The Butler’s Quarters - 5 min walk to City*
description:
Tucked away in a restored historic Georgian Townhouse with a blend of contemporary design and colonial influences.

An elegantly restored spacious one bedroom apartment forming the lower part of a traditional Georgian townhouse with a private courtyard, hidden amongst the cobbled streets of New Town.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Trendy Leith near tram/city centre, shared garden
description: Fully Licenced - Great one bed ground floor flat, in rear of traditional tenement building, overlooking shared garden. Walking distance to city centre & tourist sights. In trendy vibrant Leith Walk area with loads of bars, coffee shops & restaurants. Suits young couples & friends. Stylishly presented with open plan kitchen/living room/breakfast bar, modern shower room & utility area, bedroom with walk in wardrobe.

name: West End, entire ground floor Garden Flat.
description:
Fountainbridge. Central, large, ground floor, garden flat with oak wooden floors throughout. Sleeps up to 3 people - double bed in the bedroom and sofa bed in the living room.

Separate kitchen, shower room and WC. Large bedroom with direct access to South facing patio and shared garden. Less than 10 minutes to Haymarket.

Ideal for couples, business visitors, and small families or two friends to enjoy their visit to Edinburgh. Close to many shops, supermarkets, bars and restaurants.

name: Spacious Contemporary Apartment near the Old Town
description: See the past come back to life in a historic apartment that's been refurbished from the top of the high ceilings to the smashed porcelain mosaic bathroom floor. These are matched by modern comforts like crisp cotton bed linen and a Japanese soaktub.  Located minutes from the Old Town and Arthurs Seat, with ample choices of artisan coffee, breakfast and lunch options this is the perfect place to stay close to all the city's attractions in a hip neighbourhood setting.

name: 2 Bed Cosy Flat in Downtown Edinburgh with Wi-Fi.
description: Fantastic location on the Famous Royal Mile - Edinburgh Historic Old Town ! 5 mins walk from Waverley Station. This two bedroom flat on the third floor up a spiral staircase and  is a cosy haven for tourists. The property boasts a living-room/kitchen, two double bedrooms and shower room. The prominent location in the pedestrian area only 5 mins from Edinburgh Castle. The bedrooms with high spec King Beds are at the rear of the property where it is incredibly quiet for such a central location.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright & Quiet Edinburgh Home + Free Parking
description: Come and enjoy my freshly renovated (March 2023), bright and spacious 2nd floor apartment. Ideally located close to the vibrant Leith district and only a short walk, bus or tram ride to the city centre and historic Old Town. The apartment is located on an exceptionally quiet street at the back of the building, so you will definitely not be bothered by any noise or traffic.

name: The Portsburgh Square Residence
description:
Sit back and relax in The Portsburgh Square Residence. Tucked just behind the Grassmarket in the Old Town, this one-bedroom apartment enjoys an enviable location, but with all of the peace and quiet of an off-street setting.

The lovely and light living/kitchen area features a flatscreen TV and unlimited Wi-Fi. The kitchenette comes fully equipped with everything you need for a few days in Edinburgh, including a microwave and fridge.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful Entire Home in the Heart of the Old Town
description:
Beautiful duplex apartment in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town. Perfect for taking in all Edinburgh has to offer. The surrounding streets are packed with history and exciting things for you to discover! Live on the same street where Robert Louis Stevenson went to the pub and Sir Walter Scott's went to school.
Our place is very central with The Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, The Scottish Parliament and Princes Street all within easy walking distance.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright, cosy 2 bedroom flat near Murrayfield
description:
Our two bedroom flat is a home away from home. Cosy and good value for money, it's ideal for families and group, but also suits couples. Free on street parking with easy public transport, this would be an ideal base for explore Edinburgh and nearby towns.

Our flat is located to the west of the city centre, with the tram stop 5 minutes walk away, you will be in the centre in 10 minutes. The tram also takes you to Edinburgh Airport in less than 30 minutes.

name: Central Luxury Townhouse *HEART OF STOCKBRIDGE*
description:
A SPECTACULAR slice of luxury in the heart of the infamous Stockbridge, New Town.

This newly renovated 4 bedroom Georgian townhouse comprises 2 floors of traditional decadence with all the mod-cons. Situated on the main thoroughfare with an abundance of restaurants, cafes & independent shops on your doorstep.

A perfect base for those wishing to experience an area voted "one of the best places to live in Europe" as well as be close to Edinburgh city centre.

15min walk to Princes & George St.

name: Grassmarket/West Bow Apartment (with Castle Views)
description: This 3rd floor apartment with views of Edinburgh Castle (accessed through a spiral staircase, might not be ideal if you have mobility issues) is located in Edinburgh's famous Grassmarket - a thriving area full of boutique shops, fantastic restaurants and bars - right in the heart of Edinburgh’s Historic Old Town. Please note NO PARTIES are allowed in the property and any nuisance noise from guests will result in guests being asked to vacate the property with immediate effect.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Magical and Romantic by Edinburgh Castle
description:
The apartment is located on a historic listed building near Edinburgh Castle.
It is particularly suited to couples enjoying a city break or romantic getaway.

NCP Parking (covered) is available at Kings Terrace.
Paid on street Parking is available (free Sundays).

Both Waverley and Haymarket train stations are a short taxi ride or a 10-15min walk.
From Edinburgh airport, 25-35 min

No pets, no children, sadly.
No smoking.
Smart TV only - no live TV
check in from 3pm to 10pm (max)
check out 10am
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Gorgeous Flat near The Scottish Gallery
description:
✔ Vibrant flat ideally nestled near The Scottish Gallery
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ Patio
✔ 2-minute walk to Circus Lane
✔ 5-minute walk to Stockbridge Market
✔ 8-minute walk to George Street
✔ 8-minute walk to Edinburgh New Town
✔ 3-minute walk to Howe Street bus stop
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: The Westfield Apartment - Free Parking - Central
description:
The apartment has a modern design with a double bedroom, a small room with a single bed and a sofa bed. Murrayfield Stadium and the tram stop is a 5-10 minutes walk.

Ideal for couples/small families visiting the city to take advantage of the many attractions Edinburgh has to offer. Bus routes into the city centre are seconds away and there's many local amenities nearby (supermarkets/cafes/bars/takeaways)

Property is extensively cleaned

There is also free on-street parking right outside.

name: Stylish Boutique Apt near city centre with parking
description: The Blacket Mews Apartment is a boutique apartment which forms part of an attractive C-listed Victorian villa and has its own private entrance. Lying just south of the city centre, Mayfield Terrace is a quiet residential street in the exclusive Blacket Conservation Area. The apartment consists of a living room and kitchenette (with fridge, microwave/grill combi oven, kettle, toaster, electric hob and sink) downstairs & a double bedroom & en-suite shower room upstairs. You can park in our drive!

name: Modern & Super Central Spacious Apartment - F9
description:
This newly renovated traditional Scottish home is located in the bustling West End of Edinburgh. It is just a 1-minute walk from the tram stop & the main Haymarket train station (very convenient for arriving and departing)

There is an abundance of restaurants, bars and shops right at your door & every main tourist attraction is within walking distance - you couldn’t hope for a more central location to explore Edinburgh!

I have 10 years of experience on Airbnb & over 5500 positive reviews

name: Royal Mile, Historic Riddle's Court next to Castle
description: Stunning first floor apartment in the  historic Riddle's Court, on the Lawnmarket, at the top of the Royal Mile, only 100 m from the entrance to the Castle and close to all the main tourist attractions. The property is beautifully furnished and equipped and especially suitable for families or couples visiting Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: a nest in the city
description:
Top floor, 2 double bedroom flat with views to Arthur Seat and Calton Hill.

Distance:
Waverley Train Station: 1.3 miles
Leith Walk - 0.5 miles
Princes Street - 1.2 miles
Holyrood Palace and Parliament - 1.3 miles
National Museum of Scotland - 1.5 miles
Castle - 1.9 miles
Botanic Gardens - 1.9 miles
Lidl - 2 minutes walk

name: Comfy Central Home,5 Mins walk to Royal Mile
description:
Fully licenced central quiet one bedroom apartment, located at the back of a historical building, near the Heart of Historical Edinburgh and within walking distance to most of Edinburgh´s attractions. The apartment is located on lower ground floor accessible via about 10 steps.
Contactless self check-in with lockbox.

PLEASE NOTE THIS APARTMENT IS NOT PARTY APARTMENT !!!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Midkinleith Farm Holiday Cottage, Edinburgh
description: Midkinleith is no longer a working farm, but has over 6 hectares of field and the land surrounding it. The holiday cottage is attached to the main house. There is a barn for snooker,darts,table tennis, and a drum kit !

name: Bright twin room,quiet,well connected to centre
description:
Cute end terrace house(front door on the side)with cheery garden.Quiet neighbourhood with excellent local shops and several bus routes into town and around the city.
Single beds and desk in bright and airy room,ideal for travellers (including digital nomads) or students visiting Edinburgh University as Kings Buildings Campus is 5 minutes walk away. I am gluten free so there are separate pans and utensils for use in the kitchen.
Due to chemical sensitivity, I am unable to host smokers/vapers.

name: Charming, Cosy & Centrally-Located Double Room
description:
Decor is somewhat eclectic and combines Scottish and South African elements.
Cosy main door (ground floor) flat a stone's throw from the city centre and all transport links - tram (to airport), bus station and Waverley train station.
Broughton Street is a buzz and has everything you could wish for, cool restaurants and a plethora of pubs and bars with all the usual shops and amenities. The room is bright and cosy, with a very comfy double bed.
Private room; i.e shared with host.

name: West Norton Place, Abbeyhill, bright and sunny
description: A bright and sunny first-floor, two-bedroom apartment (sleeps 1–4) overlooking leafy London Rd Gardens & a short walk to Princes Street or the Royal Mile, within easy walking distance of the major tourist attractions, festival venues, & shops. There is an excellent bus service right beside the apartment; alternatively, it's a leafy walk through London Road Gardens and Calton Hill to Princes Street, or a short walk over Abbeyhill to the Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace and the Scottish Parliament.

name: Double Bedroom close to Airport/Bus/Tram
description:
This is a cosy bedroom in a nice quiet area of Edinburgh close to the Airport. It is a very safe area and I can appreciate that is important to a lot of people. Full access to all amenities in flat such as kitchen/washing machine/lounge with 55inch tv with Firestick and Netflix and your own bathroom with toiletries provided as I use my own ensuite.
Breakfast provided - Overnight oats or cereal / toast/local jam.
I am a very laid back host and am often out so make yourself at home.

name: 3 bedroom country cottage 20 mins from Edinburgh
description: Newly and completely renovated gate house in a country setting surrounded by trees within 15 minutes of the city centre, Murrayfield stadium and Edinburgh Zoo. This 3 bedroom, 2 public room detached house, in a large wooded garden and with parking for 3 cars, would suit families as a base to explore Edinburgh and the north of Scotland. A perfect retreat for visitors to Edinburgh looking for fully modernised accommodation  in a quiet, country setting with views of the Pentland hills.

name: Victorian Top-Floor Retreat with Leith Links Views
description:
Welcome to your top-floor retreat in a charming Victorian townhouse overlooking historic Leith Links. This private space is on the second floor and includes two cozy double bedrooms and a modern bathroom. Explore Leith’s vibrant waterfront with trendy bars, restaurants, and cultural gems nearby. Enjoy free on-street parking, bus services, and an 11-minute walk to the tram with direct links to the airport and city center.

Note: Access via two flights of stairs not suitable for mobility issues

name: City Escape on the Royal Mile
description:
This apartment was redesigned to create a welcoming and comfortable space with a contemporary, fun feel.

Step out into the beating heart of Edinburgh’s most historic area, where world famous landmarks, such as The Scottish Parliament and Holyrood Palace, are only minutes walk away.

name: Historic Edinburgh Apartment
description:
Historic Old Town Retreat with Stunning Views

Situated in Edinburgh's Old Town, at the heart of the city centre, this charming apartment offers lovely views of Greyfriars Kirk & the National Museum. Immerse yourself in the vibrant history & lively atmosphere of the area.

Key Features:
- Sleeps 4 in two double bedrooms
- Cozy living room with balcony, TV, and DVD player
- Full central heating and modern bathroom with shower
- Fully equipped kitchen with washer and dryer

Spacious bedrooms and living room guarantee a comfortable stay.

name: Traditional 3 Bedroom Quiet Flat by High St, Trams
description: This secluded private front door property is located on a peaceful cul-de-sac for a restful nights sleep, yet within the vibrant Leith district of Edinburgh and just 1.5 miles from the centre and next to the tram connecting to City and Airport along with multiple bus routes and thus offers convenience and tranquillity. Free parking just 450 Metres away.The immediate area also boasts a diverse mix of bars, shops, cafés, and restaurants catering to all budgets as well as aTesco superstore opposite

name: Central stylish period flat, garden & free parking
description:
Self contained apartment within elegant and grand Victorian mansion. Rooms are large and bright with high ceilings. Small outdoor area by entrance door.

Situated in the popular and bustling area of Bruntsfield /Merchiston. Less than two minutes walk to various cafés, bars , restaurants and takeaways. Approx 15 minute walk to centre of Edinburgh; taxi rank and bus stop (frequent service) also 100m from house. Various cinemas and theatres close by. Five minutes walk to Morningside.

name: Dalry, Edinburgh | Modernised traditional flat |
description: Welcome to our apartment. The property is a first floor flat, in a Victorian tenement block. A 10 walk to Edinburgh Haymarket Railway Station and tram stop, and on the main bus route to the city centre/Princes Street. 15 mins walk from Murrayfield stadium. We don’t charge a cleaning fee!

name: Trendy central coachhouse; parking & outdoor space
description:
Self-contained flat adjoining victorian villa centrally located in Merchiston Bruntsfield. Living room with kitchen area and table and chairs & double sofa bed. Double bedroom, separate shower and loo. Rooms are large and bright. Small outdoor area by entrance door.

Less than 2 min walk to cafés, bars, restaurants and takeaways. 15 minute walk to centre of Edinburgh; taxi rank and bus stop (frequent service) also 100m from house. Various cinemas and theatres close by. 5min walk to Morningside.

name: Albion Terrace - Edinburgh Apartment
description:
1 bedroom apartment on the 1st floor (access by stairs). Cosy accommodation with comfortable furnishings.

Rooms
Spacious living room with 2 double sofas, radio and Freeview TV. Dining area (seats 4).

Kitchen with 4 hot plates, oven, microwave, fridge, toaster & kettle.

name: Modern and beautiful 3 Bedroom House
description:
Beautifully presented and comfortable mid terrace home with 3 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms sleeping 5 guests.
Excellent public transport links to the city centre and around Scotland. Also with free on street parking and driveway.

name: 2bed flat in Edinburgh’s heart
description:
✔ Captivating flat nicely nestled in the Old Town
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 3-minute walk to Edinburgh Farmers' Market
✔ 8-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 11-minute walk to Royal Mile
✔ 12-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ 13-minute walk to Princes Street
✔ 15-minute walk to Haymarket Train Station
✔ Plenty of quirky restaurants, fashionable shops & vibrant pubs nearby

name: Room in Edinburgh New Town apartment
description:
Modern apartment in Georgian building near Edinburgh city centre. Excellent location for bars, restaurants and tourist attractions. 10/15 minute walk from train, bus and tram stations. Free parking on the weekend.

The apartment is bright and comfy. The bedroom has a double bed, built in wardrobes, desk and screen. Guests will have use of a private bathroom with bath and shower.

The neighbourhood is extremely friendly with many coffee shops and restaurants.

name: 1860's townhouse, the Shore 1 Minute from Tram
description:
Choose Leith! Choose Life!

Set in Edinburgh's vibrant 'Shore' area of Leith, Boasting two Michelin Star Restaurants and some of Edinburgh's best bars, with great connections into Edinburghs city centre.

This Historic Edinburgh flat dates back to 1860 and while it offers all the traditional beauty of a Victorian apartment it still offers all the modern comforts.

We welcome everyone to come and enjoy the real side of Edinburgh.

Choose Life! Choose Leith!

name: The Jeffrey Street Retreat - spa bath/bathroom tv
description:
LICENSED SHORT TERM LET PROPERTY
Beautiful apartment with spa bath and integral tv close to Waverley Train Station and the Royal Mile.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Near Edinburgh Airport Self Contained Annexe Ratho
description: Welcome to our home in Ratho  you have a PRIVATE  bedroom /kitchen/ shower room Annexe which is attached to the main  house but locked for your privacy also a completely SEPARATE  garden room lounge  2 AREAS IN TOTAL  a few steps into the garden KING BED  - Edinburgh airport Ratho Climbing Arena Ingliston Showground the City Centre NEW for 2024 Lost Shore Surf Resort easily reachable we are in a village and public transport can be  sporadic please check  transport app - FREE parking on premises

name: Bright Flat by Tram, Ideal for Work & City Breaks
description: Bright and stylish flat in Roseburn, 20 mins walk to Princes St and 2 mins from tram and bus stops. Direct tram from the airport in ~30 mins, and just 5 mins by bus to the city centre. Ideal for city breaks, business travel, or rugby weekends at nearby Murrayfield Stadium. Includes a comfy double bedroom, modern kitchen and bathroom, fast Wi-Fi, plus a box room with desk—perfect for remote work. A peaceful, well-furnished base for exploring Edinburgh in comfort.

name: Exceptional gem in the Georgian New Town.
description:
Diligently owner-managed, this ground-floor flat with main door access enjoys a prime UNESCO World Heritage site location, moments from cosmopolitan George St. or the delights of Stockbridge.

Inside, generous rooms are comfortably furnished and thoughtfully lit with eclectic art and premium fixtures - amassed over time with interesting stories to tell. Everything targets your comfort, enjoyment and wellbeing, helped by us being Edinburgh locals who can step in and assist should the need arise.

name: The Cobbled Rider
description:
Nestled amongst the cobbled streets of unbeatable location in Thistle Street is a rare find an unusually large 18th century period Georgian flat. Perched high above the sandstone grandeur with grown-up period elegance sprinkled with fun-loving design; is a luxurious bolt hole for a Scottish escape.

Edinburgh City Council, licence to short term let: EH-66065-F

name: Holyrood Park light and airy two bed
description: Airy flat right next to the beautiful royal Holyrood Park,  650 acres of wide open space and a 5 minute walk to Holyrood Palace, Dynamic Earth, the Scottish Parliament, the Royal Mile and the rest of Edinburgh's historic old town. 15 minutes walk from the main train station (5 min taxi) and an easy walk to Edinburgh Castle and the city centre. The ideal base for exploring Edinburgh. Unlimited fibre broadband. Committed to Airbnb's Cleaning Protocol.

name: Lovely sunny room, king size bed &private bathroom
description:
A lovely sunny double room with King size bed in our family home. There is a wash basin and small fridge in the bedroom and a private bathroom opposite with bath and shower. Fresh towels and linen provided. The space is all yours and will be spotlessly clean :-)

We are a short drive from the airport and 5 minutes walk from all the buses on the main route into the city centre, which takes 15-20 minutes. Ideal for couples, solo travellers, business travellers and families with young children.

name: 7/1 Maxwell Street apartment - lovely private room
description:
My apartment is in a peaceful, quiet location but only 50m from a bus stop and the hustle and bustle of Morningside, a lively local area full of shops and restaurants. It is 15 minutes by bus to the city centre, or you could walk through some lovely local neighbourhoods.
My apartment has a private front garden.

I am offering a private double bedroom and you have use of the bathroom and kitchen/dining-room (both shared with me). Please note the double bed is a platform bed (with no handrail)

name: Cosy & Modern Central Apartment
description: Cosy flat walking distance from Edinburgh tourist attractions with connection to all parts of the city. 1 min from tram stop  - direct connection with the airport and Murrayfield Stadium! Stroll to Princes Street, St Andrew Square and St James Quarter. One minute walk to amazing restaurants, bars and cafes for some great city vibe! FREE WiFi. SELF CHECK-IN. SERVICED BY PROFESSIONAL CLEANING COMPANY. You will need previous positive reviews from other hosts to book this accommodation

name: Porteous' Studio
description:
AS SEEN IN, CONDÉ NAST, REMODELISTA, MONOCLE, THE TIMES, GRAND DESIGNS MAGAZINE, DEZEEN, THE EVENING STANDARD, HOMES AND INTERIORS SCOTLAND, HAARKON, THE SPACES

Winner of the 2017 Edinburgh Architecture Association Small Projects Award.
Winner of the 2017 Scottish Design awards for Projects under 200K.

You can follow our story from the beginning if you have instagram @porteous.studio
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Hamilton Pl - Beautiful and central city apartment
description: A beautiful 2 bedroom (one is a large box bedroom) apartment in the trendy Stockbridge area of Edinburgh, a few minutes from the city centre.

name: Stunning West End City Centre Apartment
description: Beautiful Victorian ground floor flat available in the heart of Edinburgh’s prestigious West End. Newly renovated to a high standard, this luxury apartment is available to sleep four, with one double bed in the principle bedroom upstairs and a comfortable double sofa bed with memory foam topper available in the sitting room (sofa bed for bookings of 3+ guests only). The central location allows walking distance to all city centre attractions such as Edinburgh Castle and Murrayfield Stadium

name: South Charlotte Special - steps from Princes St
description:
Short Term Let License Number:
EH-69606-F

Luxurious 5 star bright, lower ground level apartment centrally located. Steps away from Princes Street and gardens, Castle, galleries, fantastic shopping, bars and restaurants.
Airlink bus and tram stops 1 min away.
Waverley & Haymarket train stations 15 minutes walk away.

name: Luxury Edinburgh Period Property
description:
Converted country house which combines a historic listed building with a modern luxurious interior.
Our beautiful garden flat covers the full ground floor (275m2) and is accessed by stairs with patio doors in the Living Room providing direct access to the garden and views across the fields to the rolling pentland hills.

name: Spacious 3 Bedrms in old town
description: The apartment is in one of the best locations to explore Edinburgh. National Museum, Edinburgh University and Grassmarket are within 10 mins walk. Princes Street, Waverley train station and the Castle are about 15 minutes walk. It is surrounded by supermarkets, grocery shops and restaurants. The apartment is next to the beautiful Meadows, where is one of the major venues for the Fringe shows during the Edinburgh Festival. The apartment is in a central location with a quiet neighbourhood.

name: City Center Old Town on The Royal Mile w/ Views
description:
This bedroom with private connected bathroom is for single (1 person) occupancy only.

At the more peaceful end of the Royal Mile with dozens of restaurants, cafes & pubs.

Close to The Castle, The Palace, Princess Street & Holyrood Park.

The flat is up 2 flights of stairs providing lovely views of Calton Hill. Some street noise but double glazed windows keeps noise minimal.

Waverley station is a 7 minute walk. The 100 bus takes you directly to the airport.

Complimentary tea and coffee.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Luxury Flat with Parking in West End
description:
✔ Charming flat nicely nestled in West End
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Fully equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ National Galleries of Scotland: Modern One is a 14-minute walk
✔ 21-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ Scott Monument is a 22-minute walk
✔ Free private parking

name: Spacious flat, classic tenement, Old Town centre
description:
•Spacious two-bedroomed flat, comfortably sleeping four, in a classic Old Town tenement, yards from the Royal Mile;
•Midway between the Castle and Holyrood Palace;
•Minutes walk from all transport links, the main Fringe venues, the Castle, Princes Street, the Christmas markets, and the best of Edinburgh's bars and restaurants

EPC rating: 73 (C)
Edinburgh City Council Short Term Let - Secondary Letting Licence Number EH-70904-F
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh New town Apartment - Elforma - Barony Su
description: Situated on one of the most desirable areas of the New Town, this two bedroom apartment offers plenty of style and surprise. Only a short walk from John Lewis, Edinburgh Playhouse and the Omni Centre and the property is within 5 minutes walk of the City centre. There are also great public transport links with nearby bus stops, tram stop (to the airport) and the main train station at Waverley.

name: Recently decorated luxury bedroom for tourists.
description: Recently decorated luxury double bedroom for travellers. Close to airport with good transportation to restaurants, museum, the castle, Shops, theatre.  Washing machine, fridge, microwave, kettle, toast Machine and Wifi  provided. Self check in. New nice furnitures. 247 CCTV. Bath, heating, Smoke alarm, CO2, and smart TV is available.  No pets, kids & no indoor smoking. Guest to tidy equipments in the kitchen, clean toilet & bathroom after every use. Switch off lights & appliances when not in use

name: Traditional 5BD Flat Overlooking Bruntsfield Links
description: Welcome to our spacious and character-filled Edinburgh home, set in a traditional tenement overlooking the leafy Bruntsfield Links. Just moments from boutique shops, cosy cafés, and some of the city's best green spaces, this five-bedroom flat offers a peaceful retreat with plenty of room for families or groups. Whether you're planning a family break, a group getaway, or simply want to experience Edinburgh like a local, this is the perfect place to settle in, relax, and explore.

name: Bright and Airy Flat Close to Edinburgh University
description: After a busy day come home and unwind in this stylish and comfortable apartment featuring plush furnishings and cheerful colours. Sleep soundly wrapped up in hotel quality linens and wake ready to enjoy the wonderful Edinburgh sights and hospitality.

name: Amazing Georgian Penthouse in City Centre
description: Stunning penthouse Georgian apartment right in the city.  This top floor apartment has been completely refurbished to a high standard and has all the comforts of modern living.  In the middle of the city, this apartment is perfectly situated for exploring Edinburgh or using it as a base for adventures further afield.

name: 2 Bedroom/2 Bath Flat in heart of Edinburgh
description:
IMPORTANT - The lift is, unfortunately, currently only operating until the 3rd floor. This means you will be required to walk up the last flight of stairs. We are working to get it fixed as soon as possible but please keep that in mind when booking the flat.

Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at St Andrew Sq stop and arrive at Murrayfield
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Sweet Room in Bohemian Meadows Flat
description: Bohemian Flat set in lively area, full of families, young people and students. Room has a loft bed, with a hatch which opens onto the kitchen letting in the morning light if you wish. Large kitchen/living room and bathroom which you have full access to. Area has many cafes, restaurants, two yoga studios, two pubs, five minutes walk to the Meadows, the 'green lung' of the city. Previously listed under 'Sweet Room in Artsy Meadow Flat where we received only four and five star reviews.

name: Historic 1890s Home Turned Relaxing Retreat
description: Indulge in a hot steamy shower before sinking into the chic corner sofa after a long day of sightseeing. This minimalist-inspired property is imbued with historic features such as original shutters and stripped wooden floors.

name: Modern living on the Royal Mile
description:
Beautiful top floor apartment in the centre of Edinburgh's historic Royal Mile. This apartment features all the comforts of modern living with the charm and beauty of Old Town Edinburgh.

Please note, as with all historic buildings in Edinburgh, there is no elevator. We are on the 3rd floor, up a well maintained and brightly lit stairway.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: GuestReady - Central Edinburgh Old Town Apartment
description: Attractive 2BR apartment situated in a more quaint and charming part of the historic Grassmarket area of the Edinburgh Old Town.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Zebra Club by Princess Gardens*
description:
Eclectic chic and cosy, this hideaway is the perfect place to relax and unwind.

All of the details—from the antique chairs, built-in bookshelves stuffed with vintage books, Scottish art, natural floors and huge natural stone walk-in shower—reflects a story of simple beauty, functionality and peace.

name: Private Stylish Room in Edinburgh
description:
This is a good sized double bedroom which is cozy and warm in a ground floor flat. It is a brand new flat with a walk-in shower, and all rooms and facilities are newly fitted and decorated
Very well located for the airport and motorway access, free parking outside the building, easy access to public transport. Busses 3 and 25 get you to the city center
Good local facilities including library, hairdresser, cinema, shops and 2 shopping centers West Side Plaza and Hermiston Gait at walking distance

name: Private Cozy Single Bedroom in Edinburgh
description:
This is a single bedroom which is cozy and warm in a ground floor flat. It is a brand new flat with a walk-in shower, and all rooms and facilities are newly fitted and decorated
Very well located for the airport and motorway access, free parking outside the building, easy access to public transport. Busses 3 and 25 get you to the city center
Good local facilities including library, hairdresser, cinema, shops and 2 shopping centers West Side Plaza and Hermiston Gait at walking distance

name: Luxury 2 bed apartment - perfect central location
description:
A bright, modern and charming mews house in the west end of Edinburgh's New Town. The mews has two well-apportioned double bedrooms, a modern bathroom and open-plan kitchen-dining-living room.


Airport Bus Stop Shandwick Place (0.5 mi)
Waverley Station (0.9 mi)
Haymarket station (1 mi)
Edinburgh Castle (1.2 mi)
Princes Street (0.6 mi)
Stockbridge (0.2 mi)

Check-in is from 2pm. Guests can drop off their luggage if they arrive in the city before 2pm : )

name: Explore Historic Old Town from an Elegant Apartment
description:
Curl up with a book on a tufted sofa or sofabed in a striking living room boasting elegant decor and a black marble fireplace. Be steeped in the placid glow of this charming flat while preparing breakfast in a kitchen with enduring wood floors and oceanic hues.

My apartment is great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families. Either for a short city break or stay longer. Straight out of the front door and into the heart of the busy Royal mile, leading down to the Palace of Holyrood/Princes garden or up to the Castle. Just a few minutes’ walk brings you to most of attractions in Edinburgh. I am sure it will be a Home from Home for you to enjoy.

Just a 2-minute walk from Edinburgh Military Tattoo and a 2-minute walk from Royal Mile. Edinburgh Castle is a 5-minute walk from the apartment, while Edinburgh Festival Theatre is 650 yards from the property.

Set in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town, the apartment is just around the
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: CENTRAL/WEST END, DOUBLE ROOM, PRIVATE SHOWER
description: A large bright flat, with great views over the historical Fettes College and to The Kingdom of Fife. The guest bedroom is clean, contemporary and has an ensuite shower, and walk in wardrobe. The property is within 10 minutes walking distance of the city centre including George St. and Princes St. and 5 minutes from the Royal Botanic Gardens and Stockbridge. If you prefer there is a bus stop I minute away where you can jump on a bus to Princes Street.

name: Luxury City Centre Apartment with free parking
description: Tytler Gardens presents a contemporary 1-bedroom apartment with a capacity to accommodate up to 4 individuals, ideally situated in the heart of Edinburgh, Nestled within a serene cul-de-sac bordering Arthur Seat, the apartment offers proximity to Holyrood Palace, the official residence of King Charles, a mere five-minute stroll away. Moreover, a pleasant walk of approximately 10 minutes grants access to Edinburgh’s premier shopping and dining districts of Princess Street and Quarter Mille.

name: Cosy double bedroom free parking near airport
description:
Step into the comfort & charming double bedroom with shared bathroom in the tranquil Cramond area of Edinburgh.
- Free residential parking
- Direct Airport bus to/from the house
- Close to bus stops for direct and frequent buses to/from City Centre
- Shared bathroom, immaculately maintained
- Thoughtful Amenities: High-speed WiFi, blackout curtains ensure your stay is both relaxing and practical
- Professional Cleaning ensures a spotless and hygienic environment

name: Restalrig Apartment - Modern 2 bed flat
description:
**Do not request to book before sending me a message letting me know your planned arrival details. I have 2 small children at home and cannot guarantee I’ll be available for your arrival date or time. Also make sure to confirm full details of your travel party and ages**

Modern 2 bedroom apartment on the 1st floor (American 2nd floor).

This is my home when I'm in Edinburgh and I'm therefore particular about who stays here.

name: 3 bedroom flat in lovely Stockbridge area
description:
Beautiful 3 bedroom flat (sleeps 5 people) in the trendy Stockbridge area of Edinburgh. It is a 15-20 minute walk from the city centre.
I have lived here for over 19 years - it is a great home!

name: Lovely quiet double room  ideal for Edin Airport.
description:
Cammo is a lovely area, a short drive away from the Centre. Regular buses to City which take 20-30 mins depending on traffic and cost £2 single or you can buy a day ticket.

Room is light and airy. Lovely Bathroom right next to your room with bath & shower for your sole use during your stay.

To /from Airport is only 10-15 mins max by Uber/taxi. Cost varies depending on time of day. Uber cheaper usually. Nearest tram stop is Edinburgh Gateway or airport bus stop from Maybury 30 min walk.

name: Cosy place 10min walk from Old Town. Relaxing stay
description:
Cosy flat with a private entrance. Near Arthur Seat, 10-15min walk to the Old Town. (with the Castle, great National Museum and locations that inspired the Harry Potter). Plenty of good cafes, pubs and takeaways around the corner.

We will leave you some books and guides about Edinburgh, and you can get in touch for trip ideas. But you only need to open the door and wonder around to enjoy this amazing city.

Free on-street parking from 5:30pm on Fridays to Monday morning.

name: Bright flat in super neighbourhood close to centre
description:
Bright and spacious (85 square metres) top floor apartment situated in the centre of a safe and desirable district of Edinburgh. A lovely 20 minute walk or a short bus ride to the Old Town and city centre. Nearest bus stop close to the flat. Idyllic view from the bedroom. Fully equipped kitchen. Plenty of boutique shops, cafes and restaurants nearby.
Lots of 5* reviews "Will definitely be back", "the neighbourhood is amazing", "very spacious and well equipped".

name: Prime City Centre Location
description:
Prime Location 2min walk to Princess Street, Edinburgh’s main shopping district.
Situated right next to the Usher Hall popular event venue.
10 min walk to Edinburgh Castle
10 min walk to Haymarket Train Station
15 min walk to Waverley Train Station
5 min walk to Grassmarket - popular bars and restaurants with outside eating.

Traditional Edinburgh Style Tenement Building, old quaint Edinburgh style which adds to the character. Situated on the first floor.
Local Amenities on Doorstep

name: charm & character on historic Rose Street
description:
LOVELY, FAMILY RUN, ROSE STREET FLAT, FULL OF CHARACTER IN AN AMAZING LOCATION: 1 bedroom, 1 sofa bed, sleeps 2, in the absolute centre of Edinburgh.

ALSO SEE - "ST JAMES QUARTER 2 BED APARTMENT" on host profile, DAVID'S LISTINGS

Airport trams stop - 2 mins
Waverley station/airport bus - 5 mins
Royal Mile - 10 mins
Edinburgh Castle - 15 mins

name: A Spacious Double Room in Central Edinburgh
description: This is a comfortable top-floor flat (sorry, no lift!) in central Edinburgh. It has recently been refurbished with new kitchen, bathroom, wood flooring etc.It is a double bedroom with a king size bed and is equipped with a wardrobe, a desk, a stool.

name: Private en-suite room, self check in (no contact)
description: Our elegant room is the perfect place to stay when visiting Edinburgh. There is a comfy double bed and a beautiful en-suite, secluded from the main house; with a small peaceful garden area and a private entrance. Based in the quiet suburb of Blackhall, we are only a couple of miles from the city centre - with dozens of express buses on a few minutes walk from the house; whilst at the same time ideally situated for journeys to and from the airport.

name: Immaculate 3 Bed Apartment with Private Entrance
description:
Recently Renovated to a high standard, we have a lovely 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment (1 is an en-suite) is a high specification garden level apartment.

The property has a private courtyard entrance and finished perfectly.

Bus stop directly outside for easy access to the city or walking distance to city is only 10 mins, the garden apartment is ideally located for staying in Edinburgh. Easy and available parking nearby.

Located next door to the Royal Botanical Gardens.

name: Spacious 2  Bedroom Apartment
description: Brimming with period charm a 2 bedroom with 2 king size beds & large sofa bed, second floor apartment offers spacious, comfortable, clean accommodation in the heart of desirable Murrayfield.  Excellent local amenities, cafes, bars & independent shops. The PERFECT base for exploring the City of Edinburgh. Regular buses 5 mins to city centre. From Edinburgh airport: Skylink 100 via Murrayfield, and City Tram to Murrayfield Station,  the apartment is a 5 min walk from the stop.

name: Elegant 2 bed 2 shower flat Victorian charm
description:
Location, location, location!

Your stay in Edinburgh is limited, so make sure you stay in the best apartment, and in the best location.
Whilst there are many properties in Edinburgh, we are confident that Castle View Grindlay Street is amongst the very best, and provides levels of comfort, cleanliness and convenience that are truly unique.

*Please note - we don't accept stag / hen or parties of any kind*
Please also note that the rear garden is no longer accessible.

name: Luxury Morningside Apartment with Private Entrance
description: Jordan Lane is located right at the heart of Morningside, along a quiet side street that is within easy walking distance of the main shopping area, Morningside Road. The property is the perfect base to explore Edinburgh and the surrounding areas from.

name: Cozy bedroon with private bathroom in shared flat
description: We’re a friendly couple happy to host you in our home, where you’ll have access to a comfortable bedroom and private bathroom. Our location is ideal—situated between the city center and Leith, one of Edinburgh’s most charming neighborhoods. Just a 25-minute walk from Princes Street and Waverley Station, we offer excellent transport links across the city. You’ll be surrounded by bars, restaurants, and parks—perfect for enjoying Edinburgh’s vibrant nightlife or unwinding after a day of exploring.

name: Cordiners - Castle view flat in Edinburgh centre
description:
This is a homely flat in a truly fantastic location right in the heart of the historic Old Town. Very close to a range of cafes, bars and restaurants. The Airlink 300 bus stops just minutes from the flat.

The flat itself is very cosy, with a comfortable double bed and a sofa bed that can be used to sleep an additional 2 guests in the living room. The kitchen is well equipped should you wish to cook during your stay. This is the perfect place for couples, solo and business travellers alike.

name: Spacious Apartment close to Princes Street
description:
✔ Vibrant flat ideally located in West End
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 13-minute walk to Dean Village
✔ 14-minute walk to the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art
✔ 18-minute walk to the Edinburgh Castle
✔ 4-minute walk to Haymarket train station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7

name: Double room in clermiston
description:
A double bedroom in a neat and clean flat of 2 bedrooms
Free wifi
3 minutes walk from bus stop ( bus no. 26 (24 hour)25 min to city centre , 1, 21,
skyline 200 (24 hour)15 mins from the Edinburgh airport
25 min by bus to Haymarket train station

name: Colourful & Peaceful Flat in the City Centre
description:
A colourful, stylish, luxurious and modern flat in Edinburgh's Southside area - part of the beautiful and lively Old Town.

On a bustling street with all amenities and a few minutes walk to most attractions- a perfect base for exploring the city or any of the festivals. With acoustic glass fitted, it is a tranquil respite after a long day sightseeing where you can cook, unwind or visit nearby bars and restaurants

Child friendly - travel cot, high chair etc

Edinburgh Council license granted.

name: Carlotta Guest House in Peaceful South Edinburgh
description: Featured in TimeOut's Top 15 Airbnbs in Edinburgh, our charming retreat welcomes you with tranquil pastel hues. Unwind in style with Netflix entertainment & private parking. Whether you're a solo adventurer, a couple seeking a romantic getaway, a small family, or a busy professional, our haven caters to your needs. Experience seamless arrival with our self checkin key safe, ensuring your journey begins stress-free. We can't wait to welcome you! ☺️

name: Private Guest Suite in Georgian Townhouse in City Centre
description:
Our home is in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town and very close to Stockbridge, a bustling and popular suburb of the city.

The townhouse is over 200 years old and has some great period features.

I am more than happy to help you with any questions you might have about the city and can provide some great tips and recommendations.

We will be around if needed but respect your privacy.

The townhouse is situated in the centre of Edinburgh so there will be some traffic noise.

name: Bright, stylish flat with beautiful views
description:
Bright, welcoming flat with stunning views provides luxury accommodation in an ideal location. The interior is new and modern and is furnished and equipped to a high standard.

The flat is within easy walking reach of great restaurants, bars and shops, and city centre attractions can be reached easily on foot in around 30 minutes or in 10-15 minutes by the numerous public transport links nearby.

Perfect for couples, solo or business travellers, looking for beautiful, relaxing accommodation.

name: 4 Bed, Grassmarket, Castle View apartment!
description: Spacious and bright 4-bedroom apartment perfectly located in Edinburgh’s historic Old Town. Directly across from The Elephant House, where J.K. Rowling wrote Harry Potter, and just steps from Greyfriars Bobby. Enjoy direct views of Edinburgh Castle and walk to the Royal Mile, Grassmarket, and George IV Bridge. Surrounded by lively pubs, restaurants, and cafés. Waverley Station and airport links are nearby.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Leith, spacious, bright and quiet 2 bedroom flat
description: Situated on the first floor the apartment  has been fully renovated including new kitchen and bathroom .  It has excellent transport links and is in the middle of Leith , just off Easter road but in a quiet landscaped cul-de-sac. Be in the centre of Edinburgh without the noise or hassle.  The neighbourhood is residential and a real community . could you read through all listing details before booking to make your arrival and stay more comfortable

name: Regal Art Filled Apartment with Secret Bedroom
description:
This is a tastefully decorated property, combining wood panelled walls with wonderful art. There are hundreds of books for you to peruse during your stay. The bathroom has an amazing large shower with underfloor heating, which extends into the living area, under the natural wooden floors. You will find a well equipped kitchen that has everything you need, should you decide to cook during your stay.

You will have access to the entire property during your stay.

I will be available via text, phone, or email.

The property is in the beautiful and historic old town, minutes from the castle and an abundance of wonderful restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. Furthermore the property is only a short walk from the train station and rail links to the airport.

The flat is minutes away from Waverley train station and tram links to the airport.

The flat is supplied with fresh linen and towels.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Queen Street, Flat 3
description: Located in the New Town, across the road from Queen Street Gardens, this beautifully renovated modern, contemporary apartment is on the ground floor of a distinguished 1794 Georgian townhouse. Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at Princes Str stop and arrive at Murrayfield in just 35 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the con

name: Castle Wynd North - Historic flat w Castle Views
description:
Immediately next to Edinburgh Castle with stunning views. Right in the heart of the old town, this apartment is a fantastic festival location close to bars, restaurants, museums and stunning architecture. Princes Street and George Street are only a 10-minute stroll away. There are 18 steps leading to the flat, which is on the first floor.

There are great transport links all over the city with buses from the Royal Mile 24 hours a day.

Original floorboards and windows were recently renovated
