name: Log Fire Edinburgh City Centre Apartment
description: Our traditional Victorian apartment is on the top floor in the heart of Edinburgh, with spectacular views of Calton Hill. Only a 10 minute walk from the city centre, this is a great location for exploring Edinburgh or alternatively for getting away from it all and enjoying sitting in front of our log burning stove. we are fully licensed with Edinburgh Council and have all the necessary safety Certificates We know how important holidays are, so if you have any questions, please drop us an email

name: Stylish, Cosy Corner Apartment Near Royal Botanic Gardens
description:
My flat is on the ground floor . Lovely restaurants and coffee shops very close by . Waitrose is a 5/10 minute walk and there is a Scotmid and small Sainsbury's in opposite direction again no more than 5/10 minute walk . Local delicatessens and beautiful cheese shops very close by. Beautiful Royal Botanic Gardens very close by . Modern art galleries 10/15 min walk which both have lovely coffee shop/ restaurants .

Guests will have full access to the entire property and small patio area outside patio doors in flat . Great for coffee or glass of wine of which both are supplied. I will meet you at the flat to show you found and give you keys and my mobile no .

I live about 15 minutes from flat . I'm available by text or mobile

The apartment is set in trendy Stockbridge. There are many restaurants, coffee shops, delicatessens, and bars close by, and it's also near the Royal Botanical Gardens. Within walking distance are two modern art galleries, both with ni

name: Spacious & Contemporary Apartment in Heart of City
description: This truly magnificent apartment is in the very best location, accommodating up to 8 guests in the heart of the city centre. Guests enjoy 3 double bedrooms, 2 with en-suite shower rooms and a separate bathroom with bath & shower. Spectacular views of Edinburgh Castle, and oodles of space and light throughout. We have baby cots & high chairs for guests with babies/toddlers. There is no parking with the apartment but there are several car parks nearby.

name: Charismatic and delightful apartment
description:
Traditional Edinburgh tenement flat located on the second floor and recently refurnished. Accommodation comprises of hall, bedroom with kingsize bed, lounge/kitchen with original wooden floors and bathroom with shower (central heating and double glazed).

Leith Walk has a wealth of independent cafes, bars, restaurants and shops, combined with charity and second hand clothes, books, music and furniture shops!

We’re also on the tram route so easy access direct from the airport ☺️

name: Magnificent Apartment with Edinburgh Castle Views
description: This truly magnificent apartment is in the very best location, accommodating up to 8 guests in the heart of the city centre. Guests enjoy 3 double bedrooms, 2 with en-suite shower/bath rooms and a separate bathroom with bath & shower. Spectacular views of Edinburgh Castle, and oodles of space and light throughout. We have baby cots & high chairs for guests with babies/toddlers. There is no parking with the apartment but there are several car parks nearby.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Canalside retreat - City Centre
description: A beautiful quiet canalside apartment in the centre of the city, restaurants, cafés and supermarkets all close by.  Perfect for those looking to tour the city or those working in the Centre and Fountainbridge areas.

name: 3 Bedroom Waterfront Apartment with Stunning Views
description: Beautiful 3 bedroom apartment and balcony with stunning views of the Firth of Forth, bridges and harbour.

name: Unique Edinburgh Flat.Luxury & Comfort In The City
description: The perfect location to stay in Edinburgh's New Town. The flat has been completely rebuilt over 2 years and completed in 2018, proudly boasting 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. We are opposite the Playhouse Theatre and a 2 min walk to the Tram that links directly to the Airport. We are a 5 min walk from Waverley Station & Princes St, the main shopping centre. The Famous Edinburgh Castle & Royal Mile is just a 15 min walk. This is the perfect place to stay in Edinburgh for both pleasure and business.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Top views in the heart of Unesco World Heritage
description:
[Short-term licence number: EH-69678-F]
Welcome to the UNESCO World Heritage old town. Mingle with Festival stars and nearby university academics or simply enjoy the museums, vast parks and cafes. All minutes from your door.
Our flat is bright, warm and incredibly quiet. Make yourself at home.
Bit chilly after that walk? Enjoy a hot bath, with a fan heater to keep you warm while you change.
Midnight sun? Working wooden shutters keep the summer light out when you don't want it.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Jeffrey Street (Flat 1), Royal Mile, Old Town
description: A very comfortable, centrally located first floor, one-bedroom apartment (sleeps 1–3) off the Royal Mile, with pleasant outlook onto historic buildings and within easy walking distance of the major tourist attractions, festival venues, shops, nightlife and transport connections. From the rooftop terrace, there are spectacular views of the city and surrounding area.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: City Centre Flat - Stone throw from George St
description:
Kick back and relax in my gorgeous flat in the heart of the city centre. Make it your home from home. A few minutes walk to all the major historical sites of the Old Town and on the door step of some of the best shopping and restaurants in the New Town.

A stone throw from George Street and Princess Street its perfectly located to explore all that Edinburgh has to offer, both in the Old Town and New Town.

A great base for couples, solo or business travellers

name: Discover Edinburgh's Royal Mile from an Old Town Apartment
description:
Chic and stylish, the apartment has been renovated throughout. The two-bedroom apartment is beautifully decorated with a mix of vintage and modern pieces. It's a cosy space to relax and enjoy as your home from home. The apartment is quiet and away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

There's space for 4 to sleep - two double bedrooms. We provide freshly laundered towels and bedding.

The kitchen is well stocked and has all the pots and pans you might need to cook up some haggis and tatties for dinner! There's a table that seats four so plenty of room to dine in. We supply teas and coffee for the cafetière, and cereals and bread for breakfast.

The adjoining sitting room is stylishly decorated with artwork from local artists and treasures found in vintage shops in Edinburgh and from our travels in Asia and the Middle East. The sofa is great to snuggle in if you want to relax at "home" after a busy day in the city. There's also TV with Netflix and a goo
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Wee Highland Coo, Grassmarket
description: The Wee Highland Coo is a cosy apartment located in the historic Grassmarket area of Edinburghs Old Town. The private and quiet courtyard complex, which has a stunning view of the Castle, is the perfect base from which to explore what Edinburgh has to offer. All the main attractions, a wide selection of great bars, restaurants and cafes are all on your doorstep and only a short walk away.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Seaside studio flat
description:
Situated in the heart of charming, vibrant Portobello- Edinburgh's secret seaside!
Delightful self-contained studio flat on 2nd floor of sustainable wooden newbuild. Clean, comfortable, with complete kitchen/ dining /bedroom, and clothes storage;
Instant hot water and shower.
Free on- street parking.
2 minutes to golden beach with great pubs and cafes.
3 minutes to bustling High street with supermarket and interesting shops.
Frequent bus service (20 mins) to city centre, and regular night bus.

name: King's Road - Seaside Retreat 15 Minutes to Centre
description:
Our Scandi inspired apartment is perfect for a couple.

We are lucky to enough to be right beside the sea and Portobello Beach but have great transport links to the City Centre so you can be at Edinburgh’s famous sites such as Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile, Grassmarket and Princes Street in 15 minutes.

There is free street parking which is rare in Edinburgh although we suggest using the excellent Edinburgh transport system to get into town.

name: Bruntsfield Bothy- Central Apt in Historic Building
description:
Guests will find a beautifully refurbished 1 bed apartment perfect for 2. Pristine bed linens, kitchen, tasteful decor, Tv & Dvd player.

A place to call home for short or longer term stays.

The bathroom has a corner bath and overhead shower.

This lower ground apartment is in a traditional Edinburgh tenement which can be accessed by a few stairs to the front door followed by a corridor and down a 12 steps to the apartment.

name: Cosy Flat in the Heart of Edinburgh
description:
✔ Welcoming flat ideally located in Edinburgh’s Old Town, on the historic Canongate St

name: BOUTIQUE AND CHIC CITY CENTRE APARTMENT ...
description:
This peaceful bright and spacious one bedroom apartment offers accommodation for two people. A traditional and fully refurbished Old Town apartment. The apartment is spacious, offering a large bedroom with king size bed and comfortable lounge.

A truly cosy 'Pied a Terre', located in the vibrant heart of Edinburgh's historic 'Old Town' and only a few minutes walk to the exciting Grassmarket area, the famous Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle and numerous cafes, bars, and restaurants.

name: Familievennlig leilighet
description: Well equipped apartment in a quiet neighborhood. Great bus connections to Edinburgh Castle and shopping.

name: 3 Bedroom Duplex Apartment -  Edinburgh w/ Parking
description:
This is a truly lovely large 2 storey apartment, an easy walk from the city centre and Holyrood park and palace. A minute walk from bus routes to the train and bus station and onward connection to the airport and to all parts of the city and beyond. Situated within a modern development with elevator, it offers an incredibly comfortable base to relax in after a great day exploring the fantastic city of Edinburgh.
There is free parking for one car in a dedicated space within the secure garage.

name: Exceptional home only 2 miles from city centre.
description: Sole occupancy of this home.   Freshly decorated to a high standard with colourful soft furnishings.  Modern appliances but with a cosy atmosphere.  All rooms are sunny and bright with a pleasant outlook. Arthur Seat and Portobello Beach within walking distance.  Bus stop right outside on street taking you into the city within 10 minutes.

name: Charming apartment in historic Old Town Edinburgh
description: A gorgeous comfortable apartment full of original features situated up a tiny cobbled street steps away from the Royal Mile and Edinburgh's iconic Old Town attractions. Less than 10 mins walk from Waverley Station. Moments from artisan coffee shops, theatres, restaurants and the Grassmarket.  The flat is ground floor with its own door from street (no steps or communal staircase). Previously owned, until 2017, by family of a Scottish clan chief. Completely refurbished retaining Scottish theme.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming City Centre Cottage with Lush Garden
description: Step off the picturesque Circus Lane, Stockbridge into a one-of-a-kind Mews Cottage (circa 1826) with classic and comfortable furnishings.  The fountain, tree ferns and vine-covered walls of the back patio offer an enchanted ambience. The property is in easy reach of all the main attractions, resturants and shops. Stockbridge is one of Edinburgh's most sought after areas in which to live or stay on holiday.

name: 19 Montgomery
description: This is an ideal base for exploring the Scottish capital of Edinburgh. The location is ideal for visitors, solo adventurer or a business traveller. Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at McDonald Road stop and arrive at Murrayfield in just  40 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to

name: Cosy Double Room in Traditional Flat
description:
Cosy double bedroom within large traditional flat. Located in the bustling Roseburn area of Edinburgh which is a short distance from Murrayfield Stadium, West End and City Centre. Bus and tram services within a few minutes walk from flat allowing easy access to Airport and all other areas of City Centre. Haymarket Train Station is also a ten minute walk away.

The local area of Roseburn offers various shops, food places and bars.

name: Self-contained, Bright, Quiet Private Cottage,
description:
Welcome to the charming self-catering Rockcliffe Cottage situated in the picturesque and historic coastal town of South Queensferry. You are just 15-minutes from Edinburgh city centre and well connected for Scotland's road, rail & airport routes.

This bright, modern cottage is cosy and furnished to a high standard with accommodation over one floor. Open plan lounge and dining areas include two double sofas, TV, DVD player and dining table, with French doors providing access to a decking area.

name: Newbuild - 3 bedrooms, 2 baths,5 mins from airport
description: This house is suitable for anyone looking for a quiet residential area near the airport (approx 3 miles away) within the proximity of Edinburgh City Centre(approx 5 miles away).  This is a newly built bright and spacious 3-bedroom terraced villa  consists of  2 x double bed rooms, 1 x single bed. 2 x bathrooms. It benefits from generous room proportions complimented by brand new construction and furnishings resulting in a most attractive opportunity to occupy on short or long term basis.

name: Luxury 3 Bedroom Flat in the heart of Edinburgh
description: Located in the New Town, across from Queen St Gardens, this beautifully renovated contemporary apartment is on the garden level of a distinguished 1794 Georgian townhouse. Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at Princes St stop and arrive at Murrayfield in just 35 minutes. The city's attractions are on your doorstep.

name: Rm1-Best Area-Classic Flat-15min Walk to Centre
description:
The apartment is perfectly situated between the city centre and trendy district of Leith. Countless bars, restaurants, cafés, supermarkets etc, right on the doorstep..
Ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and groups..
2 shared bathrooms, 1 shared kitchen and spacious shared lounge.
[No children or pets allowed]

name: Bright double room & bathroom  inwell located flat
description:
Modern bright apartment with well proportioned rooms that enjoy generous natural light throughout the day.
Guests stay in a double bedroom enjoying views of Leith Links (the birthplace of golf).
There are excellent transport links to the city. The bus takes only 10 minutes to Princes Street.
Direct tram three minutes from the door
The vibrant shore area is only a ten minute walk.
There is high speed WiFi throughout the property speed 200mbps
NON SMOKING
Breakfast is not included

name: Lovely spacious flat close  to City Centre
description: Bright, nicely decorated 2nd  floor tenement flat in the heart of vibrant Leith with views over a leafy garden park and Calton hill. You will be within walking distance of everything that Leith & the city has to offer. Major tourist attractions are only a short walk, cycle or bus journey away.

name: Warm bright apartment in Trinity.
description: Light & bright apartment on first floor of Victorian terrace. 30' to city centre. The double bedroom is at at the back of the house, facing west, with leafy views over private gardens. Bright office space with spare single bed. Living room with stripped floors.  Modern kitchen. Bathroom with large bath and separate shower. Easy access to the city by bus or on foot on leafy cycle paths. Bars and restaurants in picturesque Newhaven harbour with sea walks. Edinburgh Council licence.

name: Top of the Mile by Castle 2 bedroom 2 bathroom
description: Fabulous 2 bedroom apartment, luxurious standard, in the very best location. Newly renovated and with views directly onto Royal Mile. All modern conveniences.  Designer fabrics, wallpapers, free wifi, internet tv, underfloor heating.  Secure entry. Cosy & comfortable. 200 yards from Edinburgh Castle.  Please note this apartment has excellent views and is very peaceful at night.  This apartment is on the 4th floor and access is by stairs.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Modern chic apartment, lift access & free parking
description: Luxury boutique apartment decorated to a high standard. 15 min walk to the city centre or a short bus ride. Free onsite parking, fibre optic broadband, onsite gym, close to bars, restaurants and shops! Great flat, for couples, solo and business travellers - families with children too. We have added some lovely touches to help you feel comfortable. Close to the city’s transport links. Lots of green outdoor space around - Pilrig Park just across the road!

name: Traditional Boutique Apartment off Leith Walk
description:
This grand "Outlander" style one bedroom apartment is filled with with antique curiosities and historical artwork. Complete with aged yet polished wooden furniture and period tapestries, guests can truly revel in the novelty of this niche hidden gem.

The property is located around the corner from the prominent Leith Walk, a stretched road well known for it's bohemic cafes, restaurants and bars.

This truly is the perfect space to call home to reflect the nature of Scotland's historic capital.

name: Spacious Brewers Cottage & Garden on the Meadows
description:
A taste of country living in the heart of Edinburgh.

This unique property sits directly on the Meadows. It has its own entrance and garden situated next to south Edinburgh’s largest area of green space.

There is no street, so no street noise - just the sound of birds singing in the morning - which means you will have tranquillity during your stay in Edinburgh.

And you’re only 20 minutes walk away from the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle.

name: City Centre house - Arthur's Seat View, Parking
description: Experience a wonderful getaway in this charming 5-bedroom house, perfect for families or larger groups. This spacious end-terrace home spans three floors, offering a peaceful retreat for your stay. If you're bringing pets along, they are welcome as long as they're well-behaved!

name: Stunning retreat with modern features
description:
Stunning semi-detached bungalow in the Western suburbs of Edinburgh but enjoying quick rail and bus transport to the City of Edinburgh. Recently renovated to a high standard it enjoys a SW outlook with a sunny garden. Ideal for a family or two couples it provides comfortable and modern facilities to return to as you enjoy the culture and history of Edinburgh.

Situated on the canal, the bicycle/footpath takes you into the heart of Edinburgh in 15 mins. There you will find the festival hub.

name: Luxury Edinburgh Townhouse
description:
Situated in Edinburgh's New Town, this 4 bedroom main door apartment is perfectly located for shopping, dining and nightlife.

The apartment boasts a large living room, kitchen/dining room, a garden and your very own bar room.

Covering 3 levels, there are 4 double bedrooms, one of which en-suite and 2 further bathrooms.

name: Charming Old Town central retreat
description: Westerly views  through trees from this bright, cozy, "extremely comfortable"  3rd floor flat nestled in The Old Town, an oasis above the bustle of the city centre. Near popular tourist sites: The Castle, Greyfriars Kirk (church) with the loyal dog Bobby and the Royal Mile (High Street). Surrounded by Harry Potter sites and near the National Museum of Scotland, the University and iconic music pubs.  A memorable, peaceful haven in an unforgettable city, I would definitely stay here again!"
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: ⭐amazing apartments - Cables Wynd - free parking⭐
description:
Stunning modern apartment in Leith

- 2 double bedrooms, 1 Ensuite, shower over bath
- Free secure parking
- Free fast WiFi, YouView, BT Sports, Netflix on HD TV
- Ideal for families, max 6 guests in 4 beds + 1 baby
- Near Ocean Terminal & Leith

- Arrive from 3 pm, depart up to 10 am
- We try to satisfy requests for early check-in/late checkout (fees apply), and baggage drop-off (free), however, we can't guarantee, especially if guests are arriving/leaving on same day
amazingapartments co uk

name: amazing apartments: Hopetoun Street - free parking
description:
Stunning modern apartment in Leith

- Large bedroom with king-size bed
- Luxury shower over bath
- Free secure parking
- Free fast WiFi
- Free YouView, BT Sports, & Netflix on HD TV
- Ideal for families. Max 4 guests in 3 beds + 1 baby
- Near Omni Centre & Leith Walk

- Arrive from 3 pm, depart up to 10 am
- We try to satisfy early check-in/late checkout requests (fees apply), & baggage drop-off (free), however, no guarantees, especially if guests arrive/leave same day
amazingapartments co uk

name: Fantastic city centre New Town flat
description: Beautiful, sunny one bedroom flat in a fantastic location just off Broughton Street and only 5 minutes on foot to the city centre.

name: East Pilton Farm Cr - 2 bed apartment w parking
description:
Light, bright, modern apartment set in a modern & central development.

Our 2 bed apartment comes with a balcony, free parking and an elevator. These are all quite uncommon in Edinburgh!

name: Entire apartment with free parking
description: Self contained ground floor apartment with its own parking space. Conveniently situated  within easy walking distance of central Edinburgh. Direct tram link to Edinburgh airport and Murrayfield and although it is in a quiet street within a minute walk there are many restaurants, cafes supermarkets etc. nearby.

name: Edinburgh festival let!! Gorgeous family home!
description: Gorgeous 3 bedroom family home, 5 minute walk from beach, golf course, Lauriston Castle! Ideal for a family looking for somewhere in Edinburgh with great bus route directly into princes street!

name: Lovely Guest Suite,Balerno. Sleeps two.
description:
Our guest suite is in a quiet residential area in Balerno; a village at the foot of the scenic Pentland Hills. A beautiful spot for walkers and nature lovers.

To visit the city take a 25 minute car drive or the 44 Lothian bus at the end of the road for a 45 min bus ride to Edinburgh City Centre.

Complimentary milk, coffee, tea and sugar plus cereal for your first breakfast.

Shops, restaurants, bars, cafe & takeaways within a short walk.

A parking spot on the drive is available on request.

name: Spacious City Centre Retreat, Balcony&Free Parking
description:
Bright, clean 2 bedroom flat @city centre with lift and free car parking. Open-planned south-facing living/dinning room with balcony. Bedroom 1 has double bed, built-in wardrobes and en-suite shower and bathroom. Bedroom 2 has double bed and wardrobes. Main shower room/wc accessed from hall. One sofa and a king size sofa bed in living room.
Walking distance to Holyrood, Royal Mile and old town. Shops, bars& restaurants are step away.

name: SALE! Enormous Luxury 4 Bed, Sleeps 8-10
description: Welcome to our amazing Edinburgh apartment where you will feel comfortably at home and experience the city like a local.

name: Double room, easy access - airport and city centre
description:
Light and airy private room close to Edinburgh City centre and attractions. I would like to welcome you to My attractive maisonette which is shared with myself and 2 cats.
The double bedroom boasts views out onto our private garden. The flat is perfectly located with a bus stop to the city centre right outside. The tram to the airport is a 10 min walk away, The train station is a 15min bus ride away. Edinburgh castle is a 30 minute bus ride away and the zoo is roughly 1.5miles.

name: Stunning 2-Bedroom Georgian Flat, City Centre
description:
Stay in a stunning 1800s Georgian flat in the heart of Edinburgh, blending rustic charm with modern style.
This stylishly refurbished top-floor retreat offers a cozy and unique experience just steps from Princes Street, George Street, and the city’s main attractions. Enjoy breathtaking views and the character of an 18th-century building, perfectly situated for exploring Edinburgh’s festivals and landmarks.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Perfect Luxury Location!
description:
Newly Renovated main door Flat in Marchmont, Edinburgh/ Licensed By City of Edinburgh Council.
Open-Plan kitchen, comes fully equipped with luxury appliances.
King bed bedrooms, and wall mounted TV.
Cafes, Restaurants, transport links, Edinburgh Castle, Royal Mile & exciting attractions all close by.

name: Large room in spacious Georgian Flat
description: Quiet, spacious, single room in a Georgian flat located in the New Town Conservation Area.  We are only 15 mins walk (with luggage) from Waverley railway station and  5 mins from Picardy Place tram stop for onward travel to the airport and car hire depots.  The flat is surrounded by plenty of great cafes, pubs and restaurants and is only a brisk 10 min hike from the fantastic city views at the top of Calton Hill.

name: Spacious,  Bright & Quiet Home w/Balcony & Parking
description:
My home is one of the few Airbnb's listings with a review score above 4.90 in the area, recognised by guests on their rating for its quality and reliability.

Enjoy living like a local in our bright and spacious two bedroom flat with private parking located 10 minutes walk to the heart of Leith Walk and 30 mins walk to Princes St.

Welcome treats, linen & towels are provided.

name: Contemporary Meets Traditional in Scottish Themed Apartment
description:
Relax and unwind in this stylish oasis of calm. Explore all that the bustling Leith Walk has to offer, then walk back in minutes, close the door, unwind, and enjoy your own world of calm with comfortable beds and Scottish-themed art and photography throughout.

Situated in an central, but quiet, location from which to explore the beautiful City of Edinburgh. All the city sights and Waverley Train Station are within walking distance.

There are 2 bedrooms. The large double master bedroom is en-suite. The second bedroom also has a double bed and it's own bathroom next door. The apartment can comfortably sleep 4 adults (2 couples). All the beds and mattresses are new, very comfortable and feature beautiful white high quality linen and plenty of soft pillows.

Each bedroom features traditional wooden shutters on the inside of every window which keep out virtually all the daylight during the early sunrises of a Scottish summer or keep things cosy in the winter

name: Edinburgh Apartment Close to City Centre
description: 2 Bedroom Apartment, light airy, modern, ample space for 4 people or two couples, perfect for families. Local bus route to city centre and also access to Leith Harbour.

name: Luxury Apartment with Patio in City Centre
description:
✔ Modern flat nicely nestled near Calton Hill
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ Lovely patio
✔ 6-minute walk to Regent Road Park
✔ 10-minute walk to Calton Hill
✔ 23-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ 4-minute walk to Carlton Terrace Brae bus stop
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Cosy cabin, sleeps 4, close to Airport and City
description: Cosy log cabin set in large garden with close links to Edinburgh airport and the city centre. Very comfortable sofa bed in living area with bunk beds in separate room. Modern bathroom with large shower. Breakfast facilities with kettle, toaster, fridge and microwave. TV, hifi and free 4G wifi. Perfect for a family city trip or relaxing country break. This is a great opportunity to stay in a unique home in a fabulous countryside location 15 minutes from the buzz of Edinburgh.

name: Modern 2 bedrooms apartment
description: Great, modern , two bed apartment in the heart of the Leith area. Great location, near Ocean Terminal and The Shore. All buses just behind the corner. Supermarkets 1 min walk, nearby parks, pubs and restaurants. Great place for families! No parties allowed.

name: Modern City Centre Apartment in Central Hub
description: The apartment is in the lovely vibrant Dalry area which is a short walk (0.2 miles) from Haymarket Station where both the Airlink bus and Edinburgh Tram service direct from Edinburgh airport stop. Recently fully re-furbished to high standard the apartment blend modern style and comfort with the classic features such as high ceiling and original cornice features. The apartment is perfect for your Edinburgh adventures whether it be for business or pleasure.

name: Bide Collective14
description: Our cosy Double room/ twin room for two people is located in the upstairs area of a 1890’s Georgian townhouse in the heart of Edinburgh. Private en suite, complete with *compact shower, wash hand basin and toilet,ourself check in serviced rooms offer a streamline check in system and all our rooms are set over three floors, this room is located on the second floor so naturally stairs to climb. You will find us situated in "Hill Street" along the historic cobbled street in the New town of the city

name: Rose Street. Stunning City Centre Apartment.
description: Stunning City Centre Apartment at the west end of  Rose Street, one of the most charismatic and oldest streets of the historic Georgian New Town of Edinburgh. Lying directly behind the world famous Princes Street, it is easily accessible and especially suitable for couples or families.  Furnished and equipped to a very high standard in an ideal location for all of Edinburgh's main tourist sights, festival venues and a huge variety of restaurants,  bars and shopping.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Luxurious Central Edinburgh Apartment - Sleeps 6
description: Make yourself at home, enjoy the Houst experience, and feel like a true local at our modern apartment in the amazing city of Edinburgh.

name: Smart and cosy apartment close to the city center.
description:
The small and excellent one-bedroom apartment can host up to 4 people. It has a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, Wi-Fi, and TV. The apartment will be perfect for travellers who enjoy sightseeing in Edinburgh and experiencing evening nightlife. There is a free car park next to the block.

The City of Edinburgh Council Licence is pending approval.

name: Hawkhill -  2 Bed, Modern Apartment with Parking
description:
Bright and Modern Apartment. Set in a modern apartment complex only 30 minutes on foot from the city centre.

The apartment has 2 King size bedrooms, one with an ensuite bathroom, open plan kitchen/diner/living room and a master bathroom. The entire apartment was repainted at the end of March 2023.

The Royal Mile, Princes Street, Grassmarket are all within half an hour of our apartment. There are also supermarkets close by.

name: Delightful ground floor Newington flat
description:
This is a beautiful 2 bedroom Ground floor Flat in a traditional Edinburgh tenement in the Newington area of Edinburgh. It is near the Festival Theatre, Queens Hall, Arthurs Seat, The Meadows and lots of Edinburgh Fringe and Festival venues plus an excellent range of pubs, restaurants and cafes nearby.
It sleeps 4 people with a King Size bed , a Single bed and a comfortable double sofa bed in the living room. There is a well equipped kitchenette and a separate toilet and shower room.

name: The Flat with the Pink Door
description:
Comfortable and stylish home available in the city centre of Edinburgh.

The flat boasts two large bedrooms, one with a luxurious super king bed and the other with a cosy king; newly installed art deco-inspired bathroom, with wide and deep freestanding bath; colourful and spacious living room, and a cute brightly-coloured kitchen with a new appliances.

The flat is served well by bus routes, although Lothian Road and Princess Street are within walking distance.

name: Fabulous mid-century modern home by the beach!
description:
Stylish, quality, spacious, bright, colourful flat with amazing views.

100m from beach. 25 mins bus to city centre. Free street parking.

Perfect for holidays, with family & friends or remote work (2 desks + fibre broadband 200Mbps).

Portobello is a thriving part of Edinburgh - abundant hospitality, leisure, retail & community.

Sole access to my fully equipped home (2nd floor): 2 bedrooms (1 as super-king OR 2 large single beds, and 2nd as super-king), living/dining room, bathroom, kitchen.

name: Stylish 2BR Apt, Garden, free parking, Edin City
description:
Welcome to our stylish 2-bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh!
Perfect Location- Just a 15-minute direct bus ride to Princes Street and major attractions.
Explore nearby gems like:
• The Royal Botanic Garden
• Inverleith Park
• Vibrant Stockbridge with its unique shops and cafes

name: Modern flat in vibrant Leith area.
description:
A Bright modern flat in the vibrant area of Leith. My flat is situated at the foot of Leith Walk. Leith is famous for its community feeling and openness and has a diverse range of pubs, cafes and restaurants along the entire strip. The scenic Shore area is a ten minute walk away. The Edinburgh trams now run a service direct from Edinburgh Airport to the apartment. The stop is at the Foot of the Walk, less than 3 minutes away.
The trams also stops at both city centre train stations.

name: Old Town Apartment with Stunning View
description:
✔ Beautiful flat nicely nestled at the heart of Edinburgh
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 6-minute walk to St Giles' Cathedral
✔ 4-minute walk to Royal Mile
✔ 9-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ 10-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 10-minute walk to St James Quarter shopping mall
✔ 4-minute walk to Edinburgh Waverley train station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towe
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful house with conservatory and large garden
description:
Bright, modern house with sunny conservatory and large back garden. Sleeps up to eight guests in four spacious double bedrooms (2 X King, 1 X double bed, 1 X two single beds). Perfect for families/groups/festival goers.

Located in leafy Blackhall which is just 2 miles from Edinburgh’s attractive city centre. Also within 5 miles of Edinburgh airport. Excellent bus links just moments from the house.

name: Edinburgh Friendly Room
description:
The house is in a quiet periphery neighbourhood, but great for reaching any area in the city and outside - the bypass is just a minute away, if you have a car.

The room is spacious and comfortable - WiFi and Netflix included. There's a single bed, desk and chair, wardrobe, armchair, small sofa.

I'm Silvia and my partner is Gary. We are friendly, book and film lovers. I'm Italian, while Gary will be happy to share his knowledge of Scottish history if you so desire. We have a cat called Satin.

name: Victorian 2 bed in vibrant Leith
description: Beautiful 2 bed, second floor apartment in the heart of trendy Leith. 2 double bedrooms.Plenty of cool bars, cafes, shops, tourist spots & restaurants within easy walking distance. Great transport links across city and out of Edinburgh. Trams a short walk away. Small supermarket downstairs.

name: Spacious Flat in City Centre - Sleeps 3
description:
Instagram: @earlgreystreet
https://instagram.com/earlgreystreet

Located within Edinburgh's city centre, walk to all that Edinburgh has to offer including all major tourist destinations and public transport options including Edinburgh Waverley and Haymarket train station.

The home has one double bedroom with a spacious living area with kitchen including a dishwasher and washing machine.

Perfect for couples, families, business travellers and solo adventurers.

name: Luxury Penthouse Apartment, St. Andrews Square
description:
Luxury 2 bedroom Penthouse Apartment in the heart of Edinburgh City Centre, at St. Andrews Square, perfect for a romantic get-away.

The flat provides an abundance of natural light, open plan living and spectacular views over Carlton Hill & Arthur's Seat.

Located 50 meters from Waverley Train Station & St. Andrews Square Tram Station, with Harvey Nichols almost close enough to be neighbours, our flat is easily accessible and makes the perfect destination for city breaks or a weekend away.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 'A great place to stay'
description: This light, airy flat is an easy walk to the Christmas Market on Princes Street.

name: The Lane Apartment *FREE Private Parking Space*
description:
Our Apartment is not just a place to sleep and store your luggage. You can relax, stay in late or come in early and soak in the atmosphere of the place and the city. The only downside? You won't want to leave.

The Lane Apartment is located next door to The Lane Hotel and our famous Bar & Restaurant, The Canny Man's, here you can book lunch, dinner or drinks.

name: Stylish and Comfortable City Centre Apartment
description:
Presented by Juniper Rentals:

Stylishly renovated and well presented apartment, located in a prime city centre location just off the vibrant Leith Walk.

Our apartment is situated in a traditional Edinburgh Georgian building in a quiet residential area - but is only seconds from the vibrant Leith Walk and it's city centre amenities.

Located only a short walk from Waverley Train Station and the City Centre sights including The Castle, Royal Mile and Festival Venues.

name: Drylaw House, Grade A Listed Mansion near City Centre
description:
Gather for conversations by a fireplace in a room of grand proportions. Original character is preserved in the charming architectural details throughout this majestic mansion. Play billiards in a wood-paneled room and stroll acres of private gardens.

The main kitchen is often used by private chefs and has an extensive range of facilities to suit everyone. It has a four oven aga, as well as an electric fan oven, three fridges, freezer and two dishwashers.

We also have two gas BBQs for those lovely sunny days when you might want to eat al fresco.

And for those wanting to take a dip in the hot tub, we also provide separate towels, flip flops and towelling robes.

The house is yours for your entire stay, so enjoy it and make the most of the property and the gardens.

We welcome all guests on arrival and show them around the house and then return at the end of the visit for the check out and to receive feedback as to how we can continue

name: De listed. Apartment in the Famous Shore
description: This is my wee home. I travel widely so bookings of a few weeks really welcome. The second floor space is warm and reassuring, with the bedrooms facing the sun in the morning. As a designer/maker, the furnishings are enhanced by solid Cornish wood craft. Suitable for one or two guests in your own room. Note I will be in and out. Full use of kitchen

name: Cozy 2 bed flat
description: Enjoy our spacious and peaceful home for your stay in Edinburgh. Our two bedroom flat has the facilities to sleep 5 adults with separate bathroom, kitchen and living room. Five minute walk from Crammond beach and a short journey in to the city centre

name: Stylish city centre flat , clean and welcoming
description: Modern Front door flat in the capitals south side.Warm flat with a rear bedroom looking on to garden. More than enough space for your city adventure. Great bases close to bars,cafes, Parks and eatery's. Only a Ten minute walk to the city's old town and 15 to the New Town .  One minute walk from the city's largest park the meadows.

name: Comfortable Central West End Suite
description: My cosy apartment is conveniently located in the City Centre. Close to bus and tram routes linking the airport and within a short walk of Princes Street, Old Town & Conference Centre. The apartment is situated within a traditional sandstone tenement building opposite the birthplace of Sean Connery. The Grand Canal, trendy cafes and restaurants are on your doorstep. There are two supermarkets, a cinema and great selection of coffee shops a few minutes away.  Dedicated workspace & ergonomic chair.

name: Super stylish central apartment in vibrant area.
description: Situated in the heart of Edinburgh, the leafy area of Bruntsfield is a highly sought after area being only  a short walk into city centre and historical attractions including Edinburgh Castle. It boasts many restaurants, bars, cafes & fabulous shops. The apartment offers 2 double bedrooms one with en suite shower. It had a fully functional kitchen which is stocked with tea & coffee and other essentials. It also had a private sunny front garden.

name: Beautiful Old Town Flat Just Off The Royal Mile
description: This modernised city centre flat is based in the heart of the historic Old Town. Just off the Royal Mile, it's only a few minutes walk from Waverley train station and is perfect for accessing all of Edinburgh's top attractions, restaurants, shops and bars. As a fourth floor flat there are lovely views to Calton Hill, Salisbury Crags and Arthur's Seat. The flat has all the amenities any visitor could want including Superfast Broadband.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Updated Flat in Iconic 1860's Listed Building
description:
Escape to a newly converted apartment set in a historic space. Step back in time in this home featuring original repointed brick walls, boutique furnishings and decor, and a cosy balcony walkout.

This unique and charming apartment offers quirk, style and practicality. It consists of 1 bedroom with a king size bed, a well-equipped kitchen with a small dining area, a spacious living area and a complete bathroom with all the toilet amenities you would need for your stay.
There is a big sofa in the living room that can be converted to either one big sofa bed (240cm x 200cm) or up to three single sofa beds (80cm x 200cm) which gives the opportunity for 3 people to have a cozy, comfortable sleep.
4k UltraHD Smart TV will be at guests’ disposal so you can enjoy a movie night with your friends or just spend a lazy day watching your favourite show.

Guests will have the entire apartment to themselves.

My property management team and I will be available

name: ✔ Slateford Apartment ✔ Fast WiFi ✔ Free Parking ✔
description:
★★★★★ "Good proximity to the city centre. Very clean and well-presented apartment. Enjoyed with family"

"First Slateford House Luxury Apartment" offers:
✔ Free parking
✔ Walking distance to the city centre (~25 min)
✔ Frequent buses to the City Centre and a direct bus to the Airport
✔ Fully equipped kitchen
✔ Hotel quality beds/mattresses, bed linen and towels
✔ Children and wheelchair friendly
✔ Cot, high chair, hairdryer and iron provided
✔ Large Smart TV with YouTube and Netflix ❤️

name: Bright Dbl Room, Pvt Shower. Lift/Free pvt Parking
description:
Bright double bedroom and private shower room in modern second floor flat with lift and free private parking. Kitchen, dining and living area shared with host.
Central location (2 miles from City Centre) in a quiet cul de sac with open views only a few minutes walk from numerous bars, cafes and restaurants in the vibrant Leith area of Edinburgh.
Bus stop 2 mins walk with direct access to the city centre, University and Waverley Station.

name: Dog friendly and relaxed
description: Lovely flat easy commute 20 mins max to city centre, anything else please ask x

name: South facing double bedroom in the West End/Dean
description:
Hi and welcome,
to our home in the Dean /West End of Edinburgh situated in a very quite ,safe and secluded cul de sac.
The rooms for let are two double bedrooms both upstairs with a shared bathroom between them.
There is a TV and free wifi.
For breakfast there is coffee, tea, biscuits or croissants and a bottle of water by the bedside.
The bathroom is right next to the bedroom and is shared.
Garden is south facing and lovely to take your morning coffee in .
The rest of the house is private 😊

name: Elegant Modern 1BR Near Center, Trains - 5mn walk
description:
A quiet, sunny and convenient top floor penthouse apartment. Newly renovated - modern vintage, with a massive shower & heated bathroom floors with hardwood floors throughout the rest of the flat.

Located just 5 minutes walk from Haymarket Train Station and central to the vibrant Dalry restaurant scene. Very convenient to town - a short walk to the Castle or Meadows.

Comes with a large double bed in the bedroom and also includes a comfortable double sofa bed in the beautiful living room.

name: Contemporary Light Filled Apartment Close to the City Centre
description:
Walk home along the Union Canal and then kick back on the sofa after a day exploring Edinburgh. This bright flat boasts an open concept with a white palette enhanced with pops of bright colour. It benefits from underground parking.

The apartment is situated in a modern development in Shandon to the west of the City Centre.

Within the flat there is one bedroom with a king sized bed with high quality linens and plenty of wardrobe space. A spacious hall leads into a bright open plan living room/kitchen with a large sofa, coffee table, TV, and dining area. The kitchen comes fully equipped with an oven, hob, microwave, dishwasher, washing machine/dryer, nespresso coffee machine, kettle and toaster. The bathroom has a bath with overhead rainforest shower as well as a handheld shower head. Toiletries and towels are provided.

Within the development there is a shared garden and underground parking where you will have one allocated parking space with key fob. Th

name: 3-bedroom apartment near city centre - Bruntsfield
description:
Recently renovated 3 bedroom apartment near the city centre of Edinburgh.

My property retains much of its traditional Edinburgh tenement charm with modern twists.

All rooms in the apartment have beautiful views - the master bedroom overlooks Edinburgh and the Firth of Forth, and the lounge and twin bedrooms have beautiful views overlooking the green space of Bruntsfield Links.

My property is both a short bus journey or walking distance through Bruntsfield Links and the Meadows to the centre.

name: Luxury Georgian Townhouse in the City Centre
description: A beautiful four storey townhouse in the centre of the city. With five bedrooms and five bathrooms, a grand Georgian drawing room and large dining kitchen, this is the place to stay for your luxury Scottish City break.

name: Stylish Penthouse Suite
description:
This Stylish Penthouse Suite is an awe inspiring spacious apartment. Located close to Ocean Terminal! In the heart of the vibrant Newhaven/Leith community, with restaurants and bars a short walk away.
Excellent transport links meaning you are only 20 minutes from Edinburgh’s iconic Princess Street, Edinburgh castle, the Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace and the Scottish parliament.

name: Next Door to Arthur's Seat
description: This Victorian period tenement property is located in the centre of Edinburgh. It is right next to Arthur's Seat, Holyrood Palace, and the Royal Mile. There is a complimentary breakfast provided for each night booked. The property provides complete amenities and is only a 5 minute walk from the numerous food & retail establishments along the Royal Mile, as well as some of Edinburgh’s top attractions. To get around, guests can walk and use the 10 bus services available within 5 mins walk
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: ✔ Lasswade Road Villa ✔ Fast WiFi ✔ Free Parking ✔
description:
★★★★★ "Lukasz was a fantastic host. His place was perfect for our work in Edinburgh City Centre"

"First Lasswade Road Villa" offers:
✔ Multiple free parking spaces
✔ Private front and back garden
✔ Frequent buses to the city centre (every 10 minutes)
✔ Fully equipped kitchen
✔ Hotel quality beds/mattresses
✔ Quality bed linen and towels provided for all guests
✔ Children and wheelchair friendly
✔ Cot, high chair, hairdryer and iron provided
✔ Large Smart TV with YouTube and Netflix ❤️

name: Charming City Centre Flat with Warmth & Character
description:
Located in the heart of the city, my quirky apartment will be a great base for your stay in Edinburgh. It's found in a Victorian building dated 1888, on a quiet cul-de-sac street only 7 minutes walk from Holyrood Palace.
Recently renovated, the flat boasts some of its original features, such as 19th century floorboards, exposed brick walls and a woodburning stove. Decorated with a taste for vintage, it features a main bedroom, box room, open plan kitchen and living room and 1 bathroom.

name: King Bed En-Suite Master free parking close to sea
description:
Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in our en-suite master bedroom located in the tranquil northern part of Edinburgh
- En-Suite private bathroom, where you can unwind after a day of exploring
- King-Size Comfort, waking up to nature light streaming through French windows
- Free Residential Parking
- Direct airport bus to/from the house
- Close to bus stops for direct and frequent buses to/from City Centre
- Professional Cleaning, experience the immaculate cleaning

name: Double Bedroom+ Bunk Beds sleeps 4
description:
Well appointed, large house, brightly decorated. Ground floor with bedroom, private bathroom with shower, closet space and kitchen/dining room.

20 mins to town centre by bus, 15 mins from the airport by taxi, 5 mins to Murrayfield Stadium, 15 mins drive to Edinburgh Zoo.

Complementary cold and hot drinks .

The back gate open to Corstorphine Hill for good (dog) walking and deer spotting.

name: Casa Casey for ladies only
description:
Clean and modern relatively new town house 5mins to bus stop to city centre .Village of Davidson’s Mains and Silverknowes.Please note this is a room booking only with no use of the kitchen.
Please respect the check in and check out times for the comfort of other guests. There is no option of dropping off bags early or after check out. Please do not ask , there are no exceptions! There is bag drop off at both the train and bus stations

name: private Guest suite Free parking separate entrance
description: My airbnb is Quite, Spacious bright and close to city centre, with free parking on premises( On Driveway), access to private garden , wireless internet, tv freeview. Separate  huge living  area, separate bathroom, with separate entrance which is suitable for 3people. Quite and safe neighbourhood, close to portobello beach and foot of aurter seat and close to  city centre. 10 mintues to auther seat close to holylrood palace.

name: Logie Green -beautiful and central one bed flat
description:
Our place is located just outside the city centre in the Canonmills area. We are a 10 min walk from the royal botanical gardens, and 20 to Waverley train station.

The flat is recently updated including new kitchen. Our home is perfect for anyone looking for a home away from home with plenty of amenities close by.

Our place is perfect for solo adventurers or couples.

name: Bread street, Central and spacious one bed flat
description:
Our place is located very centrally. We are a 5-10 minute walk from the Edinburgh castle, Royal Mile and Princess street are a short walk away!

Our home is perfect for anyone looking for a home away from home with all the main Edinburgh attractions on your door step and plenty of amenities close by.

Our place is perfect for solo adventurers or couples.

name: Amazing apartment in the heart of Old Town
description: Spacious and very central apartment on Royal Mile, close to all tourists attractions, Edinburgh Castle, Parliaments, The Holyrood Palace, restaurants and cafes.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Hawkhill - Contemporary apartment w secure parking
description:
Bright and Modern Apartment with free secure underground parking. Set in a modern apartment complex only 30 minutes on foot from the city centre.

The apartment has recently been furnished so all equipment is brand new.

The apartment has 2 King size bedrooms, one with an ensuite bathroom, open plan kitchen/diner/living room and a master bathroom.

The Royal Mile, Princes Street, Grassmarket are all within half an hour of our apartment. There are also supermarkets close by.

name: Beautiful 2 Bed House, Corstorphine, Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to my bright spacious two-bedroom semi-detached house near the City Centre, 1.5 miles from Edinburgh Zoo and a 3 minute walk from a 24-hour Tesco Supermarket and Petrol Station. This beautiful house boasts extensive living space with French doors opening up to connect the kitchen, dining room, living room and garden. Recently refurbished, redecorated and re-carpeted this fully equipped house is an ideal stay for anyone looking for space.

Wi-Fi, Netflix and private driveway.

name: Broughton Place - 4 bedroom Georgian Townhouse
description:
A large traditional Georgian 4 bedroom Town House, located within the New Town area of Edinburgh. The property is a short walk from the city centre and easily accessible by public transport.

There are excellent amenities nearby including local shops, bars, restaurants and tourist attractions.

The property is a mix of a traditional and modern interior, with high ceilings, period features, double beds, comfy lounge, a well equipped kitchen and two recently modernised bathrooms.

name: Bright & spacious artistic central flat
description:
Spacious very central flat with all conveniences, perfectly located for sightseeing. Original 19th-century building with 4m ceilings on the first floor of the tenement building. Lively area with shops & restaurants. Close to festival venues, National museum, Royal mile, old city center, University area, the green Meadows, and the towering Arthur's Seat rock.
This is my property where I reside, so you will find a lot of personal items and decorations around the flat.

name: Luxurious 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment sleeps 5
description: Stunning two bedroom apartment,  living room, kitchen + bathroom, only a 10 min walk from princess street. Gorgeous Botanical Gardens on its door step this apartment is perfect for being in the hub of it all + at the same time enjoying the quietness of its 1st floor stand alone apartment. Parking - 6 spaces for public on a first come basis only.  wardens finish on a Friday at 5.30pm and start on Monday am at 8.30am. At weekends you can park on a single yellow line outside the apartment.

name: East Mayfield Residence-Stunning 2 Bed Apartment!
description: Situated in the bustling area of Newington, very close to Edinburgh city centre, this delightful flat has recently been decorated to the highest standard. It is on the first floor and consists of two substantial double bedrooms both with king size beds, an open plan living room/kitchen well kitted out and ample storage space. It is bright and double glazed throughout and the flat enjoys a wonderful ambiance where you can happily pass time when not out and about.

name: Spacious, chic, walk from main attractions!
description:
Entire apartment - 6 guests, 2 very spacious bedrooms, 1 double bed and an additional double bunk bed that sleeps upto 4 adults, 1 bathroom.
Property would ideally suit a large family that don't mind sharing bedrooms.

name: 2 bedroom Edinburgh apartment, 1 mile from Castle
description:
This bright and spacious 2 bedroom apartment sleeps 4 people.

It is located in Stockbridge, the premier area of Edinburgh with an array of top class cafe’s, restaurants, bars & pubs. It is within easy walking distance of Edinburgh city centre, Princes St, Edinburgh Castle, Royal Mile & Botanic Gardens.

There is a lovely bright kitchen/living/ dining area, 2 large bedrooms, modern bathroom, high ceilings & original fireplaces

To the rear of the property is a beautiful spacious communal garden

name: Edinburgh - room with a view. Superb location
description:
A beautiful room with bay windows and a wonderful view of Bruntsfield Links. Double sofa-bed, another huge sofa to lounge on, a desk for doing computer work if needed. The Fantastic location with very frequent buses into the centre. You can also enjoy a beautiful walk across the meadows and be in town in 25 minutes on foot. Excellent location for festival goers as lots of venues are within 10 -30 minute walk from the flat.
Plenty of cafes and restaurants in the area.

name: Poetic and elegant room in Edinburgh
description:
A beautiful bright spacious bedroom, and shared bathroom and kitchen could be available but only for longer stay guest. Also I have two kids and two cats that might be not ideal if you prefer quiet environment and dustless place. If you are looking for some fancy luxurious hotel like place definitely mine is NOT. It’s more homey, and I welcome all guests as my friends and family, so please ask me if you have any questions.
Also female guests preferred.

name: Gorgeous spacious room in leafy city centre area.
description:
A beautiful room in a traditional second floor flat in a Victorian tenement affording scenic views of Craig House on Craiglockhart Hill.

Located close to the city centre in a leafy area a short distance from visitor attractions. There are numerous amenities nearby and the city centre is easily accessible by foot along the Union Canal or by bus.

name: Luxury Boutique Apt in fashionable Stockbridge 5*
description: As featured in Homes & Interiors Scotland & House Beautiful, welcome to this boutique, stylish & comfortable 3 bedroom apartment. Located in the fashionable district of Comely Bank, close to Stockbridge. Furnished to the highest of standards & designed by Cathy Dean Interior Design. This apartment gives you the experience of a luxury hotel with the convenience of a self catering apartment. Can accommodate up to 6 people. Easily one of the best holiday lets in Edinburgh, a must stay!

name: Beautiful & Bright Apartment in Fabulous Location
description:
Beautiful, sunny and spacious third floor New Town apartment, extremely close to the centre of Edinburgh, but on a quiet no through street. The apartment has a lovely tranquil feel a great place to relax at the end of a busy day exploring the wonders of this fabulous city. The location is superb just off Broughton Street with all its independent shops, cafes, restaurants and only short walk to Princes Street.

Edinburgh awaits you from this perfect location and we look forward to hosting you.

name: Stunning Architect-Designed Home near King's Theatre
description:
Step into a sleek white and grey world with clean lines and floor-to-ceiling windows that maximise the natural light. High-end furnishings, dramatic flush mount lighting, underfloor heating, and a private urban courtyard all add to its upmarket feel.

This stunning house has one bedroom with king size bed, lounge with kitchen area, box bedroom. Double sofa bed in lounge. Bathroom with shower and private outside courtyard. Very close to city centre, within easy walking distance.

Text/whatsapp or phone and will respond

Stroll to the Castle, Royal Mile, and National Museum of Scotland. This unique home sits on a quiet road just minutes from King's Theatre and Princes Street. The Bruntsfield and Tollcross areas also offer wonderful shops, bars, and restaurants.

Gillespie House is situated not far from the main points of interest in the city so walking is a great option. Edinburgh has a fantastic bus service and the bus stop is 2 mins from the

name: Cal Cres -  2 bed close to Haymarket with pool
description: Superbly situated in the cosmopolitan area of Dalry and just a brisk 5-minute walk from Haymarket train station, the apartment is perfect for guests wanting a quiet yet central location for their visit to Edinburgh. With a swimming pool, sauna and attached gym, guests get the facilities of a hotel but the flexibility of an apartment - the best of both worlds!

name: Stunning Flat near St. Giles’ Cathedral
description:
✔ Gorgeous flat with classic design at the heart of the city
✔ 500 ft2 / 46 m2
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 4-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ Next to the famous St Giles cathedral
✔ 6-minute walk to Edinburgh Waverley
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
✔ Average (5–40 Mbps) WiFi Speed
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish and Spacious 2 bedroom Apartment in Leith
description:
A bright, stylish and spacious home with open plan living/kitchen area, two spacious bedrooms, two bathrooms, and access to shared garden.

The apartment is Located in the neighbourhood of Leith which contains excellent bars, restaurants and parks, and is within walking distance (lots of public transport too) from the city centre.

name: Beautiful, central, traditional Edinburgh flat.
description:
Beautiful, very central, traditional Edinburgh flat.
Amazing location. 2 minutes walk from the historic Old Town and Royal Mile, and just 10 minutes walk from Waverley Train Station......a wonderful base from which to enjoy all that Edinburgh has to offer.

name: Tudsbery House near Edinburgh Royal Infirmary - El
description:
Bright and well-presented, three-bedroom, terraced house. This contemporary and spacious house is set over three storeys and located 3miles east of Edinburgh city centre. The amenities and seafront of Portobello lie roughly a couple of miles from the property. The property is well placed for local shops, 2 Retail Parks within close vicinity and a Commonwealth Pool.

Ample unrestricted parking near the property.

name: The Peacock's house
description:
The Peacock house is a comfortable studio apartment designed for a single person or two adults. It's a self contained extension attached to the owner's house with its own main door in a quiet residential area over looking Arthur Seat. It’s a short walking distance to the lovely Prestonfield Hotel, a unique hotel with highland cows and peacocks , which you will hear in summer.
It’s walking distance to the centre and Arthur seat. JW discounts available too.

name: STYLISH APARTMENT WITH PRIVATE ROOF TERRACE
description: Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment in a central location within walking distance of shops and main attractions.  A bright and trendy first floor floor apartment on a leafy residential street.  The living area is spacious and furnished to a very high standard.  Double and single bedrooms with luxurious mattresses and bed linen.  Fully fitted kitchen and shower room.  Unique large roof terrace. This apartment is the perfect base for a holiday or business trip to the wonderful city of Edinburgh.

name: Double Room halfway Airport/City, Ensuite Bathroom
description: Furnished private Double Bedroom whit private Ensuite Bathroom, set in Edinburgh in a really quiet and friendly area, between Edinburgh Airport and City Centre.

name: Beautiful Kingsized Bedroom for Solo Guest
description:
Welcome to my peaceful and soulful home in the heart of Edinburgh – exclusively for one guest seeking calm, comfort, and inspiration during your stay in Edinburgh.

I’m an author and emotional wellness advocate, and the home reflects that spirit – calm, clean, cozy, and conscious.

You’ll enjoy a bright private bedroom in a charming period property, ideal for writers, creatives, or thoughtful travellers looking to rest, reflect, and recharge (- and who also love animals, as we have 4!)

name: Large excellent base to explore city - Sleeps  10
description:
Large traditional house in central Edinburgh.
Spacious and on two levels the house provides an excellent base to explore the city.
Ideal for large groups.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Double room, private bathroom, cozy home.
description:
Double room with a comfortable king-size bed and a private bathroom – you will stay in my cozy home.

My flat is on the 2nd floor of a newly built modern residential building with lift access, situated in a quiet neighborhood.

It offers easy access to the city center by bus, with a Morrisons supermarket just a 10-minute walk away.

License No.: EH-74077-F

name: Peaceful and convenient apartment ideally situated
description:
This apartment is positioned minutes from the hustle and bustle of Edinburgh city centre and the University but yet situated on a very peaceful and quiet tree-lined street next to vast Meadows park and close to Edinburgh's Holyrood park and Arthurs seat.

There are numerous supermarkets, cafes, pubs and transport options minutes from the door.

With generously sized rooms, the apartment is warm and comfortable and is a wonderful base to enjoy the city or visit the University.

name: Rose Street - A Charming Little Apartment
description: Located on the first floor (one flight of stairs up) of an original New Town building (built c.1780) within the very centre of Edinburgh, on Rose Street. This is a mainly commercial, pedestrianised street, which runs parallel to Princes Street and George Street.

name: Stylish Garden View Apartment
description:
This Stylish Garden View apartment is an awe inspiring spacious apartment. Located close to Ocean Terminal! In the heart of the vibrant Newhaven/Leith community, with restaurants and bars a short walk away.
Excellent transport links meaning you are only 20 minutes from Edinburgh’s iconic Princess Street, Edinburgh castle, the Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace and the Scottish parliament.

name: No. 4 Townhouse with amazing views.
description: Nestled in the centre of Scotlands prettiest Town, our unique townhouse dating from 1600’s sits on the High St in the coastal town of South Queensferry. The property has views of the magnificent Forth Rail Bridge.  All this within minutes of the local amenities, cafes, galleries, water sports, boat tours, historic homes and sandy beaches. Only 7 minutes walk to the train station and a 15 minute journey to Edinburgh, 40 minutes by bus and 15 minutes by car to the airport.

name: Beautiful, Sunny 2 Bed Flat on “The Shore” Leith
description: 42 Flat 6, Shore,  A lovely, bright hidden gem in the heart of the vibrant Shore area. Modern apartment, tastefully decorated with fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. 1st floor flat with carpeted stairwell. Flat is situated next door to Victor Hugo Restaurant and Malt and Hops Public House. A prime location for all the local bars and restaurants but set back from the street and to the rear of the building so a quiet space.

name: Spacious Flat in Central Edinburgh Location
description: PERFECT LOCATION - only short walking distance from the city centre, transport links & the Grassmarket area. Bright clean flat in ideal central location with The Meadows park, pubs & restaurants right on your doorstep.

name: Marys But n Ben
description:
Cosy loft conversion in bungalow, sharing front door with resident.
4 miles from the city centre with great transport amenities outside front door. Pub and cafe 2 minutes walk.
Comprising 2 double bedrooms sitting area/lounge, shower room and small kitchen with fridge, microwave and kettle.

People from all backgrounds are most welcome in my home.

name: Castle Vista Grassmarket (Old Town) Apartment
description: Castle Vista is a charming one-bedroom apartment located in one of the most vibrant and picturesque areas of Edinburgh – the Grassmarket! The apartment is just 5 minutes' walk away from the Edinburgh Castle and seems a great choice for travellers interested in history, art and shopping.  It is the ideal home away from home for guests who are looking to stay close to the best restaurants and the most traditional Scottish pubs, too!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: double room in city centre Edinburgh
description: Hi there 😊 a lovely room in city centre for rent , free off street parking ,The flat has internet, good heating system, very good kitchen with every thing you need , ( the room available with double bed and big wardrobe ) The area got some coffee shops and .meadow bank shopping park .iceland .sainsbury's. t. k. maxx. kfc. m&s. poundland. gala. Home store. Meadowbank sports centre and a lot of shops there , thank you so much

name: Edinburgh 2 bedroom Apartment near Ocean Terminal
description: Newly upgraded, modern 2 bedroom flat close to the vibrant Ocean Terminal centre with shops, restaurants and cinemas.  Quick public transport links to anywhere in the city and to/from the airport. New stylish furniture, a modern, newly installed well-equipped kitchen.  It's a very quiet location and flat, being on the 2nd (top) floor. Comfortable new beds, free wifi, modern bathroom with electric shower and bath. Free parking in our car park and in the street. Not suitable for young children.

name: En-Suite Room with Private  Balcony in Edinburgh
description: Enjoy a stylish stay in this bright and spacious en-suite room, part of a modern development, with its own private balcony perfect for morning coffee or sunset relaxation, ideal for solo travellers, couples on a city break, or business guests seeking comfort and convenience.

name: Art-Filled Bohemian Apartment Near Holyrood
description:
You will have the entire apartment to yourselves.

We live locally so can meet guests on arrival and be available for any questions or to provide information about local amenities.

The apartment is located in the Abbeyhill area of Edinburgh. It's a 10-minute walk to Holyrood Palace, a great selection of independent cafes, bars, bakeries, and good public transport to other parts of the city.

The apartment is exactly one mile from Waverley Train Station which is a lovely 15/20min walk or 5mins in a taxi ride.

Edinburgh Airport is located outwith the city, this is either a 30/40mins taxi ride (£20-25), or an airport bus or the tram and then a 15/20mins walk (or a second bus/taxi).

Please ask if you’d like more information for travelling and I’m happy to help!

name: A cosy attic bedroom  with private bathroom
description:
A private attic double bedroom on the top floor of upper villa. You will have your private bathroom. The room has a double bed.

You are welcome to use the livingroom and kitchen.

It is a 3 bedroom house where another 2 persons are living.

name: Cosy Place in Central Location
description: Welcome! My flat is on the first floor of a  traditional 19th century tenement building originally built for workers of the old McEwans Fountain brewery.

name: Double room with private en suite, north city
description:
You will enjoy a large bedroom with kingsize bed and the whole top floor of our modern decorated townhouse, located in a quiet residential area to north of city. Shops and cafes are accessible in surrounding areas by walking or a short bus ride. We are close to popular areas such as Stockbridge, Dean Villiage, botanic gardens and Leith. There is free parking out in the street. Hotel quality decor. You have private bathroom and your own balcony.
Max the dog will love to meet you!

EPC rating C

name: Gifford Park Apartment near Edinburgh University -
description: Set in the City ofEdinburgh, this cute two bedroom apartment has plenty to offer. Only a short walk from the popular Meadows and Holyrood park; the property is within 15 minutes walk of the City centre. There is great public transport links with nearby bus stops, and access to train station at Waverley.

name: Home by Edinburgh Castle
description:
This is our full time home. Quiet, romantic location in the Old Town. We travel often so house swapping and house sharing is possible too.

No smokers (not even occasional smokers) - we are very allergic
No pets
No children
Maximum 2 guests occupancy at all times
No parties, no extra guests, no parties
Smart TV only, no live TV

name: Stunning William Street Snug
description:
A beautiful apartment in a cobbled street right in the heart of Edinburgh. The property has 2 double bedrooms (which can be twin bedrooms if necessary) with an additional sofa bed in the lounge. There is a log burning stove in the lounge, perfect for cosy winter evenings , along with wifi access and cable tv. The kitchen is fully equipped and a welcome pack of groceries await guests.
The joy of the apartment is its centrality so guests have Edinburgh on their doorstep.

name: The Den
description: The Den is an area separated from the main house by a sliding door.  It has patio doors onto a small balcony providing its own ndependent access. Lovely garden.  The 'kitchen' is limited and is part of the laundry room.  It has a Meile oven, microwave, fridge, washing machine, kettle, toaster and sink but not really suitable for big cook ups. Many buses to city centre. Easy access to the hills, Water of Leith, East and West Loithian and the airport if travelling by car. There is free parking.

name: Montrose Terrace apartment
description:
Note: Extensive cleaning between guests.

Newly refurbished basement flat just 10 minutes walk to the East end of the city centre and 15 minutes walk to Waverley train station. New council regulations in July 2023 means there is now no free on street parking.

The property comprises of two bedrooms-one room with super king bed and one with double bed-, bathroom, lounge and kitchen.

Close to tourist attractions- Holyrood Palace, the Parliament and Royal Mile are around 5 minutes walk.

name: Lovely Guest Room in quiet and central location
description: Townhouse in central Edinburgh, Private Room with Private Bathroom. Beautiful location, situated on the Water of Leith and close to the Botanic Gardens. The 23/27/8 buses stop at the end of the road and take you to Princes Street/Waverley Station/The Royal Mile in 5 or 6 minutes. Many excellent cafés / bars / restaurants only a short walk away.

name: Cosy, large double room in a shared flat
description: Clean, Minimalist and Cosy double bed room located on the 1st floor close to the city centre (24 minute walk or 9 minutes by bus to city centre according to Maps), with plenty of space and lockable door

name: Allanfield
description: 10 minutes from city center & 5 minutes from bars, coffee shops, parks & many other amenities & attractions. Bright, spacious, modern and clean this flat has everything needed to make you right at home. A young, chilled professional couple, and a born local host on hand who is happy to help with anything you need to know. We are ground floor (smoke out front) with private parking and personal gym access @ no extra charge. Please contact for anymore detailed information.

name: Modern City Apartment
description:
We hope our 2nd floor flat ( no lift) provides you with the perfect base to explore Edinburgh and surrounding areas, visit family, work, play, relax or whatever brings you here.
The apartment is just off Leith Walk, within walking distance of Princes Street.

Entrance to the building is through the coded side gate which adds another level of security to the building,entrance to the garage is with a fob with space for one car.

Strictly no more than 4 guests!

name: Edinburgh Festival Room
description:
Lovely double room within a shared property in Corstorphine. Perfect to commute for The Edinburgh Festival/fringe.
The room has a super comfortable double bed, dresser &built in storage.
There is a shared bathroom with bath and separate shower.
Access to kitchen. Bright spacious apartment. Clean. Pet free. Smoke free home.
15mins from Princes Street.
Tea and coffee making facilities.
Corstorphine has great links to the airport as well as bars and restaurants.

name: Lovely Clean Flat*Great Location*Walk Everywhere*
description: Clean, bright and spacious flat with new furnishings and warm decor throughout. Well equipped kitchen, comfortable double beds, cozy living space with TV. It boasts a secure well lit central stair only one flight up. With WiFi and an amazing central location, this great accommodation has everything you need for a wonderful stay in Edinburgh.

name: Royal Mile Studio Flat *Castle Views*
description: This flat is amazing on location alone if you want to be in the heart of Edinburgh. Located on the Royal Mile it is a beautiful,  authentic old Edinburgh building, only a stones throw from the castle, with amazing views. It also boasts many periods features, including a unique original stone wall and a lovely log burner.  *Please note this is a top floor flat.*
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy & Colourful Tenement flat (close to Centre)
description:
Nestled in the charming residential area of Polwarth, this vibrant and characterful second-floor flat offers everything you need for a comfortable stay 🏡🎨🌟

🚍 Bus stops nearby can take you anywhere in the city, with the city centre just 15 minutes away.

🌿 Enjoy a quiet location while still being within walking distance of the city centre.

Whether you’re here for sightseeing, work, or a relaxing getaway, this cozy flat is the perfect home base for your Edinburgh adventure! 🏰☕

name: West Bow - Magical Harry Potter-inspired flat!
description:
Welcome to the Wizarding Residence, set on The West Bow which was J K Rowlings Inspiration for Diagon Alley and has had some real wizards live there too!

The apartment is right on The Grassmarket which is in the heart of Edinburghs Old Town and the City Centre.

You can walk to Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile, Princes Street and so much more in a matter of minutes.

There are local conveniences and supermarkets all within walking distance as well as bus links to the Airport and Train Sta
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Ace City Centre Apart, 8 minutes from Royal Mile
description: Only 5 minutes walk from the Royal Mile, my flat is within walking distance of all that the Old Town offers, and perfect for the festival fringe and Hogmanay. Until very recently this was my home, so no corners were cut trying to make it nice; I'm very proud of my excellent reviews. This is a stylish and spacious one bed, ground floor flat that has all the amenities you need and is  a few minutes walk from everything! There is also free parking available outside, albeit on an unallocated basis

name: Bright, Sophisticated Gem in the Heart of Edinburgh
description: Boasting smart, mid-century furnishings, vibrant artworks, and stylish hardwood floors, this glowing apartment has a refined, yet modern aura. Cook meals in a spacious kitchen with industrial-chic touches and dine at a warm farmhouse-style table.

name: Home sweet home - 2 bedroom flat near Murrayfield
description:
