Welcome to our 2 bedroom flat which we proudly call it our home for 5 years!

Within 5 minutes walking distance to the nearest tram stop and free on street parking, it would be a perfect base for you to explore beautiful Edinburgh (less than 30 minutes tram journey to airport, and 10 minutes to city centre).

Murrayfield stadium is 10 minutes walk away, and a golf course is at our doorstep. Edinburgh Zoo is 15 minutes walk, you can even hear the lions roaring in the early evenings!

name: Lovely room in beautiful Edinburgh home
description:
A beautiful room in a clean and bright flat with, bathroom, kitchen and living room, affording scenic views in a leafy suburb.

It is in a particularly nice area with public gardens, a scenic canal and school all within 2 minutes walk.

It is within walking distance (1.5 miles southwest) from visitor attractions. Numerous amenities nearby and the city centre is easily accessible by foot along the Union Canal or by bus or Uber/taxi.

name: Fantastic One Bedroom Apartment - West End
description: This lovely one bedroom home is perfect for those wishing to escape to Edinburgh and explore the capital's main attractions. Situated in the heart of the West End in Edinburgh's vibrant New Town, the property features a king sized bedroom, a modern open plan living area with SMEG amenities, and a large Smart TV. There is also a modern shower room with a large walk in shower. Perfect for couples, friends and business-travellers alike!

name: Main Door 1 Bed Flat 100m Portobello beach parking
description:
Lovely modern main door flat with a double bedroom, wooden floors, cosy lounge with a piano for guests to use!

Perfect location for exploring Edinburgh and the surrounding areas. Situated 100m from Portobello beach, you can enjoy a town atmosphere with excellent bus links to the city centre.

Portobello has several bars, coffee shops and independent retailers.

name: Beautiful, bright 2 bed in West End
description: Bright, inviting apartment that has been beautifully restored and upgraded throughout.  Our apartment is right next to the West End of the city with its amazing collection of stores, cafes and restaurants and minutes from Haymarket train statin and the Airport tram.

name: Stylish Central City Apartment
description: The flat is located in an old 18th Century tenement just off vibrant Broughton Street. The flat is Victorian and full of character with high ceilings, original cornices, redwood floors and white shutters this refurbished gem is the perfect base. Enjoy living like a local in this historical space.

name: Beautiful private room; King Size Bed in Edinburgh
description:
Beautiful private room with King Size Bed
This is a double bedroom in Edinburgh. It has a comfortable King Size Bed and Shared Kitchen and Bathroom. Our place is just couple of minute walk from the bus stop. You get direct bus to Princess street/ all attractions and university. It is warm, cosy and clean.
You can get direct Airport Bus from few min walk from flat.
We have 24 hours Asda Supermarket and a Sainsburys in few min walk as well. Private Car Park and high-speed broadband included.

name: *Elegant House in a Quiet Area | 2 Parking Spaces*
description:
Relax and unwind after a busy day of exploring Scotland's capital city in our tranquil yet centrally located home away from home!

* Spacious 3 bedroom house
* Private front door parking for 2 vehicles & 7kw EV charger☆
* City center 25 mins walk away
* Fully equipped kitchen + breakfast bar, coffee machine & coffee grinder
* Near Royal Botanic Gardens + convenient transportation links* Private garden
* Lounge with projector screen, hi-speed WiFi, home cinema, piano

☆ please request in advance

name: Stunning Tollcross Apartment
description:
This is a stunning newly renovated 2 bedroom property right next to the King Theatre in a vibrant central part of Edinburgh.
This beautiful 2 bedroom property is ideal for families and couples alike.
This stunning Victorian apartment is fully equipped with modern conveniences - whilst maintaining period feature such as high ceilings and original cornices - giving it all modern conveniences in a surrounding of elegant comfort.

name: Woodland retreat in Edinburgh.
description:
Lovely, light and bright ground floor flat. The flat backs on to a wood and is very peaceful. It’s a lovely residential area .
I live in the flat and do home share . There are 2 bedrooms in the flat, my bedroom and one bedroom for guests .
I have been approved and have a licence from Edinburgh Council to do Airbnb home share .

name: The Quartermile Meadows View Residence
description:
Enjoy a slice of the high life, at The Quartermile Residence No. 2. Sleeping up to two guests in style, this beautifully presented one bedroom apartment is located in the uber-cool Quartermile area – right on the edge of the Old Town, home to Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile. With sleek, thoughtful decor throughout, and all the mod cons the discerning traveller could ask for, we guarantee you’ll be the envy of your friends after a visit to The Quartermile Residence No. 2.

Bathed in light,

name: Tron Square [419]
description: This lovely second floor, two bedroom apartment is located in a quiet square only a minutes’ walk from the Cow Gate and the Royal Mile in the heart of Edinburgh’s Historic Old Town close to many of Edinburgh’s most visited tourist attractions and the bustling centre of the Edinburgh Fringe. The attractive second floor apartment has been recently redecorated and furnished and makes a perfect base for visitors to Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Large room (could sleep 3) in Edinburgh seaside
description:
Our place is close to Portobello Beach and only 15-20 min to city centre.You’ll love our house because of log fires in the winter and relaxing in the garden during the summer. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families .
We live in a large detached Victorian house in a quiet street. We are offering a bright, clean room in our 5 bedroom home with a bathroom. We have our own bathroom, your bathroom will be private at quiet times and shared at busy times!

name: Spacious 2-bed Apt next to Royal Mile & Waverley
description:
✔ Gorgeous flat, ideally located in the old town
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all the necessary appliances
✔ 2-minute walk to Royal Mile
✔ 6-minute walk to The National Museum of Scotland
✔ 11-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 6-minute walk to Edinburgh Waverley train station
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Two beautiful rooms in great area
description:
Two self contained rooms with beds and dining areas. Ideal for a family or group. The large room can be used as an exclusive shared space for the group. Bathroom exclusive to group. Flat is shared with myself the host. Breakfast is included.

Located 1.5 miles southwest of the city centre in a leafy area a short distance from visitor attractions. There are numerous amenities nearby and the city centre is easily accessible by foot along the Union Canal or by bus.

Free street parking.

name: Comfy 2 bed overlooking Grassmarket
description:
This centrally located 2 bed apartment is on the second floor and in the very heart of the lively Grassmarket area. Located at the bottom of the world famous Victoria Street (supposedly the inspiration for Diagon Alley in the Harry Potter series of books), you are a stone's throw from the castle, dozens of bars and restaurants.
Be aware, though, entry to the apartment is a two-story winding staircase that some people might find a bit difficult to climb
The front bedroom might a bit noisy at
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh roomy flat
description: Nice fully furnished flat in newtown ​

name: Bright, spacious Edinburgh City Centre Apartment
description: Welcome to our bright and spacious Edinburgh home where you will feel comfortably at home and experience the city like a local.

name: Nice double room near Meadows
description: This is my 3 bedroom flat and I live there all the time and let out two other rooms. The kitchen is like a living room and has a very comfortable sofa and a nice old table by the window. All my guests are encouraged to make themselves at home and fully use ALL the kitchen facilities (cooking, storing, etc).  The bathroom is also shared obviously.

name: City centre, old town Aprtm. Stunning Castle view
description:
This lovely Edinburgh Old Town 1 bedroom apartment on the 1st floor is situated in a most central and popular location, which offers a host of cosmopolitan bars, restaurants, cafes etc. Fully equipped kitchen. Safety access to the building by code. Perfect view to the Castle. Grassmarket is a very popular area in the heart of Edinburgh with market stalls every Saturday.

The apartment is on the 1st floor, accessible via stairs. Late check-in is available.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Haymarket / Murrayfield Beautiful City Apartment
description:
Beautifully situated opposite Murrayfield Stadium which is the home ground for the Scotland National Rugby team.
Princess street Edinburgh’s main shopping district 15 mins walk through the picturesque west end.
10 min walk to Haymarket Train Station
Recently Refurbished to a high standard and modern decor
Would suit families, couples, friends.
Traditional Edinburgh Style Tenement Building, situated on the first floor.
Local Amenities on Doorstep as well as tram and bus stops to travel the city

name: Studio Apartment in Leith
description: Beautiful and cosy vintage flat in the vibrant Easter Road and Leith area, Edinburgh's creative centre. Positioned on the second-floor, with large, bright windows and views over tree-lined Montgomery street. Light and airy, with plenty of period features and welcoming touches. Very well situated, only a 20 minute walk from Waverley Train station, 15 minutes from Princes street (main shopping area) and 25 minutes from the Shore. Surrounded by lots of great bars, cafes and restaurants.

name: Arthouse by the Sea - Portobello, Edinburgh
description: Light, art-filled guest suite with its own entrance,  2 minutes from the beach and 25 minutes by bus to the centre of Edinburgh. At the quiet end of Portobello beach, we're also handy for  the less-frequented Musselburgh beach, full of birdlife, as well as  Portobello High Street with its gallery, independent shops and beachside restaurants. We're also convenient for the A1, Edinburgh bypass and the airport.

name: Comfortable double room in north Edinburgh
description:
The room is a large double, in a spacious, comfortable house.

Free breakfast with booking. All the finest toasts, cereals and teas / coffee.

It's really easy to get to from the city centre (15 minutes) or the airport via bus no. 17.

We're just 5 minute drive from the coast and some great walks by the sea. Murrayfield is also just a 30 minute walk awaaay

We're available to give you all the information you need, but otherwise will leave you to enjoy your break / holiday.

name: City Centre Attic Flat
description:
Enjoy the central location and easy accessibility to public transit from this stylish, top floor attic studio. The top floor attic room is well equipped, for solo travellers and couples.
Princess Street within 2-min walk.
Castle Street is in the very centre of Edinburgh close to all the major attractions and offers a great range of shops, restaurants and nightlife. There is always something to do and you will not have to travel far for entertainment.

name: Large Central Rm (1 of 4 rooms/shared facilities
description: Large, bright space with 2 double beds and sofas. With the use of two shared bathrooms, kitchen, dining and garden room.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Central Double (1 of 4 rooms/shared facilities)
description: Cosy double room with use of shared bathroom
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Dundas Castle Boathouse
description: The Boathouse is a charming self-catering cottage situated on the bank of the loch, within the picturesque Dundas Estate. This delightful property has an open plan bedroom and living area, extending to the veranda, which boasts breathtaking views across the loch, shared only with neighbouring ducks, swans and geese. Undeniably romantic, the Boathouse exudes a sense of tranquillity and peace, making it the most perfect place to relax and unwind.

name: Old Town West Port Apartment
description: Castle view very centrally located bright 1 Bedroom Apartment on the 1st floor in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Grassmarket. Walking distance to the Castle, the Royal Mile, National Museum, National Gallery, Princes Street as well as excellent cafes, bars and restaurants. Murrayfield Stadium easily accessible by tram or bus. Free wi-fi is available. Bed linen & towels included. Flexible check in/out times. Excellent reviews, perfect location for exploring the city.

name: Beautiful double room in city centre with views
description:
A beautiful bedroom in a clean & bright traditional second floor flat in a Victorian tenement. You have access to kitchen, hallway and utility room. There are views of the city looking northwards.

Located close to the city centre in a leafy area, a short distance from visitor attractions. There are numerous amenities nearby and the city centre is easily accessible by foot along the Union Canal or by bus.

name: Stylish Double Room Close to City Centre
description: Comely Bank is situated a short stroll away from the heart of Stockbridge with its excellent range of local speciality shops, cafes, restaurants and bars. The West End and City Centre are equally accessible by foot. The Royal Botanic Gardens, walkways, cycle paths, Inverleith Park, and sports and health clubs are also right next door. Good road links provide access to the airport, Glasgow and FIFE. Haymarket train station and an Airport shuttle bus make commuting further afield quick and simple.

name: Crags View Apartment on the Royal Mile
description: The apartment is located right on the historic Royal Mile, with the castle only a short walk away and the parliament being even closer. It has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and can sleep 6. Comes fully equipped with free WIFI, linens and towels. You really cant beat the location here and you'll never be short of something to do.

name: New flat in Edinburgh Royal Mile
description: Right in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, why not spending your holidays at the awarded building by Richard Murphy Architects?
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful Grand City Centre Apartment
description: Grand Georgian Apartment in the centre of Edinburgh. This is a bright and spacious listed world heritage apartment from the 1840's with grand high ceilings and lots of natural sunlight! Located just off Edinburgh's main shopping street, Princes Street, it's ideal for exploring Scotland's vibrant capital city. The apartment is kept to the highest standard with a fully equipped kitchen, SMART TV and SONOS sound system.

name: Lasswade road
description: Beautiful two bedroom, one bathroom semi- detached house with garden space in a quiet residential area. Bedrooms, bathroom and kitchen have all recently been refurbished to a high standard and contains all you need to have a comfortable stay and a "home away from home" experience.

name: Traditional Cosy Stockbridge Flat
description: A traditional second floor flat (UK)/third floor (USA) in the centre of Stockbridge, one of  the most popular areas of Edinburgh with a ‘village’ vibe.

name: * Cosy & Central Private Room *
description:
Traditional Scottish city home located opposite Haymarket train station where buses, trams and taxi's stop if you are arriving via train or from the airport.

Everything is within walking distance - you couldn’t hope for a more central location. The bedroom is cosy with a double bed and a desk to study our travel guides! The flat is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

name: Large Very Central apt - York Place
description: A great opportunity to stay in the heart of Edinburgh's historic new town, city centre . This large comfortable Georgian flat, dates to the late 1700s. On the 2nd floor (US 3rd floor),  it has tall elegant ceilings, large windows, great views across the Forth and is ideal for exploring the city centre with the Old Town is just minutes away: 150 metres from the tram stop in St Andrews Square. Then walk down to York Place on your left . It is 5-10 mins walk from Waverley Station. Super fast wifi.

name: Stylish Edinburgh Apartment in Boho Neighbourhood
description:
Stroll back from exploring centuries of history in Central Edinburgh to a refurbished flat with every modern convenience. Refresh under a rain shower or soak in a warm bath. Sink into living room couches to share stories and fall sleep in comfy beds.

Our apartment benefits from a fully equipped kitchen (with table and chairs, washing machine, dishwasher, fridge freezer, cooker, induction hob, microwave, all the cooking utensils you will need and even the kitchen sink!). A family bathroom with bath and shower over, an additional ensuite shower room in the master bedroom and a further two bedrooms. There is also a separate living room with two sofas (one which is an all-day sofa bed), dining table and chairs, TV and coffee table. The apartment has also been stylishly furnished to make for a comfortable, relaxing and enjoyable stay. For families with small children we have one 'Baby Bjorn' travel cot with sheets for the mattress.

Prior to arrival you will be given a

name: Grassmarket Apartment: Edinburgh Castle View
description:
A charming apartment in the heart of the Old Town, nestled between the lively Grassmarket and iconic Edinburgh Castle with the Royal Mile just moments away.

Complete with fully equipped kitchen, double bedroom, bathroom with shower over bath and living room where you take relax in front of the tv, the apartment is the perfect base from which to explore the city.

The city's transport links are also within easy reach.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: ★Stunning Studio Apartment with Castle Views!★
description:
A charming studio apartment in the heart of the Old Town, nestled between the lively Grassmarket and iconic Edinburgh Castle with the Royal Mile just moments away.

Complete with fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with walk-in shower, and bedroom/living room with a double bed, the apartment is the perfect base from which to explore the city.

The apartment sleeps 2 people. The city's transport links are also within easy reach.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bijou by the Bridges, Stunning Seaside Apartment
description: Stunning harbourside apartment in the beautiful historic borough of South Queensferry just outside Edinburgh and overlooking the world famous Forth Bridges. Main door flat on the quayside of the old harbour in the town centre. Newly restored and furnished to a very high standard, suitable for families and couples. Ideal base for visits to Edinburgh, Linlithgow, the East Neuk of Fife and St Andrews and easy access to Perthshire, the Trossachs and the Road to the Highlands.

name: * Spacious Private Room *
description:
Traditional Scottish city home located directly opposite from Haymarket train station where buses, trams and taxi's stop if you are arriving via train or from the airport.

Everything is walking distance - you couldn’t hope for a more central location. The bedroom is cosy with a double bed and desk to study our travel guides! The flat is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

name: Large & Central Flat * Haymarket Apartment
description:
PLEASE NOTE - I do not accept bookings from party groups, hens or stags. Please don't book if this describes your group sorry.



Traditional Scottish city home located directly opposite from Haymarket train station where buses, trams and taxi's stop if you are arriving via train or from the airport.

Everything is walking distance - you couldn’t hope for a more central location. The flat is great for families, groups or friends and business travellers.

name: Sunny Meadows apartment
description:
My sunny spacious apartment overlooking the Meadows park in Edinburgh. Triple aspect with tree views from every window. This place, refurbished by a local artist, combines old and modern styles perfectly, making for a unique experience.

The apartment is on the first floor, with the wooden floors, wood burning stove and open views across the Meadows, it has the feel of a cottage in the city.

name: Short stay Double room to rent
Edinburgh City Centre 2Bedroom Close to Castle&Uni
description: Cosy up in the spacious Victorian ground floor 2 bedroom flat in Edinburgh city centre. With its own main door entrance in a quiet street close to  Edinburgh Castle&University, the flat is within 15mins  walking distance to major Edinburgh attractions (Royal Mile/ Edinburgh Castle/Usher Hall/Princes street/National Museum). Original features combined with modern appliances like double glazed window, central heating, High Speed Fibre WiFi,  cable TV and Netflix  will suite businss or family trip.

name: The Great King Street Residence
description: This stunning ground floor, main door flat sits in the very heart of Edinburgh's famous New Town and represents one of the most enviable addresses in Edinburgh. This traditional Georgian home has been completely renovated and no detail is left to chance. With two large double bedrooms, (one en suite) and a twin, the apartment can cater for family or friends travelling together. A truly beautiful apartment. It is not Suitable for groups of students.

name: Spacious & Unique city central 1 bed  with WiFi
description: Welcome to this sunny and comfortable city centre 1 bedroom apartment. Thoughtfully maintained and presented throughout. Located in a city central location, Nearby the Grassmarket, financial area and conference centre. Within walking distance of Princess Street and Haymarket train station with great bus links across the city. Making this holiday let a very easy destination. Nearby lots of restaurants and cafes and even a cinema. Peaceful apartment yet a short walk from the Grassmarket and old to

name: Waterfront Apartment, views over Water of Leith
description:
Located in the trendy Leith Shore area, my property is surrounded by award-winning restaurants, bars cafes! A foodies heaven.

The apartment sleeps up to 6 people between 2 bedrooms (one double, one with 2 single beds and a further sofa bed in the living room). There is a small private balcony overlooking The Water of Leith.

Free parking right outside our complex and 2 minutes walk to the bus stop for local transport.

name: ✔ Sighthill Villa ✔ Fast WiFi ✔ Free Parking ✔
description:
★★★★★ "Had a wonderful time. Enough space. Lovely place to stay, close to shops and places to see. Will definitely come back for another holiday"

"Sighthill Lower Villa" offers:
✔ Multiple free parking spaces

name: Ideal for airport. Twin room in beautiful wee town
description:
-Free Wifi and 5G coverage -

Convenient for AIRPORT.

name: Family or friends 2 cosy bedrooms for 4 people
Walk to Holyrood Palace from a Stunning Apartment
description: Open the curtains and gaze across the roofs of Edinburgh from this traditional Victorian tenement. It’s been immaculately refurbished, while retaining many Victorian features such as ornate coving, large windows, and Victorian fireplaces.

name: Francesca ‘s perfect for 3 people
description: Lovely ground floor 2 bedrooms flat near Edinburgh city centre, Portobello beach and Arthur's Seat. There are shops close to the flat, in 10 minutes you can find Morrisons and Meadowbank shopping centre, where also there is  Sainsbury's, Marks & Spencer, Poundland, TK Maxx and so on. The buses 25,19,49 are frequently every 10 minutes to the city centre and its a 2 minutes from the flat, so you can get to the centre very easy. There is also free parking on the street if you are coming by car.

name: Lovely, cosy, bright flat for autumn and winter!
description:
DISCOUNTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR LONGER STAYS.
I am also open to lowering the price of single nights in the winter months. Please message me if you are interested.

Cosy place for your visit to magical Edinburgh in winter!

'Clean, warm and beautiful place in very good location'

'Olga's flat is beautiful. Stylish and very comfortable, spotlessly clean. Olga was very helpful and communication was excellent. I would highly recommend.'

I warmly invite you to my lovely place :)

name: West End City Centre by Edinburgh City Apartments
description: Modern 1 bedroom main door apartment, ideal for visiting Fringe Festival, Edinburgh Military Tattoo and the majority of Edinburgh's City Centre attractions which are all within walking distance.

name: Fantastic 1 Bed in Heart of Edinburgh
description: This sleek and trendy main-door flat offers modern comfort and style in the heart of ancient Edinburgh- enjoy the best of both worlds! Refurbished to an extremely high standard only ten months ago, the property was once a small shop, and retains a unique floor-plan as a result. The property enjoys an incredible location, nestled between Bruntsfield and Fountainpark- with a plethora of excellent eateries, bars and boutiques in the area. Meanwhile, a 15 minute walk will take you to Lothian Road!

name: Homely City Stay with Parking, Edinburgh
description: Welcome to your cosy Edinburgh retreat! This charming home sleeps up to 4 guests and comes fully equipped with everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay. Ideal for friends, families, or business travellers, this peaceful home offers a perfect balance between city adventure and tranquil relaxation. You’ll be within easy walking distance of iconic attractions like Arthur’s Seat and Holyrood House & Park, putting the best of Edinburgh right at your doorstep. Book now to begin...

name: Classic Edinburgh Flat Close to City Centre!
description:
Welcome to our beautiful Edinburgh apartment where you will feel comfortably at home and experience the city like a local.


All bookings after the 1st of October 2023 are subject to licensing and planning permission as per guidance on AirBnB.

name: Penthouse upgrade: double room for a single person
description:
Our modern penthouse flat in north Edinburgh has scenic views over the city. We are a stone's throw away from the tranquil sea & the city is only 3.5 miles away, 20-30min on the bus.

Stay in our cosy double room with a comfortable bed with shared guest bathroom. Free parking+lift available.

* Within 20 min proximity to airport by cab (£18-20) and the new Skylink 200 bus takes 30min ( £7.50 return).

* Morrison's supermarket, petrol station and Pure Gym is only 6 min away.

name: Lovely Liberton Family Home
description:
Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place.
Two double bedrooms (1xKing, 1xSmall Double).
Suitable for friends or family as bathroom is shared between two bedrooms.
Host allows - cooking & washing, and use of living room areas on request.
Smoke free home, with 2x Small Dogs 🐕
Parking available and on 4 main bus routes

Females preferred

name: Stylish Sunny 2 Bed Flat in Centre with Parking
description:
*This flat is only available to book via the Air bnb website or Air bnb app *

Bright, sunny, modern new build flat situated in the heart of Edinburgh, ten minutes from Princes Street, George Street and Queen Street. Five minutes from the new St James Quarter!

Secure private parking for one car available. The playhouse, shops, restaurants and bars all on the doorstep with Waverley station just a 10 minute walk away. There is also a lift inside.

name: Bliss...   Spacious Room in Safe Edinburgh Area
description:
The room is spacious with single fourposter bed double wardrobe desk and chair. adjustable heating inside room, very warm. Side table with lamp, 5 pendant crystal gold ceiling light gives excellent light. Blackout blind helps protect from morning sunshine and privacy from adjacent neighbours
Supermarket, fish and chip shop , Chinese , Indian takeaway, pharmacy and pub within 1/4 mile. Variety of takeaways. Bus and train can take you to city centre in 1/2 hour

name: Wake Up Minutes from the Castle in This Authentic Flat
description:
The apartment is right on the historic Royal Mile with excellent restaurants and shops around you in every direction.

It is a 5m walk from the central Edinburgh Waverley train station, where trains, as well as the airport bus stop.

You are also a 5m walk from the Edinburgh Castle at the top of the Royal Mile or the excellent Princes Street and National Galleries.

You really couldn't be more central than this!

All parts of the apartment are free for you to use.

You'll have the whole place to yourself for the duration of the stay!

I'm never more than a message or phone call away should you need anything.

In the heart of historic Edinburgh, it's walking distance to the city's train and bus stations, most Festival venues, and popular sites like Edinburgh Castle and Arthur's Seat. Restaurants, bars, and all the city has to offer are on the doorstep.

You can take the tram or the bus from the airport, both
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Gorgeous Views from an Elegant Apartment in Bruntsfield
description:
The flat is on the second floor and consists of two large bedrooms, an open plan living room and kitchen. Freestanding bath in master bedroom and family bathroom with shower.
It’s a bright sunny apartment with good quality furnishings, original artwork and thoughtfully decorated making it a comfortable home.
Cot, high chair are available upon request

The apartment is situated in the trendy neighborhood of Bruntsfield, a buzzing cultural hub that’s brimming with exciting eateries and shops.

name: West End Gem
description: The flat is situated on a quiet and pretty street in Edinburgh’s fashionable West End. Local shops, gastro bars and restaurants are all close at hand. Within easy walking distance of the city's sights, as well as Haymarket and Waverley Stations.  There is plenty of public transport, including a tram stop (west end)around the corner for direct and easy access from and to the airport and events at Murrayfield Stadium.

name: Superb Spittal St Apartment. Genuine City Centre
description: Superb second floor apartment located at the foot of the Castle. The famous Grassmarket is only a 5 minute away as well as the bus and tram connection to the airport.

name: Entire rental unit City center old town Edinburgh
description:
Fabulous location in city centre. Well maintained studio. In a stair with other flats and neighbours so you should expect a some noise. If you are a sleep monster this unit is not for you.Please note: the shower pump is switched on/off under the bathroom sink. YOU MUST USE IT when showering.
As there is no handrail on the stair to the basement this unit is not suitable for elderly, infirm or prams.
Please note-This unit has ONE double bed and is 2 people max sharing the one double bed.
EPC - E

name: Single room easy access to city Centre
description:
Single room available in a shared house

You’ll be sharing with a young couple (hosts)

The room is cozy and warm, with wardrobe, mirror, desk chair and all amenities

Shared bathroom and kitchen

Heating and hot water

Easy access and transport within the city Centre (25 min by bus) and the Airport (30 min by bus)
Also the is a night bus (16)

Supermarkets Morrison and Lidl
Pure gym

Free parking on the street

name: Fantastic Bread St Apartment. City Centre Sleeps 5
description:
This beautiful Edinburgh apartment is located on Bread Street, perfectly surrounded by a vast range of shops, cafes, Edinburgh pubs for an authentic Scottish experience, and an eclectic selection of restaurants. Located on the first floor of its historic building, it’s ideal for most guests.
Refurbished to a high standard, this apartment is large and spacious. With its central location, it is the perfect home-from-home from which to explore the city and nearby attractions.

name: Amazing Castle View Apartment. Very Central
description: Situated on the top floor, this 80 sq. mt city centre apartment offers fantastic panoramic views of Edinburgh Castle. The Grassmarket below boasts a variety of shops, cafes, authentic Edinburgh pubs and quality dining restaurants – you need not look far for something to do.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright spacious king room in New Town
description:
Bright, spacious, king-sized room with high ceilings and triple glazing in a traditional tenement building.

3-minute walk: Cosy pubs with live music, supermarkets, coffee shops and bus links to the town centre.

15-minute walk: Botanical Gardens (free entry), and vibrant areas Stockbridge, Broughton Street and Leith Walk packed with unique shops, bakeries, wine bars, cafés and restaurants.

20-minute bus: Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, St James Quarter shopping centre, Waverley train station.

name: Bruntsfield sunny room with private bathroom
description: A lovely room in a period house, situated in Bruntsfield. Within a short walking distance to Murrayfield Stadium. Also an abundance of great local shops are within a few minutes walk. There are also lots of great cafés and restaurants close by. The city is just 20 minutes walk.

name: Detached Cottage near Airport, RBS and Motorways
description:
DELIGHTFUL SELF CATERING HOLIDAY HOME
Beautiful presented and spacious 4 bed cottage with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, sleeping between 6 and 8 guests with free private parking.
Within walking distance of Edinburgh Airport and Ingilston park and ride, catch the bus or tram into the city centre to discover Edinburgh and it's natural beauty. Also close links to the Edinburgh City Bypass and M8 and M9 to discover edinburgh and beyond.

name: Homely room in a central Edinburgh home
description:
Private room in a light, warm and comfortable home located in the popular area of Hillside.
My home consists of a double bedroom with ample storage, shared sitting room and shared bathroom and shared garden to the rear.

name: City Centre Luxury with Terrace Hot Tub
description: Upmarket, urban style with exquisite finishes in exceptional city centre location. Warm and welcoming, our place offers instant access to Edinburgh's city centre, New Town and is a short walk from the Old Town, with a quiet secluded terrace and hot tub.   Offering bright, seamless open spaces with contemporary fittings in a traditional Georgian building with private entrance and garden a moment away from the buzz of Edinburgh's cultural heartland.

name: South Groathill - lovely 2 bed with castle view
description: With its own private parking space, a twin room and double room, this apartment offers a perfect opportunity for a break in Scotland' capital city. Within easy reach of all the main sights, you can leave your car in the car park and head into the city to see Edinburgh. There is a bus stop within a 100m of the front door which will take you quickly and frequently into the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Double Room-City/Airport+Shower room/WC+Parking
description: Welcome to your home away from home, with your family away from family.  Welcum tae yer hame awa frae hame, wi' yer faimilie awa frae faimilie.  7 years of hosting, 6x awarded 'Super Host' status, and awarded 'Guest Favourite', 69 Five⭐ reviews & listed as ' TOP 5% of all hosts on Airbnb Globally.  WELCUM HAME, hosting 1 double bedroom in our home. We are close to the airport & easily accessible to city centre.  2 friendly, Shiba Inu Dogs to greet you.  Eco-friendly home with Solar & Batteries

name: Great Family apartment for Edinburgh City break.
description:
West End of Edinburgh.
Newly refurbished.
Ideally suited for visiting Families.
Master en suite.
Fully stocked, state of the art kitchen should you wish to spend an evening in.
It opens up onto a large comfortable living/dining room with flatscreen Satellite TV.
Modern restaurants, bars, bus and rail links close by.
Edinburgh Castle 2.1km
Princes St 1.2km
National Museum 2.1km
Royal Mile (St. Giles Cathedral) 2.1km
Parliament/Holyrood House/Park 3.2km
free wifi
Parking permit

name: House close to good transport links into city.
description:
Our house is situated in a quiet street with many amenities close by. It has been modernised recently and has all the amenities you could need for a comfortable stay.
There is a large supermarket, parks, restaurants and pubs within a ten minute walk.
Edinburgh zoo, which is quite famous in itself, is within walking distance.
There are also golf courses and beaches close by.

name: Stylish Flat in Superb Location
description:
Beautifully decorated, two bedroom flat in a superb location.

This main door flat is just a 5 minute walk to the west end of Princes Street, allowing easy access to a number of the main attractions, shops, restaurants and bars the city has to offer. Excellent transport links - a short walk to the nearest bus stops, tram stop, and Haymarket Station.

An ideal, comfortable and quiet stay, great for couples, families, friends and business travellers.

name: Quiet very central one bedroom flat
description: light airy flat with 5+ busses at end of street, 10 minute walk to Haymarket mainline train station, short walk from Murrayfield Stadium, tram and airport bus , more than a dozen restaurants within 5/10 minute walk and a supermarket at the end of our street

name: **Females ONLY** Tidy & comfortable double bedroom
description:
Tidy and quiet double bedroom in a centrally located flat in Edinburgh, 8min walk from Haymarket train station, 20min walk to the Castle and easy access to the city's main attractions. Many restaurants are just around. Private bathroom for guests only. Parking is accessible in the building's private parking area.

I am looking forward to hosting you :)

Late check-in is not allowed unless agreed upon.

LATE CHECKOUTS: a fee of one night for ANY late checkout :-)

Registred Host

name: 2 BR Apt with garden in Central Edinburgh
description: Main door basement flat in Edinburgh's World Heritage Site New Town. Set on a quiet crescent in the heart of the city centre. The Royal Mile, Princes Street, Grassmarket, Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace and so much more are all within walking distance or a short bus journey. Less than ten minutes walk from charming Stockbridge, with  bars, restaurants and independent retailers.

name: 2 BR Apt Walking Distance to Centre & Haymarket
description:
Thanks for checking out our listing.

The apartment is part of a modern development down a quiet lane near the city centre.

Most famous streets and sites including The Grassmarket, Princes Street, The Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle and so much more are within walking distance or a short bus journey.

There are lots of supermarkets within minutes of the apartment as well as bars, restaurants, direct airport links, Haymarket train station and so much more.

An ideal base for your Edinburgh trip!

name: Edinburgh Morningside Main door flat with garden
description:
Charming and spacious 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment with main door access. Offering a peaceful retreat within the historic city of Edinburgh. Nestled on a quiet side street in the heart of delightful Morningside, you can fully unwind during your stay. You will even wake up to the sound of birds chirping and have access to an enclosed back garden. A lovely home away from home.

Well located with everything you need nearby including cosy cafes, local pubs, restaurants and supermarkets ,

name: Superb Flat in the Heart of Edinburgh
description:
✔ Exceptional two-level flat nestled near Haymarket
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Cosy kitchen supplied with all the essential amenities
✔ 20-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle & Royal Mile
✔ 20-minute walk to the National Galleries of Scotland: Modern One
✔ 23-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ Next to Johnnie Walker Princes Street
✔ 9-minute walk to Haymarket train station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7

description:
✔ Cosy apartment located in a traditional Edinburgh
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ 25-minute walk to Royal Mile
✔ Next to Princes Street
✔ Edinburgh Waverley Train Station is a 20-minute walk away
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Near The Royal Mile and beside Edinburgh Castle
description: Beautiful 2 bedroom apart. (sleeps 6) in heart of The Old Town. 1 generous king size bedroom, 1 twin bedroom with ensuite.  Livingroom with 1 large sofa bed. 1 bathroom and kitchen.  Very close to The Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle and Greyfriars Kirk.   The Grassmarket is on your door step where you can enjoy the old pubs and fantastic restaurants in the area.  Princes Street 10 mins walk. Fantastic also for the Edinburgh Festival. Bristo Square/Festival square.  (2 bathrooms 2 bedrooms)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stunningly designed contemporary apartment
description: A spacious and  stunningly designed 3 bedroom apartment situated in a quiet residential street in the popular area of Bruntsfield close to bus routes into the city.   Within walking distance of many of Edinburgh's major attractions and festival venues  and close to restaurants, supermarket and quirky independent shops and not far from the beautiful 'Meadows'.

name: Edinburgh Castle Nest
description: Welcome to the luxurious Edinburgh Castle Nest, on your arrival you will find a newly renovated apartment that's positioned in-between the royal mile and Victoria terrace. A few steps from the Edinburgh castle. Finished to a very high standard.  Inside we have done everything to make sure you have a pleasant and relaxing stay. Just what you'll need after  a day exploring everything this Magical City has to offer...  Enjoy.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cordiners cosy modern Flat in the Old Town
description:
Central and stylish, my top-floor flat is perfect for a comfortable Edinburgh stay. Guests will find they have plenty of privacy and personal space here as well as room to spend time together.

Hidden in plain sight just off the Old Town's famous Grassmarket, my home pretty much sits in the shadow of the Castle.

This property is professionally managed. Services include: Professional Cleaning / Hotel Quality Linen / Fresh Towels

name: Beautiful Mews house in Edinburgh City Centre
description:
Beautiful 1 bedroom mews with garden and garage in prime location in edinburgh city centre. The downstairs has a spacious garage with a lovely large private garden off to the rear of the building. The upstairs is a spacious open plan kitchen/living room and there is also a large double bedroom with generous storage and off to the other side a bathroom complete with all the amenities
The mews was built in 1813 and has amazing traditional 17th century characteristics in central Edinburgh

name: Dean Park St - Lovely 1BR in famous Stockbridge!
description: Stylish, central Edinburgh one-bedroom apartment with comfortable sitting room, modern kitchen, dining table and excellent spacious bedroom with double bed and storage space. Situated in Edinburgh's famous Stockbridge neighbourhood with cafes, restaurants, bars, convenience stores and even a duck pond all close by. Stockbridge has a market on Sundays and the walk into the city centre takes you through Edinburgh's New Town, with stunning architecture and historic buildings.

name: Large Double Room with Sea View by Tram Stop
description: Light and spacious double room in Georgian style tenement with an amazing view of Newhaven Pier. Frequent buses and trams into the centre of Edinburgh from the bus stop right outside only take  15 minutes. Guests will have access to a bathroom and kitchen which is shared with me.

name: Stylish Apartment with Balcony in Old Town
description:
✔ Splendid apartment nicely nestled in Edinburgh’s Old Town
✔ 3 bedrooms
✔ 3 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all the necessary amenities
✔ Cosy balcony
✔ Palace of Holyroodhouse is an 8-minute walk
✔ 10-minute walk to Calton Hill & St Giles
✔ 13-minute walk to Scott Monument & The National Museum of Scotland
✔ Edinburgh Castle is a 14-minute walk
✔ Edinburgh Waverley is a 7-minute walk
✔ Free parking

name: Quality Dean Village flat in heart of Edinburgh.
description:
Welcome to the picturesque Dean Village, located 5 minutes walk from Princes St.

Our flat, has been refurbished to offer the perfect pied a terre with all mod cons. Comfy bed, great pillows, cosy sofas, great kitchenware. All set in the beautiful Dean Village in the heart of Edinburgh’s West end. Walk everywhere!
*** NEWS - following feedback from recent guests we've replaced our shower room, April 2025. Brand new walk in shower with hot water on demand; WC, basin & towel rail.***

name: JustB City Retreat - 2 Bedroom Suite
description:
JustB bed and breakfast is nestled in the foothills of the Pentland National Park in Edinburgh.
A dreamy cottage with "The Bungalow" surrounded by trees adjacent to the historic Water of Leith walkway which leads to the Pentland National Park and offers direct access to Edinburgh City Centre which is an eight mile walk/cycle through this leafy idyll.

name: The John Muir Studio—JustB Retreat in Balerno
description: Sit with a book in the all-glass Tree Terrace, where century-old Scots Pines sway gently above. Return to the studio via the private entrance, where a deep-pile rug adds warmth and texture to the hardwood flooring, and a wood-burning fire awaits.

name: Grassmarket ❤ City Centre ❤Romantic❤ Getaway❤
description:
Situated in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic old town/city centre.  

The apartment is literally a 20 second walk to the Grassmarket and has a picturesque view of Edinburgh Castle from the comfort of the living room sofa.

The apartments unique location means there is no noise from passers-by but close enough to enjoy this central location on your doorstep.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Thistle Apartment free parking, 2bed, 2 bathrooms
description:
Edinburgh Thistle Apartment with free parking is located in northern part of the city, just over a mile north of Princess Street. The apartment features spacious bright living room extending into the incorporated fitted kitchen. A flat-screen TV is offered and free WIFI. Flat offers 2 double bedrooms and two well proportioned bathrooms, one of which is en-suite.
Supermarkets are 10 minutes walking distance. Lothian bus with stop across the road provide excellent services across Edinburgh.

name: Coach House
description: With Gleneagles close by golf enthusiasts will love this beautiful, traditional cottage with views of the Union Canal.

name: GuestReady - Stylishly presented City Centre Ap
description: This stylishly presented 2 bedroom apartment next to thriving Lothian Road and the beautiful Meadows is the perfect space for up to 4 guests!

name: The Hayloft
description: Perfectly placed for enjoying the surrounding beautiful countryside and the cosmopolitan city of Edinburgh.

name: Cobble Cottage
description: A beautiful beachfront holiday home situated directly on a quiet beach, with breath taking views across the Solent to the Isle of Wight, all enhanced by Hayling’s micro climate.

name: Torduff Cottage (29374)
description:
Best of both worlds, just 30 minutes’ from Edinburgh, and on the edge of the Pentland Hills Regional Park, with 65 miles of paths to explore.. 2 steps to entrance. All on the ground floor.
Living/dining room: With electric coal-effect fire, Freeview TV and DVD player with a selection of DVDs.
Kitchen: With electric cooker, microwave, fridge and washing machine.
Bedroom 1: With kingsize bed.
Bedroom 2: With twin beds.
Bathroom: With shower over bath, and toilet.. Gas central heating (controlle...

description:
Delightful central West End 3 bedroom family apartment, minutes from Princess Street and tram/trains/buses. Modern, bright and spacious. Dual aspect lounge including TV, WIFI and comfy furnishings. Master bedroom includes en-suite, two further bedrooms and shower room/WC. Well equipped kitchen.

On William St, a quintessential Edinburgh cobbled street, often used for period drama filming, home to local favourite restaurants, pubs. All linens and towels provided.

name: Comfortable Edinburgh apart-close to city centre
description:
You'll feel at home in our cozy one bedroom flat .

The flat is situated in a quiet area only 1.5 miles away from the famous Edinburgh castle, the vibrant Royal Mile and the Old Town.

There are fabulous coffee-shops, restaurants and bars within a short walking

If you are looking to spend some wonderful time in a comfortable, clean flat you should consider our listing for your trip to Edinburgh.

name: Luxury Castle Suite
description: Newly refurbished boutique apartment brimming with Scottish style.  Velvets, tartans, all new furnishings offer a unique vantage point directly looking out on the bustling historic Grassmarket.  This oasis of calm has oak floors throughout, tall sash windows, shaker style kitchen and Tom Dixon lighting provides ambience.  Venture up Castle Wynd South to Edinburgh Castle in 3 minutes and be in the heart of the City in five.  A warm welcome awaits.  Price you see is what you pay, No hidden extras.

name: Loft conversion with two double bedrooms & parking
description:
Two bedrooms & one bathroom in private loft conversion with parking on the south-side of Edinburgh.

King size bedroom with en-suite bathroom & double bedroom, bathroom is shared between both bedrooms with access only through king size room.

The downstairs is not available to guests, so this is unsuitable for guests looking for accommodation with a kitchen and living room. The space has large beds, cupboards & drawers, a tv but no additional seating. Coffee, kettle and a fridge is provided.

name: Vibrant Apartment at The Shore in Leith
description: My retro one-bedroom apartment is located at the Shore of Leith. The vibrant area is perfect for a visit to Edinburgh with the city centre only a 15 minute bus or taxi ride away. The Shore has numerous cafes, bars and restaurants with a variety of cuisines to sample.

name: Edinburgh citycentre new town *walk to everything*
description:
In the heart of city..2 mins walk to princess street, 5mins to Deans village.. would be ideal for the peeps who wants to stay busy & enjoy the city with accessing everything ..
(*the model suits for voyagers*)

Shops, restaurants, and major attractions are all within walking distance.

This space is ideal for exploring the city . Please read the other sections for full details.

name: Ensuite Double Room private bathroom city centre
description:
Ensuite double room with separate bathroom in lovely comfortable apartment is perfectly located to enjoy all that Edinburgh has to offer.
Large room with double bed with king size duvet and heated mattress.

Flat is 5min from the Trams stop Picardy Place going to/ from the Airport.
10 min walk from Bus station.
15 min walk from Waverley train station on and 100 Airlink Bus to the Airport.

Please note we are on 3d floor.
Non smokers and no pets allowed

name: Entire flat to rent. Central. 15 min Princess St.
description:
THIS FLAT IS ENTIRELY FOR YOUR USE. YOU WILL NOT SHARE ANY SPACE WITH ANYONE ELSE.

Note, there may be differences in decoration and furniture (but will essentially be the same).


This beautiful flat is centrally located and superbly positioned within a short stroll of the shops and amenities of Leith Walk and Broughton Street, where coffee houses, restaurants, and delicatessens can be found.

The property is also close to lively Easter Road and Calton Hill.

name: Loft conversion with two double bedrooms & parking
description:
Two bedrooms & one bathroom in private loft conversion with parking on the south-side of Edinburgh.

King size bedroom with en-suite bathroom & double bedroom, bathroom is shared between both bedrooms with access only through king size room.

The downstairs is not available to guests, so this is unsuitable for guests looking for accommodation with a kitchen and living room. The space has large beds, cupboards & drawers, a tv but no additional seating. Coffee, kettle and a fridge is provided.

name: Presidential Rooms with Private bathroom
description: Situated in a conservation area and offers guests the finest amenities the capital has to offer, all within walking distance. On your doorstep you will find a superb choice of top- rated restaurants, cafes, fashionable bars and clusters of boutiques and speciality shops. Scotland' finest art galleries are all in close proximity. Edinburgh Castle, Princes street & garden and Royal Mile only a short walk away. It contains a double bedroom, a single bed room, one livingroom and private bathroom.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: ♥️♥️♥️Cosy City Centre Room with Private Bathroom 🥂☀️
description: As part of a magnificent listed building apartment which is right in the centre of everything!! Situated in a conservation area and offers guests the finest amenities the capital has to offer:Edinburgh Castle, Princes street & garden and the Royal Mile, Shopping district all within easy walking distance. A superb choice of top- rated restaurants, cafes, fashionable bars! The room has it’s own private bathroom.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious 4BR City Centre Apartment w/ Free Parking
description: The perfect place to relax after exploring the city. Walking distance to princes street just 1 mile away! This is a stylish modern duplex apartment situated over two levels (ground floor and level 1). Attractive modern décor and access to free off-street parking and communal gardens. You will enjoy the entire self catering apartment to yourself, which is fully equipped with hotel standard linen and towels. Cosy and spacious! VERY CLOSE TO PRINCES ST, WAVERLEY , AND THE NEW ST JAMES CENTRE MALL!

name: Very Central Beautiful bright sitting room/bedroom
description: This lovely Sitting room/bedroom in our appartment situated just off the Royal Mile Edinburgh’s most famous street. A short walk from the castle and many other sights. Perfect location for shops and restaurants. Please note. Property is third floor and no lift. Bed is a double( not a king)   Minimum booking duration in August is 7 days. Bathroom is shared, please do not book if this is an issue.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Comfortable, large single room in family home.
description: We live on the edge of the beautiful conservation village of Colinton. Although it is still known as a village, it is a suburb of Edinburgh and is a 30-minute journey by bus to the city centre. The room is very cosy and comfortable with a view to the back garden. There is a modern shower room next door. This is shared with 2 other people. The room has a double bed, a desk and chair, a built-in cupboard with lots of hanging space and a chest of drawers.

name: Comfortable very central Edinburgh apartment
38@BideCollective6
description:
Fantastically located Double en suite room with Edinburgh castle view from doorstep. Situated within an A listed townhouse. Perfect location for those looking to be right in the centre
We don’t cater for stag or hen parties or children
We offer very clean comfortable.
We attract a lot of solo travellers and couples looking for quiet clean accommodation in a fantastic location city centre

name: Peaceful, Lovely and Modern, Entire House
description:
Located in Edinburgh,
The house is 7.1 km from the National Museum of Scotland, and 7.5 km from Edinburgh's Playhouse.
This Peaceful, Lovely and Modern Entire House provides accommodation with a patio, BBQ and free WiFi. The property offers a garden and free private parking.

This Holiday Home is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen, with a fridge and an oven; a 55" flat-screen TV, a seating area; and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower and bathtub. Towels/bed linen are provided in the holiday home.

name: York Place City Centre 4 bedroom Duplex Apartment
description: A stylish 4-bedroom duplex basement apartment, set across two levels in the heart of the city. Set below street level, it’s thoughtfully designed to feel open and inviting. Featuring an outdoor decked area & large lounge perfect for relaxing & socialising in  Ideal if looking for a convenient base with lots of space. Just a 3 minutes’ walk from Princes Street & 10 mins walk from the Royal Mile. Opposite is the St James Quarter, one of the most modern shopping/ leisure facilities in Europe.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful Spacious Ground Floor Newington flat
description:
This is a beautiful and comfortable 2 bedroom Ground Floor flat in the popular Newington area, an ideal location to explore Edinburgh. We are near the Festival Theatre, Queens Hall, Arthurs Seat, The Meadows and lots of Edinburgh Festival venues. We are also near the High St., Edinburgh Castle and Princes St. There is an excellent range of pubs, restaurants and cafes nearby.
There is a modern kitchen and a separate toilet and shower room . Guests are welcome to use the communal back garden .

name: York Place City Centre 2 bedroom deluxe Apartment
description: In the heart of Edinburgh city centre, our large ground floor 2 bedroom deluxe apartment is perfect if you're looking for space and easy access, no stairs needed. Set within a converted Georgian Townhouse just a 3 minutes’ walk from Princes Street & 10 mins walk from the Royal Mile. Opposite is the St James Quarter, one of the most modern shopping/ leisure facilities in Europe.  Enjoy easy access to restaurants, public transport & attractions. A great value stay in a vibrant part of the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy room
Beautiful comfortable room and bathroom
description: The room is part of a four-bedroomed family home, which has been upgraded and recently decorated. There is a lovely, bright garden. The house is situated in South Queensferry, just 6.9 miles from Edinburgh City centre, and close to railway and motorway links leading all over Scotland. Edinburgh Airport is 6.7 miles away. There is off-road parking at the front of the house.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Top Hat House - City centre living
description:
Welcome to our first class, self-catered townhouse luxury in the heart of the city. We’re confident there’s no better way to stay in Scotland’s breathtaking capital. It is a blissful blend of original elegance and all the comforts of modern living.
This so much more than a place to rest your head. It is somewhere you can live and breathe Edinburgh in total comfort and style. With fun, vibrant interiors, and state of the art appliances throughout, you can come and go, and only ever be pleased.

name: Huge 3 Bed, 3 Bath Flat, 10 Mins from Waverley
description: This truly magnificent apartment is in the very best location, accommodating up to 8 guests in the heart of the city centre. Guests enjoy 3 double bedrooms, 2 with en-suite shower rooms and a separate bathroom with bath & shower. Spectacular views of Edinburgh Castle, and oodles of space and light throughout. We have baby cots & high chairs for guests with babies/toddlers. There is no parking with the apartment but there are several car parks nearby.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Maison des Arts in Hip Village Vibe*
description:
Discover a chic hideaway to live the city life. This listed Georgian home features tasteful furnishings and decor, wood flooring, neutral grey tones throughout, subtle touches of color, contrasting textures, and a natural light.

Inside you'll find super comfy beds, Scottish woollen blankets and retro record players & vinyl filled walls for you throw on; sleep inducing slouchy velvet sofa, deep bath with shower and a collection of vintage books and games.

name: 3 New Assembly Close -  Royal Mile
description:
Beautiful very well located apartment on the Royal Mile. 2 large bedrooms and spacious lounge/kitchen looking onto the most Historic street in Scotland.
It is on the 2nd floor with no lift access.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Relax in style in the heart of Leith
description:
Unique, stylish 2 bedroom flat conveniently located in Leith Edinburgh, with free parking

This south facing, triple aspect flat benefits from great sunlight through out the day. The flat is very peaceful, with an eclectic design

Your room is bright and cosy, the bed is new and comfy with a deluxe orthopaedic mattress and there is a desk, hair dryer and towels.

name: Edinburgh - Scotland. Highly recommended.
description:
This apartment in central Edinburgh comfortably accommodates six people.
Easy access to city centre and beyond if you wish to travel.

Private parking.

It is very spacious and equipped with everything you need for a few days getaway.

There is Alexa controlled Sonos music system and two smart televisions.

The kitchen is fullly equipped and the lounge/dining area provides a comfortable dining table for six.

Our flat is perfect for a City break and walkable to all concert and Festival venues.

name: 17 Abercromby Place
description: 17 Abercromby is a stunning, privately owned, townhouse in the heart of Edinburgh's New town. The New town is a Unesco, World hertitage site in the very heart of Edinburgh. 17 has recently been refurbished with all coviniences for modern living.

name: Bespoke Tours Accommodation - Edinburgh
description: Currently we offer accommodation for up to 8 people at our Centrally located property in Edinburgh’s West End. Situated next to the EICC and just a few minutes walk from Edinburgh Princes St and of course Edinburgh castle, our accommodation offers an excellent starting point to explore Edinburgh and beyond. We would love to have you come stay with us,  all ages are welcome and our property offers child friendly environment for kids.

name: Modern 1 bed flat In the heart of Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our simple yet chic apartment in bright Edinburgh, where you will feel comfortably at home and experience the city like a true local.

name: Stylish Central Room w/KingBed & Gym Access
description:
Elegant central bedroom located on 3rd floor (no elevator), with access to residential gym. Must climb 3 flights of stairs.

Access only to private bedroom and bathroom shared with me. There will be no other guests in the property. No kitchen or living room available.

15-20min walk to St James Centre, Waverley Station & Royal Mile. Bus and Tram stop nearby.

Direct tram from Edinburgh Airport, the tram stop 'McDonald Road' is only a few minutes away on foot.

name: The Art Lover’s Residence
description:
Victorian flat full of character close to town. Located 5mins from Lothian Road which meets Princes Street - Edinburgh’s main shopping street.

Enjoy exploring the sights of Edinburgh before returning to a cosy flat. Watch Netflix in front of the fire & fall asleep in your kingsize bed ready for another day of discovering what Edinburgh has to offer.

I love Edinburgh & enjoy giving recommendations for what to see, do & especially, eat!

name: Private room - 10 mins train to City
description: Private room in house with private bathroom. 5 min walk to the station where trains runs every half hour and take 10 mins to arrive at Waverley station. Close to Musselburgh and Portobello. Private parking. Large retail park (Fort Kinnaird) nearby (2 min drive or 15 min walk) where you can find many restaurants, cinema and clothing stores. We have a Cavapoo (called Brodie) who is 3 years old and super friendly. He does not shed any hairs and is never allowed in guest bedroom.

name: St Christopher's Inn Private Double Ensuite
description: Nestled in the centre of the medieval Old Town, our hostel is in the perfect location to reveal Edinburgh’s magical charm combined with an underground party scene unlike any other city.  With incredible sights such as Edinburgh Castle, the Scottish National Galleries and the Royal Mile just a short stroll away from your bed there’s no excuse not to get out and about! Our Edinburgh hostel is also a very convenient 2 minute walk from Waverley station.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: St Christopher's Inn Bed in 6 Bed Dorm Ensuite
description: Nestled in the centre of the medieval Old Town, our hostel is in the perfect location to reveal Edinburgh’s magical charm combined with an underground party scene unlike any other city.  With incredible sights such as Edinburgh Castle, the Scottish National Galleries and the Royal Mile just a short stroll away from your bed there’s no excuse not to get out and about! Our Edinburgh hostel is also a very convenient 2 minute walk from Waverley station.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: William Street 3 Bed Snug
description:
A beautiful apartment in a cobbled street right in the heart of Edinburgh. The property has 3 double bedrooms (which can also be twin bedrooms. )There is a log burning stove in the lounge, perfect for cosy winter evenings , along with wifi access and cable tv. The kitchen is fully equipped and a welcome pack of groceries await guests.
The joy of the apartment is its centrality so guests have Edinburgh on their doorstep.

name: The Jeffrey Street Apartment
description:
LICENSED SHORT TERM LET PROPERTY
Comfortable one bedroom apartment, roof top terrace with spectacular views! Separate shower room and separate kitchen.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Garden studio by the sea
description:
Studio apartment at the bottom of our garden in Portobello. Self contained, safe and with your own entrance. Double bed, small kitchen and shower room. Portobello Promenade and the sandy beach is at the end of our street - 2 minutes walk. Portobello is a vibrant community with specialist shops and lots of lovely places to eat and drink. Free parking at our house.
Edinburgh city centre is 20 mins by bus. From there, it is easy to walk to the castle, the old town, National Museum, galleries etc.

name: Double room with private external bathroom
description:
We are acting similar to a hotel.
This room has 1 grand double bed with a private bathroom just of the Lounge
This room has the following Amentities - Free Wi-Fi, Freeview TV, Handsoap, Showergel, Hair Dryer, Tea and Coffee making Facilites.

name: York Place City Centre 3 bedroom Duplex Apartment
description: A stylish  3-bedroom duplex basement apartment, set across two levels in the heart of the city. Set below street level, it’s thoughtfully designed to feel open and inviting. Featuring an outdoor decked area & large lounge perfect for relaxing & socialising in  Ideal if looking for a convenient base with lots of space. Just a 3 minutes’ walk from Princes Street & 10 mins walk from the Royal Mile. Opposite is the St James Quarter, one of the most modern shopping/ leisure facilities in Europe.

name: York Place City Centre 3 bedroom deluxe Apartment
description:
Set within a converted Georgian townhouse our spacious 3 bedroom deluxe apartment is perched above the city, offering privacy, and sweeping views of the city and coast. Just a stone’s throw from the St James Quarter, one of Europe's most modern shopping & leisure destinations,10 min walk to the Royal Mile & Edinburgh Castle & just 3 mins walk to Princes Street
Please note: Access is via stairs, a charming walk-up apartment full of character (no lift), but the view makes every step worthwhile.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Locke Studio Accessible at Eden Locke
description: Open-plan. Accessible. And with a roomy 35sqm to call your own.

name: Mezzanine Studio at Eden Locke
description: With a split-level living space and lots of little luxuries, our Mezzanine Studios are the best of the bunch.

name: One Bedroom Suite with Sofa Bed at Eden Locke
description: To live like a Scotsman – to accommodate everything from a one night stay to one year.

name: Modern, Leith, near city centre & tram, patio
description: Fully Licenced - Contemporary ground floor flat. Open plan kitchen/living room/breakfast bar,  shower room, spacious bedroom with access to shared rear patio & garden & utility room. Located in trendy Leith, a 15 min walk from town or tram at top of road. Suits young couples/friends. Easy access from airport or station. Loads of bars, restaurants & coffee shops on Leith Walk & the Shore. Easy walk to all the tourist sights & city centre or short bus or tram ride. Nice park nearby.

name: Serene...   Room in Safe Edinburgh Area
Edinburgh - Stockbridge Colony Flat
description:
Situated in Stockbridge, one of the most vibrant areas of Edinburgh, this quiet one-bedroom, main-door flat is a perfect spot to base yourself.

The apartment comes with all the amenities you need to help you relax and enjoy your visit. It is well laid-out with a large living room, double bedroom, kitchen, bath/shower and garden.

Stockbridge is a great place to base yourself while in Edinburgh, with easy access to the City Centre.

name: York Place City Centre 5 bedroom deluxe Apartment
description:
Set within a converted Georgian townhouse our top floor 5 bedroom deluxe apartment is perched above the city set over two floors, offering privacy, and sweeping views of the city and coast. Just a stone’s throw from the St James Quarter, one of Europe's most modern shopping & leisure destinations, 10 min walk to the Royal Mile & Edinburgh Castle & just 3 mins walk to Princes Street
Please note: Access is via stairs (no lift), but the view and quiet atmosphere at the top makes it worth the climb!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh waterfront, 3 bed, balcony, apartment.
description:
This waterfront apartment is only 3.5 miles (5.6km) around 15 mins to the heart of Edinburgh/Royal Mile/Edinburgh castle. This amazing 3bed flat needs to be your base while you explore all Edinburgh has to offer; with its wrap around balcony, offering amazing views over to fife & over the Firth of Forth. It has luxury beds. A jacuzzi bath, 75" UHD TV, full sky package, Sonos system, WiFi, playstation. You wont want to leave.

Free onsite parking right at the flat too

name: Front room. Lovely light spacious room.3 rd floor
description: Booking duration in August is 7 day minimum. Lovely Sitting room/bedroom in our appartment situated just off the Royal Mile, Edinburgh’s most famous street. A short walk from the castle and many other sights. Perfect location for shops and restaurants. This room is third floor and no lift. Bed is a double. Please note, minimum booking time. The bathroom is shared with the other room, please do not book if this is an issue.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Modern Apt by The Shore ♥ Newhaven
description: This modern coastal apartment is located in the Newhaven area well known for its local fishing history and abundance of seafood restaurants. Newhaven has frequent buses allowing easy access to Edinburgh's City Centre,  but is also in close proximity to Leith's Ocean Terminal,  home to the Royal Yacht Britannia.

name: Private room within adjacent toilet/shower room
description:
Lovely bright, ground floor double bedroom with private entrance and en-suite located in a quiet residential area.

My home is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers as well as students and visiting academics.

We have FREE on street parking .

Short walk to the bus stop to take you into Edinburgh city centre. It's around 30 minutes bus ride.

The shower/toilet room is small and compact.

Yale lock on adjoining door and front door.

Keyless entry to private front door.

name: Sunny & spacious Royal Mile apt dating from 1677
description: Explore the historic district of Edinburgh's famous Royal Mile while staying in this airy 2nd floor apartment. Apartment within a historic B listed property on Edinburgh's famous Royal Mile. This spacious & homely apartment is fully equipped, including TV, Wifi & comfy furnishings. The location is second to none & you can't help feel at home in this cosy apartment. We supply hotel standard linens, towels, & toiletries to make sure your stay in Edinburgh is as easy as possible.

name: Amazing double room whit  king size bed!!
Tranquility... Bright Room in Safe Edinburgh Area
description:
The room is spacious with single fourposter bed double wardrobe desk and chair. Side table with lamp for more studied lighting 5 pendant crystal gold ceiling light gives excellent light. Blackout blind helps protect from morning sunshine and privacy from adjacent neighbours
Supermarket, fish and chip shop , Chinese , Indian takeaway, pharmacy and pub within 1/4 mile. Variety of takeaways can supply order within 1/2 hour Bus and train can take you to city centre in 1/2 hour

name: Old Town Flat with Parking near Royal Mile
description:
✔ Charming flat, nicely positioned near the city centre
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 3 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ 2-minute walk to the Museum of Edinburgh
✔ 6-minute walk to Edinburgh Waverley Train Station
✔ 10-minute walk to St Giles' Cathedral
✔ 12-minute walk to the National Monument of Scotland
✔ 14-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Beautifully presented, spacious two bed apartment!
description: This recently refurbished spacious two-bed second-floor apartment is a wonderful example of comfortable and stylish living, located in the popular Newington area to the south of the city with a short walk to the center.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Bright and Modern Causewayside Apartment
description: Bright and modern two bedroom flat located in the vibrant neighbourhood of Newington. Delightfully decorated and fully-equipped, this 3rd-floor flat is perfect for 2-4 guests for both short and longer term stays.

name: Fabulous Central Apartment with Private Parking
description: This first floor renovated beautifully presented apartment is situated in the fabulous vibrant Broughton Street/Canonmills area which is so central for visitors to Edinburgh and has everything on your doorstep you would need to enjoy your stay various bars, restaurants, shops, coffee shops, supermarkets, buses.  There are stairs up to the apartment but it is the first floor that you come to.   I will be on hand when possible to meet and welcome you and contactable throughout your stay.

name: The Stables Merchiston
description:
Modern interior within a converted stable in the highly sought after area of Bruntsfield and Morningside
The building is situated within the grounds of a private house and is safe and secure offering a QUIET location yet positioned Conveniently close to boutique shops and a great choice of cafes and restaurants.
Local transportation is within walking distance and the city centre is a five minute bus ride or a comfortable 20 minute stroll.We do not usually provide parking on site.

name: 4 bedroom apartment Brae House Campus Accomodation
description:
Holyrood Brae House is a purposely build student accommodation, but no students will be present in the building throughout the summer period.

All rooms at Holyrood Brae House have an ensuite bathroom with toilet and shower. The rooms have a 120cm double bed, a work space and a fully equipped kitchen with lounge area and TV.

We will not be able to add extra beds in the apartment.

name: 6 bedroom apartment Brae House Campus Accomodation
description:
Holyrood Brae House is a purposely build student accommodation, but no students will be present in the building throughout the summer period.

All rooms at Holyrood Brae House have an ensuite bathroom with toilet and shower. The rooms have a 120cm double bed, a work space and a fully equipped kitchen with lounge area and TV.

We will not be able to add extra beds in the apartment

name: Spacious room in  the heart of Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our home, perfectly situated in the heart of Scotland’s capital! Just a short stroll to Princes Street Gardens, or a quick walk to the royal mile, our location offers the ideal base for exploring Edinburgh.

This is a shared home, but you’ll have your own private room and bathroom for your exclusive use.

The room is ideal for couples or solo travelers seeking to experience the best of Edinburgh, with easy access to major attractions and convenient proximity to the Christmas markets.

name: Two bed apartment w/ parking & close to Royal Mile
description: Bright modern two bedroom apartment situated close to the royal mile, Arthurs seat, Holyrood palace and parliament. Recently updated kitchen and bathrooms and parking included.

name: Quartermile 2 bedroom apartment
description: Recently refurbished 2 bedroom apartment located in the prestigious Quartermile development in Edinburgh's old town. Experience modern luxury whilst enjoying all Edinburgh's centre has to offer on your doorstep. There's a local supermarket, coffee shops and a lovely selection of places to eat just yards away, within the development itself! Just a quarter of a mile from the historic Royal Mile.

name: Georgian spacious newly refurbished central apt
description: City centre 1st floor spacious 2 bedroom apartment.  Near the lively Grassmarket area, this apartment comfortable accommodates up to 4 people. Completely refurbished in Spring 2019, to a very high standard, and beautifully decorated. The apartment feels like a boutique hotel but with the convenience of self catering. The apartment is well equipped for all your holiday needs.  Nearby Edinburgh Castle & Princes Street. Please note we have Netflix & on-demand tv only. We have 2 TVs in the apartment

name: No.1 George IV Bridge- One Bedroom Castle View
description:
Note: the photos are from a selection of our lovely apartments not one unit.

To maintain the high standard of service and cleanliness we wish to uphold for our guests, these apartments are serviced by our team of house keepers. If your stay exceeds 3 nights, they will perform a complementary clean.
However, you are welcome to opt out of this service should you prefer.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: No.1 George IV Bridge - One Bedroom
description:
Note: the photos are from a selection of our lovely apartments not one unit.

To maintain the high standard of service and cleanliness we wish to uphold for our guests, these apartments are serviced by our team of house keepers. If your stay exceeds 3 nights, they will perform a complementary clean.
