neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central Lothian Rd Apartment sleeps 16 guests
description:
This newly renovated apartment is in the heart of edinburgh. Less than a 10 minute walk to the castle, haymarket train station, princess street and the grass market this place is ideal for large groips looking to explore the city and everything is within walking distance... local supermarket, restaurants and drinks are all on your door step.

Stag and hen parties welcome

Please note in August there is a 4 night minimum stay....

name: New and modern apartment in quiet location
description:
Our modern and clean apartment offers a comfortable base for your trip. Whether you're visiting for work or leisure, our apartment has everything you need for a relaxing stay.

We're located in the leafy Murrayfield area, just off the main road between the airport (20 minutes) and city centre (15 minutes), very close to Murrayfield Stadium and the Zoo. The city centre can be reached easily by walking or bus.

Licence Number EH-68854-F
Expires 15 Sept 2025

name: Beautiful Georgian 2 bed flat
description:
NEWLY REFURBISHED
Located on one of Edinburgh's prettiest streets, the apartment is ideal for short stays, it is well equipped, spacious two bedroom basement apartment in Edinburgh's New town, near popular Stockbridge (3 min walk), and the city centre (10 - 15 mins walk).

Great restaurants, bars and cafes all close by, and the perfect location to explore the wonderful city of Edinburgh.

name: Spacious flat, off the Royal Mile - sleeps 4
description:
LOCATED NEXT TO THE EDINBURGH FESTIVAL FRINGE BOX OFFICE
The Tron Square Residence is all about the three Cs: character, comfort and central location. Sitting pretty in a quiet development just off of the Royal Mile, this apartment offers guests a peaceful haven amidst the hustle and bustle of the city centre. The property sleeps up to four guests, and features a balcony, and two double bedrooms. Additionally, we can offer a travel cot for Babies.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy room with sea view in beachfront apartment
description: Guest room in a bright and sunny, 1960s beachfront home in the bohemian neighbourhood of Portobello. On an excellent public transport route to the city centre which is approximately 20 minutes away by bus. The apartment has beautiful sea views from every room, is full of sunshine in the mornings, has excellent central heating and is extremely peaceful. WiFi, quality bedding, and use of living room and kitchen available. I live in the property and am very happy to call it my home.

name: Private Room Near Royal Mile Edinburgh
description:
A beautiful room in a modern apartment in the heart of Edinburgh.. The other bedroom is permanently occupied so you will share the apartment with one more person.
Just a 5 minute walk from the Royal Mile and about 20 minute walk to Edinburgh Castle. There is free on street parking between 5:30pm-8:30am Monday to Friday and at the weekend (Saturday/Sunday) it is free of charge.
During week days the closest free parking is about 15-20min walk away.

name: Comfortable double bedroom
description:
Comfortable double bedroom

The bedroom is spacious and bright. The bathroom is mainly for you. We have ensuite bathroom. The flat is close to the city center (10-15 min walking) and well connected with public transports. The neighbourhood is quiet during the night and the area is well served with restaurants, , grocery stores, nice pubs. etc. Leith Walk is a very welcome area, where you can meet a lot of local people and experience traditional atmosphere.

name: Spottiswoode - Lovely, accessible 2BR near Meadows
description: Newly licensed, sunny and spacious, two-bed main door apartment in the highly desirable area of Marchmont, next to the Meadows - just South of the City Centre - with beautiful castle views from the street. The Castle, Grassmarket, Old Town, St Giles, Royal Mile and Princes Street are all within easy walking distance across the Meadows.

name: High-End Apartment in Georgian Building by Holyrood Park
description:
Sit back and relax on the luxurious leather sofa after a long day exploring Edinburgh. Cook up a feast in the fully equipped kitchen. Indulge in the powerful waterfall shower. Finally, sleep tight on the soft mattress complete with crisp white linen. In this high-end apartment every detail has being designed for a comfortable stay.

Our perfectly located apartment has been renovated to a truly luxury standard - designed from the ground up for your comfort with everything you need to relax and unwind after a long day exploring the nearby sights.

There are beautiful real oak wooden floors throughout the living spaces and a sumptuous carpet in the double bedroom. As you enter the apartment you will immediately notice the attention to detail with no expense spared during the recent renovation (May 2019).

We know you're here to sleep so to ensure you get a great nights sleep you'll be laying your head on the worlds most comfortable mattress complete with cris

name: Bright flat with big terrace- Leith, Edinburgh
description:
A bright, modern, first floor apartment situated in the in the historic Port of Leith. Ideally located with lots of coffee shops, restaurants and pubs nearby. Access to the city centre is made easy with the closest bus stop and tram being within a two minute walk. Or a 30 min walk.

The apartment is suitably furnished and well- equipped, with a large balcony overlooking the communal garden and breath taking view of the harbour. Parking is also available onsite for one car.

name: Fabulous 2 Bed Property - Heart Of The New Town
description: A lovely 2-bedroom home, perfect for anyone wishing to explore Edinburgh and all its attractions. In a fantastic location in the heart of the New Town, its a short stroll from lots of cool shops, restaurants and bars. The property has a large living room, and two bedrooms (both with double beds). While you can easily swing a cat in the main bedroom, the second one, not so much!  It's cosy and cute. There's a kitchen and dining area that opens onto a private patio. Looking forward to hosting you!

name: Stockbridge Village Artist Studio 3 bdrms
description: A unique bright and airy loft style apartment in Stockbridge, nestled in the heart of cafe culture & artisan food in Edinburgh. We offer the original Airbnb experience, and are happy to help with any questions you have about the city and beyond. There is nothing like local knowledge which we are happy to share with you. With a roof terrace, it is the perfect place to unwind after a day exploring Edinburgh.

name: Lovely Edinburgh House with garden&private parking
description:
The House is very light and has a large bright lounge/dining area, a good size kitchen and total three bathrooms in the house.

Downstairs comprises; hall/cloakroom/wc. The Upstairs, three good sized bedrooms and for guests en-suite room.

The House comes with all mod cons including:

WiFi available (Fibre optic Internet)
Double-glazed windows,
Gas central heating,
Washing machine & Dishwasher
Microwave,
Fridge and Freezer
Gas hobs
Free Parking
Front and beautiful back graden as well.

name: City centre, two bedroom apartment- Regent Terrace
description: The flat is a basement two bed accommodation ,comfortably furnished.One of the bedrooms can be double or two singles with the other being double- there is a double sofa bed too. there is a kitchen, bath/shower room with a utility annex off the kitchen with washing machine. It is self contained and entry is by its own door.

name: Modern 2 Bedroom Apartment in Centre of Edinburgh
description:
This newly renovated, first floor, 2 bedroom flat in the centre of Edinburgh is the perfect place to stay during your trip to the capital!

Within walking distance of the town centre, its the perfect place to get ready for a night on the town, or rest up after a long day exploring Edinburgh's many famous attractions!

Quality hard flooring along with newly installed boiler, roller blinds and double glazed windows means comfort will be no issue for you! I hope to be welcoming you soon!

name: Rustic flat 20 mins from City Centre
description:
In walking distance to City Centre!

Welcome to my little home.

Newly refurbished Lower Ground flat.

Busy location with everything you need around, but surprisingly super quiet flat!

Private back door directly into the shared garden - lacks of care but easy access for fresh air or smokers.

Please bear in mind I do live here but it will be as cleared as possible.

Any questions, just let me know :)

Licence Number: EH-68976-F

name: A splendid 3 bedroom apartment, with Free Parking
description: A luxury, private, 3 bedroom apartment offering comfortable and spacious accommodation, within easy reach of Edinburgh city centre. The apartment is fully furnished, with 1 king sized bed, 1 double bed and 2 single beds, kitchen and living room. The apartment reflects a clean and quiet environment which resembles the desirable comfort of your own home. Free wifi and parking is readily available at the premises.

name: Castle View Apartment - price drop
description:
Modern, cozy one bedroom studio flat in the heart of the city, lovely outlook to Edinburgh castle.

24h secure entry system

Fibre Internet WiFi
Nintendo NES classic console
King size bed
Fully fitted kitchen
Washer & Dryer
Dehumidifier & Fan

name: Large South facing quiet bedroom
description:
South facing double bedroom with king size bed and own toilet in a very quiet area.
Open view on Edinburgh's observatory and Blackford Hill.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Perfectly located converted Georgian Coach House
description:
A traditional Edinburgh Coach house lovingly restored in the heart of the New Town. Perfectly located being only a 5min walk from Princess Street and George Street (the heart of the Edinburgh Festival).

The tram stop, which runs directly to the Airport is maximum a ten minute walk and Waverley train station is a 15 min walk.

It is the perfect place to base yourself as a couple, friends or young family. It is based on its own private mews street but there is unfortunately NOT parking.

name: The Hidden Warehouse - Garage Parking *
description:
Your secret escape where industrial charm meets modernist luxury—tucked into the cobbled streets of Stockbridge Village.

This family-friendly home offers a warm village feel with modern comforts: a cozy nursery bed, private entrance, and secure underground parking. Wander just minutes from your door to discover hip independent restaurants, artisan cafés, and the beloved WASP art gallery—where you can meet local makers and take home a piece of Edinburgh’s creative soul.

name: Twin room-Shared Bathroom
description: Adrenlee Guest House  is perfectly located as it is in walking distance from City of Edinburgh. Making the hotel the ideal location for accessing the City and its attractions, including Calton Hill, Edinburgh Castle, National Museum of Scotland, St. James Quarter, Scottish National al Portrait Gallery, Princes Street (Edinburgh’s main shopping street), Royal Botanic Garden,Water of Leith, Dean Village,The Royal Mile and the Royal Yacht Britannia.

description: ‍

name: Holyrood Skyline Apartment - Arthur's Seat views
description: Bright, modern and freshly decorated two-floor apartment located in a quiet residential area. Incredible views of Arthur's Seat! Private balcony 4.5 m x 1.5 m with a sitting area. Very convenient location to explore both the Old and New Towns of Edinburgh. Comfortable accommodation for up to 6 guests maximum. Car parking available at NCP Holyrood Rd Car Park. Free for our guests for the duration of their stay with us.

name: Bright and stylish 1 bed apartment at the Shore!
description:
Bright and well-presented 1-bedroom flat in the heart of Leith. Featuring a spacious lounge, modern kitchen, double bedroom, and contemporary bathroom. Located just moments from The Shore with its vibrant cafés, bars, and shops, and offering excellent transport links, including the Edinburgh tram. Ideal for professionals and couples seeking a home in one of the city’s most desirable areas.

Please note we do not accept infants at this property.

name: One Bedroom Open Plan Suite at Eden Locke
description: Designed by New York architects Grzywinski + Pons, these one bedroom open plan apartments are 29m² of carefully thought-out space – stunning design with uncompromising functionality.

name: Seaside Escape: Extra Large Room with Locks & View
description:
Super close to city centre yet perfect for unwinding and taking in the tranquil surroundings. Ideal for both nature lovers and travellers.

Welcome to our stunning seaside retreat located right next to Edinburgh's shoreline! This beautiful & Spacious private double Room comes with lock & key for your privacy & security, large bright windows with nice views and a shared access to the balcony with breath-taking views of Granton Harbour and the sea located right in front.

name: Single room with external bathroom
description: Adrenlee Guest House  is perfectly located as it is in walking distance from City of Edinburgh. Making the hotel the ideal location for accessing the City and its attractions, including Calton Hill, Edinburgh Castle, National Museum of Scotland, St. James Quarter, Scottish National al Portrait Gallery, Princes Street (Edinburgh’s main shopping street), Royal Botanic Garden,Water of Leith, Dean Village,The Royal Mile and the Royal Yacht Britannia.

name: 4 bed Georgian town house with lovely garden
description:
Delightful lived-in traditional Georgian Ground and Lower Ground garden apartment on a quiet cobbled street a stone's throw from gorgeous Stockbridge with its artisan market, art galleries, bars, cafes, restaurants & unique shops
Our apartment is a family-friendly base in Edinburgh. Right in the heart of the stylish New Town and a 10 minute walk from Princes St, everything you need is on your doorstep.
Enjoy private, sunny garden with outdoor dining area with fairy-lit patio.

name: Second floor Haymarket apt with private parking
description: Spacious 2 bedroom apartment on the second floor in the heart of Haymarket. It has 2 double beds and can accommodate up to 4 guests

name: Montgomery Apartments - Crighton
description:
Our latest lovely apartment is the main door ground floor flat and located at a walkable distance to Edinburgh City Center and all the major tourist attractions.

The Apartment is located on two floors.

You will love the location in vibrant Leith with many great cafes, bars and restaurants just a few steps away.

It is ideal for families, couples or friends visiting Edinburgh for sightseeing or events️.

name: City Centre Quiet 2 Bed Apartment Free Parking
description:
Welcome to this quiet 2 bed apartment in the heart of Edinburgh

This property benefits from available on street parking.
Property consists of Two double bedrooms, good size bright living room fully equipped Kitchen, Compact bathroom/Shower room, Double glazing and gas central heating
  
Superfast Wi-Fi with Wi-Fi controlled TV, Nest Intelligent Heating and washing machine. Cooker, wine, rack, dishwasher, microwave It is light, stylish, clean and contemporary apartment close to city & airport

name: Fleshmarket Close - 1BR apartment in the Old Town
description:
Be at the very heart of Edinburgh's vibrant historic Old Town in this beautifully located, bright 1 bedroom apartment which overlooks the Royal Mile.

Newly refurbished, with a brand new bathroom and new flooring throughout, you could not get more central than this property, with everything you need on your door step. This cosy home is just what you need to come home to after a day of exploring.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful Travelers Apartment - Salmond Place
description: A charming well-sized one bedroom apartment situated in the central area of Edinburgh. This amazing place has pleasant view and easy access  to a quiet private garden. The Meadowbank shopping centre is literally right at its doorstep! Edinburgh's top tourist attractions just a short walk away. Free WiFi included.

name: Comfortable room close to central Edinburgh
description:
A comfortable private double bedroom in shared apartment. The shared living area has a dining table, sofa, and all kitchen facilities.

Situated on a quiet street but only a 10 minute walk from the the popular Leith area and city centre attractions.

While our check in policy is flexible, please let us know at time of booking if your transport to Edinburgh arrives before 1000 or after 2000.
Please note, we cannot accept additional overnight guests.

name: Spacious Two Bedroom - Two Bathroom byMansley
description:
Comfortably spacious and elegantly modern, two-bedroom serviced apartments make your perfect home from home.

The main bedroom features a double bed, and a second bedroom with twin beds which can be joined to make a super-king bed on request. The open-plan living and kitchen are well appointed with modern amenities and appliances to make your stay a comfortable and easy one – just like home.

The apartment also benefits from two bathrooms with a walk-in shower

name: Bright One Bedroom Apartment by Mansley
description: Spacious and modern, our one-bedroom serviced apartments close to Edinburgh’s city centre are the perfect city pad. The open-plan living and kitchen are well appointed with modern amenities and appliances to make your stay a comfortable and easy one – just like home. The separate bedroom features a double bed, LCD TV, room safe & make-up area. Fully tiled bathroom with shower over bath or a walk-in shower, heat resisting mirror, heated towel rail.

name: Stylish and beautiful apartment - great location
description:
You'll feel at home in our beautiful and stylish one bedroom apartment in Edinburgh

The flat is situated in a quiet residential area only 1.5 mile away from the majestic Edinburgh castle and stunning Royal Mile.

Haymarket Train Station and Murrayfield stadium close by

There are fabulous coffee-shops, restaurants and bars right on your doorsteps.

name: King Room in Prime Position for Playhouse
description:
Licence Number EH-68226-F
I offer a comfortable private bedroom in my home, a superbly located 3rd floor traditional Edinburgh tenement within walking distance of Princes Street. It is a peaceful well connected base for exploring the city, with bus, rail, tram connections (direct to/from airport). Enjoy local amenities such as cafes, restaurants, shops, cinema, theatre. Catch the sunset from Calton Hill, escape to volcanic Holyrood Park, just minutes away, or simply rest and enjoy the views.

name: Castle view penthouse room
description: Welcome to our unique Edinburgh city penthouse. Enjoy views of Edinburgh Castle, Arthur's Seat and the Pentland hills from your dual-aspect room and the wrap-around balcony, accessible from your room.  Situated on the stunning Water of Leith, next to the beautiful Saughton Rose Gardens. This apartment has easy access to Edinburgh airport, the city centre,  Murrayfield Stadium, or the countryside via car or public transport.

name: Modern 1BR flat - free parking + lift
description: Stylish, bright, top floor flat in Corstorphine with access to a private balcony. Onsite private parking available in the complex. Excellent transport links to the airport and city centre by bus stop located directly outside the property. Great location for rugby at Murrayfield stadium, as well as Edinburgh Airport (10 min), Gyle Business Parks (10 min) and Zoo (10min). Local amenities (24 hour Tesco) 2 minutes walk from the flat, cafes/restaurants, pubs) are also located at 10min walking away.

name: Bright central Edinburgh Apartment
description:
Bright apartment with large windows. Two bedrooms:
- One room with a double bed
- Second bedroom with sofa bed (John lewis. Could install desk and chair for long stays ).

- Blackout blinds in both bedrooms, and living room
- 59 sq metres
- Lift available in the building.

- Fast WiFi (Virgin)

- 10 minute walk to Holyrood park and Arthur's seat
- 20 minute walk /multiple buses to Prince's street.
- 20 minute bus ride to Portobello beach

- Groceries, pub, and great cafes nearby

name: Cosy  room behind Holyrood Palace
description: My flat is located in a very quiet area 5 minutes walk from Holyrood Palace/Parliament and bottom of the Royal Mile, and next to Holyrood Park. Flexible check out & great transport links. It is an excellent base to discover the history, attractions and nature this amazing city has to offer!!

name: Rose Street - Watchmaker's Apartment
description: Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at Princes Str stop and arrive at Murrayfield in just 30 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to the heart of the action.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely Edinburgh Home - Craighouse Gardens
description: A lovely one bedroom apartment situated in a quiet and picturesque residential area of Edinburgh. This amazing place has pleasant view and easy access to a communal garden.  Edinburgh's top tourist attractions just a short bus ride away. Free WiFi included.

name: Two Bedroom Apartment, Longterm Stays - 5 persons
description: Ocean Serviced Apartments offer a Two Bedroom Serviced Apartment, sleeping 5 persons. This comfortable apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, open plan kitchen and lounge area. The beds in this apartment can be set as king size or single beds, based on your preferences. A FREE underground parking and a complimentary WIFI will be provided. Our building is located at the sea front, approximately 2.5 miles from the city centre. A direct bus to the centre stops just outside our building.

name: Cottage in the City  - traditional mews house
description:
This traditional mews house is very close to Princes St and the West End
-8 minutes walk to Princes St
-Very close to many attractions
-Lots of independent cafes, bars, coffee shops and restaurants nearby
-Traditional Edinburgh mews house
-Very quiet house tucked away from traffic
- New shower room and freshly painted
-Complimentary tea/coffee facilities in room

name: Stylish modern newly built apartment
description:
Newly built, modern two bedroom apartment.
The flat comprises of a large open plan kitchen/living area, two bedrooms (one with ensuite) and a large bathroom with shower and bathtub.
Bedroom 1 has one double bed and an en-suite bathroom. Bedroom 2 has 1 single bed and one double bed. It takes approximately 20min to reach the city centre by bus. The area is surrounded by beautiful greenery in a quiet neighbourhood.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: East Claremont Street - Beautiful 2BR apartment
description:
This beautiful, spacious property with new John Lewis sofas March 2025, is the perfect base for your stay in Edinburgh. Benefiting from stunning tall-ceiling rooms and authentic period features including a cast iron bath to relax after a full day of sightseeing. The Bellevue area with its quirky cafes and bars is at your disposal, however the kitchen is fully equipped should you prefer to dine at home.

The flat is a 15-min walk from the York Place tram stop for visitors taking the airport

name: Grassmarket Apartment: Castle View
description:
A charming apartment in the heart of the Old Town, nestled between the lively Grassmarket and iconic Edinburgh Castle with the Royal Mile just moments away.

It is complete with fully equipped kitchen, double bedroom, bathroom with walk-in shower and living room where you take relax in front of the tv or take in an unrivalled view of the castle.

The city's transport links are also within easy reach.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Peaceful  Cabin In The Dell -enjoy!
description:
This space is for you! A peaceful , beautiful, bespoke, architect- designed cabin set by the waters of Leith in Colinton Dell. You will be greeted by birdsong and the gentle sound of the river. Come relax and enjoy this space.
Colinton with its wonderful history and amenities- Robert Louis Stephenson trail. Every thing is here, close to Edinburgh , the sea, beautiful hills and mountains - a gateway for you to enjoy, resting, sightseeing, walking, cycling , Edinburgh Festival -ITS ALL HERE!

name: Private eco friendly flat in Victorian townhouse
description: This is a freshly refurbished flat in a restored Victorian townhouse with Arthur's seat visible from the garden. Conveniently situated on a main road into the city centre, it is 10 minutes by bus or 25 minutes walking, bus stop located across the road. It is a popular area with many bars, restaurants, The Queen's Hall and Festival Theatre nearby. You can also enjoy a walk in neighbouring Holyrood Park, taking in the Science Museum and The Scottish Parliament Building which are close by.

name: St Christopher's Inn Bed in 18 Bed Dorm
description: Nestled in the centre of the medieval Old Town, our hostel is in the perfect location to reveal Edinburgh’s magical charm combined with an underground party scene unlike any other city.  With incredible sights such as Edinburgh Castle, the Scottish National Galleries and the Royal Mile just a short stroll away from your bed there’s no excuse not to get out and about! Our Edinburgh hostel is also a very convenient 2 minute walk from Waverley station.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh City Centre hideaway
description: Location, location, location...Discover Edinburgh from this charming city centre hideaway nestled on a cobbled lane. Just steps from the castle, train station, tram stop, and bus routes, surrounded by vibrant bars and restaurants, it's the perfect base for exploring the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautifully Designed, Art-Filled City Escape
description:
I’m a highly-rated, experienced Airbnb host and this is a rare chance to stay in my home—available only a few days a year.

It’s filled with art, antiques, and unique finds, creating a warm, comfortable, and quiet retreat. Located in a vibrant city-centre neighbourhood, you’ll be just 10 minutes from Holyrood Palace, the Royal Mile, and Princes Street, with fantastic cafés, restaurants, and wine shops nearby.

Breakfast, ingredients and fresh linen are all included for a seamless stay.

name: 4-bedroom apartment perfect for families!
description:
Fantastic spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom maisonette apartment perfect for families and groups!

*Contact me for a long stay discount!*

The apartment benefits from a superb location just off London Road, within walking distance to the Scottish Parliament, Holyrood Palace and Holyrood Park, historic Royal Mile and the Old town.

The property is on 2 levels and offers 4 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, large living room with a double sofa bed, dining space for 8 people and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Safe & Private entire Gatehouse Apartment Newhaven
description:
This charming 1 bedroom + sofa bed , gatehouse is in a beautifully quiet & safe location and only 20mins to the iconic Royal Mile & Princess St. This stone-built gatehouse is completely secluded, self contained and modern. Property sits behind a safe and secure walled garden with private entrance.
Set near the harbour waterfront, north of the city centre and within easy reach of the Shore and Leith area with facilities including a cinema, supermarket and lovely cafes, bars and restaurants

name: Bright and spacious central flat
description:
Bright, spacious but cosy one bedroom flat a walking distance from Edinburgh city centre! Funky and stylish flat with lots of character.

One bathroom, with a shower and bath. One spacious bedroom with king size double bed, also option for electric blow up single mattress if needed.

All amenties such as condiments, kettle, microwave, toaster, oven, pots, pans, hob, TV, fridge, freezer, washing machine all included and available for use!

name: Tranquil Retreat in the City/Free parking/Wifi
description: Our spacious house is absolutely perfect for family/extended family time in Edinburgh. The house, in a superb location provides the ideal base to explore the sights. Situated in a leafy crescent in up-market Merchiston this modern house has all the facilities of Bruntsfield and Morningside on the doorstep yet is only a short bus ride or scenic walk into the centre. With a private entrance, free parking in the drive and a lush garden all to yourselves this is the ideal place to stay. (NO PARTIES)

name: Double/Twin room near Edinburgh city centre
description:
Stay in this tranquil and modern city centre home for a unique and friendly Edinburgh experience.

-Room is located in a newly built highly insulated garden room, with private en suite & underfloor heating.
-Room can be arranged as 1 king size double bed or 2 single beds.
-Electronically controlled opening rooflight, with black out blinds
-Bi-fold doors with blackout blinds.
Shared use of kitchen and living room with wood burning stove.
-Room located in rear garden & accessed via main house.

name: *Fabulous, modern and clean flat* LOVE EDINBURGH!
description:
My flat is located in Sighthill, a residential area of Edinburgh. It has got a front and back garden which is great for a picnic if you wish (if weather is dry and warm).
Entering the flat, you will find the bathroom and the kitchen on the left, the living room in front of you and the bedrooms on the right. There are 2 cupboards for cleaning stuff/vacuum cleaner.

name: Penthouse Sea City Views
description: Discover Edinburgh’s most prestigious waterfront retreat, favored by celebrities and footballers alike! Nestled by the bay, this luxurious spot offers not only breathtaking views but also excellent tram connectivity. Reach the city center in just 15 minutes and immerse yourself in the charm of Scotland's capital. Ideal for those seeking exclusivity and convenience

name: Frederick Street - Stylish New Town apartment!
description: Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at Princes Str stop and arrive at Murrayfield in just 30 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to the heart of the action.

name: Beautiful mews house on a quiet cobbled street.
description: Our lovely mews house is on a cobbled street in the centre of the city, just behind Picardy Place & York Place. It's a new build property, beautifully finished in an eclectic modern style with high quality furnishings. Each bedroom is on its own floor with its own shower room. The lower ground floor bedroom has patio doors opening out onto the house's peaceful patio garden space. The lounge, kitchen & diner are on the first floor, which is a beautiful light space with mezzanine. A rare property.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cute House with Courtyard
description:
✔ Stunning house with a great location in central Leith
✔ 729 ft2 | 67 m2
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1.5 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ Shared courtyard with outdoor seating
✔ Great selection of restaurants, bars, and shops within walking distance
✔ 9-minute walk to Leith Links
✔ 10-minute walk to The Royal Yacht Britannia
✔ 11-minute walk to Leith Theatre

name: Edinburgh City Centre Flat - Fringe Festival
description:
Stay in the heart of the action this Fringe! Our newly refurbished 3-bedroom flat in Lauriston Gardens (EH3) is ideally located just off The Meadows – one of the most central and sought-after areas for festival-goers and performers alike.

📍 Unbeatable Location – Walk to Major Fringe Venues

name: High Street - Modern apartment in the Old Town!
description: High Street - Modern, scandi design apartment in the Old Town!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Delightful Edinburgh City Centre Apartment
description:
Treat yourself to a stay in this fabulous traditional third (top) floor Edwardian flat, dating back to the late 19th century (with no lift).

The apartment has been nicely decorated throughout and offers a charming and stylish place to spend your holiday or business trip in bonnie Edinburgh.

The location is 2nd to none and is only a 5 minute walk from the city centre (Lothian Road). It offers great access to bus routes, quaint cafés, memorable restaurants, cinema & the delightful Union canal.

name: Amazing penthouse, stunning views, Castle 2 mins
description: A striking renovated apt, in sought-after address & neighbouring Edinburgh castle. Wonderfully bright 2 bedroom top floor flat with arguably the best views across the city & over to Fife. The finish has high specification throughout. Generously sized open plan kitchen/dining/lounge area. The apartment is completed with a stylish bathroom with modern features such as underfloor heating & Samsung QLED flatscreen in the lounge & Sonos surround sound to accompany. This apartment won't disappoint.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright apartment 5 kms from the city centre
description:
CHECK-IN is from 13:00.
Bright flat just 5 km away from the city centre and 9 km from the airport, with FREE car parking ALONG THE ROAD. The guest room features a double bed, fresh linens, pillows and towels.
Your room has a lock and locks from INSIDE ONLY.
The bus connection is excellent both to the airport (30 mins) and to the city centre (15-20 mins).
Several supermarkets to choose from nearby. The area is very quiet - also a big park right in front of the house with lots of green areas.

name: Boutique Bothy - Bolthole in Stockbridge New Town
description:
Experience the charms of Edinburgh with this Grade A listed, main door converted Georgian sweet shop located on a quaint lane in the New Town.
Brimming with quirky charm, the 'Boutique Bothy' is a one bedroom urban bothy perfect for 2-3 and snug for 4 if you dont mind a cosy sofa bed.
Nestled on a quaint lane between the cafes of Stockbridge and the bars and restaurants of George Street, this self-contained property offers a cosy designer inspired cottage right in the middle of the city.

name: *25% OFF* 3-Bedroom Apartment - Central Edinburgh
description: Positioned in the heart of Edinburgh, this newly renovated second floor apartment offers the perfect combination of convenience and style. The property is just 10 minutes' walk from the historic Royal Mile, the extinct volcano of Arthurs' Seat and the delightful Meadows Park. Additionally, its proximity to some of Edinburgh's finest bars and restaurants makes the property the ideal hub for city-centre exploration.

name: King's Road [425]
description: This charming apartment, only a minutes walk from Portobello beach, is situated on the second floor of a victorian tenement. Portobello has a lovely long sandy beach and offers plenty of great restaurants and cafes it is a destintaion in itself, but for guests also looking to explore edinburgh, you can reach Princes street by public transport in around 30 minutes or 20 minutes by car.

name: 12-Bed Mixed Dorm
description: Single bed in a shared mixed dorm.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Montgomery - Fantastic, 2-bed main-door apartment!
description: Back for Summer 2025—perfect for a central yet peaceful Edinburgh stay. Spacious main door apartment in a quiet spot near Princes Street and Calton Hill. This bright lower ground flat has 2 large bedrooms with UK king-size beds, a roomy living area with fully equipped kitchen, and separate bathroom and toilet—ideal for sharing. The front bedroom features a dressing room and seating area. Shared outdoor space, private street entrance.

name: 6-Bed Female Dorm
description: Single bed in a shared all-female dorm
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 4-Bed Private Dorm
description:
Entire private room, with an attached private bathroom.
2 single bunk beds.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 9-Bed Female Dorm
description: Single bed in an all-female shared dorm.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 9-Bed Mixed Dorm
description: Single bed in a shared dorm.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 6-Bed Mixed Dorm
description: Single bed in a shared dorm.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 5mins to Queen Palace, FREE parking
description:
The 2 bedroom apartment is ideal for up to 6 guests and is centrally located - an excellent base from which to explore Edinburgh with everything very close at hand. Free parking space available in request.
Bed configuration is 2 kingsize beds in the bedroom ( twin bed set up or sofabed available on request)

name: Bright Single Room in Spacious New Town Flat
description: A bright single bedroom in Edinburgh's New Town.  Close to the city centre with excellent transport connections, and on a lovely local street full of great bars, restaurants and shops.

name: Be My Guest!
description:
Welcome to my home.

A restful place, close to the city centre.

The guest room is furnished with:

• a double bed
• two night-stands with night-lamps
• USB charging ports
• writing desk and chair
• a tallboy
• mirrored wardrobe
• luggage rack
• hairdryer.

The private shower room (not en-suite) - enjoy fresh clean towels and toiletries produced in Scotland.

A simple 'self serve' breakfast is offered:
tea/coffee, orange juice, muesli/porridge, yogurt, milk/butter, bread, marmalade/ jam.

name: Comfortable Royal Mile apartment
description: A comfortable and well equipped apartment located on Royal Mile, an ideal location for an Edinburgh holiday. This first-floor apartment is  on the Canongate, part of Edinburgh’s famous Royal Mile. It is 5 minute walk from Waverley station and airport bus, and also all major attractions are literally on your doorstep, including Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, St. Giles Catedral, Princes Street which are minutes away. A wide range of shops, bars and restaurants are quite close to the apartment.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 9 person GF flat - NEWINGTON - 10 min city!
description: This spacious 4 bedroom main door flat is the perfect place for an Edinburgh getaway. Located in affluent Newington, the property is within walking distance from the Meadows, Pollock Halls, Arthur Sear, the Royal Commonwealth Pool and Summerhall. Along with this, a diverse rang of restaurants and cafes are located around the area. Only a 10 minute walk into the centre!

name: Waterfront Comfortable Double Room In Edinburgh
description: Fresh bright clean newly decorated ground floor flat with garden patio door. In a very quiet desirable area of Edinburgh next to the water and harbour. 2 minute walk from bus links into the city centre. The flat is a 10 minute walk from a friendly hotel bar/restaurant with beer Garden and local Supermarket.

name: Perfect place to enjoy Edinburgh
description:
This is my lovely 2 bed apartment with an ideal location to take advantage of all the city has to offer. The city centre, The Shore(Top restaurants,bars and The Royal Yacht Britannia), Stockbridge, The New Town and The Royal Botanic Gardens are all within walking or if you prefer bussing distance.

My background is almost 16 years of running an award winning B&B. I pride myself in offering Scottish hospitality at its best. Happy to help with insights into my Edinburgh.

Slàinte mhath

name: A beautiful well appointed comfortable family home
description: Large family home set in 10 acres of private gardens and woodland. Tennis court, BBQ hut. Sleeps up to 14. Just 30 mins from Edinburgh city centre, 15 minutes form the airport and 45 minutes to Glasgow. Perfect for special occasions, family holidays, Edinburgh International Festival and Fringe.

name: Central double bedroom with ensuite shower room
description: Lovely room in lower ground floor flat in quiet and beautiful Georgian New Town - within easy walking distance of all the sights.  Double bedroom with ensuite shower room and private entrance. Wifi, tea and coffee provided - take your morning tea/coffee in the garden or in bed!  Lots of excellent cafes and restaurants 5 minutes walk away. Just 10 minutes walk from Waverley train station,  5 mins from the bus station and  5 mins from the tram stop, which takes you to/from the airport.

name: Beautiful Cosy Apartment on edge of Edinburgh
description: A beautiful apartment, cosy and comfortable situated on first floor of large country house. Lovely views onto parkland with mature trees and extensive garden. Large double bedroom, smaller twin bed room, modern bathroom with shower, small kitchen and sitting room with dining area at one end and log fire. The sitting room has large sunny windows facing south and onto gardens at the rear of the house. Guests have full use of immediate garden and also use of our tennis court.

name: New/Return: Lovely 3 Bed Apartment near Haymarket
description: This is a lovely flat within walking distance of Edinburgh Haymarket station and has easy access to all major amenities in Edinburgh with fantastic bus and train links.

name: CosyFlat:NrAirprt,Bus,Centre.Patio,Parking,Wifi TV
description: Fully  licensed. Small studio flat attached to main house, ideal for a couple or a change in working environment. On drive parking.  Local shops, cinema, swimming pool & pubs walking distance. On main bus route to city centre & train stations. Easy access to bridges & countryside. Short walk to Pentland hills. WiFi,TV.  Heriot Watt Uni, Edinburgh College, Murrayfield Stadium, Ski Centre, Highland Cattle nearby. Short Taxi drive from airport. Not safe for children under 12. No pets are allowed.

name: Spacious 3BR apartment great links to city! + LIFT
description:
A delightful and spacious apartment with all the modern essentials you could need, located in the west of the city. Great for travellers, families and those on business alike!

The apartment has great bus links to both the airport and to Edinburgh's famous city centre including sites such as Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile, The Grassmarket, Princes Street and so much more!

There are bars, restaurants and shops are all within walking distance of the apartment.

name: 3 Bedroom Edinburgh City apartment - sleeps 6
description: Our 3 bedroom apartments are part of Cairn Hotel and Apartments, situated in Edinburgh's city centre in converted Georgian townhouses. The bedroom apartment/houses are at the lower ground.

name: Cosy Double room in south Edinburgh, Free parking
description:
Comfortable double room in bright, clean and well-furnished apartment. Located in a quiet suburb, yet only 4 miles from the city centre, which is served by a number of fast and frequent 24-hour buses from right outside, and direct to and from the airport too. There are several large supermarkets within walking distance. Parking is free.

The room is in my own home and the sitting room, kitchen and bathroom are shared. The room has satellite TV, quality bedding and Wi-fi is available throughout.

name: Bright 2BR flat 5 minutes from the Royal Mile
description:
This bright and ideally situated two-bed apartment is located in the bustling centre of town, it is only a short walk to all of the main attractions Edinburgh has to offer.

The apartment comes with all the amenities you may need to enjoy your time in Edinburgh in comfort. There are numerous bars, restaurants, coffee shops and quirky stores on your doorstep to enjoy.

All bookings after the 1st of October 2023 are subject to licensing and planning permission as per guidance on AirBnB.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful 4 bed 2 bath family home in Newington
description:
Perfect home for your stay in Edinburgh. Very spacious 4 bed 2 bath. Walking distance to Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, Pleasance, George Sq, Queen’s Hall, Festival Theatre. Beautiful, bright family home spread over 2 floors with period features & stunning views. It’s a very quiet residential neighbourhood on the south side of the city near Edinburgh University.
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, bars & The Meadows all within walking distance or v easy bus access. Free on street parking.

name: Your second home, The Glasgow room
description: The perfect hideout for your excursion into the city, central between the airport and the city centre, is the right place to enjoy the beauty of the city and a good night sleep

name: A House of Plenty - Peaceful, Beautiful & Central
description:
Step into a bright, beautiful flat just off Leith Walk — one of Edinburgh’s most vibrant and well-connected neighbourhoods. Just minutes from the city centre with direct airport tram access, the flat is beautifully styled with original features, curated artwork, and all the comforts of home.
Enjoy a comprehensively equipped kitchen, spa-style bathroom, memory foam mattresses, and ultra-fast Wi-Fi.

Welcome to my home — a peaceful base to explore the City of Edinburgh, shared with love.

name: Stylish flat in Holyrood Park close to Royal Mile
description:
Beautifully renovated, traditional tenement flat over looking Arthur’s Seat, Holyrood Park And Palace, conveniently close to the Royal Mile and City Centre attractions.
Useful info - 2nd floor traditional tenement with 2 sets of stairs required to access the accommodation.
Parking is free and unlimited in directly adjacent streets but pay for parking Monday -Friday 8.30am to 5.30pm on the actual street where the flat is located.

name: Stylish Two-Bedroom Apt With Spiral Staircase
description: Centrally located in Edinburgh's highly desirable Stockbridge/New Town area, the apartment is perfectly designed for couples, solo travellers or a family looking to enjoy the buzz & beauty of the city! With easy walking access to all the main attractions and the public transport links, there is very little you can't reach within a 10-15 minute journey. The area boasts some fantastic restaurants, cafes, bars, shops and green spaces. It's without doubt my favourite area in the city.

name: ✔ Pleasance Luxury ✔ City Centre ✔ Fast WiFi ✔
description:
★★★★★ "Exceptional. Lovely apartment, absolutely perfect for us and our elderly parents. Excellent wheelchair access and ideal for shops/cafes/pubs etc. Would happily stay again."

"First Pleasance Luxury Apartment" offers:
✔ Ground floor, private main door access
✔ Less than 10 min walk to Royal Mile
✔ Fully equipped kitchen
✔ Children and wheelchair friendly
✔ Hotel quality beds/mattresses.
✔ Bed linen, towels, cot, high chair, hairdryer and iron
✔ Large Smart TV with YouTube and Netflix ❤️

name: Portobello seaside apartment .
description: Beautifully stylish freshly refurbished ground floor , own door 1 bedroom flat, 200 yards from the beach and a few miles from Edinburgh city centre.

name: Cosy apartment in Historic City Centre
description: Fabulous,  bright basement flat peacefully situated close to the bustling top of Leith Walk (Playhouse theatre, Calton Hill, cafes, pubs & restaurants). 10 minute walk to east end of Princes Street and 20 min walk to the Royal Mile, the flat provides a spacious living room area and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Charming, quiet, central apartment with gardens
description:
An attractive, traditional ground floor apartment with lovely front and rear gardens. It's on a wide, tree-lined street by a large park; walking distance to the historic centre.

It’s bright and spacious, nicely furnished, with a charming living room. The kitchen is well-equipped, with patio doors leading to the rear garden.

There are two delightful double bedrooms. Off the hallway are the main bathroom, walk-in dressing room and a further separate WC.

STL Licence: EH-70029-F
EPC: C

name: Bus: 15 to city, 20 airport/Murrayfield. Late-C-O
description: We are situated just off Queensferry Road. There is a lovely park across the road which takes you on a pretty scenic walk.  The park is also a shortcut to the village of Davidsons Mains, which has a Costa coffee, Pharmacy & a local pub which serves food. Getting around is really quite simple. We are a 2 min walk to two bus stops - a 43 bus into the city centre in around 15/20 minutes OR a 21 / 200 which brings you to Ocean Terminal & Leith & a 200 which is the airport route in 23 mins.

name: Stockbridge- 2 Bedrooms- Ground Floor- Trendy Area
description:
Our charming ground floor apartment is in a prime location in Stockbridge - a stunning part of central Edinburgh.

The Victorian apartment is light and airy and was recently refurbished.

It is beautifully decorated and styled throughout and overlooks the quiet shared garden.

The accommodation comprises living room with dining area for four, compact modern kitchen, bathroom with roll top bath and shower over it, double bedroom and a second bedroom with single bunk beds.

name: Beautiful Meadowbank Apartment near Holyroodhouse
description:
Beautiful, large apartment located near main tourist attractions such as Arthur's Seat and the Palace of Holyrood House.

Modern furnishings with brand new beds and orthopaedic mattresses (as of June 2019).

High spec finish to the whole apartment and Smart TV, internet and washer dryer all available for guest use.

Large supermarket and shopping park just a five minute walk away. Bus routes just outside.

Suitable for families, business trips and friends alike.

We hope to host you soon!

name: Bright and airy flat in the heart of the Old Town
description:
Bright and airy flat in the heart of the Old Town, overlooking Arthur's Seat.

You have shops, cafes, restaurants literally downstairs. You are so central that everything is walking distance!

The flat comprises of two double bedrooms, bathroom and spacious kitchen/diner. Please note there is no separate living room as we converted it to a bedroom with a comfy bed.

Please note that the flat is on the 3rd floor without an elevator. The flat is 45 square metres, but has everything you need!

name: Single bed in beautiful cottage in rural setting
description: Private single bedroom in old stone cottage. 15 mins from airport and 2 min walk to regular bus service, which runs day and night to the city centre. Out the back gate and you are on the beautiful tree lined Water of Leith walkway, out the front gate and up the road and you are up in the Pentland hills. Fabulous walks and running routes either way.

name: Apartment at Dalry Road in Edinburgh
description:
This is a lovely, spacious 2 double bedrooms apartment located in Murieston Terrace. It is close to bus stop for1, 2, 3, 4, 25, 33, 44 which brings you to the City Centre .

Not far from Haymarket Station, which takes about 12 minutes walk to the station and 25 mins to the city centre! It also handy to local pubs, restaurants and shops and close to the town.

name: Amazing Large Apartment With Great City Links
description:
This delightful two-bedroom apartment can fulfil all your needs as you visit one of the UK's most interesting and largest cities. An open-plan living and dining area, complete with a large Smart TV and all the cutlery and crockery you need, means there is ample room for relaxation, while the fully equipped kitchen allows you to cook at your leisure.
A double bedroom and a twin bedroom mean there is plenty of space for all the family, and a sofa bed helps this apartment cater for large groups.

name: Elegant Open Plan Studio By Mansley
description: Our City Studio apartments the perfectly cosy city pad for a short business stay or a weekend away. Featuring a compact lounge with a dining area, fully fitted kitchen, modern bathroom, the City Studios also have a separate bedroom with a standard double bed. Book direct to find the best rates for your stay. City Studio apartments are located on the ground floor.

name: Elegant 1 Bedroom Apartment by Mansley
description: Overlooking Lauriston Street, our modern one bedroom serviced apartments are spacious for one guest on a business stay or a couple on holiday. Featuring a lounge with a dining area, fully fitted kitchen, modern bathroom, the City One Bedroom apartments feature a standard double bed in the main bedroom.

name: Spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment by Mansley
description: Located in the main building facing overlooking our quiet car park, these spacious two bedroom apartments are perfect for a small family or group of friends. The main bedroom features a queen size double bed, the second bedroom offers Twin beds, which can also be joined together (on request) to make a super- king size bed. These apartments also offer a spacious lounge with a dining area, fully fitted kitchen and a modern bathroom.

name: Spacious 1 Bedroom Apartment by Mansley
description: The Comfort One Bedroom serviced apartments feature a contemporary style layout of an open plan lounge and kitchen with dining area. The fully fitted kitchen comes with high spec appliances. The main bedroom presents a queen size bed. These modern apartments are located in the annexe building and overlook the quite car park.

name: Comfort 2 Bedroom Apartment by Mansley
description:
Elegant and modern, the Comfort Two Bedroom serviced apartments feature a spacious lounge, fully fitted kitchen and two bathrooms. The master bedroom has a queen size bed and an en-suite shower room. The second bedroom features two single beds that can also be joined together on request. The main bathroom comes with a shower over bath.

Ideal for groups, or families on a longer visit, these brilliant serviced apartments are where you’ll find a home from home experience in the heart of Edinburgh.

name: Yellow Monkey Apartment near Holyrood Palace
description: Return from a busy day exploring the city of Edinburgh to relax in eclectic style and complete comfort. Our apartment is packed with original art, furnishings and thoughtful touches - the perfect spot to unwind and feel at home!

name: Cordiners Land - 2BR in the heart of the old town!
description:
At the end of a quiet no-through road, this beautifully refurbished tastefully decorated property with private garden will be your home from home. In close proximity are Newhaven harbour, the Royal Yacht Britannica and the Shore area of Leith. Royal Botanic Gardens are less than a 30 minute walk.
Regular buses or the tram take you to city centre within 30 mins, and free on street parking is available.

name: Direct tram from airport, train and bus stations
description:
LGBT+ friendly cosy, modern, room in recently decorated 3rd floor Victorian flat. The room sleeps 2 people in 1 bed. There are USB A and C charger sockets and an international adapter in the room. Free Wifi. Shared bathroom.

Parking - My street recently became part of a permit holder's parking zone, but the edge of the zone is just 400m away where you can park for free.

name: Stunning Old Town Red Room for Cosy Stay
description:
This is a large A-listed tenement flat in Newington, within walking distance of Edinburgh University (and five minutes from the Pollock Halls), the vibrant city centre, Queen’s Park and the Meadows.

We offer a double bedroom called the Red Room because of its decor. This is a stylish space which makes an ideal base from which to explore my favourite city. It suits a couple.

The surrounding area has many charming individual shops, plenty of bars, cafes and restaurants.

name: Comfort 3 Bedroom Apartment by Mansley
description:
The exceptional Comfort Three Bedroom apartment is the perfect combination of luxury and home from home experience. A spacious lounge features a Plasma TV, DVD player with cinema surround system and a separate dining area for up to six guests.

The master bedroom has a queen size bed and single bed, and an en-suite shower room. The second bedroom has twin beds which can be joined to make a king bed. Bedroom three features a queen size bed & make-up area.

name: Very Large Old Town Yellow Room for 2 guests
description:
This is a large A-listed tenement flat in Newington. It is within walking distance of Edinburgh University (and only five minutes from the Pollock Halls), the vibrant city centre, Queen’s Park and the Meadows.

We offer a very spacious and stylish Yellow Room with a small bright study. The main area has a three-piece suite and a dining table. This room makes an ideal base from which to explore the city. The surrounding area has four supermarkets and many shops, bars, cafes and restaurants.

name: Large ensuite room in a central flat, free parking
description: Our unique, just decorated historic apartment is perfectly situated to enjoy Edinburgh. Within walking distance of Princes Street and most major central locations, you also have easy access to anywhere else in the city, or beyond, by bus, tram or train. The sunny and spacious bedroom, with a garden theme, has very comfortable twin beds (or a double bed if desired) and a modern en-suite bathroom. There is also a large, relaxing living room and a fully equipped kitchen. Free parking is available!

name: Seaside Maisonette in Popular Tourist Town
description: Entire high end 19th century maisonette situated in the heart of historic seaside town, South Queensferry. Located with free parking nearby (1 min walk) and multiple restaurants, bars and amenities on your doorstep as well as beautiful walks and beaches. 30 second walk to a bus stop which goes directly to Edinburgh city centre for perfect access to The Edinburgh Fringe Festival and links to surrounding areas. Ideal for a relaxing escape or for experiencing the thrills of Scotland's capital!

name: Characterful Architects Home in Morningside
description: Amazing Victorian home of two Architects! Spacious & bright, warm & lovingly designed & entirely yours for your stay. Beautiful natural light with a balance of contemporary furnishings & features. Perfectly located in the heart of Morningside. Enjoy the history & atmosphere of the city whilst you sit & relax surrounded by greenery & connections to Pentlands, Blackford & Craiglockart Hills. Delicious coffee shops, artisan bakeries, delis, restaurants and a super friendly culture on our door step.

name: Trendy & Central 18th Century River View Apartment
description: A superb location - In the village like haven of Leith the apartment is a Trendy 18th century converted Whisky bond with a River View of the Water of Leith. The shore area is central to everything that Leith and Edinburgh has to offer surrounded by trendy bars and coffee shops it's perfect for couples who want to explore Edinburgh as it's only 10 minutes from Princess Street, A unique property with original oak beams and restored stone work. Don't just experience Edinburgh's history - STAY in it

name: 3 bedroom flat,great hub for town & airport
description:
A bright, modern and spacious three-bedroom apartment, located on the first floor, that has been recently renovated to a very high standard providing a comfortable and homely environment in the perfect location to explore the city.

Whether you are travelling alone, as a couple, a group of friends or family. This tastefully decorated apartment will provide you with the perfect base for your stay in Edinburgh.

name: Upper Bow - Luxurious, Modern 1BR flat near Castle
description: In the heart of Edinburgh's  Old Town, our classy 1 bedroom home is the ideal spot for any traveller looking to experience this historic city! Perfect for guests travelling for the Edinburgh festival, you will only need to take a step outside the front door and you will be met with a hub of entertainment. Whilst I will not be available in person, I engage the help of a professional management company, so you can be sure that your stay will be flawless!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious, Bright & Central, Ground Floor- Sleeps 6
description: This stunning Edinburgh property is situated on Gayfield Place, at the top of Leith Walk.  It is a ground floor apartment with its own private entrance. Comfortably sleeping 6 guests between its 3 large bedrooms it also offers a stunning sociable kitchen, 2 bathrooms (one is ensuite to master bedroom) and a spacious living room. Extremely well positioned for exploring Edinburgh using public transport, or on foot- many of the main attractions are an easy walk!

name: Beautiful Georgian Home in the City Centre
description:
This traditional Scottish home is bound to give you the true Scottish experience. Ideally located on the quiet Union Street, right next to The Edinburgh Play House and the York Place tram stop, you will never be far from the action!

You will feel relaxed in this Georgian home featuring 2 bedrooms; one super king and one double bed, a huge living room with beautiful high ceilings, 2 bathrooms and an eloquently design kitchen. Flexible check in and out at no extra cost :) just pop us a message!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Large (125m²) 3 Bedroom Apartment with Garden
description:
This spectacular large (125m²/1350 sq ft) 3 bedroom garden flat is situated in Edinburgh's prestigious New Town district, inside a Georgian-era building. It is accessed via a private front door directly from the street, and features large rooms, high ceilings, ornate period features, and a private back garden.

Amenities include a 52" Smart TV with Netflix, Nintendo switch, digital piano, and a Sonos sound system for music. We are pet friendly, and have baby facilities (high chair and cot)

name: Pod in shared 10 bed dormitory - THE CoURT
description: A former courthouse and jail has transformed into a CoDE Pod Hostel- The CoURT. The Victorian A-listed building is located in the heart of Edinburgh's old town and is surrounded by the cities most famous landmarks.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Pod in shared 6 bed dormitory - THE CoURT
description: A former courthouse and jail has transformed into a CoDE Pod Hostel- The CoURT. The Victorian A-listed building is located in the heart of Edinburgh's old town and is surrounded by the cities most famous landmarks
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Pod in shared, female 8 bed dormitory - THE CoURT
description: A former courthouse and jail has transformed into a CoDE Pod Hostel- The CoURT. The Victorian A-listed building is located in the heart of Edinburgh's old town and is surrounded by the cities most famous landmarks.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Pod in shared, female 10 bed dormitory
description: A former courthouse and jail has transformed into a CoDE Pod Hostel- The CoURT. The Victorian A-listed building is located in the heart of Edinburgh's old town and is surrounded by the cities most famous landmarks.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Heart of City & Old Town - Townhouse 1.6Gbps Wifi
description: Beautiful light airy and spacious town house located in the very heart beat of Edinburgh's festival and student area. The House is split over two floors with a main door entrance from the main street and a beautiful landscaped garden to the rear. new mattresses and beds and linens ensure you a high level of comfort and fast fibre broadband and desk space make it an equally good place to work from.

name: Chinese room free parking close to Royal Infirmary
description:
Quiet residential area, easy walking to the Royal Infirmary. Bus stop to the city centre, festival venues and airport are only two minutes walk from our home. 30 mins to city centre and an hour to airport. Easy reach of the bypass with free parking on street.
The Chinese themed bedroom has a standard double bed with wardrobe.
Kitchen/diner and bathroom are shared with my husband and I.
Please read the house rules before booking.
You are at other people's home please treat with care and respect!

name: Bright 1BD Central City Stay with Historic Twist
description: This refreshingly bright and comfortable one-bedroom flat is the perfect base for your Edinburgh adventure. Nestled in the heart of the city, you’ll be just a short stroll from iconic sights, lively cafes, restaurants, and fantastic transport links. Whether you're here to explore the historic Old Town or enjoy the local culture, this stylish flat has everything you need—from a cosy living area and fully equipped kitchen to a peaceful bedroom. Book your stay and feel right at home...
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Unique Tranquil Location In The City Centre
description: City of Edinburgh license and compliant with council H&S requirements.  Home share, set in the heart of picturesque, historic Dean Village, a 10minute walk from the West End of Princes Street where you can enjoy all the delights that Edinburgh offers.  Private entrance on Miller Row, you will enjoy privacy in your suite.  The accommodation has a king-size bed, TV, beautiful en-suite shower room and a private sitting room, with smart TV, dining space and basic catering facilities. (no kitchen).

name: Single room in beautiful victorian house.
description: Single room on second floor of beautiful Victorian guest house in southside Edinburgh. Close to Kings Buildings Campus of Edinburgh University and only 35 mins walk to the High Street. Please note there is no breakfast included for this listing.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Heart of City & Old Town - Townhouse 1.6Gbps Wifi
description:
Beautiful light airy and spacious town house in the very heart beat of Edinburgh's festival and student area 4 mins to George SQ-EH8. The House is split over two floors with a main door entrance from the main street and a beautiful landscaped garden to the rear. new mattresses and beds and linens ensure a high level of comfort and 1GB very fast broadband, desk space make it an equally good space to work from.

This room is furnished with a new Double bed & Mattress and very fast internet

name: Heart of Festival & Old Town - Great townhouse #4
description: Beautiful light airy and spacious town house located in the very heart beat of Edinburgh's Old town and student area 6 mins walk to University Eh8 9QN. The House is split over two floors with a main door entrance from the main street and a beautiful landscaped garden to the rear. new mattresses and beds and linens ensure you a high level of comfort and fast fibre broadband and desk space make it an equally good place to work from.

name: Festival Perfect Stay - Perfect Location-Old Town
description:
Big traditional room with a king size sofa bed. Beautiful light airy and space located in the very heart beat of Edinburgh's old town. The House is split over two floors with a main door entrance from the main street and a beautiful landscaped garden to the rear. Very comfortable sofa bed and huge windows with shutters

Room has all mod cons Dyson Air Purifier, 65 Inch TV and a heated blanket with his and her controls(you can regulate each side separately )

Desk and Chair workspace also.

name: Relaxing flat , Edinburgh, Leith
description: Central Victorian one bedroom quiet Edinburgh flatnext to The Royal Yacht Britannia.  Nice decorated & recently refurbished, this flat boasts a living room, kitchen, 1 large bedrooms with big wardrobe, shower and toilet seperate. Close to The Shore and Newhaven Harbour, Ocean Terminal shooping centre , 10-15 min drive to the city centre.

name: Charming Historic Cottage - near EICC Pubs & Shops
description: This 200-year-old historic listed property, with a garden and walk-out balcony, is hidden on a quiet, leafy street in Fountainbridge. It has two double bedrooms and is a 5-minute walk from vibrant Morrison Street, buzzing with bars, pubs, and eateries. Princes Street, the main shopping area, is about 1 kilometre away. The internet (Three Network) is mostly reliable but can be patchy at times.

name: Modern 2-bedroom flat on the Union Canal
description:
First floor flat with two bedrooms, two bathrooms living and free parking. 20-30 mins by foot to Princes st and Royal mile or 10-15 mins by bus.

Living room and a separate kitchen with coffee maker, dishwasher, washer dryer. One king and one double bed, Wi-Fi, ample storage. Bathrooms include a large bath with shower and a second shower in the separate en-suite.

Peaceful and trendy location, very close to Brunsfield and Fountainbridge with many cafes, restaurants and ba

name: Boutique Studio Suite East Edinburgh Free Parking
description: We offer a freshly painted self contained studio, with private bathroom and kitchenette. The studio is attached to our house however you will be completely self contained with your own front door to come and go as you please. There is plenty of free on-street parking right outside the house.

name: Immaculate 2 Bedroom Flat Near Royal Mile
description: Perfect Location: 5 mins' walk from Holyrood Palace and the famous Scottish Parliament Building; within walking distance to Edin old town's main attractions. Our brand new and beautifully presented 2 bedroom modern apartment is a PERFECT base for exploring Edinburgh. With 2 big bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and spacious living area with fully equipped kitchen facilities, it easily fits 5 guests. A short and easy bus ride to the centre. Supermarkets and eateries are 3 mins away. Free Parking-Weekend Only

name: Entire home with garden Morningside Edinburgh
description:
Ideal location for the Festival, Christmas and New Year. Walking distance or bus to the town centre. Peaceful neighbourhood. A variety of trendy cafes, bars restaurants, theatre and parks on your doorstep. Stand at the lounge windows and watch the fireworks display held at the Castle in New Year!
Its a spacious 3 double bed ground floor flat. 2 modern bathrooms and a modern kitchen with dining area. The master bedroom looks directly on to the extensive garden. Available for monthly lets!

name: Modern flat in Canonmills close to city centre
description:
Set in sought after Canonmills, just a 10 minute walk from the city centre and within walking distance from all the main Festival locations. Spacious double bedroom, good sized living room, private bathroom, kitchen with washing machine, dishwasher and dryer. Also a nice outside patio which is lovely when the weather is good and a bike shed.

Close to town and on the Water of Leith. Botanic gardens, art galleries, pubs, cafes and a good gym also nearby.

name: Carlton Street · Charming and spacious apartment.
description: A rustically charming small and central basement flat in the heart of Scotland's capital. Within walking distance of the Botanic Gardens, Princes Street and the Castle. Enjoy a relaxing stay in the city in a modern and comfortable location with everything you could possibly need within close reach!

name: A little gem in lochend drive
description:
A little, modern and comfy house few minutes walk to the center of Edinburgh.
The spaces are furnished of all comforts with fancy details for a nice and lovely stay.
Close to parks, bus stops, supermarkets and shopping centres. Lots of windows and a balcony make it so bright and beautiful.
Be aware before booking that there is a cat in the apartment.

name: Walker Street, West End, Edinburgh
description: Centrally located ground-floor and first-floor, two-bedroom apartment (sleeps 1–4) on a splendid Georgian Street in the West End, just a few minutes' walk from Princes Street and the shops and sights of the city centre and Old Town. This apartment is very close to the tram stop for Edinburgh airport. This is a peaceful location in the heart of Edinburgh's spectacular West End architecture.

name: Relax in Cosy Contemporary New Town Flat.
description:
~ Self Check in with key box
~ 10 minutes’ walk to Waverley main train station and tram stop (airport just 35 minutes tram ride)
~ Lovingly refurbished and decorated
~ Quiet location near park
~ Relax on the huge velvet sofas and enjoy Virgin Media a 55 inch TV and up to 100Mb WiFi + USB plugs throughout
~ Wealth of local independent retailers, amazing coffee shops and cosy pubs on the doorstep!
~ Set up for business travellers
~ Washing machine and hanging space
~ Up to 2 guests (1 King

name: South Bridge - Stylish Apartment in the Old Town
description: A light and airy apartment ideally located in the beautiful and historic Old Town, this apartment provides a perfect base for sightseeing and exploring. The neighbourhood offers a never-ending maze of curiosities, enticing eateries, boutique shops and age-old drinking dens. During the world-famous Fringe Festival, the area becomes the epicentre of artistic activity within the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh Calton View Royal Mile Residence - Apt 2
description: Our central apartment has been fully refurbished to an extremely high standard, and is just metres from Edinburgh's world famous Royal Mile. Outside you are immediately in the heart of the historic old town, with Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, Edinburgh Festival, Waverley Train Station, wonderful cafes, restaurants, pubs, museums, theatres, tours all close by.  We offer a welcome drink of Scottish Beer,  or a soft drink.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely Spacious Main Door Apartment on Leith Walk
description:
A pleasantly furnished, self contained perfectly located apartment in the centre of Edinburgh, at the top of Leith Walk. Parks, restaurants, theatres, buses, trains, trams, art galleries and museums are all within walking distance.

• Opposite Edinburgh Tram Stop
• Main Door Basement Flat with Wi-Fi
• Comfortable & Spacious Open Plan Living Area
• One Double Bedroom with Views over Garden
• An Additional Large Double Sofa bed in Lounge
• Modern, Spacious Shower Room
• Good Cooking Facilities

name: Broughton Rd Apartment Great For Central Edinburgh
description: Comfortable and well located apartment in the bustling city of Edinburgh, the capital of Scotland. Furnished and ready to cater for all of your needs, with plenty of cooking facilities and a comfortable living space. Only a mile away from Waverley Station and the city’s main attractions, whilst also less than ten minutes from a big superstore, it’s location is perfect to ensure you have a superb stay.

name: Charming room with private bathroom in city centre
description: Large bedroom and your own bathroom in a very central Edinburgh flat. Access down steps from street level to 16A. Note this is not apartment 16. 8-minute walk to the tram going to the Airport. Tesco and Lidl supermarkets and a range of shops, pubs and restaurants are just minutes away.

name: Grassmarket studio-Close to Castle & Royal mile
description: We have got everything you need for a perfect holiday. Fully fitted kitchen, oven with gas hob. Microwave, fridge/freezer, washing machine and dryer, and breakfast bar. As it’s a studio, we want to maximise your space, your double bed is on a special upper space above the living area. There is also a daybed in the living area, which can turn into two single beds. Gas central-heating, secondary glazed window. Enjoy your holiday in the best location!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Fabulous apartment on the Royal Mile near Castle
description: An enviable city centre location right in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town.  Situated within a historic listed building with views to Edinburgh's famous landmarks - St Giles Cathedral and Tron Kirk.  Boasting dual aspect views overlooking the Royal Mile on one side and picturesque Cockburn Street on the other.  Within walking distance to Edinburgh's vast majority of visitor attractions, museums, galleries and restaurants.  A perfect base to explore this cultural city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Boutique Hideaway in Edinburgh New Town
description:
Stylish one bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh on second floor of small modern complex. This is a quiet residential block with guests restricted to two named guests, couple or two close friends sharing double bedroom.

Close to Waverley Station, St James Quarter and the Airport Tram link, ideal for exploring all the Edinburgh has to offer. New Town's galleries , cafes, restaurants and the bustling bars and boutiques of Broughton Street are just a few minutes walk from your front door.

name: Perfectly formed one bedroom apartment.
description: Small but perfectly formed this is a lovely one bedroom apartment for work, rest or play! This is a ground floor, main door apartment with a bright open plan sitting room, spacious kitchen and dining area and large queen size bedroom.

name: Karibu Cottage (close to airport) The Thistle Room
description: The house is an old railway cottage, Previously also a butcher, flat and shop which has now been converted into one house. The kitchen has old farmhouse features with an aga. Due to the age of the property, the shared bathroom is downstairs from the bedrooms. There is a large shared family room and also a quiet (open plan) study area. The bedroom has a TV.

name: Cosy, Central West End Residence
description: My apartment is perfectly located in the centre of Edinburgh. The Airport bus stop is directly outside and the tram is just a short walk away. The historic Old Town, Princes Street and many major tourist attractions are within easy walking distance. Experience living in a traditional sandstone apartment building directly opposite the birthplace of Sir Sean Connery. Cafes, music, arts and culture are all located right outside; then relax and enjoy the 100Mb Internet and Virgin Media TV.

name: Magnificent Apartment Close To Arthur's Seat
description:
This delightful two-bedroom apartment can fulfil all your needs as you visit one of the UK's most interesting and largest cities. An open-plan living and dining area, complete with a large Smart TV and all the cutlery and crockery you need, means there is ample room for relaxation, while the fully equipped kitchen allows you to cook at your leisure.
Two bedrooms with comfortable King Size beds mean we can cater for all the family, and a sofa bed helps this apartment suit large groups.

name: Kingsize Bedroom in a Beautiful Period Property
description: Stunning period property, main door ground floor flat with beautiful south facing Patio, decorated to a high standard over 2 floors. On a desirable residential street in the heart of Edinburgh’s City Centre. With king size bedroom and private bathroom. The property is steps away from The Royal Mile, The Playhouse and Calton Hill with beautiful views of the City. In a lovely neighbourhood filled with eclectic bars, restaurants, bakeries and coffee spots.

name: Karibu Cottage (close to Airport) The Kelpie room
