description: The house is an old railway cottage, previously also a butcher, flat and shop which has now been converted into one house.  The kitchen has old farmhouse features with an aga.  Due to the age of the property, the shared bathroom is downstairs from the bedrooms. There is a large shared family room and also a quiet (open plan) study area.

name: ❂ Heart of Historic Old Town - Blair Street
description: You could hardly be more central in the very heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town within 10 minutes walking distance to almost all the major attractions. This spacious main door apartment will be the perfect base from which you can explore the city and still pop home for a spot of lunch and rest your feet.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Traditional Garden Flat in Newington Edinburgh
description:
Our traditional 2 bedroom ground floor flat, with access to front and back gardens, is a family home from home.

Based in Edinburgh's Newington area, guests are ideally located close to lots of Festival hot spots including Potterrow, Bristo Square and Teviot Place.

Edinburgh City Centre, Waverley Train Station and the bus station are a short (15 minute) bus journey away and the bus stop is a 2 minute walk from the apartment.

name: Modern loft style apartment  in converted church
description:
If you need a good city fix this converted Mariner's Church is perfect for a getaway!

Situated within a former Gothic Chapel, designed by the respected architect John Henderson in 1839.

Comfortably relax in a large, modern and stylish home.

The atmosphere is sophisticated with high-end furnishings and a fully equipped kitchen.

Located in trendy Leith, there are great transport links into the city centre.

name: The Butlers Basement
description:
In the heart of the Historic New Town, The Butlers Basement is an interior designed 1796 Georgian home with private courtyard and access. The stylish one bedroom basement apartment next to the cathedral is ideally located for tourists, families and business travellers. A 15 minute walk from the castle and Royal Mile and a 2 minute walk to Haymarket train and Airport tram stations.

The perfect space for up to 4 guests, the designed interior blends modern convenience with historic ambience.

name: Second floor flat with King Bed
description: Great base for any festival activities. Good options for buses.  Murrayfield Stadium & Tram station are around a 12minute walk away.

name: The Stewart Family
description:
Our new beautiful apartment is light spacious and by the Harbour and Shore areas of the Firth of Forth, a backdrop for some amazing sunsets.
The city centre is a 20 minute bus ride away with a bus stop 1 minute walk away or a 10 minute taxi ride.
The property is located in quiet residential area with great local amenties including the friendly Scotmid supermarket just round the corner.

name: Cosy Private Room in the heart of Edinburgh
description:
A comfortable, spacious and airy flat that has a welcoming entrance, located in the heart of Edinburgh. The street is in a fantastic location, shared by a well renowned brunch restaurant and a great independent bar.
A 10 minute walk from shopping location Princes Street, 15 minute walk from the beautiful castle and close to loads of great restaurants and bars.
If you’re more the hiking type, Arthur’s seat and Salisbury Crags are a 20 minute walk away and can be seen from the living room.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Calton Hill - Private entrance with outdoor space
description: Main door apartment with garden area in the heart of Edinburgh's city centre, but away from the hustle and bustle. On the iconic Calton Hill, this 3 bed flat complete with full amenities for your stay. A 3 minute walk from Waverley Station, a 2 minute walk from a multi-storey car park and a 5 minute walk to Waverley train station. 1 minute walk to St James' Centre and all of its attractions, a 3 minute walk to Princes Street and Edinburgh's best shops
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful & bright 2 bed flat Murrayfield
description: Our beautiful flat  offers you a perfect base to explore Edinburgh. Located in a residential area with free on street parking, within 5 minutes walking distance to the nearest tram stop. There is excellent public transport, 15 minutes by bus to Princes Street, 20 minute direct Bus/Tram from Edinburgh Airport, and  the popular Edinburgh Zoo, Murrayfield Stadium are both a 10 minute walk. There are vibrant bars and cafes on the doorstep, and a beautiful scenic walk along the Water of Leith.

name: Traditional home near Edinburgh city centre
description:
Tranquil and traditional city centre home for a unique and friendly Edinburgh experience.

Full use of a 2 bedrooms in a terrace house. 1st bedroom is located in the main house & the 2nd bedroom (can be arranged as 1 king bed or 2 single beds) is located in detached ' reargarden room'. Use of main bathroon & en suite shower room. Large living room with comfortable couches, TV & wood burning stove. Patio garden furniture. Potential 3rd bedroom also available at extra cost - please enquire.

name: Lovely Double Bedroom - Direct from Airport
description: Cosy bedroom well connected by buses from the city centre (20 min by bus). Direct bus 17 from and to the airport (bus stop just 2 minutes walk from the house). Two big supermarkets are located 5 minutes walk (Morrisons and Lidl), as well as a Post Office and a pharmacy. It takes 10 minutes on foot to reach the sea, where you can admire stunning sunsets with an amazing view of the Firth of Forth.

name: Magnificent Meadows Apartment
description:
Beautiful three bedroom apartment on the second floor in a traditional Edinburgh tenement building. Located in one of Edinburghs most popular areas on Lonsdale Terrace with the Meadows right on your doorstep.

The apartment consists of three bedrooms, with master ensuite, fully equipped kitchen, and a large living room overlooking the Meadows.

Perfect for a short or long stay to experience Edinburgh as a local.

name: Suntrap House, in stunning 3 acre mature garden.
description:
Suntrap House is a modernist house built in 1964 and is situated in a mature 3 acre garden. The house has a small courtyard for alfresco dining (weather permitting). Access to the house and garden is through an electric gate with ample private parking & car charger. There is one other house in the garden where the owners live.

The house has a large kitchen/dining area, with a separate laundry room, lounge, 3 bedrooms (king/double/twin), shower room and bathroom.

name: Stylish SightHill 3 bedroom flat with FREE parking
description: Conveniently situated between Edinburgh Airport & the city center, this upscale three-bedroom upper villa flat offers self-check-in & free parking for up to 3 cars in the adjacent driveway. Fully equipped with a kitchen, bathroom, lounge, as well as fast WiFi & a 55-inch TV. Easy access to the city center via car, public transport (with at least five bus routes), train or Uber/Bolt taxis. The Pentland Hills are just minutes away by car, and there's a cycle path leading to the city.

name: Stunning Apartment Close To Edinburgh City Centre
description: This accommodation is the definition of luxury; it is modern, stylish with pool facilities and a home from home. The apartment is spacious, well suited to accommodating large groups and furnished with beautiful pieces. There's a large living room which opens onto a contemporary kitchen, built to provide a trouble-free cooking experience. The bedrooms offer the excellent respite, comprising of two twin bedrooms, all can be converted into king-size beds and a double master bedroom with en suite.

name: Double Bedroom close to City Centre
description:
A great place for exploring all Edinburgh has to offer. Just 15 minutes by bus to all the cities' main attractions in the City Centre, Leith, Old & New Town. The area is surrounded by shops, gym, parks and the famous Edinburgh zoo (15 minutes by walk)

We offer to our guests
- 24/7 guest support
- Tea and coffees
- Laundry facility
- Great transport links, airport tram&train station 2 minutes away
You can also use the two private gardens for a bbq or just for some relax.

name: Newly converted apartment in Leith, The Shore
description:
Newly converted, top floor apartment in the trendy neighbourhood of Leith, The Shore.

Brand new, high-end furniture with comfy sofa, 65" Sony TV and integrated Siemens kitchen appliances.

Just a 10 minute taxi or 35 minute walk from Edinburgh city centre.

Surrounded by great bars and restaurants.

name: Modern City Centre Apartment in Central Location
description: Apartment newly refurbished this summer. The apartment is in the lovely vibrant Dalry area which is a short walk (0.2 miles) from Haymarket Station where both the Airlink bus and Edinburgh Tram service direct from Edinburgh airport stop. Recently fully re-furbished to high standard the apartment blend modern style and comfort with the classic features such as high ceiling and original cornice features. The apartment is perfect for your Edinburgh adventures whether it be for business or pleasure.

name: Modern room with great airport access,free parking
4. High quality accommodation.
description: Price  for 1 person.    Safe place , privacy,  great host,  and accommodation.  15 mins. by bus to city, 15 mins. walk to supermarket.  Booking Min. 2 nights. The room for 1 person .  No children,  This room is on the upper floor with 18 steps  and bathroom dowstairs.   Our place is not suitable for visualy impaired/ disable , kids. For security reasons: Please show your recent photos before you book, if not I regret to accept.   We have hair dryers, washing machine.use free once a week.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: A bright, well furnished 1 bed.
description: Cosy flat in a well maintained apartment block. Bright and airy feeling due to fresh decor and plenty of sunlight. Vintage Edinburgh with tall ceilings and doors but with excellent central heating and double glazing. Great location to access festival activities but away from the hustle of George Sq/City centre. Ideal for a weekend in Edinburgh.

name: Edinburgh Church Apartments - The Bell Tower
description: The kitchen with breakfast bar and additional seating is fully equipment and integrated with all the modern kitchen utensils and appliances, there is a small Dining Area/table for four, with a separate utility room off the entry hall which contains a washing machine/tumble dryer.The double bedroom has fitted wardrobes and an additional storage cupboard. There is a double bed, bedside tables. The twin bedroom gives you a real sense of the building's past with its original bell tower features. Thi

name: ★ 2BR Grassmarket Apartment with Castle View ★
description: A modern apartment with views up to Edinburgh Castle!Split over 2 floors, the ground floor has two double bedrooms and a bathroom with a walk-in shower. The lower-ground floor has a comfortable living area with a smart TV, fully equipped kitchen and dining table.The apartment is located in a quiet courtyard, just seconds from lively Grassmarket and many of the city's best pubs and restaurants. It's the perfect base from which to explore Edinburgh!

name: Comfy Flat nr Tram, Airport & Centre. Free parking
description:
Welcome to your home away from home - a beautifully refurbished and spacious flat filled with natural light and equipped with everything you need for a cozy, stress-free stay.

✔ Warm flat with homely atmosphere
✔ Plenty of free on-street parking
✔ Tram and bus stops nearby - city centre in just 15 minutes
✔ Direct tram connection to the airport makes getting here a breeze
✔ Close to two large supermarkets
✔ Surrounded by nature (stroll through the stunning rose gardens or relax in the park)

name: Beautiful and Historic 'New Town' Flat
description:
A beautiful and historic New Town flat in the UNESCO heritage site within central Edinburgh, a stones throw away from one of Edinburgh's top rated beer gardens, The Cumberland Bar, which has been frequented by many historic figures.

Cumberland street was formerly the home to JM Barrie (Author of Peter Pan)

A Georgian south facing ground floor flat with a lovely lounge where you can relax

The flat has all the comforts you would expect.

name: Warm Welcome:  perfect solo stay, home from home
description:
Just a little note: I do ask guests not to return later than 11pm because of my own work commitments. If that works for you, I’d love to hear from you!

If you're looking for a cosy place to stay while exploring Edinburgh, you're very welcome here. Leith is a friendly neighbourhood with great cafes,pubs and restaurants right on the doorstep. There’s a bus stop 2-minutes walk from my home too, so getting around is easy.

I live here with my small dog, who’s always happy to say hello to new faces.

name: Cosy room in renovated Leith flat.
description:
Welcome to Leith, Edinburgh!

I recently renovated my flat; all the flooring, furnishings and decor are new. With high ceilings and big windows, my home is light, airy, clean and comfortable.

My property is a few minutes away from Leith Walk (shops/ restaurants etc) and a 15 minute walk from the city centre. There is a supermarket across the road so you won’t have to go far if you want to buy food/ essentials.

Please do make yourselves at home.

name: Large, spacious room in renovated Leith flat
description:
Welcome to Leith, Edinburgh!

I recently renovated my flat; all the flooring, furnishings and decor are new. With high ceilings and big windows, my home is light, airy, clean and comfortable.

My property is a few minutes away from Leith Walk (shops/ restaurants etc) and a 15 minute walk from the city centre. There is a supermarket across the road so you won’t have to go far if you want to buy food/ essentials.

Please do make yourselves at home.

name: En suite room 3 next to Edinburgh Zoo
CoDE Pod Hostels-The LoFT (Female only 4 bed dorm)
description: CoDE - THE LoFT is a boutique hostel on Rose Street North Lane, in the vibrant and beautiful city centre of Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Secluded garden flat, convenient & central
description:
Comfortable and self-contained basement garden flat, bedroom has double bed, also double sofabed in living room, very quiet, only 20 mins walk from centre of Edinburgh, and close to many festival/fringe venues such as Summerhall and the Pleasance.

Great shower room and functional small kitchen; the flat also has a box room with washing machine and desk space.

There are buses nearby as well as convenient shops. We are close to Holyrood Park and Arthur's Seat, and a 10 min walk to the Meadows.

name: En-suite bedroom 4
en-suite bedroom 2, opposite Edinburgh Zoo
description: a warm two bed en-suite bed room

name: en-suite two bed room 1 opposite Edinburgh Zoo
description: a nice two bed en-suite bedroom

name: Stylish and Spacious, City Centre Apartment
description:
Stylish city centre duplex Apartment in an art deco building 10 minutes walk away from the iconic Edinburgh Castle.

In close proximity to the royal mile and only a few minutes walk away from princes street.

In the vicinity there are many supermarkets, coffee shops, restaurants and bars.

Offered by an experienced and professional Airbnb superhost who will provide every comfort and support for a great stay.

name: Geri & Rado’s Place
description:
Great location Tram stop ( Saughton ) is just 3min walk, perfect if you are coming from the Airport, visiting the highland show or going to the City Center passing the Murrayfield stadium tram top is just 2 stops away.
Bus stop just 1min walk. Heriot-Watt University bus stop is 10min walk and further 15min journey on the bus. Free parking spaces around us and our location is outside the Less Emission Zone
Secure bike storage provided on request.
First floor flat. Check-Out by 11am. Check-in 3pm

name: Large Boutique Dubai Inspired Townhouse 9.0 stars
description:
available for edinburgh Fringe festival - Ultra Modern LUXURIOUS Townhouse 10 mins from city centre- Customisable Rental Lengths: 5days - 3 Months - 36 Months
Ideal for Contractors & Companies (3+ Months), Long-Term Rentals (12+ Months for Families), or 6-12 Months for Professionals & Relocating Families

Top Townhouse in Edinburgh on Airbnb 2023/2024 with a 9.0 Review!

name: Cute and cosy 1 bedroom flat in Dean Village
description: Cosy and spacious 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Dean Village which is one of the most desirable areas in Edinburgh next to the Water of Leith.  Just a 5/10 minute walk to Edinburgh's West End and Princes Street. Close to Stockbridge's many restaurants and bars.  The bedroom is spacious and the open plan kitchen is perfect for cooking and relaxing.   There is an outdoor patio area for sitting outside in if the sun is out.  Perfect spot for exploring Edinburgh while also feeling at home.

name: Very central room in Victorian family home- room 1
description: Bright room on top floor of house. 2 flights of carpeted stairs to climb. Large shared bathroom.

name: Central Location free private parking
description: Beautifully modern apartment in a quiet area and only 15 minutes walk to Princess Street and the Royal Mile and also on tram (from Edinburgh airport) and bus route. Free on-site private parking, wi-fi and Netflix. Large living room with seating and dining table. The newly refurbished bathroom has a thermostatic shower with fantastic pressure. There is also a separate full size kitchen with large fridge/freezer and washing machine.  King-size (UK) bed with a quality Sealy pocket sprung mattress.

name: Luxury Top Floor Apartment in Stockbridge ★★★★★
description:
The apartment is bright & modern with large windows & high ceilings. Featuring quality furnishings, the property is south facing & has a view across Comely Bank. The bedroom features high quality bedding & venetian blinds. The bathroom is brand new, with power-shower & designer fittings. The apartment also features fast wifi, Philips Hue lighting & Alexa. Just 5 minutes walk to Stockbridge, 2 mins walk to the bus stop (15 mins to city centre).

*Please read 'The Space' section now*

name: The Main Door Dundonald Apartment - EH-70443-F
description:
This lovely property(The Dundonald Apartment) is one of our companies favourites. This is professionally managed and well kept. Our Edinburgh based company have been operating for over 20 years.

Located in the affluent New Town area, this spacious property is spread over 2 floors and is only a few minutes walk of all the attractions.

This apartment is ideal for large groups and families looking to stay in a comfortable traditional luxurious Edinburgh apartment with all mod cons.

name: Double bedroom in lovely Georgian City Centre home
description:
Double bedroom in our lovely Edinburgh city centre home. We live and work in the flat and love its leafy location, close to the New Town and Old Town.

Short walk to Princes St, Waverley Rail Station, St James Quarter Shops & trams to airport & around city.

Walkable to Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace, King’s Park & Arthur’s Seat volcano.

Good bus routes outside flat.

Period features, wifi, TV, kettle in room, central heating. Bathroom is shared with hosts. Bring your own toiletries!

name: ⭐ROYAL MILE MANSIONS ⭐WALK TO CASTLE ⭐WITH LIFT ⭐
description:
**This property is only available under set circumstances. Do not request to book without discussing first**

A stunning apartment within the exclusive ROYAL MILE MANSIONS Grade-A Listed building, in the heart of the Edinburgh's Old Town.

Spacious 2 bed apartment, ideal for those relocating, or studying/working here temporarily.

Served by 2 lifts & with no steps to the apartment, this is a great option for those not wanting to climb numerous flights of stairs in Edinburgh's tenement buildings.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Penthouse apartment in the heart of the city
description:
*Built in 1865 and in the heart of the UNESCO world heritage site of Edinburgh
*Centrally located on a quiet, tree lined cobbled crescent.
*Historic 2 floor property with many period details
* Chimney top views from an elevated position
* 5 min walk over Dean Bridge to Princes Street and 15 mins to the castle
* Stockbridge is the nearby market town with independent cafes/ restaurants and shops.
* Walking distance to all attractions and on main bus routes all around Edinburgh and beyond

name: Bright & Spacious 3 Bedroom Apartment in Marchmont
description:
Located in the popular area of Marchmont with many local amenities on the doorstep & the historic Old Town & city centre a short walk away through The Meadows Park.With its café culture and family vibe this 3 bedroom, top floor apartment is a great base to explore Edinburgh. Free overnight & weekend on-street parking. At other times paid on-street parking is available with free unrestricted all-time parking only a short walk away.

Licence No. EH-70226-F

name: 4 Bedroom Edinburgh City Apartment - Sleeps 12
description: Our 4 bedroom apartments are part of Cairn Hotel and Apartments, situated in Edinburgh's city centre in converted Victorian townhouses.

name: Luxury boutique flat w/free parking
description: Boutique apartment newly decorated. A 30 min walk to the city centre or a short bus ride. Free onsite/secure parking, high speed fibre broadband & free onsite gym. Very close to bars (10 mins), restaurants & shops! (10 mins). Decorated to a very high standard & very cosy & comfortable. It is a wonderful flat, great for couples, solo & business travellers - families with children too. Very close to the city’s transport links, including Waverley Station, the local bus station / airport bus.

name: Cosy flat, great links to Airport & City Centre
description:
Lovely little main door ground floor apartment located in the Clermiston region of Edinburgh, close to Corstorphine and a wealth of amenities.
Modern facilities within fresh and neutral décor, set in a quiet residential location.
Great bus links to the airport and in to the city centre.
Easy check in. I will be on hand should any problems arise during your stay.

name: Lovely Cosy Private Room with Private Bathroom
description: Beautiful private room with own entrance and en-suite private showroom in the heart of Edinburgh city center. On your doorstep, you will find a superb choice of top-rated restaurants, cafes, fashionable bars and clusters of boutiques and specialty shops and a selection of some of Scotland' finest art galleries are all in close proximity. Edinburgh Castle, Princes street & garden and Royal Mile only a short walk away. Tram station to the airport just 2 mins away. This room with private bathroom!

name: Fully licensed studio in upscale neighbourhood
description:
Contemporary and newly refurbished studio flat in a 19th century Victorian house. Situated in Edinburgh’s most desired residential area Merchiston, it is 3 minutes walk to the trendy Bruntsfield for boutique shopping and dining, 25 minutes walk to Edinburgh city centre.

Fully licensed compliant to short-term let law in Scotland. Book with confidence!

name: Bed in 8 Bed Dorm
description:
Welcome to our modern, trendy hostel in the heart of Edinburgh Old Town. Whether you're after the ultimate social backpacker experience or if you're looking for a little more privacy during your stay - our new hostel really does cater for all!

Our recently refurbished Belushi's Bar is the perfect place to grab a beer with your fellow travellers after a long day sight-seeing. And make sure to check out the exclusive 25% food discount and awesome daily drinks deals for hostel guests!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bed in 4 Bed Dorm

description: Welcome to your serene retreat in the heart of Edinburgh's Morningside area, where classic Georgian elegance meets modern comfort. Nestled amid the storied cityscape, this charming flat offers an ideal haven for families and groups of up to five, seeking an authentic Scottish experience without sacrificing the comforts of home.

name: Castle View Luxury Apartment
description:
- Kings Stables Road, built in 2019 is part of the superb new development with Castle Views in the Historic Old Town of Edinburgh and is part of Edinburgh’s UNESCO World Heritage Area
- Current Photos taken September 2019. Allowing 6 Months for final furnishings - apartment will be in top class condition for the rental market April 2020.

name: Bright, quiet & stylish room close to city centre.
description: Light & airy double bedroom in a no smoking  home.  Private  en-suite bathroom and terrace for your sole use plus WiFi, Freeview TV &  workspace.  Free parking, walking distance to City Centre & great local bars/cafes. We clean & disinfect all touch points  between visits. Cleaning materials are available if you need them. This is a quiet residential area just 30 minutes walk from Waverley Station & 5 minutes from main bus routes, cafes and shops.

name: Private room in lovely house.
description: Private room in beautiful period house in a lovely area. 10 minutes by bus from Edinburgh city centre, located in Trinity, close to Leith Waters paths and local amenities. Leith harbour and Ocean Terminal in walking distance.

name: Bide Collective11
description: Lovely spacious  Double room with* “shared bathroom facilities”(this is shared with one other room) and cleaned daily,this is located on the first floor of a 1890’s Georgian townhouse in the heart of Edinburgh. Our self check in serviced rooms offer a streamline check in system to allow guests to come and go as they please hassle free. All of our rooms are set over three floors, You will find us situated in "Hill Street" along the historic cobbled street in the New town of the city.

name: Trinity Lodge: Home with Private Garden & Parking
description:
Unique, nicely decorated, comfortable town house with the garden. The house is located very close to Botanic Gardens and have the parking space on the site. The bus stop is located only 50 meters from the property and the bus takes you directly to the City Centre in 10 mins.
The house is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with shower and bath. A microwave, a fridge and oven are also featured, as well as a coffee machine.

name: Quartermile Central Apartment
description: Quartermile Central Apartment is a bright, spacious and freshly decorated two-bedroom apartment located within easy walking distance of all the city centre attractions, festival venues, shops, nightlife and transport connections. The apartment is set on the 3rd floor of a contemporary lift-served building.

name: Victorian School Apartment  (licence EH-68232-F)
description:
61/2 Park Avenue is a delightful, very spacious two-bedroom apartment with super king-size beds on a quiet street in Portobello . It boasts three state-of-the-art bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen and a lovely open-plan lounge/dining area. The décor is bright and thoroughly modern with a cozy Scottish twist. It Has private parking
Just 30 minutes by bus from Edinburgh city centre, and 5 minutes walk from Portobello with its stunning beach and promenade, and excellent bars and restaurants.

name: ✔Castle View ✔Walk Everywhere ✔Grass Market ✔Quiet
description:
→ Super central location, everything is walkable from the flat, you won't need a car/transport to see Edinburgh
→ Brand new 1st floor Grass market 52 sqm flat with lift & castle view from bedroom
→ Ideal for couples, group of friends visiting Edinburgh for sightseeing, events or nightlife
→ 1 bedroom flat, has 1 king bed, 1 double sofa bed & sleeps up to 4 people
→ Fresh linen, towels, toiletries & essentials provided
→ Free unlimited hi-speed WiFi, Smart TV & Netflix
→ Fully equipped kitchen
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Contemporary, patio garden, walk to city centre
description: Bright, spacious, modern ground floor flat with patio in great vibrant, canalside location, within walking distance of city centre & all tourist attractions. Also few minutes’ walk to EICC. Perfect for young people visiting Edinburgh & for work travellers. Easy access from airport & train station. Supermarket on the corner and Fountainbridge cinema & restaurant complex nearby. Also within walking distance of Bruntsfield with local trendy bars, restaurants & coffee shops.

name: Boho Studio With a Beautiful View of the Castle
description: Situated on King’s Stables Road, this compact studio apartment will be a great choice for a couple or a group who want to discover Edinburgh. The Edinburgh Castle and Princes Street Gardens are within a few minutes walk away. You will also find a great variety of shops, bars and restaurants nearby and along the Grassmarket. The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a living room and a kitchen. Essentials such as linen, towels, TV & WiFi are provided. Paid parking available nearby.

description:
✔ Chic flat nicely nestled in the Old Town

✔ 1 bathroom

✔ 6-minute walk to The National Museum of Scotland

✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Fleshmarket Close - Old Town Hideaway
description:
Located on Fleshmarket Close in the very heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town, the apartment is nestled between Waverley train station and the Royal Mile. The apartment has been elegantly furnished and provides a spacious home for up to 5 guests .
A 2 minute walk from Waverley Station, 5 minutes from the castle and Royal Mile.
Fleshmarket Close is a truly historic street, and could not be better located or set up for groups looking to enjoy the best of Edinburgh right on their doorstep
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

description: Tranquil, spacious, two bedroom, second floor flat within traditional Edinburgh tenement. Located in Morningside, a prestigious area south of the city centre, a few hundred metres from bustling Morningside Road.

name: Double bedroom in maisonette flat
Perfect 4 bedroom 2 bathroom Home
description:
Portobello Beach is 15 minute walk away which is a must see especially with kids they will love it in all weathers. Buses (every 10 minutes) stop at end of the street to city centre which takes about 15/20 minutes. Co-op, post office, and various takeaways at end of street.

Travel cot available if needed

NO parties we will be contacted to deal with any noise at the property as we only live a few minutes away.
Ring doorbell has been set up to monitor this.

name: Edinburgh Central Montgomery with free parking
description: Enjoy a warm welcome to Montgomery St! Perfectly located within a short walking distance to Edinburgh's attractions, shops and restaurants and with excellent transport links, this 2-bedroom apartment is a perfect base to explore the city. The warm flat is ideal for visitors looking for a comfortable accommodation as well as quietness and privacy. *Free car parking for our guests at a nearby location (5 minutes' walk away from the apartment)*. Very close to tram stop!

name: Property on beautiful street away from tourists
description: This first floor property is located in the trendy Leith area of Edinburgh. It is a five minute walk to a bus stop, where you can then take bus 7 or 14  directly into the city center, (getting off at North Bridge for Princes Street or the Royal Mile).

name: ♔ King bed, lrg rm, Crags view 5m⇄Royal Mi. 11⇄STN
description:
🚶11 minutes walk to Waverley station, 15 mins to the Airport bus stop, 9 mins to Holyrood Palace, 5 mins to the historic Royal Mile. A midcentury Old Town hideaway beside the King's Holyrood Park, near everything.

🧙 ‘Dumbiedykes’ is Albus Dumbledore's name in Scots. I'm on a generally quiet cul-de-sac. Warm, bright, pleasant, with a soaring Salisbury Crags view 😶‍🌫️ And a slight homage to the Boy Who Lived ⚯ ͛

⚡ I'm a Harry Potter tour guide; I can help as little or as much as needed.

description:

name: Lovely MAIN DOOR apartment - old town Edinburgh
description:
Main door flat, in vibrant old town Edinburgh, minutes walk from restaurants, bars and attractions

Fully equipped for an enjoyable stay, with 40inch TV, essential cooking utensils, condiments, selection of board games, towels, bedding etc are supplied. You just have to turn up and enjoy!

Anew sofa bed was purchased 23/8/2023 giving a larger bed with more space in the living room.

Check in/out is operated by key safe located at the premises.

Licence no: EH-70653-F
Energy rating band D (68).

name: Charming Edinburgh City Centre Apartment
description: My traditional apartment is perfectly located in the city centre. The Airport bus link is directly outside and the tram is a short walk away. Princes Street, the historic Old Town and  major tourist attractions are within easy walking distance. Experience living in an authentic sandstone building directly opposite the birthplace of Sir Sean Connery. Cafes, music, arts and culture are all located nearby. Explore the city then come home to relax in the cosy living space with Wi-Fi internet.

name: Luxury Main Door Apartment, Fantastic Location!
description:
2 bedroom luxury apartment located in the centrally located Newington area, a stone’s throw away from the idyllic Hollyrood Park where the Queens palace is situated. Beautiful Arthurs Seat, 10 minutes on foot, capturing panoramic views of Edinburgh!

This apartment is very tastefully decorated to a very high standard with its own main entrance set in a lovely street.

The city centre is only 5-10 minutes in a taxi and you have a choice of many buses close by.

name: 5* large room central New Town with King Size Bed
description:
Huge New Town room (5m x 6m) - en-suite bathroom, king size double bed, table, chairs, and kettle in basement level of very central street. When possible we like to greet guests and welcome them - seems appreciated.
Most major tourist destinations are within walking distance of our home as are both tram, airport bus and Haymarket station. This bedroom is by entrance to our home so has degree of privacy. Tea, coffee, milk and a nip of whisky are all available; several cafes within 3 mins walk.

name: The Roseburn Apartment - Central - Free Parking
description:
The apartment has a modern design with two bedrooms, a sofa bed and sleeps a maximum of 5. The Roseburn area has some best transport links in Edinburgh with the tram station and major bus lines minutes away.

The official Airbnb Cleaning Protocol is implemented in this property.

The mattresses and pillows are of very high quality as is the bed linen and towels. There is high speed Wi-Fi and cable TV.

name: Mono Suite - One Bedroom Suite
description:
A private home away form home situated in the historic heart of Edinburgh making it the perfect place to stay whether you are visiting for business or pleasure.

The only thing these Suites share with historic Edinburgh is their address. Each Suite is contemporary & naturally decorated, to contrast the traditional and busy city outside, making it a quiet place to rest your head after a day in the city. With views of Arthur Seat, you can forget you are in the middle of bustling Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: City Centre Stylish Apartment With Free Parking
description:
This newly renovated styles city centre flat is located at the heart of Edinburgh.
Free parking available.
Just 10 mins walk from High Street , Edinburgh Castle and Holyrood palace, making it a perfect location to discover the city.The Apartment is in a safe and quite private residential area ,very easy to reach with public transportation, car or by walk.
The flat is very cosy ,has his own character.

description: Stunning and peaceful apartment nestled off the Royal Mile and close to Edinburgh castle (3 minutes walk). Tastefully refurbished to a very high standard, with all mod cons. 2 Good sized bedrooms, a double bedroom and a twin bed. Separate stunning shower room and toilet. The open plan living area is very spacious and well thought out, its a pleasure to be in. A large L shaped sofa, tv, Sonos speaker and dining area. The apartment has views towards a church as seen in pictures.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Ice Cream Suite Central 2-Bedroom 2-Bathroom Flat
description: Once an ice cream shop located in the heart of Edinburgh, the Ice Cream Suite today is a beautifully furnished apartment with an open-plan kitchen, living area and two double bedrooms, each with its own en-suite shower room. It is a cozy home away home with walking distance to most of Edinburgh's major attractions, Edinburgh University, and princes street shops. It is just off the busy Main Street which allow our guests enjoy the city centre convenience as well as a quieter living space.

name: Little Linton
description: Situated in the peaceful and leafy Colinton Village, we have an annex attached to our house for your stay with your own entrance. We love living here and feel it offers country views out to the Pentland hills yet we are easily accessible to the airport and centre of town. We have a double bedroom and sitting room with a small sofa bed/futon (best suited for young person/child due to it being low to the ground) and private bathroom for your stay. Tea, coffee, microwave and toaster are available.

name: Locke Studio at Eden Locke
description: Designed by New York architects Grzywinski + Pons, these studios are 29m² of carefully thought-out space – stunning design with uncompromising functionality.

name: Bright Apartment with Rooftop views and Pool
description:
Bright and airy newly refurbished apartment located in the James Square complex, which boasts garage parking space, quiet residential garden and rooftop views.

Fitted with comfortable furniture and plenty of storage space, this is the perfect place to relax and call home during your stay!

name: Best View in Leith from the Clock on the Shore
description:
Described by all visitors as the best view in Leith, this is an ideal place to base yourself to explore Leith, Edinburgh and the east coast of Scotland.

With three bedrooms and two bathrooms, the apartment comfortably sleeps six whilst the open plan lounge, dining, kitchen provides a great entertaining space including a table that extends to seat​ ten.

If eating out is your thing there is an abundance of choice on the doorstep from bars and handy takeaways to Michelin star restaurants.

name: Lovely 2 bedrooms appartment in Grassmarket
description:
Cozy & spacious groundfloor flat in Edinburgh's vibrant Grassmarket/ Tollcross area. Ideally located for all attractions in the city centre, the Royal Mile & Central Edinburgh, sitting right opposite Edinburgh Castle. 2 bedrooms (1 x King size, and 1 x double bed plus 1 x double sofa bed). All major attractions are within easy walking distance but there is excellent & plentiful public transport right outside the door.

Kitchen/Living room with a bar area. Bathroom suite, with shower & bath.

name: Entire Flat w/ bright & cosy double bedroom
description:
We are renting our entire flat whilst we are on holiday.
Available for a couple of nights or for short term let.

The double room has it's own private bathroom with overhead shower and bath.

Our home is a ground floor maisonette with main door entrance, located just behind the sea, ideal for morning or evening walks.

We are a young couple looking for honest and happy people (just like us!) looking to visit Edinburgh during the season.

name: Entire 2 bedroom flat
description:
Snuggled in a quiet location this large bright flat has 2 x double bedrooms. Newly refurbished with new boiler & hive switch; shower; carpets, furnishings etc. Free parking in front of flat.

Close to Cameron Toll shopping centre; Holyrood Park & Arthur's seat; Kings buildings and Commonwealth pool for fitness centre. Lively Newington area close by provides bars; restaurants; shops and cafes as well as Queens Hall & Festival Theatre. 30 mins walk Waverley Train Station. Great transport links.

name: Warm & bright 3 bedroom flat
description:
Snuggled in a quiet location this large bright flat has 3 x double rooms. Newly refurbished with new boiler & hive switch; shower; carpets, furnishings etc. Free parking in front of flat.

Close to Cameron Toll shopping centre; Holyrood Park & Arthur's seat; Kings buildings and Commonwealth pool for fitness centre. Lively Newington area close by provides bars; restaurants; shops and cafes as well as Queens Hall & Festival Theatre. 30 mins walk Waverley Train Station. Great transport links.

name: Stylish Sunny Victorian Tenement
description:
Wake up to sweeping views of Newhaven harbour. Have morning coffee with sunny castle views. This bright, king-size one-bedroom flat in Newhaven offers the perfect mix of coastal calm and city buzz
Perfect for couples or solo travellers. Located in quiet traditional 3rd floor flat. Newhaven Tram & bus links to the city centre & airport. FREE on street parking. City centre (1.9 miles) is walking distance via an inner city tree lined path. Self check in via lock box right outside

name: Edinburgh.Arrandale Guest House.double room
description:
Arrandale Guest House is a stylish, stone built Victorian villa with many traditional features such as ornate cornices, high ceilings, wide doors and large windows, making it light and spacious.
​
The Arrandale is conveniently located for most of the main attractions in Edinburgh, including the Castle, Holyrood Palace, Dynamic Earth and Royal Yacht Britannia.

name: Edinburgh.Arrandale Guest House.Large Double Room
description:
Arrandale Guest House is a stylish, stone built Victorian villa with many traditional features such as ornate cornices, high ceilings, wide doors and large windows, making it light and spacious.
​
The Arrandale is conveniently located for most of the main attractions in Edinburgh, including the Castle, Holyrood Palace, Dynamic Earth and Royal Yacht Britannia.

name: Powderhall, Canonmills Apartment
description: Spacious, modern apartment located in quite area at Canonmills with private  parking space (free). This apartment features 2 bathrooms with a shower, a bath. Perfect place for the guests who appreciate quiet and safe neighbourhood. Walking distance to Botanic Garden and fairly close to the City Centre (1.2 mile)makes this place perfect for someone who want to have peaceful sleep, but at the same time stay not to far from the tourist attractions and events. Park and river just 200 meters away.

name: Edinburgh.Arrandale guest house.Large family room
description:
Arrandale Guest House is a stylish, stone built Victorian villa with many traditional features such as ornate cornices, high ceilings, wide doors and large windows, making it light and spacious.
​

neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Homely 2 Bed flat next to tram stop on Leith Walk
description:
Welcoming, bright and modern two bedroom apartment located just minutes from the bustling and charismatic Leith Walk, which is populated by several highly rated restaurants, cafes and bars.

With two king sized bedrooms and large kitchen come living room, guests can expect comfort and practicality during their stay. The bathroom has also been recently refurbished with new shower and bath tub!

Well connected to all city centre attractions, major travel links and also comes with free parking!

name: Beautiful flat,  3 mins walk to Haymarket Station
description: Our lovely, fresh and modern apartment is ideally placed within quick walking distance of the transit hub at Haymarket Station and the EICC. The bars, boutiques and nightlife in the west end are within easy reach.  The Old Town with such delights as Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile are only 15 minutes walk away. As travellers ourselves, we understand what makes a good Airbnb stay great, and have taken our experiences and applied them to our apartment. We hope you will enjoy your stay with us.

name: Family flat in the trendy Shore area of Leith
description:
Please note this is our own home which we let out when on holiday, not a dedicated self-catering flat.

The space is or 2 adults and 1 child under 10 (plus baby/toddler) max, not 3 adults.

Flat features a large double bedroom, a single child bedroom, a bathroom, and a large bright open plan eating and living area overlooking a beautiful 17th century chapel.

The flat is a minute walk from the famous Shore with its bars and restaurants, and close to parks and playgrounds.

name: Spacious 2 bed apartment close to Edinburgh city!
description:
Gorgeous two bed apartment with comfy sofa with reclining chairs, 4 person dining table and two large cosy beds!

Key Safe for flexible check in!

All bookings after the 1st of October 2023 are subject to licensing and planning permission as per guidance on AirBnB.

name: The Wee Haven, Edinburgh
description:
Your main door, self contained main door apartment by the sea!

We have won guest awards year after year on other platforms for your holiday apartment. This is a main door apartment on ground level with free car parking and an excellent bus service.

With a beautiful sea view, we provide stylish self-catering accommodation on the Scottish coast, located in the historic Newhaven, Leith area. This converted shop is around 2 miles from the city centre and offers free parking and free WiFi.

name: The Garden Cottage
description:
The Garden Cottage is a cosy and charming detached two storey cottage set within the garden of a family home on one of Edinburgh's most desirable streets.
Recently built, The Garden Cottage is very comfortable with underfloor heating and plantation shutters. Entering into an open plan living space, there's comfy seating and a smart TV. There is an attractive kitchen and breakfast bar for dining. With a shower room on the ground floor and stairs lead to a huge bedroom and desk for home office.

name: Bright House with garden in city centre
description:
Bright and warm house with private garden in central location.

This spacious Mid Terraced House, renovated few years ago, has a good size private garden located in a central quiet area of Edinburgh. The property is located within walking distance to main public transport stations (8 min to York Tram Station and 10/15min to Waverly Station) , Princess Street (15 min) and the beautiful Botanic Gardens.

name: Saunders Street - Beautiful 1BR flat, Stockbridge!
description: This stylish one-bedroom flat is brilliantly located in Stockbridge less than 15 minutes walk into the city centre. Picturesque Circus Lane and Dean Village are must-see and the latter is reached by walking along the green and tranquil path along The Water of Leith Walkway.The well-designed flat offers a perfect space for couples to enjoy a great time in this beautiful city. After a long day of adventure and exploration, the living room is ideal for relaxing and preparing for the day ahead.

name: Elegant Home at the Heart of the Royal Mile
description:
✔ Warm & Inviting flat ideally positioned in the old town
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 2-minute walk to Royal Mile
✔ 10-minute walk to The Grassmarket
✔ 11-minute walk to Scottish National Gallery
✔ 12-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 6-minute walk to Waverley Train Station
✔ A variety of bars and restaurants nearby
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Very Central, Large 1 Bedroom Apartment - Sleeps 4
description: Extremely Central, beautiful Georgian era apartment with modern furnishings and original wooden floors. Fantastic for all transport links and central bars and restaurants. The flat itself is located above a wonderful gastro pub where you will collect keys from.

name: Bedroom in modern roof top apartment in Leith
description: Double Room with king size bed in a modern, contemporary roof top apartment on the 5th floor. Located within the vibrant neighbourhood of Leith which is situated on the water front of Edinburgh. The apartment is accessible via stairs so please be aware of this prior to requesting to book here. You have your own private shower room situated off the main hall for your private use when staying as well as use of kitchen if required.

name: Your second home, The Isle of Skye room
description: The perfect hideout for your excursion into the city, central between the airport and the city centre, is the right place to enjoy the beauty of the city and a good night sleep

name: Beautiful and stylish Edinburgh flat
description:
You'll feel at home in our beautiful and stylish one bedroom apartment in Edinburgh.

The flat is very homely yet luxurious as only recently it was refurbished to a high standard.

The flat is situated in a quiet residential area only 1.5 mile away from Edinburgh castle and the stunning Royal Mile.

There are fabulous coffee-shops, restaurants and bars right on your doorsteps and the airport bus stop is only 2 minutes from the flat.

name: Edinburgh Dean Village - Riverview Retreat
description:
Edinburgh Council Licence No: EH-68293-F

Stay in a rare piece of living history. Our home is part of an original stone milling building in Edinburgh’s Dean Village — a UNESCO World Heritage Site where the Water of Leith has flowed for centuries.

This licensed property blends Georgian character with modern comfort, offering a peaceful riverside setting that’s both central and unique.

EPC: D

name: Sonder Royal Garden | Superior 2BR w/ Garden View
description: Picture this — an elegant grey-stone exterior with rows of French windows reflecting against the pink Edinburgh sunset. Welcome to the Royal Garden. Hints of gold and bronze decorate your space while bright light streams through the open windows. Just outside your door is The Scottish National Portrait Gallery. Let the fairytale views of Edinburgh Castle inspire your adventure. Have the best of comfort and excitement at Royal Garden.

name: Sonder Royal Garden | 2BR Apartment w/ Balcony
description: Picture this — an elegant grey-stone exterior with rows of French windows reflecting against the pink Edinburgh sunset. Welcome to the Royal Garden. Let the fairytale views of Edinburgh Castle inspire your adventure. Have the best of comfort and excitement at Royal Garden.

name: Trendy Flat near to Canal & City centre
description: Situated in a perfect spot to explore Edinburgh, within easy reach of Princes Street, The Castle, Murrayfield and Bruntsfield/Fountainbridge area. The apartment is walking distance to Haymarket station and the tram, close to bars and restaurants and a great area to explore Edinburgh. Experience an unrivalled selection of culture, walks, restaurants, scenery, history and everything else life in Edinburgh can give. A stunning base to enjoy city life & Scotland in style and comfort.

name: Private Sleeping Cell - Double bed- THE CoURT
description: A former courthouse and jail has transformed into a CoDE Pod Hostel- The CoURT. The Victorian A-listed building is located in the heart of Edinburgh's old town and is surrounded by the cities most famous landmarks.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Welcoming and Homely 2 Bed in Central Location
description: Welcome to our warm and centrally located Edinburgh apartment, where you will feel comfortably at home and experience the city like a local.

name: Apartment walking distance from Royal Mile
description:
A brand new property with the Arthur Seat and Hollywood Palace round the corner! Less than 10 min walk to Royal Mile and Old Town. Located on a ground floor with easy access and parking just outside the property.
The apartment is bright and spacious.

name: The Polwarth Gardens Apartment
description:
Our brand new apartment at Polwarth Gardens has been recently renovated and is situated in the much sought after area of Polwarth. The two bedroom apartment features a modern design with a double bedroom, single bedroom and luxury double sofa bed in the living room.

The official Airbnb Cleaning Protocol is implemented in this property.

Bus routes into the city centre are seconds away outside and there are many local amenities nearby (supermarkets/cafes/bars/takeaways

name: Lovely 2-Bed Apartment in Old Town Edinburgh
description: ‍

name: High Riggs, Tollcross, Old Town, Edinburgh
description: A bright, centrally located modern third floor, two-bedroom apartment (sleeps 1–4) on a pedestrianised street a short walk from Grassmarket, with free parking and within easy walking distance of the major tourist attractions, festival venues, shops, nightlife and transport connections. Unusually for a city centre apartment, there is free parking available at this property (usually available on request).

name: City Centre, Historic Apartment, Fibre Wifi
description: Please MESSAGE HOST FIRST bottom of page - Do Not  "REQUEST TO BOOK"  "  Booking can only be made via special offer invite, after some checks, we vet 100% of bookings. Free parking within walking distance.   250 MB Cable Internet / Wifi ( dedicated not shared ) Netflix, Disney TV,  Please note No parties,  No Loud Noise, No Smoking, No Vapes  anywhere in or near building- due to quiet & peaceful conservation area & respect of neighbour. ( zero tolerance on these items ) Thanks

name: Detached Mews House  - The Perfect Quiet Retreat!
description:
~ Entire detached house with private entrance situated in a very quiet neighbourhood (STRICTLY no parties - property suitable for a quiet, relaxed city break for couples / smaller families, not suitable for groups)
~ Stunning open plan interior and sunny terrace - perfect for morning coffee in the sunshine!
~ Peacefully tucked away from the noise and bustle of the City, yet just a gentle stroll into the heart of Edinburgh
~ A true 'home from home'
~ Contactless self check in via keypad

name: Arthur's Seat view apartament with FREE parking!
description: I speak French, English and Polish 😉

name: Frederick Street Apartment - Castle Views
description:
Spacious and comfortable 3 bedroom drawing room apartment, located just 1 minute walk from Princes Street.
This apartments excellent city centre location makes it an ideal base for a visit to Edinburgh.

name: Artists Seaside Home - Paolozzi Room
description:
Artists Seaside Home - Victorian Lower Villa with private entrance and garden. Peaceful, homely and quiet.
There’s a two minute stroll to a long sandy beach and promenade and many restaurants, bars, cafes, galleries, independent shops and supermarkets locally and you will be able to find all you need nearby. Frequent buses to and from Edinburgh take approx 20 - 25 mins to be in the city centre.

name: Beautiful one bed on the famous Royal Mile!
description: Incredibly authentic and homely one bed luxury apartment over looking the most iconic and famous street in Edinburgh - the Royal Mile
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: One double  room near napier,lady or couple only
Holyrood Central Apartment
description: Welcome to Holyrood Central Apartment - a modern and newly refurbished (April 2025) second-floor apartment in a peaceful residential yet very central area of Edinburgh. The property offers a welcoming space for up to 5 guests maximum making it an excellent choice for families and groups of friends. *Strictly no parties* 🅿️Enjoy hassle-free parking at the NCP Holyrood Road Car Park, just a 2–3 minute walk from the apartment. Guests park FREE with the exclusive pass provided upon arrival.

name: Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment by the Royal Mile
description:
Bright and spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment just off the Royal Mile in the heart of Edinburgh Old Town. Enjoy a short 5-10 minute walk to many Edinburgh attractions including Edinburgh Castle, Grassmarket, Cowgate, Calton Hill, Princes Street, Holyrood Park and Arthur’s Seat.

∙ Superb Central location
∙ 2 lovely bedrooms with ample storage space
∙ Large separate living room
∙ Fully equipped kitchen
∙ Lift access
∙ Plenty of bars, restaurants and cafes nearby
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Super king size bed, private floor and bathroom.
description:
Located in Stockbridge, a leafy tranquil neighbourhood. Lots of bars, cafes and markets in the area.

Local visitor attractions are Botanic Gardens, Water of Leith and Inverleith Park.
The award winning Raeburn Bar and Scran & Scallie Restaurant are in the vicinity.

Pleasant 20 minutes walk into centre of Edinburgh where you can enjoy the Castle, Whisky tasting and much more.

name: Vibrant Home near Calton Hill
description:
✔ Lovely 2-bedroom flat in the New Town
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Fully furnished kitchen with all the necessary amenities
✔ Charming garden
✔ 10-minute walk to Calton Hill
✔ Princes St is a 17-minute walk
✔ 20-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle

neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Chic flat close to Edinburgh, Airport, & Zoo
description:
Our gorgeous little flat in the heart of historic Corstorphine has been designed to encompass a chic relaxed vibe, making our insta worthy flat the perfect pad to explore historic Edinburgh.

A stones throw from Edinburgh airport, zoo, Murrayfield stadium, Edinburgh city & Gyle, is centrally located for business or leisure get away.

With buses just across the road, free on street parking, restaurants, pubs & cafes nearby you have everything you need a couple of steps away.

name: The Waverley Park Terrace Residence
description: The Waverley Park Terrace Residence is a delightful 2 bedroomed apartment sleeping up to 6 guests, located on the 1st floor and in a superb location. Tucked away on a quiet residential street, away from all the noise, hustle and bustle of the city, you’ll find Holyrood Park right on your doorstep. This self-catering apartment comes complete with a private parking space – a rarity in the city, and is fully furnished and provides everything you need to make your stay in Edinburgh as comfortable as

name: Stunning traditional room in Leith
description:
This room is in a grade B listed Edinburgh tenement building. It boasts high ceilings with traditional features including original floorboards and cornices.

The room contains a king size bed, sofa, TV and radiator.

Guests will have a private bedroom and access to the hall and bathroom. Other private rooms will be kept locked unless I am there. I live here too, but am normally away midweek.

The apartment is located at the Shore - the tram goes directly to the city centre in 15 minutes.

name: A Stay on the Brae Apartment
description:
The 'A Stay on the Brae' is a petite stylish annex to a family home with its own private patio door entrance and bathroom. Inside is a superking bed. There are a TV, Wifi, fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. No kitchen. Outside is a love seat in a beautiful shared enclosed south/west facing garden.

The bus stop to the centre is just outside the front door and a direct 15 minute bus ride from the property will take you directly into town.

name: Ideal location : Edinburgh Old Town - Castle Neuk
description: The Castle Neuk is a cosy 3 person apartment on the third floor. The Property is located in the historic old town (City Centre) in the Grassmarket, in the heart of the city, however, it's tucked away in a tranquil corner away from the busy pubs. With no shops or bars underneath the apartments, the quiet location allows you to recuperate and get a peaceful nights sleep. The apartment is at the foot of the castle so access to all attractions is easily accessible by foot.

name: Two-bedroom city flat with free private parking
description:
Welcome to my lovely 2-bedroom flat, just a short distance from Edinburgh’s vibrant city centre.
Perfect for couples, friends, solo travellers, or business guests, this cosy and contemporary space offers a peaceful retreat with the added bonus of private parking. A true home away from home.

name: Refurbished Home on the Royal Mile
description:
✔ Stylish flat nicely nestled in Edinburgh’s old town
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 9-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle

name: Lovely  flat in a great location
description:
A beautiful spacious flat in the popular Inverleith area and near the Botanical Gardens.

* High Ceilings
* 2 double bedrooms (one with superking bed)
* Living room with great views
* Smart TV, Wifi
* Huge dining kitchen
* New bathroom
* Great bus link services

name: Royal Bolthole!
description: Located on Royal Terrace in a beautiful Grade A Listed Georgian property. Very close to the city centre on a grand, quiet residential street. It's super close to Calton Hill, The Old Town, New Town and all the main attractions. You’ll love my place because of the space, the style and the comfy beds. It's great for couples, business travellers, and families with kids (cots, highchairs, toys etc can be provided).

name: modern cosy flat easy access to city center
description: Contemporary  and Cozy 1bedroom flat located at the vibrant and convenient area at Broughton Road/ Canonmills. Can easily walk to new town and Stockbridge, and a short bus ride to old town attractions. This warm and welcoming space features open plan living room, a trendy shower room and a separate toilet. It's designed thoughtfully with contemporary furniture and decor that aims to provide a sanctuary after exploring the beautiful city

name: Royal Mile - Old Town Apartment
description: This beautiful two bedroom apartment is located on the Royal Mile at the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, making it the perfect location from which to explore the City.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Gorgie Duplex Quality Flat
description: With a Convenient and Quiet location, this garden facing duplex apartment is an ideal base for visiting Edinburgh during the Edinburgh Fringe Festival.  Ideal for medium sized groups.  New layout for Festival 2022 (2 Double bedrooms, 1 Single, refurbished open plan lounge/kitchen).

name: City Centre Styles Apartment At The Meadows Park
description:
This newly renovated styles city centre flat is located at the heart of Edinburgh.
Just 10 minutes walk from High Street , Edinburgh Castle and Holyrood palace, making it a perfect location to discover the city.
This apartment makes a lovely holiday home, very easy to reach with public transportation or by walk.
The Apartment is at the Meadows Park which gives an amazing atmosphere for the area with many eateries within walking distance.

name: The Converted Stables - A Characterful Mews House
description:
~ Historic mews property with many quirky and original features
~ ** Free ** parking for 1 car
~ Completely private entrance
~ Huge dining kitchen with AGA
~ 1 well behaved pet welcome
~ 10 minutes’ walk to tram stop (journey to airport 25 minutes)
~ Washing machine and drying rack in the apartment
~ Linen and towels provided, soap and toilet roll
~ Licence no: EH-69629-F

name: The Back Flat - Private flat in Georgian home
description: GREAT VALUE! Cosy flat with own entrance 5 minutes from beach, shops and buses into City Centre. A clean and safe hideaway in a lovely garden located in the heart of Portobello -  Edinburgh's best kept secret. Fully equipped kitchen, shower/wet room and very comfy king sized bed. It's the perfect base to return to after a day of exploring the city or the beautiful East Lothian coastline.

name: Large double/twin ensuite room in Dene Guest House
description:
The Dene is a charming and cosy townhouse in the centre of Edinburgh.
Eleven rooms spread over four floors, offering modern amenities while retaining the character and essence of the typical Edinburgh New Town Georgian houses dating back to the 1830's.

In The Dene we offer a relaxed and laid back atmosphere. You can enjoy our large and bright lounge where you can relax and share experiences and moments with other travellers after a long day of sightseeing.

name: Budget Single Room. Dene Guest House
description:
The Dene is a charming and cosy townhouse in the centre of Edinburgh.

Eleven rooms spread over four floors, offering modern amenities while retaining the character and essence of the typical Edinburgh New Town Georgian houses dating back to the 1830's.

In The Dene we offer a relaxed and laid back atmosphere. You can enjoy our large and bright lounge where you can relax and share experiences and moments with other travellers after a long day of sightseeing.

name: Superb City Centre flat close to all attractions!
description: Cosy 1 bedroom flat with a warm welcome. Close to all Edinburgh attractions. Situated in the city centre next to bustling cafes, bars and restaurants this accommodation is in the ideal location. The West end is a 5 minute walk with The Real Mary's close 2.7 km and Camera Obscura 2.5 km. There are a number of shops, supermarkets and superb transport links at your doorstep.

name: Lovely Flat on the Royal Mile
description:
✔ One-bedroom flat based in Edinburgh Old Town
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ 7-minute walk to National Museum of Scotland
✔ Next to The Royal Mile
✔ Edinburgh Waverley: 5-minute walk
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: LAIRD’s LODGE  - Stunning castle view - Old Town
description: Set in the enchanting Old Town and next to Edinburgh Castle.  Luxury apartment with four-poster bed and looking up to the oldest part of Edinburgh Castle.  Laird’s Lodge is a short walk from the legendary Royal Mile and the quaint, picturesque, boutique-filled West Bow. The vibrant, historic Grassmarket which pulses with restaurants, cafés and traditional pubs is literally a few steps away. This is the perfect location from which to explore the delights of Scotland’s gorgeous capital city.

name: Double room en-suite
description: Welcome to the Blossom Guest House Edinburgh. We offer friendly and affordable accommodation with Free Parking and Free Wi-Fi, close to Edinburgh City Centre. The guest house is located on a main bus route with easy access to Edinburgh city centre which is only 5 minutes away from Princes Street. All rooms are en suite. No shared bathroom facilities. There is 24 hour access to a shared kitchen. Reception closes at 10pm.

name: Blossom Guest House
description: Welcome to the Blossom Guest House Edinburgh. We offer friendly and affordable accommodation with Free Parking and Free Wi-Fi, close to Edinburgh City Centre. The guest house is located on a main bus route with easy access to Edinburgh city centre which is only 5 minutes away from Princes Street. There is 24 hour access to a shared kitchen. Reception closes at 10pm.

name: Blossom Guest House
Blossom Guest House
Blossom Guest House
description:
Blossom Guest House is a traditional stone-built Edinburgh Town House where Victorian period features have been carefully combined with a mixture of modern facilities and amenities to provide a home-from-home experience for visitors who return time and again for a warm welcome.

The guest house is ideally placed in its proximity to Princes Street with its vast array of stylish shops and stores, Edinburgh Castle, and many more tourist spots and visitor attractions.

name: Blossom Guest House
description: Welcome to Blossom Guest House Edinburgh. We offer friendly and affordable accommodation with Free Parking and Free Wi-Fi, close to Edinburgh City Centre. The guest house is located on a main bus route with easy access to Edinburgh city centre which is only 5 minutes away from Princes Street. There is 24 hour access to a shared kitchen. Reception closes at 10pm.

name: Royal Apartments Edinburgh
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. Gorgie, west of Edinburgh city centre and within walking distance of the west end and Princes Street, offers a wide range of amenities that include a Sainsburys Superstore at Inglis Green Road and an Asda Chesser Supercentre at New Mart Road. Nearby. Fountain Park provides a wide range of entertainment that includes a multi-screen cinema, gym, trampoline park and bowling, as well as a variety of restaurants.

name: Skyline View Apartment
description:
Penthouse apartment with 4 bedrooms located only 10 minutes from the centre of Edinburgh. Our home is right next to the refurbished Victorian Saughton park and just short walk to the water of Leith.
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids)

>🅿️ Send us a message for information about parking
>🚶 20-25 minute walk to city centre (1 Mile)
> 💨 Tram: 15 min walk to Balgreen stop
> 🚌 Bus stop 2 minutes away on Gorgie Park Road and Westfield Road

name: Georgian Flat In The Heart of Edinburgh’s New Town
description:
Stunning, cosy, main door ground floor flat, in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic New Town. Steps away from St James Quarter, Playhouse, Waverley Station and the tram to the airport.

Accommodation comprises: a spacious bedroom, a substantial bright sunny living room boasting two sofa beds, stylish well-equipped dining kitchen, and a family bathroom with a powerful shower ensures you will have a comfortable stay and a fully functional laundry room.

name: Top Floor Apartment With Castle Views
description:
>🅿️ Send us a message for information about parking
>🚶 20-25 minute walk to city centre (1 Mile)
> 💨 Tram: 15 min walk to Balgreen stop
> 🚌 Bus stop 2 minutes away on Gorgie Park Road and Westfield Road

This apartment is fully renovated and is 180 sqm in size which allows for large bedrooms as well as a considerable roof terrace. The views of Edinburgh Castle and Edinburgh skyline are not to be missed. The surrounding hills and countryside can also be seen from the roof terrace.

name: New Town - Beautiful Period 1 Bedroom Apartments
description: These beautiful New Town apartments (built c. 1790) are located on Queen Street right in the city centre, just a few minutes walk from Waverley station, and surrounded by wonderful restaurants and bars. The living rooms are nicely furnished with well equipped kitchens including dishwashers and washer/dryer's. The stylish bedrooms in both units face the quiet rear of the building. The shower rooms feature large shower enclosures with multi-head showers.

name: Quiet Self Contained City Retreat Private Entrance
description:
~ Self-contained apartment with secure and private entrance
~ 2 totally peaceful double bedrooms at rear of property
~ 10 minutes walk to tram stop (journey to airport 25 minutes)
~ Fully equipped kitchen, and dining area overlooking gorgeous city skyline!
~ Washing machine and drying rack in the apartment
~ Linen and towels provided, soap and toilet roll.
~ On street paid parking outside the apartment
~ Add us to your favourites by clicking the heart in the upper right corner!

name: Sonder Royal Garden | Queen Studio Apartment
description: Picture this — an elegant grey-stone exterior with rows of French windows reflecting against the pink Edinburgh sunset. Welcome to the Royal Garden. Hints of gold and bronze decorate your space while bright light streams through the open windows. Just outside your door is The Scottish National Portrait Gallery. Let the fairytale views of Edinburgh Castle inspire your adventure. Have the best of comfort and excitement at Royal Garden.

name: Edinburgh Alexander guest house .double room
description:
Alexander Guest House is a friendly B&B clean rooms and excellent bus access to Edinburgh city centre. Arthur’s Seat provides a beautiful backdrop.

At Alexander there is free private parking for two vehicle and free on-street parking is available nearby ,free internet access.

The house is in a residential area about 1 miles south of Edinburgh’s Old Town and the Royal Mile. Waverley Train Station on Princes Street is 1.2 miles away.

name: Elegance in Edinburgh
description:
Our beautiful property has been fully refurbished to make your stay comfortable and relaxing.

Downstairs you’ll find the award winning, ‘The Little Chartroom’ Restaurant or enjoy a local beer at The Black Fox Bar, or why not glam it up with Afternoon Tea or a Spa at the Famous and luxurious Balmoral is only a 10 minute walk away!
However you choose to spend your time, you will have everything on your doorstep and will be able to relax in full when you return to your stylish apartment.

name: Edinburgh.Alexander Guest House.luxury double room
description:
Alexander Guest House is a friendly B&B with good breakfasts, clean rooms and excellent bus access to Edinburgh city centre. Arthur’s Seat provides a beautiful backdrop.

At Alexander there is free private parking for two vehicle and free on-street parking is available nearby ,free internet access.

The house is in a residential area about 1 miles south of Edinburgh’s Old Town and the Royal Mile. Waverley Train Station on Princes Street is 1.2 miles away.

name: Newtown dbl bedroom with private access front door
description:
The property comprises a double bedroom with a king sized bed private en-suite in the basement of a beautiful 200 year old townhouse situated in the heart of the West End of Edinburgh's city centre.

The room is accessed directly from the pavement, descending a short flight of steps to the front door. The room is locked off from the rest of the house, so that guests have total privacy, and are able to come and go as they wish.

name: Picturesque seaside house in Queensferry Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our lovely family home in South Queensferry just outside of Edinburgh with stunning views over the world famous Forth Bridges.

This spacious newly decorated and furnished accommodation offers 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a kitchen with all gadgets you may ever need!

Our house is 15 minutes from Edinburgh airport and 30 minutes from Edinburgh city centre.

Suitable for families or large groups - you will have access to the whole house and garden. Enjoy your stay in Scotland!

name: Modern apartment with spacious room available
description:
Beautiful and spacious flat in the heart of Edinburgh. The perfect spot to explore all the city has to offer including the summer festivals!

You will have access to the entire first floor flat which is fully equipped with thoughtful extras to make your stay comfortable.

There are many local shops and cafes close by serving coffee and meals throughout the day. The vast majority of central Edinburgh and attractions are within 10 minute bus journey.

name: City centre flat
description: Very central main door flat, easy access to Princes street, with all the shops and Princes street gardens

name: Grand New Town 1 Bed
description:
Located just half a mile from Princes Street, this is a beautiful and spacious one bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh’s prestigious New Town.
The apartment sits on the ground floor of a stunning Georgian townhouse and provides a wonderfully relaxing base from which to explore Edinburgh.
Northumberland Street is one of Edinburgh's most popular and iconic streets, less than a mile from the Royal Mile.

name: King Size Room to Let: Edinburgh City Centre
description:
This traditional Scottish city home is located just 5 minutes from Waverley train station and a two minute walk from Picardy Place tram stop and Edinburgh Bus Station; both with direct airport links.

Everything is in walking distance; you could not hope for a more central location - especially for the Edinburgh festival!

This spacious double bedroom is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Room to Let: Edinburgh City Centre
description:
This traditional Scottish city home is located just 5 minutes from Waverley train station and a two minute walk from Picardy Place tram stop and Edinburgh Bus Station; both with direct airport links.

Everything is in walking distance; you could not hope for a more central location - especially for the Edinburgh festival!

This spacious double bedroom is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Haymarket Boutique Hotel - Kitchen and Lounge
description: No.6 West Coates is a boutique accommodation set within a beautiful 1850's property located beside Haymarket train station in West Coates. With splendid en suite bedrooms within this Victorian property set on landscaped gardens is not to be missed.  All bedrooms recently upgraded with furniture

name: Elegant period apartment next to Edinburgh Castle
description:
Wake up next to the Castle. Open the period wooden shutters of your bedroom and relax and enjoy a coffee overlooking Scotland’s most famous landmark.

Designed by the award winning architects MDO this lovingly restored apartment is perfectly located as a base to wander Edinburgh’s picturesque streets and immerse yourself in its unique culture and heritage.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful Riverside Apartment With Balcony
description: This recently renovated spacious modern apartment is situated in the stunning heritage site of Dean Village on the waters of Leith. It is a beautiful and tranquil green oasis at the heart of Scotland's capital city. Within 10 minutes walking distance of Princes Street, this accommodation comfortably sleeps 4 with 2 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The apartment boasts a quiet river side balcony with Secured keypad parking

name: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Edinburgh Centre
description:
PLEASE NOTE: We are an 18+ hostel.

Welcome to Castle Rock! We have lots of room for you to relax, socialise and make the most of your stay in Edinburgh…
Enjoy a game of pool, listen to music and make new friends over a free cup of tea, coffee or hot chocolate. We also organise events such as pub crawls, comedy nights and ceilidhs to keep you entertained.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street
