neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 17th Century Riddle’s Court Retreat, Royal Mile
description: This beautifully atmospheric and wonderfully located apartment will set visitors' hearts racing. Set in a historic close at the top of the world-famous Royal Mile, this apartment offers guests a wonderful insight into Edinburgh's Old Town, whilst not scrimping on modern comforts. We strongly recommend you do not bring a car as there is no parking nearby and you are central to everything the Old Town has to offer.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious Double Room | Cramond, Garden & Pets OK
description:
Charming double room, single bed , shared bathroom, private grounds.

Cramond with the River Almond and Foreshore. Most beautiful and sought after area to live in Edinburgh. Ease of access to everywhere. i 100 meters from the River (not on the river) and a 5 minute walk to the Foreshore.

Bus stop at the top of the street and takes you to Princess Street/Lothian Road and the heart of the festival in approx 30 mins

Near Airport - 5-10 mins with no traffic. Flights start at approx 6.30am

name: Delightful Fully Licensed Room in the Inch
description:
Bright, spacious Room with morning sun and a small garden in the south of Edinburgh.
I have another room available in the same house. Please go to my profile to see it.

SMALL BREAKFAST INCLUDED

name: Bright, Spacious, Main Door, 4 Bed in Bruntsfield
description:
A bright and well-proportioned, 4 double bedroom, main door, apartment based in the highly sought after area of Bruntsfield, in south Edinburgh.

The property has a large living room, kitchen, three good-sized double bedrooms and one smaller double bedroom. It is fully furnished. There are two contemporary bathrooms and access to a shared garden.

The property is in a good location, close to a variety of popular restaurants, cafes and bars, including the Cameo Cinema and Kings Theatre.

name: Spacious drawing room apt, 10 mins to Princess st.
description: Stunning large drawing room apartment with beautiful outlook over private gardens, within 10 minutes walk to Princes Street. This apartment is spacious light and an ideal place to relax. Two large bedrooms and ample living space for up to four people. Located in the fashionable district of Comely Bank, close to Stockbridge village. Stockbridge is full of fabulous eateries, cafes and bars. Once home to Sir Ernest Shackleton, the Antarctic explorer.

name: Castle View Retreat, Historic Grassmarket, 3 Bed
description:
Stay at the heart of Edinburgh's Magic, nestled beneath the mighty shadow of Edinburgh Castle! Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located gem overlooking Edinburgh's famous Castle, the Grassmarket and Victoria Street, the inspiration for Diagon Alley!
Excellent City Centre location within 5 minutes of all the main attractions.
Stay in a front row view of Beautiful Edinburgh, from your windows, look up to see the stronghold still standing, timeless, proud, and unchanged!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Luxury Room at Central Penthouse Flat/Free Parking
description:
Please note this listing is for a room in this appartment when I am in town and share communal spaces with my guests.
Set at the end of a quiet no through road this penthouse flat affords stunning views across the South West of the city and on to the beautiful Pentland Hills.
Very conveniently located: 10-15 mins on the bus or 30 mins walk to the city centre (West end of Princess Street).
It is a spacious open-plan.There is a private car park for residents and guests to the side of the building

name: Stunning views of Arthur's Seat, Free parking!
description:
Experience the spirit of Edinburgh at your pace, style & comfort at our charming apartment featuring:
- Spacious balcony with spectacular views of Arthur's Seat and Salisbury Crags.
- Free off street parking.
- Close to all the central attractions Edinburgh has to offer.
- King size beds (or one superking and 2 singles (twin) if you prefer).
- Fully equipped kitchen.
- Super fast internet

name: Stylish Micro Apartment 2 Tram Stops from Centre
description:
Hi! My room is full renovated with window seating, desk, kitchenette and a brand new en-suite with rainfall shower!
In the bustling Leith Walk area of Edinburgh with plenty of local restaurants, pubs and shops we're also only 15 minutes walk from Princes Street!

name: Beautiful Georgian Apartment | City Centre
description: This is a spacious, newly renovated flat with traditional high ceilings in the Heart of Edinburgh.

name: Triple En Suite Family Room - Work Desk / Wifi
description: The Edinburgh Hotel is a boutique accommodation set within a beautiful 1850's property located beside Haymarket train station in West Coates. The property has en suite bedrooms within this Victorian property set on landscaped gardens.

name: Stylish room by West End  & 15 min walk to Castle
description:
This is a traditional Victorian tenement apartment just a short walk from Edinburgh’s West End.

Free on-street parking is available at weekends (subject to space), or at Sauchiebank, around 10 minutes away. I’m happy to provide more details if needed.

There’s a new walkway just across the road that leads toward Murrayfield Stadium, making it easy to reach on foot. If you’re relocating or planning a longer stay, feel free to get in touch.

name: Gibson Terrace - Cosy 1-bed flat by the canal!
description:
This cosy main-door, one-bedroom flat right next to the Union Canal is only a 10-min walk to the bustling Lothian Road and has all the necessary amenities for an excellent home away from home. Located in Fountainbridge, close to the EICC and Fountain park, both work and entertainment are close by.

Both Grassmarket and the Castle are in easy walking distance and there are great public transport options within a minutes walk, taking you through the Old Town or via Lothian Road and into New Town.

name: Lovely 2 bedroom flat in the heart of the city
description:
Welcome to our beautiful flat right in the heart of the city in Edinburgh. Rose St.
As a self-catering house, you'll find everything you need for a perfect stay.
The flat is a perfect place to relax and offers a television and internet access.
This house has 2 bedrooms and can comfortably sleep 3.
In the first bedroom, you will find a double bed.
The second bedroom contains a single bed.
There is one bathroom, which has a toilet and sink and a walk-in shower.

name: Charming Studio Flat in Vibrant Leith
description:
Welcome to our bright and comfortable studio flat, perfect for a city break in Edinburgh! This open-plan space features a cosy double bed and a sofa bed, comfortably accommodating up to 3 guests.

The studio includes a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, ideal for enjoying home-cooked meals, as well as a modern shower room for your convenience.

Located just 5 minutes by bus from Edinburgh’s city centre, the flat sits in the lively Leith neighbourhood

name: Drumbank Cottage* - Sleeps 4
description:
Tranquillity! That is what meets you as you walk through the door of this delightful cottage. Which once was the quarters for the butler of the Dower House, Drumbank House who still remains our neighbour. Within a mere two minute walk and you can hop on a bus into the city centre to take in all this beautiful city has to offer.
Your own cosy, country cottage within reach of the city lights!
Drumbank cottage is within striking distance of many beaches, parks, woodlands and adventures.

name: The Edinburgh Rooftop Terrace
description:
This stunning central Edinburgh apartment is one of the city's most unique apartments with unrivalled views of Edinburgh Castle on your own private South facing terrace.

The apartment is located in the heart of the city on Rose Street and ideal if you want to explore the city or relax in the sunshine all day on your terrace.

name: Quiet room in a homely apartment - Solo Guest
description:
Solo guests with 5 Star Reviews, who love animals, are welcome to stay in our beautiful double room within a peaceful, elegant Victorian stone built 1st floor apartment, set in the highly affluent area of Morningside.

The apartment has been newly decorated with wooden floors in the bedroom and the bathroom.

Gorgeous Victorian style cast iron bath with overhead shower.

Set in a quiet, family communal stair within a stone throw of the main bus route to all of Edinburgh.

name: Cool urban apartment with stunning Castle views
description:
Cool, urban apartment in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town with spectacular views over Princes Street and of the Castle.

The apartment has been finished to an exceptionally high standard and is beautifully decorated throughout. This apartment is the perfect choice for a romantic getaway or city break.

name: Entire flat to rent.  Central. Well decorated.
description:
THIS FLAT IS ENTIRELY FOR YOUR USE. YOU WILL NOT SHARE ANY SPACE WITH ANYONE ELSE..

The property is superbly positioned within a short stroll from the shops and amenities of Leith Walk and Broughton Street, where coffee houses, restaurants and delicatessens can be found. The property is also close to Easter road which includes a very useful Scotmid supermarket, chemist, Post Office, bakeries, and ATMs. Nearby Calton Hill also has one of the most photographed views of Edinburgh’s cityscape!

name: Royal Mile Apartment 2 bed-rooms & 2 bathrooms
description:
Advocates Close is one of the Edinburgh's oldest close, positioned on Royal Mile, opposite St Giles Cathedral. 5 mins walk to Edinburgh Castle.

The flat itself is a ground floor flat lay out over 2 levels. 2 spacious bedrooms, one has its own en-suite shower room.

The shopping and entertainment area around Princes Street and George Street is ideally situated approximately half a mile away and provides a huge array of retail outlets, supermarkets, restaurants, clubs and bars.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Guest Favourite Petite Studio 2 min walk to beach
description:
This handsome 19th-century Victorian house is situated on one of the most exclusive streets in Portobello. It offers unusually flexible accommodation, an enviable beach-side location and is close to all the towns amenities. The apartment is clean and has been furnished with all the comforts of a home away from home.

This exceptional house has three apartments for short-term let and all of the apartments are well equipped and completely self-contained but can also be let together.

name: The Botanist Apartment Edinburgh Old Town
description: It's the perfect location - in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town yet situated in a lovely quiet location, with views of Arthur's Seat, the two bedroom Botantist Apartment is your ideal stylish holiday home-from-home. Built on the site of the 17th Century formal gardens of houses on the Royal Mile, everything that Edinburgh city has to offer is a few minutes walk from here - Old Town, New Town, Princes Street – history, architecture, galleries, shops, restaurants, cafes, theatres and cinema

name: The Malt Kiln Apartment Edinburgh Old Town
description: In a charming quiet area just off Edinburgh's Royal Mile, nestling right at the foot of historic Calton Hill, the seriously stylish three bedroom Malt Kiln Apartment is your ideal relaxing holiday retreat. Built on the site of the former historic Canongate brewery maltings, a short walk away from the major attractions in City Centre Edinburgh, the apartment has been expertly designed to give you a stylish contemporary Scottish welcome.

name: Edinburgh / Leith comfortable large double room
description:
A spacious double room in a beautiful, airy and comfortable flat in Leith (Edinburgh's super cool sister). There is easy fast connection to and from the city centre or to the coast for great walks.

Your room is large enough for you to be self-contained and keep your distance. This is my home so the flat feels lived in unlike many Airbnb apartments. I am usually around to assist your stay.

My flat is up 60 steps and is inaccessible in a wheelchair and tough if you have bad knees. Sorry

name: Castle Boutique, Royal Mile luxury 2 bed apartment
description:
Castle Boutique is a luxury two bedroom apartment situated on the Royal Mile, in the very heart of Edinburgh's historic old town.

Edinburgh Castle is a two minute walk up the famous cobbled streets. The area is filled with history, culture and stunning architecture. You will find a wonderful choice of shops, restaurants, cafes and pubs right on your doorstep.

A medieval courtyard situated at the back of the property allows you to relax and explore what Edinburgh has to offer.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stunning Central 2-Bed Mezzanine Apartment
description: A stunning and spacious contemporary 2 bedroom apartment in luxury development close to Edinburgh Castle and the city centre.  This unique apartment is spread over two floors with a study area overlooking the reception space via a glass balcony. The development overlooks The Meadows, a beautiful green space, and is incredibly quiet. There is a 24-hour Concierge and a selection of coffee shops, restaurants and supermarket within the development, which a walk away from city centre and attractions.

name: Modern Bedroom (only) in Newhaven Apartment
description:
Bedroom and shared bathroom use only.
Bright, modern double bedroom in beautiful, scenic Newhaven Harbour only 15 minute drive away from the wonderful Edinburgh City Centre with excellent transport links. Including bus and the tram line.

name: City Centre, Newly Refurbished Stylish Apartment
description:
Our beautiful, modern & stylish flat has recently been renovated to a high standard and will provide you with a central & relaxing base for your visit to Edinburgh. Close to Princes St, it takes less than 8 minutes to walk from Waverley Train Station and Tram/Bus stops are a few minutes away. The Castle, if your legs aren't too tired is just a 15 minute walk up The Royal Mile and you are surrounded by great restaurants, bars and shops in the City Centre

The stylish master bedroom benefits from

name: Spacious room in a very clean flat near Napier Uni
description:
This is a bedroom which is cosy and warm in a ground floor flat. It is a brand-new flat with a walk-in shower, and all rooms and facilities are newly fitted and decorated.
The flat is very well located for the airport and motorway access, free parking outside the building, easy access to public transport. Busses 3 and 25 get you to the city centre.

Good local facilities including library, hairdresser, cinema, shops and 2 shopping centres West Side Plaza and Hermiston Gait at walking distance.

name: Bijou by the beach
description:
Beautiful one bedroom flat in Portobello, Edinburgh’s seaside town.

Ideally located for a relaxed stay and long walks on the beach, Nicola and I have lived here for 10 years and think it’s the perfect place to stay in Edinburgh.

Only a short bus or taxi ride into the heart of the city, Portobello is the best of both worlds.

To get to the beach just walk under the bridge and straight down Brighton Place and Bath street. It’s a 7 min walk.

name: Central 1 Bed - 10 Min Walk to Edinburgh Castle
description:
Welcome to our charming one-bedroom apartment nestled on one of Edinburgh's most iconic streets, beside the famous Royal Mile. This unique apartment is perfect for solo travelers, couples, or business visitors seeking a central stay with character and comfort.
Situated just a short walk away from all main attractions, the Scott Monument, Edinburgh Castle, St Giles' Cathedral, as well as the National Museum of Scotland. Edinburgh Waverley Station is also only a 3-minute walk away!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Immaculate cosy flat next to Holyrood Park!
description: Superb flat warm and cosy

name: Bright Studio with Free Parking, Garden & WiFi ★★★
description:
Fully self-contained studio within a suburban home with own entrance.
We also follow a strict Covid cleaning regime, so please book with confidence. We have you protected.

name: Large Suite -Mountain View in Haymarket - Sleeps 4
description:
Fabulous period hotel suitable for large group / family.

It has retained period detail room the Victorian era and was built sometime back in the 1850's. Enjoy comfort and warmth with large sash windows , high ceilings and modern stylish furniture.

Excellent work station desk with strong WiF.

name: Ground Floor New Town Flat - Views to Dean Bridge
description:
Perfectly situated on the Western edge of New Town, just five minutes walk to Princess Street and George Street but with lovely open views over the private gardens on the Water of Leith and the Dean Bridge to Stockbridge from the sitting room and second bedroom.
Recently renovated Georgian, Ground Floor flat, stylishly finished with fantastic high ceilings and traditional features but boasting a funky open plan layout, two bedrooms and two bathrooms.

name: Forrest Hill Retreat
description: A hidden gem right in the centre of Edinburgh's historic Old Town with access to a small secluded garden. This is a ground floor property in a quiet cul-de-sac. All the major city centre attractions, such as Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, The Royal Mile, The National Museum of Scotland, Mary King's Close, Arthurs Seat and The Whisky Museum are just minutes walk away.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Self-contained ground level cottage with hill view
description:
Situated in west Edinburgh, beside the zoo, Murrayfield stadium, 15mins bus to city centre, airport and train stations
Double bedroom with clothes cupboard. Private sitting room has a sofa, a smart tv and dining/workspace.
Your private kitchen has a small fridge, portable hob, air fryer, microwave, and pod coffee machine.
Your modern shower room has halo LED Mirror and electrical shower.
There’s shared garden and patios space with dining table with city view.
Free private/on-street parking

name: King En Suite - Work Space -
description: No.6 West Coates is a Hotel which has been taken over by new management with a upgrade of facilities, furnishings and decorations as of 2020. The site has been trading as a hotel since 200. It has retained period detail room the Victorian era and was built sometime back in the 1850's. Enjoy comfort and warmth with large sash windows , high ceilings and modern stylish furniture.

name: Classic vintage VW Campervan
description: Cute Vintage VW Campervan available to rent. Perfect for weekends away and romantic breaks

name: Downtown and central 1 bed in Edinburgh
description:
We wish you a warm Scottish welcome in our centrally located, downtown apartment.

We are minutes from Waverley Station, across the street from the St. James Centre, 1 minute from Princes St in one direction and 1 minute from Leith Walk in the other direction. Everything is on your doorstep!

Our flat is recently refurbished and makes a cosy retreat from the hustle and bustle of exploring the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Quiet, single room getaway from the city bustle
description:
A peaceful getaway in the bustle of the city. Quiet residential area close to shops and within easy reach of the city centre.

Please note that due to chemical sensitivity, I am unable to host smokers or users of e-cigarettes/vapes. This is therefore a smoke free house.

name: Cosy 2BR Getaway | 10 Mins to City | Free Parking
description:
This first floor flat is situated in a sought-after area just off Ferry Road with an allocated parking space. It is in a quiet cul-de-sac near to gyms, parks and pool.
Very near to City center (10 min car) and all essentials :Morissons Supermarket is 10 min walk & Craigleith Retail Park is 6 min drive with High Street stores. Good bus service.
*Beaches, Ocean Terminal & Britannia : 15 min drive
* Inverleith Park & Royal botanics: 10Min walk
* Wifi and Auto central heating available in the flat.

name: Double  bedroom  near heriot watt ，napier airport
Lovely central rm single or double use
description:
Double rm in fresh new home central Edin .

1 new dble bed
15 min walk to city centre and harbor with shops restaurants and cafes close by
reviews v good👍
Tram direct from airport then 9 walk from Balfour street stop. 15min from train station
Bus outside flat

Hygiene a priority
4th floor apartment by stairs or lift

6 Flaxmill place 1st left after Bonnington Bar
Flat 11
Double occupancy only at the moment sorry

name: The St Patrick Square Residence
description:
Relax in comfort, at The St Patrick Square Residence. Located just a haggis’ throw from The Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle, this gorgeous two-bedroom, first-floor apartment is simply perfect for your next visit to Auld Reekie.

Spread across over 1,110 feet of exquisite Georgian architecture, the first thing you’ll notice is how much space and light the apartment spoils you with.

name: West Edinburgh (Airport/Murrayfield/City Centre)
description:
This is a 3 bedroom house in Corstorphine. House has recently been modified to a good standard and you can expect a comfortable experience here.

Given the quiet disposition of the area and the neighbours, suitability is mainly for holidaying families, couples or professionals. (No stag/Hen/Groups)

The property is an excellent location for Transport links directly into the City Centre, Edinburgh Airport, Queensferry Crossing, M8, M9 and City Bypass.

name: Central quiet traditional Victorian 2 bedroom flat
description:
Top floor flat (third floor) in a traditional Victorian tenement on edge of Edinburgh's New Town

Located 20 minutes walk from Waverley train station & Princes Street, and 10 minutes walk from tram stop to airport (Picardy Place)

Adjacent to large supermarket (Tesco) with several independent cafes, bars and restaurants nearby. Edinburgh's Botanic gardens, Water of Leith, and lively neighbourhoods like Stockbridge are a short walk.

Please note - there is no elevator/lift in the building.

name: Newly renovated centrally located modern rental
Edinburgh Silvermills
description: 3 bedroomed apartment in Stockbridge area of Edinburgh

name: Artistic colony house old world charm - bluebells
description:
My double room is available for either a couple or a single person
Free parking outside. It is a lovely neighbourhood with colony style house, garden at front with table to put your coffee on
and bench to sit on.
There is a super bagette/croissant/cheese/chutney style shop opposite the bedroom, at the back of the house.
There is also wifi. and a local park where you can jog or walk.
After a 15 minute walk you can come across the waterfront with cool coffee places.

name: 2 Bedroom Garden flat - close to major attractions
description:
Leopold Place is a large south facing city centre garden flat with the majority of Edinburgh's attractions within easy walking distance. The Playhouse Theatre & the St. James Quarter are just 5 mins walk from the apartment. George Street and Princes Street are just a few more minutes away.

Valvona & Crolla, arguably Edinburgh's best delicatessen, is literally around the corner.

The peaceful garden at the back is perfect for relaxing with a glass of wine at the end of a busy day in the city

name: Newly refurbished city centre chic pad
description:
Our trendy apartment is in a fab location! A bright & spacious 1 bedroom apartment works as a fantastic base to explore our beautiful city. 1st floor apt which has been renovated summer 2020 and has high ceilings & a sense of style. You are spoilt for restaurants & bars as they are literally on your door step. This apartment suits couples & is a none party apartment!

Situated 1 min walk from the tram stop which takes you directly to the Airport & across the city. This place wont disappoint!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright Central Apt with Garage + Private Entrance
description:
A bright and fully furnished two-bedroom apartment with a garage for one car in a central, but quiet New Town location along from Queen Street and Princes Street. Short walking distance to most tourist attractions, Princes Street, Stockbridge and train station.

- Restaurants, shop and sights nearby.
- Free parking (Private garage)
- Private entrance to the flat.
- 9 mins walk to Princes St.

The apartment is a real home from home and perfect for business travelers, families, or couples.

name: Old Town 2BR Apt with Lift,  Parking and Views
description:
This stylish 2-bedroom top-floor apartment is located in central Old Town, on a street just off the Royal Mile. Iconic attractions such as the Palace of Holyroodhouse, Arthur's Seat, the Scottish Parliament and St Giles' Cathedral are within a short walking distance.

The flat is on the 6th floor (also the top floor) and has a private parking space if you request to use it in advance. You can enjoy a wonderful view of Salisbury Crags and the Forth estuary from the living room.

name: Luxury 4-BR Apt Next To Castle - Ramsay Garden
description:
A spacious and grand ground-level 4-bedroom apartment with full amenities located next to Edinburgh Castle, just a minute's walk away from the many attractions that Edinburgh has to offer. The perfect place for family, business, and holiday travelers.

- Luxurious holiday home in the best location.
- Located in a quiet area - Ramsay Garden - next to Edinburgh Castle and the famous Royal Mile.
- Fully-equipped kitchen.
- Beautiful interiors and finishes.
- Restaurants, shops and sights nearby.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Arthur's Seat View
description:
This recently refurbished home is centrally located and benefits from easy access and public transport to easily reach the city centre. It also enjoys wonderful South facing views over Arthur's Seat, it sits within Holyrood Park which is a wonderful place to explore.

It's perfect for guests with dogs and kids alike. You will love staying here!

This apartment is located very near the Royal Mile district of Edinburgh, a 25-minute walk from Camera Obscura and World of Illusions, 1.3 mile from Ed

name: Home from home on the Royal Mile
description:
Spacious and bright rooms with large original sash windows provide a gorgeous light to this hidden Edinburgh gem a few steps away from the Royal Mile.

The bedroom is fitted with king-size bed, feather bedding, and wooden window shutters to ensure the best sleep possible during your stay.

Iconic Design Classics such as Jean Prouvé chairs, and Serge Mouille lamps happily co-exist with antique local finds.

A beautiful & stylish retreat to escape to - we are sure you will love your stay.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: City Centre Modern Flat | Haymarket | Sleeps 2
description:
This stunning flat is located centrally in Haymarket, with great pubs, restaurants & transport links on the doorstep. Some of the most iconic sights, such as Edinburgh Castle, Grassmarket & Princes Street, are a short walk and it offers:
✔ 1 modern bedroom
✔ Beautiful vintage-themed bathroom
✔ Modern, well-equipped kitchen
✔ 2-minute walk to Haymarket, providing easy transport links 24/7
✔ Positioned 4-minute walk to Edinburgh International Conference Centre
✔ Essentials & WiFi are provided

name: Stylish Edinburgh Villa
description: Beautiful, eclectic and stylishly decorated Edinburgh villa. Only a ten minute bus ride to Edinburgh's historic centre with its numerous attractions & stunning architecture. Edinburgh has something for everyone, from art galleries for strolling to Arthur's Seat to take in the breathtaking views.  East Lothian offers over 40 miles of stunning golden beaches. A short walk to Portobello, Edinburgh's bohemian beach quarter with a village feel, this is a perfect home from home.

name: Haymarket - Standard Double Room
description: JOIVY Haymarket offers a stylish and homely experience for our guests to unwind and relax. Our cosy en-suite rooms provide everything you need for a comfortable and pleasant stay, including free Wi-Fi. Located in the centre of Edinburgh in a traditional Victorian townhouse, directly across from Haymarket Train Station and only a 20 minute walk from Princes Street. The famous Old Town, The Royal Mile and The Water of Leith are easily reached by foot or a short bus ride away.

name: Haymarket - Deluxe Double room
description: JOIVY Haymarket offers a stylish and homely experience for our guests to unwind and relax. Our cosy en-suite rooms provide everything you need for a comfortable and pleasant stay, including free Wi-Fi. Located in the centre of Edinburgh in a traditional Victorian townhouse, directly across from Haymarket Train Station and only a 20 minute walk from Princes Street. The famous Old Town, The Royal Mile and The Water of Leith are easily reached by foot or a short bus ride away.

name: Haymarket - Studio Double room
description: JOIVY Haymarket Hotel offers stylish rooms with private bathrooms and free Wi-Fi in the centre of Edinburgh, directly across from Haymarket Train Station. It’s located in a traditional Victorian townhouse only a 20-minute walk away from Princes Street and the famous Old Town. Edinburgh International Conference Centre is an 8-minute walk away and most of the city attractions can be easily reached either by foot or a short bus ride.

name: 16th Century Courtyard Apartment on the Royal Mile
description: Historic, studio apartment located in the heart of Old Edinburgh with views overlooking the Royal Mile and Riddle’s Court. This is an excellent location to enjoy everything the city has to offer from restaurants to museums.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Harbour Hill Cottage
description:
Harbour Hill is a single storey cottage, situated on a working farm in the picturesque Pentland Hills, only 1 mile from local amenities & public transport in Currie & 6 miles from Edinburgh City Centre.
It has a large, enclosed garden with private driveway & spectacular views of the hills & surrounding farmland. It is the perfect location to enjoy outdoor pursuits or explore Edinburgh & central Scotland, with most major attractions less than an hour away.
2 Nights minimum stay. Sorry no pets.

name: Fabulous main door flat with fantastic views.
description:
Lovely main door flat situated in the stunning and central location of South Queensferry, with fantastic views of the three famous bridges including the iconic Forth Bridge. This traditional 18th century Victorian building is finished to a high standard, with what we hope is a homely feel.

The property is minutes from lovely walks, fantastic bars, cafes and restaurants with local transport to the city and further a field.

name: Entire Deluxe Georgian 2-Bed Flat in City Centre
description:
A fabulous 1st floor Georgian apartment situated on Heriot Row - a highly prestigious street in central Edinburgh. It offers 2 spacious bedrooms with 1 king sized bed and 1 double bed.

- Fully equipped kitchen with hob, oven, kettle, microwave, toaster, cookware, fridge and freezer, washing machine etc.
- Beautiful interiors with deluxe sofa.
- Close to many attractions.
- Free Wi-Fi.
- Very close to Princes St and the train station.

name: Forth Reflections
description: South Queensferry offers a plethora of things to see and do for all age groups, whether it’s visiting a museum or taking a boat trip.

name: Fringe central Haven: 1min walk to Castle
description:
Step into the charming and bright 2BR 1BA retreat in the heart of Edinburgh! It promises a relaxing retreat on the iconic Royal Mile, just one minute away from the historic Edinburgh Castle, scenic Grassmarket, bustling Princess Street, and many other attractions and landmarks.

The modern design and rich amenity list will leave you in awe.

✔ 2 King Bedrooms
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ HDTV with Netflix
✔ Wi-Fi
✔ Direct Royal Mile Views

Learn more below!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh fringe Castle View!
description:
Experience the unique ambience of living on the famous Royal Mile by staying in this 1BR 1BA home, ideally situated just a few steps away from the historic Edinburgh Castle. Take in the area's landmark beauty, vibrant setting, and diverse selection of restaurants, shops, pubs, and attractions. After a day of exploring, return to our home for a rejuvenating stay.

✔ Comfortable King Bedroom
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Smart TV
✔ Wi-Fi

Learn more below!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: East End Edinburgh Apartment
description: A warm apartment with an open plan kitchen/living room. Close by to many shops and amenities. Bus/tram routes to all major attractions and easy walking distance to Princess Street,Playhouse etc

name: Perfect Old Town Location Two Bedroom Apartment
description:
Spend your holiday or work trip in this traditional apartment, located in Old Town just two minutes from train station and minutes from most of Edinburgh´s attractions.
We follow cleaning protocols to reduce chances of any cross infection. The apartments is cleaned and disinfected before each guest. Fully licenced property.

THIS APARTMENT IS NOT PARTY APARTMENT !!!
STRICTLY NO STAG,HEN OR ANY KIND OF PARTIES!!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh City Centre Home (Arthur's Seat View)
description:
PERFECT cosy home for a Fringe performer to have peace and tranquility after a hard days work.

VERY central home in Edinburgh.

Walking distance to:
- Edinburgh Fringe Shows
- The Pleasance
- The Royal Mile
- Arthur's Seat
- Holyrood Park
- The Meadows

The Property is well kept; very clean, sunlight, quality furnishings, fast WIFI (upto 110mb/s), work station and TV. It is a very comfortable environment for guests.

name: Double Room at Airdenair Guest House
description:
Please note: Most of our guest rooms are on 2nd floor and two rooms are on the first floor. No lift available. Please re-think about it, if you have any mobility concerns.

We are very much a family run business and have worked hard to establish a warm and welcoming environment for our guests.

The guest house is located in a quite residential area. And it is close to Royal Commonwealth Pool, and Arthur's Seat.

With frequent bus services, you can go to almost everywhere in Edinburgh.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

description:
Please note: Most of our guest rooms are on 2nd floor and two rooms are on the first floor. No lift available. Please re-think about it, if you have any mobility concerns.

We are very much a family run business and have worked hard to establish a warm and welcoming environment for our guests.

description:
Please note: Most of our guest rooms are on 2nd floor and two rooms are on the first floor. No lift available. Please re-think about it, if you have any mobility concerns.

We are very much a family run business and have worked hard to establish a warm and welcoming environment for our guests.

name: Longterm Two Bedroom Apartment sleeping 5 persons
description: Ocean Serviced Apartments offer a Two Bedroom Serviced Apartment, sleeping 5 persons. This comfortable apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, open plan kitchen and lounge area. The beds in this apartment can be set as king size or single beds, based on your preferences. A FREE underground parking and a complimentary WIFI will be provided. Our building is located at the sea front, approximately 2.5 miles from the city centre. A direct bus to the centre stops just outside our building.

name: Cozy Room Near Edinburgh Centre with Garden Access
description: Discover comfort and convenience in this lovely room in a cozy ground floor flat in Granton, just 25 minutes by bus or 7 by car to Edinburgh city centre! Enjoy a spacious shared living room with TV, dining area, and access to a private garden, perfect for relaxing or BBQs. The fully equipped kitchen has all you need for a homey stay. Just 4 minutes to a supermarket and bus stop. A perfect base to explore the charm of Edinburgh!

name: Spacious city centre apartment with stunning views
description:
Welcome to lovely and spacious apartment which is located in the heart of Edinburgh's city centre, yet really peaceful and only a few yards from the tram stop. The apartment is refurbished and cozy so during your stay you can feel like home, all of the essentials are provided.

Princes Street, George Street and all city centre attractions are within walking distance with all essential amenities provided and a stunning view of the Firth of Forth will guarantee your perfect stay in Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Shore South Queensferry
description:
The Shore is located within the picturesque coastal town of South Queensferry, with incredible views of the iconic Forth Road Bridges with everything you need right on your doorstep.
This stunning boutique 3 bedroom property with south facing garden and private decking/seating area, has everything you need for the perfect stay, whether you want a fun packed holiday with a wealth of activities to choose from nearby or a quiet retreat.

name: GuestReady - Classic Charm near Holyrood Park
description: A cosy 2-bedroom flat just right outside of Old Town. A perfect place for peace and quiet as you'll be right across Arthur's Seat!

name: Edinburgh West End Design Apartment | Sleeping 4
description:
Nestled in the cobbled streets of the West End in Edinburgh is a beautifully designed 2 bedroom apartment - West End Muse.

Sleeping 4 in 2 bedrooms (one Super-King & one King) with 2 bathrooms, the apartment has been lovingly renovated keeping original features and adding modern touches and splashes of colour. One of a kind furniture and art work is placed throughout, making this apartment a truly unique space in Edinburgh.

name: Spacious Suite & Office wokring area
description: No6 West Coates is a Boutique hotel set in fabulous Victorian 1850's building. Located beside Haymarket & Roseburn its only a 15 minute walk to Princess Street. (1 Mile). The property has excellent work desk space and access to a communal dining, loungs and small kitchen area. Sleeps 4 very comfortably with large bathroom en suite.

name: Tron Square cosy apartment,  5 mins from Castle
description: The Tron Square apartment is cosy with a comfortable, homely  feel.   Located just a short, 1 minute, stroll downhill from Edinburgh's famous Royal Mile, and in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Tron Square apartment has all of Edinburgh's main attractions almost literally on it's doorstep. The apartment is ideally suited to max 2 people.  There is a sofabed available for guests who wish to sleep separately.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh city centre royal mile lovely stay
description:
Amazing, very clean 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh.

Feel free to contact me with any questions or queries :)

Views out on to the royal mile from the front and Calton hill visible form the back

Situated on one of the most historic streets in Scotland

name: Stylish Stockbridge - Edinburgh
description: Beautifully-presented, one bed flat in the heart of Stockbridge - Edinburgh, dual aspect, second floor (Top) apartment , set in traditional Georgian building.

name: ‘New Town’ Georgian apartment in Unesco area
description: Stylish Georgian Townhouse flat in Edinburgh’s New Town UNESCO heritage site dates from 1825.  Being 2 floors up, there are amazing views northwards.  This quiet apartment is ideally situated close to the heart of the city - walking distance to most major attractions including Holyrood Palace, Playhouse Theatre, Princes Street and the Old Town.  King-size bed (UK), bath & shower, comfortable living area, fully equipped kitchen with dining area for 4 people.  NB - there is no lift in building.

name: Lovely City Centre Hideaway
description:
Edinburgh Licence Number: EH-77238-F

This is a central apartment with its own main door at street level - just one step to get in. Recently added to Airbnb and we be perfect for couples or small families looking for a short break in Edinburgh or someone moving here to find a permanent home.

We have a good sized double bedroom and a nice livingroom which has a sofa bed. On street parking charges Monday to Friday 830-530pm

name: Modern clean flat in Edinburgh
description:
Hello! This is my lovely little apartment in Edinburgh. My flat is a 10 minute drive into the city centre and there’s really good public transport around the area.

The area I live in has lots of parking around (I usually always get a space right outside my door!) which is really handy.

There are places to drink, eat and shop within walking distance.

Please feel free to ask any questions you may have as I’m always happy to help :)

Happy airbnb’ing!

Sarah xx

name: 2 Bedroom Central Flat Sea Views Free Parking
description:
PROFESSIONALLY CLEANED (in accordance with Airbnb’s guidelines)
Our central 2 bedroom apartment is based at the heart of The Shore with stunning views overlooking the sea/water. We're near The Royal Yacht Britannia & Newhaven Harbour.Private & FREE car parking space. This flat boasts a kitchen, living room, bathroom, 2 bedrooms with comfy king sized beds. This flat has all the home comforts of free Wifi, a large TV & 2 double mirrored wardrobes

name: Royal Mile House in Edinburgh’s Old Town
description:
Hi there,
Stay at our cosy house right in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site filled with so much history. Situated right next to Holyrood Palace, the ancestral home of the Scottish Royal family & the Queen's residence in Scotland. 30 seconds from the historic Royal Mile & the beautiful Holyrood Park & Arthurs Seat, we are located perfectly for all major tourist attractions & only five minutes walk from Waverly train station & Airport Bus Link.

name: Ocean Harbour View Oasis /Room
description:
Welcome to our unique flat, where the ocean's breathtaking view, magical sunrises, lush plants, vibrant colours, and positive energy create a refreshing and invigorating retreat.

With a private room and an exclusive separate bedroom, we offer an unforgettable experience, embracing nature's beauty and providing our guests a cozy, personalized haven.

Important: you will have a private room and a bathroom (outside of the room) but private for you. However, the owners will be in the flat.

name: Cozy Central Apartment including Wifi
A stunning central 120sqm Georgian 1-bed flat.
description: This elegant, spacious and lavish one bedroom flat is situated on the first floor in the heart of the very convenient West End of Edinburgh. The tram is just a three minute walk from the flat and all the major shops and sites of Edinburgh are in comfortable walking distance. This grand Georgian (circa 1850) property was extensively renovated last year and is furnished to a high standard. Flooded with light natural light and rarely available to rent. A truly delightful flat.

name: Romantic Georgian Apartment in Edinburgh New Town
description:
This delightful apartment within Carlton House is located within arguably Edinburgh's most desirable postcode. It is the combination of the proximity to the City Centre and yet also to Holyrood Park which makes this New Town Georgian apartment so appealing.

Designed by the architect William Playfair in the middle of the 19th century, Carlton Terrace, along with the adjacent Regent and Royal Terraces, forms part of Edinburgh's prestigious New Town district.

name: Johnstone Apartment by The National Trust Scotland
description:
Licence No EH-60472-F

Situated at the heart of the Old Town, guests at the Gladstone’s Land apartments, owned by The National Trust Scotland, can soak up the atmosphere of historic Edinburgh while enjoying one of the best addresses the city has to offer.

These apartments are finished to the highest standard and boast beautiful decoration and Scottish-designed furnishings. The interiors are inspired by Gladstone’s Land residents from the early 1630s.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Castle View, Historic Old Town
description: In the heart of the historic Grassmarket with an amazing view of the castle this 1st floor apartment aims to please. No better location to explore what the Historic Old Town of Edinburgh has to offer. Climb the steps opposite and you reach Edinburgh Castle. Watch the world go by from the window. All local attractions are within easy walking distance. This well laid out apartment is perfect for a couple but has an added bonus of a double sofa bed as a second bed! Licence No EH-69712-F

name: Huge, stunning ground floor garden maisonette!
description: We are very excited to offer this huge, stunning, newly renovated 3 bedroom ground floor garden maisonette. Situated in a great location, it would make the perfect home for a family or friends sharing with views to the gardens from every window. This property benefits from free on street parking, a warm fireplace with electric fire, and private back and front garden access. There is also a powerful shower in a very practical wet room.

name: Stylish 3 bed  2 bath Meadows main door garden apt
description: A newly refurbished 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment with private entrance and own garden, in the heart of Edinburgh. The apartment situated in Marchmont, a trendy area with local shops and bars and only a short stroll across the meadows to Edinburgh's best attractions. It is the prefect base to explore the city.

name: Seaside Luxury | 2min to Beach, 20min City Centre
description:
Immaculate and luxurious 40 sqm apartment with a private entrance, just a 2-minute stroll from the beach, cafes, and numerous bus links to get you anywhere in Edinburgh.

🛋️ The studio space is thoughtfully designed to comfortably accommodate up to two guests. We're dedicated to your comfort with professional cleaning and hotel-quality linen. There's a cosy double bed, Nespresso coffee maker, Sony 42” Smart TV, Bluetooth speakers and many home comforts we can think of!

name: Homely & Spacious 2 BR Flat in Bruntsfield
description:
Our homely & spacious first floor flat is in a traditional Edinburgh tenement, with lots of period features, as well as a modern bathroom and central heating. Well equipped kitchen and fast WIFI make it perfect for those working from home.

We're located on a quiet street in the heart of Bruntsfield with easy access to the city centre on foot or by bus and close to the Meadows. It's a lovely area with independent shops and plenty of nice cafes and restaurants.

Licence number: EH-69703-R

name: Stylish and chic apartment on Charlotte Square
description: This lovely duplex apartment is perfectly situated in the heart of the city centre, between Princes Street and George Street. Edinburgh Castle is just a short stroll away and the tram network is also only a short distance from the apartment. Guests enjoy 4 double bedrooms over two floors, 1 with en-suite shower room and a separate bathroom with bath & shower.  Oodles of space and light throughout. There is no parking with the property but Castle Terrace NCP is only a 5mins walk.

name: Maria Bright & Modern City Center Apartment  Maria
description:
The City Center Apartment " Maria " is a very nice 2 bedroom Apartment in a nice quiet area , only a 20 minute walk from Holyrood Palace, the Royal Mile, Princess Street, the Harbor and the beautiful Portobello Beach Promenade.

The Apartment have two Bedrooms, a Bathroom with bathtub and shower, a Living Room and a fully equipped Kitchen.

In our apartment is a small office workspace with an inkjet printer and a super fast 500 Mbit/s Fiber Broadband Connection. Ideal to work on the way.

name: Beautiful mews house in central Edinburgh
description: A cosy and comfortable mews house located in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town, yet on a quiet square with no through traffic. The 3-bedroom house benefits from its own integral garage which is included in the rental.

name: Beautiful Family Friendly Central 5 Bedroom Flat.
description: Our spacious, comfortable and homely 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms garden flat with own front door is located in the beautiful New Town. Waverley, George Street and Stockbridge are all within 10 minutes walk making it the perfect spot to visit all the sites that Edinburgh has to offer. The wonderful open plan living and entertaining space makes it especially good for families, as well as groups of friends. A quiet street, with pay and display parking right outside.

name: Perfectly located, modern city centre apartment
description:
Bright and airy, comfortable and modern, we think you’ll love staying in our super central city apartment. We have an open plan kitchen and living area for you to enjoy with your companion, or simply by yourself. Have a relaxing night in the cosy king bed after your long day trips out. You’ll have everything you need for your stay to feel like a home from home.
Being so central, you’ll only be a few minutes away from the amazing sights Edinburgh has to offer.
STL License No EH-68602-F
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Comfy Little Room in the Heart of Edinburgh🤗
description:
Lovely, double bedroom with a shared bathroom in a lovely little flat. The property is located in the absolute heart Edinburgh's Old town. With less than 5 minute walk to the castle, this place will make your stay super comfortable and worth remembering. Easy to travel to most parts of the city, this location is unbeaten.

Please note that the bathroom is shared. Free street parking is available only after 6:30PM on a first come first serve basis. We do not provide breakfast or access to kitchen
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Modern, spacious, 4 bedrooms, Free parking!
Central Apartment In Edinburgh In Perfect Location
description: This newly renovated, first floor flat situated in the wonderful Meadowbank area is the perfect place to stay during your trip to the capital! Within walking distance of the town centre, its the perfect place to get ready for a lovely night in town, or rest up after a long day exploring Edinburgh's many famous attractions! Make full use of the fully kitted out kitchen, and along with quality hard flooring and quality furnishings, comfort will be no issue for you! I hope to be welcoming you soon!

name: Stylish duplex with private parking in city centre
description:
Stylish and spacious self-catering apartment set over two floors and overlooking Charlotte Square Gardens in Edinburgh's prestigious New Town. Finished to a high standard, South Charlotte Street provides the perfect base for those wishing to explore Scotland's wonderful capital and is within easy reach of Edinburgh Castle, The Scottish National Gallery and the Old Town.

- Stylish apartment in a central location
- Equipped with own private garage
- Superb transport links for bus, train and tram
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming 3 Bed Apartment in The Old Town
description:
This 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment is ideal for couples and friends looking to experience the charm and history of the Old Town while staying in the city center—perfect for exploring.

Just minutes from the famous Royal Mile, it’s a short walk to Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, and all major attractions. Enjoy nearby shops, or relax at home and cook in the fully equipped kitchen. This apartment offers a welcoming base for your Edinburgh adventure.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Britannia Penthouse
description: The kitchen is equipped with a gas hob with extractor hood and a double electric oven, a microwave, fridge freezer, toaster and a kettle. There is plenty of crockery, glass, cutlery and cookware available for guests who would like to cook in the apartment. There is access to the Al Fresco Balcony.

name: large double bedroom with Arthur Seat view!
description: Very large bedroom. Bright and sunny . there is a NOISE from the busy street during the day. fast wi-fi. Walking distance to shopping centre, park and old town.bus stop just opposite main door.beautiful view to Arthur seat from Ur window. guests aloud to SMOKE in the kitchen with windows open. ⚠️ this shouldn't be an issue when U book the room . all decor and furnitures making no much space for guests to entertain themselves.  no party no extra ppl. it's space to relax only. no noise after 10pm.

name: Sumptuous 2BR Apt Next To Edinburgh Castle!
description:
This elegant 2-bedroom apartment, each with its own en-suite, is both stylish and cozy, offering breathtaking views over the entire city.

Spacious and fully equipped, it comes with complimentary towels, linens, and toiletries.

Ideally situated in the heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town, right next to Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile.

Perfect for small families or groups of friends looking to explore Edinburgh’s beauty while staying within walking distance of its iconic attractions.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Modern 3 Bedroom Apartment, West End
description:
This bright, modern, and comfortable apartment has all you need for a perfect stay in our vibrant city. Located on the lower ground, it features a private main entrance.

The space is designed to make you feel at home, offering a cozy and welcoming atmosphere.

It’s the ideal place for families or friends to relax after a day of exploring.

In the heart of the West End, it’s just a 5-minute walk to Princes Street, with easy access to top tourist attractions.

name: Home by The Meadows, close to City Centre
description: Located just outside the city center, this lovely flat is perfect for families/friends who wish to explore Edinburgh and enjoy the peaceful greens.

name: Two bedroom home to rent in Edinburgh
description:
Semi detached main door lower villa house located in boswall, a residential area and only a short commute by car or public transport to both the city centre, local amenities & tourist locations and even the local beach. Excellent property for two couples, or a family to stay in for a visit to Edinburgh,

It has all the inbuilt modern amenities and private driveway that fits two cars.he property has one bathroom & large private back garden that is accessed through the conservatory.

name: Royal Mile/Right in the heart of Edinburgh
description: Centrally located apartment just off the historic Royal Mile in the heart of The Old Town. Take advantage of all the city has to offer with local amenities & tourist attractions right on your doorstep. A 2-5min walk from Edinburgh Station, Edinburgh Castle, Princess St & Edinburgh Festival, you are spoilt for choice for food, drink, culture & entertainment. A clean & modern apartment with elevator access; a perfect base for a remote working, business, holiday or Edinburgh Festival experience.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Private En-Suite Room | Garden | Easy City Access
description:
Our family home is situated in Gilmerton, south of the city centre with direct buses and easy access to the City Bypass. Located 20 minutes by car from the airport / 30-40 minutes by bus to and from the city centre.
The double bedroom is located on the ground floor with a tea and coffee station and a private en-suite bathroom. The room can be accessed via the front door or through the back garden entrance.
EV charging is allowed with prior arrangement at an extra cost.

name: City centre flat next to Holyrood Park
description: Just 10 minutes walk away from all the major attraction: The Edinburgh Castle,High street,(Royal mile),Holyrood Park And Arthur's Seat. The single entrance flat has just been newly decorated with everything new.

name: Stunning Edinburgh 1820s stables converted room
description: The Courtyard Room sits upstairs within Ratho Park Steading: a stunning Scottish courtyard stable (built 1826; converted 2021). It borders Ratho Park Golf club (area of outstanding beauty), a walk from the heart of Ratho village, 8miles from Edinburgh centre. The large room is stylishly furnished (super king size bed),  tv/wifi, and heated through ground source. The property has off-road parking with use of/ views into a beautiful courtyard. Breakfast is a cold self-served buffet in the  'Den'.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Contemporary Royal Mile Apartment with Balcony
description:
✔ Elegant flat, ideally located in the old town
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ Balcony
✔ 13-minute walk to Calton Hill
✔ 14-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle

name: Elegant City Retreat in Hip Neighbourhood
description: This stunning Edinburgh property is located on Union St, at the top of Leith St and Queen St.   Edinburgh Playhouse theatre is only minutes away, as is the newly developed St James Quarter and entertainment complex Omni Centre.  We are right next to the hip Broughton St area with its awesome cafes, restaurants and bars.  The apartment provides generous space for 4 guests in elegantly styled surroundings.

name: Modern 2 bed apartment - in the trendy Shore area!
description: Modern chic apartment overlooking The Water of Leith, bright and spacious furnished to a high standard throughout. This stunning apartment is luxurious and comfortable with little extras to make any guests stay wonderful. The double bedrooms are finished with beautiful linen, one also has an en-suite shower room. There is a main bathroom and fully equipped kitchen. There is wifi and a TV included along with essentials such as tea and coffee to ensure a lovely guest experience.

name: Entire flat to rent. Central. Modern. Renovated.
description:
THIS FLAT IS ENTIRELY FOR YOUR USE. YOU WILL NOT SHARE ANY SPACE WITH ANYONE ELSE. FEEL FREE TO MESSAGE ME FOR INFO



The property is superbly positioned a short stroll from the shops and amenities of Leith Walk and Broughton Street, where coffee houses, restaurants, and delicatessens are located.

The property is also close to lively Easter Road. Nearby Calton Hill also has one of the most photographed views of Edinburgh’s cityscape.

Our prices are the lowest!

name: 1 bed mezzanine, private parking, Leith, Edinburgh
description: Quayside Mills is a superb block of flats situated on the Water of Leith. This redevelopment has been converted from the old granary mill and sits in the heart of the highly desirable area of the Shore, Leith. The apartment offers a cool contemporary feel. It has one main bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with a bath and shower, an open plan kitchen/work area and a mezzanine upstairs which is the main livingroom. It has a dedicated free parking space.

name: Splendid Apartment in New Town
description:
✔ Gorgeous flat ideally located in the New Town
✔ 860 ft2 / 80 m2
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 9-minute walk to Princes Street & Royal Mile
✔ 11-minute walk to Dean Village
✔ 16-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 5-minute walk to Princes Street tram stop
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Large and bright Nordic style Room in a quiet area
description:
Large and bright room in a 2 bed flat in a quiet residential area, to the west of Edinburgh City Centre. 20 min on a bus and 15 min on a train to get to the City Centre. It takes 3 min to get to the nearest bus stop and about 12 min to get to the tram stop. If you are a Nature lover you have the Water of Leith Walkway and Pentlands on your doorstep.
I live with two feline friends who are friendly and curious about the guests :)

name: Ultra Modern, Stylish Apartment Next To Princes St
description:
Prime location in the heart of the city center.

This newly refurbished 2-bedroom apartment is perfect for a short stay in Edinburgh, whether for business or leisure.

You’ll find a fantastic selection of independent shops, bars, restaurants, and cafes nearby.

Just a minute’s walk east to Princes Street and a minute west to the airport tram stop.

With a private entrance, the apartment is modern, bright, and comfortable—everything you need for a stay in our vibrant city.

name: Edinburgh Cozy City Apartment
description: ‍
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright and Modern Studio in a Stunning Location!!
description:
Our guest suite is ideal for one person or a couple. Its central location will appeal to people who want the full Edinburgh experience, but who also want somewhere quiet to come back to that has all the facilities of a modern apartment.

It is also an ideal space for those planning on leisure time, or meeting friends/family, but who also need to spend some time working. The bright, airy and tranquil setting, with a table, comfortable sofa and ultrafast Wi-Fi will suit their needs perfectly.

name: Stunning Edinburgh 1820s stables converted house
description: East House sits within Ratho Park Steading: a stunning Scottish courtyard stable (built 1826; converted 2021). It borders Ratho Park Golf club (area of outstanding beauty), a walk from the heart of Ratho village, 8miles from Edinburgh centre. Rooms are stylishly furnished (with wifi), and proudly eco-friendly (ground source heated). The property has parking, doors to the courtyard, patio with views looking onto a beautiful fairway, and a path to the gardens, fire pit, ruins and historic canal.

name: Home in the heart of Edinburgh- near The Castle!
description:
This cosy apartment is just seconds from the Royal Mile and a short walk to Edinburgh Castle. Stay in the heart of The Old Town - a UNESCO World Heritage site.

Fast Wi-Fi, self-check-in, and hotel-quality comfort included.

Perfect for families, couples, solo travellers, or business guests.

Explore the city's rich history: top attractions like St Giles' Cathedral and the Scotch Whisky Experience- as well as lively pubs and restaurants all walking distance!
BOOK NOW FOR A MAGICAL STAY!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful home to rent in South Queensferry
description:
We live in the beautiful area of South Queensferry, just a short walk to the famous forth road bridges with fantastic bars and restaurants and very close to the airport and city bypass for commuting.
Our beautiful home and garden is the perfect place for a weekend get away, enjoy a lazy few days in our spacious garden lounging in the sun on our large patio/ Decking area.
Our home away from home has everything you’ll need to make your stay truly wonderful.

name: Stylish Stockbridge apt w/private entrance
description: A stylish, main-door apartment (private entrance) set on the ground-floor of a Georgian tenement block in central Stockbridge, one of Edinburgh’s loveliest neighbourhoods. From a quiet side-street enter a spacious and restful space, a mix of modern and period design. The apartment is perfect for week-long getaways and longer sojourns; fantastic boutiques, cafe’s, restaurants and green spaces are a stone’s throw away while everything central Edinburgh has to offer is also within walking distance!

name: Buccleuch - Cosy Grnd Floor flat near The Meadows
description:
This cosy ground floor one bedroom flat is perfect for your Edinburgh getaway. With a super comfortable double bedroom, well-equipped sitting room with a sofa and free wifi throughout, it allows guests a home-from-home and within walking distance of Edinburgh's major sites.

Perched perfectly at the east end of the Meadows, you are within a couple of minutes walk from the world famous Summerhall and less than 10 minutes' walk to The Royal Mile. Great coffee and eating options

Views across the old town towards Arthurs Seat you will not be disappointed.

Top floor flat (4 floors) no Lift/Elevator but view is worth the steps!

description: We are delighted to welcome you to this delightfully light 3- bed 1st floor flat overlooking the leafy pedestrian entrance to Edinburgh's most popular park in the Old Town. This charming home offers copious space throughout and includes three large bedrooms, a well-equipped kitchen dining space and a beautiful lounge. Some of the most popular attractions are within 10 minutes walk including Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile. The area nearby is packed with bars, restaurants, and grocery stores.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: New Town stylish apartment with great location.
description:
Situated in the very heart of the Unesco World Heritage Site, New Town, this beautifully furnished one bedroom apartment offers guests easy access to Edinburgh's main sights and sounds, whilst remaining quiet and secluded.

With a good-sized open plan kitchen living space, fantastic luxury shower room and double bedroom, guests will feel both on holiday and at home.

name: Castle View, City Centre Apartment
description:
This newly refurbished one bed property is located on the top floor of Lothian House with unobstructed views of Edinburgh Castle and Edinburgh's UNESCO sky line.

Open your door into the Centre of Edinburgh City, with only a 10 minute walk to Edinburgh Castle.

Local Venues include - Edinburgh International Conference Centre - Kings Theatre - The Usher Hall - Scottish National Gallery and the Famous Shopping Distrct of Princes Street

name: Grassmarket Apartment
description: Newly refurbished 1 bed apartment in a very city centre next to the Edinburgh Castle! Everything is brand new inside the apartment, like, a furniture, kitchen, bathroom, etc. The Edinburgh Castle can be seen through the apartment window and also from the communal balcony. The view is absolutely spectacular! It will be extremely hard to find a better location than this where to stay in Edinburgh. We are sure all guests will love the location and our brand new and comfortable apartment.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Welcome to our city centre home and garden
description:
Our place is a quiet roomy garden flat in the heart of Edinburgh's UNESCO World Heritage New Town, within a short walk of the major tourist sites, and a minute from the bars and restaurants of Broughton St.

We live here with our two lively beagles, so you'll need to enjoy being part of our dog-friendly world.

The generous room has a double bed, walk in wardrobe, and direct access into our private garden with gas heater and BBQ. You'll also have a bathroom for your use only (not en-suite).

name: Stunning Marchmont Festival Flat
description: Beautifully renovated Victorian flat in the heart of Edinburgh, blending classic elegance with modern luxury. Enjoy traditional high ceilings, original cornicing, and bright spacious rooms alongside contemporary comforts like two rainfall shower rooms, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a stylish dining area. With three generously sized bedrooms, this is the perfect home base for exploring the city, just a short walk from cafés, parks, and major attractions

name: Modern apartment overlooking Edinburgh Castle
description: Situated on King’s Stables Road, this compact 1-bedroom apartment will be a great choice for a couple or group who want to discover Edinburgh. The Edinburgh Castle and Princes Street Gardens are within a few minutes walk away. You will also find a great variety of shops, bars and restaurants nearby and along the Grassmarket. The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a living room and a kitchen. Essentials such as linen, towels, TV & WiFi are provided. Public garage available nearby (for a fee).

name: Modern & Spacious 1 Bed Apt, West End
description:
This refurbished one-bedroom, first-floor apartment has a modern, cozy vibe, creating a warm and inviting space.

Located in the West End, just steps from Princes Street, it’s central and within walking distance of Edinburgh’s main attractions and landmarks.

The apartment offers fast Wi-Fi, two Smart TVs, and includes complimentary toiletries, linen, and towels.

It has one bedroom, one bathroom, and an open-plan living area with a fully equipped kitchen and sofa bed.

name: One Bedroom Apartment in Edinburgh City Centre
description:
Stylish one bedroom apartment The apartment can accomodate up to 4 people by providing small double bed and comfy double sofa bed.

My place is good for couples, travel companions, solo adventurers and business travellers.

The apartment is located in heart of Edinburgh, 5 min walk from Edinburgh castle.

name: FAMILY ROOM
description:
In a quiet area, a 10-minute drive from the centre of Edinburgh and 5 minutes’ walk from Haymarket Rail Station, Dalry Guesthouse has free Wi-Fi and luggage storage.

The bedrooms are colourful and inviting and each has heating and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms have an en suite bathroom.

A continental breakfast is served every morning and there are various pubs, cafés and restaurants a 10-minute walk away.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: dalry guest house
description:
In a quiet area, a 10-minute drive from the centre of Edinburgh and 5 minutes’ walk from Haymarket Rail Station, Dalry Guesthouse has free Wi-Fi and luggage storage.

The bedrooms are colourful and inviting and each has heating and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms have an en suite bathroom.A continental breakfast is served every morning and there are various pubs, cafés and restaurants a 10-minute walk away.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Entire flat to rent. Central. 10 min to Castle.
description:
THIS FLAT IS ENTIRELY FOR YOUR USE. YOU WILL NOT SHARE ANY SPACE WITH ANYONE ELSE. FEEL FREE TO MESSAGE ME FOR INFO



- Self check-in, arrive at any time
- perfect for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers and groups
- Great bus transport connections
- Unlimited fibre optic internet available
- Watch Netflix TV
- The flat is near Princes Street, Grassmarket, The Royal Mile, and Edinburgh Castle.
- Spacious rooms, great decor, well-equipped & great location!

name: Newly Styled, Central, 2 Bed - Main Door Apartment
description: This central, main door apartment has been recently redecorated with a bright, laid back, contemporary feel. It is situated on a residential street in the heart of Tollcross, just a stones throw from the Kings Theatre, Lothian Road and the Meadows, with lots of great bars, restaurants and cafes close by. The high amenity area of Bruntsfield and Morningside is approximately 5 / 10 minutes walk away and the West End of Princes street is a about a 10 minute walk or a short bus ride.

name: Central, beautiful room and bathroom, garden flat
description:
I look forward to having you stay in my beautiful garden flat, in the centre of Edinburgh

The area is full of vibrancy and buzz. You are within walking distance of Princes Street, designer shopping, Carlton Hill, and Arthurs Seat, all doggie friendly. A stones throw from theatres, cinemas, restaurants and endless neighbourhood cafes. Live and love local :)

You can arrive by plane, train, car or bus, all are easy to link from. Plenty of on-street parking and public transport is a breeze.

name: Quartermile Luxury Landing Apartment
description:
Quartermile Luxury Landing Apartment is a bright, very spacious and freshly decorated two-bedroom apartment that is set on the 3rd floor of a contemporary lift-served building.

Perfect for both couples and families, the apartment provides comfortable accommodation in a prime city centre location.

The apartment benefits from an abundance of natural light throughout the day, free unlimited and speedy Wi-Fi and an allocated parking space in the underground car park.

*No parties*

name: Bright Local’s flat in trendy Leith
description: Sunny ground floor flat offering great base to explore tourist's and local's Edinburgh alike.  Free Coffee/Tea. Easy access to city centre (1 short bus/short drive/beautiful walk along cycle path) as well as walking distance to The Shore where you will find good vibes, views and food. Psst...whilst being totally hip, cool and trendy in accommodation and location we're also baby friendly.

name: Shandwick Apartment @ The West End
description:
***** THIS PROPERTY CAN ACCOMMODATE 2 ADULTS AND UP TO 2 UNDER 10s ON THE SOFA BED. PLEASE ENQUIRE BEFORE BOOKING *****

This modern, bright apartment is a stone's throw away from Princes Street and all of Edinburgh’s main sightseeing area as well as many fabulous shops, restaurants, cafes, theatres and conference centres. It is a one bedroom property, sleeping 2 adults and 2 children under 10 total.

name: ★ 1BR Spacious & Sunny Grassmarket Apartment ★
description:
This spacious apartment enjoys an incredible location overlooking the Grassmarket - a must-see historic spot in the Old Town now lined with lively pubs, restaurants and shops - and just a 2-minute walk from the famous Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle.

The apartment is perfect for a couple or a solo traveller, comprising of one double bedroom, bathroom with shower/bath, spacious open plan living area with large windows and complete with fully-equipped kitchen and dining table.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Royal Mile 2bedroom apartment
description:
Beautifully finished luxury apartment, close to Edinburgh Castle and The Royal Palace. 2 bedrooms.

The property has a feature bath in the master bedroom, shower bath room and 2 large bedrooms with storage for clothing. The kitchen has everything you will need including boiling water tap (replaces kettle).
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Studio Hart | Castle Rock | Grassmarket
description:
This third floor newly renovated studio apartment presents arguably the best view in Edinburgh! Situated in front of the famous Castle Rock, Edinburgh Castle and a stone throw away from the heart of the Grassmarket, our guests can experience the charm of this bustling City as well as enjoy peace and comfort in our apartment. The apartment is located only an 8-minute walk from Edinburgh Castle and within walking distance of the Royal Mile, Princes Street, Haymarket, Waverley Station and many of the top tourist attractions in Edinburgh.

There are numerous bars, restaurants, coffee shops and quirky stores on your doorstep to enjoy.

name: Beautiful West End Apt. Private,own access.
description:
Beautiful Georgian apartment with own private entrance and seating terrace.

Open plan lounge/dining, kitchen (including oven, hob and washing machine), comfortable double bedroom & spacious shower room.

Set on a quiet residential road the apt is quiet at night despite its very central location.

300yards from the famous Princes Street in Edinburgh and Edinburgh Castle and the Johnny Walker experience. George street, famous for restaurants and wine bars a 5mins stroll.

name: Lux 2 Bed Ground Floor Apartment
description:
This newly renovated open plan 2 bed ground floor apartment has been recently refurbished to a high standard. Located in the south of the city of Edinburgh and only 15 minutes drive to the city centre. The apartment is located within well managed private grounds and next door to Liberton Golf Course.
It is the perfect accommodation for solo travellers, golfers, family of 4 or couples looking to explore Edinburgh.

name: Beautiful 1 bedroom flat in Fountainpark
description:
We are proud to offer this delightful 2nd floor 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom flat in a great location. The flat has been refurbished in June 2021 and has been beautifully decorated throughout. It will provide a stylish and comfortable base for you in Edinburgh.

It is close to the city centre with easy access the Edinburgh Conference Centre and Edinburgh financial district. It is also conveniently located close to lovely parks, the Union canal and popular going out and shopping areas in Edinburgh.

name: Luxury, City Centre, Wide-Beam Boat, ‘Camillia’
description: Luxury floating, accommodation on board a purpose built, wide beam, canal barge. Moored in Edinburgh city centre, 7 minutes walk to Edinburgh Castle and can sleep up to 8 adults in 2 double cabins, an adult bunk bed room and a double sofa bed in the lounge. This is the perfect unique choice of accommodation to make your stay in Edinburgh extra memorable.

name: Entire Central Edin. 3 bedroom Flat- Free Parking
description:
Rated highly by our guests

Guests have the sole use of this 3 bedroom bright & spacious apartment, (sleeps 6) in a quiet location in central Edinburgh

Easy walk to the City Centre, Stockbridge & the Festivities.
Free parking is available

3 bedrooms : King, double, single & and guest bed
Living room & dining area (6 chairs)
Fully equipped modern kitchen with table
2 bathrooms with baths & electric showers
Patio doors & balcony
Fast broadband

Most suitable for families although all welcome.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Superbly Located Mews Home Close to Princes Street
description:
Welcome to my peaceful home located in the heart of Edinburgh's city centre, where the splendour of New Town merges with the beautiful cobbled streets of my historical Mews flat.

Enjoy the convenience of having Charlotte Square, St Mary's Cathedral and both George and Princes Street right on your doorstep along with fabulous eateries close by, including the Johnnie Walker Experience. My cosy home has everything you need to enjoy a perfect city break while staying in a quiet and cosy location.

name: Bide Collective15
description:
Our accommodation offers Self Check in/check out serviced Rooms in a central location,we are located in the heart of Edinburgh's City Centre. Our self check in serviced rooms are set over three floors within a 1890's period Georgian Townhouse. This room is on our second floor so naturally stairs to climb. We are situated in "Hill Street" along the historic cobbled street in the New town of the city.

This is a double room with a uk standard size bed, private en suite (no bath use)just shower,

name: Lothian Road - perfect city centre location.
description:
Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at West End stop and arrive at Murrayfield in just 30 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to the heart of the action.

This beautifully decorated and appointed 2nd floor apartment is spacious and wonderfully located to take in the sights and so

name: Stockbridge Apartment
description: Stay in this lovely and very cosy self-catering apartment located in one of the most picturesque areas of Edinburgh. The property is a great choice for travellers interested in riverside walks (Water of Leith flowing alongside Stockbridge and Dean Village just a 15-minute walk away along the riverside), crafts & antique shops and tea houses.
