The apartment is excellently located to explore the city. We hope you will have a wonderfully memorable time!

name: Beautiful 2 bed apart. Full of character & colour
description: An absolutely gorgeous quirky apartment, full of character and colour.  High ceilings with beautiful cornices and ceiling roses. Large windows that flood with light. A well stocked spacious kitchen with everything you need for cooking, amazingly comfy beds, this apartment has everything to ensure your stay is the best ever. Set in a quiet street in one of Edinburgh's most incredible neighbourhoods, Bruntsfield, the apartment is minutes away from independent shops, artisan cafes and bus stops.

name: Modern house, office, garden terrace & parking
description:
Relax at this peaceful house just 15-minute drive from Edinburgh city centre. Whether you are looking to climb Arthur’s Seat, visit Edinburgh Castle, try some treats at one of the markets or put your feet up with a glass of wine in the garden, Bluebell Terrace is the ideal home away from home!

Featuring:
2 bedrooms, family bathroom, WC, study, living room with smart TV, and large sofa bed. Spacious dining kitchen with French doors leading to garden and private driveway for parking.

name: Fisherman's Cottage
description: Located just 1 minute away from the Newhaven harbour and a short bus trip away from the centre of town (with frequent bus services running throughout the day) this cozy apartment offers the best of two worlds: the sea and the beautiful city of Edinburgh. Just a short walk from the harbour where the Great Ship Michael was built, we’re also proud of the heritage to be found on our doorstep. With plenty of cafes and restaurants nearby,

name: ★ Modern & Cosy 2BR Rose Street Retreat ★
description: This snug 2-bed apartment offers all the conveniences of home and is located in the heart of the city centre, just moments from Princes Street.The apartment has a modern finish and is complete with one double bedroom and one single bedroom; fully-equipped modern kitchen with washing machine and hob/oven; bathroom with walk-in shower; and living room with sofas and smart TV. Amenities including free Wi-Fi, towels and bed linens are included as standard.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Traditional 2 bedrooms apartment
description: Stylish recently renovated 2nd floor apartment in traditional building  , near Holyrood palace in the heart of Edinburgh with stunning views of Arthur’s seat . The flat has 2 bedrooms , one with a free standing bath in which you can relax and get the view . There is a kitchen / dining / lounge with all the necessary equipment and a bathroom with modern shower . There are wooden floors throughout and gaz central heating . Plenty of restaurants and bars nearby and easy bus connections.

name: Luxurious 3 bedroom ground floor apartment
description: This is an ideal house for families or couples coming to visit Edinburgh.  It is a gorgeous ground floor apartment.  It consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and large kitchen dining area. You enter through a private main door entrance.   There is free parking at the weekend and supermarket 1 minute walk along with the Botanical Gardens and city centre close by also.  10 minute walk from John Lewis and the New shopping mall.

name: Stylish, Central And Cosy 1BD Nr Canongate
description:
Newly refurbished in 2022, this spacious ground floor one-bedroom property features all brand new furnishings and modern decor, making it the perfect hub for your city break.

It includes an additional sofa bed for extra guests and is within walking distance of Holyrood, Canongate, Dynamic Earth, and both the Old and New Towns. The property boasts an open-plan kitchen and living room.

Enjoy luxury towels and linens, a flat-screen TV, and high-speed Wi-Fi for your convenience.

name: Cosy Edinburgh 2BR Flat: Scenic, Stylish & Central
description: Treat yourself in our charming 2-bedroom flat in an Edinburgh's authentic neighbourhood. Enjoy two spacious bedrooms with scenic views to Arthur’s seat, a fully-equipped kitchen, a cozy living room with large TV, and a handy laundry room. Immerse yourself in local culture with nearby traditional pubs, exquisite restaurants, and quaint coffee shops. Just a short walk from the city center and offering convenient parking options, this flat is your perfect base to explore the wonders of Edinburgh

name: Bright and Cosy West End Quarters
description:
Bright and cosy flat with a recently renovated separate kitchen, located in lively and urban Fountainbridge.

The lovely union canal is just around the corner, perfect for a morning stroll. Several restaurants, bars and brunch places can be found in the area.

The flat is in walking distance of Grassmarket, The Royal Mile and Princess Street and is well connected by bus to the rest of the city.

Located on the 3rd (top) floor of a traditional sandstone building & 3 flights of stairs, no lift.

name: GuestReady - Stylish Apt w/ Parking near Edinburgh
description: Fantastic travel to and from both the city centre and the airport with the new Edinburgh Tram network extension that passes near the flat (from 21 June). Located close to the Shore, which has been voted one of the top 5 "coolest" neighbourhoods in the world by Time Out, with trendy bars and top Michelin star restaurants. In addition, there are some breweries and taprooms close by.

name: Ultra Modern, West End Village, Refurbished 1 Bed
description:
Fully refurbished in February 2022

Experience the stunning city of Edinburgh solo or with a partner in this fantastic apartment.

Just a 5-minute walk from Princes Street and 2 minutes from the Tram, it’s ideal for those who want the freedom to explore the city on foot.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, an open-plan living area, and a brand new kitchen with a dishwasher—all full of character.

Enjoy complimentary hotel-quality towels, linens, toiletries, and Wi-Fi.

name: Bright & Cosy Central Apartment
description: For the ones who want to be right bang in the middle of it all! Amazing restaurants, tourists attractions - its all on your doorstep! Stroll away from Old Town, New Town, St James Quarter and Johnnie Walker Experience. 2 min walk from the tram stop - direct connection with an airport . 5 min walk from Waverley train station and Bus station. FREE WiFi. SELF CHECK-IN. SERVICED BY PROFESSIONAL CLEANING COMPANY. You will need previous positive reviews from other hosts to book this accommodation

name: ALTIDO Elegant 3-bed flat with views onto Meadows
description: ALTIDO is delighted to welcome you to this newly renovated property, conveniently located just seconds away from the Meadows with views overlooking the beautiful park from the apartment. This flat puts all of Edinburgh's unmissable places within reach, including Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street, and the Old Town. The property consists of 2 double bedrooms, 1 sofa-bed room, 1 bathroom, a stylishly furnished living room, and a fully equipped open-plan kitchen with dining area.

name: Large private room near New Town
description:
Private room 15 minute walk from centre of Edinburgh, 5 minutes from the beautiful Botanic Gardens, 5 minutes from the Water of Leith and 10 minutes from Leith Walk.

Recently refurbished to a high standard, I'm busy turning this flat into a home and happy to share it with you while you enjoy your stay in this historic city.

I live in this flat as well, so will be on hand to give you tips and answer questions.

name: 7-Bedroom Townhouse , Edinburgh
description: Private  Central 7-Bedroom Townhouse just 15 min walk away from princess street and royal mile . it is a perfect choice for family ,friends , Hen or Stag groups , Rugby  groups , Conference business groups who want to stay together and close to all facilities just within walking distance to variety of restaurants ,cafe, pubs, clubs  , theatre, cinema , late night convenience stores , Meadow Garden and Caledonian Canal  .Excellent connectivity to city centre , Airport and Waverley Rly Station .

name: Newly upgraded flat in World Heritage location
description: Newly upgraded apartment located in Edinburgh New Town, a city centre World Heritage site. The property is spacious and bright, benefitting from much natural light. It features a king sized four poster bed, a walk-in wardrobe and a fire. Dundas street offers galleries and antique shops, with the boutiques and restaurants of George Street within a 5 minute walk with Princes Street and its famous gardens adjacent, below Edinburgh Castle.

name: Old town, free parking, Outlander experience
description:
1-bedroom flat in Holyrood - within 2 min walk of the heart of the Old Town. One of the greatest benefits is the free secure parking.
Everything is within walking distance. The Royal Mile, Waverley Station, Holyrood Palace&Scottich Parliament Building - 5 minutes walk.
Arthur's Seat and Calton Hill - 10 minutes walk.
Edinburgh Castle and Grass market - 15 minutes walk.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 94dr
description:
94DR is a 6 bedroom luxury, spacious, self-catering Edinburgh Townhouse with on-site parking and bags of social space with its own private south-facing garden.

Although the world may be different, our commitment to service through style, informality, and relaxed luxury remains unchanged. So it’s in the spirit of chartering a yacht, reserving a fully catered ski chalet, or planning an exclusive use country house, that we’re planning our path forward.

name: Spacious 2-bedroom apartment in Spylaw Park
description:
A stylish and homely 2-bedroom apartment in Spylaw House in Colinton Village. The house is a listed building, set in a beautiful park on the Water of Leith, conveniently situated between Edinburgh Airport and Edinburgh city centre - about 15 minutes drive to each and well serviced with local transport.

A beautiful home in a picturesque, quiet and peaceful setting for your stay in Edinburgh. It's like being in the countryside with the city at your fingertips, we hope you enjoy your visit.

name: Luxury City Centre Coach House, garden & balconies
description:
The Coach House is a luxury 18th century Coach house which has been renovated and modernised to an extremely high standard and is situated in the vibrant Broughton area of Edinburgh based in the heart of the city centre.

Princess Street is a mere 10 minutes walk away and Queen Street tram stop is only a 5 minute walk away.

The stylish property has its own main entrance, is arranged over 2 floors with its own private rear garden and 2 sunny balconies making it a truly unique place to stay.

name: Stylish comfortable flat in centre of Edinburgh
description:
Stylish, comfortable 2nd floor flat in traditional Victorian townhouse, in Edinburgh's leafy Abbeyhill area, owned by Scottish artist. The apartment is ideally situated, in a quiet street yet close to the heart of the city. Within easy walking distance of the Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace and Park, Calton Hill, Scottish Parliament and the Old Town.

Light breakfast included in cost - croissants/jam, coffee, tea and milk.

Plenty of shops, cafes, pubs and parks nearby.

name: Deluxe 3BR Apt in Central Old Town Next to Castle
description:
This spacious 3-bedroom is located in the prestigious Ramsay Garden, just steps away from the best Edinburgh has to offer, including Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, and St Giles Cathedral.
An upscale place to stay to experience Edinburgh at its finest.
- 6 guests
- Beautiful interiors and finishes
- Restaurants and shops nearby
- Great for adult families and people who travel for work, sightseeing, and festivals.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Super comfy KS bed, tram link, free parking
description:
The property is situated within the residential area of Corstorphine, west of Edinburgh City Centre.
Ideal for guest who looking for good rest and easy access to the City Centre, Airport, Murrayfield Stadium and all that Edinburgh has to offer.
8 min walk to the Tram stop
4-10 walk to the busses
20min walk to Edinburgh ZOO,
Restaurants, bars, supermarkets, cafes whit in walking distance.

name: Victorian Flat in City Centre
description:
This 2nd floor sunny flat in Hillside neighbourhood. Centrally located in a quiet traditional Victorian tenement building close to cafes, restaurants and shops. We are within walking distance of most of Edinburgh's “must sees” like Calton Hill and Arthur's Seat. We have a fantastic bakery right across the street and are close to public transport.

All bookings after the 1st of October 2023 are subject to licensing and planning permission as per guidance on AirBnB.

name: Portobello Charming Seaside 3-BR Holiday Apartment
description: Stunning family beach house 3 bedroom flat. Brilliant and uniquely decorated accommodation in the heart of Portobello, 40 meters away from the sea  🌊 and just a short and frequent bus ride away from the Edinburgh's city centre. Ideal for families and couples looking for a quiet romantic break and safe neighbourhood, you will feel home from the very first moment! Warm, cosy and relaxing place to retreat to after a day out and about. Located on the ground floor with private entrance. *No parties*

name: Garden Annexe with private access & parking
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space in leafy Morningside.  A recently converted annexe, we have created a private hideaway at the bottom of our garden.  You have your own entrance via a gated driveway onto secluded paved area and detached studio where you have everything you need to provide the perfect tranquil haven from which to explore Edinburgh.  Ideal for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.

name: Edinburgh New Town Main Door Flat
description:
Centrally located flat main door flat in the New Town World Heritage Site, located in a 225 year old historical listed building.

Perfectly located for exploring the city and a very short distance from the St James Quarter centre, bus station and train station.

Newly refurbished and has the unique advantage of being a main door flat with a lovely outside patio/courtyard with lighting so is perfect to sit out in the summer evenings.

name: Bright 2-Bed Flat – Ideal for Families or Groups
description:
Welcome to my cosy, fully private, not shared flat. Renovated in 2022, it's my home for part of the year, so it’s well cared for and thoughtfully equipped.

– Two comfortable bedrooms
– Fully equipped kitchen and bright living space
– Stylish bathroom with walk-in shower

Just a 20-min walk from Edinburgh’s city centre and right next to Arthur’s Seat. Shops, cafés and supermarkets are nearby. Well connected by public transport.

name: Flat with lovely views in trendy Leith
description:
Come stay in my lovely flat for the Fringe!

It's a third floor, south-facing flat with stunning views of Arthur Seat and Calton Hill.

There are two bedrooms, two bathrooms. It's clean, comfortable, relatively minimal, and drenched with daylight.

We are just two minutes walk from the nearest tram stop, three minutes from the bus stops, and it's 10-15 minutes into the city centre.

Free use of my bike, free parking and wifi, and all basic amenities to cook at home, or head out into town.

name: Lovely 1-Bedroom Unit Near Edinburgh Castle
description:
→ Super central location, everything is walkable from the flat, you won't need a car/transport to see Edinburgh
→ Brand new 1st floor Grass market 52 sqm flat with lift & castle view from bedroom
→ Ideal for couples, group of friends visiting Edinburgh for sightseeing, events or nightlife
→ 1 bedroom flat, has 1 king bed, 1 double sofa bed & sleeps up to 4 people
→ Fresh linen, towels, toiletries & essentials provided
→ Free unlimited hi-speed WiFi, Smart TV & Netflix
→ Fully equipped kitchen
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely flat in Leith from SuperHost!
description:
Our lovely flat is in the heart of Leith - Edinburgh's coolest neighbourhood!

Leith is known for its fantastic selection of restaurants, bars, coffee shops, bakeries & more – you have everything you need nearby.

With a tram stop nearby, getting around Edinburgh couldn't be easier. You also have easy access to lots of lovely walks and green spaces.

name: Delightful modern Flat near Edinburgh castle
description:
Enjoy the experience of this newly refurbed and lovely central flat with modern and stylish decor throughout. Sleep up to 3 people. One double bedroom and sofa bed.

It is in the city centre, right next to the International Festival venues, the Meadows, the Castle, Princes St, Grassmarket with regular bus services available on the doorstep, with a great selection of shops, breakfast cafes, bars and restaurants. Edinburgh and Napier Universities are readily accessible.

name: Porteous apartment in the heart of Grassmarket
description:
The apartment really is in the shadow of the castle and perfectly situated to explore every mysterious and beautiful corner of the city.

Ideally suited for 2, but can accommodate up to 4 as there are sofa beds

Thanks for looking!
DS Holidaylet team

name: Lovely en-suite room in Edinburgh's New Town
description: A beautiful private en-suite room situated in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town with all the best that Edinburgh has to offer within easy walking distance. From Princes Street to the Royal Mile, Edinburgh's famous Botanic Gardens to the historic area of Stockbridge. A wonderful breakfast is also served to set you up for the day ahead.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Cosy Flat in Historic Building in the City Centre
description: This small, centrally-located flat is within walking distance of most places you would like to visit in Edinburgh, such as the Castle, The Royal Mile, and Princes Street. Overlooking The Meadows, the flat is close to where the locals like to relax and is within easy access to Edinburgh University. Across the road, there's a friendly, local pub and around the corner, all the shops, bars, and restaurants you will need. The flat itself is light-filled and comfortable with fast WiFi.

name: Bright and spacious 2 bedroom maindoor flat
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located, modern 2 bedroom apartment. Maindoor flat making it very convenient for all guests and all local bars, restaurants and shops are only 5min walk and approx. 300ft. Royal mile, Holyrood palace, Princes Street all are only 15min walking distance. There is on-street parking that is charged by pay meter, max stay at once 4hrs, hourly rate vary from £2-3.50 per hour. Free parking from 6.30pm to 8am daily and weekends.

name: Beautiful 1-bedroom apartment in heritage building
description: Enjoy the full Edinburgh experience in this central apartment,  within 10-15 minutes walk of the Castle, the Meadows, Princess Street, Haymarket, Grassmarket and all their attractions such as dining out, shopping, theatres and museums. If you prefer a quiet and affordable meal at home there are several supermarkets within a 5 minutes walk and many takeaway places.

name: Apartment in the Grassmarket area of Edinburgh.
description: Edinburgh, Old Town - Grassmarket. This 2nd floor studio apartment offers stunning view of the Castle in one of the city's best locations. In the heart of the Grassmarket, which features bistros and craft shops. WiFi available. The Grassmarket Studio offers self-catering accommodation. The studio apartment is 200 yards from the famous Royal Mile and 350 yards from Edinburgh Military Tattoo. There are numerous restaurants, pubs, and bars within a 5-minute walk.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 2-bedroom Apartment by water of Leith
description: A modern decorated 2 bedroom flat in a traditional tenement building, offering our guests a bright and modern space during their stay in Edinburgh. This apartment is newly listed in Airbnb, however we are experienced host and will operate this holiday let in the same standard as our other listings.

name: Edinburgh Tour - Ensuite 1-bed private room
description: McDonald Road Edinburgh is in the heart of the city. The house is just besides the Mcdonald Road station of Airport tram. It has a main door entrance and on the left room after the entrance is a private room. It has a modern shower room and also a high-speed fibre broadband access. In the downstairs, there is a kitchen and a dining room. It is nice and quiet, despite being close to all the amenities. The TESCO is just on the opposite of the street. It is walking distance to Calton, Princess St.

name: The Haymarket - Minimalist Central Edinburgh Home
description:
A beautiful 3rd-floor minimalist apartment in the heart of Edinburgh hosted by an experienced Superhost with a track record of 100% 5* Feedback.

Our spacious, modern West End Georgian apartment is located just a one-minute walk from Haymarket Station. The property is also within walking distance of Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street, Stockbridge, and Murrayfield Stadium.

This clean, stylish and comfortable property offers the perfect base for your Auld Reekie adventures.

name: Apartment with pool, sauna & free parking
description:
+ Stylish one-bedroom apartment
+Access to shared amenities, including a pool, sauna, and gym.
+Walking distance to the city centre, Edinburgh Castle, and major attractions.
+Close to bars, restaurants, entertainment venues, and Haymarket transport hub.
+A perfect base for both work and leisure to explore Edinburgh.

name: Loft styled Victorian apartment, 95M2
description: Take some time out to relax in a loft inspired apartment in Edinburgh city. Enjoy walks along the canal to city centre. First-class amenities on the street include an artisan coffee shop and Italian deli, stocking the best Edinburgh has to offer along with craft beers and wine. Spacious apartment with 2 bedrooms and log burner for winter. Kitchen is fitted with pop up breakfast bar and ample dining space for entertaining. Ample on street parking.

name: Gorgeous 2BR & Central Edinburgh Bolt-hole
description:
Stunning, newly refurbished two-bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh City Centre, just 1 minute from Princes Street

At the end of a large building, it has a unique quirky layout

Located on the first floor, it offers two bedrooms (King and Double) and an open-plan kitchen, living, and dining area

Enjoy the luxury walk-in shower and ample built-in wardrobes in both rooms.

With fast Wi-Fi, towels, and toiletries included, it’s a short walk to central attractions, perfect for a city break

name: Bright and Cozy Double Room in Edinburgh
description:
The flat is located on Rutherford Drive, a well-connected street in Edinburgh. It’s close to Craigmillar Castle and the Newington area, which has a variety of shops and restaurants. The King’s Buildings, the University of Edinburgh campus, and the Royal Infirmary Hospital are all nearby, making it a convenient location for students and professionals.

The flat is shared with one male professional. Public transport links make it easy to reach the city centre

name: Bright room in uniquely styled apartment.
description:
A unique stylish apartment in an excellent Edinburgh location. Only a shirt 20 minute bus ride to the city centre.
This is my home, I live here and am happy to share. I will most likely be here, too. If I am not, the costs will reflect that and you can enjoy the apartment to yourself.

name: Unique cottage in vibrant Grassmarket, Edinburgh
description:
Enjoy Scotland’s capital city in all its glory and retreat back to The Signal House, a unique and tranquil cottage in the heart of the bustling Grassmarket.

The Signal House can be found secretly hidden through an entrance in between antique book shops, nestled at the top of a unique residential area. It’s elevated position gives it spectator views of Edinburgh Castle.

The cottage is perfect for a couple’s getaway or a fun trip for two friends.

Car park space available for additional cost.

name: Central 2 bedroom Cosy Sunny Flat Free Parking
description: PROFESSIONALLY CLEANED (in accordance with Airbnb’s strictest guidelines) Our central 2 bedroom 2nd floor apartment is situated in Newhaven next to The Royal Yacht Britannia,the sea & Newhaven Harbour. We have a private car park & FREE parking. This flat boasts a large kitchen & living room, a bathroom, an ensuite bathroom & 2 bedrooms with comfy king sized beds. This flat has all the home comforts of Wifi, large TV & 2 double mirrored wardrobes.

name: Bright, Spacious + Modern 2 Bed - On Tram Line
description:
Prime central location, fresh, modern interiors and charming period features, this Victorian two-bedroom third-floor tenement flat promises a highly appealing city abode with a favourable south-facing aspect and pleasant open views.

Positioned in Leith Walks heart, the flat enjoys excellent transport links and a diverse array of shops, bars and eateries right on its doorstep – an excellent apartment for those looking to experience Edinburgh's nightlife for the night, or a week of history.

name: Central Studio Apartment with Free Parking
description: Central studio apartment situated in the secluded garden of a Victorian villa. The space is entirely yours throughout your stay and is equipped with walk in shower, flat screen TV, combination oven/microwave, toaster, kettle and fridge.Please note there is NO HOB but the studio is minutes away from the numerous trendy boutiques, bars,restaurants and cafes in Bruntsfield. You can walk to the city centre in 20 minutes and there is a bus stop at the end of the street with a frequent bus service.

name: Bright Quiet City Centre Apartment with Balcony
description: Bright, C-listed 1st floor apartment. Edinburgh New Town,  20min walk from Princes st. Peaceful and safe residential street, 7min walk from the buzz of local amenities. Newly refurbished, it includes a comfortable and bright living-room with a balcony and a dedicated workspace equipped with Superfast WiFi. Pristine hygiene & cleanliness. Paid on street parking. A perfect base to explore the city!

name: Great Central 2-Storey 2BR Apt + Private Entrance
description:
A delightful two-storey apartment situated in a beautiful lane in Edinburgh's New Town. This two-bedroom apartment also boasts the advantage of a private entrance. Short walking distance to most tourist attractions, Princes Street, Stockbridge and train station.
- Fabulous apartment in a central location
- Located on a quiet street
- Fully-equipped kitchen
- Restaurants, shops, and sights nearby

The apartment is perfect for business travelers, families, and couples.

name: City Centre Modern Flat | Sleeps upto 3
description:
Welcome to Scotland – a land steeped in myth, mystery, and magic.

Here in the heart of Edinburgh, our elegant residence offers the perfect base for your Scottish adventure. With a central location, attentive personal service, and exquisite interiors, we promise a stay that is truly unforgettable.

We take great pride in our hospitality and look forward to making your time with us both memorable and uniquely Scottish

name: Central Leith  flat
description:
This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. It is just off Leith walk and within walking distance of the centre of town.
There is an excellent bus service and the tram taking you in to town stops right at the end of the street. There are several great bars and restaurants in the area so you don’t have to go far if you don’t want to.
Several great shops too .

name: Large 4 bed (sleeps 8) Castle View - refurbished
description:
Beautiful 4 Bedroom Apartment, just a stone throw away from Edinburgh Castle.

Very spacious 4 Bedroom flat, large living room; includes; Pool table, PS4, Arcade machine. Perfect for up to 8 guests.

2 Shower rooms & a kitchen.

City Centre location, car park 1 minute walk (chargeable seperatly)

Spectacular views of Edinburgh Castle. The Royal Mile is just a 5 Min Walk away.

Your whole group will enjoy easy access to everything Edinburgh has to offer from this apartment.

name: Cosy Boutique Character Flat in Central Location
description: A cute & cosy studio flat in a fantastic location within walking distance to centre, near Meadows and Holyrood Parks and Edinburgh University. Historic building overlooking a lovely inner courtyard. Large living/bedroom, large separate kitchen and small shower room with wc.

name: Castle Side, Edinburgh Old Town
description:
The views of Edinburgh Castle as you enter Websters Land will take your breath away. The stunning castle views will be yours from every window in our spacious and comfortable apartment.

You will be living in the heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town, perfectly located in a quiet and safe gated courtyard, the city's main attractions are just a step away. This is an ideal base for a holiday and/or for working from home.

Get in touch and we'll help you plan your trip.

Licence No EH-66082-R 11/9/2025
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: central city apartment with underground parking
description:
Welcome to your ultimate getaway in the beautiful city of Edinburgh! Nestled in a central location, my spacious, bright, and relaxed flat offers a haven of tranquillity for your stay. Rest assured; you'll enjoy a comfortable and secure environment throughout your visit.

I am thrilled to open up my home to guests while I am away. You'll have the entire flat to yourself, providing you with the privacy and freedom to make yourself home.

name: Stylish 2 bed City Centre Apartment, Edinburgh
description:
Unwind in Style in the Heart of Edinburgh

Relax in this calm, stylish two-bedroom apartment perfectly located just a 10-minute walk from Edinburgh Castle, the Old Town, and the city centre. Nestled beside the scenic Meadows park, it's the ideal base for exploring the city on foot. You're only 15 minutes from all major Edinburgh Fringe Festival venues, with some of the city's best wine and cocktail bars, as well as five-star restaurants, just minutes away in the trendy Morningside district.

name: Lovely New Town Bedroom & Private Bathroom
description: Hi we are Laila and Allan and we would love to welcome you into our New Town home which is on the second floor of our building, up two flights of stairs. We have a very spacious bedroom to offer and a  private separate bathroom, providing a fabulous base to explore Edinburgh.

name: Ensuite private family room in center Edinburgh
description: McDonald Road Edinburgh is in the heart of the city.  The house is just besides the Mcdonald Road station of Airport tram, it has a main door entrance.The room has a private on-suite bathroom and toilet. It is for a family of 4, but not suitable for 4 adults.  In the downstairs, there is a kitchen and a dining room. It is nice and quiet, despite being close to all the amenities. TESCO and Sainsbury are just on the opposite of the street. It is 15-min walking to Calton or Waverly train station.

name: Comfort Double Private Bathroom and City View at C
description: Carmichael at No 11 Ravelston Dykes is a charming Edwardian detached house in the prestigious Murrayfield area and offers the epitome of family run bed and breakfast accommodation. With four beautifully appointed bedrooms fine home cooked food, complimentary wifi and car parking, within easy walking distance of fabulous pubs restaurants and shops, not to mention unparalleled Scottish hospitality we create a true home away from home for all our guests. A studio flat which sleeps 4 also available.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Stunning, quiet cottage  + garage in city centre
description: It has been described as "possibly the best studio apartment in central Edinburgh" this bright, detached Georgian mews cottage flat includes a secure parking garage with parking space for the exclusive use of our guests.  (NOTE CAR HEIGHT RESTRICTED to 180cm/5 feet  11 inches).  Situated in a quiet cul-de-sac  just 5 minutes walk to Princes Street and close to bars, restaurants and supermarkets.  Ultrafast internet.   With Nespresso, tea, fresh bread & milk,  jam & biscuits for arrival survival.

name: Western Harbour-Luxury Seaside Apartment
description:
Welcome to our modern and inviting apartment in Newhaven - the perfect place to stay for contractors, groups, business, travelers, families, and friends. We welcome you to enjoy our warm hospitality.

➞ Easy access to A901 motorway.

➞ 12 min drive away from McDonald Road train station.

➞ 2 min walk away from nearest supermarket & restaurant.

➞ Attractions like Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh, The Edinburgh Dungeon, The Edinburgh Dungeon are just a 15-20 minutes drive away from this property.

name: Stylish and spacious 1 bed Edinburgh tenement flat
description: Gorgeous 1 bedroom 3rd floor flat equipped with all you need for a cosy stay. Spacious with a shared garden and clean stair, cosy carpeted floors + central heating. Located in Leith, on a quiet street 5 min walk from Easter Road and beautiful Lochend Park. Lots of bakeries and boutiques minutes away. Great restaurants and pubs on Leith Walk 15 minutes away. City centre and Holyrood Park not far. Ideal for 2 guests - eg couples or small groups/families. NB: Owner lives here when not rented out.

name: Stylish 2bedroom+FREE Parking+20min Centre
description:
Welcome to our Modern and Spacious 2 bedroom apartment located in the Costorphine area. An ideal place for you and your family or friends to enjoy an unforgettable stain in the city of Edinburgh.
Fee parking, easy connection to the city centre (20 mins by bus), walking distance to the vibrant Costorphine area with pubs and restaurants.
On the route of 200 bus from the airport.

2 double bedrooms (each with tv), living room, kitchen and a bathroom with a walk-in shower

name: Canongate [357]
description: This newly decorated one bedroom holiday apartment, is in a perfect location at the bottom of the Royal mile directly opposite Holyrood Palace and the Queen’s Gallery and next to the Scottish Parliament. Arthurs’s seat provides a picturesque backdrop to the view from the living room and the bedroom of the apartment which provides the ideal base from which to explore the historic and contemporary sights of Scotland’s capital city. Most of Edinburgh’s major tourist attractions are located within a

name: Executive Apartment with Parking
description:
✔ Exceptional flat with stunning roof terraces in Edinburgh
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ 2 rooftop terrace
✔ Private parking
✔ 12-minute walk to Scottish National Portrait Gallery
✔ Next to Montgomery Park
✔ York Place tram station and Edinburgh Waverley train station are in a walking distance.
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Edinburgh Apartment near University of Edinburgh -
description: Set in the City of Edinburgh, this cute two bedroom apartment has plenty to offer. Only a short walk from the popular Meadows and Holyrood park; the property is within 15 minutes walk of the City centre. There is great public transport links with nearby bus stops, and access to train station at Waverley.

name: 2 bed on Leith Walk by McDonald Rd Tram Station
description: Please Note: We're on a main street in the city centre, so it can be a bit noisy at night sometimes. We also have a comprehensive guest guide including parking info. The flat is right on Leith Walk and there is a tram which is 2 stops from Waverly station. There is also a direct tram to/from the airport. We're surrounded by shops and restaurants of all types. Old town is also about a 15 minute walk away. Note, the no smoking policy is STRICT, so there is a £100.00 fee if any guests violate it

name: 369 High Street, Royal Mile, Edinburgh
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely modern  one bedroom flat with patio area
description:
Welcome to my one bedroom main door flat.Free on street parking is available outside the property and on the surrounding streets.
The property is located in the Restalrig area of Edinburgh.
The city is a 20 minute walk or 10 minute bus journey away. I hope you enjoy your stay.Any questions feel free to contact me.

name: 3 Bedroom Apartment, In City Centre With Parking
description: The property features fast WiFi and secure private parking. Located in the very centre of the city, it takes less than 20 minutes to visit popular attractions such as The Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street, Arthur Seat, the Botanical Gardens and the brand new St James Quarter shopping centre which features several shops, restaurants and entertainment. It is also only a 10 minute drive or bus journey from Ocean Terminal shopping centre which is home to the Royal Yacht Britannia.

name: Lovely 2 bedroom Flat with parking and Tram stop
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Two double bedrooms with free parking and a tram stop 5 minutes walk away. Great bus links to all over city and straight tram from Edinburgh Airport to the flat in 20 minutes.

name: Stylish apartment in historic centre
description: Our lovely spacious apartment is part of a city centre Category A Listed building from the Georgian period in the heart of Edinburgh’s New Town. The area dates from the 18th Century and is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. All around you are cobbled streets, beautiful Georgian architecture and plenty of great cafes, bars and restaurants. It’s a very safe and quiet area, and just a short walk to the mediaeval Old Town, and to the lovely adjoining local neighbourhood of Stockbridge.

name: 2 bedroom apartment  2 miles from Edinburgh centre
description: Two bedroom, two bathroom spacious apartment just two miles from the centre of Edinburgh. Set in a private, gated apartment block with a very pleasant courtyard and a secure underground parking space included (2m height restriction). The apartment itself is on the 4th floor (lift access) and has recently been completely renovated. Hotel grade linen and towels included. Complimentary toiletries from Scottish Fine Soaps (shampoo, shower gel, hand wash).

name: 1BR • Modern Victorian • Waverley Station ~15 Min
description: Located on bustling Leith Walk with some of Edinburgh’s coolest bars, pubs, cafes and restaurants nearby, our beautifully modernised Victorian apartment will put you right at the centre of the action while giving you some quiet comfort of a home away from home. You’ll get the entire apartment to yourself with a spacious bedroom, bathroom, living room, kitchen and dining areas. *Please note that we Airbnb the apartment when we’re away, so our personal belongings will be in the apartment.*

name: ★ Cosy 1BR Old Town Apt. - 1min from Royal Mile ★
description:
Stay on one of Edinburgh’s most iconic Old Town streets, just moments from the Royal Mile, Princes Street Gardens and Waverley Train Station.

The apartment is located on the lower level of a renovated tenement building and is split over two floors. On the ground floor find an open kitchen/dining/living area with seating and a flatscreen TV, plus bathroom with shower-over-bath The double bedroom is located on the upper floor and is complete with ample storage including a large wardrobe.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Holyrood New Apartment
description: Holyrood New Apartment is a bright, modern and freshly decorated two-floor apartment located in a quiet residential area. The newly-refurbished (in August 2021) two-bedroom apartment seems a great choice for travellers who are looking to explore both the Old and New Towns of Edinburgh. Perfect for all couples, families and groups of friends, the apartment provides comfortable self-catering accommodation. Car parking available at NCP Holyrood Rd Car Park. Free for our guests.

name: Beautiful Central City, Waterside Quay Apartment
description: Enjoy a cosy experience at this centrally-located place, set alongside  Edinburgh Quay. Enjoy views along the cobbled waterways with glimpses of the city rooftops and castle over to Arthur's Seat. A rare city apartment that is close to all the main attractions while being tucked away beside the water. The canal walk is a popular and safe way, by foot,  to  Lothian Road ( 5 mins) , Princes Street, The Castle, Grassmarket and Old Town. A perfect base from which to explore this beautiful city.

name: The Mews Stables, a studio in Edinburgh's West End
description: Compact studio room created from a former mews stables with living, sleeping  and kitchen areas in one space, close to Haymarket Station and the airport tram.  Princes Street and the Dean Village and art galleries are 10 minutes walk away (0.5miles), the Conference Centre is 5 minutes walk away (0.25miles) and the Castle and Old Town are 20 minutes walk (1mile). There are numerous excellent restaurants and pubs in the vicinity, and for rugby fans Murrayfield is a 22 minute walk away (1.1miles).

name: Traditional tenement flat in Edinburgh
description: Enjoy a cosmopolitan Leith experience at this centrally located property. Well serviced by public transport, both bus and tram.

name: Cozy 2 bed cottage flat close to city centre
description: Cozy, quiet cottage style flat, only ten minutes walk away from the Royal Mile. Private, gated garden and an open plan living room/kitchen, with a bathroom, a double and a single bedroom.  Extremely well positioned for exploring Edinburgh using public transport or on foot- many of the main attractions such as Holyrood Park, Calton Hill or the Scottish Parliament are an easy walk!

name: Fabulous Apartment with Bay View Terrace
description:
✔ Elegant flat ideally located in Leith
✔ 1095 ft2 / 101 m2
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ Terrace with delightful sea views
✔ Private parking
✔ Ultra-Fast (1,000 Mbps) Wi-Fi Speed - perfect for long staying guests
✔ 1-minute walk to Ocean Terminal bus stop
✔ 6-minute walk to Leith Theatre
✔ 7-minute walk to The Royal Yacht Britannia
✔ An extensive area guide is provided & we are available 24/7

name: Cosy Large Double in Cheery Clean Home & Parking
description:
A relaxing and welcoming space in a quiet neighbourhood with a very comfy bed to give you a restful night's sleep.

All bedding and towels are 100% good quality cotton and we like big bath sheets after a hot shower:)
The guest bathroom is shared with only one other guest and is cleaned and sanitised daily. There's plenty of hot water at all times!

Homemade eco/non toxic cleaning products used!

The kitchen and living room are available if you wish and I am usually around if you need me.

name: Newly Refurbished-Central Location- 2 Bedroom Flat
description: A beautiful recently developed flat in the heart of Edinburgh’s West End,  just 7 minutes walk to the famous Princes St and a 5 minute walk to Haymarket Train station. This stylish basement apartment boasts two outdoor areas, a bright spacious sitting room with comfy seating, modern kitchen and dining for up to eight people. Fast Broadband. The TV does not have terrestrial channels and is all through apps.

name: One Bedroom Apartment
description: A beautiful private residence in the heart of Edinburgh City Centre. Step straight out of your apartment and into the Georgian streets of the New Town, famed for independent art galleries, unrivalled shopping and exceptional eateries. A few minutes’ walk from Princes Gardens, St James Quarter and Calton Hill, our apartments have been designed with you in mind and have everything the modern independent traveller is looking for.

name: One Bedroom Apartment with Car Parking Space
description: A beautiful private residence in the heart of Edinburgh City Centre. Step straight out of your apartment and into the Georgian streets of the New Town, famed for independent art galleries, unrivalled shopping and exceptional eateries. A few minutes’ walk from Princes Gardens, St James Quarter and Calton Hill, our apartments have been designed with you in mind and have everything the modern independent traveller is looking for.

name: Deluxe Two Bedroom Apartment
description: A beautiful private residence in the heart of Edinburgh City Centre. Step straight out of your apartment and into the Georgian streets of the New Town, famed for independent art galleries, unrivalled shopping and exceptional eateries. A few minutes’ walk from Princes Gardens, St James Quarter and Calton Hill, our apartments have been designed with you in mind and have everything the modern independent traveller is looking for.

name: Two Bedroom Apartment
description: A beautiful private residence in the heart of Edinburgh City Centre. Step straight out of your apartment and into the Georgian streets of the New Town, famed for independent art galleries, unrivalled shopping and exceptional eateries. A few minutes’ walk from Princes Gardens, St James Quarter and Calton Hill, our apartments have been designed with you in mind and have everything the modern independent traveller is looking for.

name: Newly Reno'd Cosy Nest, Prime Edinburgh New Town.
description:
A stunning, newly refurbished main door apartment on one of the most sought-after streets in Edinburgh’s New Town

A short, pleasant walk through James Craig’s architecture leads to the City Centre’s shops, bars, and restaurants

The property has been fully renovated and redesigned, featuring a brand new kitchen and walk-in shower room

Enjoy a widescreen TV with Sky, Wi-Fi, and a quiet view over the cobbled streets at the rear

Free hotel-quality towels, linens, and toiletries are provided

name: The Shandwick Place Residence No. 2
description: With its sweeping staircase and stunning cupula, a grand entrance welcomes you to The Shandwick Residence. This fabulous duplex two-bedroom apartment is perfectly located in the heart of the city's West End,  just seconds from Princes Street and all of Edinburgh’s main sightseeing attractions. You couldn’t be better placed to enjoy everything this capital city has to offer.  You’ll be spoilt for choice with an abundance of shops, restaurants, cafés and bars right on your doorstep.

name: Beautiful City Centre Room
description: Beautiful city centre room, with full use of kitchen facilities.  Situated on the A1 on main bus routes. 25 minutes walk to the train station with main tourist attractions at hand.  Situated on the A1 on main bus routes. Great local restaurants/bars and large retail park very close. Very close to Arthur's Seat and Holyrood Palace. Stylish modern conversion of old stone building with huge character. Very friendly live in owner happy to help with any concerns. Flat is quiet with a shared garden.

name: Traditional home contemporary style, by University
description: A truly relaxing home in the heart of South Edinburgh, near the Kings Buildings at Edinburgh University. Jerry , the owner,  is an architect who has lovingly restored the property's 1930s features whilst incorporating a clean contemporary design over 2 floors, this accommodation with parking appeals to families and couples. It has the most spacious kitchen dining area, with living room combined with generous bedrooms,  a wonderful west facing garden with sunset views over old town Edinburgh.

name: Luxury 3 Bedroom Apartment In Centre Of Edinburgh
description: This newly renovated, main door 3 bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh is the perfect place to stay during your trip to the capital! Located very central & within walking distance of the town centre, it's the perfect place to be situated during your stay. As well as having a private entrance, the apartment is very spacious and has a fully kitted out kitchen & bathroom, along with quality furniture in the living area & bedrooms- comfort will be no issue for you! I hope to welcome you soon!

name: Sweet Eyre a cosy, maindoor, studio flatlet
description:
"Sweet Eyre" is the perfect location for 1 person or a couple looking to enjoy historic Edinburgh and quirky Stockbridge.

This main door gem offers a cosy living room space with bedroom off, for relaxing after an adventurous day exploring Edinburgh.

Deco light and airy and with a gothic touch around the bedroom area.

As well as easy access to the city centre, the area offers a local feel with river walks and the Royal botanics close by, simply a visitor's gem.

name: No.6 West Coates 4 Family Suite
description: Located on the ground floor overlookingrear courtyard this room oozes natural light which is excellent if you wish to work or read from your room. The room was recently upgraded with furniture and decoration.

name: No.6 West Coates 1 Triple
description:
Modern comfortable room with all the following - This triple room is the best in the house overlooking the garden and moutains in the distance. With all the original features of this 1850s property



-Excellent Work Station

-Nespresso Coffee Machine & capsules

-Kettle and Biscuits

-TV & WiFi

-En Suite Rooms

-Communal Dining Area

-King or Double Bed with a Single Bed also.

name: Amazing apartment by the Portobello beach
description: Jeremy and Anne invite you to our bright and tastefully decorated modern two-bedroom apartment which has all the essentials you will need to have a wonderful stay in Edinburgh. It can accommodate up to 4 guests, making it ideal for couples and small families. It is right by the beach and 20-mins from the centre of Edinburgh so is perfect for a relaxing holiday or city break.

name: Peaceful 1 Bedroom Flat in Edinburgh
description:
A cosy flat with a private main entrance in the beautiful Bruntsfield neighbourhood, close to central Edinburgh. With lots of independent coffee shops, bakeries and boutiques nearby. The Old Town is an easy walk - through large, open public parks - or a short bus ride away. Fast 108 Mbps Wifi.

The flat has a clean, modern interior but retains original features like the classical columns on the outside, which date back more than a hundred years to when the property was a traditional sweet shop.

name: Double room 20mins walk to centre
description: I have a spacious and comfortable double room in my flat available for single occupancy. (Sorry no couples.) You'll share the other spaces (bathroom, kitchen, balcony) with me. My flat is on a very quiet street in a central neighbourhood with lots of local cafes, shops and pubs close by. It is only 20 mins walk to the east end of Princes street and 15 mins to Holyrood Park/Holyrood Palace and the botttom of thr Royal Mile.

name: En-suite room close to city centre
description:
Recently decorated to a high standard with wallpaper by local designer Mairi Helena and a fully tiled bathroom. There’s also a study area, fridge and tea / coffee making facilities.

We are in the bustling area of Leith Walk with many pubs and restaurants nearby. Princes street is only 15 minutes walk away.

name: Cosy, Comfortable Newington Apartment
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located newly constructed, cosy apartment in the fashionable Grange area of Edinburgh. Situated on a quiet residential street surrounded by grand properties.

Edinburgh University Kings buildings are just around the corner, perfect for students. Several restaurants, bars and brunch places can be found in the area.

Within walking distance of The Meadows, The Royal Mile and Princess Street and is well connected by bus to the rest of the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Grassmarket Apartment with Castle View
description:
This sunny top floor apartment enjoys an incredible location overlooking the Grassmarket - an historic spot in the Old Town lined with lively pubs, restaurants and shops.

The apartment is perfect for a couple or a solo traveller, comprising of one double bedroom, bathroom with shower/bath, open plan living area with fully-equipped kitchen and dining table - the perfect spot to enjoy breakfast at while taking in a view of Edinburgh Castle.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Joppa By The Sea, 2 Bed Victorian Villa.
description: Bring the whole family to this great flat with lots of room for fun and relaxation. Situated at the quiet end of Portobello beach/promenade (Edinburgh's seaside) we're just a few minutes walk from all the amenities Portobello has to offer and a perfect base to explore the surrounding areas of East Lothian. The centre of Edinburgh is a simple 20 minute bus journey away. Our property has two bedrooms and we can accommodate up to 4 guests in comfort.

name: Royal Mile apartment
description:
This lovely two bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Edinburgh's old town - the prestigious Royal Mile, a pedestrian zone. This street connects the historic Edinburgh Castle, to the renown Holyrood Palace.

This beautiful third floor apartment is perfect for both holiday and business trips.

Walking distance from public transport such as buses and the train stations. It is 300m away from Waverly Station. There is a taxi rank just one minute walk away and likewise easy access for ubers.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Unique Flat - Close to Haymarket & Centre.
description: This apartment is located 10 minutes away from Princess Street and old town where most of the touristic attractions are. It's a hat throw away from Tram and Haymarket train station and it's sorrounded by great restaurants and coffee shops. Great spot for families and friend who wish to enjoy Edinburgh!

name: The Blair Street Residence
description: This lovely one-bedroom apartment situated on the 3rd floor enjoys an enviable location just a few yards off Edinburgh’s famous ‘Royal Mile', right in the heart of the oldest part of the city. The local area is brimming with history and things to do, and you’ll find an abundance of pubs, restaurants and cafes literally on your doorstep.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Incredible City Centre 2 Bed In The Sky
description:
Experience this stunning two-bedroom top-floor apartment at St Andrew’s Square, right in the heart of the City Centre. Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of the Firth of Forth from this elevated space (no lift)

Located just a 5-minute walk from Waverley Train Station and 1 minute from the tram stop, the apartment includes two double bedrooms, one en-suite bathroom, and a separate bathroom with a shower. The unique circular living room and kitchen with a dining area create an inviting atmosphere
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Quiet room, ideal for studying and remote working
The Edmonstone's Residence
description: This lovely one-bedroom, first-floor apartment is converted from the former Traverse Theatre and situated just off the Grassmarket in a quiet courtyard right in the heart of the city’s Old Town. Sitting at the bottom of Victoria Street - one of the city’s most beautiful and photographed streets in the city, and home to numerous independent restaurants and cafes, historic pubs, quirky boutiques, and specialist shops. With all of the main attractions just outside your door, you’re perfectly placed
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright and  cosy duplex.
description:
Comfortable, bright and compact home. Free on-street parking with easy public transport; this would be an ideal base to explore Edinburgh and nearby towns.
Located in the picturesque village of Cramond in the north west outskirts of Edinburgh, near to the River Almond and the Cramond shore which are popular for walks. Nearby bustop, you will be in the city-centre in 30 minutes. Airport is about 15 minutes away by car/taxi or bus and tram. .

name: Charming Mews House in city centre
description: This stylish and comfortable property is situated on a quiet cobbled lane, bang in the centre of the city.   A stones throw from vibrant Broughton Street.  This cosy home will be a haven to return to after visiting the many local attractions including Cafes, Bars & Restaurants and   a short stroll from the highly desirable shopping  areas, historical sightseeing and Arts such as theatres, museums and galleries. Waverley train Station and a local bus and tram service are a mere 5 mins away.

name: Modern Flat on Rose Street
description:
✔ Tastefully furnished two-bedroom apartment with a private entrance, conveniently situated in the heart of Edinburgh’s New Town
✔ 600ft2/ 56m2
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ 11-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ Next to Princes Street
✔ Waverley train station is located only a 9-minutes walk
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
TRANSPORT
● There is no free parking available at this pr

name: Eclectic Apartment near Edinburgh Castle
description:
✔ Eclectic flat, ideally located in the old town
✔ 1356 ft2 / 125 m2
✔ 3 bedrooms
✔ 1.5 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 2-minute walk to St Giles' Cathedral
✔ 6-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ 3-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 7-minute walk to Edinburgh Waverley train station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Idyllic Victorian Oasis In The Heart Of Edinburgh
description: My gorgeous private entrance Victorian garden flat, built in 1850 is nestled in the heart of Edinburgh & steeped in history as the first Colony dwellings in Edinburgh. Take it easy & relax in my unique & tranquil getaway, enjoy a morning cup of coffee or evening glass of wine sat in my peaceful garden. My home is just steps away from the hustle and bustle of Edinburgh & Leith, a perfect base to experience Scotland's ever changing capital & discover its stunning sights & hidden gems! 😊

name: Unique apartment in the heart of Stockbridge
description:
Enjoy Scotland's capital city in all its glory and retreat back to Duncan's Land, a unique and newly refurbished Georgian apartment in the heart of 'bohemian' Stockbridge.

Down a few steps and through a delightful shared garden is the door to the old stone spiral stairs that leads up to this beautiful, newly refurbished apartment.

Perfect for a couple's getaway or a fun trip for two friends, it does however have a second bedroom with a sofa bed for an extra guest (additional charge).

name: GuestReady - Central 1BR near the Royal Mile
description: Right in the centre of Edinburgh's Old Town, this beautiful nineteenth-century home is the perfect spot for anyone looking to discover the best Edinburgh has to offer! It is located in the famous Royal Mile, just minutes from Edinburgh Castle, in an area popular with tourists with high foot traffic with the sounds of bagpipes and street buskers right outside. It's a very lively yet historic place.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy and Chic, Quiet Apartment in Leith
description:
Located on a quiet residential street overlooking a peaceful garden, our apartment offers a serene yet convenient retreat just a short walk from the lively Leith Walk.

Perfect for up to two guests, this stylish and elegantly furnished flat is an ideal base for travelers, professionals, and couples.

Whether you’re here to explore Edinburgh’s iconic landmarks, enjoy its vibrant culture, or simply unwind, our apartment provides a comfortable and homely alternative for your stay.

name: A colourful jewel close to the city centre
description:
A beautifully designed and quirky little flat in an historic Georgian tenement within easy walking distance of the Castle, Arthur’s Seat and the Old and New Towns. You can hop on a bus to take you further afield.

Although situated in a peaceful oasis over looking the Meadows the immediate area has a lovely array of individual shops, coffee houses and Restaurants . You can even buy a violin.

Enjoy the full Edinburgh experience!

name: Beautiful 2-bedroom New-Town holiday apartment
description:
Beautiful Georgian apartment in heart of Classical "New Town" of Edinburgh. Short walk to bustling Princes Street and St James Quarter. Lots of great restaurants, pubs and shops .

Spacious ground-floor two-bedroom apartment: Furnished and equipped to high standard.

name: Stunning city centre 2 bed apartment
description: Enjoy a fabulous experience at this centrally-located light and spacious apartment conveniently located close to The Playhouse, new St James shopping centre as well as many other attractions and venues in the historic city of Edinburgh.  Access to tram,  direct link to airport and  10 minutes walk to Waverly train station; secure car parking available 5 minutes away at Omni Centre.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Saughton Suite with views of Water of Leith
description: This charming 2-bedroom apartment offers a perfect retreat for up to 5 guests, combining comfort and convenience with a prime location in Edinburgh. The property features a cozy layout with a double bed, two single beds, and a double sofa bed to accommodate an additional guest.

name: Edinburgh Dean Village - Luxury Riverview Retreat
description:
Edinburgh Council Licence No: EH-68293-F

Stay in a rare piece of living history. Our home is part of an original stone milling building in Edinburgh’s Dean Village — a UNESCO World Heritage Site where the Water of Leith has flowed for centuries.

This licensed property blends Georgian character with modern comfort, offering a peaceful riverside setting that’s both central and unique.

EPC: D

name: Modern flat near Murrayfield stadium, sleeps 4
description:
West End of Edinburgh, Roseburn, reach the city on foot in 15-20 mins or 5 mins bus ride. Murrayfield rugby stadium is less than 10 mins walk.

This 1 bedroom flat has a separate double bedroom but also a double sofa bed to sleep an additional 2 people, up to 4 in total. It has an open plan living/dining room and kitchen area. There is a separate bathroom which has both bath & shower.
Situated on the ground floor, in a small block of flats in a very quiet residential area, no parties welcome.

name: Huntly Street, New Town Edinburgh
description:
An eclectic apartment full of character situated in the New Town area, just a 5 minute walk from the buzzing city centre.

This 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom, child friendly apartment is situated within an old tenement building and has tonnes of character, spacious rooms and high ceilings.

name: Charming Cozy Victorian Flat, Grassmarket Fringe
description: This cozy Victorian flat, recently renovated offers a beautiful & bright accommodation in a period building.  Located steps away from Edinburgh's beating heart, the Grassmarket and OldTown. Step outside and be greeted by a view of imposing Edinburgh Castle.  In the other direction is Edinburgh's Meadows, a tranquil place to enjoy space and greenery in the centre of Edinburgh.  Be surrounded by cozy cafes, delightful restaurants and boutique shops. This location has it all!

name: Bright Scandi-Style Luxury Studio Apt. - Old Town
description:
This gorgeous newly-renovated studio apartment forms part of Museum Apartments, a collection of modern and spacious scandi-style apartments located directly across from The National Museum and less than a 5-minute walk from the famous Grassmarket and Royal Mile.

The apartment is furnished and equipped to the highest standard, with supremely comfortable double bed, smart TV, kitchen with dishwasher, and bathroom with underfloor heating.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Tiny Garden House - Bruntsfield, central Edinburgh
description: Tiny garden house for one or two (just!) in Brunstfield, central Edinburgh.  One minute walk to great selection of restaurants, coffee shops,  pubs, independent retailers in Bruntsfield, and short walk to the meadows, castle, royal mile and other famous attractions. It's tiny (5m x 4m) and at the end of our family garden (10 m away) and features a kitchenette (fridge, hob, sink, microwave), toilet & shower room, hidden fold down double bed (140cm wide) and wifi. No TV. Friendly cat may visit.

name: Grassmarket Luxury Penthouse Apartment
description: A truly stunning, recently refurbished luxurious penthouse apartment built nearly 400 years ago in the year 1634. The apartment is split over the top 2 floors and is therefore quiet and exclusive. Being located in the very heart of Edinburgh's historic Grassmarket the apartment has an unrivalled location in one of the oldest and iconic areas of the city with an up-close view of Edinburgh Castle.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish Georgian House minutes from station
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located peaceful spacious townhouse, just minutes from the train, bus and tram stations.
You will have exclusive use of the house—-your bedroom, bathroom and sitting room, and the light and airy kitchen.
Located in the vibrant east end of the Georgian New Town, with independent shops, cafes and restaurants on the doorstep, and easy access to all transport links.

name: Contemporary City Apartment with all Amenities
description:
• Spacious apartment in Edinburgh city centre with K/S bed and sofa bed - sleeps 3.
• Take a gorgeous stroll along the Union Canal from the flat for easy access into town
• 15 minute walk to tram stop for easy airport access
• Numerous places to eat and drink on the doorstep, Fountain park leisure centre is situated a 5 minute walk away with access to restaurants, gym, bowling, mini golf, arcade, trampoline park and cinema.
• WIFI, smart tv, washing machine and wardrobe. All linen provided.

name: Clean apartment. Fringe and Oasis friendly.
description:
Relaxing apartment with wonderful views of the Firth of Forth from the bedroom and balcony.
The flat itself is clean and well maintained. The spacious bedroom has a double bed and plenty of storage space. The flat is situated in a quiet and safe area of the capital city with excellent transport links to most areas of the city.
Occupants also have use of a separate private bathroom and use of communal kitchen, work space, living/dining room and balcony.

An excellent find!

name: The South Maybury Residence
description: The South Maybury Residence is a fresh, modern second-floor apartment within a residential area, sleeping 4 guests. Accessing the city centre couldn’t be easier with Edinburgh’s excellent bus and tram services taking just 20 minutes, while Edinburgh Airport is only 5-10 minutes from the property. This is an excellent base from which to explore the city and further afield with great transport links right on your doorstep.

name: Edinburgh, 3 Bed, 2 Shower, Private Door@Tram Stop
description: Private Entrance Door, next to Tram Stop, enjoy easy access to everything in this Central, Spacious ground floor flat (No Stairs) with 3 Bedrooms, 1 Living Room in the Cradle of HARRY POTTER, SHERLOCK HOLMES, JEKYLL-HYDE & PETER PAN ... AND Robinson Crusoe, Long John Silver & ARR JIM LAD !!!  Traditional Victorian tenement at vibrant Leith Walk, North End of Edinburgh City Centre: Entrance Vestibule into Hall serving each room in the flat, Bright south facing Lounge, 3 Bedrooms, 2 Showers.

name: Observatory House
description:
✔ Edinburgh’s unique hilltop retreat, Observatory House is a large self-catering property extending over two floors w/garden
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ East-facing garden with outdoor seating
✔ 15-minute walk to National Museum
✔ Next to National Gallery
✔ Waverley station is just a few minutes away on foot
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Three Bedroom Detached Villa with large garden
description: Relaxing short term rental. Minimum of one week. Three bedrooms and large living / dining area. Main bedroom has on-suite suitable for someone with mobility needs. Close to public transport routes and Glasgow is within easy reach.

name: Central, newly refurbished 3 bed apartment.
description:
The flat is centrally located with lots to see and do within a ten to twenty minute walk. For example Stockbridge, New town, St James Quarter, Royal Botanic Gardens and the National Gallery.
Broughton Street has independent shops, restaurants, and bars and is only a few minutes away. The flat itself is lovely and quiet - perfect to relax in after a busy day exploring the city.

All bookings after the 1st of October 2023 are subject to licensing and planning permission as per guidance on AirBnB.

name: Double room and private bathroom in cosy house.
description: A friendly welcome with drive for parking in comfortable home with shared access to kitchen and your own bathroom.  Buses are  7min walk from the house, and then 15/20 minutes to the centre of Edinburgh.  Nearest pub 10 minutes walk, with other shops, cafes and takeaways 10 minutes away.  Close to the Botanic Gardens and the sea at Wardie Bay/Newhaven.  Lots to explore.  Use of washer and dryer.  Garden with furniture, foxes and local birds.

name: Bright Modern Luxury Studio Apt. - Old Town
description:
This gorgeous newly-renovated studio apartment forms part of Museum Apartments, a collection of modern and spacious scandi-style apartments located directly across from The National Museum and less than a 5-minute walk from the famous Grassmarket and Royal Mile.

The apartment is furnished and equipped to the highest standard, with supremely comfortable double bed, smart TV, kitchen with dishwasher, and bathroom with underfloor heating.

description:

The apartment is incredibly spacious (549 SqFt) furnished and equipped to the highest standard, with supremely comfortable double bed, smart TV, kitchen with dishwasher, and bathroom with underfloor heating.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central Edinburgh castle apartment, 1 bed room.
description: This wee flat is located at heart of Edinburgh, great place if you want to explore this beautiful and magical city, this flat only few steps away from Royal mile, Edinburgh Castle, The Scotch Whiskey Experience and Camera Abscura. there is set of steps right outside the flat which will take you to Victoria street and Grassmarket, you also have the National Museum of Scotland one street away,there are many pubs and restaurants around, princess street is about 5 minutes walk with all retail shops.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Private en-suite bedroom
description:
En-suite double bedroom available.
Property benefits from Gas central heating, carpet throughout out, electric shower and free unallocated parking space available
Ground floor and easy access

description:
