name: Lovely 2 bedroom with private garden
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: City Centre Apartment Flat on George Street
description:
City centre on Edinburgh's high street - George Street.

All of Edinburgh's best restaurants, bars, high end stores, night life spots and historic monuments are a walk away. Whether it's long stays or weekend getaways, we're happy to accommodate. The kitchen is fully equipped and we provide towels and toiletries. There is wi-fi and TV with streaming apps.

(Disclaimer: the flat is in city centre so expect noisy evenings on weekends)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Apartment in the centre of Edinburgh’s New Town
description:
The whole group will enjoy a cosy and spacious flat, with separate dining and sitting room. Seating for 6 at dining table and 2 large couches in sitting room.
Access to our kitchen and cookware is included with instructions and info provided on check in.

Upstairs, we have 3 bedrooms, each with spectacular views of the city and beyond. You can even see the Forth Road Bridge and Queensferry Crossing on the horizon!

name: Modern, cosy flat in Leith
description:
Homely, modern flat in the Leith with excellent transport links to Edinburgh city centre and out to the shore. Plenty of great restaurants, bakeries and bars near by and a 20 minute walk to the city centre.
Located on a side street, the room is quiet, and the flat offers all the amenties you could need with a modern bathroom (fantasic shower pressure), and a fully fitted kitchen ft. hob, oven, coffee machine, dishwasher and more.

name: The Balerno Inn, Room 5, Loganlea
The Balerno Inn, Room 1 , Pentland
Edinburgh Haven - a little bolthole in the city.
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at our studio space - king sized bed, en-suite shower room, tv with Netflix, small kitchen sink & food prep area, fridge, microwave that’s also an oven.There’s even a 2 seat dining table. This architect-designed studio with its own access is self-contained & has everything quiet discerning travellers would expect to enjoy on a visit whether for work, leisure or to visit family. It has WiFi &  independently controlled heating. City centre 15 to 20 minutes on bus.

name: Beautiful 2 bed Victorian flat near city centre.
description:
Our beautiful family home is perfectly located on the edge of the city centre, bordering Leith, making it an ideal base for tourists, locals and business guests alike.

Plentiful shops, cafes and restaurants are nearby, popular sites such as Calton Hill, the Playhouse theatre, the Royal Mile and the Shore only a short stroll away.

Part of a traditional Victorian tenement, we have retained and restored many period features throughout the property.

name: Stunning Edinburgh 1820s stables converted studio
description:
The Green sits within Ratho Park Steading: a stunning Scottish courtyard stable (built 1826; converted 2021). It borders Ratho Park Golf club (area of outstanding beauty), a walk from the heart of Ratho village, 8miles from Edinburgh centre. Rooms are stylishly furnished (with wifi), and proudly eco-friendly (ground source heated). The property has underfloor heating, parking and views looking onto a golf green and beautiful fairway and courtyard space.

See 'Other Details' for spaces at RPS.

name: A "Royal" Residence
description: Overlooking the historic Royal Mile and with views of St Giles Cathedral, this wonderful first floor (one flight of stairs), two bedroom apartment is perfectly positioned for exploring everything that the Old Town has to offer. If you like being in the “thick of it” with the city on your doorstep then this is the place to be!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central Apartment in the Heart of a Vibrant Area
description:
A fantastic newly renovated 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh's City Centre just off the Royal Mile.

Set in one of Edinburgh's historic "Close", you will be sure to have a wonderful visit to the city in this top floor apartment t is in a very busy bustling part of royal mile with vibrant nightlife.

This bright and airy top floor flat and the fresh design will have you feeling at home after a long day exploring Edinburgh.

Historic building, may not be suitable for elderly guests.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Quiet, central double bedroom with own bathroom.
description: Peaceful and centrally-located room in turn of the century building. Private adjacent bathroom with shower, bath and WC. 10 minutes walk to tram and central street - Princes Street, opposite international car rental  facility. Close to all amenities - shops, pubs and restaurants - all a few minutes away. Full Wi Fi, limited use of kitchen, some on-site carparking . Parking meters on public streets. Continental breakfast included.

name: Light and Spacious 2BD flat in Heart of Edinburgh
description: This contemporary 2 bed (1x double + 1x single) apartment is situated in the heart of Edinburgh New Town, making it the perfect location for those looking to explore the city. It is just a minutes walk to Queen Street Gardens and 15 minutes from Edinburgh Castle. With a spacious living area and a fully equipped kitchen, the 1st floor apartment features large floor to ceiling windows that provide a wealth of light. The property accommodates a maximum of three people. Sofa bed now available too!

name: Bright & Cozy City Centre Apartment by Haymarket!
description: Enjoy easy access to Edinburgh and its attractions from this stunning one bedroom flat conveniently situated in Dalry, minutes away from Haymarket Station and the tramlink to Edinburgh Airport and only a 10 minute bus ride to Princes Street! Bright and well proportioned, this flat comfortably sleeps 2 guests in its spacious bedroom while it also offers an open plan kitchen/living room, a WC and a shower room. Numerous shops, bars and restaurants are within walking distance!

name: Stunning Edinburgh 1820s stables converted room
description: The Canal Room sits upstairs within Ratho Park Steading: a stunning Scottish courtyard stable (built 1826; converted 2021). It borders Ratho Park Golf club (area of outstanding beauty), a walk from the heart of Ratho village, 8miles from Edinburgh centre. The large room is stylishly furnished (super king size bed),  tv/wifi, and heated through ground source. The property has off-road parking with use of/ views into a landscaped garden/canal. Breakfast is a cold self-served buffet in the  'Den'.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Trendy 3 Bed, 2 Bath, 5 Mins From Town
description: Trendy 3 Bed, 2 Bath Main Door 5 Mins from City Centre. Walking distance to the Royal Mile & The Playhouse. TV’s in all the 3 bedrooms & the super stylish lounge, Ultra Fast Fibre broadband, Private Front Garden and private seated patio at the rear of the property. Dishwasher, Wine Fridge and feature gas fireplace for those cosy evenings.

name: Luxury Georgian City Retreat by Sovo Apartments
description:
Experience the charm of the luxurious, Georgian-style 1802 home nestled in the vibrant Leith area of Edinburgh. The prime location offers a unique retreat close to top restaurants, shops, pubs, cultural attractions, and much more.
Marvel at the award-winning design and the rich amenity list found in this majestic getaway.

✔ 3 Comfortable Bedrooms
✔ Open Design Living + Dining
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Smart TV
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Free Street Parking

Learn more below!

name: Edinburgh, DeanVillage Cosy Hideaway Apartment
description:
Enjoy this beautiful apartment (that sleeps 4) in the heart of the famous historic Dean Village - a MUST SEE location and an "Insta" photo hotspot. Conveniently located, it's a 5 minute walk from the city centre, 10 minute walk from Haymarket station/West End Tram Station, and a pleasant signposted 20 minute walk (along the water of Leith) to Murrayfield stadium.

Enjoy the nearby restaurants, famous Stocksbridge foodmarket, Dean Gallery, and the National Gallery of Modern Art with ease.

name: Duddingston Gem.airbnb.com/h/duddingstongem
description: Beautiful double bedroom in family home. 15 mins walk to beach. 15 mins walk to Arthur seat. 25 mins by bus to city centre. Fort Kinnaird is 15 mins walk with all the high street names for a great shopping experience. Lots of 'restaurants and bars close by  in Portobello. Free parking outside.

name: Exquisite Georgian Flat in Prime Location
description: Our Georgian basement flat with private entrance enjoys a prime UNESCO World Heritage Site location. George street and Stockbridge, with their wealth of amenities, are just a stone’s throw away, and Dundas Street itself boasts a wealth of art galleries and independent cafés for you to enjoy on the doorstep. This is our home away from home, and we want it to be yours too, so we have paid attention to detail and provided all homely comfort for your stay.

name: Cosy 1 bedroom cabin with free parking
description: Welcome to our super cute cosy cabin situated in the gardens of our home with it’s own separate entrance. We are very close to Portobello, Edinburgh’s seaside and 20 minutes from the city centre, making it an ideal location to explore the beautiful city of Edinburgh and the East Lothian countryside.  An ideal base for couples & families, close to Holyrood Park, Arthur’s Seat and with lots of lovely bars & restaurants within walking distance. We welcome well  behaved dogs, kids & their owners!

name: Central Edinburgh New Town Apartment
description: Enjoy all that Edinburgh has to offer from this city center apartment in a converted Georgian town house.    Just 5 minutes' walk from Princes Street, 2 minutes' from the St James Quarter and 1 minute from the tram (to/from the airport).  There is easy access to a private front entrance down a short set of stairs and private rear access with patio and one parking space.  It offers spacious and stylish accommodation that is my happy place and could also be yours!

name: En-suite with Kitchenette close to City Centre
description:
I have completely renovated my garden room to include an en suite bathroom, powerful shower and stylish kitchenette.

The room has clever storage and a desk & chair for work. The kitchenette is complete with microwave and fridge.

We are in the bustling area of Leith Walk with many pubs and restaurants nearby. Princes street is only 15 minutes walk away.

name: Lovely room in quiet residential area
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space :)  Easy accessible from airport and  direct bus to city center.

name: Cosy, Warm, Comfortable + Family Friendly Flat
description:
Thanks for checking out my 3 bedroom flat in Edinburgh! Superbly located just 200 metres from Leith Walk. It’s served by a popular bus route and very close to the city centre.

You will have the whole flat to yourself. There are 3 bedrooms and 6 people can stay. One of the double beds can separate into 2 single beds on request.

The kitchen is fully equipped. There's 1 bathroom (shower + bath) and 1 ensuite (with shower). There’s fast wifi, board games & 43” TV with free Netflix + Amazon Prime.

name: Lovely 3 bed, jacuzzi,driveway,wifi,close airport
description: Feel welcomed in our 3 bed garden flat in Edinburgh. Located short drive from the Airport ( direct bus ) and 15 minutes drive from city centre. Enjoy your morning coffee from our bean to cup machine for a good start of the day.

name: Great 1 bed studio guesthouse surrounded by green
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.

Located just 5 minutes from the airport, the guesthouse is superbly located for both business and leisure purposes.

The guesthouse comprises 3 spacious, self-contained studio apartments. Each with a decking area, bathroom, kitchen, and lounging space.

Tram station is 15-20 minute walk from the property.

name: Studio Guesthouse Apartment - 4 mins from airport
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.

Located just 5 minutes from the airport, the guesthouse is superbly located for both business and leisure purposes.

The guesthouse comprises 3 spacious, self-contained studio apartments. Each with a decking area, bathroom, kitchen, and lounging space.

Tram station is 15-20 minute walk from the property.

name: Studio Apartment with great views and outdoor deck
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.

Located just 5 minutes from the airport, the guesthouse is superbly located for both business and leisure purposes.

The self-contained studio apartment has views on the green fields, with nice walks close by. A decking area with outdoor furniture is great for breathing in the fresh air.

Wifi and Smart TV are available, as well as a washing machine, and a kitchen with a hob and microwave.

name: Small studio unit in peaceful location
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.

Located just 5 minutes from the airport, the guesthouse is superbly located for both business and leisure purposes.

The guesthouse comprises a small self-contained unit with a kitchenette (microwave, fridge, toaster, kettle), a small workspace, and a sleeping area.

We would recommend it as the perfect space to stay for a single person before an early flight from Edinburgh airport.

The front garden space is a shared space for guests.

name: The Old Bakery
description: The Old Bakery is a beautifully presented two-bedroom mews cottage with its own private entrance and tucked away in the quiet, ever-popular area of Dean Village and perfectly located to explore Edinburgh. Situated just ten minutes away from the hustle and bustle of Princes Street, you can enjoy the best of both worlds, as guests find the Dean Village, a beautiful oasis nestled close to the beautiful water of Leith.

name: Family Room at Haymarket
description: JOIVY Haymarket offers a stylish and homely experience for our guests to unwind and relax. Our cosy en-suite rooms provide everything you need for a comfortable and pleasant stay, including free Wi-Fi. Located in the centre of Edinburgh in a traditional Victorian townhouse, directly across from Haymarket Train Station and only a 20 minute walk from Princes Street. The famous Old Town, The Royal Mile and The Water of Leith are easily reached by foot or a short bus ride away.

name: Elegant 2-Bed Next to Edinburgh Castle
description:
Beautiful and Airy Flat in the Heart of Edinburgh

This spacious and well-appointed flat is located in the heart of Edinburgh, just steps away from Edinburgh Castle. Situated on a street that leads directly to the castle, it offers an unbeatable location for professionals or long-term visitors wanting to experience the city’s rich history and culture.

name: Luxury Top Floor 2 Bedroom Apartment
description:
This historical 2 bedroom flat lies an idyllic 15 minute walk from Edinburgh city centre through the famous Meadows park. An excellent base to explore the city from.

The space
A lovely two bedroom flat with a huge living room and fully equipped kitchen.

Guest access
The flat is yours to use. The storage room in the flat will be locked. But otherwise, the whole flat is open to you.

Please note: There is no lift/elevator available and the flat is on the 4th floor.

name: Central Main Door Flat near Water of Leith
description:
Main Door flat in a great location close to the city centre, New Town and trendy Stockbridge and the Water of Leith Walkway. Very short walk to Tesco and Lidl.

One double bedroom and a comfortable sofa bed with a real mattress in the living room. Perfect for one or two couples, small family, a group of friends or single travellers. Living room with TV, Wifi and space to relax and eat.

name: Next to the Palace and Royal Mile with parking
description: Situated just round the corner from the official Scottish residence of King Charles III and metres from the Royal Mile.  You will be right in the centre of Edinburgh but with secure parking and close-proximity to Waverley Station.    Two on-suite bathrooms to the bedrooms and a separate bathroom for anyone using the sofabed in the living room.

name: Stunning 2 bed Central Apartment with Castle Views

Perched above the city centre, it provides a quiet haven within walking distance of the bright lights, but nestled high above them amongst the crags and wildlife of Calton Hill.
The House has a rich history, with the oldest tower section dating back to 1776 and the first attempt to build an astronomical observatory for Edinburgh. Recentl

I'm a Superhost who usually rents one room in my home but on rare occasions when I am away, the king-bed guest room and entire flat (aside from my room) can be made available for sole use!

description: The elegant and spacious 2nd floor property is located in a chic and popular area of Edinburgh only a few minutes walk away from Edinburgh's most famous attractions such as the Botanical Gardens, Calton Hill or Princess Street.

name: Private room&bathroom. 3 mins from tram to centre
description: Quiet room on top floor of our house with your own private shower and toilet room. Our place is 2 minute walk from Saughton tram stop and can get you to the city centre in 15 minutes. The tram also goes directly to Edinburgh Airport in 15 minutes. The kitchen space will be shared with us but you will have your own fridge and cupboard. Please note we have two cats Peggy and Mabel. We don't allow them in the guest room but they do roam the rest of the house.

name: 107 Broughton Street
description:
Broughton street is one of Edinburgh's most popular hot spots due to its fun and thriving atmosphere and we're confident this property won't disappoint!
Newly renovated to an extremely high standard, our guests have nothing but compliments to feedback having stayed in this apartment. With three large bedrooms, immaculate interiors and beautiful style, this Broughton street apartment will provide everything you need for your stay in Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Private loft bedroom & en-suite in Leith & parking
description:
Have your own top floor in our three story, modern home. The room comes with a comfortable double bed, en-suite and your own TV.
The house is situated just off Leith Walk, perfect location for getting buses into the City Centre or for exploring the beautiful seaside area of Leith. In a very quiet, secluded area you can relax from the bustle of the city.
You are welcome to use the kitchen and living room area which is shared with two friends. The house is a new build with a small garden.

name: Edinburgh Castle Luxury Studio on Princes Street
description:
This newly refurbished suite is in the BEST location next to the main Princes Street tram stop, very near Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street Gardens and lots of shops & restaurants. It is the most central and easiest Edinburgh location on Airbnb to get to!
As you get out of the building you can walk across the street into the Princes Street gardens.
Kitchenette with sink, worksurface & microwave. Suitable for breakfast & snack preparation. Luxury bathroom.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely Room located in Stockbridge
description: Enjoy a stylish stay in the heart of the coveted Stockbridge. Less than a 5 minute bus, or 15 minute walk to the centre, this apartment is ideally located for all amenities in the city of Edinburgh.

name: Private spacious double suite within home.
description:
The suite is in an extremely central location minutes from the Tram and Haymarket train station. The apartment is within a Georgian corner building and all rooms are well proportioned, decorated in an elegant traditional style and extremely spacious.
Large double room, with private ensuite shower room.
Semi retired professional couple delighted to act as hosts and provide information and recommendations for the neighbourhood.

name: Lovely apartment with Park View
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

Our lovely top floor apartment is located within a traditional Edinburgh tenement and offers unrestricted views over Holyrood Park and Arthur's Seat. We have a quiet double bedroom, separate lounge, kitchen and shower room.

Our place is perfect for couples or friends who would like a peaceful base within walking distance of the main tourist sites.

City of Edinburgh Council licence EH-87325-F valid until 14 May 2028.

name: Royal Mile Luxury Apartment
description: Just a few minutes walk from Edinburgh Castle, St Giles Cathedral and Greyfriars Bobby, this beautiful two-bed apartment is two centuries old, but offers every modern amenity, including high-speed internet. Boasting stylish decor and an unbeatable location, here you can soak up the city’s history and explore its most iconic sights. What's more, the Georgian New Town, Waverley Train Station, and the Tram are also just a short walk. The perfect place to enjoy everything Edinburgh has to offer.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Double bedroom
description:
Lovely bright room with one double bed, en-suite bathroom (bath/shower and toilet), Multi-channel flat screen TV.

We provide tea & coffee refreshment tray, free WiFi, hair dryer.this peaceful oasis.

name: Idyllic Mews House in the Heart of the New Town
description:
This charming Mews house is the perfect spot for your stay in Edinburgh. Hidden away down a peaceful cobbled lane you can escape the hubbub of the city and relax. On a sunny day you can sit out the front with your morning coffee or perhaps a glass of wine in the evening!

It's located in the heart of the new town, only a short walk to St Andrews Square and the new St James Centre.

Enjoy the buzz of the city from the peace of this home

name: Lovely bright dbl bedroom next to Holyrood Palace.
description:
Welcome to our home, a refurbished shared second floor apartment with all the unique features of a Victorian building in Edinburgh. We are right between Holyrood Palace and Portobello Beach. (5 minutes walk to Arthur's Seat). The connection is great, all buses are literally downstairs.
It has a shared new toilet, a shared spacious lounge/kitchen with integrated ceramic 4 hob/oven, fridge/freezer. Gas central heating, full double glazing windows and free parking. Samuel & Violeta

name: Ensuite 1-bed private room in Edinburgh CityCentre
description: McDonald Road is in the heart of the city. The house is just besides the Mcdonald Road station of Airport tram. It has a main door entrance and two levels. The room has an on-suite bathroom which is a modern shower room and toilet. It has a high-speed fibre broadband access. In the downstairs, there is a kitchen and a dining room. It is nice and quiet, despite being close to all the amenities. TESCO is just on the opposite of the street. It is walking distance to Princes Street and Calton Hill.

name: Walkable to City & Leith with Garden
description:
Welcome to our home – where we live when we’re not on our own wee adventures!

• Nestled between the historic city centre and the vibrant neighbourhood of Leith
• A short stroll to Balfour Street tram stop – direct links to the airport, city and Leith
• Calm semi-private garden, with direct access from the lounge
• Comfortable European king-size bed
• Stylish, modern bathroom
• Well-equipped kitchen for home-cooked meals
• Flexible dining/workspaces to suit your plans

name: Artist curated apartment on Leith Walk
description:
Relax into a deep sofa after a busy day exploring Edinburgh’s historic and beautiful sights. This art adorned and thoughtfully designed apartment is perfect for visitors to come home to.
Leith Walk is an amazing part of the city and has a wealth of independent cafes, bars and restaurants, together with charity and boutique retro clothes shopping it’s a treasure beyond the city’s main tourist attractions.

We’re also on the tram route so easy access from the airport ☺️

name: amazing apartments -Gt Junction St- Water of Leith
description:
Stunning modern apartment near Ocean Terminal & Leith. Large bedroom, large bathroom with bath & shower. Open plan living/dining area, & kitchen. Large balcony overlooking Water of Leith

Secure parking nearby, fast WiFi, Netflix on an HD TV. Ideal for 1-2 people.

- Arrive from 3 pm, depart up to 10 am
- We try to satisfy early check-in/late checkout requests (fees apply), & baggage drop-off (free), however, no guarantees, especially if other guests arrive/leave same day
amazingapartments co uk

name: Forest view luxury home in Edinburgh
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. This is a spectacular unique house in Colinton, Edinburgh, which is the perfect escape after a busy day in the city. It comes fully equipped with all of the modern amenities, including a log burner to cosy next to while taking in the views of the woodland on your doorstep.

name: Charming  1 single room- B&b Boutique Guest House
description: Edinburgh37 boutique residence is only a walk or very short bus ride away from the city centre and close to the university of Edinburgh. A cosy stylish boutique home from home with all the grandness of a Victorian residence where you will also find a modern twist with everything you should need for your comfort. We have CCTV for your security.There is an array of coffee shops and eateries all around. A truly awesome location. Any questions? Just ask. Bookings only 1 room.

name: 1 Bed Flat in prime location
description:
You'll have a great time at our apartment (with Lifts), within the heart of Edinburgh City Centre. The flat consists of 1 Master Bedroom with King Size Bed and a double bed settee in the lounge to cater for an additional guest. It is fully equipped with everything needed for your stay, (Dressing Gowns, slippers, Hairdryer, Iron Board, Iron, Clothes Steamer, a selection of spices). Numerous amenities and Edinburgh view.
LONG STAY ONLY please.

name: Immaculate 2-Bed Apartment in Edinburgh
Sunny Private Room, 20 mins to centre (by bus)
description:
Private Bedroom in a lovely fully-furnished flat located in Edinburgh West.
3 mins by walk to the nearest bus stop & train station (Slateford). Multiple buses to the city centre. 3 mins by walk to 5 different supermarkets ideal for buying groceries, gifts etc.
100+ plants in the flat.
Kitchen, toilet, & lounge areas are shared with live-in hosts i.e. us :)
200MB WiFi & central heating also available.
Very comfortable and homely environment.
Surely you will enjoy your stay with us!

name: Modern and Bright Central apartment with lift.
description: Bold and modern, this property has bags of character! Tastefully decorated in bright, vibrant colours, patterns and textures, this apartment is a world away from your traditional Edinburgh rental. With bunk beds, one single bed and a king, this home is perfect for families or friends travelling together!

name: Luxury Architect Designed Apt 13 Mins 2 Royalmile❤
description: You will probably never stay anywhere like this again! Architect-designed luxury duplex 1800 square foot main door apartment in central Edinburgh, furnished with luxury BoConcept furniture, sonos systems and 1 Gigabit fiber internet. The Royal Mile, Scottish Parliament and so much more is only a 15 minute walk away. We also have Arthurs Seat and Holyrood park literally on our doorstep. My home is a mix of historic Edinburgh with green views.

name: The Old School House
description:
Beautiful and unique 2 bedroom flat located in a converted 19th century school house.

Perfectly centrally situated, within a short walking distance of Edinburgh's Old Town, Fringe festival venues, Arthur's seat and many more lesser known Edinburgh gems.

name: Newly Reno'd 2 Bed w/ Free Private Parking
description:
Discover this newly renovated 2-bedroom apartment with free private parking, situated in a quiet neighborhood near Canongate. The two-story apartment is on the ground floor and features its own front door entrance.

With professional interior design and new furnishings, you’ll feel right at home after a day exploring Edinburgh. Enjoy an open-plan kitchen and living area, a modern bathroom, and fast Wi-Fi. Located just minutes from Holyrood Palace and within walking distance to the city centre

name: Cosy Small Bedroom in a Centre of Edinburgh
description: Small cosy bedroom to rent in a two bedroom apartment in a heart of Edinburgh. You will be sharing a flat with only one person who is a professional. The Cowgate is a street in Edinburgh, Scotland, located about 550 yards southeast of Edinburgh Castle, within the city's World Heritage Site. The street is part of the lower level of Edinburgh's Old Town, which lies below the elevated streets of South Bridge and George IV Bridge. Street is full great nightlife.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming Old Town 2 Bed Apt, 2mins From Royal Mile
description:
This special apartment is perfectly located on The Royal Mile, at the top of Canongate, just a few minutes’ walk from Edinburgh Waverley Station.

It features one double bedroom and a twin room, both with ample storage. The spacious layout includes a separate living room, kitchen, and bathroom, all recently refurbished and filled with natural light.

Enjoy free Wi-Fi, fluffy towels, hotel-quality linen, and toiletries for your convenience. The ideal base for exploring everything Edinburgh.

name: Modern Flat Westfield Edinburgh
description:
This apartment has a king-size bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room.

It is ideal for couples or small families visiting the city.

It has a quick and easy access to the city centre, various bus stops are located a few minutes walk or Murrayfield Stadium tram stop is less than 10 minutes away.

Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space and wake up listening to the birds singing in the back garden.

name: Welcoming on 1 bedroom bed and breakfast apartment
description: Enjoy easy access to popular shops and restaurants from this charming place to stay. On apartment you can find fully furnished kitchen with equipment to use for you, bathroom with bath and free Wi-Fi. Also you have great location just 20min away from city centre and fantastic buses connection I’m happy to accommodate you. I'm more than happy to introduce Edinburgh to you!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Lovely, bright, king-size bedroom - ideal location
description: Your room is bright and cosy, with a new, comfy king-size bed and mattress. You are 25 mins walk from Waverley station (1.1 miles) with Canonmills, Leith and Broughton street all within 10 minutes. There are bedside tables, a wardrobe and shelving space. You will have a hairdryer, full length mirror,  fresh towels & mini toiletries for that luxury feel.  You will be sharing my two bedroom flat with myself 😊.

name: Cosy and charming with twin beds/private bathroom
description:
Licence - EH-69536-F. Approved til December 2026

Serene and tastefully decorated in the heart of Edinburgh's historic New Town, steps from Stockbridge.

The style embodies the city's bookish, artistic tilt while modern touches guarantee hotel level comfort including cashmere hot water bottles. The heavenly, iron framed beds excuse Sunday lie-ins, with well-lit corners for writing and reading. The separate private bathroom allows for relaxing baths or an invigorating shower.

name: Lovely 1 Bedroom Flat Located in Edinburgh
description: A spacious and stylish 1 bedroom apartment located in Edinburgh's city centre.

name: Charming 1 Quadruple room B&b Boutique Guest House
description: Edinburgh37 boutique residence is only a walk or very short bus ride away from the city centre and close to the university of Edinburgh. A cosy stylish boutique home from home with all the grandness of a Victorian residence where you will also find a modern twist with everything you should need for your comfort. We have CCTV for your security.There is an array of coffee shops and eateries all around. A truly awesome location. Any questions? Just ask. Nothing is too much trouble :)

name: Charming  1 double room- B&b Boutique Guest House
description: Edinburgh37 boutique residence is only a walk or very short bus ride away from the city centre and close to the university of Edinburgh. A cosy stylish boutique home from home with all the grandness of a Victorian residence where you will also find a modern twist with everything you should need for your comfort. We have CCTV for your security.There is an array of coffee shops and eateries all around. A truly awesome location. Any questions? Just ask. Nothing is too much trouble :)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Charming 1 family room- B&b Boutique Guest House
description: Edinburgh37 boutique residence is only a walk or very short bus ride away from the city centre and close to the university of Edinburgh. A cosy stylish boutique home from home with all the grandness of a Victorian residence where you will also find a modern twist with everything you should need for your comfort. We have CCTV for your security.There is an array of coffee shops and eateries all around. A truly awesome location. Any questions? Just ask. Nothing is too much trouble :)

name: The Urban Hideout
description:
A two-bedroom apartment with stylish period features located in the heart of the cultural hotspot, Leith. This unique location is situated perfectly between the eclectic dockside bars and bistros of Leith’s waterfront The Shore, and Edinburgh's city centre.

There is an abundance of fantastic local bakeries, restaurants, bars, and coffee shops in the area making it the perfect choice for a city break with everything you need at your fingertips!

name: Lovely apartment beneath Edinburgh Castle
description: Hey! Are you looking for a beautiful, safe, clean and affordable accommodation styled to your taste and needs? Great! WHERE TO STAY APPARTMENTS is just like it! Business travels, family trips, holiday stays, Relocation, long-term and short-term stays, We cover all this plus we always aim to deliver the best experience to our lovely guests! Check us out and book a stay with us!

name: Large,sunny, 4/5 bed seaside house close to beach
description: Welcome to Eastfield — a light-filled, deceptively spacious 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom holiday home with spectacular sea views from most rooms. Accommodating up to 10 guests, it’s ideal for families, groups, or couples looking for the perfect beach-and-city escape. Relax on one of the many decks or patios, soak up the sun, and enjoy breathtaking views of the sea. Inside, the home is bright and airy with generous communal areas, perfect for socialising or simply unwinding after a day of adventure.

name: Spacious 3 bed top floor apartment Newtown centre
description: A spacious stylish  three bed  Georgian period Newtown pad offering  an excellentl central base from which to explore the best of Edinburgh's many cultural attractions, shopping, restaurants and nightlife. Top floor views over Queens gardens and rear view over the Forth of Firth . The lovely open green spaces of the Royal  Botanic Gardens, Inverleith Park and the water of Leith walkway.

name: Cosy one-bedroom apartment in central Edinburgh
description:
Quiet, garden-facing, second-floor flat off vibrant Leith Walk with views of Carlton Hill and the St James Quarter.

All the amenities are close by. Tram Stop (7 mins walk), Lidl (4 mins) and Sainsburys (6 mins) and Waverley Train Station (15/20 minute) Holyrood Park, Leith Links, St James Quarter and Omni Centre (10/15 mins) and The Meadows, a short 10-minute bus ride away.

The Shore and the Airport are easily accessible via the tram.

name: One bedroom Apartment in the centre of Edinburgh.
description:
Enjoy a wonderfully appointed modern apartment within a Victorian building, which is centrally located in the old town.

Three flights of stairs lead to the top floor flat on a narrow stairwell. The apartment has underfloor heating and anti steam mirror in the bathroom. Comfortable king size bed with bed linen for 2 sharing. A well designed kitchen, cosy living room with pleasant views.

The Grassmarket is 5 minute walk. There are a lot of bars, restaurants & coffee shops in the area.

name: ★ Bright 2BR Apartment - 10min walk to Royal Mile★
description:
This stylish two-bedroom apartment is complete with two bedrooms (1 x double bed and 2 x single beds), modern fully equipped kitchen, sunny living/dining room, and bathroom with walk-in shower.

The apartment is a short 10-minute walk from the Palace of Holyroodhouse at the foot of the Royal Mile, and a 15-minute walk from the brand-new St James Centre.

name: South Facing single room by University
description: Quiet south-facing room in a very quiet and green part of Edinburgh. Located between the two main Univeristy of Edinburgh Campuses and close to Blackford Hill and Hermitage of Braid, as well as Meadows and Marchemont.

name: Lovely 3 bed apartment in central Edinburgh
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located apartment.  Our 3 bed apartment is incredibly spacious and located right next to Princess St, in the heart of the city.  Tucked away on a quiet residential square, the apartment is incredibly quiet and peaceful and yet is only minutes walk away from the sights and sounds of Edinburgh.

name: Stylish Central Apartment
description:
Feel at home in this comfortable property only 20 minutes walk from Princes Street, Holyrood Palace and the famous Edinburgh Royal Mile.

In the heart of trendy Leith with its many artisan cafes, galleries and Art houses but still far enough from the hustle and bustle of the City Centre. There is a park with a playground right opposite the apartment. Public transport is readily available to take you in all directions on nearby Easter Road, about 2min walk.

name: Edinburgh New Town Georgian Period Home
description: It is a true gem of serenity it exudes romance and class making the apartment desirable for the most special occasions.

name: Homey/Centre15min bus/Airport bus/Doorlock/parking
description: Private room hosted by Luka and Ji-Eun. Very well located in a freshly renovated flat 10min far from city centre. Bus stop is right next to the front door.

name: Lovely double room in traditional tenement flat.
description: Come and stay in my spare room. My flat is in a street next to Holyrood Park with Arthur's Seat. 1.5 miles to Portobello, a mile's walk through the park to Holyrood Palace, 1.5 into Leith, 1.5 miles to city centre with regular fast buses. Meadowbank retail centre 10 mins walk away with a Sainsbury's and there is a new sports  sports stadium just across the road. You are welcome to share kitchen basics- tea, coffee  spices, oil etc. This is a quiet flat in a nice well maintained building.

name: Lovely 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Gorgie
description:
Minutes away from centre. 5 minute busy journey or 20 minute walk to princess street.

Cosy 1 bedroom apartment in a vibrant neighbourhood. A variety of shops around including Indian, polish, Mediterranean and Chinese. Also and Sainsbury’s are Just around the corner, Lidl is 6 minutes walk.
200 mbps finer internet with 43” Super Retina TV screen. Enjoy tv channels from all over the world as well as Netflix, Prime video, Apple TV and more…
Your perfect place to stay while visiting Edinburgh ❤️

name: Entire Cozy Old Town Apartment -Central Edinburgh
Charming Seaview Flat- Free parking |Pass The Keys
description: Indulge in the serene charm of this seaside sanctuary, nestled within a traditional building that offers unobstructed views of the mesmerizing sea. Located in a peaceful neighborhood, this 400-square-foot getaway provides the perfect setting for a refreshing escape from the everyday bustle.

name: Private 2 bed flat (no living room) in Edinburgh
description: You will have the flat to yourself! Two spacious double bedrooms, kitchen and newly fitted bathroom with a toilet, sink, bathtub, and a shower. No access to the living room at the moment but there is a small dining table with chairs in each bedroom where you can enjoy your meals. Towels, toilet paper and body wash are provided. The kitchen has an oven, fridge with freezer, microwave, kettle and other essentials like pots, pans, plates, cups, cutlery etc.

name: Beautiful, bright and spacious room in New Town
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and relaxed space. Our bright and beautiful flat is light and peaceful and we look forward to welcoming you.

Our apartment is right in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town and we have the best bars, restaurants and cafe's just outside our door - please ask us for recommendations.

The perfect place to make your stay in Edinburgh with your own private space and bathroom, right on the steps of the city!

name: Double room in a warm flat room 8 free parking
description:
This apartment is ideal for anyone travelling on a budged. It’s a 4 bedroom apartment with a shared toilet, kitchen and living room.

We are not in city centre ( it’s around 30 min by bus to it) but we are close to airport ( 10 min by car).

If you are passing by or vising Edinburgh here is a place you can stay. It’s safe and the area offer great travel links to the city centre.

There is also free car par which is very rare in Edinburgh to find.

So book it now.

This room has a lock.

name: Lovely warm room, Edinburgh central & university
description: This is a lovely room situated on a quiet tree-lined street with free  parking directly outside. With a beautiful south-facing garden you will find it is a great base from which to explore the city. Enjoying a comfortable  mattress,  and newly furbished luxury bathroom, it's a very welcoming, relaxing   place to stay after a days sightseeing, visiting friends and family or if coming to the city for work or study at Edinburgh University
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Artist's Studio in Stockbridge
description: This beautifully bright and colourful, spacious, modern studio apartment is located in the trendy and central neighbourhood of Stockbridge on a very quaint, beautiful and extremely quiet 'mews' street. It was for many years the studio of a well known sculptor, but now it has been refurbished with all the comfort and amenities you could want for your stay in the beautiful city of Edinburgh.

name: Gorgeous 1 bed ground floor flat near the centre
description: Welcome to my home! Stylish and quirky 1 bed ground floor flat 10 mins from the city centre in the vibrant area of Easter Road. Full of character, bespoke decor and mod cons, this is a unique home away from home. Would suit a couple or single person looking to explore Edinburgh or enjoy all the local amenities. Very close to Calton hill, Arthur’s seat, and just a 10 minute walk to the city centre. Bus stops, cafes and shops on the door step. Full STL licence ref EH-70267-F

name: Double Ensuite Room
description: This is ensuite bedroom in  our 3 Bedroom house with Toaster, Kettle, coffee maker, Freeze Freezer, and some kitchenware. Ensuite wet bathroom with shower which have Massage Jet, Sink, Bidet Hair Drier. King size bed, wardrobe, Chest of Drawer, folding table.

name: Bide Collective12
description: Lovely spacious  Double room with *shared bathroom facilities( this is shared with one other room)this is cleaned daily, this is located on the first floor of a 1890’s Georgian townhouse in the heart of Edinburgh. Our self check in serviced rooms offer a streamline check in system to allow guests to come and go as they please hassle free. All of our rooms are set over three floors, You will find us situated in "Hill Street" along the historic cobbled street in the New town of the city.

name: Lovely 2 Bedroom Flat In Stockbridge
description: This apartment is spacious and light with open views and offers all the amenities and comfort for a citybreak. The location in Stockbridge is perfect to enjoy Edinburgh's trendiest area and its pubs/bars and restaurants as well as the (free!) Botanic Gardens. It is ideally located for all city centre or further afield attractions - the castle, museums and galleries, as well as the villages of Fife and East Lothian. It is quiet and located on the second floor of a traditional Edinburgh building.

name: Spacious 3 Bedroom Apartment, Gorgie, Edinburgh.
description: Spacious 1st floor apartment  with 3 bedrooms,  (2 double beds and 1 Queen bed)  large living room with dining area,  kitchen and  newly installed bathroom. The apartment has a balcony at the front and a large veranda at the rear. The apartment has excellent transport links, including numerous bus routes across the city with the city centre a 10 minute ride away. The nearby Balgreen Tram Station connects to the city centre and airport. Ample free parking is available in front of the apartment.

name: Modern one bed apartment with sea views
description:
This recently upgraded property is located in the Newhaven area of Edinburgh with spectacular views of the Firth of Forth. Offering a small private south facing sitting area where you can enjoy al fresco dining with access to a larger communal garden
Convenientally located close to bus stop for airport bus and also buses to the city.
There are a number of quality bars restaurants and cafes in the close vicinity of the apartment.
There is an supermarket only a ten minute walk away.

name: Lovely One Bedroom Apartment in Edinburgh Old Town
description: The apartment is located on Cockburn Street, between Waverley bridge and the famous Royal Mile . This one bedroom,double upper flat has a fantastic location,in the heart of the Old Town, surrounded by shops,cafes and restaurants, yet a stone's throw Princess Street Gardens to enjoy a walk or just to relax. As well as the vasy selection of historic buildings close by,Waverley train station is a few minutes' walk as well as an excellent bus and tram service.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 3 bedrooms apartment Calodonia ROAD
description: Top floor, sunny , fully furnished. Very centrally-located, fully furnished 3 bedrooms apartment with 4 beds (2 double 2 single), 2 shower rooms, 1 toilet, Kitchen with dinning/ living area, no sofa beds available. no pets allowed. As holiday letting during the summer festival time only. As long term requirement is maximum 2 single persons only, or a family , or a couple plus a single person also welcomed. suitable for large family. This is not a HMO property. Long term lease must be signed.

name: Lovely 3 bedroom spacious apartment in Grassmarket
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place. It is located right in the heart of Grassmarket , short walk away from main attractions and the Castle. You won’t regret staying at out place :)

name: Grand Luxe Room in New Town Classical Home
description: A true gem of serenity whilst being close to everywhere in the city centre, making it the perfect location to stay during your visit to Edinburgh.

name: Elegant Room in New Town Classical Home
description: A true gem of serenity whilst being close to everywhere in the city centre, making it the perfect location to stay during your visit to Edinburgh.

name: Very central, next to the Castle with garden
description:
Right at the heart of Edinburgh in the shadow of the world famous Edinburgh Castle. Next door to theatres, restuarants, bars, shoppping and a short distance to all the main sightseeing.

An early Victorian apartment with its own front door from the street with a small terrace to the front and a rear garden accessed by french windows to the rear.

Perfect for a family city centre break or those working in the centre.

As animal lovers we welcome all well behaved furry companions.

name: Green oasis in central Edinburgh: 80m2, 2 bedrooms
description:
Private 80m2 apartment in central Edinburgh, with parkland views out of every window. My apartment is bright & spacious, with a south facing living room and large kitchen/diner, great for convivial suppers with friends.

You will be surrounded on all sides by beautiful Harrison park, ideal for jogging/yoga/picnics... The Union Canal also runs right next to the flat, perfect for a lovely 30 minute stroll to the castle.

Buses are frequent: 3min walk to stop + 10min ride to major attractions.

name: Luxury Old Town Flat on Iconic Cockburn Street
description:
An impeccably restored luxurious 1861 Victorian apartment inside a Category B listed building on iconic Cockburn Street in Edinburgh’s Old Town, one minute’s walk away from The Royal Mile.

The second floor apartment is centrally located to all major attractions and only two minutes walk from Waverley train station and five minutes walk from the nearest tram stop and airport connection. Most attractions are within 1 - 15 minutes walk from the apartment.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming Grassmarket 1 Bed Castle pad
description: This charming flat is located in the desirable, central and historic area of Grassmarket, at the foot of the famous Edinburgh Castle.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely ensuite 1-bed private room in Edinburgh
description: McDonald Road Edinburgh is in the heart of the city. The house is just besides the Mcdonald Road station of Airport tram. It has a main door entrance and this quiet, private room is facing the back garden. It has a modern shower room and also a high-speed fibre broadband access. In the downstairs, there is a kitchen and a dining room. It is nice and quiet, despite being close to all the amenities. Coop and TESCO is just on the opposite of the street. It is walking distance to Calton, Waverley.

name: Lovely room in stylish flat, Edinburgh
description: Relax in this calm, stylish space, only 25 minutes from city centre.

name: Spectacular Studio hideaway in City Centre
description: The Cave plays host to a wide range of guests, from couples on a romantic getaway looking to relax and unwind, to working professionals who need everything on their doorstep and want to be in the hub of the city or tourists looking for something a little bit unusual whilst they explore Edinburgh. Whatever draws you to the cobbled streets of Auld Reekie, Canon Cave offers everything you could want or need.

name: Spacious modern main door flat  - patio & parking
description:
Spacious, cosy and bright 2 bed home in Edinburgh with open plan living.
Very homely and fully equipped for a comfortable stay.
Large comfortable bedrooms (Super King and King).

Bus stop outside with direct route to city centre or a 5 min walk to trains, linked to Edinburgh (10 min) and Glasgow (1hr20).

Private car park and a 5 min drive from motorway roads North and South.
Lots of green space nearby, with a park opposite, woodland walks and both Water of Leith or Union Canal near

name: Lovely old town apartment
description: Central base to explore Edinburgh and the Old Town.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: York Place City Centre 3 bedroom Apartment
description:
Set within a converted Georgian townhouse our generously sized 3 bedroom 1st floor apartment has has a light filled expansive lounge with high ceilings and stunning views over the city and coast. Ideal for unwinding, socialising, or simply taking in the lovely views from the windows.
Just a stone’s throw from the St James Quarter, one of Europe's most modern shopping & leisure destinations, a 10 min walk to the Royal Mile & Edinburgh Castle and just 3 mins walk to Princes Street
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely 5 bedroom apartment in Edinburgh
description: Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.  Our 5 bedroom flat is located in Marchmont, close to the Meadows and a short walk into the centre of town.  Enjoy the best of both worlds, in our close knit community with superb shops, cafes and restaurants, lots of outdoor space and yet only 10 minutes walk away from the city and the excitement of Festival.

name: Stylish & Central Place In The Heart of The City
description:
Our lovely newly refurbished 1 bedroom apartment is offering a stylish experience in the heart of the beautiful city of Edinburgh.

Located very centrally near Lothian Road, it is only a few minutes walk away from Grasmarket and Edinburgh Castle. There are also many beautiful cafes and restaurants around, you will be guaranteed to fully absorb what this lovely city can offer.

Very ideal for tourists looking to discover the Scottish capital or professionals visiting the city on a business trip.

name: Studio Apartment with Castle View
description:
Modern, cozy one bedroom studio flat in the heart of the city, lovely outlook to Edinburgh castle.

24h secure entry system

Fibre Internet WiFi (35mb/s)
King size bed
Fully fitted kitchen
Combined Washer/Dryer
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: York Place City Centre 4 bedroom Apartment
description:
A generously sized 4 bedroom apartment located on the second floor of a beautiful Georgian townhouse, offering elevated views and plenty of charm. With an expansive lounge ideal for relaxing & socializing in. Just a stone’s throw from the St James Quarter, one
of Europe's most modern shopping & leisure destinations, a 10 min walk to the Royal Mile & Edinburgh Castle and just 3 mins walk to Princes Street. Please note: Access is via a staircase (no lift) but the views make it worth the climb!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 38@bidecollectivestudio
description:
Lovely city centre based studio, suitable for 2 people looking for a quiet house perfect base in the town.

Your studio is complete with an en suite bathroom, kitchen prep area/lounge. Please note the kitchen prep area does not have a hob& oven)
We don’t cater for children/infants
The studio is very spacious it’s spacious and has a tV in the bedroom and also lounge area.
Sleeps
No more than 2
No parties
All bedding , towels & shower gel provided

name: Beautiful family house, centre of Edinburgh
description: This beautiful 4 bedroom town house designed by William Playfair  in the 19 century sits surrounded by the hub of Edinburgh, theatres, restaurants, delis the new st James quatre which has every shop, restaurants and cinemas too, leith voted the worlds coolest place is a ten minute bus ride and Waverley station a ten minute walk, the street is a family street and at the end is Carlton hill, a world heritage sight, with views spanning the whole city, galleries and restaurants. Great Christmas hous

name: Adorable 1-bedroom home with free parking.
description:
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.
Good for couples, friends, professionals and families (with 1 or 2 children).
Own kitchen and bathroom.
Tv and free wi-fi.
Space to park, sit, relax, BBQ and more, in safe environment for children.
Minute walk to the bus to get to city center (20-25 min) bus

name: Spacious and bright tenement flat, Stockbridge
description: Set on the first floor of a traditional tenement building in Stockbridge, this flat boasts a bright reception room with a bay window and an abundance of traditional features, including 2 fireplaces and 2 Edinburgh Presses. The large corner bay window captures natural light and frames leafy views of the street below. Located in Stockbridge, you will have a whole host of charming artisan shops, art galleries and boutiques, as well as fashionable eateries and Inverleith Park on your doorstep.

name: Stylish, quiet, centrally located 2 bed flat.
description:
This stylish 2nd floor 2 bedroom flat will suit a professional stay or long weekend break. A traditional Edinburgh tenement flat with period features.
A quiet street, close the the city centre with a lovely dining kitchen, peaceful outlook and full amenities. Free on street parking. High Speed WIFI, 250mbps
-7 mins by Bus to the West End
-1.3 miles from Murrayfield Stadium
-15 mins walk to Stockbridge
-5 mins walk to shopping centre (M&S, Sainsburys, Lidl, Currys, Gym, TK Max, Costa, Boots)

name: 2 Bedroom by Edinburgh Castle
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place, a short stroll from Edinburgh Castle and Edinburghs Royal Mile!

Fully renovated to a luxury standard, ensuring a luxury comfortable stay in Edinburghs city centre.

The master bedroom boasts a relaxing bath to soak away the days adventures, and both bedrooms include king size beds with pocket-sprung mattresses ensuring relaxation & comfort while you stay.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Castle View 5
description:
Modern one bedroom top floor apartment with stunning castle views right in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town.

Situated in Grassmarket, keeping you in amongst what Edinburgh has to offer all within walking distances.

name: Edinburgh Harbour view over the Royal Yacht Club
description:
You will be blown away by the stunning Harbour views, the Firth of Forth and Arthurs Seat.
On the third-floor with an open plan living area and a huge 1500sqft of space.
Stylishly furnished and beautifully presented, this 2 bedroom flat with 2 bathrooms can sleep 4 in the bedrooms and a 'plus one' on the pull out.
Freeview TV, high speed wifi (fair usage applies!), underfloor heating and a balcony with no overlook means this is your space for your vacation, with no interruptions and onlookers.

name: Edinburgh Playhouse Cheerful 4 bedroom house
description:
This special place is close to everything Edinbugh city centre has to offer. A few minutes walk from Princes Street, a 15 minute walk to Royal Mile, with Calton Hill on your doorstep.

The house is at the bottom of a steep hill. The house has 2 double and 2 twin bedrooms and 1 bathroom, 1 shower room. There is enough room for up to 8 people to sleep in a bed.

There is no private parking however there is Q Park Omni Centre multi storey car park 1 minute walk up the street (charges do apply).
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 3 bed apartment ideal for Royal Mile & Old Town
description: Our 3 bedroom 1st floor apartment nestled in the vibrant Newington neighbourhood of Edinburgh offers a perfect home-away-from-home base. Featuring a large lounge ideal for socialising and relaxing in. Just a 15 minutes’ walk from the Royal Mile & Old Town & a further 10 minutes’ walk to Princes Street. Ideal for Arthurs Seat, Holyrood Park, the Royal Commonwealth Swimming Pool & Edinburgh University. Easy access to public transport, making it simple to explore all of Edinburgh’s must-see spots.

name: Royal Mile Apartment next too castle  Sleeps 4
description: Fabulous 1 bedroom apartment, luxurious standard, in the very best location. Newly renovated and with views directly onto historic James Court on the Royal Mile. All modern conveniences. Designer fabrics, wallpapers, free wifi, internet tv. Secure entry. Cosy & comfortable. 200 yards from Edinburgh Castle. Please note this apartment has excellent views and is very peaceful at night. This apartment is on the 4th floor and access is by stairs.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: private room in New Town Georgian main door flat.
description: Located a few minutes walk from Waverley Station and with Picardy Place tram stop at the end of the street , this is the perfect location to explore the Old & New Town by foot.  With some of the city’s best nightlife, theatre and restaurants on your doorstep, it is the ideal base for your stay in Edinburgh. My home is a safe space, I welcome guests of all races, faiths, genders, sexual orientations. My home is yours, and includes free Alfie-cat & Louis-dachshund cuddles, im also a licensed host!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bedroom with private shower room and free parking
description:
Stylish private room 10 minutes walk from the Royal Mile & 20 minutes from Princes Street.

Large, bright room with its own private shower room across the hall. The room has a fridge, kettle, tea/coffee, dining table for two and a TV. The bed is king-size (5ft wide)

Our apartment is within a beautiful Victorian red brick factory that was converted into apartments. We are situated at the end of a quiet cobbled street.

Please note, you will share the flat with us and our cat during your stay.

name: Lovely 2 bed apartment with free parking
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. This 2 bed, 2 bath apartment is well equipped and comes with free parking and even has an elevator!! A comfortable and welcoming flat, tucked into a private neighbourhood in Leith. The flat is located a 5 minute walk from the 'Foot of the Walk' tram stop in Leith, which gets you to Princes St and the city centre in less than 20 minutes. And unusually for Edinburgh, we have an elevator!!

STL: EH-70218-F

name: Dean village studio apartment
description:
Our cosy getaway in Dean Village is the perfect place for couples, solo travellers or those travelling for business.

The apartment offers a home away from home for those who want to experience what Edinburgh has to offer, and have a quiet and cosy place to relax. The apartment offers a double bed, a place to dine, fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a shower. The apartment is equipped for all your needs including washing machine, Wifi and a smart TV for all your streaming needs.

name: White house in Edinburgh,  2 bedroom good location
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Semi-detached house, quet neighbours,  5 min from shopping centre , cinema  etc ( Fort Kinnaird) , friendly host.

name: Double room in artsy flat in Leith/Portobello
description:
Welcome to my artsy flat!

You'll have a super king bed in your private room at your disposal (2x2 metres). Perfect for tall guests or big couples.

15 min to Princes Street and Royal Mile by bus.
20 min walk to Holyrood Park, Portobello and Leith Walk.

Plenty of free parking available.

I spent most of my the time in the flat between my room and the livingroom for work. If you need to use the livingroom to eat a meal, for example, let me know in advance so that I can organise myself.

name: Lovely Festival Flat
description: Central, bright, large flat, located in the heart of one of the best cities in the world. Your apartment is within walking distance of everything you need to enjoy this vibrant city. Whether you are on a family holiday, a cultural getaway or visiting with friends, you'll love being so close to the superb restaurants, bars, theatres and attractions this great city has to offer. Within walking distance of most Edinburgh Festival venues, the excellent transport links ensure a hassle-free stay.

name: Double Room in Traditional Edinburgh Flat Polwarth
description:
We offer the chance to stay in a traditional flat in central Edinburgh. We are conveniently located as a base for your visit to our beautiful city, whether you are visiting for the history, museums, the Fringe Festival, or the great outdoors – Edinburgh has it all.
The room we rent within our 2 bedroom flat is a spacious and comfortable double bed room with full access to the rest of the property.
We are live in landlords but only part-time so you may have the place to yourself!

name: Beautiful quiet room Edinburgh University old town
description: This is a lovely room situated on a quiet tree-lined street with free  parking directly outside. With a beautiful south-facing garden you will find it is a great base from which to explore the city. Enjoying a comfortable  mattress,  and newly furbished luxury bathroom, it's a very welcoming, relaxing   place to stay after a days sightseeing, visiting friends and family or if coming to the city for work or study at Edinburgh University.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Cheerful Home with Garden at Leith Links Park
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: Warm Apartment On the Doorstep of Holyrood Palace
description: This newly renovated, first floor flat situated on the doorstep of Holyrood Palace, The Royal Mile and the Old Town is the perfect place to stay during your trip to the capital! Within walking distance of the town centre, its the perfect place to rest up after a long day exploring Edinburgh's many famous attractions,  or get ready for a lovely night in town! You can make use of the fully kitted out kitchen, and with full of quality furnishings, comfort will be no issue for you!

name: 2 bed apartment ideal for Royal Mile & Old Town
description:
Our 2 bedroom 2nd floor apartment nestled in the vibrant Newington neighbourhood of Edinburgh offers a perfect home-away-from-home base. Featuring beautiful original cornicing and tall ceilings
Just a 15 minutes’ walk from the Royal Mile & Old Town & a further 10 minutes’ walk to Princes Street. Ideal for Arthurs Seat & Edinburgh University. Easy access to public transport, making it simple to explore all of Edinburgh’s must-see spots.
Please note: There is no lift—access is via stairs

name: The Castle Hub .. … a magical stay!
description:
A central location on the door step of Edinburgh Castle, explore this amazing city as soon as you step out of your magical apartment…

….after a day exploring Edinburgh, step back in time and relax … enjoy your luxury rain shower and cosy up in a bed for a boy wizard…. Step on to Harry’s luggage box and enter the luxurious box bed and close the curtains for a snoozy time !
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 8 Royal Mille Mansions
description:
Located off the Royal Mile in the Heart of Edinburgh, this immaculate 2 bedroom deluxe apartment is the ideal base for families, professionals and anyone with a passion for Edinburgh history and culture.

The apartment features 2 double bedrooms - one with a king bed with zip feature to transform into 2 single beds and another bedroom with 1 single bed - a spacious entrance area, beautiful bathroom and large kitchen/ diner/ living room.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 3 bedroom apartment in heart of Edinburgh
description:
Beautiful 3 double, bedroom ground floor apartment in the heart of Edinburgh that benefits from modern furnishings and eclectic art as well as a large book collection which makes this place a real gem.

We have been awarded a short term let licence via Edinburgh Council our licence number is EH-68501-F

name: Stylish Apt, Fettes Edinburgh. With Free Parking.
description:
Stylish mews style apartment situated in the quiet Fettes village area of Edinburgh renovated to a high standard.
The 1st floor private main door property consists of a spacious living, kitchen and dining area with two bedrooms, family bathroom and en-suite.
Fettes village is a quiet residential area next to the up market and beautifully leafy area of Stockbridge and Inverleith. Close to parks, bars, restaurants and shops and the Royal Botanical Gardens. Walking distance to city centre.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Gorgeous 3-Bedroom Apt Next to Castle & Royal Mile
description:
Located in the prestigious Ramsay Garden right next to the famous Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle, this spacious 3-bedroom/3-bathroom apartment is perfect for guests wanting to see the city’s finest attractions. You can enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

- Elegant interiors with heritage features.
- Enough space for 6 guests in a truly convenient location with an abundance of pubs, restaurants, cafes and shops.
- Fully-equipped kitchen and wonderful views.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: GuestReady - Lovely retreat in Edinburgh
description: Experience comfort and style in this charming one-bedroom apartment in a prestigious Edinburgh neighbourhood. Just a short walk from Stockbridge and the West End, enjoy easy access to boutique shops, cafés, and cultural landmarks like Dean Village and the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art. With great transport links and nearby green spaces, it's an ideal city retreat.

name: Castle Den - 1 bedroom flat in Grassmarket
description: Castle Den is newly redecorated tastefully by interior designers and it is now open for booking! Castle Den is a stylish one-bedroom flat nestled right in the heart of Edinburgh’s historical old town, with the majestic Edinburgh Castle literally adjacent to your door step. It is conveniently located at Grassmarket, one of the most popular tourist attractions in Edinburgh. Only 2 minutes walk to the Royal Mile and many other attractions in the Old Town. It is a perfect base to explore Edinburgh!

name: Peaceful flat with easy access to city centre
description:
Relaxed, tidy, ground-floor flat. Enjoy full use of the kitchen, living room, bathroom and private garden.

Bright bedroom includes desk/table, plenty storage, black-out blinds and garden view.

Area is peaceful and safe with nearbyshops and regular buses on the doorstep to Princes Street and the Royal Mile. Train station 5mins walk away.

name: Spacious Georgian Newtown Apartment
description:
This spacious Georgian New Town apartment is within the vibrant heart of Edinburgh, situated in a fantastic location just minutes walk from the fashionable St James Quarter and Multrees Walk. St Andrews Square, along with Princes Street are within a 7 minute walk. The tram stop serving the Airport is within 5 mins

There is main door entry, and is decorated to a high standard with its modern kitchen, living room (with double air mattress for adults and a sofa bed for a child ), dble bedroom

name: 2BD Loft Style Apt - Edinburgh - Free Parking
description:
This stylish and modern loft style apartment is located close to the City Centre, and a walking distance from Edinburgh's most famous attractions such as Edinburgh Castle, Arthur's seat and Holyrood Palace.

The homely touch to the property makes it the perfect place to stay for families and a group of friends!

name: Calm & Cosy in New Town | Walk to all attractions
description:
In the Edinburgh’s historic New Town, this cosy but comfortable one-bedroom apartment is on a peaceful street, within walking distance of Edinburgh's tourist attractions and public transport; 5 mins to Dean Village, 10 mins to Princes Street and Haymarket, 20 min to the Old Town, 30 mins to Murrayfield Stadium and 5 mins to tram and bus routes.

The flat is on the lower ground floor of a historic 140 yr-old Georgian townhouse, with its own private courtyard and main door, perfect for 2 guests.

name: Delightful 4 bedroom family home in Newington
description: Our charming Victorian stone-built family home is warm and inviting, with plenty of parking, including an EV charger. The front garden features a fun kids' play area, while the spacious rear garden has a lovely patio with a table, chairs, and a BBQ—perfect for relaxing outdoors. Nestled in the popular and vibrant Newington area, it offers a peaceful retreat with easy access to the city, making it an ideal spot for visitors.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Cosy 1 bedroom flat near Murrayfield
description:
Spacious 1 double bedroom flat to rent in Gorgie. Fantastic location for city centre.

Welcome to your home away from home! The flat compromises of a bright and spacious living room, kitchen with washing machine and fridge-freezer, and a bathroom with a shower.

It is a 15 minute walk from Haymarket station and has great bus links.

This self-catered flat is fully furnished, lovingly maintained and looked after.

name: 38@bidecollective5
description:
Double en-suite room within a quiet Georgian townhouse.
. Fantastic location just off Edinburghs princess st & George st.
We offer quite comfortable accommodation.
We don’t cater for stag or hen parties or children/ infants We have a quietly run house promoting a clean safe environment for people to stay we also have a lot of solo travellers who stay due to the quietness of our house
and our fantastic location in Edinburgh city centre.

name: Lovely 2 Bedroom Flat in the Heart of Stockbridge
description:
19 Dean Park Street has just undergone a complete bare brick restoration!

The flat comes complete with brand new furniture and everything you might need to enjoy a stay in the beautiful Capital City!

The location in Stockbridge is perfect to enjoy Edinburgh's trendiest area and its pubs/bars and restaurants as well as the (free!) Botanic Gardens.

name: 38@bidecollective4
description:
Located on the 3rd floor of an A listed Georgian townhouse this double en-suite room elegant room
is a perfect base for those looking to be right in the city centre. Clear views of Edinburgh castle from this room window and also looking the other way out the window you get a lovely
View of the Firth of the forth water
Not suitable for anyone who may find stairs a problem.
please note.
We don’t cater for children or infants and no stag or hen parties.

name: Ground floor 1 bedroom apartment with Netflix
description:
Modern and spacious ground floor apartment located in quite residential development with unallocated parking space for 1 car.
Netflix included
24hours hot water via mains and electric shower included.
Gas central heating system is available with limited access due weather conditions.
Netflix included

name: Vibrant & cosy 1-bed flat in very central location
description:
Hello!

Our flat is located right in the heart of Calton/Hillside/Leith, super central, close to all the cool shops and good restaurants as well as sites, but in a very quiet residential part. Being Edinburgh, it is also very close to greeneries and nature within and outside the city.

The place has high ceiling & big windows with wooden floors in a typical tenement block. Furnished, you’ll have everything you need.

3min tram stop
15min Waverley Station
12min St. James Quarter
10min Calton Hill

name: 38@bidecollective7
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.
Set within the loft of a Georgian townhouse up stairs this cosy room with a shared bathroom which is Shared with only one other room. You will have the use of a kitchen prep area set on the floor below.(between Room 5&6)
Beds are made up with clean white hedging fresh towels and body wash provided.
The loft area has sloping ceilings worth considering if you are tall.
Please note we do not cater for parties or children/ infants.

name: 38@bidecollective8
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.cosy double room set within the loft of an A listed Georgian townhouse. Not suitable for people that can’t do stairs. Our property is This is the perfect base for a central location.
This room has shared bathroom facilities with one other room. The loft area has sloping ceilings wif you are tall.
Use of a kitchen prep area on the floor
No parties or children/infants towels& bedding
Shower gel provide.your room is lockable

name: Bright Stylish Flat in Leith - Airport Tram Link
description:
Welcome to our bright & spacious apartment, a cozy haven in the heart of Leith’s Shore area. Embrace the laid-back vibe as you explore eclectic cafés, lively pubs & restaurants. With easy access to Edinburgh’s city centre & a direct tram link to the airport, you’re perfectly connected and never short of things to do & sights to see.

Enjoy free weekend parking. With just a short stroll on week days.

Ideal for up to 2 guests, come unwind & make yourself at home.

We can’t wait to welcome you! 😊

name: Blue Door at the Rosemount
description:
Welcome to Edinburgh!

Settled in a quiet Victorian (1854) quadrant, the blue door flat at the Rosemount is Scotland's oldest brick build (Grade B Listed)

Originally used to house workers at the adjacent tannery, it's now a gateway to the treasures of Edinburgh at a 15 minute walk to the Castle, Grassmarket and Princes Street.

Being my primary residence, the flat has a cosy feel and the kitchen has everything you might need.

I hope you decide to stay!

name: 2 Bedrooms flat in Charming Newhaven, Leith
description:
2 Bedrooms, 3 beds apartment in Newhaven. Located at only 40 minutes walk or 15 minutes by public transport from Edinburgh Main Street. The area is called Newhaven "New Harbor", a Historical and Conservation area of Edinburgh.
It is one of few apartments in historical fisherman cottages. It is a bright, romantic, clean and quiet lovely house with its private entrance.

name: Cosy flat in Newhaven, Leith
description:
The apartment is located at only 10/15 minutes by public transport or only 40 minutes walk from Edinburgh Main Street. The area is called Newhaven (meaning "New Harbor"), a Historical and Conservation area of Edinburgh.

It is one of few apartments in historical fisherman cottages. It is a bright, romantic, clean and quiet lovely house with its private entrance.

name: Cosy 2 bedroom home in the  city centre
description:
Enjoy our stylish home located centrally to the city .
Ideal location for all activities, restaurants, bars, tourist attractions.

name: Brunswick Road Lovely 2 Bed Apartment
description: Hey! Are you looking for a beautiful, safe, clean and affordable accommodation styled to your taste and needs? Great! WHERE TO STAY APPARTMENTS is just like it! Business travels, family trips, holiday stays, Relocation, long-term and short-term stays, We cover all this plus we always aim to deliver the best experience to our lovely guests! Check us out and book a stay with us!

name: Exclusive 2 Bed w/ Free Private Parking, West End
description:
Relax and enjoy a stylish experience in our 2-bedroom apartment in the heart of the West End. Designed with immaculate décor and furnishings.
It offers a sophisticated retreat.

Just a 5-minute walk to Princes Street, 6 minutes from the tram, and 5 minutes from the iconic Dean Village, The apartment features free private parking and a lift to the top floor, providing spectacular skyline views of Edinburgh

Enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, linen, towels, and toiletries for your convenience and comfort

name: Bright, spacious and relaxing Morningside flat
description:
Bright, spacious and relaxing Morningside home. The flat has a lovely shared kitchen/living room area, shared bathroom and an upright piano if you like to play.

The living room is a relaxing place to be, complete with a wood burning stove for the winter months. The kitchen is well equipped with space to cater for 6 or more people if you enjoy dinner parties.

You will be sharing with me, a professional who works 9-5 ish during the week. I am a relaxed, sociable person who enjoys a good chat!

name: Sleek 2BD City Stay in the Heart of Edinburgh
description: Searching for the perfect Edinburgh getaway? This cosy home is just the spot! Ideally located close to the heart of the city, it’s perfect for couples, friends, or families looking to explore everything Edinburgh has to offer. Just a short stroll from the stunning Royal Botanic Garden and the vibrant Leith High Street, you couldn’t ask for a better base.
