Inside, you’ll find a warm and stylish space with all the comforts of home — the perfect retreat after a day of sightseeing. Book now to begin!

name: Dock Street - Lovely 2BR in the Mariners Church
description: The apartment is located within the former Dock St Mariners Church – Originally built in 1850 and is now a historic listed building. Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at The Shore stop and arrive at Murrayfield in just 50 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to the heart of the ac

name: 7-2 Ferry Gait Crescent
description:
This delightful accommodation offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience, making it an ideal choice for travellers seeking a memorable stay in the heart of our captivating city.
The flat features two double bedrooms, ensuring a peaceful and restful night's sleep for up to four guests. The bright and modern bathroom features a bath and overhead shower. The flat is located on the ground floor and access is super easy due to it being self-check-in.

name: Private Door Stockbridge Garden Apartment
description:
My lovely little Stockbridge flat is super central, only a 15 minute walk to Edinburgh centre and 50 mins to Murrayfeild Stadium along the Water of Leith!
The flat has 1 double bedroom with 2 wardrobes including drawer storage and a sofa bed in the living room. Flat has a fully equipped kitchen and a beautiful, private dog-secure garden where you can sit and enjoy your morning coffee! It’s truly an epic place to stay in the heart of the oldest part of the city.

name: 3 bedroom House with lovely garden in Edinburgh.
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: Embra; central king size room with breakfast
description:
**FULLY LICENSED AIRBNB**

Perfectly located on a leafy residential street between the top of trendy Leith Walk and the amazing city views of Calton Hill, 'Embra' offers a beautiful and comfortable king-size private room in my much-loved home.

NOTE: there are 2 resident cats plus a small happy dog!

A light breakfast is included, as well as slippers, robes, hairdryer, some toiletries and everything to make your stay comfortable.

LGBTQIA++ and neurodivergent friendly - this is a safe space.

name: luxury 1 Bedroomed Apartment in the Royal Mile
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.
Located on the First Floor, 5 mins walk from Waverley Train Station, Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace and Beautiful Restaurants and Cocktail Bars
Luxury Apartment,

name: Stylish room at the meadows with the cutest cat
description:
Cute, cosy room available at my place, 1 min walk from the Meadows, 10min walk from city centre. Best area in Edinburgh to stay.
I'm a restauranteur so always good coffee, homemade kombucha & my delightful cat Nye will be on hand to welcome you in, she's very friendly.
Quiet, calming place to stay.
I do ask guests to keep in mind that this a room rental only, not a whole apartment, you are welcome to use the communal areas but to be aware not 24/7.
LGBTQI friendly.

name: Luxury spacious apartment in Edinburgh city
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located New Town basement property close to fashionable Stockbridge, and city centre and only minutes walk from supermarkets, cafes, bars and restaurants.

The apartment sleeps 6 and has 3 double bedrooms with uk king sized beds, 2 bathrooms (1 with shower and 1 with a roll top bath), an office, a cinema room, front court yard, back garden, and a renovated cellar at the front to allow early bag drop off / late bag pickup.

name: York Place City Centre 3 bedroom Apartment
description:
Escape to our top floor 3 bedroom apartment, perched above the city, offering privacy, and panoramic views. A cosy apartment centrally located in the heart of the city for all attractions & transport. Just a stone’s throw from the St James Quarter, one of Europe's most modern shopping & leisure destinations, 10 min walk to the Royal Mile & Edinburgh Castle &3 mins to Princes Street
Please note: Access is via stairs (no lift), but the view and quiet atmosphere at the top make it worth the climb!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious one-bedroom apartment in Leith, Edinburgh
description:
Spacious second floor one bedroom apartment in Leith, right next to the historic port of Leith known as the Shore.

Ranked fourth in the world’s coolest neighbourhoods by Time Out. Numerous eateries and attractions on doorstep.

Bright spacious bedroom, large high ceiling living room including office space, box room with piano, kitchen & bathroom. Period furnishings throughout.

The city centre, including Waverley train station, is 15 minutes away by bus.

Free local parking.

name: Entire flat in central Stockbridge
description:
Welcome to our charming one bedroom flat in the lovely neighborhood of Stockbridge in Edinburgh!

Located on a quiet street, this cozy flat is perfect for a solo traveler or a couple seeking a unique and authentic Edinburgh experience.

Please note that there are several flights of stone stairs leading up to the flat, so it may not be suitable for guests with mobility issues.

name: Free Parking - Modern and Cozy City Centre Flat
description:
Our beautiful city centre flat is in the perfect location, nice and quiet but a stones throw from the bustling Leith walk with lots of shops, bars and restaurants. It feels like a tranquil and modern home away from home.

This is self catering accommodation, please find amenities provided described below.

name: Charming Apartment near Leith Links with Patio
description:
SPACES
⭐ 1 bedroom
— the bedroom is complete with a double bed
⭐ 1.5 bathrooms
⭐ A comfy living room with a flat-screen TV
⭐ A fully equipped kitchen & dining area suitable for up to 2 guests
⭐ Lovely patio with outdoor seating

name: Haymarket - Single bunk room
description: JOIVY Haymarket offers a stylish and homely experience for our guests to unwind and relax. Our cosy en-suite rooms provide everything you need for a comfortable and pleasant stay, including free Wi-Fi. Located in the centre of Edinburgh in a traditional Victorian townhouse, directly across from Haymarket Train Station and only a 20 minute walk from Princes Street. The famous Old Town, The Royal Mile and The Water of Leith are easily reached by foot or a short bus ride away.

name: Stylish Loft With Patio Near Royal Mile • Fits  4
description:
This cozy and bright apartment is in a great city center location and ideal for couples, small families or friends looking for a City break in Edinburgh.

With a spacious garden, this downstairs apartment is only 5 minutes from the Royal Mile and Arthur's Seat. Bus routes to all over the city from the street and only a short walk from Waverly station. There are a great variety of restaurants, bars, shops, and a large supermarket close by. High speed internet for those working away from home.

name: Ann House - superbly located 3 bed with lift
description: This top-floor apartment (with a lift) is located perfectly, making it easy to head into the city centre via Dean Bridge or head down into trendy Stockbridge for a meal or drink. You can also shop in some of Stockbridge's wonderful independent shops. With various food markets, Stockbridge has become a bit of a foodie mecca.

name: Double bed in Edinburgh (EH6)
description:
Double bed available in two bed flat.

Bus and tram stops less than 5 mins from the flat, both of which take you to city centre in under 15 mins . The tram also goes directly to and from the airport. The flat is right beside Leith links, and a 5 min walk from the shore and leith walk (this is where all the bars and restaurants are) and since the flat is down the back of leith it is very quiet at night.

name: very central St. Andrew Street
description:
LOVELY, FAMILY RUN, ST. ANDREW STREET FLAT, FULL OF CHARACTER IN AN AMAZING LOCATION: This is a two bedroom apartment located in a stunning location within Edinburgh's Georgian New Town, and in the UNESCO World Heritage Site.

ALSO SEE - "CHARM & CHARACTER ON HISTORIC ROSE STREET" on host profile, DAVID'S LISTINGS

The apartment is only a few steps away from St. James Quarter and Multrees Walk retail district. An ideal base for the perfect shopping experience in Edinburgh!

name: The one on Leith Walk
description: Make some memories at this unique and family-friendly place.

name: Beautiful apartment on Rose Street
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Please note it is located on Rose street, EH2 3DX even though it shows a different pin on the map. It has been recently refurbished to a high standard and can accommodate up to 6 guests.
The apartment really is perfectly situated to explore every mysterious and beautiful corner of the city.

Please also note the apartment is located on a very busy pedestrian street, with lots of bars and restaurants nearby
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright and Quiet 1 Bedroom apt, close to Haymarket
description:
Our bright and homely, newly renovated 1 bedroom apartment in the West End of Edinburgh is the perfect location for solo, couple and business travellers alike. The property boasts a bright, fully equipped kitchen, a bedroom with a super king size bed and a large living space to relax in.

Only half an hour walk from Edinburgh Castle or the Murrayfield stadium and a 7 minute walk to Haymarket station. Thanks to the transport links you can get to any of the city’s best attractions in minutes.

name: Open Plan 2 Bed Apt, Near Edinburgh Castle
description:
This fabulous third-floor flat is located in the shadow of Edinburgh Castle. The apartment includes two bedrooms, comfortably sleeping up to five guests, along with a bathroom and a separate WC.

The open-plan, fully equipped kitchen and living area, including a charming fireplace.

Enjoy access to communal gardens, and the prime location just an 8-minute walk from The Royal Mile, the Grassmarket, and Princes Street. Complimentary towels, linen, toiletries, and Wi-Fi are provided.

name: Cosy top floor flat in the centre of Edinburgh
description:
Located just off of Leith walk, this cosy and bright one bedroom flat is perfect for a couples getaway. A beautiful View of Arthurs Seat and Calton Hill right from the living room window.

Only 15 minute walk to Princes Street or venture further to experience the Edinburgh Fringe Festival. Bus stops are available within a 2 minute walk with easy access to the city. The closest tram stop is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Beautiful 5 Bedroom Detached House and Patio
description: A lovely large spacious home for family and friends to enjoy their holiday in the stunning historic city of Edinburgh.  Situated just 2 miles(3.2km) from the city centre the home offers easy access to the city centre and surrounding areas, with excellent local amenities this home away from home is the perfect place to stay.

name: Princes Street flat full view of Edinburgh Castle!
description:
This special place has a full uninterrupted bay window view of the historic and beautiful Edinburgh Castle. (Perfect for Photos) It is close to everything including Princes Street tram stop direct from Edinburgh Airport, making it easy to plan your visit. Walking distance from Edinburgh Waverley train station.
As you get out of the building you can walk across the street into the Princes Street gardens.
There are delightful, authentic restaurants within seconds of the apartment!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Boutique-hotel Styled Central, Quiet, Quaint Flat
description:
Stay in two king-bed rooms and one double bedroom of a boutique hotel, except that, located on a cobble-stone lane in New Town, this is no hotel! Rooms are quiet and bright with natural light and views

Under 3 minutes' walk are Michelin-restaurant and award-winning pubs, and at a 10-minute walk, the train station (direct airport links/trams bring you even closer!) Around the corner is a children's playground; options for luggage storage are 3 min to walk to!

name: 2 bedroom flat in Bruntsfield
description: Enjoy a stylish stay at this centrally-located place. A great, spacious flat which can sleep up to 4. Great access into the city centre by public transport.

name: Lovely 2 bedroom,  apartment with private parking
description:
Stylish, bright, contemporary flat short walk from the heart of the stunning city of Edinburgh with the Castle, Palace, Museums and our world famous International Festival.
We are within the hub of what Leith has to offer from local pubs, bistros & restaurants serving cuisine from around the world and an array of artisan coffee shops.
THE SPACE
Bright living room with sunny balcony for morning coffee to evening drinks. Stunning new kitchen seating for 4. Two bedrooms, two bathrooms.

name: Spacious modern city centre apartment Castle Views
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at our centrally-located apartment. Perfect for a family get together, our place offers plenty of space combined with great Edinburgh Castle views and a central location.

Stylish and modern, our apartment has been recently renovated to offer a quality experience and comfortable home from home.

We've tried to suit the needs of seasoned travellers with lots of little touches to help make your stay as comfortable as possible.

name: "SUR MER" Bright & cosy private room in W. Granton
description:
Private room with shared bathroom. A great location for exploring Edinburgh with exellent bus connections to city centre, all stopping right outside the house including Airport 17 bus direct. Daybed pulls out to a spacious and comfy double. Choice of supermarkets and local shops 3 mins walk.

A quick walk to the oceanfront promenade with beautiful views of the Forth Estuary and iconic bridges.

name: Spacious 2bed 2bath flat, tram/ bus access - Leith
description:
- A spacious, light and modern 2-bed apartment located on the doorstep of The Shore and moments away from the city Centre
- Private and secure off-street parking, enterprise car club, bike hire and bus links on the doorstep
- Tesco Metro and ATM within the building, great for last minute necessities
- Walking distance to multiple Michelin starred restaurant and Ocean Terminal shopping center as well as numerous trendy eateries such as Pitt St market and Biscuit Factory

name: Skyline View 1BR - Edinburgh City Centre
description: Nestled in the vibrant district of Fountainbridge, this charming one-bedroom apartment provides an ideal base for your Edinburgh adventure. Just a mile from the city center, you'll find yourself within walking distance of iconic attractions such as the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street Gardens, the Grand Canal, and the Edinburgh International Convention Centre. Enjoy the neighborhood's bustling atmosphere with an array of local amenities right at your doorstep.

name: Chic Central 3-Bdr Apartment in Edinburgh New Town
description: Welcome to your Edinburgh retreat! Nestled in the heart of New Town, this chic and spacious house offers everything you need for an immersive city stay. Just a ten-minute stroll transports you to the iconic sights of Edinburgh Castle, the vibrant Royal Mile, and the elegant streets of New Town.

name: Hidden little gem
description: Lovely 1 bedroom flat located in the trendy neighborhood of Leith. This is a unique, stylish and peaceful flat with all the commodities you need to feel at home (inside & outside). It takes 20 mins to walk to Princess street (city centre). Surrounded by supermarkets (1 min), local shops, restaurants, pubs and parks.

name: 2 bed apartment close to Edinburgh City Centre
description: Centrally located, peaceful 2 bed flat for rent. Great transport links, multiple direct busses will take you into city centre within 15 minutes, 10 minute walk to South Gyle train station for direct routes to Haymarket or Waverley.

name: Comfy room in quiet and convenient area
description:
Quiet place close to Edinburgh in a very convenient location, very near the city centre but in local and quiet neighbourhood. You have many things around and the views from your room are of the beautiful Pentland Hills.

Nice for people travelling to explore Edinburgh and around, having a stop over to/ from the Highlands or for newcomers to Edinburgh while searching for a permanent place where to stay.

The bed can be arranged as a single or double room, according to the number of guests.

name: 7A The Mews - cottage in the city
description:
This unique place has a style all of its own. You will be staying in an original mews stables which has been newly converted by the owner into a stunning one bedroom apartment. It is full of thoughtful details and brand new appliances and furnishings.
7 The Mews is located in a tiny cobbled street in the heart of the city centre. Secluded and quiet, the apartment is only a few minutes walk to all the bustle of the city centre and to restaurants, bars and all the attractions.

name: Out Of This World
description: Like a well dressed window display from your favourite boutique, this newly converted Edinburgh shop is in a prime location for exploring the city and is the perfect getaway spot for couples or solo travellers. The accommodation is situated in Inverleith, one of Edinburgh’s most desirable areas. Just a 20 minute walk from Princes Street, with buses every few minutes to the centre of town (Old Town, New Town), waterfront, airport and tram links. FREE PARKING round the corner.

name: 2 Bedroom House in Edinburgh
description:
Relax at our bright & cosy 2 bedroom stay with private parking, in Scotland’s capital.

With the bus route on your doorstep, you are just a short ride away from exploring the beauty Edinburgh has to offer.
Our beautifully located stay offers wonderful views of Arthur’s Seat and Edinburgh’s two castles, Edinburgh Castle & Craigmillar Castle.

Enjoy easy access to everything the city has to offer from this perfectly located stay in Edinburgh.

20 minutes drive to EDI Airport.
No parties allowed.

name: Lovely 2 bedroom flat in a great location
description: Stunning traditional 2 bedroom flat in the heart of beautiful Bruntsfield - a fantastic area full of cute cafes (it is fondly called Brunch-field!), stylish bars, delicious restaurants and independent shops. 5 min walk to the famous Meadows park, 25 min walk to Princes Street , 20 min walk to the Grassmarket  and 15 mins walk from Haymarket train station. Next to lots of local bus connections.

name: Bijou, cosy one bedroom home in heart of Old Town
description:
* In the heart of the Old Town, near University buildings and residences
* 10/15 minute walk to the Castle, Royal Mile. Princes Street and The Meadows
* A converted Old Customs House, the apartment is more like a garden cottage
* The area is full of independent cafes, restaurants and shops.
* Several supermarkets are only two minutes away.
* Nearby buses take you to all areas of the vibrant, historic city of Edinburgh
* Nestled away from the bustle it’s super quiet

name: Welcoming a couple or single-includes breakfast.
description: You won’t want to leave this charming, one-of-a-kind place. Tis a fabulous central city centre location. A stone throw away from all amenities and a few minutes walk to the tram. Which can take you all the way to the train stations and Edinburgh airport.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Secluded 1-bedroom ground floor flat with parking
description: Cosy ground floor flat within a peaceful and secluded development, right at the foot of Arthur's Seat. This property is positioned in popular Newington, with its coffee shops, bars and restaurants, as well as sitting right between Holyrood Park and The Meadows. You will have the entire place to yourself without any intrusion.

name: Cute, cosy room w/free parking&WIFI, close to uni
description:
Ideal for travellers and people who just need the basics without the price tag of the city centre, still with easy access to the city centre.

Room is for one adult only.

Shared kitchen, bathroom. You will be sharing with me and my long term tenant (who works from home so please mind noise) and possibly another guest

View of Arthur seat from hall window!

Very quiet and safe neighbourhood, locks on all doors.

Free parking nearby! Check pics for details

Check-in from 2pm, check-out is 11am.

name: Stylish 2 bedroom flat in the heart of Edinburgh
description:
Perfect for Families! Enjoy feeling at home in this 2 bedroom flat right in the heart of Edinburgh's new town. A 10 minute walk straight into the city centre to stand admiring the Castle and all the city as to offer. 5 minutes to Inverleith park to enjoy a peaceful stroll, passing through Stockbridge on route. There is so much right on the doorstep, make your stay as big or as peaceful an adventure as you want it to be.
Waverley Train Station:15 min walk
Airport:30 min Tram or Bus ride

name: Cozy one bedroom flat in central location
description:
Have a wonderful stay in Edinburgh in this cozy flat located in fabulous Abbeyhill!

This cute one bedroom flat has everything you need and is in a perfect spot- with cafes, shops, and bars on your doorstep, a 10 minute walk to Holyrood Palace and the base of the Royal Mile, or 15 minutes to Prince’s Street or to bustling Leith Walk.

The flat itself is clean, quiet and comfortable. It was recently freshened up with new decor and floors. A great place to return to after a busy day in the city.

name: Beautiful, spacious room near city centre
description:
Large, peaceful and comfortable king-size room in a period Victorian apartment near the city centre. The room is handsomely decorated with personally-collected art from all over the world. A warm welcome in our beautiful home. A clean and smart shared bathroom and the coolest WC in Edinburgh. Use of dining area & kitchen on request.

The location is fantastic – on a quiet street only 8 minutes walk from the university and close to the Meadows park, Festival Theatre, Summerhall and High Street.

name: Lively & Energetic 2BR on The Royal Mile
description:
This apartment is perfectly situated on the famous Royal Mile. Ideal for a couples getaway, family vacation, or a city break with friends, it features two comfortable bedrooms, and an open-plan living and kitchen area fully equipped for all your needs.

Within walking distance to all major tourist attractions, it’s just a 10-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle, 7 minutes to Princes Street, and 15 minutes to The New Town. Enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, towels, linen, and toiletries are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stockbridge ‘Little Gem’ Flat, Sleeps 3
description:
Little Gem is a recently renovated, one bedroom flat, with a stylish pull out sofa that sleeps one. It has the perfect WFH space/study, an open plan kitchen & living room. Ideal for hosting a few friends before a summers night at the fringe or enjoying a cosy night in.
Please note my flat is not able to host small children under the age of 7. This is due to no where to bathe them (shower only) and no cot or highchair

If you are booking for Christmas the flat will have a tree (on request) 🥂❤️

name: Charming Refurbished Tenement Flat
description: Beautifully refurbished one-bedroom flat in a traditional Edinburgh tenement, located in the vibrant Canonmills area. Just a short walk to the city centre, Stockbridge, and the Royal Botanic Garden. Features a king-size bed, sofa bed, modern kitchen, and bathroom. Free off-site secure parking included.

name: Two bed apartment with views of Arthur Seat Mount
description:
Spacious new 2 bedroom apartment.
The flat comprises of a large open plan kitchen/living area, two bedrooms (both with En-suites) and a large main bathroom with shower and bathtub.
Bedroom 1 has one double bed . Bedroom 2 has 3 single beds. There is free on street parking. It takes approximately 20min to reach the city centre by bus. The area is surrounded by greenery in a quiet neighbourhood. Brilliant views of Arthur seat volcano from the living room. First floor apartment. One set of stairs
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: En- suite Room With Independent Entrance.
description: Discover our newly renovated en-suite room with a king size be and with private entrance in Edinburgh. Perfectly located with easy bus access to the city center and the airport. Enjoy amenities like a mini-fridge, microwave, kettle and more. Self-check-in and check-out for your convenience. Book now!

name: Colourful one bedroom flat
description:
Enjoy a relaxing experience at this centrally-located Gorgie flat!

The flat is known as the ‘Pink Palace’ and has been designed as a floral oasis in the heart of Edinburgh.

name: Clean, spacious and comfortable double bedroom
description:
Nice, clean and spacious double bedroom in in a cul-de-sac flat. 25 mins walk distance to Arthur’s Seat and Portobello beach with good bus link into town center.
Free on-street parking. There’s a Morrisons supermarket a block away from the flat. Sharing spaces are the entrance hall, dinning area, kitchen and toilet.
Breakfast is not included, however, tea, coffee, milk and sugar are available in the morning .

name: Light Airy single bedroom in a Victorian House
description:
This stylish place is close to most anywhere you wish to walk to in Edinburgh.

15 min walk to West end of Princess Street Jhonny Walker corner ,or 40 min to the East End of Princess Street .

My house sits in the secluded greenery, just past the West end ,and situated on top of Dean Village .

Edinburgh Sportsclub is 3 min walk away.
Gallery of Modern Art 1 &2 ,is 2 min walk away .
Murrayfield Stadium is 1.1 mile away/1.8km and ca 24 min walk away.
Murrayfield Golf club 1.2 miles also ca 25 min

name: Beautiful Double Room in Victorian Edinburgh Flat
description: Lovely double room in Victorian Edinburgh tenement. Peaceful street, centrallly located. Suitable for cat lovers. I have one big fluffy cat called Bran. 5 minute drive, 15 minute walk to Princess Street. Set off lively Leith Walk, restaurants, cafes, bars, cuisine from around the world. Large shared garden. Bathroom and kitchen, shared with host. Working area, wooden shutters, arm chairs, extra blankets, towels provided. Kitchen with hob, microwave, fridge and oven.

name: Vida City Pad Edinburgh Breakfast & Guest Parking
description:
This Luxury, stylish apartment is perfect for Couples, individuals and LGBTQIA guests visiting the Historic City of Edinburgh.
Sitting on The Water of Leith with great walks, into The Shore, with its eclectic bars and restaurants and The Royal Yacht Britannia.
In the other direction you can walk into the Arty Culture of Stockbridge.
Edinburgh’s Historic Attractions, fantastic bars and restaurants, are only a 10 min bus ride, or you can walk within 20 - 30 mins.

name: Cosy Compact Sleeping Within Victorian Tenement
description:
Loft Bed box-room within large Victorian tenement flat.

Traditional Edinburgh sandstone building, built around the end of the 19th century. Main-door access, direct from ground floor street level with idyllic green garden to the rear.

Located within walking distance to the city centre with regular buses available for alternative transfer to Edinburgh's many beautiful sights and attractions departing only yards away

Shared kitchen, bathroom and living areas well equipped for comfortable living

name: Lux Apartment in Cool N' Hood with tram to door!
description:
This fabulous apartment is set in the heart of Leith, voted the 4th coolest neighbourhood in the World (TimeOut 2021).
Leith is awash with fabulous restaurants for every taste and budget with 2 of the 3 Edinburgh Michelin Star restaurants a 10 min walk away.
The apartment is perfectly located for all main tourist attractions with The Royal Yacht and Princes St a 20 min walk away, with the Old Town just beyond.
This neighbourhood has a cool cafe culture vibe and is a must visit!

name: 5 Bedroom apartment with private parking
description:
Double upper apartment - located within a large semi-detached Victorian property with period features beautiful high ceilings modern touches throughout with a homely touch. Giving you a home from home feel.

Free onsite Parking
5 double Bedrooms all with double Beds
Located within Newington Edinburgh
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Entire apartment, great views FREE Parking!
description:
Relax and unwind at this peaceful and welcoming apartment, nestled in a quiet residential area. Enjoy beautiful views of the Pentland Hills — located by walking distance and ideal for scenic walks and outdoor adventures.

The apartment offers a calm escape and is conveniently located just 15 minutes from vibrant city centre.
Local shops are within easy reach, and there’s direct transport to and from the airport.

This cosy apartment offers a comfortable and well-connected base to call home.

name: Edinburgh Apartment - 2 Bedroom - Private Garden
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

Located in the heart of Colinton Conservation Village.

Fully equipped two bedroom appartment with private access. Two bedrooms both with kingsize bed.

Fully equipped kitchen.

Idilic secluded private garden with outdoor seating.

Private off street parking (2 vehicle driveway)

10 minutes from Edinburgh Airport. 15 minute drive or 25 minute door to door bus ride to the centre of Edinburgh. (24 hours a day, 7 days a week - bus No.16)

name: Flat in New Town (City Centre)
description:
Located in Edinburgh's prestigious World Heritage Site of the New Town, Rose Street is only a few yards walk from the retail and commercial centre of Edinburgh in George Street and Princes Street, and a short journey from the West End and the new Scottish Parliament at Holyrood.
The property enjoys all the benefits of city centre living with a wide variety of shops, bistros and restaurants on the street as well as on surrounding streets.

name: Room across from Murrayfield tram line
description:
Bright spacious ground floor villa flat located across from Tram stop. It gives easy access from Edinburgh airport and Edinburgh city centre is a short distance away.

The properly has its own front door and is home to a 5 year old Shitzhu.

The double room is good size with a wardrobe, desk and chair. The bathroom has a pressurised shower and products will be supplied.

There is no tea / coffee making facilities or access to the kitchen area.

Please enquire if any queries.

name: 3 Bedroom Apartment (4 Adults, 2 kids max)
description:
Welcome to your home from home.

Our beautiful traditional Victorian Upper Villa is situated in Edinburgh's seaside and is perfect for families looking for the best of both worlds - close to a wonderful sandy beach and all the amenities Portobello and Joppa have to offer yet only a 7 minute train journey into central Edinburgh.

Set in a quiet neighbourhood there is free on street parking and frequent bus and train routes are only a few minutes walk away.

name: Leith Apartment with a beautiful view!
description:
I am a traditional Airbnb host. Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

Nice modern, WARM and comfortable flat in a very quiet residential street.

✔ Modern flat in the trendy neighbourhood of Leith
✔ Very quiet apartment block
✔ 6-minute walk to to Leith Walk
✔ Walkable to Edinburgh City Centre
✔ Bus connection to city centre (bus number 11 right outside flat!)
✔ Tram connection to Airport/Murrayfield for events/concerts

name: Homely 1-bed tenement flat, close to city centre
description: Enjoy an authentic local experience at this central Edinburgh home. The flat is kitted out with everything you might need for a great stay in this beautiful city!

name: Gorgeous 2BD apartment in the heart of Leith
description:
My bright and cozy flat, recently refurbished 2BD apartment in the heart of the Shore, Leith. The spacious property includes all the comforts of home in a truly unbeatable location. Double beds, open kitchen dining area with office area and a newly renovated bathroom. The perfect home base to explore all Leith and Edinburgh have to offer.

Excellent links to the Edinburgh airport, Portobello Beach, Edinburgh old Town, West End, and City Centre.

name: Spacious & Warm New Town Home by Stockbridge
description:
Welcome to our spacious and beautiful two bedroom ground floor flat located where New Town meets Stockbridge, two of the most trendiest neighbourhoods in Edinburgh. Our newly renovated Edinburgh home is super clean and it has everything to make you feel at home.

This property is one of the few 'Airbnb's Guest Favourites' listings in the area, recognised by guests on their ratings, reviews and reliability. As experienced hosts, we are very responsive and ready to help you during your stay.

name: Elegant Studio 15 mins to the Castle
description:
✔ Elegant studio in a prime location at the heart of Edinburgh
✔ Double bed
✔ 1 bathroom

✔ 1-minute walk to George Street

name: Modern flat with Nice Views by the Royal Mile
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place. Enjoy the views over Princess Street Gardens, the Firth of Forth in the background.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Well-appointed one bedroom flat in city center
description:
Hello,
I hope my lovely cosy (28 square meters approx ) one bedroom flat will provide you home from home experiences in a super central location of city Edinburgh. 3 min walk to EICC, 5 min to Edinburgh castle, 12 min to royal mile. Close to university of Edinburgh and military tattoo.
I have choose to use a wallpaper from a local artist, who was inspired by Edinburgh botanic gardens during the lockdown time. I hope you like it too.
The flat has modern kitchen, new bathroom with shower.

name: Stylish 1 bedroom flat in the centre of Edinburgh
description:
Recently renovated, this charming one bedroom flat is ideally located in the centre of Edinburgh and within walking distance of all the major attractions. The flat has its own front door and a private patio to the rear with table and chairs.

The flat has everything you need to make your stay in Edinburgh comfortable and enjoyable. There is a spacious double bedroom, a separate working area with desk and a contemporary kitchen with a table for two. The seating area is cosy and welcoming.

name: Large room in bright flat with hilltop views
description: A bright, spacious, top-floor flat in a classic Edinburgh tenement building with good views of Calton Hill and Arthur's Seat.

name: Spacious 5-bedroom flat in the heart of Edinburgh
description: Lovely, large and airy apartment in an unparalleled central location tucked between The High Street and Cowgate in a secluded, leafy courtyard. Around the corner from the buzz and excitement of the Royal Mile, the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town is right at your doorstep. With its own story to tell, the apartment was built on the site of the Old Scottish Mint dating from the 1500s.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central Bright 2 Bed Flat with Pool Access
description: Our beautiful, light, bright flat has recently been renovated to a high standard and will provide you with a comfortable and relaxing base for your trip to Edinburgh. It takes less than 8 minutes to walk to the flat from Haymarket Train Station and Tram Stop; the tram will take you to and from the airport, and into town if your legs are too tired for the 15-20 minute walk! There are also lots of buses available close by.

name: Renovated - Cosy 3 bedroom home  Central Edinburgh
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. Our lovely home is located in a peaceful and friendly residential area, which is only 15 minutes walking distance to the City Centre. Spacious 3 bedroom apartment with a private garden is ideal for a relaxed and cosy stay.

name: Light and bright 3 bedroom apartment in Merchiston
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

Our lovely and bright 3 bed apartment is located in the Merchiston area of Edinburgh, a short walk from the bustling neighbourhoods of Morningside and Bruntsfield and a 15 minute bus ride to Edinburgh Castle (the bus stop is immediately outside the apartment).

A quiet location with free parking for private vehicles, we offer a lovely place to retreat after a busy day of sightseeing.

Licence No: EH-71086-F

name: Stylish Victorian Garden Flat
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. The flat is ideally located in the buzzing area of Leith Walk, placing you in the heart of a fun area with great coffee shops, restaurants and bars. It's a fifteen minute walk to Princes Street and ten minute walk to St James Quarter, the best shopping area in the city. There are many bus options running constantly from right outside the door, plus the tram route direct to and from the airport is one minute from the flat.

name: Comfy Edinburgh base
description:
Our cosy Edinburgh apartment will provide you with a comfortable and relaxing space from which you can explore the city and its rich culture. Whether you are here for the famous Edinburgh Festival or on a work assignment, our apartment is the perfect place to call home

With central heating and recently updated high-speed internet connection, you'll have all the modern amenities you need to make your stay as comfortable as possible

name: Edinburgh Festival Escape
description:
Beautiful 3 bedroom flat on Easter Road. Newly refurbished and carpeted to a high
standard, this is a bright, modern, cosy second floor flat. Lovely high ceilings and tall double glazed windows. Enjoy plenty of extra room and comfort at this well decorated, fresh and comfy place. The Royal Mile and city centre attractions within 15 minutes walk.

name: Beach front apartment
description: One bedroom modern apartment. 50 meters from portobello beach. Outside terrace area with seating and fire pit. Faces the sun all day. 15 minutes away from centre of edinburgh on excelllent local transport.

name: Just see Edinburgh castle
description:
Your will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. old town 5 minute walk an also station 10 minute walk
I live at home, I will allocate you a private room in the other room, we will share the bathroom

name: Large Bohemian flat with 3 bedrooms & free parking
description:
Our unique, recently renovated historic flat is perfectly situated to enjoy Edinburgh. It is within walking distance of Princes Street and most major central locations. Bus, tram and train connections are close by to take you everywhere in the city. We offer you an entire spacious flat which can easily accommodates up to 5 guests. Free parking!

Pubs, restaurants, a cinema and theatre complex, the St James shopping centre, national galleries, Carlton Hill, etc, are virtually on your doorstep.

name: Stylish, pet friendly 3bd flat near Hollyrood Park
description:
Welcome to our stylishly decorated 3-bed apartment in Edinburgh, which is the perfect place for families to enjoy their time in this beautiful city.

It is located in the heart of Edinburgh’s Meadowbank neighbourhood - just around the corner from Arthur's Seat and within walking distance to Holyrood Palace and the Royal Mile. This property is on the main bus route and is perfect for those looking to discover Edinburgh’s historic city centre and surrounding areas. You can even bring your pet!

name: Desirable 2 Bed Apt Near Edinburgh Castle
description:
With Edinburgh Castle just around the corner, this ground floor apartment is your next city getaway. it’s only minutes from the bustling Grassmarket, where you’ll find delightful cafes, markets, and a rooftop bar.

All major tourist attractions are within walking distance. The apartment features two king-size beds, a shower room, and a separate toilet. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen and a living room with a dining area.

Free Wi-Fi, hotel-quality linen, towels, and toiletries are provided.

name: Silvermills - Cosy 1-bed in Stockbridge
description: Modern ground floor, well-equipped, spacious, comfortable flat in Stockbridge. Own allocated off-street private car parking space at the rear. One mile from Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle, yet with a village atmosphere, high quality restaurants and food shops. There are leafy roads and artisan and bohemian shops, independent cafes and a weekly market. A pleasant walk beside the Water of Leith leads to Dean Village with its historic buildings. The Botanical Gardens are close by.

name: Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment in Edinburgh.
description:
Two bedroom apartment located 2 miles from Edinburgh city centre and 4 miles away from Edinburgh Airport.

Property features:

- En-suite off main bedroom
- 65” TV
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Bathroom with freestanding tub
- Excellent transport links
- Stones throw from Edinburgh Zoo
- Quiet neighbourhood
- 1 mile from Murrayfield Stadium, ideal for concerts/rugby

Both bedrooms have standard double sized beds at 1.9m x 1.35m.

name: Tranquil bedroom w/ stunning views
description:
Enjoy the comfort of this very large stylish bedroom and private bathroom in the exclusive and peaceful Grange neighbourhood. The super-kingsize bed guarantees a great night's sleep, and breakfast at the window seat area gives a stunning view of Arthur's Seat and the Crags
George Square (Edinburgh Fringe Hub) 1.2 mile, The Castle 1.5 miles, Princes Street 1.6 miles, approx. 15 mins on the fast, efficient buses. Free on-street parking or in our carport by arrangement.

STL Licence: EH-74531-F
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Lovely 2 bed flat located next to Edinburgh Castle
description: Located on the opposite side of the street from Edinburgh Castle, this first floor apartment has a lounge, double bedroom, twin bedroom, kitchen and bathroom.  The two bedrooms sleep up to a maximum of four persons and the windows of these rooms look over the city skyline, giving wide panoramic views to Arthur Seat and Salisbury Crags on the east side of the city as well as George Heriots and the Pentland Hills which lie to the south and west of the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Luxury Flat near Edinburgh Castle
description:
✔ Gorgeous flat ideally nestled in Edinburgh New Town
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 4-minute walk to Princes Street Garden
✔ 7-minute walk to Scott Monument
✔ 7-minute walk to Scottish National Portrait Gallery
✔ 10-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 11-minute walk to Waverley Train Station
✔ Located on the famous George Street

name: Beautiful Spacious Flat In Leith
description:
Welcome to my beautiful, tranquil and spacious flat in the heart of Leith.

My apartment is newly decorated and fully stocked with everything you will need for your stay. It has been designed and curated to include all my favourite things for you to enjoy!

A 10 minute walk to central Edinburgh, and a 2 minute walk from the tram stop, the flat is well connected.

The neighbourhood itself is gorgeous, trendy and hip - with lots of independent restaurants, coffee and brunch spots you can explore.

name: Views of Leith - Serviced Apt & Secure Car Parking
description: Situated directly on The Water of Leith Walkway, check in with us and quickly forget your worries in this spacious, serene space that's quietly tucked away from the busy roads of Leith. The Elevator/Lift gives you direct access up to to your apartment from the secure car park, providing peace of mind that your vehicle is securely parked on the premises in a locked garage, along with offering a simplistic and effortless way to access your home away from home here in Leith, Edinburgh. :o)

name: Cosy 1 Bed Cottage Near City & Cramond Beach
description:
1 bedroom ground floor cosy cottage in Cramond - the scenic corner of historic Edinburgh!
Suitable for couples, it has a private outside area overlooking a well-kept shared garden.
Minutes from Cramond beach and the beautiful River Almond walkways .
2 minutes walk to a direct bus (No. 47) taking you into historic Edinburgh city centre in 20 mins.
Cramond is conveniently close to the airport.

name: Double room with Private bathroom
description:
A relaxing room with your own private bathroom in a modern apartment. Perfect for chilling out after a day exploring the city.

Fantastic bus links to the city centre and Edinburgh’s main attractions!

We are located a 5 minute walk from Easter Road which has a range of boutiques and cafes. In 15 minutes you can walk to Leith walk with its pubs, restaurants, theatres and the new St James quarter shopping centre.

In 20 minutes you can walk to Holyrood and the bottom of the royal mile!

name: Ferry road apartment
description: Welcome to your home away from home in beautiful Edinburgh! As your local Superhost with over 10 years of hosting experience, I’m proud to offer this bright and comfortable 2-bedroom flat perfectly located just a 4-minute walk from the nearest bus stop and only a 20-minute ride into the heart of the city.

name: 2 bedroom family home with free parking
description:
PLEASE tell me a bit about yourself before sending a request. This is my home and it is suitable for verified accounts with reviews only.

Family home with 2 bedrooms ( 1 double, 1 single bed ). Please note this is single parent family home, it is basic and not very modern.

Flat is located in south part of the city. Easy-access to city centre, bus takes around 30 minutes. Fully fitted kitchen. Towels and linens are provided. Wifi available. On-street parking is free.

name: Luxury Nests - New Town 6 (Refurbished 2022)
description: Luxury Nests is a group of premium apartments which stand proudly in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town, famous for its architecture and World Heritage Centre status. Comprising a collection of two, three and four bedroom apartments, each one has been recently renovated to the highest specification. The apartments combine traditional Georgian style with the latest modern design, providing a beautiful private and comfortable city centre living space.

name: Simpsons Loan [428]
description:
This beautiful modern 2 bedroomed apartment, sleeping up to 4 guests and a baby, is situated on the 7th of floor of the building (there is a lift!) The panoramic views over the meadows and Arthur’s seat are outstanding, the photographs really do not do them justice.

The accommodation is within an easy stroll of the Royal Mile and Edinburgh’s historic Old Town and is very close to the open green spaces of the Meadows.

name: 200 year old Georgian apartment in Edinburgh
description: A beautiful apartment on the top two floors of 200 year old Georgian building designed by world renowned architect, William Playfair. Centrally located within short walking distance of many of the most popular parts of Edinburgh.

name: Lovely 2 bedroom apartment - Edinburgh city centre
description:
The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.
It is a short walk away from Arthur’s Seat and Portobello beach with excellent bus routes to go all throughout the city.

The apartment is a stylish 2 bedroom, with a newly fitted bathroom and kitchen. The living area has a fresh and airy feel, perfect for relaxing after a long day of exploring.

name: Edinburgh bright double
description: Great location Leith and centrally-located place. 3nights No working from home

name: Beautiful 2-Bedroom City Centre Apartment
description:
A beautiful top-floor apartment on one of Edinburgh's most stunning and historic streets, part of the UNESCO World Heritage New Town, built in 1810.

Stunning views over the Firth of Forth from both bedrooms, with plenty of natural light and traditional wooden shutters.

A comfortable modern interior with a large living room, two spacious bedrooms, a modern bathroom, and a well-equipped kitchen. Around a 10-minute walk from Edinburgh Waverley and Princes Street, and 15 minutes from the Old Town.

name: Loveley two-bedroom groundfloor apartament.
description:
Loveley two-bedroom groundfloor appartment with open plan kitchen and bright livingroom where you can relax and watch tv after all day long exploring amazing city of Edinburgh.
Enjoy preparing meals with your family or friends in full fitted kitchen.
Rest in cosy masterbedroom with king size bed fitted warderobe and ensiuted private bathroom with shower cabine.
Second bedroom also has fitted warderobe and double bed.
There is second bathroom off the hallway. Hope you will enjoy your stay.

name: Comfortable 2 bed apartment in Morningside
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space. Located just off Morningside Road and it's lovely bakeries and coffee shops, our place is in the ideal location for a chilled out stay in a cosmopolitan neighbourhood.

Perfect for couples or families, we're a couple of miles from the Old Town, a short bus ride away!

name: Lovely double bedroom in cosy shared cottage flat
description: Relax in this cosy ground floor cottage flat with front door access on a pedestrianised street. There is a garden and shared patio with bench and bbq available as well as a lawn out the back with free allocated parking. Garden in full bloom atm! Guests have access to a shared kitchen and bathroom with me. Excellent connections via bus to city centre, close to the airport with a Tesco, Lidl and Scotmid just down the road. The Zoo and Murrayfield stadium are nearby. Quiet and friendly neighbours.

name: Lovely 3 bedroom apartment in Edinburgh’s West End
description:
Located on one of Edinburgh's best streets, this spacious 3 bedroom apartment makes an ideal base for exploring the city.

- 3 bedrooms
- 2 bathrooms
- Open plan kitchen, dinning & living room
- Bath & shower facilities
- Dedicated Laundry area

Walking distances (minutes)

Dean Village - 5
Stockbridge - 8
Princess Street - 10
The Botanical Gardens - 18
Grassmarket - 20
The Royal Mile - 22
Haymarket - 22
The Meadows - 25
George Square - 25
Waverley - 27
Carlton Hill - 30
Murrayfield - 35

name: Entire Deluxe 3-BR 3-Storey Apt in City Centre
description:
A deluxe, stunning 3-bedroom 3-storey apartment with private entrance located on a quiet street in Edinburgh's city center. You will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

- Ideally located on a quiet street in central Edinburgh - Windsor Street Lane
- Short walking distance to many iconic attractions in Edinburgh.
- Excellent transport links.
- Beautiful interiors and finishes.
- Fully-equipped kitchen.
- Restaurants, shops and sights nearby.

name: Chic Apartment near Stockbridge Market
description:
✔ Gorgeous flat, ideally based in Stockbridge
✔ 670 ft2 / 62 m2
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ Front patio with outdoor furniture
✔ 5-minute walk to Stockbridge Market
✔ 8-minute walk to Circus Lane
✔ 12-minute walk to Royal Botanic Garden
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Characterful 1 bedroom apartment in Leith
description: Spacious, quiet and characterful 1 double bedroom apartment in Leith, facing Leith Links, frequent bus services to City Centre, 10 minute walk to The Shore area pubs and restaurants.  Lower ground floor of a Georgian townhouse with its own front door (down 7 steps), living-room, kitchen, study area, double bedroom and bathroom.   Kitchen has hob, combi Microwave oven, dishwasher, toaster, kettle, small fridge.   Free parking on the street outside.   Ideal for Edinburgh festival stays.

name: Edinburgh Castle Apartment
description:
Fully modernised apartment located at Edinburgh Castle, in the heart of the Old Town. Centrally placed for shopping, bars, bistros and restaurants; perfect for visiting Edinburgh’s tourist attractions.

Well connected to Edinburgh Airport and walking distance from Waverley train station as well as efficient bus and tram network access.

Walking distance to attractions such as Edinburgh Castle, Princess Street, Royal Mile and Arthur Seat. Breathtaking and unmatched private views.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Emerald 2BD Retreat in Historic Building, New Town
description: Experience the perfect blend of heritage and modern living in this beautifully refurbished Grade A-listed 2-bedroom flat, nestled in the heart of Edinburgh’s prestigious New Town. With over 180 years of history, this elegant home offers generous space, stylish interiors, and sweeping views across the city. From iconic landmarks and museums to world-class restaurants and shopping (and with excellent bus and tram links nearby), you’ll have easy access to everything Edinburgh has to offer...

name: Modern Flat in Edinburgh with Free Parking
description:
Experience the beauty and history of Edinburgh from this delightful 2-bedroom apartment, located in the sought after residential development the Strada, in the Fettes district of the city.

This spacious and profesionally styled apartment accommodates up to 4 guests and is designed for maximum comfort.

Free parking within the development is included with your stay!

A welcome pack with a selection of teas, coffee and local traditional Scottish snacks is offered with every stay :)

name: GuestReady - Stay in Leith
description: This 1-bedroom apartment in Leith is the perfect cosy retreat for anyone looking to explore the vibrant neighbourhood of Leith in Edinburgh. Its convenient location gives you easy access to local shops, restaurants, and attractions. The apartment is tastefully decorated and offers a comfortable living space for solo travellers or couples.

name: Cozy & Modern Flat • Close to City Life
description:
Located only a 15 minutes away from the Holyrood Park, my homely, stylish property can accommodate 2 guests. Perfect for a romantic getaway, solo traveller or friends, it’s central location gives you access to Edinburgh's most famous attractions in only a few minutes by foot.

*Absolutely delighted to have the chance to finally welcome you in my listed property! I look forward to providing you with an incredible experience in Edinburgh*

name: Unique, beautifully spacious Edinburgh Flat
description: Wonderful Edinburgh flat, the whole group will be comfortable in this unique bright central flat with plenty of space and high ceilings. Two bathrooms (one ensuite) and two bedrooms.

name: Super Modern 2BR Home with Parking & Fast WiFi
description:
My ground floor home is one of the few 'Airbnb's Guest Favourites' listings in the area, recognised by guests on their ratings, reviews and reliability.

My newly renovated ground floor flat is located in Craigentinny, a residential area between the vibrant neighbourhood of Leith and the beach side resort of Portobello. Perfect for a short getaway, a mid length stay or business travellers that require a dedicated workspace with a reliable and fast WiFi connection, with FREE private parking.

name: Boho Comfy 2-Bedroom Flat in Stockbridge
description:
Welcome to our fabby little home in Stockbridge, Central Edinburgh. We are David, Sophie, Isabelle and Rosie and this is our family home that we welcome you to stay in whilst we are on holiday. It's comfy and welcoming and decorated in our own boho-psychedelic style!

There are 2 bedrooms, one superking, one double.

We are in a trendy and very central area, 10 min walk from Princes Street and 20 mins to the castle on a quiet side street with many shops, cafes, pubs and restaurants close by.

name: Lovely studio Edinburgh city centre
description:
Take a break and unwind at this beautiful spacious studio set bang in Edinburgh city centre. You can see clearly Edinburgh castle from the doorstep and the castle is a 10 min walk
Views from the window include Edinburghs cosmopolitans George st & Edinburgh Castle
This studio located on the 3 rd floor of a Georgian townhouse
not suitable for those that can’t do stairs

Kingsize bed
All towels snd bedding provided also shower gel. Supplied
We do not cater for children or infants
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central cosy 2 bed maisonette
description:
Enjoy a cosy retreat in this 2 bed maisonette that's just far away from the hustle and bustle to relax after a busy day out in the city centre.

Make use of the large kitchen/dining area for home cooked meals or enjoy some food al fresco in the front garden or sat on the steps in the afternoon/evening sunshine. A generous main bedroom and cosy second bedroom are tucked away in the eaves upstairs.

name: Lovely 2-bedroom flat in a great location
description:
Comfortable, convenient flat located a 5 minute walk away from Haymarket train station and 15 minutes from the west end of Princes St, it's a great location for exploring the city right at your doorstep!

The flat is surrounded by plentiful amenities in Dalry including supermarkets, restaurants and takeaways.

Our home is well equipped with two double bedrooms. The smaller double bedroom has a day bed. You can pull it out into a double bed. Ideal for a couple, family and small group of friends.

name: Double room with Arthur’s seat view, free parking
description: Centrally located in the quiet Blackford area next to Edinburgh University's Kings Buildings campus and a 25-minute walk to the start of Edinburgh's Old Town which hosts Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, The Royal Mile and countless bars and restaurants. The Old Town comes alive at the Edinburgh Festival, with a significant amount of festival venues in this area.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Stylish, fully refurbished, central foodie hotspot
description: Fully Licenced - Newly refurbished, one bed ground floor flat - private access, fabulous open plan lounge/kitchen, high spec bathroom & beautifully presented bedroom. Perfect for couples/friends. Located in very popular Dalry - a short walk from West End/city centre, minutes from Haymarket station & tram stop with links to airport.  15 minute walk or 5 minute bus ride into town and all the tourist sights.  Foodie's delight surrounded by numerous restaurants, speciality delis & coffee shops.

name: Fabulous new build garden studio with own patio
description: Super stylish & welcoming, the Garden Studio is a quiet East Edinburgh haven close to the popular area of Portobello yet within easy reach of the City Centre. Tranquil colours & cosy furnishings, a smart drop-down double sleeping arrangement, a well-kitted kitchen area and superior shower room, the space also offers high speed Wi-Fi and a smart TV with Netflix.  BiFold doors  open onto your private patio and south-facing garden. There is underfloor heating throughout. Free on- street parking.

name: Modern Studio Apartment in prime central location
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this fantastic, contemporary and very centrally-located place. The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay and is ideally situated to discover the wonders of Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely 2-bedroom apartment in central Edinburgh
description:
Homely and spacious Georgian ground-floor apartment located on a quite street, which is only a few minutes walk away from the thriving retail and entertainment district around York Place.

STL License no: EH-68021-F

name: George IV Bridge - Superbly located 3 bedroom!
description: The apartment is fantastically located in the heart of Old Town. The Royal Mile is 3 minutes walk and you can be at the castle in under 10 minutes. The National Museum is a few steps from the front door as is the atmospheric Greyfriars Kirkyard, famous for both Greyfriars Bobby and as an inspiration for JK Rowling when it came to the names of her characters. With the photogenic Victoria Street, a couple of minutes walk from the front door, you will really be in the heart of the action and hist
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Kaida Suite - City Centre 1 Bed Studio Apartment
description: Dragon Suites is delighted to welcome you to this luxury 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom studio apartment. Perfectly located in the West End area of Edinburgh with major tourist attractions within reach, including Johnnie Walker Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle. The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with all the essentials provided. The open planned living space features a TV, dining area and sofa.

description: Dragon Suites is delighted to welcome you to this luxury 1 bedroom, 1 ensuite bathroom apartment. Perfectly located in the West End area of Edinburgh with major tourist attractions within reach, including Johnnie Walker Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle. The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with all the essentials provided. The open planned living space features a TV, dining area and sofa bed. name: Beautiful West End Basement Apartment
description:
Our west end basement apartment is now an available to welcome guests.
. Part of our bide collection properties this cute flat is now available to book. Our location is fantastic a one min walk to princes st.
Enjoy our easy key box system for a quick and streamline check in. We are perfectly located in the west end of Edinburgh,within Walking distance to most of Edinburghs major attractions.
please note we are a basement (so steps to entrance x6)
We don’t cater for parties. Hen or stag

The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with all the essentials provided. The open planned living space features a TV and dining area.
