The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with all the essentials provided. The open planned living space features a TV and dining area. Please note as this is studio style the bed is part of the living area.

name: Amazing two-bedroom groundfloor appartment.
description:
Take a break and unwind at this peaceful oasis.Loveley two-bedroom groundfloor appartment with open plan kitchen and bright livingroom where you can relax and watch tv.
Enjoy preparing your meals with your family or friends in full fitted spacious kitchen.
Cosy masterbedroom with king size bed fitted warderobe and ensiuted private bathroom with shower cabine.
Second bedroom also has fitted warderobe and double bed.
There is second bathroom off the hallway with shower over the tub.

name: Lovely 2 Bedroom B-listed converted Whisky bond
description:
Stunning 18th Century B listed Whisky Bond flat. Located in the fashionable Shore area of the City next to the water.

Ground floor flat with private secure access.

Stunning period features including beams stone pillars.

1 x Bedroom
1 x Super King Bed

Solid wooden floors throughout.
Washing machine
Tumble dryer
Microwave
Oven
Fridge
Inducction hob
Kettle
Coffee Machine
TV
Wifi
Central Heating
Under Floor heating

Travel Cot available on request.

name: *NEW* Edinburgh Apartment 10 mins from City Centre
description:
Under 10 mins bus journey into Edinburgh City center providing an accessible escape from the Inter city noise.

This 1 bedroom apartment is ideal for any one or two persons looking to relax with the city in view with a shared garden with one other neighbour.

This apartment comes with amenities such as washing machine, fully functioning kitchen, free gym weights and bench, small office workspace in the bedroom, hairdryer, wifi, tv, inside dining and an outside dining area and fire pit.

name: Double Bed Room in tow bed flat with shared kitchn
description:
1-15 minutes away from Princess street by bus.
2-20 mints from Edinburgh airport &Waverlysteps station .
3-15 minutes away from Haymarket station.
4-24 Hour Bus service.
5-15 minutes away from Herriot Watt university by bus .
6- 1.4 Mile from Napeir university sighthill campus.
7-1.3 Napier Craig locket campus .
8-Pure Jym 5 minute by walk .
9-Famous Saughton park 3 minutes by walk .
10-Asian Halal food is available nearby .
11-free car street parking.
12-Mosque is just 5 minutes away by walk.

name: lovely one bedroom place- renovated with wifi
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Kitchen with fridge with freezer, electric oven, ceramic hob. Extractor hood, microwave and complete Kitchenware.

Cold air conditioning and heating with hot water radiators with gas boiler. Fiber optic internet.

name: Lovely one bedroom flat in the heart of Edinburgh
description:
Experience the best of Edinburgh in this stylish, central one bedroom flat with a sofa bed in the living room. Only a 10-15 minute walk from east Princes Street and Calton Hill.

The flat is situated at the top of Leith, a bustling area, tucked away on a quiet side street. It is on the ground floor of a typical Edinburgh tenement building. The bedroom faces the garden and is very peaceful for the central location. Open plan kitchen and living room with a smart tv, dishwasher & washing machine.

name: The Cabin : Stylish hideaway near city & hills
description: The Cabin is an ideal escape to experience the best of Edinburgh, whether exploring the city or hiking or cycling in the nearby Pentland Hills.Only a 5 minute walk from amenities and regular, quick bus links to the city centre,The Cabin has an open outlook in the historic mill village of Juniper Green.Your hosts, Colin, Gill and family, live in the main house by The Cabin.You’ll relax in your own private space, however if you need anything we’ll be happy to help. Free parking onsite.

name: Double: safe, quiet area 15 min A'port/City centre
description:
Double bedroom within a beautiful detached house. I live in the house too.

Look out for squirrels, birds and fox in the garden 🐿

Free parking. Lovely peaceful area.
If you have a car, quite near Blackness Castle where Outlander was filmed.

The modern shower is only shared with single room on same floor.
Please note, the shower cabinet is a little smaller than standard so if you are heavily built or over 6ft 3ins this may be a problem!!

Children over 14.

name: Cosy 1-bed flat in the heart of Holyrood
description: This wee gem is centrally located, making it easy to plan your visit. 15 min walk to the bottom of the Royal Mile (Old Town); frequent buses to the city centre (15 mins) or Portobello beach (25 mins). Peaceful area (the street is a cul-de-sac) with limited free parking. A warm & cosy nest with a king-size bed or double sofa bed to choose from after trying the deep-soaking bathtub! Supermarket, shops, bars & restaurants nearby, plus a secret passage into Holyrood Park at the end of the road...

name: Mid-mile - chic 2 bedroom Royal Mile apartment
description:
Stylish, modern, spacious apartment, tucked away in a side street just off the Royal Mile, the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town. This fantastic apartment is perfectly located in easy walking distance of all the main attractions, with a wide range of restaurants, pubs, comedy clubs and night life round the corner.
The New Town with all its shops and restaurants is a short walk across North Bridge.
No lift.
There's a car park with EV charging 150m away. The central (Waverley) Station is 400m away.

name: Lovely Flat in Haymarket, 1-bedroom
description:
Enjoy a cosy and homely stay at this centrally-located place, located a 10 mins walk to Princes Street and Haymarket station, 20 min to the Old Town and Grassmarket, 30 mins to Murrayfield Stadium and 5 mins to the tram and many bus routes.

This top-floor flat has an indoor fireplace, TV with a sound bar and streaming services and is fully furnished with all amenities to feel at home during your stay.

name: Private spacious room for ladies only.
description: Relatively new modern townhouse on three levels. There is no option of bag dropping before the check in time or leaving after checking out , this is for the convenience of both myself and other guests who maybe staying at the same time

name: Central 2 bed apartment with parking garage
description:
This newly refurbished second floor property is an ideal base for those wanting to explore Edinburgh and beyond, with free parking for one vehicle located in the garage below the property.

Located next to the Water of Leith in the affluent area of Stockbridge, the property is only a short walk to the city centre. Stockbridge itself boasts a number of independent shops and a plethora of dining options including cafes, bars and restaurants.

name: Immaculate design flat in prime central location
description: Just walking distance from main tourist attractions like Edinburgh Castle, Royal Mile, Old Town. Vibrant local community with lots of coffees, bars, pubs, shops. An apartment in the middle of the town, in an ecclectic,boheme area.

name: Private room in Edinburgh: The Green Room
description:
Quite centrally located and close to everything! The room is cosy and the shared bathroom + kitchen are clean.

Bus (lines 24 or 9):
- 25 minutes away from Princes Street and the city centre.

Walking:
- 5 minutes away from Blackford Hill.
- 10 minutes away from The University of Edinburgh King's Buildings Camp
- 15 minutes away from Morning Side.
- 20 minutes away from Cameron Tool, the shopping centre.
- 40 minutes away from Castle Rock.

Tea bags & kettle provided.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Spacious comfy room right in the heart of Old Town
description: Our home is in a heritage listed building from the 1800's and right in the heart of the majestic old town of Edinburgh. You will be spoilt for choice for restaurants, cafes and a 20-mins walk will get you to the city center. It’s a lovely airy room on top (third) floor of Edinburgh Victorian tenement (meaning you would need to be able to walk the three flights of stairs as there’s no lift).  We've got two adorable dogs (miniature Dachshunds). We were granted STL licence EH-79856-F.

name: Delightful double, view of Arthur seat from desk
description:
Ideal for travellers or those who just need the basics without the high cost of staying in the city centre.

You’ll be staying in a quiet residential area with a beautiful view of Arthur’s Seat from your room. The house has a relaxed atmosphere. You'll be sharing the space with me, my long-term tenant who works from home (so please be mindful of noise), and occasionally another guest.

✅ Shared kitchen and bathroom
✅ Lockable doors for your privacy
✅ Check-in anytime after 2pm, check-out by 11am

name: Cosy & Quiet Flat near Haymarket Station
description:
Steps from Haymarket Station, this cosy 1-bedroom flat offers a perfect retreat for travellers and business professionals.

Enjoy the bright, airy space and well-equipped kitchen. Relax in the comfortable and quiet living area or plan your adventures using the dining table as a workspace.

Discover Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, and Princes Street Gardens, all within easy reach. Book your Edinburgh getaway today!

name: twin/triple room only. In porty by the sea
description: Bright airy private twin bedroom 150m from stunning portobello beach and 150m to bus stop for all city centre buses including night bus. Fast wifi stylish modern showeroom

name: Perfect central location 2 bed flat by the Meadows
description:
2 bedroom, ground floor flat. Fantastic location, opposite Summerhall, with cafes, restaurants, bars and shops nearby. Walking distance to the city centre and all the main Festival venues. Situated by the beautiful green spaces of the Meadows & close to Arthur’s seat. Close to the University and the Royal Commonwealth Pool.
Includes 2 spacious bedrooms with double beds, a sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen with dining table & chairs, dishwasher & washing machine, shower room & separate WC.

name: 1-bedroom nest near Edinburgh Old Town!
description: This is a quaint 1-bedroom flat in Meadowbank. 15-20min walk from the very core of Edinburgh's Old Town, where all the buzz from the Fringe is happening! This is my home, so you can be sure it's been treated with love and care.

name: The Merchants89 - St Magdalene - One Bedroom Flat
description:
Welcome to TheMerchants89 luxury apartments in the heart of Leith, Edinburgh. This new redevelopment of a historic listed building exudes opulence and modern elegance, offering the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.
Located in the vibrant energy of Leith, guests can indulge in an array of delights right at their doorstep; with the newly finished tramline just a stone's throw away, you can effortlessly travel to and from the airport and the bustling city centre.

name: The Merchants89 - North Port- Two Bedroom Flat
description: Welcome to Flat 7 at 89 The Merchants! Situated in the highly sought-after area of Leith in Edinburgh, this charming loft apartment offers a unique and inviting living space, perfect for your stay.

name: Grassmarket View Suites
description: Relax and enjoy your stay in this recently renovated, beautifully designed private residence studio suite in the very centre of the bustling historic Grassmarket Square. Nestled in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town, with stunning views of Grassmarket. It’s one of the most picturesque and lively areas of the city. Check out our guide for city tips on our profile page!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Merchants89 - Caledonian - Two Bedroom Flat
description:
Welcome to TheMerchants89 luxury apartments in the heart of Leith, Edinburgh. This new redevelopment of a historic listed building exudes opulence and modern elegance, offering the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.


Located in the vibrant energy of Leith, guests can indulge in an array of delights right at their doorstep; with the newly finished tramline just a stone's throw away, you can effortlessly travel to and from the airport and the bustling city centre.

name: The Merchants89 - Port Ellen - One Bedroom Flat
description: Welcome to Flat 6 at 89 The Merchants! Situated in the highly sought-after area of Leith in Edinburgh, this one-bedroom loft apartment offers a bright and spacious living space, perfect for your stay.

name: Cosy Flat near Edinburgh Centre
description:
Visiting Edinburgh and need a cosy place to stay?

This well-located first-floor flat is situated just a short walk from Edinburgh’s bustling city centre.

The flat incorporates traditional Edinburgh high ceilings with a modern kitchen, spacious living room and large master bedroom.

name: Stunning Royal Mile 2 bedroom apartment
description:
We are talking LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Stunning newly refurbished 2 bedroom apartment in the very heart of Edinburgh's historic Royal Mile. This unique place has an unrivalled view over the Royal Mile and is simply fabulous for watching the buzz beneath you.

If you want to be in heart of it and walking distance to everything Edinburgh is famous for (Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace are 2 of the many attractions that are just moments away) then this has it all.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Rooftop room with a view in Edinburgh
description:
Keep it cosy in this peaceful rooftop room close to city centre. Comfy double bed, library of books about Edinburgh and Scotland and exceptional views across the city to the foot of the highlands. You can even see the castle from the kitchen!

Five minutes from the Meadows, twenty to the Grass Market and Princes Street, twenty-five to the Castle and Royal Mile. Located in a bijou neighbourhood just south of the centre of Edinburgh replete with restaurants, cafes, cute shops etc.

name: Artists Seaside Home - Drawing Room
description:
Artists Seaside Home - Victorian Lower Villa with private entrance and front garden. Peaceful, homely and quiet.
There’s a two minute stroll to a long sandy beach and promenade. There are many restaurants, bars, cafes, galleries, independent shops and supermarkets locally and you will be able to find all you need nearby. Frequent buses to and from Edinburgh take approx 20 -25 mins to be in the city centre.

name: Classic double room with large en suite bathroom.
description:
This lovely, spacious queen bedroom sleeps two people. The room is on the top floor of our double-upper family home in a converted terrace house on the edge of Stockbridge, one of Edinburgh's most desireable neighbourhoods. 15 minutes to the city centre by foot and close to multiple bus routes.

Guest Access:
Guests will receive keys to come & go as desired. Self serve continental breakfast served in our large combined kitchen/dining room.

Other notes:
A family home with 2 children. No pets.

name: Stylish & cosy 2 bed 2 bathroom flat in Leith
description:
Enjoy precious time with loved ones at a warmly home away with home just 15 mins from city center

Conveniently located at the heart of leith within walking distance to the city center and the St James quarter, The 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom flat has everything you need to make your stay comfortable

The flat is designed thoughtfully to allow guest to rejuvenate and relax after a day exploring the attractions in Edinburgh.

If you are a family of more than 4, please send a message for booking

name: Entire 2-BR Apt in Old Town next to Royal Mile
description:
A charming, central 2-bedroom apartment, located just around the corner from the famous Royal Mile. Only a 5-minute walk from Waverley Railway Station, this apartment is perfect for experiencing the historic atmosphere of Edinburgh’s Old Town.

- Centrally located at St Mary's Street in Edinburgh Old Town (Just off from Royal Mile).
- Plenty of great restaurants, and shops nearby.
- 2 Bedrooms and a sofa bed in the living room that you can unfold yourself and add linen for sleeping at night.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright room in Victorian family home -room 2
description:
Bright double Bedroom on top floor of family house. 2 bedrooms are available with a shared bathroom. 100 carpeted stairs to reach your room so mobility is key - will keep you fit!
Room is freshly decorated with plenty storage and tea and coffee making facilities.

name: Private bedroom within newly decorated apartment
description: Enjoy a cozy private bedroom in a newly decorated apartment in Edinburgh’s Inverleith area. The property has free, secure parking, convenient bus links, and easy access to the city centre. You’re within walking distance of the Botanic Gardens,  Inverleith Park and a supermarket just 250 yards away. The room includes a double day bed, a built-in wardrobe, and tea / coffee making facilities ( no kitchen facility beyond this). You will also have access to a modern shared bathroom.

name: Traditional Scottish home, Edinburgh city centre
description: Tranquil and modern city centre home for a unique and friendly Edinburgh experience. Bedroom 1 contains a Queen size double bed. Bedroom 2 contains a double bed, which can convert into 2 single beds. Modern, recently refurbished bathroom with a powerful overhead shower. Classic lounge has a stylish chesterfield suite, woodburning stove and flat-screen TV, smart speakers as well as fun board games. Modern kitchen with the usual amenities. Rear south facing garden with paving and BBQ facilities.

name: Super Central: 1 min to Waverley Station
description:
*perfect location for new years eve hogmanay celebrations*

Bright 2 Bed flat in the heart of the city centre, great views down Leith Walk. 1min walk to Waverley train station and 2min walk to Prince's Street

Hotel quality cotton bed linen, memory foam mattresses.

Right opposite large shopping centre and lots of restaurants in the vacinity.

**Self check-in**

Apartment will contain some personal belongings.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Private, large bedroom in central Edinburgh
description: This is a spacious bedroom with a king size bed, comfy seating space, dedicated work space, and a smart TV.  You’ll have access to a shared bathroom with a rainfall shower, and will have a kettle and Nespresso coffee machine in your room. We are a 20 minute walk or a quick bus trip from Prince’s Street which is the heart of Edinburgh, minutes from the botanical gardens and Edinburgh bike paths, and close to a wide range of cafes and restaurants. A small dog will greet you at the door!

name: 2 bedroom garden apartment, Stockbridge, Edinburgh
description:
Stylish main-door apartment on the lower ground of a Grade A listed Georgian townhouse in Stockbridge, Edinburgh.

A private entrance opens to a spacious, restful home with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (one ensuite).

The private courtyard garden is ideal for summer days, with cafés, restaurants, shops and green spaces on the doorstep, and central Edinburgh within easy walking distance.

name: Refurb 3 bed flat in Roseburn
description:
Spacious, modern flat, refurbished in 2023, great central location.
3 minute walk from Murrayfield and tram station.
10 minute walk from Haymarket.

name: Cosy 1 Bedroom City Centre Flat Near Uni & Castle
description: Lovely ground floor flat with its own entrance offers a stylish experience in the city centre. The Victorian stone-built apartment was newly decorated with all modern facilities including high speed wifi. It has everything needed for an enjoyable stay. It is next to the Meadows, Edinburgh University, Kings Theature & Ulsher Hall. All central attractions like Edinburgh castle, Royal Mile, Prince street are within a 10-15 minutes walk. Great restaurants and local amenities nearby.

name: Super Central City Flat - 1 bed and 1 sofabed
description:
This sunny little flat is situated super centrally! It is walking distance from everything, the castle, Old Town, New Town, Grassmarket, Haymarket, Princes Street, Waverly, and anywhere else you can think of! As well as that, there are so many delicious eateries seconds from your front door that not only will you never have to eat in, but you'll never have to eat at the same place twice!

The bright little flat is a perfect place to base yourself to really make the most of lovely Edinburgh!

name: Stockbridge city centre apartment
description:
My lovely bright two bedroom Georgian apartment, is the perfect place to stay in central Edinburgh. Based right in the middle of Stockbridge, off the Main Street, down a quiet 18th Century terrace. It’s ideal to explore the city and then come home to relax and have a good quiet sleep. All of the rooms have original wooden shutters that can block out any light.
The apartment is very calm and serene …even with the abundance of cafes, restaurants and bars within a walking distance.

name: Bright flat near The Meadows
description:
Keep it simple at this bright and centrally-located 2 bedroom home.

Nestled in a quite cup de sac the property is a stones throw from the Meadows. A short 15 minutes walk through this beautiful green space and you’re in the city centre! Perfect for being in the hub without the hustle and bustle. The property is in a traditional Victorian tenement and perfect for exploring the city.

name: Stunning Apartment Overlooking St Giles
description: JOIVY is delighted to welcome you to this beautiful 1-bed flat, conveniently located in Edinburgh's heart, a culturally vibrant area just a stone's throw from the famous Royal Mile. Highlights nearby include Edinburgh Castle and Princes Street. Edinburgh Waverley is the closest train station it is a 6-minute walk and it will provide you with easy transport links. The property consists of 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, an inviting living room, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a dining area.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Luxury Apartment on the Royal Mile
description: JOIVY  is delighted to welcome you to this beautiful 1-bed flat, conveniently located in Edinburgh's heart, a culturally vibrant area just a stone's throw from the famous Royal Mile. Highlights nearby include Edinburgh Castle and Princes Street. Edinburgh Waverley, the closest train station, is a 6-minute walk and it will provide easy transport links. The property consists of 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, an inviting living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining area. Essentials are provided.

The property consists of 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, an inviting living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining area. Essentials are provided.

description: JOIVY is delighted to welcome you to this beautiful 3-bed flat, conveniently located in Edinburgh's heart, a culturally vibrant area just a stone's throw from the famous Royal Mile. The property consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an inviting living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining area. Essentials are provided.

description: JOIVY is delighted to welcome you to this beautiful 3-bed flat, conveniently located in Edinburgh's heart, a culturally vibrant area just a stone's throw from the famous Royal Mile. The property consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an inviting living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining area. Essentials are provided.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Majestic Apartment on the Royal Mile
description: JOIVY is delighted to welcome you to this beautiful 3-bed flat, conveniently located in Edinburgh's heart, a culturally vibrant area just a stone's throw from the famous Royal Mile. Highlights nearby include Edinburgh Castle and Princes Street. Edinburgh Waverley, the closest train station, is a 6-minute walk and it will provide easy transport links. The property consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an inviting living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining area. Essentials are provided.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central and Chic Studio in the Heart of The City
description:
Our lovely newly refurbished studio apartment is offering a great experience in the heart of the beautiful city of Edinburgh.

Located very centrally at Drummond Street, it is only a few minutes walk away from Royal Mile, National Museum and Uni. There are also many beautiful cafes and restaurants around, you will be guaranteed to fully absorb what this lovely city can offer.

Very ideal for tourists looking to discover the Scottish capital or professionals visiting the city on a business trip.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Unique colony building in the heart of Edinburgh
description:
Located in the historic and peaceful Abbeyhill, only 5 mins from Holyrood Palace and 10 from the centre, or to Leith Walk by foot.

The unique colony building is split across two floors, with a spacious and stylish living room, bathroom and gorgeous open-plan kitchen situated on the ground floor, with a master bedroom and bathroom below.

There is a private outdoor space in the front of the house, including a summerhouse and tables to eat on summer nights.

name: Cosy home with work studio and small garden
description: Sweet cottage with 1 bedroom, wood burning stove in the integrated kitchen and sitting room,  1 work studio and small garden close to the beach at Wardie Bay.   Only 15 mins by public transport to Central Edinburgh and a short walk to the Botanic Gardens, with local amenities within walking distance.   Walk down the Wardie Steps into a secluded and colourful square with views over the water, to relax in a comfortable house with green space (including apple tree)  at the end of a busy day.

name: The Merchants89 - Brora - One Bedroom Flat
description:
Welcome to TheMerchants89 luxury apartments in the heart of Leith, Edinburgh. This new redevelopment of a historic listed building exudes opulence and modern elegance, offering the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.

Located in the vibrant energy of Leith, guests can indulge in an array of delights right at their doorstep; with the newly finished tramline just a stone's throw away, you can effortlessly travel to and from the airport and the bustling city centre.

name: The Merchants89 - Banff - One bedroom Loft
description:
Welcome to TheMerchants89 luxury apartments in the heart of Leith, Edinburgh. This new redevelopment of a historic listed building exudes opulence and modern elegance, offering the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.

Located in the vibrant energy of Leith, guests can indulge in an array of delights right at their doorstep; with the newly finished tramline just a stone's throw away, you can effortlessly travel to and from the airport and the bustling city centre.

name: Slateford House 1770 - The Music Room - 2 Bed
description:
Luxury with a Story

Slateford House 1770 is more than a place to stay; it’s a piece of Edinburgh’s past. Bonnie Prince Charlie was handed the keys to the capital here, and now, after a careful restoration by The House of Danu, you can collect your keys to a luxury stay.

At Slateford House 1770, we combine original features, bold design, striking bathrooms, and modern luxury.

It is the Perfect base for exploring Edinburgh and being part of keeping Scottish history alive.

name: 1 Bedroom flat (double bed) 20 mins to City Center
description:
Flat you will have on your own. 20 minute walk to Edinburgh Waverly Station. 5 minute walk to great cafés, restaurants and bars on Leith walk.

Parking charges Mon-Fri 8:30 - 17:30

Trams stop a five minute walk. Will take you to most places in Edinburgh (including airport)

One room will be locked but unoccupied.

Close enough for the lively nightlife and Edinburgh Festival events, but not on a main road so peaceful.

Check in times can be adjusted. Depends on bookings. Contact me for info.

name: The Garden Room: welcoming, peaceful and central.
description: This charming place is located in the fabulous neighbourhood of Broughton Street and close to must-see destinations and all festival venues.

name: Holyrood Duplex 3-Bedroom Apartment
description: Welcome to the Holyrood Duplex - spacious, modern and freshly decorated two-level, 3-bedroom apartment. Just moments from the iconic Holyrood Palace and a short stroll to both the Old and New Towns, it is the perfect base for exploring the city's rich history and vibrant culture. 🅿️Enjoy hassle-free parking at the NCP Holyrood Road Car Park, just a 2–3 minute walk from the apartment. Guests park FREE with the exclusive pass provided upon arrival.

name: central one bedroom apartment for maximum 3 people
description: suitable for family of 3-4, or friends 2-3. 1 double bed and 1 single also a long sofa. kitchen bathroom , bedding included bath towels included.  fridge, freezer,  oven cooker, kittle, washing machine. Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. suitable for Edinburgh city central travelling  and the university visiting

name: Remarkable 5BR Townhouse w/ Garden, Sleeps 12
description:
This newly refurbished townhouse comfortably sleeps up to 12 guests across three floors. With private main door entry and access to a back garden, it’s perfect for enjoying time with family.

The property features a unique blend of modern and vintage furnishings, including five bedrooms, five bathrooms, and two kitchens.

Located on Gilmore Place, the townhouse is just minutes from Bruntsfield, the Kings Theatre, and the Meadows, making it an ideal base for your Edinburgh adventure.

name: Large bright contemporary room.
description: Large bright contemporary room with feature home office overlooking private garden. Set in modernised Victorian main door flat 15 minutes walk from Edinburgh's historic old town. Fully licensed. Nr EH-69491-F.

name: Unique Apartment by Edinburgh Castle
description: JOIVY is delighted to welcome you to this beautiful 3-bed flat, conveniently located in Edinburgh's heart, a culturally vibrant area just a stone's throw from the famous Royal Mile. Highlights nearby include Edinburgh Castle and Princes Street. Edinburgh Waverley, the closest train station, is a 6-minute walk and it will provide easy transport links. The property consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an inviting living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining area. Essentials are provided.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Modern 2 bedroom apartment with free parking
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place with your own private parking space.

Just a stone's throw from the City Center and Oldtown, our lovely 2BR Apartment is perfect for families and friends visiting the beautiful city. Fully equipped for a comfortable stay, you'll also find that the property is surrounded by plenty of Edinburgh's greatest attractions, making it the perfect base for an Edinburgh trip.

name: Central 1 bedroom apartment. Newly decorated
description: Lovely bright central apartment that sleeps four that’s just 5 minutes walk from hollyrood palace, princess street ,royal mile , Carlton hill & st James shopping quarters . The apartment has just been newly decorated & is very peaceful

name: Lovely apartament, office,free parking and garden
description:
A two bedroom and office family home with a private garden in a peaceful and pleasant residential area situated on the west side of Edinburgh. It is a south-facing downstairs flat with private entrance and parking space. The tram stop is 10 min walk and can take you to the city centre and airport in 15 min.
The house can accommodate 5 people as it has one king size bed, one double bed and sofa bed.

name: Edinburgh Holiday Let - 2 Bedroom Victorian
description: Newly refurbished flat is a part of a Victorian Villa located in Newington with gardens and a lovely view of Arthur's Seat and Salisbury Crags. Ground floor apartment has 2 large bedrooms ,one with double bed and a king sized bed can be configured into two single beds, as well as a bathroom and a utility room. The house is conveniently situated in a quiet neighbourhood within easy walking distance of a host of shops, leisure activities and public transport. There is no cooking facilities.

name: Royal Mile Brand New Listing - 2 Bedroom
description:
Enjoy easy access to Edinburgh’s delights from this bright two bedroom apartment. Located in the very hub of Edinburgh, you can walk everywhere if you choose. Step out of the historic Old FishMarket Close, onto the Royal Mile with Edinburgh Castle at the top and Holyrood Palace at the bottom.

The apartment has 2 double bedrooms, a spacious lounge with television and a well equipped kitchen with washing machine, microwave, coffee machine and fridge/freezer. Bed linen and towels are provided.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful & Cosy Newhaven Flat
description: Bright and tastefully furnished, this lovely one-bedroom flat is located in one of the more popular areas of Newhaven, only a few steps from the beach and less than a mile from the sea and the trendy Shore area of Leith. It is also perfectly equipped with everything you'll need for a comfortable stay.

name: Lovely double bedroom in Gorgie, Edinburgh
description:
This cosy flat features an open-plan kitchen and living area, a spacious double bedroom with a charming original fireplace, a separate shower room, and a separate toilet. You'll be sharing the kitchen/living area and bathroom facilities with me.

The flat is conveniently located near three large supermarkets and a range of local amenities. There are frequent bus services to the city centre—Haymarket is around 11 minutes away, and Waverley can be reached in about 25 minutes, depending on traffic.

name: The Edinburgh Meadows Apartment
description:
This private entry central Edinburgh apartment is ideally located to enjoy the sights and experiences Edinburgh has to offer.

The apartment is located just a 5 minute walk from the old town and ideal if you want to explore the city or relax in the sunshine all day in the Meadows park.

name: Charming bedroom near city centre and Meadows
description: We like old charm at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Kitchen, bathroom and a living room are welcome for you to use. Only one to three other people might be there to share a kitchen with you, so you won't be disturbed much. It is on a SECOND floor, so if steps are a problem, you should keep it in mind. The free parking is on a street about 10-15 min walk, but not here. The bus stop is across the street and you could get anywhere in the town. No place access after 1am, unless discussed

name: Lovely quiet Room, Newington view of Arthur Seat.
description: We like old charm at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Kitchen, bathroom and a living room are available and welcome for you to use. Only one to three other people might be there to share a kitchen with you, so you won't be disturbed much. It is on a SECOND floor, so if steps are a problem, you should keep it in mind. The free parking is on a street about 10-15 min walk. The bus stop is across the street and you could get anywhere in the town. No place access after 1amt, no stags.

name: Elegant 35m Georgian w/private bath in City centre
description:
The perfectly located spacious and beautiful Georgian period rooms with modern, recently renovated kitchen in Newington. This urban city-centre apartment has easy access to everything: easy walk to Fringe venues, restaurants, tourist attractions, Royal Mile and the Castle, climb Arthur Seat and Blackford Hill or enjoy a coffee in the garden or funky cafes nearby. The place is on a 2nd floor, keep it in mind if you have mobility problems.
Different sleeping arrangements can be accommodated.

name: Cosy private double bedroom in flat share
description:
A private double bedroom in a shared flat (with live-in hosts) with scenic views of Arthurs Seat from the back garden with a fire pit and BBQ.

The private room looks out to the back garden and has a secure stairway into the flat with an entry door system.

LGBTQI+ friendly

name: Rooftop Retreat
description: This bright, third and top floor flat with large private balcony will make the perfect home away from home while visiting Edinburgh. Situated in the middle of the vibrant Leith Walk, guests are within a short walk to a huge selection of bars, cafes, pubs, shops and international supermarkets.

name: Georgian Main Door Apartment in Central Location
description: Escape to refined luxury in Edinburgh’s elegant New Town with our private apartment. Hidden from the bustle, this exquisite retreat combines calm with premium convenience. A distinguished residence with its own private entrance. Chic bars, fine dining and boutique shops are moments away. Perfectly positioned near the city centre and the Royal Botanic Gardens. Secure baggage storage is available, on request, and is subject to availability. Fully licenced until December 2027.

name: Lovely apartment close to city, garden & driveway
description: This is not a good choice of apartment if you are looking to go out, get drunk, play loud music and make a lot of noise. I have neighbours with young children so there is zero tolerance on parties, loud music, disturbing the neighbours or having guests in the property in addition to the those who booked (2 max.). I will be advised of these situations and will have no option but to end your stay and seek compensation.

name: Bright double room and private bathroom
description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for a weekend break to Edinburgh. Large double room with own bathroom. Full use of kitchen and WiFi.
Leith links is 1 minute away which is perfect for a leisurely stroll. Free tennis courts are also available on the links. An abundance of trendy bars, restaurants and coffee shops are all in close range. The city centre is a 10 minute bus/tram ride where all the sights of Edinburgh can be found.
Tram connections to the airport and city are a short walk away.

name: 38@bidecollective3
description:
Enjoy this cosy room located to the front of the house with clear views to Edinburgh castle.
This is the perfect base for those looking to be right in the city centre.
The accommodation is set within a quiet Georgian Townhouse so not suitable for those who can’t do stairs.
Easy access to everything city centre from this perfectly located accommodation base.we do not cater for stag or hen parties or children
The shower room/toilet is very compact and may not be suitable for large people.

name: Modern cottage, large garden, 20 mins to Edinburgh
description:
Available to guests from September 2025 after period off market due to an extension to the property.

The ideal getaway to the Scottish countryside, with the stunning city of Edinburgh on your doorstep! Nestled in farmland on the outskirts of Edinburgh, the cottage is on the banks of a small river (Niddry Burn), has a big spacious garden and all the amenities needed for a delightful stay!

The property is surrounded by untouched countryside, with so many beautiful walks and areas to explore!

name: ★ 2BR Royal Mile Apartment w/ Private Balcony ★
description:
This two-bedroom apartment is situated on the Royal Mile in the historic centre of Edinburgh’s Old Town.

Located on the 3rd floor, enjoy views from the private balcony across to iconic Calton Hill; from the bedrooms you can look out towards Arthur's Seat.

With two bedrooms, a spacious living/dining room and fully equipped kitchen, the apartment is great for families or friends travelling together.

name: Guest house, free on street parking
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.  Ground level bedroom and shower room . Upper level  open plan kitchen living room with large comfy sofa bed . Juliette balcony with views over the city.  Please note the price is based on 1 person , all additional guests are charged . Please input the correct amount of guests. 2 min to bus stop with regular buses. A 10 minute walk to the lovely Suburban area  of Morningside with chain store shops as well as small business and bars cafes

name: 4 Bedroom Apartment with 7 Beds
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips.

name: Lovely 4 bed Apt with 8 separate beds
description:
★ Special Offer Available ★

🏳 Sensational Stay Short Lets & Serviced Accommodation Edinburgh 🏳

🗝 4 Bedroom Apartment
🗝 Sleeps Up to 8 Guests
🗝 Bedroom 1 - 1 x Super King Size Bed
🗝 Bedroom 2 - 1 x King Size Bed & 1 x Single Bed
🗝 Bedroom 3 - 1 x King Size Bed
🗝 Bedroom 4 - 1 x Super King Size Bed
🗝 Livingroom - 2 x Single Beds
🗝 Fully Equipped Kitchen
🗝 Free Wi-Fi
🗝 Free on-street parking on neighboring streets

name: Pretty City centre garden flat with private garden
description:
1850’s historical Colonies main door flat. 5 mins from the city centre with own private garden and main door on a quiet street. Includes smart TV, WiFi, Hifi. Outside table and chairs, bath and shower, central heating and gas woodburning stove. Fully equipped kitchen with microwave and washer.
Beautifully restored and decorated throughout. 5-10 mins walk from central edinburgh and bus taxi shops 1 min away. Kindly note we only accept bookings with 2 positive reviews or more. Thanks

name: Charming Large Family Suite with Kitchenette
description:
A grand and elegantly restored Georgian Townhouse, on Queen Street in the heart of Edinburgh city centre.

Located in the iconic Edinburgh New Town, a UNESCO world heritage site, 45 Queen Street overlooks Queen Street Gardens. A magnificent 13-bedroom Guest House, combines exquisite period detail with the convenience and facilities you would expect of a modern self-check-in, self-catering Guest House.

name: Comfortable Family Room
description:
A grand and elegantly restored Georgian Townhouse, on Queen Street in the heart of Edinburgh city centre.

name: City Centre First Floor Family Suite
description:
