name: PrivateRoom_KingSizeBed_Lift_Parking_Shared flat.
description:
When booking please let me know your estimated check in time.

Bright room facing the waterfront in Granton Harbour, approx 3 miles north of the city centre. The place is connected by buses 9, 22, X37, 19, 16 and 17 (airport). Elevator + 1 underground car park available. Guests can use the kitchen and have your professional latte as much as you like. There are also cereal and milk. We have 2 kids (1 & 5yrs old). We also have a cat. The cat litter is in the bathroom but is kept tidy.

name: Royal Mile Luxury 2Bedroom apartmen
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located apartment in The Royal Mile Mansions. This 50 apartment building is as central as it gets in Edinburgh. A short stroll to Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile and The Royal Palace.

There is ample sight seeing, bars shops and restaurants on the apartments doorstep, but the double glazed unit keeps the noise out at night!

One king size bed
One double bed
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Elm House - Hillside, Edinburgh City Centre
description:
Our stylish lower ground floor apartment is part of a historic Georgian town house. It has its own main door entrance and a shared outdoor heated patio area.
It is a 10 minute walk from Waverley Railway Station and adjacent to the airport tram link. Situated just off vibrant Leith Walk, it is close to the new St James Quarter and all of the attractions of Edinburgh's Old and New Town.
It is overlooked by the beautiful Calton Hill where you can enjoy fantastic panoramic views of the city.

name: Central Edinburgh Apartment with 3 Beds
description:
* Central location, near Haymarket train station

* Two double bedrooms with additional sofa bed in living room

* Main Edinburgh attractions and transport options within walking distance

* Full access to the apartment

name: King Size Double Bedroom in Central Edinburgh
description:
This is a top-floor flat (sorry, no lift!) which has recently been refurbished, with new kitchen, bathroom, wood flooring etc. The King size room is a double bedroom which can accommodate 2 people

The bed has over 1400 springs which makes for comfort; a mattress topper, a good quality 100% cotton sheet and bed ! This will result in you having a lovely sleep and sweet dreams!

name: Studio with private entrance & direct garden acces
description:
Lovely, spacious private room with double bed, sofa, tv & dvd player also private showeroom. There is a kitchen sink, larder fridge and microwave in the room.
The house is situated approximately 20 minutes on bus to city centre, peaceful quiet location & accomodation.
Close to New Royal Infirmary Hospital, Edinburgh Sick Childrens Hospital and the Kings Buildings, if travelling for work.
Aldi supermarket is a 10 minute walk.

name: The Restalrig Residence Edinburgh City Apartments
description: Newly available for Fringe 2022!

name: Cityscape view room next to Royal Mile
description: Enjoy our welcoming airy room with iconic Old Town cityscape view. Licenced short term let. UK king size bed. Share kitchen & bathroom with mature well-travelled owners. Comfortable relax area. Free wifi. Close to Royal Mile, historic and cultural sights, gardens, viewpoints, restaurants cafes and bars and all transport options (train, tram, buses, hop-on hop-off sightseeing buses). 4th floor (no lift), may not be suitable for those with mobility issues. Help with luggage. 2 nights minimum stay.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming Victorian flat. Room.
description: Room within a charming Victorian flat within the heart of the city.

name: 2 bed,2 bathroom lake view apartment free parking
description: Hidden just behind Easter Rd our stylish apartment has a sunny balcony with lake and park views. Recently decorated we are in a central but quiet location with excellent transport links and only minutes from shops and cafes. Easily walk into the centre of town or down to the fashionable bars and restaurants  in Leith. You can see Arthur's Seat from the apartment meaning wonderful walks In Holyrood Park are only a short stroll away

name: Charming Porteous Studio
description:
This beautiful apartment is right in the centre of Grassmarket , tucked away at the end of the pend , away from all the noise.

Please note if you intend to bring a pet there will be additional £30 fee charged for cleaning

name: Fabulous 2 bed,  2 bath apt. Central Edinburgh
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base. Short walk  to train station, tram lines and all major attractions  including, all restaurants, bars, old Town & Castle.

name: Beautiful, spacious apartment - Excellent location
description:
Welcome to your home away from home! This beautiful, spacious apartment offers a luxurious retreat in a prime location.

Thoughtfully designed with elegant decor and modern comforts, it’s perfect for relaxation after a day of exploring.

Enjoy a stylish, open space with all the amenities you need for a seamless stay. Whether you're here for business or leisure, you'll love the convenience, comfort, and charm of this exceptional getaway.

name: Large Modern 2 Bed - Beside Meadows (Fringe)
description:
Here we have my beautiful home in the centre of Edinburgh!

It has a great balance of new modern alongside old original features.

It’s a bright 2 double bedroom flat on the 4th floor (top, no elevator.

It has a bathroom with separate W.C.
Open plan kitchen/Dining/Living Area with the original stone wall and fireplace reinstated.

This place is a one off in Edinburgh, right beside the meadows and a 2 minute walk to the grass market!

Close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.

name: GuestReady - Castle View Apt
description: This is a fantastic 2-bedroom apartment in Edinburgh with castle views. The apartment is ideal for both families with children or for those travelling alone or with friends. There are two bathrooms so you can give your little ones a bath at the same time as you’re enjoying a shower or a bath yourself.

name: Super 2 bedroom flat next to Edinburgh Castle
description: Edinburgh city centre apartment which sleeps up to 4 adults is situated beside and looking onto Edinburgh Castle.  This first floor apartment has a lounge/dining room, double bedroom, twin bedroom, kitchen and bathroom and the windows of these rooms overlook Johnston Terrace, the Castle and the western skyline.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Solo Female ; Newly decorated, clean safe & quiet.
description: Female only. Bright and airy double room  1 guest. Newly decorated with new carpets. Safe family home.  It's  quiet residential area shared with me & my 2 cats. Upstairs bathroom is modern fully tiled with original Cast Iron bath & downstairs shower room. Back garden for smokers. Free on street safe parking. Appr 20 minutes by bus to Central Edinburgh £2 per trip or upwards of £10 Taxi/Uber. 20 minutes walk to the Royal Botanical Gardens and 5 minutes to Granton Bay. Female guests only please.

name: 2 Bedrooms modern Apartment central Edinburgh
description:
A beautiful decorated light, bright and Spacious two bedroom apartment (With Free Parking) in close proximity Edinburgh city centre / Murrayfield Stadium/Edinburgh College and beach.popular with tourists and locals- great place to stay.
• Fully equipped with everything you may need during your stay. High speed WiFi and 65 inch 4K smart TV with Netflix movies and entertainment

name: Lovely Guest Suite in Central Edinburgh
description:
Beautifully furnished one-bedroom guest suite in a central, but quiet, location and within walking distance of most tourist attractions - also a good bus service is nearby.

The guest suite is a real home from home - comfortable for up to three people. It is part of my home but is a private space. As I live in the same building, I am available if you need help or advice.

PARKING: you MUST let me know if you plan to bring a car BEFORE booking. The available parking won't suit everyone.

name: The Jungle Room | 1870s Boutique Experience
description:
Experience a beautifully designed stay in a historic 1870s Georgian townhouse.

Full of charm, original features and thoughtfully curated global treasures, the Jungle Room tells a story to those who value art, culture, storytelling and meaningful travel.

What makes it unique:

Elegant Architecture
Boutique Interiors & Antiques
Exclusive Local Guide Book
Personal Hospitality
Excellent Location

More than just a place to sleep - every object has a story and every guest adds to the next chapter!

name: Cozy bedroom (very central)
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at my centrally-located flat.
The room can host up to 2 people and you will be sharing the flat with me (and occasionally some family/friends)
A small kitchen and a very spacious living room is available for shared use.
Please note that this is a no-smoke, no-pets and no-party flat.
A bit about me..
I am a young professional with a marked passion for travels and cooking. Originally from Italy, I have lived in many places and I like to share stories with other people.

name: Spacious Ground Floor Flat, Ideal Location
description:
Spacious and lovely 1 bedroom main door flat with free off street parking.

The bus stop is right outside the flat or alternatively it is a 5 minute walking distance to the nearest tram stop. The flat is an ideal base for you to explore the City of Edinburgh (only 15 minutes from Edinburgh Airport and Edinburgh City Centre.

Murrayfield Stadium, Edinburgh Zoo and Public Golf Course are all in walking distance from the flat aswell.

name: Stylish Flat at The Shore
description:
Lovely flat located at The Shore in Leith. The flat sleeps up to 6 guests with 2 spacious double rooms and a hotel quality small double sofa-bed. It is a main door, ground floor flat so no stairs or buzzers. The flat features a new luxury shower room, comfortable beds and open plan kitchen and living-room.
There is Sky TV with Sky Sports and BT Sports.
All the amenities of The Shore and Ocean Terminal are within a 5 minute walk, with the city centre 10 minute bus or tram, or 20 minute walk.

name: Fabulous 3 Bedroom Flat
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. Second Floor property has a Living Kitchen area on a corner plot with full length windows offering panoramic views which leads onto two separate balcony's. The flat comprises of a Master Double Bedroom en-suite, further double bedroom and a single bedroom with a main bathroom. Fully furnished with Fridge Freezer and washer Dryer.
Property situated within minutes reach of local amenities, public walking grounds and bus stop.

name: Lochrin Apartments by Edinburgh City Apartments
description:
Modern and central 1 bedroom apartment.

Please use the “contact” function below BEFORE requesting to book so I can check suitability and availability.

This apartment is generally available for slightly longer stays but may be available short term on occasion eg over summer and we will ensure we are competitively priced compared to others!

name: Royal Mile Charm: Stylish 2BR Flat Near Waverley
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base just a 5-minute walk from Waverley Station. Complete with two bedrooms (1 x double and 1 x king); fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with shower-over-bath and living/dining room, the apartment is a great option for family or friends travelling together. The famous Royal Mile is just seconds away!

name: Old Town Beautiful 2 Bed-room Apartment
description:
This beautiful apartment is located in the heart of Edinburgh’s old town. It is a minutes walk to the Royal Mile and a minutes walk to Edinburgh University.

Built in 1788, this historic location is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.

The apartment is on the 2nd floor in a B listed building. It is 70 square metres. The spacious rooms are complimented by the exuberant mix of colours, eye catching views and double glazed windows.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Victorian Apartment - city centre - free car space
description:
Luxury Victorian Apartment in Central Edinburgh. Peaceful Traffic-Free Street
Stay in the heart of Edinburgh in this luxurious and stylish Victorian city apartment
Combining elegant traditional features with modern luxury

🏛️ Stunning Victorian Architecture High ceilings, original period details, and large sash windows

🛁 Modern Comforts – Fully equipped kitchen, underfloor heating in both bathrooms and stylish contemporary decor

🚗 Free Gated Secure Parking
Fully licensed until December 2027

name: **Females ONLY** Lovely & cosy double bedroom
description:
Central area but quiet double bedroom, 20min walk to the Castle and touristic area, many restaurants around. 8min walk to Haymarket station (2nd largest station), which has many inter-city connecting buses, with a direct link to the airport.

The sleeping furniture is a SOFA BED with 2 stacked mattresses for extra comfort. Soft-medium firmness.

Late check-in is not allowed unless agreed upon.

Registred Host

LATE CHECKOUTS: a fee of one night for ANY late checkout :-)

name: Stunning 1 bedroom home with a view
description:
Sit back and relax in this calm, stylish space in a newly refurbished one double bedroom flat in old town Edinburgh is available for festival let.
- 5 to 10 min walk to high street.
- lounge / kitchen with toilet in fist floor, with stunning view of Arthur seat and Holyrood park.
- upstairs there’s a double bedroom with bathroom.
- council tax and bills included.
- WIFI.
Landlord registration: 383071/230/06481

name: Beautifully renovated flat in Merchiston
description: With this special place, all the important points of contact are close, so planning your stay is easy.

name: Single room in a warm flat room 10 free parking
description:
This apartment is ideal for anyone travelling on a budged. It’s a 4 bedroom apartment with a shared toilet, kitchen and living room. We are close to airport but to city centre is around 30 min by bus, where bus stop is only 4 min walk.

If you are passing by or vising Edinburgh here is a place you can stay. It’s safe and the area offer great travel links to the city centre.

There is also free car par which is very rare in Edinburgh to find. Here in this zone is all day free.

So book it now.

name: Trendy Historic Flat in Edinburgh
description:
This freshly renovated Victorian flat in Leith provides a comfortable base to enjoy all Edinburgh has to offer.

The accommodation is up one flight of stairs and situated above a nice pub. It consists of 2 double bedrooms, open plan kitchen/living area.

Located in the vibrant Leith area of the city, with independent shops, cafes and restaurants on the doorstep and easy access to transport links

name: Eyrie on Edinburgh seafront
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.
This is a penthouse with wonderful views overlooking the sea and the docks. You can see the Royal Yacht from its windows which flood the lounge with light. It is very quiet despite the fact that it is set on the harbour and its attractions.
It has very easy access via tram and bus to the centre of the ancient city. Car parking is available on site should you wish to drive.
Pedestrian footpaths and cycle ways also link you to the town centre.

name: Double bedroom in family home
description:
Double bedroom in family home with shared bathroom.

Quiet street in the picturesque South Queensferry. Great base for exploring Edinburgh and the Highlands.

3-min walk to bus stop (30 mins to city), 15-min walk to train station (15 mins to Waverley), and 14-min walk to 24/7 airport bus (15 mins to airport).

Town centre with views, cafés, and restaurants 10 mins away.

Tesco 5 mins walk, small shop and takeaway 2 mins.

On-street parking, bike storage, and friendly local tips available.

name: Luxury 2 bedroom apartment just off Princes Street
description: This lovely 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment has the benefit of a private walled garden, yet is just a one minute walk from Princes Street.

name: Spacious 2BR Old Town Apt - Next to Castle!
description:
This spacious apartment is in a central location on the door step of Edinburgh Castle with views of both the Grassmarket & Arthur Seat and great for those who wish to explore the City.

The apartment is fully furnished and equipped with comfortable double beds, smart TV, kitchen, and bathroom.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Comfortable Home in Central Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to your ideal base for exploring central Edinburgh.
- Comfortable home in the heart of the New Town
- 1 minute walk from George Street
- Bedrooms with King sized beds and fitted wardrobes
- Main bedroom with en-suite shower room
- Family bathroom with shower and bath
- Open plan living room/diner leading to a newly finished kitchen
- Perfect for a social stay

name: Beautiful one bed apartment in stylish Stockbridge
description:
Great apartment in Edinburgh, situated in the heart of Stockbridge famed for its many pubs, restaurants, cafes and market, with the city a short stroll away through impressive Georgian streets. The apartment is large and bright, full of traditional features with everything you need for your stay, including a spacious kitchen/dining area, bathroom, restful double bedroom, and comfortable lounge.
Body care products and fresh towels and linens provided for your comfort.

name: Dean Village 1 bed flat with river views
description:
The apartment is located in Well Court the most iconic building in Dean Village.
Looking onto the Water of Leith the apartment feels peaceful and tranquil.

The location is very well situated for exploring the city. Only five minutes from Princess Street and the West End.
Also a short walk, the beautiful Water of Leith walkway takes you from Dean Village to Stockbridge where there are many good restaurants, bars and cafes or up the river to the modern gallery of art and beyond.

name: Family Apartment At Fountain Park
description:
Welcome to our cozy flat which is located next to Edinburgh City Centre.

It was a one bedroom flat however we have converted the place into a two bedrooms. One bedroom has a loft you may use as a small office or play area, downstairs is a double bed and a single bed which is amazing for families with kids!

The other bedroom has just one super king size bed - perfect for couples!

We then have a seperated bathroom, toilet and kitchen which comes equipped.

name: Bright 2-bedroom terrace house with fire pit
description: King sized bedroom in a semi detached house. 15 min walk to the sea. It has great transport links with many bus routes (4min walk to the bus stop) taking you straight to the city centre in 15min including night busses. You will have access to free on street parking spaces, use of the full house including power shower, fully equipped kitchen, wifi and television, terrace area with the fire pit. Friendly cat Michael lives here too.  Any questions please message!

name: Secrète Morningside
description: Welcome to our home, where you will find peace, comfort, privacy and access to many shared spaces, garden, conservatory, sitting room with a piano and we love to hear the sound of music so you are welcome to play ! Easy access the town center,  many wonderful open green spaces, the wild Pentlands hills and the beautiful beaches of East Lothian.

name: Home in Edinburgh
description:
Relax at this unique and tranquil getaway. A lovely 1 bed apartment annexe attached to our family home, with it's own private front door in a peaceful residential area. We are on the East side of the city with lovely views across the Firth of Forth and of Arthurs Seat. Portobello beach is just a 10 minute walk away & City Centre is a short bus ride away. There are excellent restaurant/bar, shopping and leisure facilities a short walk/drive away.
Perfect for a little City Get away or for work!

name: One double bedroom in perfectly placed shared flat
description: Welcome to my home in Edinburgh. A three bedroom, 4th floor flat with lift. Glorious views over the Forth to North Berwick. A large living room, small balcony, kitchen and bathroom with wi-fi in all rooms. A ten minute bus ride to the City Centre and a short twenty minute walk across Holy Rood Park to The Royal Mile. Close to town but in a very quiet location. I do have a second bedroom available for friends/family travelling together, contact me and I can make a special offer for two rooms.

name: The Zen Forest - spacious private bathroom
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious, sunny and serene space - the Zen Forest on top floor of upper colony townhouse. Wake up under the beautiful Mural of the Trossachs forest, smart art TV, desk and en-suite with full size bath and separate shower. Plenty of floor space to exercise / yoga.

I live with my cute dog co-host Indigo - she loves meeting all of the guests!

Note: Currently looking for a live in part time cleaner / dog walker if anyone is looking for something more long term

name: Hopetoun Apartment with free parking
description: Beautifully presented two bedroom apartment on the ground floor of a modern block of flats located on the fringe of the New Town. Safe and peaceful location with easy access to and from the city centre of Edinburgh. **Free residential parking.** Two comfortable bedrooms, two bathrooms and a fully-equipped kitchen. Tastefully decorated, bright and spacious. Hop on the tram! The flat is very close to the tram stop so SUPER convenient for getting into / from city centre & Edinburgh airport as well!

name: Perfect flat in Edinburgh
description:
Well equipped and quiet and centrally-located flat.
Attractive ground floor flat with no flights of stairs needed for access it enjoys a nice and quiet position towards the rear of the building.

Gas central heating, brand new windows ( a must have for Edinburgh winters!) and all the modern necessities.

Fast and reliable internet.

Polwarth has become an extremely sought after residential by the Union Canal providing access to a wide range of amenities.
Close to universities.

name: 1 Bedroom Flat in Historic Cooperage Apartments
description:
My flat is a charismatic one bedroom flat in 18th century converted bonded whiskey warehouse building on The Shore in Leith.

The shore is a real gastronomic destination two Michelin star restaurants and is well connected the city centre with the new tram system The flat has private parking, is second floor with an elevator, instant hot water, Netflix, free Wifi and polished wooden flooring

Flat has off street parking and security entry

name: Bright and unique 2 bedroom flat on Leith Shore.
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to Edinburgh from this centrally located place. The flat is very close to trendy Leith Shore which is full of restaurants and bars. Great access to rest of city via gorgeous Water of Leith walkway and handy bus routes. We are also close to the airlink bus stop to the airport. Pets welcome. We have a Labrador who lives with us when not renting. We hope you enjoy our property.

name: The Lookout view - spacious private bathroom
description:
A self contained ensuite in on the top floor of a beautiful colony townhouse in East Edinburgh with lovely views.

Large room with a double bed, large sofa, table, smart TV, kettle, wardrobe and full large bathroom with towel rail.

Perfect for those looking for a large self contained space that’s a quiet retreat from the busy / noisy centre but still within easy reach.

Note: Currently looking for a live in part time cleaner / dog walker if anyone is looking for something more long term

name: Cosy 1 bedroom flat close to city centre
description:
The apartment is under new management (March 2023).

We are happy to offer a unique place located in the heart of Leith. It is located around 15 minutes walking distance from Princess Street and Waverly train station. With fantastic public transport connections, lots of shops, bars and restaurants 5 min away from the flat.

name: Comfortable single room with small double bed
description:
Comfortable single room with good quality pocket sprung small double bed, table and chair in freshly renovated flat 30 metres from Holyrood Park.

I spent 6 months and £50,000 stripping this flat back to bare walls and floors and completely renovating it. This included complete redecoration, a new bathroom, new shower room, and refreshed kitchen and WC.

Decent wifi (108Mb), Samsung smart TV, USB-A and USB-C charging point and a short walk from the city centre through historic Holyrood Park.

name: Comfortable small double room close to the centre
description:
Comfortable single room with good quality pocket sprung small double bed, window seat, table and chair just 30 metres from Holyrood Park.

The boiler (water heater) disturbed 4 guests in 2 years so I had it encased in a 50kg sound proofed cabinet and it's inaudible now. Maximum noise level is 24dB which is equivalent to someone breathing 1m away.

Decent wifi (108Mb), Samsung smart TV, USB-A and C charging points and a short walk from the city centre through historic Holyrood Park.

name: Cosy 2-bedroom house in Leith
description:
Enjoy your visit to Edinburgh in our cozy and peaceful house with a private patio in the heart of Leith.
There are plenty of amenities nearby with the Ocean Terminal at 2 minutes walking distance and with less than 10 minutes walk to the popular Shore area.

The house has direct connection to the airport and the city center and there is free on street parking available.

STL License no: EH-70858-F

name: The Moon room  - in a peaceful beautiful townhouse
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space, under the Moon Mural on a rising night sky.

Perfect for those looking for a quiet retreat from the busy / noisy centre that’s still within easy reach.

I live with my cute dog co-host Indigo - she loves meeting all of the guests!

You will share the downstairs bathroom with the guest across the hall in the Sunroom.

Note: Currently looking for a live in part time cleaner / dog walker if anyone is looking for something more long term

name: 3 Bedroom Mews + Garage - West End
description:
The ‘Hyde-Out’ Edinburgh is a 3 double bedroom Mews nestled in a quiet corner of Dean Village. This charming property is your home away from home and has been fully renovated with stylish interiors and everything a family, couple or group of friends could need to enjoy the space - you won't be disappointed!

The central location allows you to explore all Edinburgh has to offer and the property itself benefits from a large secure garage - a rare find in the city!

We hope to welcome you soon.

name: Gorgeous Apartment near Edinburgh Castle
description:
✔ Beautiful flat conveniently located in Haymarket
✔ 3 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ Free parking available
✔ 11-minute walk to Fountain Park
✔ 15-minute walk to Dean Village
✔ 16-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 5-minute walk to Haymarket train station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Spacious  double room close to the city centre
description:
Spacious, comfortable double room with good quality pocket sprung double bed, table and chairs in freshly renovated flat 30m from Holyrood Park.

I recently spent 6 months and £50,000 stripping this flat back to bare walls and completely renovating it. This included complete redecoration, a new bathroom, new shower room, and refreshed kitchen and WC.

Decent wifi (108Mb), Samsung smart TV, USB-A and USB-C charging point and a short walk from the city centre through historic Holyrood Park.

name: Sunny and spacious room on Leith Walk
description: This flat is sunny and spacious in a great location on Leith Walk.

name: Bright, spacious & central room w private bathroom
description:
Spacious and bright room with private ensuite bathroom, 5,000 spring pocket sprung king-size bed, and table and chairs on the mezzanine looking out onto the world. A really nice space from which to enjoy Edinburgh.

This is a new room in a recently renovated flat that I remodelled, decorated and added an ensuite bathroom to.

Decent wifi (108Mb), Samsung smart TV, USB-A and USB-C charging points and a short walk from the city centre through historic Holyrood Park.

name: Stylish 2bed apartment underneath Edinburgh castle
description:
Hey! Are you looking for a beautiful, safe, clean and affordable accommodation styled to your taste and needs?

Great! WHERE TO STAY APPARTMENTS is just like it! Business travels, family trips, holiday stays, Relocation, long-term and short-term stays, We cover all this plus we always aim to deliver the best experience to our lovely guests! Check us out and book a stay with us!

name: Broughton Pl - Beautiful New Town Garden Flat
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space in the centre of Edinburgh with it's own patio and garden to the rear. A rare find in the heart of the city. Perfect for couples, solo travellers, and business people alike

name: Double room in beautiful listed community building
description:
Cosy double room in a beautiful listed community building in a peaceful residential street in Central Edinburgh. The Centre is home to long term resident and hosts spiritual, creative and therapeutic events, which can at times be lively. We ask people only to book if they can be respectful of the Centre's ethos of tolerance and inclusivity.

Please read the full description, and note that the staff team are all part time and it may take some time to respond to your enquiry.

name: Quiet double room in heart of Leith.
description:
Cosy and quiet room in a spacious and stylish flat. The property is located in the heart of the popular Leith area, under 5 minutes from a tram stop. Leith is packed with a fantastic range of restaurants, bars and coffee shops. The city centre is a short bus or tram ride or a 25 minute walk away.

Unfortunately I can't offer bag drop or early/late check out.

name: GuestReady - Amazing apt near The Meadows
description: Located in a traditional Edinburgh building near Bruntsfield, this bright and beautiful two-bedroom Bruntsfield apartment is fully furnished and equipped with all the essentials you need for a pleasant stay. It can accommodate up to 4 guests, making it ideal for couples and small families. Haymarket station is just an 18-mins walk, so guests will be able to explore the city with ease.

name: 4 bed mews house in prettiest street in Edinburgh
description:
This gorgeous Georgian stone mews house with garage is on Edinburgh's most picturesque street, Circus Lane, right in the heart of trendy New Town/Stockbridge, just a quarter mile walk to the centre of town.


If you tire from the hustle and bustle of Edinburgh's many festivals and attractions, have a sip at the cafes/bars of Stockbridge or take a stroll by the Water of Leith and relax in the wide open surroundings of Inverleith Park or the floral majesty of the Royal Botanic Garden.

name: GuestReady - Historic Edinburgh Old Town Apartment
description: This fantastic two-bedroom apartment is situated on the second floor in a classic 18th Century tenement building next to St. Giles Cathedral in Central Edinburgh. It is perfect for small families or friends looking to stay in the city's historical heart! Easy walking distance from The Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, the National Museum and other historical monuments and attractions!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh Sea View loft apartment
description:
Wake up to breathtaking views over the sea in this 2-bedroom bright and sunny loft apartment next to Portobello beach. Perfect for a relaxing escape with the convenience of Edinburgh's attractions a short journey away. The property is beautifully decorated and fully equipped with all the essentials you will need to have a wonderful stay in Edinburgh. With the addition of a large roof terrace to enjoy the spectacular sea views.
Excellent transport links & free unrestricted on street parking.

name: Stylish, cosy & comfy 2 bed!  Great location!
description:
Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place.
My two bedroom family home is in a super location with great transport links. 15 minutes by bus from the city centre and 20mins drive from the airport.
As well as close to lovely seaside walks, great parks & the Botanical Gardens.
The house is comfortable and stylish with a private garden and all amenities you will need.
Please note, it has 1 king size bed and 2 single beds.
Ideal for a couple or small family.

name: 2BR Modern Mews Apartment - New Town
description:
This delightful modern mews apartment is found off-the-beaten-track, nestled in a quiet development in Edinburgh's New Town.

Inside, guests will find two double bedrooms with built-in wardrobed, bathroom with shower-over-bath, fully-equipped kitchen with Lamona appliances, and a spacious living/dining room complete with comfy seating and a 43-inch HD Smart TV.

It's a 20-minute walk from Edinburgh Castle, and just 5mins to Broughton Street's best pubs, restaurants & coffee shops.

name: Cosy private room close to Holyrood Park.
description:
Ideal location between Old Town, Leith, and Portobello, this cosy double bedroom is perfect for exploring Edinburgh. Bus and transport links 5 minute walk from the flat will take you straight into town (20 mins) or through the quaint high street of Portobello (5-10mins). Only a 15 min walk to Holyrood Park or the beach to explore some outdoors and nature trails in Edinburgh. Ample on-street parking.

Should you require a car during your stay, we also have a car for hire on Turo. Please enquire!

name: Lovely 4 Bedroom residence in New Town
description:
This spacious apartment in the enviable location in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town is a perfect example of the Georgian architecture meets contemporary living.
The residence boasts 4 large bedrooms, two ensuite and a family bathroom, well equipped kitchen and spacious dining living room. Located within a stones throw of Princes' Street with shopping, rail and airport links, and easy walking distance to world-famous sights like Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace and the Royal Mile.

name: Viewforth Quarters
description: Enjoy your stay in Edinburgh at my cosy and comfortable apartment in the centre of the City. The modern space provides a contemporary and relaxing home for visitors with excellent access to bus and tram routes, city centre attractions, cafes, bars and restaurants. The Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, Princess Street Gardens, the Grand Canal and Edinburgh International Convention Centre are all within walking distance and there is an array of local amenities in the immediate vicinity.

name: Large City Apartment with Parking in a quiet area
description:
Unique 3 bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh, close to restaurants, pubs and a short walk to a great view of the Castle. The area is part of the Historic World Heritage site.

All bookings after the 1st of October 2023 are subject to licensing and planning permission as per guidance on AirBnB.

name: Stunning Apartment in Royal Mile
description:
✔ Beautiful and romantic apartment in a prime location on the Royal Mile
✔ A mere stone's throw away from Edinburgh Castle
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Essentially fitted kitchen
✔ Next to The Writers' Museum
✔ 2-minute walk to St Giles
✔ The National Museum of Scotland is a 5-minute walk
✔ 9-minute walk will take you to Scott Monument
✔ 2-minute walk to Victoria Street bus stop
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy number 19 with private parking for three cars
description:
Number 19 is a beautiful homely three bedroom main door apartment with parking for up to three cars.
The apartment is located in a quiet street within close walking distance of the city centre.
This apartment is perfectly suited to people who wish to have access to everything the city centre has to offer but wish to be away from the noise and have a relaxing time when home.
There is a security deposit of £500 that must be authorised on check in.

name: Large double room near University Campus / Fringe
description:
Large room overlooking The Meadows with easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

Lonsdale Terrace is a short walk through The Meadows to Bristo Square which is the epicentre of the Fringe. Major venues including Underbelly, Pleasance, Gilded Balloon and Assembly are all located in this area. Consequently this flat is the ideal base from which to enjoy the festival.

name: Huge room on Meadows near University and Fringe
description:
Huge room overlooking The Meadows with easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

Lonsdale Terrace is a short walk through The Meadows to Bristo Square which is the epicentre of the Fringe. Major venues including Underbelly, Pleasance, Gilded Balloon and Assembly are all located in this area. Consequently this flat is the ideal base from which to enjoy the festival.

name: Nice room on Meadows near University and Fringe
description:
Single room in flat next to The Meadows with easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

Lonsdale Terrace is a short walk through The Meadows to Bristo Square which is the epicentre of the Fringe. Major venues including Underbelly, Pleasance, Gilded Balloon and Assembly are all located in this area. Consequently this flat is the ideal base from which to enjoy the festival.

Significant discounts available for longer stays.

name: Cosy single room in modern family home+breakfast
description:
We have a single downstairs bedroom in our family home. We are situated close to the local hospital and main shopping complex with lots of nice restaurants and shops
We are a 2 minute walk to the local bus stop which takes you straight into the city centre within 20 minutes. We also have a bus that takes you straight to and from Edinburgh Airport.
We aim for guests to feel comfortable, relaxed and at home when staying with us.

name: Chic Royal Mile Flat
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located 3rd floor apartment with lift. Located in the Old Town of Edinburgh.
Furnished to luxurious standards, with high ceilings and a contemporary style where you can enjoy amazing views of the Old Town. Check out our guide for city tips on our profile page! New fast hyperoptic wifi is also now installed at the flat.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming Patio Flat on Quiet Stockbridge Street
description: The flat is in a quiet sought after cobbled street facing the river the Water of Leith in Stockbridge.  The beautifully presented flat is on the lower ground floor and has a shared front South facing courtyard.  It is a 2 minute walk to Stockbridge market and the shops.

name: Amazing Castle View Apartment
description:
Centrally located right in the heart of the city is this stylish top-floor apt in vibrant New Town with stunning, uninterrupted views of Edinburgh Castle and the charming New Town neighborhood.

The apt offers chic, stylish décor with open, sun-filled living, a fully equipped kitchen, a modern bathroom, and two beautiful bedrooms.

Stay just steps from the vibrant George and Rose Streets lined with restaurants, bars, and cafes and only a 15 min walk to The Royal Mile, the Castle, and Holyrood.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely 2 bedroom Apartment with glimpse of castle
description:
Unwind at this Stunning first floor flat. The flat is built with hard wood flooring, high ceilings and antique details for a luxurious yet charming feel. The apartment is located in the heart of the city within walking distance to all the local attractions (10 minute walk to Edinburgh Castle, 6 Minutes walk to Grassmarket,10 Minutes walk to the Old Town , this only to mention a few).
You will not be short of Cafe's, Pubs and Restaurants to choose from as they are right on the doorstep.

name: Immaculate one bedroom flat in the city centre
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Off Royal Mile Edinburgh, lovely 2 bedroom flat
description: This apartment  is in a very central and safe location in Old Fishmarket by St Giles. 5 mins walk to top attractions such as the National Museum of Scotland, Festival Theatre, the Castle. Waverley Station is 10 minutes walk. The Meadows and to George Street and the Newtown beyond are easy to reach. Very suitable for sightseers, old and young. Not a party flat but my second home when working in Edinburgh and so it is not a hotel style offering but I am sure you will love it. New kitchen for 2025.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Welcoming&Homely apartment near City central
description:
Very comfortable and Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment located on oxford street in the popular Newington of Edinburgh’s most regarded residential streets!
The flat is surrounding with numerous cafes, pubs. Shop and restaurant .in the heart of the atmospheric and historical old town of Edinburgh (royal mile)with a mere 15 to 20minutes walk to Edinburgh Waverley train station, Edinburgh castle. National gallery.national museum of Scotland and all main tourists.

name: Solo Female  Safe quiet newly decorated  Edinburgh
description: Bright & airy newly decorated re-carpeted single room in Family home 20 mins from City Centre. The single room has ample storage and an extremely comfortable bed. The area is safe and quiet. There is free on street parking and guests can sit in my well maintained back garden. A fully tiled upstairs bathroom with cast iron bath and a shower room on the ground floor. Please be aware that I share the house with 2 cats and accept bookings from Female guests only, ideal for solo travellers'

name: Lovely flat in Leith
description:
Hi, we're a young couple renting out our entire flat in lovely Leith. The flat is close to the beautiful shore, and only a 5 minute walk to ocean terminal, the farmers market and the Britannia. It's just a 20m bus to the center, with the bus stop just outside your door! One bright and spacious double bedroom for 1-2 people. We are happy to accommodate to any specific needs so please feel free to send a message beforehand :)

*Please note this flat is on the 4th floor.

name: EICC/West End Townhouse with Parking
description:
A stylish family townhouse in Central Edinburgh. Just minutes from Haymarket Station, Princess Street and the Edinburgh International Exhibition Centre.

Private secure parking on the edge of the new Low Emissions Zone.

name: Cosy 2 bedroom Edinburgh flat close to city centre
description:
Looking for a home away from home during your stay in one of the best capital cities in the world, Edinburgh? Look no further.

This lovely 2-bedroom apartment is bright and peaceful. There are direct bus links into the heart of the city. Princes Street is only 12 minutes on the bus with the bus stop just around the corner. Inverleith Avenue boasts and array of cafes and restaurants. The Royal Botanic Gardens and fashionable Stockbridge is a 25min beautiful walk along the canal.

name: Modern flat in Leith, Edinburgh
description:
Surround yourself with style in this standout space. Enjoy breakfast on the balcony with a view of Arthur’s Seat.
Situated in the lively and culturally diverse Leith area of Edinburgh and a short walk or bus ride to Edinburgh’s city centre.

name: Central Bright 3 Bed Flat. Balcony&Secure Parking
description: My beautiful, light, bright flat has recently been renovated to a high standard and will provide you with a comfortable and relaxing base for your trip to Edinburgh. It takes less than 8 minutes to walk to the flat from Haymarket Train Station and Tram Stop; the tram will take you to and from the airport, and into town if your legs are too tired for the 15-20 minute walk! There are also lots of buses available close by.

name: Forthview, Hidden gem
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. 4 bedrooms 2 doubles, 1 twin and 1 single. Family bathroom and shower/toilet room. With parking for up to 3 vehicles. Outside patio and garden. Lovely cosy Also offers highly flexible living very close to city Centre and Murrayfield

name: 1 bedroom flat
description:
Note: Edinburgh is introducing a 5% tourist tax in 2026. Daily rates from the 24th July 2026 include the tourist tax.
Modern flat with off street parking. Within walking distance of the Castle and tourist sites. Close to several restaurants, cafes and bus stops with services to the airport, stations and tourist sites. There is ready access to attractions outside the city e.g. Glasgow, the Forth Bridge and the highlands.

Licence No. 67987 - R.

name: Lovely 2 BDR apartment in Dalry / near Haymarket
description:
Spacious 2 bedroom ground floor apartment is perfect location for traveler. Located within walking distance of Haymarket train station, tram, buses, pubs, restaurants, tourist attractions, and shopping centers.

2 bedrooms, a living room, 2 bathrooms (1 shared bathroom and an ensuite for bedroom 1), and a fully equipped kitchen.

The living room is spacious with two comfortable sofas, a TV, and a dining table. It is a perfect space to relax after taking in all the wonderful things in Edinburgh

name: Modern Edinburgh studio
description: Unique studio apartment, modern design, perfect as a base to explore the vibrant neighbourhood of Morningside with easy bus access to the city centre.

name: Guest Favourite Main Door City APT w/ fast Wi-Fi
description: All 5 star reviews in 2024.  Our home is one of the few 'Airbnb Guest Favourite' listings in the area, recognised by guests on their ratings, reviews and reliability :-).  We do not use an Airbnb Property Manager and have been Self-Managing the apartment since 2024.  This helps us to reduce your room rate by up to 20%.

name: Stunning Loft Apartment on High St - Bridge Views
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space on South Queensferry High Street. This main door property offers stunning views over the Forth and the iconic bridges.

The first and second floors of a beautifully renovated 300-year-old building, the apartment features an open-plan kitchen and living room, separated by modern glass balustrades. It is located next to the beach and a variety of local shops, cafes, and restaurants. Enjoy a perfect blend of comfort and history in this unique setting.

name: Magnificent Georgian 3-BR Apartment in New Town
description: Enjoy a very warm welcome to our Albyn Place apartment - a stunning and recently refurbished Georgian drawing room apartment in the heart of the New Town. This is a very safe location that offers super quick access to all the Edinburgh's tourist attractions, it is 5-10 minutes' walk away from Princes Street. This unique and beautifully presented place is perfect for visitors looking for a stylish experience. We hope you will have a wonderfully memorable time!

name: Lovely 2 Bedroom flat Near Edinburgh Airport
description:
✪ South Gyle Apartment near to Edinburgh Airport, sleeps up to 4 guests ✪ Perfect for Couples, Family, Friends and City Breaks ✪

✪ Spacious Lounge
✪ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✪ 1 Double Bed
✪ 1 Super king
✪ Fresh Linen & Towels
✪ Professionally Cleaned
✪ Complimentary Wi-Fi and on-site Parking
✪ 43" Smart TV, Netflix (account needed)

name: Modern 2 bed apartment with stunning seaside view
description:
Modern 2 bed apartment with stunning views overlooking Firth of Forth, walking distance to the Newhaven harbour, lighthouse and the best fish and chips in town at the Fish Market.
Easy access to public transport, 3.5 miles to city centre and other local attractions

name: 1-bedroom flat in Leith
description:
Welcome to my 1-bedroom flat in Leith!

This is a cosy, stylish and recently redecorated 1 bedroom flat that is perfect for a visit to Edinburgh. Away from the hussle and bussle of the city centre, yet in the heart of Leith, you'll love it here with all my plants!

You'll be a 20 seconds walk from the local river and a 7 minute walk from the stylish Shore docks/canal and Ocean Terminal. Quick transport links to the city centre including the brand new tram system.

name: Roseburn Apartment, Edinburgh. Free Parking
description: Modern 2 bedroom flat (1 en suite) in Roseburn, Edinburgh. Walking distance from city centre and local amenities. FREE PARKING

name: Comfy one bedroom annexe adjoining owners' home
description:
Located in attractive Juniper Green, this comfy annexe adjoining the owners’ home is conveniently five miles from the city centre.
Juniper Green is served by a range of local shops including hairdressers, deli, supermarket, takeaways and a real ale pub serving food. Regular bus services run day and night from outside the house into Edinburgh. Recreational access to the Water of Leith cycle and walkway into Edinburgh, local parks and the Pentland Hills.

name: The Newington Residence
description: Situated in the heart of Newington, a vibrant area of the city, with a relaxed and charming feel… The Newington Residence boasts one of the best locations in Edinburgh. The perfect spot for any discerning traveller, this apartment has it all.

name: Luxury king size room
description: 1950s property. With forest at the back with wildlife and deer .

name: Lovely City Home (Free Parking) (15mins to centre)
description:
Lovely 3 bedroom bungalow.
Fully equipped.

Two double bedrooms.
One single bedroom.

Free premise parking.

Great location very near the hospital, golf courses nearby.

15 minute bus ride into the Heart of the City.

Bus stop within 1 minute walk.
Immaculate home.
Free Superfast broadband

In quiet neighbourhood

name: Lovely 1-bedroom flat in Stockbridge
description: Enjoy a newly decorated apartment in a great central location.

name: Main Door  1 bedroom apartment Leith Tram Station
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish one-bedroom apartment, just 3 tram stops from the city centre. Newly refurbished, this serene and cosy space is ideal for unwinding after a day of exploring.

Step inside your main door apartment, which opens directly into a bright open-plan lounge and kitchen—your space to unwind or prepare a meal. At the rear of the property, you’ll find a quiet bedroom and a sleek shower room, offering a peaceful escape for rest and rejuvenation.

name: Main door 1  bedroom apartment Leith Tram Station
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

Our newly refurbished one bedroom apartment is a calm and cosy space, perfect for chilling out after a day of sightseeing.

We offer a main door apartment which opens directly into the open plan lounge and kitchen. Our quiet bedroom and stylish bathroom are located to the rear of the property.

name: At The Top with City Views
description:
Located on the top floor, this beautiful, spacious two-bedroom apartment is in the heart of the Old Town of Edinburgh. It is close to the city's top attractions including Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, art galleries and museums, & an abundance of restaurants, cafes, and bars. It is well-furnished & has iconic views of Edinburgh & beyond to Fife and East Lothian. Edinburgh Waverley train station, & the tram stop for the airport, are just 5-minutes away.
NB: This property does not have a lift.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Grassmarket Secret Getaway Fringe Apartment
description:
This cozy traditional old town flat, recently renovated offers a beautiful & bright accommodation in a period building. Located seconds away from Edinburgh's pulse, the Grassmarket and Old Town. Step outside and be greeted by a view of imposing Edinburgh Castle and the historic Old Town. Stroll up the famous curving Victoria Street with its colourful facades up to the historic Royal Mile.

Be surrounded by cozy cafes, delightful restaurants and boutique shops. This is the centre of the action!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: City Centre 2 Bedroom Main Door Flat
description:
This apartment is a lovely home with a private entrance, close to the Edinburgh Playhouse and Charlton Hill, and only a 20 min walk to Princes Street and Waverly Station. Many lovely cafes, shops, restaurants, and bus stops are within only a short walk from the apartment.

It's perfect for group/family trips, workcations, contractors & professionals for up to 4 people.

name: GrassMarket City Centre APT with Free Parking
description: This freshly renovated flat located right next to Grass Market offers unique experience of most iconic Edinburgh' landmarks within walking distance and free parking. If you are looking for comfortable and quiet stay in HEART of Edinburgh, this is the place for you.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Castle Oasis in the City Center with Garden view
description: Freshly renovated garden floor Grassmarket apartment is at the heart of Edinburgh historic Old Town. The apartment has a big garden visible from the living room windows, this garden is hidden gem with views of the castle and lush green garden. Please note, although the apartment is on the ground floor, the building is on the stairs leading to the castle. The location Castle Wynd South is stairway leading from Grassmarket to the castle, placed at the first landing from Grassmarket.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy and modern flat in Merchiston
description:
Lovely recently renovated one-bedroom flat located in a green and quiet area in walking distance to the city centre.

The perfect choice if you want to explore Edinburgh or have a staycation while working remotely.

name: Large bedroom, close to Airport and City Centre
description:
This fully refurbished stylish place is close to must-see destinations. 5min journey to City Centre.
Located at West Edinburgh, it's very close to the Zoo, Murrayfield Stadium and the Edinburgh Airport.
The tram is only 8min walk. It comes every 7min and can take you to City Centre, to Leith area and to the Airport.
The room has king size bed and is ideal for couples and professionals. The house can offer breakfast, coffee and tea.
Free parking on street.
No pets please.
No smoking in house.

name: Delightful 2 bedroom central location home
description: You will be situated close to fountainpark central south of the city centre. You will be close to coffee shops, shops, parks for dog walkers and playgrounds for children. Beautiful canal walk into town and on the major bus route that takes 15 minutes to reach the city centre.

name: Very Central, Princes St, near the Castle
description: A charming 2 bedroom quiet Mews apartment in the centre of Edinburgh. Stroll over a cobbled roadway past garages which once stabled horses, and you are in Charlotte Square with Princes St to the right. Within 10 minutes you can be at the Castle steps, theatres and art galleries. There are many cafes and restaurants at your doorstep. Great travel links from the airport and train stations, with bus and tram lines close by. Perfect accommodation for the Edinburgh Festival, Christmas and New Year.

name: Spacious 1-bed flat with parking
description: This beautifully appointed 1 bedroom apartment is situated in the converted distillery, with its trade mark tall chimney, which forms the heart of the stylish Caledonian Village development at Haymarket.

name: Double room en-suite (room 6)
description:
18 Craigmillar Park is a Victorian town house nestling in the exclusive suburb of Newington situated on the Southside of Edinburgh in walking distance
from the city centre. The property has been beautifully restored and tastefully decorated offering comfortable surroundings for work or pleasure. All rooms have Wifi, internet smart TV, complimentary toiletries, tea and coffee making facilities.

name: Bright modern 1 bedroom flat in central Edinburgh
description: This stunning apartment has been recently renovated. You can walk into town in 10/15 minutes or get a bus outside and be there in 5 minutes! Enjoy an Emma memory mattress on the kingsize bed. There is a dedicated workspace and desk. The apartment has a dishwasher, induction hob and full size fridge and freezer. The apartment is south facing so it’s sunny even in winter, it’s very quiet too! There is paid parking behind the flat for £1 an hour.

name: Lovely 3 bedroom apartment with private garden
description:
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun. Our spacious basement apartment offers 3 bedrooms, lounge & separate family kitchen as well as a private garden

Our cosy lounge offers a comfortable corner sofa/sofa bed for six, smart TV and warming feature fire place

Bedroom 1 has a double bed, smart TV & ensuite shower room

Bedroom 2 has a double bed, sofa bed & smart TV

Bedroom 3 has single bunk beds & smart TV

There is a separate family bathroom with shower & bath.

name: Cheerful Stays: Jamson Pl 2BR Apartment in Leith
description:
A Bright modern flat in the vibrant area of Leith. My flat is situated at the foot of Leith Walk. Leith is famous for its community feeling and openness and has a diverse range of pubs, cafes and restaurants along the entire strip. The scenic Shore area is a ten 10 minute walk away and public transport can bring you to the centre in 15 minutes as well as directly to the airport and train stations
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.

name: Budget Apartment near Hollyrood Palace
description:
Private main door, ground floor 1 bedroom apartment near Holyrood Palace and Arthur's seat.

A quiet residential area well served with local amenities such as supermarkets, restaurants, cafes and pubs.

You will be in the City Centre in a prime location, only a short walk to The Royal Mile. Holyrood Palace, and Edinburgh Castle. Easy to get to and from the airport, bus station, and train station.

Maximum 2 guests. Minimum 3 night stay.

It's super central with a nice garden in a beautiful old house.
It is in the local colonies, all green and quiet. It is a main door flat.

It offers a comfortable space to relax and unwind after a day out in the city. With lots of restaurants, cafes and bars on its doorstep, you are spoilt for choice. Walking, its 25 mins from Waverley train,3 mins to Holyrood Park, Arthur's Seat, the Palace of Holyrood, and Royal Mile,  are 15 minute. description:
Super room with comfortable bed in quiet room. Large table/work station convenient for working.

The modern shower is shared with double room on same floor. Please note, the shower cabinet is a little smaller than standard so if you are heavily built or over 6ft 3 ins this may be unsuitable.

Free on street parking. If you have a car, quite near BLackness Castle where Outlander was filmed.

Free light breakfast each day.

There is no TV in the bedroom but strong WiFi.

name: Craigey Beach Home
description: Bring your friends & family to our lovely spacious immaculate clean modern property with outdoor discreet living space in garden seating/dinning area which is close to beach & local amenities approximately 5 minute drive in car.

name: Slateford House 1770 - The Prince's Parlour - 2 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Luxury with a Story

Slateford House 1770 is more than a place to stay; it’s a piece of Edinburgh’s past. Bonnie Prince Charlie was handed the keys to the capital here, and now, after a careful restoration by The House of Danu, you can collect your keys to a luxury stay.

At Slateford House 1770, we combine original features, bold design, striking bathrooms, and modern luxury.

It is the Perfect base for exploring Edinburgh and being part of keeping Scottish history alive.

name: Cozy Room in a Peaceful Edinburgh Neighbourhood
description:
Room is located on the first floor of a private entrance in a quiet and peaceful neighbourhood. There is fresh bedding in the room with a mattress topper to ensure a comfortable night sleep.

The room boasts a view of Edinburgh Zoo. Pentland hills (perfect for hiking and skiing) can also be seen from the shared living room and shared kitchen.

The place is 9 mins walk to the tram, which you can get to Edinburgh city centre and the airport in < 19 mins. Supermarket is a short walk away.

name: Central Edinburgh castle apartment 2 bedroom
description: This wee flat is located at heart of Edinburgh, great place if you want to explore this beautiful and magical city, this flat only few steps away from Royal mile, Edinburgh Castle, The Scotch Whiskey Experience and Camera Abscura. there is set of steps right outside the flat which will take you to Victoria street and Grassmarket, you also have the National Museum of Scotland one street away,there are many pubs and restaurants around, princess street is about 5 minutes walk with all retail shops,

name: Masons Lodge - 2 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Set in the heart of Trinity, 15 minutes walk from Edinburgh Botanic Gardens sits this hidden gem. Fully gut renovated in 2023 to a high standard, this upper apartment forms part of the original Trinity Masonic Lodge, Number 885, built in the 1880’s.
Cosy, light, quiet and private with blackout blinds fitted throughout, the apartment is set amongst parks and trees and feels like a peaceful haven, welcoming and warm in any season. Free on street parking and shops nearby.

name: Craigiehall Keep
description: With fabulous countryside views, this luxury dwelling has the rare benefit of beautiful rural surroundings whilst still being just a short drive from both the centre of Edinburgh and Edinburgh Airport. Situated on its own grounds on a former section of the Craigiehall Estate, the property is surrounded by rolling countryside and excellent walking trails.

description:
Located in the residential Clermiston area, between Edinburgh Airport and the city centre, this apartment is ideal for couples or friends looking to explore the city.

We offer one double bedroom in a shared two-bedroom apartment, with access to a shared bathroom and a Nespresso machine with capsules provided for your stay.

Guests are welcome to use the living room and sofa. Please note, a dog lives in the home, and the kitchen is not available for use.

name: Grassmarket View Suites - 2
description: Relax and enjoy your stay in this recently renovated beautifully designed private residence suite in the very centre of the bustling historic Grassmarket Square. description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. This beautiful and modern flat has a large living room with an open kitchen and dining area. The property has all that you need for a great holiday.
Please note there are 3 friendly cats on the property.
Flat is just right by the Arthur’s Seat - perfect for walks and jogging. 20 min walk from Portobello Beach. Good transport to the city attractions (15 min by bus to Princes Street/Waverley station). Nearest big supermarket is 3 min walk.

name: Cozy Flat in Bonnington, Edinburgh
description: Newly furbished ground floor flat. Fully equipped kitchen, living room with a expandable dining table, sofa, bathroom,  2 bedrooms and access to a utility room (if you need to wash &  dry your clothes). Located in trendy Leith, a 15 min walk to the centre. Suits a party of 4 people; two beds both size UK Queen plus ONE sofa bed. Direct access to the airport via tram from Balfour Street. Close to Leith Walk and the Shore which offer cozy coffee shops, traditional bars and exquisite restaurants.

name: Old Town Studio Apartment - 5mins from Grassmarket
description:
The compact studio apartment is perfect for couples or solo travellers looking for a city centre base just minutes from Edinburgh Castle and the lively Grassmarket.

The studio is complete with a double bed, bathroom with walk-in shower, fully-equipped basic kitchen and a living area with sofa, smart TV and dining table that seats two.

No pets allowed.Comes with all bedding/linen/towels.WIFI available,open plan kitchen+2 galleries to sit outside.

Fully equipped kitchen ready for cooking, driveway with space for one car and back garden with seating area and heaters.

A short walk to the tram stop which either goes to Edinburgh airport or busy city centre in less than 20 minutes. Two tram stops away from Murrayfield stadium, walking distance to nearby local parks and Edinburgh zoo. Public buses within a few minutes walk that will take you around the city

name: Luxury City Centre Flat w/Private Garden & Parking
description:
Luxurious modern apartment in Edinburgh's fashionable West End - a few minutes walk from Princes Street and the Castle, both train stations, and all that Edinburgh has to offer. Comprising the entire garden level of a Grade A-listed Georgian townhouse, the flat is spacious and tastefully decorated with a large private outdoor garden and off-street parking. Close enough to walk to everything in town, but beautifully quiet.

Travel crib and high chair on request.

name: Lovely, peaceful flat close to City Centre
description:
A comfortable ground floor flat with a private front garden. Conveniently located in a quiet, leafy neighbourhood - close to the City Centre, Leith, Holyrood Palace and Portobello Beach. Free on street parking and a bus stop two minutes walk from the front door (15 mins to city centre).

The flat has 2 double bedrooms and a living room with two double sofa beds - perfect if you're travelling with children or a large group of friends. It's an ideal base for exploring all areas of the city!

name: Easy Access to City & Airport
description:
Available to you is my spare room in a quiet 2-bed flat (where I also live).

Conveniently located within 5-minutes walk of the tram line, or easily accessed by the motorway, you can get to and from the city center or airport very easily.

This is a peaceful place to stay - before or after your travels - while in Scotland's capital city of Edinburgh.

name: Private Loft Room – Great Location & Value
description:
Simple, clean, & great value — this private room is ideal for guests who want a comfortable place to sleep while making the most of their time in the city.

Private room with lock & sink (low ceiling height not suitable for tall people)
Tea, coffee & light snacks provided
Shared bathrooms (used by other guests)
No kitchen or cooking facilities
Friendly, quiet household
Ideal Location for Edinburgh Festival & gigs.
A practical & welcoming place to rest your head after a full day of exploring.

It would be perfect for small groups or couples who want to soak up the Edinburgh atmosphere without having the business that comes with staying in the city centre.

name: Charming Room in a Serene Edinburgh Neighbourhood
description:
Room is located on the first floor in a quiet and peaceful neighbourhood. There is fresh bedding in the room to ensure a comfortable night sleep.

The room boasts a view of the Edinburgh Zoo. Pentland hills can also be seen from the shared living room and shared kitchen (good for hiking and skiing).

The place is a short walk to the tram, which you can take to get to Edinburgh city centre and airport in < 19 mins. Supermarket is also walking distance.

name: Ground floor flat - Haymarket
description:
The flat is 2 bedrooms but I will be away when letting the flat so you’ll have the place to yourself.

Beautiful flat located five minutes walk from haymarket station in the centre of Edinburgh. Regular trams to and from the airport, leith and Newhaven from the airport. Local restaurants and bars a short walk away from the flat. Quiet and residential area. Not suitable for pets.

name: Modern and Airy Flat in Edinburgh's West End
description:
Located in the popular West End and a short walk into historic New Town, this chic 2 bedroom is the perfect location for those wanting a central stay.


All bookings after the 1st of October 2023 are subject to licensing and planning permission as per guidance on AirBnB.

name: Rose Street's Hidden Treasure- 2Bed Newly Reno'd
description:
Hidden on Rose Street, nestled between Princes and George Street, this newly refurbished open-plan 2-bedroom apartment is perfectly located in the heart of Edinburgh.

The bright and spacious living room features a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen with brand new appliances. Enjoy two king-sized bedrooms with fresh, linen and a bathroom stocked with towels and complimentary toiletries.

You’ll be just minutes away from all major city attractions and Waverley Train Station.

name: Slateford House 1770 - The Jacobite's stronghold - 3 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Luxury with a Story

Slateford House 1770 is more than a place to stay; it’s a piece of Edinburgh’s past. Bonnie Prince Charlie was handed the keys to the capital here, and now, after a careful restoration by The House of Danu, you can collect your keys to a luxury stay.

At Slateford House 1770, we combine original features, bold design, striking bathrooms, and modern luxury.

It is the Perfect base for exploring Edinburgh and being part of keeping Scottish history alive.

name: Deluxe Villa with Private Bathroom
description:
Welcome to your home away from home in Edinburgh. Enjoy a modern and stylish stay in a warm host home featuring private bedrooms, exclusive bathroom access, and free private parking — all set in a quiet, affluent neighbourhood.

🚌 24/7 bus to city centre, short walk away
✈️ Direct Skylink 400 to/from airport
🏥 Royal Infirmary minutes away
🚗 Quick access to A720 Bypass

Note: A friendly cat lives here—please consider this before booking.

Registration Number: EH-80218-F

name: Double room with private ensuite in new  home.
description:
Welcome to Edinburgh. Spacious double bedroom with kingsize bed and private en-suite bathroom with private shower in newly built detached large modern family home.
The city centre is accessible by a short bus ride direct from our home that takes 20 minutes to reach the centre of town. Buses run every 15 mins and provide a 24hour service. Our home is also 15 mins from the airport by taxi or car. Our home surroundings are very quiet for a great nights sleep.

name: Luxury 2 bedroom City flat Free parking
description:
Luxury flat located near Haymarket, tucked away behind Grove Street. Everything (restaurant, shops) are close within walking distance, bus stops and rail station.

The property is on first floor of a modern detached building which has been refurbished recently to “show house” condition. It is a lovely and luxious place with newly refurbished kitchen and bathroom, and two double bedrooms. Everything is high standard!

Cleaning fee is £70
Free parking.

name: Cosy 1 Bedroom in the West End
description:
This cosy flat is perfect for couples seeking a home base for their stay in Edinburgh. It also features a sofa bed, sleeping up to four guests.

Located on a quiet mews lane it's only a short walk to popular Princes Street and New Town, with easy bus links and 1 minute away from the tram stop.

Parking is available on-street, at the nearby castle terrace car park.

All bookings after the 1st of October 2023 are subject to licensing and planning permission as per guidance on AirBnB.

name: Warm&Welcoming 3-bed flat in Stockbridge
description: JOIVY is delighted to welcome you to this beautiful flat based in Stockbridge, famous for its elegant Georgian and Victorian terraced houses, quaint cafes, and trendy gastropubs. Highlights nearby include Stockbridge Market and the Royal Botanic Gardens. A short 4-minute walk will take you to the nearest bus stop, Raeburn Place, providing excellent transport links. The property consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a living room, a well-equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a cosy balcony.

name: Tasteful Studio on Rose South
description:
✔ Stylish studio at the heart of the city centre
✔ 1 double bed
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 5-minute walk to George & Princes Street
✔ Fast (40–100 Mbps) WiFi Speed
✔ 11-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 3-minute walk to George Street (Stop GY)
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linen, towels, and WiFi are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Elegant Studio on Rose South
description:

neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming & Central 2 Bed Flat - Excellent Location
description:
Located on Rose Street this cosy apartment is close to everything! With more than enough space for 4 guests, and within minutes of Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street Gardens, the West End and Stockbridge, it’s the perfect base for a visit to Edinburgh.

There are several shops, restaurants and bars right on your doorstep so you can comfortably explore the city on foot. No need to use a car or taxi as everything you need is just a walk away.

name: Jo’s Garden Light House
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. With a large garden, set in a quiet neighbourhood, our house is a perfect getaway. 8 miles from the centre of Edinburgh,  with great transport links into the city or to the North of Scotland.

name: Spacious modern 2-bedroom apt.
description:
This modern two-bedroom apartment is a great base for visiting Edinburgh for work or leisure.

Complete with a two double bedrooms (one with en-suite bathroom/walk-in shower), second bathroom with shower-over-bath, spacious open-plan living/dining room with smart TV, dining table and comfy seating and fully-equipped kitchen complete with all appliances, including dishwasher, washing machine and coffee machine.

name: Room 1
description:
No. 53 Frederick Street, Guest House in Edinburgh City Centre is situated on the second and third floors of an original Georgian townhouse dating from circa 1820, in the heart of Edinburgh’s New Town.

Breakfast is available at our discounted rate with our neighbours Rabble, full details will be provided after booking. These guest houses are self-catering, and self-check-in properties.
