name: King bed & Ensuite Private Bath - Free Parking
description:
Private en-suite room in newly built modern home located just 5 minutes walk from Haymarket train station where all buses, trams and trains stop (you will hear the train/tram passing by during your stay if you keep the window open).

The room is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers and those who come for concerts, rugby matches and events at BT Murrayfield stadium.

We would love to welcome you into our lovely home and will be on hand to assist where we can.

name: Peaceful Room in a Traditional Edinburgh Flat
description: A traditional 1890’s tenement flat in the heart of Edinburgh. A quiet and cosy room, just minutes away from the many restaurants, bars and shops of Bruntsfield Place & only a 20 minute walk to Edinburgh castle. Located in a quiet street with no through traffic - our flat is an escape from the hustle and bustle of town, yet only a short and beautiful walk away from Edinburgh’s most loved attractions.

name: Quay Cottage
description: A seaside location in the outskirts of Edinburgh, easy access to the road and motorway network.

name: King bed & Ensuite Private Bath - Near City Centre
description:
Private en-suite room in modern home located just 5 minutes walk from Haymarket train station where all buses, trams and trains stop (you might hear the train/tram coming and going during your stay if you keep the window open).

The room is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers (conferences at EICC) and those who come for concerts, rugby matches and events at BT Murrayfield stadium.

We would love to welcome you into our lovely home and will be on hand to assist where we can.

name: Private Room & Bathroom for 3  at Western Harbour
description:
Experience tranquility at our waterfront Airbnb in Newhaven, along the scenic River Forth.

Historic charm meets modern amenities for a perfect Scottish getaway.

Conveniently located near Edinburgh's top attractions.

Transport Options:
1) Tram: 10-minute ride from Princess Street to Newhaven Tram Stop; short walk or take Bus 11 to Western Harbour Park.

2) Bus: Lothian Bus 11 offers a direct 20-minute ride to Western Harbour Park.

Enjoy a memorable escape with easy accessibility!

name: Beautiful room with private bathroom
description:
This tastefully decorated bedroom and shower room is perfect for a city escape.

Location is very well connected for the bus or train. Haymarket train station is only a 10 min walk away and there is a bus stop on the doorstep.

Murrayfield stadium is just a 15 min walk, so the flat is ideal for a rugby game or attending a concert!

The location is perfect for exploring local bars and restaurants while also not being far from the city centre and all it has to offer (20 min walk).

name: Spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment In The City Centre
description:
Spacious, centrally located apartment, with everything you need to work, relax or explore Edinburgh.

The apartment is located in Tollcross which is surrounded by a host of wonderful restaurants and bars as well as being just a short walk from many of Edinburgh's main attractions including Edinburgh Castle, The Grassmarket and The Meadows.

The apartment has two bedrooms with two double beds, as well as a sofa bed in the sitting room, as well as a large kitchen.

name: Luxury Modern 3 Bedroom Apartment in City Centre!
description:
This modern 3 bedroom apartment is in the heart of the City just a few minutes away from the Castle, Festivals & Markets that take place in the city of Edinburgh.

- High-quality linen, towels, essentials provided
- Self Check-in with Luggage storage near by
- Edinburgh Castle & Attractions within 0.3 miles
- Tourist attractions, restaurants & bars within walking distance
- Fully equipped kitchen
- 100% safe and secure location
- Washer/Dryer
- 3 double beds & 2 double sofa beds (Sleeps 8-10)

name: Beautiful Penthouse with Terrace & Jacuzzi
description:
✔ Beautiful penthouse ideally positioned in the New Town
✔ Panoramic views of Edinburgh - ideal for the New Year's fireworks
✔ 4 bedrooms
✔ 3 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ Spacious terrace with outdoor furniture & jacuzzi
✔ Private parking & lift
✔ 6-minute walk to George Street
✔ 17-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ An extensive area guide is provided & we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials & WiFi are provided

name: Cosy n' Comfy Flat in Historic Heart of Edinburgh
description:
BIG UPDATES:

April 2025
- Full Bathroom Renovation
- High Pressure Water System
- Entryway Cleaning
Nov 2024
- New Livingroom Radiator
- New Sofa Bed
- New Cooker

Enjoy your Edinburgh experience with easy access to anywhere from our perfectly located Old Town flat.

Take a 1 minute walk up to the Royal mile and get a taste for Edinburgh's proud history, or head downwards instead and find yourself stumbling upon prolific nightlife venues (HIVE, Stramash, and more).
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Hopetoun, Cozy Basement Flat
description: Located just to the east of Edinburgh's New Town, this modern building has its own entrance and private parking. For guests with children, there is a park just across the road. Discover the perfect blend of comfort and style in our charming basement flat on Hopetoun Crescent, Edinburgh. This spacious retreat features three beautifully appointed bedrooms and two modern bathrooms, making it ideal for families, groups of friends, or business travellers.

name: Cozy, stylish room-Leith Links
description:
Tastefully decorated double room in a beautiful Georgian style tenement, this room shares a bathroom and a separate WC with me and my husband. Guest has access to the fully equipped kitchen and dining area which has a magnificent view of Leith Links and Arthur’s seat. The flat is close to many vibrant bars, shops and restaurants.
This stylish place to stay is perfect for solo trips.

name: Our little castle
description: Great location a 10min drive of the old town, multiples parks around the area and of course the river walk. Also the whole group will enjoy a 5 min walk to the beautiful shore of Leith.

name: Sonder Royal Garden | Double Studio w/ No View
description: Picture this — an elegant grey-stone exterior with rows of French windows reflecting against the pink Edinburgh sunset. Welcome to the Royal Garden. Hints of gold and bronze decorate your space while bright light streams through the open windows. Just outside your door is The Scottish National Portrait Gallery. Let the fairytale views of Edinburgh Castle inspire your adventure. Have the best of comfort and excitement at Royal Garden.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Holiday apartment with two double beds
description:
It is located between Geoge SQ and Kings Building of Edinburgh University.
Easy access to both the university also the city center of Edinburgh.
Fully furnished .
Some shops near by.
2 double bedrooms in total. No living room please be aware.
one bedroom apartment and now, the living room converted to a double bedroom , so total two bedrooms, and
kitchen Bathroom . Be aware that , only two double beds in this apartment. No extra floor mattress available.

name: Ben Cruachan Room 1
description: Enjoy this cosy room in our 4-star boutique hotel. Our property offers you an authentic Scottish experience with tastefully decorated en-suite  rooms. A cosy bed is guaranteed as well as a tray of complimentary hot drinks to start your day or unwind after exploring the historic streets of Edinburgh. The room has a street view, however since we are just off Leith Walk, it's generally quiet at night time.

name: Cosy, Walking Distance to Centre, Free Parking
description:
Enjoy a relaxing stay in our cosy double bedroom.

This home is located just a 30 minutes walking from the Princes street where all buses and trams stop. Bus 11 (2 minutes walking) takes you everywhere in Edinburgh.

The room comes with all necessary utilities. The bed is a double and particularly comfortable. The room is warm and the neighbourhood is very quiet.

You also have access to a small kitchen and garden.

The bathroom is shared with other guests and regularly cleaned.

name: stay with Carlitos
description: welcome to my place where you will find peace and relaxing atmosphere to enjoy 100% this fantastic city of Edinburgh.

name: Sweet & cozy room near City Centre / Door lock
description: In a freshly renovated flat. Bus stop is just next to the flat  from where you get bus into city centre in just a 10min.

name: Picturesque flat near Murrayfield & City Centre
description:
A beautiful apartment with own parking. 1 min walk to bus stop, (15 min walk to Haymarket). Small pet welcome.

Rugby enthusiasts have Murrayfield on their doorstep, with pubs and shops a few minutes walk away.

Fantastic public transport links to the city, Haymarket train station and Edinburgh Airport. Free allocated parking on the premises if required.

name: Cosy Double Room Retreat
description: Stay at our quiet, professionally-maintained flat, nestled in a family-friendly neighbourhood in Edinburgh. Enjoy the convenience of three major supermarkets (Sainsbury's, Aldi, and Lidl) within 400m. Explore the city centre, a mere 30-minute walk or a swift 20-minute bus ride away. Unwind in our lovely garden equipped with BBQ facilities, and take advantage of private parking and a garage. Our home is a serene retreat that offers easy access to the vibrancy and charm of Edinburgh. Welcome!

name: Luxurious Apartment -Royal Mile
description:
Enjoy a luxurious apartment situated within the beating heart of Edinburgh on the Royal Mile, with the cities greatest attractions only stones throw away. Such as Victoria Street merely a few strides away whilst The Real Mary King's Close is 350 yards and Edinburgh Castle is 550 yards.

This newly renovated Luxury apartment consists of a living room with a 4K TV, fully equipped modern kitchen, entrance hallway, bathroom and a double bedroom complete with Tempur mattress and fresh bed linen.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Delightful Stockbridge  apartment
description: Delightful one bedroom apartment in Edinburgh’s Stockbridge, close by to Princes Street, Old Town and Dean Village, with a lively hub of independent shopping, artisanal coffee shops, bakery’s, bars and restaurants.

name: RÌGH Properties- Luxury West End Artisan Apartment
description: Situated in Edinburgh's West End, the apartment is just a short walk from Princes Street, the West End–Princes Street tram stop, and Haymarket Station. Decorated in a luxurious Scottish theme, it also features a hidden whisky cellar! Please note that there are a few steps inside the apartment.

name: WM Charming Garden Cottage
description:
WM Garden Cottage is newly renovated to the highest standards and provides stylish, comfortable accommodation with free on-site parking and Wi-Fi. Located in the Newington district close to great restaurants and amenities.

The cottage has a fully equipped kitchen with oven, microwave, coffee machine, fridge and dishwasher, and indoor and alfresco dining. Relax in the cinema room, enjoy outdoor table tennis.

3 spacious bedrooms are complemented by beautiful bathrooms with bath or shower.

name: McDonald Rd - Modern and light apartment with 2BR!
description: Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at McDonald Road stop and arrive at Murrayfield in just 40 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to the heart of the action.

description:
Luxury with a Story

Slateford House 1770 is more than a place to stay; it’s a piece of Edinburgh’s past. Bonnie Prince Charlie was handed the keys to the capital here, and now, after a careful restoration by The House of Danu, you can collect your keys to a luxury stay.

name: Cosy cottage with free parking close to airport
description:
Situated on a quiet street within an established residential development, the two bedroom semi-detached bungalow is charming and beautifully presented.

The bungalow is close to the airport and also the train station for zipping into the city centre!

EPC- rating C

name: Bright one bedroom flat in Leith
description:
Beautiful bright third floor flat in central Leith.
This freshly renovated flat is a much loved base from which to explore Leith. Near the top of Easter road but on a quiet street with a park, you're walking distance to Holyrood and Arthurs Seat or jump on a tram or bus to Princes Street and the Old Town. The flat has a king size bed with fresh hotel linens, fully equipped kitchen and a bath.
You're spoilt for choice with cute cafes,local shops and pubs and bars all within a few steps.

name: Stylish Flat in New Town
description:
✔ Luxury 1-bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh’s New Town
✔ 546 ft2 / 51 m2
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ Front communal garden w/ outdoor furniture
✔ 13-minute walk to Princes Street Gardens
✔ Average (5–40 Mbps) WiFi Speed
✔ Next to Circus Lane
✔ Edinburgh Waverley train station in a walking distance
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: 2Bed, Private Garden & Fireplace, Near Stockbridge
description:
A rare find in Scotland’s capital, this peaceful 2-bedroom apartment features its own front door entry, a private garden, and an outdoor dining area.

With beautiful art, an electric fireplace charm, you’ll feel right at home. Enjoying a city getaway with friends, or even working from home.

Enjoy free Wi-Fi, hotel-quality linen, towels, and complimentary toiletries. Located just 2 minutes from Stockbridge and the famous Water of Leith, all city attractions are within walking distance.

name: Ben Cruachan Room 2
description: Enjoy this recently renovated room in our 4-star boutique hotel. Our property offers you an authentic Scottish experience with tastefully decorated en-suite  rooms. A cosy bed is guaranteed as well as a tray of complimentary hot drinks to start your day or unwind after exploring the historic streets of Edinburgh.

name: Two bedrooms apartment, wifi
description: I’m professional living in Edinburgh for years now. Recently I started to travel a lot with my work and I’m more like a guest in my own house, so I decided to let my apartment to you:). You will have access to entire apartment. Also, you will have access to conservatory ;)

name: Royal 2bed Apartment City Center
description: Hey! Are you looking for a beautiful, safe, clean and affordable accommodation styled to your taste and needs? Great! WHERE TO STAY APPARTMENTS is just like it! Business travels, family trips, holiday stays, Relocation, long-term and short-term stays, We cover all this plus we always aim to deliver the best experience to our lovely guests! Check us out and book a stay with us!

name: Smith Place Hotel Room 7
description:
Welcome to Smith Place Hotel, where we offer a range of comfortable and spacious rooms to meet your needs. We currently have four types of rooms available, including 7 double rooms, 1 triple room and a family room, with more rooms on the way as we continue to grow.

Our self-check-in process ensures that your arrival is as smooth and hassle-free as possible. On the day of your arrival, you will receive the codes necessary to open the main entrance door and your room door.

name: Room to let in bright flat now.
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. The flat is near a lovely park...it's walking distance to the city centre...I have two kittens so hope you like animals.

name: Steps off the Royal Mile, comfortable 2 bed flat
description: The apartment is very central and safe, just steps off the Royal Mile within the Old Fishmarket by St Giles cathedral. Just 5 minutes walk to top attractions such as the Museum of Scotland, the National Gallery, Festival theatre and the Castle. Waverley station, the Meadows , George Street and the New Town beyond are easy walks away too. Great for sightseers, old and young and is NOT a party flat. My family use the apartment when working in Edinburgh and so it is more a second home than a hotel.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: SlatefordHouse1770 - The Poet's Sanctuary - 1 Bed
description:
Luxury with a Story

Slateford House 1770 is more than a place to stay; it’s a piece of Edinburgh’s past. Bonnie Prince Charlie was handed the keys to the capital here, and now, after a careful restoration by The House of Danu, you can collect your keys to a luxury stay.

name: Edinburgh 1bed near Haymarket
description:
This a lovely 1 bedroom ground floor apartment . Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base.
It suitable to walk or cycle from, with the Union Canal 10 mins away. The bus stops to Princes St is 2 mins away giving you quick access to the city centre ( frequent buses) Haymarket travel hub is 15mins walk so buses, trams, trains to most places in Edinburgh & further. Edinburgh Zoo, Murrayfield Rugby & many other venues e.g Fountain Park Cinema Complex are nearby

name: Lovely Rooms in a Calm Edinburgh Neighbourhood
description:
Two rooms located on the first floor of a shared flat in a quiet and peaceful neighbourhood with a private bath. There is fresh bedding in each room to ensure a comfortable night sleep.

Both rooms boasts a view of the Edinburgh Zoo. Pentland hills can also be seen from the shared living room and shared kitchen (good for hiking and skiing).

The place is a short walk to the tram, which you can take to get to Edinburgh city centre and airport in < 19 mins. Supermarket is also walking distance.

name: Quirky West End Edinburgh House
description:
A one of a kind unique apartment situated in a very central location in the popular West End area of Edinburgh within a few minutes' walk of the main commercial and retail areas, close to fine restaurants or Pubs, and within walking distance of Haymarket and Waverley train stations.
With antique interiors throughout and a particularly homely feel, this property could be your home away from home!
This property is perfect for families, friends and business-travellers alike.

name: Modern flat near city centre.
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located flat in Edinburgh. The place has just been refurbished and benefits from modern look and fancy design. The apartment is always cleaned to the highest standards. Enjoy your private entrance, peaceful bedroom at the back of the flat with a new king size bed, well equiped open kitchen. living room with sofa bed for an extra person, large 65 inch tv and playing music with alexa.

name: Artist's Loft in Leith
description:
Welcome to my Loft, an open plan apartment in the heart of Leith Perfect for couples and families.
Fantastic restaurants, cafes and bars on your doorstep.
Public transport routes to the beach and to the city centre.
The large open plan kitchen, dining, living area is perfect for socialising and the cosy den for tv and games.
I provide under-the-radar recommendations of places to visit, eat, drink and explore. So you don't miss out on the hot spots of Leith and Edinburgh that the locals enjoy.

name: Stunning/Huge Double bedroom
description:
Stunning double bedroom, in a just refurbished flat. Big king size bed with brand new mattress, linen provided. The room provides an ensuite wardrobe with plenty space for hanging,shoes rack and extra storage box. There is a huge drawer and 2 more small on each side of the bed.
The room is really bright and watches a private garden, which makes it quiter along all day and night. Nice green area surround the flat. Room situated in big 3bedroom flat. Fast wifi, basic kitchen utilities included.

name: Cosy Georgian apartment
description: Beautiful, peaceful Georgian apartment in vibrant Leith. Only a short distance from Leith walk and the fashionable Shore, with a wide range of restaurants, bars and shops all within walking distance.

name: Double room with connecting Single room
description:
The Dorstan Guest House offers you every comfort and convenience.

We are a beautiful Victorian family villa in the City of Edinburgh located in a quiet residential area but close to the Old Town, Edinburgh Castle and all main attractions.

name: 2 BR Holiday Home With Private Garden and Parking
description: Enjoy a very warm welcome to Milligan Rd Holiday Home! This modern and tastefully decorated two-floor house is perfect for visitors looking for a homely experience and privacy. This is a very safe location with easy access to and from the city centre of Edinburgh. Ideal place for families and groups of friends. Lovely back garden and free car parking on site. We hope you will have a wonderfully memorable time!

name: Near Royal Mile & Arthur's Seat
description:
Unique art filled two double bedroom apartment in Edinburgh's historic Old Town, minutes to all the attractions and events: Royal Mile & Edinburgh Castle, Arthur's Seat, Holyrood Palace, Christmas Market, University, museums, shops, restaurants, etc
- Two large and quiet double bedrooms with super comfy double beds
- Fast WiFi
- Kitchen with Nespresso machine, microwave, induction stove, refrigerator, toaster, etc
- Full bathroom
- Hotel quality bedding and towels
- Professionally cleaned

name: Albert home
description: Discover our charming Leith flat, just a 20-min walk from the historic Old and New Towns. Surrounded by vibrant cafes and restaurants, it offers convenience and tranquility. Excellent transport links and a fully equipped kitchen make it the perfect retreat after exploring Edinburgh. Relax in the cozy living room and rest easy in the inviting bedroom. Ideal for a memorable stay!

name: Premium Double Room Ensuite
description: Fraoch House is one of the finest guesthouse establishments in Edinburgh. Vibrant, warm and comfortable, it provides friendly 4 star accommodation in the heart of the city. The period features of this lovely Victorian building combine with contemporary design to produce a clean, modern look. Ideally situated 20 minutes walk from Princes Street.

name: Double Room Ensuite
description: Fraoch House is one of the finest guesthouse establishments in Edinburgh. Vibrant, warm and comfortable, it provides friendly 4 star accommodation in the heart of the city. The period features of this lovely Victorian building combine with contemporary design to produce a clean, modern look. Ideally situated 20 minutes walk from Princes Street.

name: Edinburgh Castle View, Grassmarket EH1
description:
Centrally located EH1 apartment, based in Edinburgh's famous Grassmarket. The apartment is high spec, with a skillfully designed interior & finish.
Enjoy an uninterrupted Castle view from your kitchen and balcony.

A perfect base to the city!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 3bed FullyFurnished Near Airport
description: Perfectly peaceful and centrally-located place to stay near Edinburgh airport. Equipped with proper working desk for remote working. Designated parking space on premise. Bus stop just outside property and Tram station in 5 mins walking distance. One of Edinburgh’s main shopping mall Gyle Centre in at 5 mins walk.

name: House with Cats and a Hamster for company
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.
Come stay in this house not far from Edinburgh to explore the city and nearby town of South Queensferry.

name: Smith Place Hotel Room 3
description:
Welcome to Smith Place Hotel, where we offer a range of comfortable and spacious rooms to meet your needs. We currently have four types of rooms available, including 7 double rooms, 1 triple room and a family room, with more rooms on the way as we continue to grow.

Our self-check-in process ensures that your arrival is as smooth and hassle-free as possible. On the day of your arrival, you will receive the codes necessary to open the main entrance door and your room door.

name: Smith Place Hotel Room 8
description:
Welcome to Smith Place Hotel, where we offer a range of comfortable and spacious rooms to meet your needs. We currently have four types of rooms available, including 7 double rooms, 1 triple room and a family room, with more rooms on the way as we continue to grow.

Our self-check-in process ensures that your arrival is as smooth and hassle-free as possible. On the day of your arrival, you will receive the codes necessary to open the main entrance door and your room door.

name: Smith Place Hotel Room 9
description:
Welcome to Smith Place Hotel, where we offer a range of comfortable and spacious rooms to meet your needs. We currently have four types of rooms available, including 7 double rooms, 1 triple room and a family room, with more rooms on the way as we continue to grow.

Our self-check-in process ensures that your arrival is as smooth and hassle-free as possible. On the day of your arrival, you will receive the codes necessary to open the main entrance door and your room door.

name: Room for 1 to 2 guests with great transport links
description: Our home is perfectly located with excellent transport links to access Edinburgh Airport, the city centre and Ocean Terminal. There is a lovely private garden with a Summerhouse. We are a short walk to Murrayfield Stadium and a 7 minute tram ride to Edinburgh West End, 10 minutes to Edinburgh Mound and 15 minutes to Edinburgh Waverley Train Station. We are in a quiet residential area but in minutes you can be in the midst of the bars, cafes and restaurants.

name: Cosy Double Room @ Haymarket
description:
This lovely guest room is a 5 minutes walk away from Haymarket Station, 10 minutes away from Princes Street, 15 minutes away from the Meadows.

There are lots of great bus connections. Local amenities include Pharmacy, Supermarkets, Pubs and more.

name: Luxury central flat with ensuite
description: Want to stay in a luxury apartment only 15-minutes away from Edinburgh City Centre? Welcome to McDonald Road, our stunning home with en suite bedroom. The apartment offers two bedrooms with modern kitchen and comfortable living facilities.

name: 2 Bedroom Edinburgh with steam room!
description:
⸻

Edinburgh Retreat – Modern 2BR with Steam Room & Garden
• Location: Walk to Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace, and city attractions.
• Bedrooms: King-size master + double bedroom downstairs.
• Bathrooms: 2 modern showers; one with private steam room.
• Features: Rear garden, Wi-Fi, full kitchen, paid street parking.
• Transport: Close to tram, bus & rail links.
• Renovated: 2022 stylish, comfortable finishes

name: Near Holyrood Palace, walking distance to Castle
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.
You’ll be located at one end of the famous Royal Mile , near the Parliament building and overlooking the beautiful Arthur’s Seat.
You can walk to the castle at the other end of the Royal Mile
You are also 10 mins on foot from the intercity Waverley Station .
You’ll be in the centre of the historic Old Town , with museums and galleries close by .We are on the fourth floor with spectacular views and elevator . It’s a quiet apartment.

name: Spacious Ground Floor-2BR-2BA
description: Spacious Ground Floor-2BR-2BA

name: Bright & Cosy Double Room, Female OnlyFree Parking
description:
Stay in a bright, stylish double room in a residential development with secure entry and free parking. You’ll have private access to the spacious main bathroom.
Conveniently located with a frequent bus service to the city centre (20 mins), and the airport bus stops just 5 minutes away. Beaches, local shops, and scenic walks nearby – perfect for solo female travellers, students, or remote workers.

name: Stylish, Walking Distance to Centre, Free Parking
description:
Enjoy a relaxing stay in our stunning double bedroom with lovely living area.

This home is within 25 minutes walking from the Princes street. Bus 11 (2 minutes walking) takes you everywhere in Edinburgh.

The room comes with all utilities. We pay a lot of attention to comfortability of the bed. The room is warm and the neighbourhood is quiet.

You also have access to a garden and work station.

The bathroom is shared with other guests and regularly cleaned.

name: En-suite, Walking Distance to Centre, Free Parking
description:
Enjoy a relaxing stay in our stylish en-suite.

This home is just a 30-minute walk from Princes Street, where all buses and trams stop, making it convenient if you’re arriving by train or from the airport.

The room is equipped with all the necessary amenities, and we place great emphasis on the comfort of the bed. The neighborhood is safe, friendly and quiet.

You’ll also have access to a small kitchen and a lovely garden.

The private bathroom features a bathtub for your convenience.

name: Spacious room in the city centre, garden facing.
description:
Beautiful spacious room with lots of plants, a big desk and garden facing. Its peaceful and a great space to relax, focus on work.
We have a communal kitchen which is also generous in size, we like to eat together from time to time but also like our own space.
We have one simple bathroom.

Our flat is a creative flat with friendly, professional musicians and artists. We keep a rota which changes each month. Ideal location, walking distance to the centre, Arthurs seat and the meadows.

name: Gorgeous room + en-suite + balcony (EH-70820-F)
description: Keep it simple at my centrally-located flat just off Leith Walk, easy walking distance of the Botanical Gardens (25 mins),  Old Town (30 mins) and Stockbridge (30 mins). Big bedroom with King Size bed, en-suite and balcony. NO SMOKING - not even on the balcony pls. Not suitable for kids and babies. From July 2026 the City of Edinburgh is introducing a 5% visitor levy for all bookings made after 1 October 2025 - this charge shall be collected via 'special offer' payment on the Air B&B app.

name: Pentland View
description:
Nestled in the scenic South West of Edinburgh, this two-bedroom home has views of the Pentland Hills. 4 miles from the centre and 8.9 miles from the airport, it’s well-located with excellent public transport links to top attractions, shops, and restaurants.
The bright kitchen/dining area and separate living room are on the ground floor. Upstairs are two spacious bedrooms and a bathroom.
Outside is a private driveway for one car and free on-street parking. At the rear, a peaceful garden awaits.

name: Spacious room, private bathroom
description:
Welcome to our elegant & enchanting Georgian house (1803) just 100m from the beach with many shops, cafes, restaurants nearby. Owned by an artist, it's decorated with eclectic style. The book-lined room is large & overlooks our private, walled garden so quiet & comfortable. Private bathroom with shower/toilet/basin (not ensuite). Pure cotton sheets & goosedown duvet. Tea & coffee making facilities. Mini fridge. Regular buses to the city centre, a 25 minute ride.

License EH-70823-F

name: Authentic Edinburgh - Stay in Stylish Stockbridge
description:
A lovely one-bedroom flat, located inside a traditional tenement in the heart of one of the most popular areas to live in Edinburgh - Stockbridge.

Perfect for couples exploring the city, it's complete with a double bed, bathroom with walk-in shower, full kitchen and spacious living room with dining table and smart TV.

Stockbridge is the perfect place to stay to venture a little of the tourist track in the city!

name: Flat with Views of Arthurs Seat
description:
Beautiful flat in Meadowbank with stunning views of Arthur's Seat.

This lovely 1 bedroom flat is situated on the top floor of a traditional 3-story Edinburgh stone tenement, flooded with natural light.

The flat is a 10 minute walk to Holyrood Palace and Arthurs seat and a 15 minute walk to the top of Leith Walk, The St.James Quarter and Royal Mile.
We are a 10-15 minute taxi from Waverly station and Tram network serves the airport with a stop 15 minutes walk away from the flat.

name: Central flat with balcony. Parking included.
description: Welcome to my home. This is my main residence which I rent when traveling for work or pleasure which is a fair bit of the year. I hope you’ll feel at home and experience the city like a local.

name: Charming house in convenient location for city
description:
Beautiful quiet family home with sunny garden that we let out from time to time when we go away. Comfortable for a family or small group of friends with easy access the centre of Edinburgh. Less than a 30-minute walk to the city centre or you can hop on a bus which takes you right through the heart of the city. We are also a 15-minute walk from the bustling area of Leith and there is free parking available on the street.

This is a family home so has more equipment than a typical air b and b

name: Private bedroom
description:
peaceful and centrally-located place. Close to Edinburgh university GS and Kings building.
Comfortable double bed .
Fully Furnished .
Bathroom and kitchen are shared with one person only but you might have your own bathroom and kitchen if other room is not booked.

The location os quite central.
Some shops around the corner.

Quiet and peaceful is the point.

name: Special private bedroom
description:
Comfortable private bedroom close to George Sq and Kings building Edinburgh university.
Fully furnished with a very comfortable double bed , three doors wardrobe, large desk , office chair, bedside table , small sofa , large windows makes the room very sunny and bright . Shared bathroom and kitchen with one person only but you might have your own bathroom and your own kitchen if no booking for other room.
Shops around the corner.
13-16minutes walk to KB , GS of Edinburgh university

name: Stylish & Central 2BR Apartment
description:
Two bedroom apartment 2 miles from Edinburgh City Centre with excellent transport links. The property has been converted from an old bakery and has recently been newly renovated to a high standard. Keeping some features. No parking linked to the property

- Large flat screen TV with Sky and streaming services
- Full equipped kitchen
- Quiet neighbourhood
- There is no parking linked to the property
- 1 mile from Haymarket Station & 1.5 miles from Murrayfield Stadium
- Private main door

name: Adam's Marchmont Place
description:
This spacious traditional Edinburgh tenement flat in the sought after area of Marchmont. has just been comprehensively and lovingly upgraded with new kitchen, bathroom, flooring and fixtures and fittings.

Only a few minutes walk from Edinburgh’s famous Meadows park.

The area offers excellent local eateries, coffee shops and specialist boutiques.

We have a travel cot for infants.

Free on street parking over the weekend

Host will meet each guest giving information on flat and local area.

name: Beautiful ultra modern home!
description:
Welcome to our stunning two bedroom, two bathroom modern contemporary home. Located in a prime location, it is the perfect blend of comfort and style. This is our home, but we’ve tailored it for guests - beautifully presented and ready for you to settle in and enjoy.

Enjoy the sun in the south-facing garden, and on cooler days, unwind with heated floors and a relaxing jacuzzi bath.

We take pride in offering a space that feels like home.

We can't wait to host you!

name: Craigiehall Temple (historic property built 1759)
description: Make you trip to Edinburgh truly memorable with a stay at Craigiehall Temple. Built in 1759 and situated in its own grounds on a former part of the Craigiehall Estate, it's Grade A listed for its stunning portico displaying the arms of the 1st Marquess of Annandale. A plaque on the wall carries a quote from Horace: "Dum Iicet in rebus jucundis vive beatus", "Live happy while you can among joyful things". We hope that a stay at the Temple will deliver this experience and stay true to this vision.

name: Bright and spacious Georgian flat in New Town
description:
Delightful and spacious New-Town Flat. Centrally located flat within 5-minutes walk of the historic village of Stockbridge, 15 minutes from Waverly Train Station, close to shops and restaurants, and a short walk to the Royal Botanical Gardens. Bright and airy, this flat is a classic New-Town historical building, with modern design and a cozy feel.

Perfect for families and couples, this two-bedroom flat is large enough to accomodate a group or family looking to explore Edinburgh. Garden access.

name: Georgian Style 3BR Flat Edinburgh City Centre
description:
Welcome to our beautiful period apartment located in the heart of Edinburgh's vibrant New Town!

Located in the heart of the city, our apartment is within easy walking distance of all the best historic landmarks, shops, and restaurants. You'll love exploring the charming streets and soaking up the rich culture of this wonderful city.

Whether you're travelling with family or friends, our spacious apartment can comfortably accommodate up to six guests. We can't wait to welcome you!

name: Jeffrey's House
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located first floor apartment in the heart of the city. Located just off the Royal Mile and a few minutes walk from Waverley Station, this beautiful accommodation is the perfect location from which to explore the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 1 Sunshine On Leith - Bright & Breezy flat
description:
This sunny double bedroom features high ceilings, a comfy double bed, bedside tables, and a set of stylish wood drawers. Double doors open onto the deck and garden - perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation. Enjoy access to a recently renovated bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and shared living spaces.

Ideal for couples exploring Edinburgh & Leith! Just a short stroll to Leith Links, the Shore’s buzzing bars, and the tram for easy trips to the city centre or airport.

name: Snug Studio on The Grassmarket | 5mins from Castle
description:
Located in the bustling Grassmarket, with Edinburgh Castle, this studio apartment offers the convenience and comfort.

Enjoy a quiet, cozy, and fully equipped space that features an open-plan layout, including a double bedroom, bathroom, living area, and kitchen. It provides everything you need for a perfect city getaway.

Just a short walk to The Royal Mile and all major attractions in the Old and New Town, the apartment includes linen and towels, toiletries, and Wi-Fi for your convenience.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Peaceful Oasis By The Sea
description: Take a break and unwind after exploring all that Edinburgh has to offer at this peaceful oasis by the sea. My 1-bed apartment is located in Newhaven which is north of the city centre, enjoying stunning views across the sea to Fife. There are excellent amenities on the doorstep, including popular local restaurants, a large 24-hour supermarket, access to the cycle path network, and a new tram stop with a frequent service to the city centre, both train stations, Murrayfield stadium and the airport.

name: Miss Daisy Camper Van.
description: Miss Daisy Camper Van is your ultimate partner for an unforgettable Scottish adventure. Our camper van rental service in Edinburgh offers the perfect way to explore the breathtaking landscapes, charming cities, and hidden gems of Scotland.

name: Beautiful 2BD Flat in Haymarket, Edinburgh
description: Looking for a cosy and convenient place to stay in Edinburgh? This Flat in Haymarket is the perfect choice! This modern and fully furnished apartment is located in a peaceful residential area, part of Edinburgh New Town, a world heritage site, and just a short distance from the city centre. With comfortable beds, a well-equipped kitchen, plenty of natural light as well as a private garden, you'll feel right at home during your stay. Book now and experience the best of Scotland's capital city!

name: A cozy room in Edinburgh city
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located cozy room in Edinburgh. It is a perfect location for tourists to explore Edinburgh theatres, restaurants, and shopping. With access to over 5 different buses to different attractions.

name: Luxury Apartment between New Town and Stockbridge
description: Spacious 2-storey apartment with private garden.

name: Quiet large single room with bathroom
description:
Large single room in quiet house with exclusive use of bathroom with bath and shower (not ensuite).

Local buses (10/27/45) that take you in to the city centre (15-20 minutes). You are also able to walk along the Union Canal to the city centre (30-45 minute walk).

Private parking available.

Access to the room is between 4pm and 10am - rooms must be vacant between 10am and 4pm daily irrelevant of length of stay

There are small dogs in the house but they have no access to upstairs rooms

name: Lovely spacious double room with ensuite
description:
Double room with private en suite toilet/ shower in quiet house.

There are local buses (10/27/45) that take you in to the city centre (15-20 minutes dependent on traffic). You are also able to walk along the Union Canal to the city centre (30-45 minute walk).

Private parking is available.

Access to the room is 4pm daily (7pm Fridays) and 10am daily - rooms must be vacant between 10am and 4pm daily irrelevant of length of stay.

Small dogs on site but no access to upstairs/ bedrooms.

name: Cozy&Bright King Bed, Airport Bus, Free Parking
description:
Recently renovated flat with new furniture and appliances.
Spacious, tidy, and bright room. King size bed, desk with a chair and lamp, ultrafast 477 MB WIFI speed, 43 inch HD TV, big wardrobe with sliding mirror door
Close to the most famous Newhaven harbours and a pleasant walking path alongside the beach
Botanic garden 25 mins on foot.
City centre 20 mins by bus with multiple choices 8, 9, 14, 16, 19, 22.
Edinburgh Airport bus 17.
Scotmid is in 3 mins, huge Lidl is in 8 mins.

name: Finding Nemo
description: ...In the name of Nemo, no TV, no microwave, no plastic is fantastic,,,bear in mind Scotland is always cold, windy, dark and wet. However, Johnnie keeps walking and the air is so fresh. Therefore leveling up, chariting and supporting the local community of SM as well as low budget travellers. Minimum stay 2 nights. Welcome...

name: Comfy&Glamorous Room, Free Parking, Airport Bus
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm space.
Recently renovated apartment with new furniture and appliances.
Double size bed, desk with a chair and lamps, ultrafast WIFI speed >400 MB, 43 inch HD TV, big wardrobe with sliding mirror door,
Close to the most famous Granton & Newhaven harbours and a pleasant walking path alongside the beach
Botanic garden 25 mins on foot.
City centre in 20 mins by bus: 8, 9, 19, 22
Edinburgh Airport bus 200Skylink
Scotmid is in 3 mins, Lidl in 8mins

name: Cosy, central and free parking
description: Stay right in the heart of Edinburgh just off the Royal Mile in this newly decorated and super central apartment. This bright and cosy apartment is situated in the perfect location for your trip - right next to The Royal Mile, Scottish Parliament and overlooking Arthur Seat park. The beautiful Holyrood park is just a short 2 minute walk away and offers a wonderful recluse from the bustling city life - you will feel almost as if you were in the Highlands, whilst staying in the city centre!

name: VW Campervan, sleeps 4
description:
For hire, our lovely campervan, ready to see Scotland .
Gretna is based on a VW Crafter long wheelbase van with a full-height roof, and a good strong engine. There is two bunk beds at the rear (170cm) a bench seat that flips down to a double bed 190cm, running water, LED lights, phone charger points, an opening skylight, gas cooker, microwave, 240v sockets, 12v fridge, a portable toilet and a night heater which makes it nice and cosy. The passenger seats swivel around creating more space.

name: Bright and Spacious 2 Bed Flat by the Harbour
description:
Bright and Spacious Apartment with the view on the Harbour and Arthur’s Seat.

The accommodation is suitable for couples and families with children. It comprises of 2 bedrooms, kitchen/ livingroom and beautiful newly refurbished bathroom. Fast internet and flat-screen TV. Fully equipped kitchen has everything you need.

Great public transport connection with airport and city centre. Asda/Lidl store is 5 min drive, some cafes and restaurants (Old chain pier) within walking distance.

name: Edinburgh Royal Mile Apartment.
description: Perfectly located and just a few steps from the famous Royal Mile, this 3-double bedroom apartment is ideal for anyone looking to enjoy Edinburgh at its best. Minutes away from all transport links, the main Fringe Venues, Edinburgh Castle, Princess Street, Holyrood Palace and the best of Edinburgh’s bars and restaurants. The apartment is light and bright, with plenty of space to work, eat and sleep. The property benefits from a tranquil outdoor terrace that leads down to a grassed garden.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: New Town Meuse Cottage
description: Situated in the heart of Edinburgh’s World Heritage Site and part of Dublin Meuse courtyard this small and unique mid 19th century 3 bedroom house retains many of its original features with commanding views of Georgian Edinburgh.

name: Comfortable West End Apartment
description: Enjoy your stay in Edinburgh at my bright and cosy apartment in the centre of the City. The recently-renovated space provides a comfortable and relaxing home for visitors with excellent access to bus and tram routes, city centre attractions, cafes, bars and restaurants. The Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, Princess Street Gardens, the Grand Canal and Edinburgh International Convention Centre are all within walking distance and there is an array of local amenities in the immediate vicinity.

name: Comfy 2 bedroom free parking out
description:
Relax with the whole family at this is lovely l place to stay. Free on street parking, very good bus connection. Big shopping centre nearby, four minutes drive, Fort Kinnaird with over 70 shops, restaurants and Cinema. City centre about 25 min by bus. Portobello beach about 15 min maximum by car.
Friendly host.

name: JOIVY Superb studio w/ separate kitchen near The M
description:
✔ Lovely studio, great located in Newington
✔ 1 double bed
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Bike storage available
✔ Kitchen with all necessary appliances located across the hallway
✔ 9-minute walk to The Meadows
✔ 20-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ 30-minute walk to Holyrood Park
✔ 1-minute walk to Duncan Street bus stop
✔ The area nearby offers plenty of restaurants, bars, shops & beautiful parks
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linen,

name: Beautiful 2 bedroom house
description:
1 bedroom with king size bed
1 kids bedroom with a double bed
Living room with sofa bed
Netflix and Disney
WiFi
Free parking

Please note this is our family home, so you may find some of our personal touches around
That said, we’ve made sure the house is fully equipped with everything you might need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay, especially if you're traveling with children. From a well-stocked kitchen to thoughtful amenities for little ones, we're confident you'll feel right at home.

name: Lofty Leith Luxury
description:
Experience the charm of this luxurious, converted whisky warehouse loft apartment in the vibrant heart of Leith Shore, Edinburgh.

The prime location offers a unique retreat close to top restaurants, shops, pubs, cultural attractions and so much more.

At over 1200 square feet this first floor apartment serviced by a lift offers a spacious and relaxing base from which to explore the immediate Leith Shore with Edinburgh City Centre attractions a short bus / tram ride away.

name: Private Studio Apartment -Fairmilehead Edinburgh
description:
Private Basement Garden Studio Apartment in Fairmilehead with King Size bed, private bathroom, kitchen, washing machine with outside garden area.
With the addition of Solar & electricity storage this now means we generate more electricity annually than is consumed and are a net exporter back to the grid

name: Comfortable short stay
description: Safe, Luxurious,peaceful and centrally-located short stay place for guest

name: Cozy double bedroom in Edinburgh
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.
This is a good sized double bedroom which is cozy and warm in a second floor flat with security door entrance. It's well located for the airport and motorway access, free parking outside the building, easy access to public transport. Buses 3 and 30 get you to the centre in 25 mins and by car in 13 mins. Good local facilities including library, hairdresser, cinema, shops and the shopping centre Wester Hailes 10 minutes walking distance.

name: King Size Double, Private Bathroom & Breakfast
description:
Situated in the fashionable Shore area of Leith, Edinburgh, this unique apartment is found on a quiet street close to independent and renowned restaurants, cafes & pubs.

Your comfortable, quiet double room is downstairs in our stylish apartment with exclusive use of an adjacent shower-room and toilet.

The house is a 1-minute walk to buses & a 5-minute stroll for trams for speedy access to & from the city (15 mins), Airport (50 mins), Waverley Station and St Andrews Square bus station.

name: 6 Coltbridge Gardens
description: This delightful Victorian terrace house rests in Edinburgh, Midlothian and can sleep five people in three bedrooms.

name: Stylish One Bed Apartment
description:
This one bed apartment is absolutely perfect for your home away from home! We can offer guidance for your adventures around the city.

Fully equipped kitchen, wifi, storage space, linens and towels with a stylish decorative flair.

There’s a bus stop within a 90 second walk from the front door that gets you to the Royal Mile within 25 minutes.

The closest shops on foot are at Straiton Retail Park, a 20 minute walk.

Neighbours have some ongoing construction. This shouldn’t disrupt your stay!

name: The Eden Apartment, Edinburgh City Center
description:
Absolutely delighted to welcome guests in our property. We are thrilled to make a long-lasting memory of your experience in our beloved Edinburgh.

The “Eden” Apartment is a spacious, light-filled and elegant property, equipped with all the amenities you would need to make the best of your stay – an idyllic setting for families or friends!

To create an authentic feel and comfortable place for every guest, we have tastefully decorated the space to reflect a polished, classic, and stylish vibe.

name: bright triple 120m to beach
description: bright triple room only sorry no kitchen facilities, with garden views in our beautiful victorian home full of period features with all modern conveniences  150m from beautiful sandy beach and a plethora of independent shops. this is an area that is a hub for artists writers and has a creative vibe. convenient transport to city centre day and night stops 150m from house recently had parking restrictions introduced by council but there is still parking in the area on a first come basis

name: Beautiful flat, bright and spacious double room
description:
Situated in a central yet peaceful area of town, with a great castle view. Close to Bruntsfield, Morningside, the Meadows and Murrayfield.

This is a spare room, living with an experienced host. Perfect for festival visits.

name: Serene studio Apartment with secure parking
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space with off street secure parking. 10 Minutes from city centre. On main bus route . Indoor mall shopping 5 minutes walk. Easy accessible to everywhere in this amazing city.

name: Garden Annex in Victorian Villa
description: Charming Garden Annex | Private Entrance! Attached to a detached Victorian villa, this tranquil 1-bedroom flat boasts its own main door access. Recently decorated and furnished. Enjoy modern comforts with a Large 4K Smart TV and a speedy 500mb fibre internet connection. Easy access to Edinburgh City Centre, Portobello beach and shops. Fully equipped kitchen with washing machine. Lovely bathroom with shower. Experience a cosy stay with the added convenience of private entrance.

name: Spacious lower ground flat
description:
Bright spacious 2 bedrooom basement flat. Garden access available out the back
Door. 2 bathrooms, 1 en suite. In the heart of Newtown. Nice and quiet but very central. Great transport links to airport. Cot available.

name: Elegant Edinburgh house
description:
✨ Enjoy a stylish stay in this centrally located main-door flat in the south of Edinburgh.

This immaculate property offers:

Two bedrooms – one with a luxurious super-king bed, and a cosy box room with a double bed.

A welcoming entrance vestibule with elegant tiled flooring, leading into a spacious hallway.

A stunning bay-window lounge, featuring ornate cornicing, a centre rose, decorative fireplace, and plush luxury carpets – the perfect place to relax in the evenings.

name: Spacious 5 double Bedroom apartment Edinburgh Old
description:
The Area
An attractive, light and fully newly refurbished high quality 5 large double bedroom double top floor listed building apartment located on Forrest Road in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town conservation area offering direct views of Greyfriars and Edinburgh Castle. Edinburgh University and Edinburgh Art College are both within the immediate vicinity as are The McEwan Hall, George Square and the Fringe Festival.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright 2bed with amazing views
description: Cosy and cheerful top floor flat in a lovely, quiet building in the heart of Leith. Incredible views over the city, right next to tram stop and 15 mins from the centre of Edinburgh or a short walk to the cafés, restaurants and bars of the Shore.  Two bedrooms, one with a double king sized bed and ensuite, one single room with adjacent full bathroom, perfect for a small family or couple or friends who are happy to share. The sofa can be made into a bed for a further guest.

name: Beautiful sunlit room (sleeps up to three)
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Lovely and calm room in Leith
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. Lovely private bedroom in Leith, 2 minutes to the Water of Leith and the cycle/walk path leading to the city centre, on the bus is a 20 minutes ride. Close to many great cafes, bars and restaurants, supermarkets and the Ocean Terminal Shopping centre.

name: Single room
description: Single room in the city center with shared facilities such as bathroom and kitchen.

name: Double room
description: Double room shared bathroom and kitchen in the city central flat with easy access to Edinburgh Castle, Edinburgh university etc.

name: Cosy Modern Flat n/ Leith | Pass The Keys
description: Newly developed, modern 2 bedroom property in desirable city centre location. Within 20 minutes walking distance to vibrant St James Centre, home to Duck & Waffle and a number of leading restaurants as well Edinburgh no.1 shopping destination. Permitted parking, free after 6pm weekdays and free on weekends.

name: Modern two bedroom retreat
description:
This stunning property boasts a modern and stylish interior, with brand new furnishings throughout.

The spacious living room with comfortable seating and a large flat screen TV. The fully equipped kitchen has everything you need and the dining area is perfect for sharing meals.
The bathroom is sleek and modern, with a large walk-in shower.

Outside, you'll find a private driveway and a lovely back garden.
This house is located in a quiet and peaceful neighbourhood.

name: Unique king-size room
description:
South-facing king size bedroom in Georgian flat with beautiful features.
You will be sharing the flat with Mark, who works in the media, and Antonio, who works in finance. There is a spacious sitting room with dining table, a compact kitchen and a nice bathroom with good quality shower. The flat is just 5 minutes from the many galleries, cafes, bars and restaurants at The Shore. Free parking is available nearby and there are frequent buses to the city centre.

name: Modern Flat in Central Edinburgh
description: Stylish 1BD flat with mezzanine as an extra sleeping space. In the flat, you have an open-plan living space. The flat features a couch, smart TV, double-glazed windows. You also have blackout blinds for privacy. The equipped kitchen includes a, microwave, oven, fridge and freezer. The flat features a desk and cosy bed, and a walk-in shower with a rainfall showerhead. This flat is situated in the vibrant Cannonmills, which is located in the city centre, ideal to explore the city's attractions.

name: 5-BR 3-BTH Newington Apartment - Modern & Spacious
description:
Stay in one of Edinburgh's huge tenement flats, on the south side of the city, surrounded by a multitude of quirky cafes, bars and restaurants, and with easy access to the Old Town, Castle, with a further stroll to the New Town and beyond.

The Newington neighbourhood is near the foot of Arthur's Seat, by the Commonwealth Pool, and by the Meadow's park in Edinburgh offering great active and outdoor options if you fancy a break from urban exploring.

name: Brand new entire 2 bedroom flat, free parking!
description:
Welcome to our brand new cozy flat! We've furnished the space to create a familiar, inviting atmosphere for our guests.

In the apartment, you'll find:
- 1 King bed, 1 single bed & 1 Sofa bed
- Nespresso Coffee machine
- Pantry with rice, pasta, ramen, granola, regular & oat milk
- Luxurious Emma mattress, hotel-style linen and soft towels
- Washing machine/dryer/ dishwasher
- 65" smart TV, board games
- Hairdryer
- Real plants
- 10 minutes from city by car/ bus
- 15-minute walk from the beach!

name: Luxury 3 bed house in Edinburgh, Prestonfield
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place, full house recently undergone full make over top to bottom 3 spacious bedrooms with double beds.

name: Cozy Double Bedroom
description: You'll find a very cosy double bedroom with a desk and internet access, perfect for holidaymakers. Located just 30 minutes by bus from the city centre, the flat is well-served by a bus service that conveniently connects with the airport, making it a convenient choice for travellers. You'll find various amenities nearby, including shops, restaurants, and cafes, offering you a range of options for dining and entertainment. You will share the property with me and two very friendly border collies.

name: Vibrant & Cosy Flat in Leith
description:
A vibrant and modern one-bedroom flat with free on-street parking outside. Perfect for couples exploring the city, it's complete with a double bedroom, open-plan kitchen and living area, and separate W.C and walk-in shower.

Located in Leith, it's great for getting off the beaten track. Within a 10-minute walk, you'll find Alby's, for (arguably) the best sandwiches in the city; The Little Chartroom, a laidback fine-dining restaurant; and Lind & Lime Distillery, where you can book a gin tasting.

name: York Place City Centre 2 bedroom deluxe Apartment
description: In the heart of Edinburgh city centre, set within a Georgian townhouse and  accessed by a beautiful staircase, our 1st floor 2 bedroom deluxe apartment is perfect if you're looking for space and comfort . Just a 3 minutes’ walk from Princes Street & a 10 mins walk from the Royal Mile. Opposite is the St James Quarter, one of the most modern shopping/ leisure facilities in Europe.  Enjoy easy access to restaurants, public transport & attractions. A great value stay in a vibrant part of the city
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

description: In the heart of Edinburgh city centre, our large ground floor 2 bedroom apartment is perfect if you're looking for space and easy access, no stairs needed. Set within a converted Georgian Townhouse just a 3 minutes’ walk from Princes Street & 10 mins walk from the Royal Mile. Opposite is the St James Quarter, one of the most modern shopping/ leisure facilities in Europe.  Enjoy easy access to restaurants, public transport & attractions. A great value stay in a vibrant part of the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: private bedroom private bathroom
description:
private bedroom with a double bed for 1 person or couple. You will have your own bathroom but it is not in your bedroom. It is in the hallway. Nobody else will use the bathroom apart from you.
Fully furnished with a double bed and bedding linens. Wardrobe, desk , chair .
Back garden view
Free parking in our drive way. Very quiet area. Kitchen, bathroom are shared.

name: 2 bed apartment ideal for Royal Mile & Old Town
description:
Our 2 bedroom 1st floor apartment nestled in the vibrant Newington neighbourhood of Edinburgh offers a perfect home-away-from-home base. Featuring beautiful original cornicing and tall ceilings
Just a 15 minutes’ walk from the Royal Mile & Old Town & a further 10 minutes’ walk to Princes Street. Ideal for Arthurs Seat & Edinburgh University. Easy access to public transport, making it simple to explore all of Edinburgh’s must-see spots.

name: 1 bed Apartment ideal for Royal Mile & Old Town
description:
Our 1 bedroom basement apartment nestled in the vibrant Newington neighbourhood of Edinburgh offers privacy and comfort with its own entrance and direct access to a patio from the lounge.
Just a 15 minutes’ walk from the Royal Mile & Old Town and a further 10 minutes’ walk to Princes Street. Ideal for Arthurs Seat, Holyrood Park, the Royal Commonwealth Swimming Pool & Edinburgh University. Easy access to public transport, making it simple to explore all of Edinburgh’s must-see spots.

name: Dean Village Panoramic
description:
Welcome to my unique, peaceful, history-steeped home in the heart of Edinburgh with stunning panoramic views over the Dean Village and its famous bridge.

The street is wonderfully quiet despite its extremely central location.

Many of the city's best attractions are within easy walking distance such as Old Town, New Town, Stockbridge, Botanic Gardens, Princes Street, Edinburgh Castle, museums, galleries and Murrayfield Stadium for Rugby and concerts.

name: Home in Edinburgh - The Grange
description: Our home is a unique, very spacious and bright 'double upper' spread across the first and top floor of a listed detached Victorian stone villa from 1880, full of character and original period features. It benefits from good light throughout the day and offers superb views of Blackford Hill to the south and lovely views over large Grange gardens full of mature trees to the north. There is a large and very private garden that gets sunlight throughout the day.

name: Stunning SeaView Large secure Room, Balcony Access
description:
Welcome to our stunning seaside retreat located right next to Edinburgh's shoreline! Our cosy, lockable room also has private door access to the shared balcony with breath-taking views of Granton Marina & the sea located right in front.
Perfect for unwinding & taking in tranquil surroundings, while also being super close to city centre.
Ideal for nature lovers, couples, solo or business travellers,and tourists.
Book your stay today & experience the best of the city as well as its coastline!

name: Private room at edge of Meadows
description:
A nice and clean private room at just the edge of the Meadows, shared with hosts (a married couple with a daughter) who live in the apartment. The flat is at the top floor of a four floor building.

The room
It has a standard double bed, wardrobe, chairs with a desk to work. It is spacious, about 15 M^2. It is at the top floor and facing west allow you to enjoy the sun in the afternoon.

Guest access
For stays of a week or more, you have the kitchen available and well equipped to feel at home.

name: Complete City Centre Comfort
description: This unique place has a style all its own. Situated just a short walk from the centre of Edinburgh, with all of its shops, bars and restaurants, five minutes from the Scottish Galleries of Modern Art and The Water of Leith, which provides a peaceful meander into the heart of Stockbridge with its cobbled streets, elegant Georgian architecture, lush green parks & gardens and abundant mix of independent shops & restaurants. Stockbridge is one of the city’s most popular neighbourhoods.

name: Stylish Georgian city unit
description: This Georgian property in the conservation area of the historic and beautiful New Town has been wholly renovated and interior designed for maximum comfort. Occupying the whole of the basement with its own front door and rose courtyard, it is centrally located. 15 minutes walk to Waverley train station, trams, Calton Hill, Princes Street, Palace of Holyrood, Scottish Parliament, Royal Mile and Old Town. Enjoy easy access to the city for the castle, shops, restaurants, bars, galleries, theatres ..

name: Seaview, 1 bedroom, Tranquil space in Edinburgh
description:
Enjoy the stunning Seaview and relax in this calm, stylish space.

1 bedroom, 1 bathroom newly renovated apartment in relaxing residential area with private parking along with excellent bus route connections.

Well equipped kitchen, bathroom with both bathtub and shower, bright airy lounge room inclusive of sofa-bed.

Enjoy the beautiful Seaview over Wardie Bay from the private balcony and look out for the 3 local seals who visit regularly.

If you have any requests or questions please just ask.

name: Lovely Central Double En Suite Room - free parking
description: Enjoy a relaxing experience at this centrally-located place.  Bedroom with small en suite shower room / toilet  in beautiful family home. UK king size bed, coffee machine & clothes storage. Less than a 30-minute walk to the city centre or you can hop on a bus which takes you right through the heart of the city in fifteen minutes. Easy access for station/airport and a short  walk from the bustling area of Leith. Free parking available on the street. Please note - two very friendly dogs!

Very large and spacious private double (triple) bedroom on first floor.
Uk standards large double bed (135 cm)and a single bed.This is only put out for a third guest not for a 2 guest booking unless booked for 3 albeit 2.

Kettle, tea/coffee ,home baking, water, fruit, cup-a-soup, biscuits incl in stay .

Bathroom with macerator toilet and shower just outside it shared with guests in opposite room only.

North facing so cool during summer months .

17 min walk to West Princess St.(Johnny Walker

description:
Large room in flat which looks onto The Meadows with easy access to everything from this centrally located place. This room is at the rear of the building so looks onto the garden and is quieter.

Lonsdale Terrace is a short walk through The Meadows to Bristo Square which is the epicentre of the Fringe. Major venues including Underbelly, Pleasance, Gilded Balloon and Assembly are all located in this area. Consequently this flat is the ideal base from which to enjoy the festival.

Let us be your friendly hosts and provide recommendations for a memorable stay in Edinburgh. Book now for a comfortable and convenient experience in our welcoming home!

description: An entire Georgian garden villa apartment, very central yet calm and peaceful. A fabulous, relaxing place to stay, close to the Palace, Royal Mile and Holyrood Park. Sleeps up to six.

description:
Private room with separate bathroom (only used by guests) in the Cammo/Barnton area of Edinburgh.
- 7 minutes drive from Edinburgh Airport
- 10 minutes drive from South Queensferry and Queensferry crossing
- 10 minutes drive from Royal Highland Centre/Ingliston.

Convenient bus routes to the City Centre of Edinburgh:
- Bus 43, 17 minutes
- Bus 47, only 1 minute walk from the apartment and takes around 22 minutes
- Other options INTO the centre available.

Beautiful local forest walks nearby.

name: Gorgeous central 3 bed house free parking & garden
description:
Situated to the east side of Edinburgh only a 7 minute by Taxi or car from Waverly Station, this stunning property represents a great combination of an ideal location and comfort to a luxury standard. This is a modern and unique townhouse with a garden and off street parking.

This is a residential area therefore not suitable for parties or loud music. Both are strictly prohibited.

@cityscape_rental

name: Bright and spacious town house.
description:
Discover our charming townhouse, set over three floors in a picturesque seaside town west of Edinburgh. Lower level - your bedroom and access to back garden.
mid level - large kitchen, entrance hall, bathroom with bath, shower and toilet, small additional WC. Top level - stunning sea views, living room, office room. Large south-facing garden with BBQ and seating area. Enjoy the tranquility of seaside living and explore historic Edinburgh.

The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with all the essentials provided. The open planned living space features a wall mounted TV, dining area kitchen island and original fireplace.

description:
A stunning 1 bedroom flat located at The Cooperage on The Shore.

This vibrant Edinburgh area offers plenty of restaurants, bars, and cafes nearby.
At the doorstep is the most beautiful Water of Leith walkway which is perfect for an evening walk.

name: 2 bed apartment ideal for Royal Mile & Old Town

Our 2 bedroom 2nd floor apartment nestled in the vibrant Newington neighbourhood of Edinburgh offers a perfect home-away-from-home base. Featuring beautiful original cornicing and tall ceilings

name: Luxury Nests - Old Town 1
description: This stunning luxury apartment is nestled in the heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town, right next to the Grassmarket, one of the city’s most picturesque and lively areas. Recently renovated to the highest specification the apartment combines stunning contemporary design and the latest technology, resulting in an exceptional city centre living space.

name: Cosy flat
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: A wholesome home from home.
description:
Welcome to my extremely cosy and quaint periodic flat!

The flat boasts a large living room perfect for any occasion (and a built in office!) with large sofas (one which can be used as a very comfy bed), a futon chair (folds out to a bed), a spacious kitchen ideal for hosting, a very cosy and minimalist in style bedroom with a double bed, a recently renovated modern bathroom with a bath and waterfall shower.

A communal garden is situated to the rear which benefits from sun for most of the day!

name: 3-bed house with free parking near airport
description: Whole house for guests in quiet residential area near Edinburgh airport with good access to shops and public shops. Access to bus, tram and train stations.

name: Elegant West End / New Town - Georgian flat
description: Blissfully nestled on the quiet cobbled William Street, home to it's own artisanal delights and in the heart of the cosmopolitan West End and Unesco World Heritage New Town district. The flat is a stones throw from all of Edinburgh's main attractions, superbly located, just 20 minutes from Edinburgh Airport by tram with Haymarket and Waverley train stations within walking distance. The fashionable Stockbridge area is just short walk away, as is Arthur's Seat, the Water of Leith and Murrayfield.

name: Gorgeous City Centre Pad, 2 Bedrooms
description:
This gorgeous 2 bedroom flat is conveniently located close to London Rd Park on a desirable residential street within walking distance of all major Edinburgh sights and great bus links to all other parts of the city including the Botanic Gardens, Portobello and The Shore in Leith Edinburgh's hippest district.

It has been lovingly decorated to create a comfy stylish home with all the amenities required to enjoy a relaxing visit to our beautiful Edinburgh.

name: Cozy entire flat In the heart of city center
description:
Experience a one-of-a-kind stay in this beautifully styled, newly renovated 1-bedroom apartment, perfectly situated in the heart of Edinburgh’s city center.
Ideal for couples, the apartment accommodates up to 2 guests with a king-sized bed. Located on the 3rd floor (only accessible by stairs), it offers a peaceful and quiet atmosphere, away from the hustle and bustle, with the bedroom overlooking the garden for a restful night's sleep.

name: The Emirates
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.

name: Modern loft conversion in quiet residential area.
description:
Tastefully decorated spacious en-suite private room for up to 2 people. Easy access via public transport to vibrant Leith area and the city centre. Portobello beach is within easy walking distance and has an abundance of cafes and restaurants.

Our home is close to the A1 and there are many famous golf courses and beautiful beaches in East Lothian. There are 10 golf course within a 40 minute drive of the accommodation including Archerfield, Muirfield and Gullane Championship courses.

name: Comfortable 2 Bedroom Flat In The City Centre
description:
Welcome to our charming and cozy flat, located in the heart of the city. Our flat is perfect for couples or solo travelers who are looking for a comfortable and affordable place to stay while exploring the city.
The flat is located on the 1st floor of a historic building, which provides a unique atmosphere and plenty of natural light. The flat has been recently renovated and decorated with care, to create a warm and welcoming ambiance.

name: City centre sanctuary!
description: Keep it simple at this centrally-located place. Small and cosy studio apartment - amazing central location 10 minute walk to Leith, Stockbridge, Princes St!

name: Cosy Spacious 4 Bed Home w/ Garden
description:
We are always contactable to ensure your stay goes perfectly!
We have fully renovated a historic 1800s Tailors, located in the trendy Shore Of Leith. Built to the highest standards we paid homage to the building. You will have a 4 bed town house stretching 136 SQM all to yourself with rainfall showers, a bath to relax, towels, shampoo, conditioner & shower gel provided as well as freshly ground coffee and tea so you can relax in our sun trap south-facing garden to get your Scottish sun tan!

name: Home from home - near Edinburgh & Airport
description: Relax with the whole family / friends at this peaceful place to stay. Near Edinburgh / Airport and ingliston Park - with parking

name: Modern, Relaxing City Stay
description:
Bright top-floor flat in a quiet, well-connected area - ideal for exploring Edinburgh.

Minutes from the City Centre, Leith, Holyrood Palace & Portobello Beach. Free on-street parking & bus stop 2 mins away for easy access (15 mins to city centre). Large double bedroom, cosy lounge, modern bathroom & equipped kitchen.

Whether you're here to explore the city or unwind in comfort, this flat offers the perfect home base.

name: Sunny, spacious ensuite double room. New Town.

description:
The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place. Short distance walk into town, The Meadows, Arthur’s seat and lots more! Loads of local restaurants, bars and amenities.

Great location for adventures around Edinburgh.

If you’re coming for the Fringe Festival, you’ll be in the ideal location. 5-10mins walk to several larger venues!

name: Room in Edinburgh. My home your home!
description:
Located in a quite residential area, 17 minutes walk from Arthur's Seat "iconic landmark in Edinburgh" is a perfect starting point to explore the city. Walking through Duke's Walk you will reach the stunning scenery of St. Margaret's Lock in 20 minutes and Royal Mile in 35 minutes, otherwise if you prefer to use the public transport, there are plenty of buses to city center and it takes around 25 minutes. Get ready to explore! Enjoy the Nature, enjoy Edinburgh!
Thank you!
Roberto

name: Two Bedrooms in Historic Central Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our historic apartment in the centre of Edinburgh. We're perfectly located for main attractions, whether you want a walk up the Royal Mile, a visit to Britannia at Leith, or to explore shops and cafes of the New Town.

We’re an easy direct tram ride from Edinburgh Airport (45 min) or a short walk from Edinburgh Station (15 min).

Our peaceful neighbourhood is a perfect base for exploring – whether you’re looking for good food, Harry Potter tours, or the Castle.

Home share with Kerry in Edinburgh approx 20mins via bus into city centre.

Whole upper floor in beautiful detached house comprising of:

Double bedroom looking onto landscape garden with double wardrobe and shelves with tea and coffee facilities.

Second room available as sitting area with sofabed, small fridge, desk for work/dressing table complete with hairdryer and straighteners. Sofa bed can be used at an additional £20 per night.

Private Separate shower cubical and WC.

description: Dragon Suites is delighted to welcome you to this luxury 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment.
