The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with all the essentials provided. The open planned living space features a TV, dining area and sofa bed.

name: Private Double Room For 2 - In A Charming  Cottage
description:
Garden, Free Parking, Free Wi -fi, Quiet- Secure- pretty side of Edinburgh.

Double room for 1 person , or for couples or 2 sharing priced separately with additional guest fees .
The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place, plenty of transportation, close to the town center.


Communal areas include an outdoor smoking area, kitchen, shared bathroom and dining area, washing facilities .

Tea, Coffies, Cerial, Towels, Bedding provided.

name: Private  Room- In  A Shared Cottage
description:
This Room can be booked for 1 person, contact me if you require for second person, subject to availability.

You will enjoy easy access to public transportation close to amenities, and a centrally located place,. Charming old cottage for share.

Fully furnished, Free wi-fi, Free parking, Garden,

ID, £50.00 Key deposit required on arrival.

name: Double Room in Historic Flat on the Royal Mile
description: Experience an unforgettable stay in our immaculatley presented flat situated on the beautiful and bustling Royal Mile, Edinburgh's cultural and historical heart.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Whole apartment, one double-bed, Stunnning views.
description:
My cheery one bed apartment, with breath-taking views of famous Edinburgh landmarks like Edinburgh Castle, Arthur Seat and The Crags to name a few.

Situated in the residential south side of Edinburgh. this is a top floor flat with tidy communal staircase and on street parking

The city centre is just a short bus journey away and the apartment is within a 5 minutes walk to a bus stop.

name: Prime Location Striking Grand Apartment
description:
A spacious 235m2 two-storey apartment on the border of the prestigious New Town/West End, which is packed with top restaurants and bars. This stylish apartment boasts grand flowing space, creating lots of room to relax and socialise in style.

The flat is a stone's throw away from the Johnnie Walker Experience, Georgian House museum and the First Minister's Official Residence, as well as being a few mins walk from Princes Street Gardens and around 10 mins walk from the Old Town.

name: 2 bed 1 bath Apt on Royal Mile
description:
The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

This flat is on the 2nd floor, sorry no lift
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Quirky and Cute Apartment
description: A really unique home with lots of character and charm. Although only a 20 minute journey to Waverly Station, our 1 bedroom apartment is located in a very quiet cul de sac in a residential area of Leith. You have access to private garden with a dining area and chiminea.  Leith Links is right on your door step as well as great restaurants, bars and coffee shops. The apartment itself is small and cosy - perfect for a getaway for two

name: Quiet Single RM -For Women & Couples-  Duddingston
description:
Quiet single room (with sleep space for two) near Holyrood Park in east Edinburgh. You're welcome to share my home; would suit a city visit for work or an independent female traveler / duo. Access to all flat amenities - shared living room, well-equipped kitchen, clean fresh bathroom, shared grassy outdoor area. Free parking, fantastic walking opportunities, 15-minute (4km) bus ride from Waverley Rail Station, 35 mins (2km) walk from Portobello Beach, supermarket & bus links nearby.
No smokers.

name: Spacious 1 BR / king size
description:
Relax and unwind in this comfortable and spacious one bedroom apt in the heart of Edinburgh while being 15 mins drive away from city centre. The city offers awarding winning restaurants, boutique shops and a lively nightlife.

When ready enjoy this apartment and the many amenities it comes with.

Free Parking
High Speed Wi-Fi
Fully Equipped Kitchen
In- unit Washer
Cozy Bedroom
Office Desk

name: Garden & Art House, exquisite location
description: A family home with curated art collection, Persian rugs, and furniture from around the world. Located within a 10 minute walk to festival venues, Edinburgh University, and town centre, home retains a feeling of quiet countryside. The front door opens to a path to Arthur's Seat and the back door to secluded south facing garden, with seating and fire pit for chilly evenings. We have a lush garden with a herb spiral for salads and cooking, and shops, bakery, and restaurants within a short walk.

name: Peaceful private room
description: Relax with the peaceful place to stay. WiFi, kitchen access, parking space and Garden access.

name: 1 bedroom flat , King sized bed
description: Located in the City Centre, a 1 minute walk away from the Royal Mile/ Festival, your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place, comfy spacious bed, small area for exercise, all the necessities there for your stay.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stunning & central - plant lovers' dream!
description:
Welcome to your urban oasis in the heart of Edinburgh! Experience the best of city living in our stylish and cozy flat overlooking the lush Bruntsfield Links.

Step outside and play a round of pitch & putt on the Bruntsfield Links (clubs provided) or explore the area’s many cafes, shops, pubs, and restaurants. The central location is ideal, close to all of the attractions of the Old & New Towns but removed from the bustle of tourists, so you can experience the city like a local.

name: 1 bedroom apartment
description: 1 bedroom apartment located in the north west of Edinburgh. Very convenient for the airport and approximately 15minute drive from city centre of Edinburgh. Within walking distance to a supermarket, and easy access to public transport.

name: Cozy and very clean room with private bathroom.
description:
Bright, cozy single room in a family house, ideal for solo travellers. There is a private parking space and free Wi-Fi. Large bathroom for your own use -with shower and bath. I provide towels,shower gel, shampoo and hair dryer. There is also wardrobe and desk.
Great location with fantastic buses connection (15-20 mins to city centre ). There is also a bus to/from airport. (takes about 30 mins to get to airport on the bus, or from airport to my property). Bus stop is 5 mins walk from my house.

name: Steps Away from All the Action
description: City Centre Retreat: Stylish 2-Bedroom Flat near shops, transport, and hospital. Enjoy the stunning views of Arthur's Seat. Modern, spacious, and meticulously maintained. Perfect for families and groups seeking a comfortable stay close to Edinburgh's vibrant city centre.

name: Stag's View Lodge
description: Stag's View Lodge is a spacious bungalow with modern attic conversion. Located in a very peaceful residential suburb of Edinburgh. Easy access to city centre, Edinburgh Zoo, Murrayfield Stadium and local shops & conveniences. PREFERENTIAL RATES at Edinburgh Breaks (all one word) dot co dot uk

name: Charming Spacious Centre Edinburgh Apartment
description:
Wake up inspired to explore from this spacious apartment. The charming flat features contrasting blue and gold, varying textures and motifs, an open-plan layout, and contemporary furnishings and decor that combine to create an elegant and tranquil space. Walk to Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street or climb Arthurs Seat for a panoramic view. Many restaurants cafes, pubs and theaters nearby!

This accommodation features two double rooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Elegant 3-BR Central Princes Street Apt with View
description:
Ideally located on Princes Street, this 3-bedroom apartment is your home away from home. It features a spacious living area with a view of Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle, a large open-plan kitchen-dining-living area, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and 1 ensuite shower room.

- Conveniently located on Princes St - near local shops and restaurants.
- Near Princes Street tram stop, Waverley Train Station and Airlink bus stop
- Close to Edinburgh’s top tourist destination.
- Fully-equipped kitchen.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy King Room/Private Bathroom
description:
Escape to Edinburgh in style with this charming king room, perfectly located in the Gilmerton area. Enjoy a comfortable stay with:

- 1 King Bed: Relax in comfort and style
- Private Bathroom: Fresh towels, toiletries, and a relaxing space all to yourself
Convenient Location:
- Easy Transportation: Regular buses to the city centre (20-30 minutes)
- Shopping facilities: 5-minute walk to Morrisons and Aldi
- Friendly Host: Happy to help with any questions or recommendations

name: 17Teen
description:
Spacious Kingsize room with own en-suite inc walk-in shower plus continental breakfast and private parking.
Situated in west Edinburgh on the edge of a nature reserve within easy reach of the town centre, Edinburgh Airport, and road links to the North & South.
Murrayfield stadium is 20 mins away by bus/car - on match days parking and pre-match meals can be arranged a 15 minute walk from the game.
Perfectly located for city or countryside and a handy stop off point for touring around Scotland.

name: Annexe Apartment. Extended & Converted Garage
description:
New conversion
2 minute walk to Brunstane train station then a 7 minute journey to Edinburgh Waverley city centre, trains are every 30 minutes into town.
Great Lothian Regional Transport (LRT) buses nearby as well.
A lovely 20 minute walk into Portobello for loads of bars and restaurants plus the bonus of being right next to the beach.
About 30 minutes drive to some of the most beautiful golf courses in Scotland.

name: Stylish castle-view townhouse with secure parking
description:
A unique and stylish Edinburgh duplex apartment with an incredible view of Edinburgh Castle. A double bed upstairs and a double sofa bed downstairs plus a selection of quality fitments makes the space suitable for up to 4 guests.

It's a 3 minute walk to the famous Grassmarket with its array of cafes, bars, restaurants and independent shops, yet tucked away in a quiet street making it a perfect base from which to enjoy the best Edinburgh has to offer.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 2BR Bright New Town Flat - Castle View
description:
A bright and modern top floor two-bedroom flat perfect for couples or friends exploring the city. It's complete with 2 x bedrooms, open-plan kitchen and living area, and bathroom with walk-in shower.

Located in the New Town, it's great for exploring both local favourites and top tourist attractions. Enjoy breakfast next door at Hata, take a 10-minute stroll to charming Stockbridge and it's famous Sunday Market, or head up to the Old Town to explore the Royal Mile & Edinburgh Castle.

name: 5 min walk to city center
description:

flat unavailable for Airbnb at the moment.

Walking distance towards Edinburgh Castle. Scottish Parliament, Arthur Seat mountain 🏔️
Spacious and Clean
wifi available!

flat is on 3rd floor without lift/elevator 🛗

name: 5 bedroom, 3 toilet, 2 shower, bath,2 reception
description:
Dreghorn House is a fully licensed (STL-Ref 511069) and spacious 4 bedroom, 3 reception house. Our inviting kitchen is fully stocked with appliances and utensils, perfect for cooking!
The house has been completely transformed and underwent a massive refurb into a beautiful, bright and welcoming home located in the affluent village of Colinton, rich in history with easily accessible public transport.

name: Elegant & Bright Haven in Leith
description:
Welcome to our bright and spacious home in the vibrant neighbourhood of Leith! This spacious and stylish haven offers a comfortable and homely atmosphere, where you can unwind and relax after an exciting day in Edinburgh.

Book now and experience the perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience that our home has to offer!

Licence no EH-70890-F
EPC rating D

name: Stylish & Vibrant Retreat in Leith
description:
Welcome to our luxurious and elegant home nestled in the heart of vibrant Leith! This bright, colourful, and vibrant haven is a stylish retreat that promises a truly unforgettable stay. Step into a comfortable and homely space where you can relax and unwind.

Book now and experience the comfort, style, and convenience of our remarkable home. Your unforgettable Edinburgh adventure starts here!

Licence no EH-70898-F
EPC rating C

name: Warriston Loft
description: Peaceful, stylish and modern apartment just on the outskirts of the city with great transport links.  Very private south west facing balcony with views across the field with the Pentland Hills in the back drop.  Completely renovated this year. The apartment is above our domestic workshop within the grounds of our house.  The parking is off street and within a closed gate. The parking and gate is shared with us.

name: Penthouse in Leith with free parking
description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for family and group trips.

It's really close to fantastic park and beach. One of not many apartments with free parking (you can park anywhere below the block of apartments)!

The apartment is on the 5th floor with an elevator.

Licence number: EH-69968-F
Energy Performance Certificate (EPC): Band C

name: Lovely 1-bed in Leith
description:
Spacious 1-bed second floor flat in a well-kept tenement building in Edinburgh’s historic port of Leith. With a recently refurbished kitchen, it is ideal for couples, friends and business travellers looking for a convenient and comfortable base in Edinburgh. Perfectly located within 1 min walk of a bus stop, 7 min walk to the tram stop and 24 min walk to the city centre.

Surrounded by restaurants, cafes, pubs and parks you can immerse yourself in the vibrancy of Leith and The Shore.

name: Cozy 1 Bed Flat in the Heart of Leith, sleeps 4.
description:
Perfectly located in the centre of Leith, close to Arthur Seat and just a 15 min walk to Edinburgh city centre, this one bedroom flat with modern decor throughout is the perfect base to explore the wonders of the historic city of Edinburgh.

Equipped with all the amenities of your own home to ensure your stay is as comfortable as possible. Excellent location with multiple transport links, Leith is the ideal place to experience the 'real Edinburgh' avoiding costly tourist traps.

name: Private room in 2-bed flat
description:
Fabulous view from window room and located in a quiet central area. Convenient bus and tram system to reach anywhere in Edinburgh.

Bed liners, duvet and pillow covers included. Generous speed of broadband.

Bedroom door comes with a secured key fob, so that you have maximum privacy while you are staying here.

name: Carlton Corner Edinburgh Home Central!
description:
Notice: we re at central location and walking distance to everywhere.
Due to the peak season, The pictures of the rooms are real.
Please note that the room must pass through the stairs as shown in the picture, so if you cannot accept climbing the stairs, please do not book a room.

name: Beautiful room with Meadows & Castle view. Central
description: Stunning room with leafy views in historic home dating from 1880. Overlooking Links & Meadows (100 acres of parkland). Clean, spacious, quiet. The house has lovely period features and modern high-end finishes. This is the perfect location: Old Town & Royal Mile 10 min walk. Close to Uni and Festival. Marchmont is a safe affluent neighbourhood with independent cafes, restaurants and bars. Gyms, Victorian pool, yoga studios, tennis courts and golf course (dates from 1761) all on your doorstep!

name: 2 Bed Royal Mile Apartment
description:
My place is located in vibrant Royal Mile area - can sleep 4 persons Right in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old-Town. Princes Street, Waverley train station and the Royal Mile are a 5/10minute walk away... This is a beautifully two-bed flat on the 3rd floor, sorry no lift in the middle of famous Royal Mile. My place is good for couples and families (with kids).
My Apartment sleeps 4 comfortably in the double and 2x single bed - there is also a comfortable living room.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 2 ensuite BRs, 2 king-sized beds, with breakfast
description: After a day walking up Arthur's Seat, shopping at an amazing Italian deli, hearing great comedy, and exploring Edinburgh, come back here to cook a fabulous meal. The kitchen is well-equipped with spices and cooking essentials for European and Asian cooking. Fast wifi, dedicated work spaces, and shelves full of great books will stimulate your mind and body. It sleeps 4 comfortably, or 7 who are very friendly together. Sheets are 100% cotton, washed in unscented soap. Friendly dog lives here.

name: Tour Scotland in Ruby red, VW campervan
description:
For hire, our lovely VW crafter campervan Ruby Red is ready to see Scotland or afar. insurance and unlimited miles included in price.
Ruby red is based on a VW Crafter long wheelbase van with a full-height roof, and a good strong engine. There is a fixed comfortable bed at the rear, running water, LED lights, phone charger points, an opening skylight plenty of storage in the garage, a portable toilet.
We supply, sheets, duvet, pillows, towels, tea and coffee.

name: Quirky space with garden access
description: this former recording studio. Close to Edinburgh city centre

name: Stunning Georgian house with 2 bedrooms
description: Directly opposite Edinburgh’s famous Botanical gardens, this beautiful New Town family home is situated right in the City Centre. Surrounded by excellent restaurants, local bars and with lots of green space this is the perfect location for your visit to Edinburgh.  There are excellent transport links all over the City.

name: Charming & Peaceful Hideaway in Leith
description:
Welcome to our stunning detached house in Leith, where a bright and boho vibe awaits you. This spacious and gorgeous retreat offers a secluded and tucked-away spot, providing the perfect place for quiet relaxation after a day of exploring Edinburgh.

Our house is a hidden gem within the city!

name: Stunning Ensuite Apartment
description:
Stunning double bedroom studio apartment in the heart of Edinburgh’s West End.

Our well appointment double bedroom includes a private Ensuite bathroom.

A tv and seating area is provided. Complimentary tea and coffee making facilities also available.

Own front door for ease of access.

Please note- our studio apartment does not include a kitchen or any cooking/microwave facilities.

name: King-size & double room in a garden flat
description: Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place.

name: Double bedroom in NorthEdinburgh
description:
Our apartment is situated in the Nort of Edinburgh only 20mins away to the city centre by bus.
The room is a cosy but very comfortable double bedroom well furnished. We count with a very big living room with 55" Smart Tv and a very well equiped and spaciaus kitchen
Feel free to use our private garden!
Very convenient for those coming by plane since we have direct buses to the airport from almost our doorstep - and also for those arriving by car since we have private CCTV watched private parking.

name: Warm Homehub in Edinburgh city!
description:

name: Private room with en-suite
description:
Welcome to our charming Airbnb in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town. Located in a building dating back to 1822 and next to Holyrood Palace.

The en-suite bathroom offers modern luxury fixtures and a refreshing rainfall shower, providing complete privacy and convenience throughout your stay.

Just steps away, you'll find yourself immersed in the vibrant atmosphere of the Royal Mile, where you can explore historic landmarks, charming cafes, shops, and Holyrood Palace, all just moments away.

name: Homely Flat with Panoramic View
description:
We invite you to feel at home & enjoy the beauty of Edinburgh staying in our peaceful flat! A short bus from our doorstep will take you to the action, and when you need to rest or work, our 'WFH-ready' flat is surrounded by a quiet area.

Walking Distance:
- The Botanic Gardens
- Inverleith Park & the very popular Stockbridge area
- The Old Chain Pier & Newhaven

Short Bus:
- Leith area & Leith Walk
- The Castle & Royal Mile
- Princes Street
- The Fringe Festival

Andrew & Eve

name: Luxury City Centre Oasis ~ Lux Spa Bath ~ Romantic
description:
Welcome to the luxurious 1BR 1Bath getaway nestled in the upmarket central neighbourhood of West End.Immerse yourself in the high-end ambience of our brand-new city oasis and enjoy the opulent settings while being just a few mins away from famous historic landmarks, Edinburgh Castle, Royal Mile, Princes street, and exciting attractions.

✔ Comfortable Double Bedroom
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Luxury Spa Bathroom
✔ Front Patio
✔ Smart TVs
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi

name: Gorgeous Centrally Located Flat
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Our gorgeous basement level flat is located a short 12 minute walk from Edinburgh Waverley train station and Princes Street. The flat is bright, tastefully decorated and characterful with original features. Enjoy an authentic Edinburgh experience in this beautiful space.

name: Entire one bed flat in quiet area.
description:
A small, cosy top floor one-bed flat located next to local amenities: supermarkets, bars and transport links.

Only a short bus ride from the centre of town and out to the airport, this flat is ideal for the solo traveller or couples wanting their own space.

Free parking is available on the street.

name: The Meowhaus
description: Welcome to Meowhaus, where every whisker, tail and toe bean is celebrated. It’s the ultimate sanctuary for cat lovers (and their non-cat-obsessed partners too). Tucked away in a quiet, leafy part of the city, Meowhaus is a spacious, cat-themed maisonette with serious charm and zero cattitude.

name: festival triple close 120m to beach
description: very comfortable bright  room in a relaxed family home. 120m to beach and 120m from great bus service number 26 to city centre also runs through the night. Great local shops including several supermarkets. coffee shops and eateries.there is a gym and swimming pool 250m away and free on street parking.

name: Acogedora habitación
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space with good public transport connections, 15 minutes from city center.

name: 1 bedroom flat in Leith
description:
This studio flat is the perfect base to explore Edinburgh. With excellent transport links at your doorstep, you’ll have easy access to the whole city.

Whether you’re a solo traveller or a couple, our studio offers you the convenience and comfort you need!

name: Abhaile
description: Relax in our spacious apartment after a day exploring Edinburgh- with all the amenities and home comforts you could possibly need, set yourself up well to explore our beautiful city.

name: Gorgeous Stockbridge garden flat
description: Ideally located in uber-hip Stockbridge, this stylish garden flat is perfect for all your needs, with a beautiful, peaceful garden to take your morning coffee in the sun before hitting the shows. With its village vibe, Stockbridge is one of the city’s most desirable  neighbourhoods, boasting an array of fantastic places to eat and drink, a great selection of local shops and within easy walking distance of the city centre.

name: Apartment Near Edinburgh Airport
description:
️￫ 2 Bedroom Second Floor Apartment with free parking has 2 double beds and 1 Sofa bed and sleeps up to 6 people.
￫ Ideal for group of professionals, young families, friends or a couple visiting Edinburgh for sightseeing or events
￫ Fully equipped kitchen,Fresh linen, towels and Professionally serviced.
￫ Extremely safe neighborhood
￫ 9-min in Taxi from Edinburgh Airport and Direct buses to Airport
￫ Direct buses (15-18 mins Journey), Tram& Train (8-12 Mins) to city
￫ High-speed WiFi,TV

name: Retro New Town Garden Flat
description:
A lovely two-bedroom flat with private entrance and garden. Perfect for a couple or small family exploring the city, it's complete with 1 x double and 1 x single bedroom, fully-equipped kitchen, open-plan living/dining room, and bathroom with shower-over-bath.

It's located in the beautiful New Town: within a few minutes walk you'll find The Pantry for one the best brunches in the city; The Last Word, a quirky and atmospheric cocktail bar; and (on Sundays) the ever-popular Stockbridge Market.

name: City Centre Apartment
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Enjoy a stay in a high end property with excellent views of Edinburgh castle.

name: Charming Victorian riverside cottage. Parking
description:
A charming and peaceful Victorian mill worker's cottage with a secluded private garden in West Central Edinburgh with beautiful woodland and river views.

A restful place to stay during Edinburgh’s very busy festival period. Despite being just over a mile from Princes Street and the city centre, the area is tranquil due to its proximity to the river and surrounding woodland. Owls can be heard at night and Kingfishers and Otters can be seen during the day. A rare find within the city.

name: Spacious Room with Private Bathroom  & Garden
description: Conveniently located in Abbeyhill, the flat is on a quiet street dotted with cosy front gardens. The spacious double room (about 17 sq m) with a double bed overlooks the front garden. The street is peaceful, yet only a few minutes from many bus links. It's about a 10 min walk to Parliament/Royal Mile/Holyrood Park/Leith Walk, about a 20 min walk to Waverley Station/Princess Street and about 30 min to the Castle/Grassmarket.

name: Heart of Stockbridge flat
description:
Lovely flat in the heart of vibrant Stockbridge area. Characteristic Shops, restaurants and pubs at your door step.
Two minutes away from the beautiful Inverleith Park and 5 from the famous Botanical gardens. City centre attractions at 10 min walk.
Sunday farmers market and many other summer activities 2 minutes away.
The flat has a very good overall feel, facing the vibrant Stockbridge Main Street on the front and lovely green private gardens on the back.

name: Delightful Fully Licensed Room in the Inch
description:
Bright, spacious Room with afternoon sun and a small garden in the south of Edinburgh. View of Edinburgh castle.
I have another room available in the same house. Please go to my profile to see it.

SMALL BREAKFAST INCLUDED

name: Quiet&Modern Double Room Stockbridge, Edinburgh
description: The peaceful and charming area of 'Comely bank' is situated within a 5min walk of the very popular and stylish location of Stockbridge, which hosts an excellent range of shops, cafes, restaurants and bars. The property enjoys all the benefits of city centre living as-well as the option to relax in the Royal Botanic Gardens & Inverleith Park which are within a 5/10 minute walk away. The city centre is accessible by foot within 20mins and has excellent transport links to the city via bus or taxi.

name: Quiet bedroom in lovely Leith Walk flat
description:
Fully licensed with City Council EH-81950-P
Message me first, please, to enquire before booking.
Off-peak Discount available depending on length of stay.
Your double bedroom is peaceful and quiet, located at the back of a large first floor tenement flat on Leith Walk in Edinburgh, a haven of peace.
You will have priority over the shared bathroom.

name: One private room in Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our charming 1-bedroom Airbnb nestled in the heart of Edinburgh! This cozy and stylish accommodation offers a fantastic location that is walkable to the city center, Holyrood Park, Holyrood Castle, the Royal Mile, and many other captivating city attractions.
As you step into this private room, you'll immediately feel at home.
You will have access to a private bathroom, providing you with convenience and privacy throughout your stay.

name: Bright double room
description:
Double room within 10 minutes bus ride of Edinburgh city centre, Leith and Portobello.

Ideal for a Festival performer or solo visitor to the city.

LGBT friendly.

name: Dean Village Dwelling
description:
Enjoy a stylish and calming experience at the centrally-located Dean Village Dwelling, only a few minutes walk from the bustling west end of Edinburgh, yet tucked away in the tranquil oasis of the historic and quirky Dean Village.
With Bosch and Miele appliances, Egyptian Cotton White Company bedding on super comfy beds, Illy coffee, Arran Aromatics toiletries, complementary 2 days breakfast, Prosecco, water and Scottish goodies you’ll feel you've found somewhere really special

name: Edinburgh Retreat
description:
Located near restaurants and independent shops you will feel a part of the community while relaxing in a comfortable home away from home. Bus transportation is at your doorstep while cabs and other car services are readily available.

This flat has it all.

name: Unique Edinburgh flat
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.
Top floor of a very unique building in the east of Edinburgh.
With views or Arthers seat and a beautiful private garden.
Short walk to both Leith and Portobello and with excellent, regular bus links into the centre.

name: Beautifully Decorated 2Bed Apt- Gem in City Center
description:
Enjoy a cosy experience at this centrally-located Georgian flat:
✔ 2 bedrooms:
* 1st: king size bed + sofa + wardrobe
* 2nd: double bed + wardrobe + table
* living room: 2 sofas, TV, table
✔ 1 bathroom (bath + shower), organic cosmetics
✔ Fully furnished spacious kitchen: Nespresso coffee machine, tea selection, large table.
✔ 10-minute- St James Quarter Shopping Mall
✔ 15-minute- Calton Hill
✔ 15-minute- Edinburgh Waverley train station
✔ 30-minute- Edinburgh Castle

name: 2 bedroom flat with pool & sauna
description: Cosy 2 bedroom flat 5 minutes walk from Haymarket Station and 15 minutes walk from Princes Street. Direct access to a lovely rooftop terrace with seating and 360 views of the city, including spectacular view of Edinburgh Castle - great for watching firework shows in a private setting. The building has a heated swimming pool, gym facilities and a sauna which can all be booked privately free of charge.

name: Very Modern Central Edinburgh Apartment
description: Central and very modern flat located in Edinburgh City Centre just off vibrant Leith Walk - this lovely apartment is close to all the best attractions Edinburgh has to offer, including Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile and Holyrood Palace. This apartment is also equipped with free Wifi, Central Heating, Double Glazing and with Wooden and Carpeted flooring. Fifteen minutes walk to Princes Street, great public transport connections including Tram and Bus. Perfect for Couples and Solo Adventurers!

name: 4 bedrooms house with garden
description:
Entire, new build house with lovely, large garden, 4 bedrooms with 4 double beds, living room with a 65" TV and cosy sofa, spacious kitchen with dining area, utility room, 2 bathrooms and a toilet.

Great bus connection to the city centre. Bus stop located 3 minutes walk away.

House located in quiet and peaceful area. 5 minutes car drive to the shopping center. Shops, pharmacy etc. in walking distance.

name: Cosy room in Edinburgh, Leith Female guests only
description:
Situated in the trendy area of Leith and very close to the city centre where all the main attractions are. There are lots of restaurants, coffee shops, bars and boutique’s within walking distance from my apartment. There is a tram stop at the top of my street for easy access to and from town and the airport.
Leith is a great place to stay when visiting Edinburgh, and a very safe and friendly part of town. I’m in a very popular location - so there’s lots to see and do

name: Stylish Victorian Apartment for Two in Edinburgh
description:
A spacious and beautifully decorated top floor apartment in a traditional (1890s) tenement with commanding views. A short walk from Holyrood Park and the Royal Mile with easy access to all of Edinburgh's main attractions.

The apartment comprises a bedroom with a European King Size bed, a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, hallway, and cosy living room.

There is a large supermarket five minutes walk away.

Government licensed, Health and Safety Compliant.

name: Edinburgh’s Western Harbour Sea View
description: Wake up to sweeping sea views in this spacious and stylish three-bedroom apartment nestled by the coast of Edinburgh. Perfectly positioned just steps from the shoreline, this bright and airy home offers the best of both worlds—tranquil seaside living with easy access to the heart of the city.

name: Saxe-Coburg Sauna Apartment Stockbridge
description:
Experience the charm of this luxurious Georgian garden flat built in 1831. Located in Stockbridge - one of Central Edinburgh’s most popular upmarket neighbourhoods - it is the perfect base to relax and enjoy the local restaurants and shops, and only a 20-minute walk or a 5-minute Taxi to Princes Street.

Renovated throughout as a boutique designer home with 3 bedrooms, 3 en-suites, large Spa bath and Sauna. Large private courtyard area and private rear garden. Unique for central Edinburgh!

name: Large double bedroom leith
description:
Welcome! My place is located within a charming neighbourhood. It's a perfect haven for those looking for a retreat but with easy access to the city centre.

Excellent transport links- bus stops 2 minutes from our place and a 10 minute walk to the tram stop that is perfect for getting to Murrayfield Stadium, Royal Highland Centre and Airport.

Please note that there is a gorgeous resident cat that is very friendly.

Hope you have an enjoyable stay.

name: Royal Mile Apartment, Sleeps 4
description:
Royal Mile Apartment! located in the heart of Edinburgh Old Town!

Welcome to our charming one-bedroom Airbnb in Edinburgh's Old Town. Located on The Royal Mile, it comfortably accommodates four people with a double bed and sofa bed. Explore historic landmarks like Edinburgh Castle and Holyrood Palace. Enjoy Edinburgh and sample Scotch whisky. Book now for an enchanting stay in this captivating Scottish city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Flat in central Edinburgh
description:
This beautiful, traditional flat is nestled in the heart of Edinburgh. Located just a 15 minute walk from the city centre, the flat provides a peaceful base to explore the city. It is also located just under Calton hill allowing guests to be enjoying the amazing views Edinburgh has to offer in just minutes.

- Stunning king sized bedroom
- Charming kitchen perfect for a leisurely breakfast
- Spacious lounge
- Luxurious shower and bathroom

name: Modern 2 beds city apartment
description:
Modern 2 bedrooms apartment located near a lake and only approximately 20 minutes walk to the city centre and main tourist attractions Arthur Seat, Holyrood park. It is suitable for up to 4 people.
Ideal for whoever is looking for a quiet place but also wants to be in close proximity to the city centre.

name: A lovely double room near centre
description:
Welcome to this double room in our lovely flat, the perfect base for your visit to Edinburgh!

Located in a residential area, it's well connected to the city center (~10 minutes on the bus) and Old Town (~17 minutes on the bus). Frequent buses are just a few minutes from the flat.

The apartment is shared with me and my partner who will make sure you have everything you need (including lots of good tips when exploring the city!) for a pleasant stay.

MUST CLIMB STAIRS - We are on the 4th floor

name: Cosy bright home in Murrayfield
description:
Our nice and cozy house offers you a perfect base to explore Edinburgh. Locates in a residential area with excellent public transportation, 15 mins bus/tram journey to Princes Street, 15 - 20 mins bus/tram from the airport, and popular Edinburgh Zoo, Murrayfield Stadium are both 10-15 minutes walk away.

We also have free on street parking if you are driving, and a back garden for you to enjoy some sunshine. With 2 bedrooms and 1 sofa bed, our house comfortably accommodates 4-5 people.

name: Cosy & Spacious Victorian Apartment@Edinburgh City
description:
A cosy and spacious home, perfect for your Edinburgh visit!
Enjoy an outstanding location near The Meadows, within walking distance of Summerhall, Pleasance, George Square, Queen’s Hall, Festival Theatre, Edinburgh Castle, Arthur’s Seat, the Royal Mile, and the University of Edinburgh.

For a true Edinburgh experience, live like a local in a charming, traditional apartment!

name: Spacious 1 bedroom flat at Edinburgh Shore
description:
Located in Edinburgh shore's historic Timber Bush, our flat is set in a 19th century conversion. This spacious 1 bedroom flat includes a sitting room, well-equipped kitchen, bathroom with a good-quality shower. The bedroom has a double bed.

The flat is 2 minute walk from a tram stop, taking you directly to the city center and airport. There are also galleries, cafes, bars, and Michelin star restaurants right outside the flat.

name: Newly Renovated Super King En-Suite | Free Parking
description: A newly beautifully renovated Super King bedroom with an ensuite bathroom + huge walk in shower to a very high standard. Your own private door access. Free parking. Luxury bedding, duvet, 4 pillows and towels provided. Tea and Coffee in room provided and access to garden if wish. There is also a microwave, mini fridge + plates provided. Close to bus+walks into centre of town and a short walk to Stockbridge, Botanical Gardens and Inverleith Park. Me and my children live in the main house.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Cozy Room in Edinburgh City Centre
description:
Welcome to the Magical and Beautiful City of Edinburgh!
Located in New Town just meters from the famous Calton Hill, the room offers a cozy place to relax and rest.
Edinburgh is a perfect city to walk around and discover its history and mysteries, so a hot bath with hydromassage will be waiting for you when you get back to the flat.
In addition, the place is located in the LGBTQ+ neighbourhood of the city so at night you will have many options of restaurants, bars and nightclubs to have fun.

name: One bedroom modern apartment
description:
Ground floor apartment set within a newly
refurbished Art Deco building (2018); high ceilings, free private parking.
Flat is in a modern private residential development situated a ten-minute walk from the
Western General Hospital and is close to Ferry Road. Regular bus services run to nearby
Stockbridge, Craigleith Retail Park, the restaurants and riverside walks in Newhaven and Leith, city centre, and the airport. A supermarket, pharmacy, fitness centre and local
amenities are close by.

name: Leith Hospital - A Boutique Family Airbnb in Leith
description: Leith Hospital is a boutique Airbnb located in The Shore area of Leith, Edinburgh, which Time Out rated as the 4th coolest neighbourhood in the world in 2021. This beautifully converted former hospital blends historical architecture with contemporary design, spread across two floors. It features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and a spacious living room with a double-height ceiling, creating an ideal space for families. The Shore is 7 mins tram ride from Edinburgh New Town and 44 mins from the Airport.

name: Midsummer House
description: Large, Detached, Victorian House in Edinburgh City Centre. Only 5 min walk to the Airport Tram stop and 15 mins walk from Princes Street. Large back and front private, mature, walled gardens. Free private parking. Not overlooked by neighbours so total privacy, with large park across the street. Original features, multiple fireplaces and en suite bathrooms.

name: Spacious, central and newly decorated apartment
description: This flat is bright and airy and suitable for larger families like my own. It's been recently re-decorated to a very high standard (Aug 2023).  The location is in the heart of Leith with a great selection of trendy bars and restaurants and only 20 minutes walk from princess street. The Edinburgh tram stops less than a 5 minute walk away which will take you to and from the airport in under 30 minutes.  We are ground floor however up 6 steps off the ground.

name: Thomahome cosy&stylish apartment
description:
This beautiful 2 bedrooms apartment is centrally located but still it’s a quite area with view over Lochend Park with Lochend Loch.

The apartment is situated on the first floor with lift access.

Two bedrooms with separate bathrooms for each room.
Separate living room, the fully fitted kitchen/dining area has everything you need for your stay.

Everything has been done to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

Many attractions within walking distance.

name: Single room in a new build house
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

The bathroom is only for guests and it is shared only when the other room is occupied by other guests.

Smoking/ vaping is not permitted anywhere inside our Airbnb, guests can step outside and smoke. All rooms, bathrooms and hallways are fitted with smoke alarm and any kind of smoke or steam will set the alarm off.

name: Happy House.
Warm comfortable bedroom.
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING.

A Very popular room in the heart of Edinburgh. You will be sharing apartment with the owners and our dog 'Pickle'. We will assist you with check in. We would like to clarify our house rules:
There is no access to kitchen.
No check in after 9pm.
Quiet time is from 11pm until 7am.
Remove outdoor shoes at the door.
Please do not slam/bang doors.
We are Very friendly and happy to provide information, just ask.
Please begin message 'OK' to show you agree.

name: Spacious 1-BR Flat near Meadows and city centre
description:
This stylish 3rd-floor 1-bedroom flat is located in a highly desirable residential area in central Edinburgh in a safe yet lively area - Bruntsfield.

- Spacious double bedroom for 2 guests and an airbed in the living room for the 3rd guest.
- Short walking distance to local cafes, bakeries, restaurants, and supermarkets.
- Large well-equipped kitchen.
- Easy reach to the city centre by bus or on foot.
- Ideal for leisure, business trips and couple retreat.

name: Fringe Leith flat
description:
Leith 2 bed flat with 2 double beds, kitchen and bathroom.
Sleeps 4
Fridge accommodations, up to central Edinburgh on a 10 mins tram.
Leith has great bars and coffee shops nearby.
Weekdays Paid parking outside but I can send you pin for free street parking ;)
Free weekend parking

No party’s or smoking inside

STL number EH-89180-E
Only late July and August booking excepted

name: Castle View Retreat
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located two-bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town, just a 5 minute stroll to Edinburgh Castle and The Royal Mile. Welcome to Castle View where modern comfort meets historic charm. This contemporary space offers a cosy retreat amidst the bustling vibrancy of the Grassmarket, one of Edinburgh’s most iconic areas. Perfectly situated for exploring the city, Castleview is more than a place to stay; it’s a welcoming home from home.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 1 bedroom flat Leith, sleeps 4
description:
This studio flat is the perfect base to explore Edinburgh. With excellent transport links at your doorstep, you’ll have easy access to the whole city.

With 1 double bed and a sofa bed, this is a great spot for a couple or a group of 4!

name: Cosy flat nestled in old town
description: The flat is nestled in the centre of the beautiful old town. Large bay windows flood the living area with light, and although it could not be more central, the bedroom is surprisingly quiet. It is a 'B' listed building, meaning it has special historical and architectural significance. An open stairwell leads up to the walkways leading to the flat. Everything is within a stone's throw of all attractions in the old town. The flat is cosy, comfortable and fully equipped for an unforgettable stay!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh seaside historic home
description:
Welcome to my home, right on Edinburgh's seaside! My apartment is a traditional Victorian building, a 60 second walk to the beach and the Promenade - Portobello is the place to be if you want to experience more local life and enjoy the sea air and many brilliant restaurants, bars and shops whilst still being very close to the centre. Several direct & quick bus services to the city centre stop right across the road departing and arriving very regularly.
Hope to hear from you!

name: Edinburgh Easy Flatshare room 3 free parking
description:
This apartment is ideal for anyone travelling on a budged. It’s a large apartment with a shared toilet, kitchen and living room. We are close to airport but to city centre is around 30 min by bus where bus stop is only 4 min walk

If you are passing by or vising Edinburgh here is a place you can stay. It’s safe and the area offer great travel links to the city centre.

There is also free car par which is very rare in Edinburgh to find. Here in this zone is all day free.

So book it now.

name: Edinburgh Easy Flatshare room 2 free parking
description:
Warm and sunny shared flat, great for anyone planing to visit Edinburgh for short or long stay. We are close to airport but to city centre is around 30 min by bus where bus stop is only 4 min walk

Flat has free parking space in case you are coming by car and a safe bike storage. Ideal place for anyone travelling on a budget or student that is still looking for accommodation.


I hope to see you soon.

name: Double room in a warm flat room 9 free car parking
description:
This apartment is ideal for anyone travelling on a budged. It’s a 4 bedroom apartment with a shared toilet, kitchen and living room. It’s close to airport , but to city centre is around 30 min by bus, where bus stop is 4 min walk

If you are passing by or vising Edinburgh here is a place you can stay. It’s safe and the area offer great travel links to the city centre.

There is also free car par which is very rare in Edinburgh to find. Here in this zone is all day free.

So book now

name: Cute room in charming flat!
description:
Really cute room in charming, spacious and recently renovated ground floor flat.

The bathroom and kitchen are shared spaces. There is also a communal garden off the kitchen ☺️.

There is a Tesco and Lidl less than a 5min walk away, nice pubs, cafes and shops all around the area. It’s a 15/20min walk to town too!

name: Holiday&Festival Room2
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Large room in spacious shared flat in South Central Edinburgh (single or double occupancy). Perfect holiday&festival location - 5mins Meadows and Holyrood Park, 5 mins University, 15 mins Princes Street. Rental per night or by block of nights

name: Holiday&Festival Room—-1
description: Generous Double Bedroom in a shared flat in South Central Edinburgh (single or double occupancy). Perfect festival location - 5mins walk from Meadows and Holyrood Park, 5 mins from University, 15 mins from Princes Street. Rental per night or by block of nights

name: Beachside property
description:
Three minutes walk from Portobello beach and excellent access to Edinburgh and East Lothian.

Master bedroom with Private En-suite . I provide basic toiletries such as shampoo, shower gel and conditioner . Hair styling tools such as hairdryer and straightener can be provided on request .

Towels provides .

Washing machine can be accessed on request .

Host occupied (just me).

Second floor apartment in quiet and peaceful neighbourhood , lots of local amenities on my doorstep .

name: Newly refurbished cottage conversion
description: Newly refurbished cottage converversion in the heart of Corstorphine, close to Edinburgh's vibrant city centre.  You'll love this private and romantic city escape. Easily accessible via a range of public transport options to and from Edinburgh Airport, rail stations and bus routes.  Close to Edinburgh Zoo and Murrayfield Stadium. Private outdoor space and free on-street parking  (updated photos to follow - watch this space!)

name: Old Town Gem
description:
Enjoy easy access to everything in Edinburgh from this centrally located rental, within walking distance to most of Edinburgh´s attractions.

Your bedroom is set up to be welcoming, comfortable and a great space to relax. It can be set up as a kingsize bed or two singles

You will be sharing the space with myself. Please note I also have a dog, Fred, who lives in the flat. He’s 15 and very well behaved and doesn't go into the spare room but he is NOT hypoallergenic.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Beautiful 2 bed Apartment with free onsite parking
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally- located place around 2.5 miles from the city centre and 1.2 miles from the beach.
Fantastic transport links around a 5 -10 min walk from the property
Please note we have a strict 4 pm check in and 11 am check out policy.
This is to provide time to deep clean the property for the next guests.

name: Thistle City Inn Room 3 King
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for group or individual trips.   Centrally located on South Bridge, five minutes from Princes Street and a stone's throw away from the Royal Mile/High Street.  One is surrounded by an array of shops, bars and restaurants and Waverley train station.  This is an ideal tourist location with Edinburgh Castle on your door step with a whole host of other attractions such as the National Museum, Dynamic Earth and the Scottish Parliament, all within a short walk.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright and comfortable central home
description: Comfortable 4 bedroom apartment, centrally located. The apartment is my home and so has everything you need to make it a home from home for your stay!

name: Stylish 3 Bed Apartment
description:
Welcome to our stylish 3-bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh!

Located just steps away from iconic landmarks such as the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle and the Palace of Holyrood House, this centrally situated retreat offers convenience and easy access to the city's top attractions.

With spacious bedrooms and modern amenities, our apartment provides a comfortable and stylish base for your Edinburgh stay. Book your stay today and experience the captivating charm of this remarkable city!

name: Charming Flat in the Heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town
description: Welcome to your home away from home, perfectly located in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town. Tucked away in one of the city's most prestigious and sought-after postcodes, this beautifully designed two-bedroom flat puts you just moments from the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street, and Waverley Station. Whether you're visiting for a festival, a family break, or a romantic getaway, this is the perfect base to explore the very best of the city!

name: Cosy Room In a Shared Apartment
description:
Lovely bright large double bedroom for rent in a 2bedroom flat. The area is quiet and easily accessible to various buses. There is also a train station that is only 5mins walk from the flat.
JD Gym, Odeon Cinema and a shopping mall are only 5mins walk away.

name: City Centre Hidden Hideout for 2
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located apartment, tucked away just off Rose Street and within reach of all central attractions.

Situated in a traditional historic building, the private apartment is on the first floor, accessible via a short spiral staircase. It features an open-plan living room and kitchen, a bathroom with a shower, and a cozy double bedroom.

This is the ideal spot to explore Edinburgh, with the added comfort of a professional clean.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: A wholesome home from home.
description:
Hey, you will be sharing my flat with me that boasts a large living room perfect for any occasion (and a built in office!) with large sofas, a spacious kitchen perfect for cooking up a storm, a very cosy and minimalist in style bedroom with a double bed (your room!), a recently renovated modern bathroom with a bath and waterfall shower.

A communal garden is situated to the rear which benefits from sun for most of the day!

name: Flat in leafy Bruntsfield
description: Spacious flat in leafy Bruntsfield.Quiet flat less than a minute walk from coffee shops, bars and shops in Bruntsfield.A few minutes walk from the meadows and a shared garden can also be enjoyed below the flat.A 20 minute walk to the centre of Edinburgh/Haymarket/the Grassmarket,regular buses are also available if you wish and there is a taxi rank located right opposite the flat.Please note i currently live in the flat also with my very friendly dog.

name: Chris’s Place
description: Sit back and relax in this calm, stylish space.  A contemporary bedroom/shower room in a historic Edinburgh main door tenement. Only 15 minutes on foot from the city centre, bars, restaurants, sights, theatres and the bustling shopping district.  Close to the botanical gardens, and many of the city’s most exciting neighbourhoods.

name: Thistle City Inn Room 4 King
description: Perfect for groups or individuals. Centrally located on South Bridge, five minutes from Princes Street and a stone’s throw away from Royal Mile/High Street.  One is surrounded by an array of shops, bars, restaurants with Waverley train station just a short walk away.  This is an ideal tourist location with Edinburgh Castle on your doorstep, alongside a whole host of other attractions such as the National Museum, Dynamic Earth and the Scottish Parliament, all within a short walk.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Luxury Detached Home
description: Nestled in the picturesque landscapes of Edinburgh, Scotland, and within 15 minutes to either the airport or center of town, your detached luxurious 4-bedroom home is awaiting your arrival. Overlooking the majestic Pentland Hills. this haven of tranquility offers a harmonious blend of elegance, comfort, and breathtaking views, enveloping you in a world of refined luxury.

name: The Sunny Side
description: Stunning modern double bedroom  in the quiet Craigmillar Castle residential area, a perfect fit for a couple or a solo traveller exploring the capital of Scotland.

name: Amazing location
description:
Spacious room in a beautiful flat located in Edinburgh's New Town on a prestigious street. Centrally-located but a peaceful room with an outlook over gardens to the rear.

License from: EH-70531-F

name: Thistle City Inn Room 1 King
description: Perfect for individual or group trips. Centrally located on South Bridge, five minutes from Princes Street and a stone’s throw away from Royal Mile/High Street.  One is surrounded by an array of shops, bars, restaurants with Waverley train station just a short walk away.  This is an ideal tourist location with Edinburgh Castle on your doorstep, alongside a whole host of other attractions such as the National Museum, Dynamic Earth and the Scottish Parliament, all within a short walk.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Thistle City Inn Room 2 Single
description: Perfect for individual or group trips. Centrally located on South Bridge, five minutes from Princes Street and a stone’s throw away from Royal Mile/High Street.  One is surrounded by an array of shops, bars, restaurants with Waverley train station just a short walk away.  This is an ideal tourist location with Edinburgh Castle on your doorstep, alongside a whole host of other attractions such as the National Museum, Dynamic Earth and the Scottish Parliament, all within a short walk.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Nice room on Meadows near University and Fringe
description:
Small single room with double bed in flat next to The Meadows with easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

Lonsdale Terrace is a short walk through The Meadows to Bristo Square which is the epicentre of the Fringe. Major venues including Underbelly, Pleasance, Gilded Balloon and Assembly are all located in this area. Consequently this flat is the ideal base from which to enjoy the festival.

Significant discounts available for longer stays.

name: Live like a King / Queen In The City
description:
Stay in our stunning 16th century castle full of wonderful history.
The land had been given to Clan Seton by Robert the Bruce in the 14th Century.
The newly refurbished 2 bedroom cottage an extension of the castle has a lounge, kitchen/dining, bathroom and free parking.
Located next to Edinburgh Airport only 7 miles from Spectacular Edinburghs Princess Street
Easily accessible from the tram route at the bottom of the grounds.

Step back in time when you stay at this unique and historic place.

name: Peveril Terrace
description: Lovely secluded garden and spacious comfy house with lots of common space to enjoy.

name: Large room in central Edinburgh
description: Beautiful, spacious and airy room in central Edinburgh (10 minutes to Royal Mile, 3 minutes to St George Sq), fantastic view on Arthur Seat. Two sleeping places - one double bed (fits 2 people) and a sofa (fits 1 person). Large fully equipped kitchen; separate shower and toilet rooms.

name: King size bedroom close city center.
description:
It's lovely and peaceful. The bedroom is a bright , airly and spacious room with king size bed , bedside table , wardrobe, desk and dresser. You are more than welcome to use the kitchen and living room is close in thr nights I sleep there. Common private Parking .
The flat is located in leith walk 2 minutes to coffee shops , restaurants, supermarkets and bus, direct tram from airport
and Water of Leith and Leith Links are great walk and enjoying the sunshine.

name: Stunning flat with castle view
description: Welcome to your perfect getaway in the heart of Edinburgh! Nestled in the charming Inverleith area, within close proximity to Stockbridge and the Royal Botanic Garden, this beautiful Victorian flat offers a home away from home. Perfect for couples, families and friends, this residence provides a relaxed retreat just minutes from the city centre.

name: Private room with terrace & free parking Edinburgh
description:
Lovely double room in our family home, with large decked terrace overlooking mature gardens. Private shower-room in hallway opposite room, with small 'cloakroom' sink and toilet. Fresh towels and linen provided. Tea and coffee making facilities in the room.
10 mins drive from Edinburgh Airport, and 5 mins walk to the main bus route for the city centre (20 mins by bus). Free on-street parking.
Perfect for couples, solo/business travellers and children. We have 2 children and 3 cats.

name: Close to trams and buses
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: Central Converted Distillery Penthouse
description:
Our apartment is light and spacious, very clean with easy access to Edinburgh’s city centre. Just a 15 minute walk to George Square and Princes Street or 7 min tram/ bus ride. Less than 5 mins walk to St Mary's Episcopal Cathedral.
It is in 3 mins walk to airport tram and Haymarket train station for travelling in the UK.
Washing machine, fridge, freezer, dishwasher. Private bar area. A working space. 2 bathrooms. 2 balconies. Projector for films/ sport if you have the connectors for your device.

name: Sunny Leith Room – Walkable, Peaceful, Connected
description:
Welcome to my charming Airbnb! Located near the sunny docks of Leith, my cosy and stylish accommodation offers a perfect retreat for travellers seeking comfort, convenience and an authentic local experience.

This Airbnb is two minutes away from Ocean Terminal, where both the Royal Britannia and tram lines are, and close bus links that can take you anywhere in the city. It is also situated in one of the friendliest and charming places in Edinburgh- Leith.
Sunshine on Leith :)

name: Sunshine On Leith - Bright and Breezy Flat
description:
This sunny and bright flat features high ceilings, a comfy double beds, bedside tables, and a set of stylish wood drawers.

Double doors open onto the deck and garden - perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation. Enjoy access to a recently renovated bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and the living space.

Ideal for couples or families exploring Edinburgh & Leith! Just a short stroll to Leith Links, the Shore’s buzzing bars, and the tram for easy trips to the city centre or airport.

name: Bright double room in city center.
description: It's lovely and peaceful and centrally-located place. The bedroom is double , bright and airly. It has bedside table , wardrobe and desk. You are most than welcome to use the kitchen and living room is open during the day then I sleep there.The flat is located in leith walk 2 minutes to coffee shops, restaurants, supermarkets and bus ( directly central Edinburgh in 15 minutes and tram until aeroport). It is also close Water of Leith and Leith Links.

name: Large Flat in Edinburgh 4/2 with mountain view
description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips or business trips. Our apartment comprises a living room which has a TV and comfortable sofas, providing a great means of comfort for when you are indoors.
The kitchen is fully-equipped with all the essentials you need.
There are two bedrooms. One bedroom has a double bed and the other has a double and single bed with an en-suite bathroom. There is two bathrooms in the apartment. The apartment has beautiful views of Arthur Seat Mountain
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Brand new and spacious entire flat, free parking!
description:
This brand new flat, completed in 2023 is conveniently located near Edinburgh City Centre (10 min) and the airport (20 mins).

In this bright and airy apartment, you'll find:
- Real plants!
- 1 King bed & 1 King sofa bed
- Super comfortable Emma mattress, high thread count linen & soft towels
- Nespresso coffee machine
- Washing machine/dryer/ dishwasher
- Hairdryer
- 65" Smart TV and board games
- Pantry with rice, pasta, ramen, granola, regular & oat milk
- a 15-minute walk from the beach

name: New Town traditional 2 bed flat
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Edinburgh 3 story family townhouse (5 bedroom)
description:
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.

Spacious 5 bedroom house is suitable for anyone looking for a quiet residential area near the airport (5 miles away) within the proximity of Edinburgh City Centre (also 5 miles away). This house benefits from generous room proportions complimented by recent refurbishments and new furnishings

name: Drumsheugh Garden House
description: A beautiful newly restored Victorian garden level property with a large wrap around private courtyard. The private front entrance is located on the lower ground floor of Drumsheugh House, situated on the prestigious Drumsheugh Gardens, in the leafy West End of Edinburgh. This quiet street is in the centre of the city; only a five minute walk to Princes Street, and a fifteen minute walk to the Royal Mile.

name: Great Flat, Spacious and bright
description:
3 bedroom modern flat, bright and spacious, always kept clean and tidy.
its in a nice quiet area 30min by bus from Edinburgh centre. Bus stop just outside the building.
the flat is fully furnised with all amenities available.

very safe area and lots of greenery and nice walks.

private parking space is available for free just outside the flat.

there's a local shop 5 minutes walk from the flat.

my 4 year olsld son stays with me 3 days week, he have his own bedroom.

name: Central Edinburgh Castle View
description: Beautiful Modern apartment, with stunning balcony views of the Castle. Fully equipped flat, with a architectural twist. Master comes equipped with a super kingsize bed, walk in wardrobe and en-suite. Spare room comes equipped with a double. There is a large bathroom located in the hallway. The sofa you see in the pictures without legs converts into a double bed. Enjoy a delicious breakfast in the sun looking onto a 900 year old castle.

name: Elegant Flat with Balcony
description:
✔ Stylish apartment near Calton Hill
✔ 398 ft2 | 37 m2
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Fully-furnished kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ A cosy balcony and free parking are available
✔ 9-minute walk to Dalmeny Street Park
✔ 15-minute walk to the Palace of Holyroodhouse
✔ 19-minute walk to Calton Hill
✔ 21-minute walk to the National Monument of Scotland
✔ Next to London Road Gardens
✔ 2-minute walk to Brunswick Road bus stop

name: Beautiful room - Victorian house
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Modern flat near Royal Mile, City Centre and Leith
description:
Enjoy a cozy experience at this centrally-located place.

Modern property very close to city centre. It is 15 minutes by walk from Holyrood park, the royal mile and Princess st. It’s also a 15 minute bus ride away from Portobello.

It’s a fully functional flat, with heating and hot water included. There is an air mattress and extra bedding available. Can comfortably fit two couples, or 3/4 people.

The flat is very close to Meadowbank Shopping Centre, for groceries and food.

name: In the heart of the Old Town beside the Castle!
description:
Situated in an iconic historical location just behind the majestic castle, 🏰our unique flat offers an unforgettable stay that combines comfort, classic & cozy design, and an authentic Scottish experience!

Our fully equipped kitchen allows you to prepare a hearty Scottish breakfast before setting off on your adventures.
Immerse yourself in the rich heritage as you explore the vibrant streets, enjoy the breathtaking castle view, and unwind in our thoughtfully designed space.
Enjoy your staying!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy private room with King sized bed
description:
A private bedroom in a newly built modern house just 25 minutes from Edinburgh city centre by direct bus. Ideal for someone who needs a place to spend the night comfortably and explore the iconic city of Edinburgh and nearby areas during day.

There is no kitchen facility available.

Due to religious reasons, no non-vegetarian food is allowed to bring in the house. Eg. Eggs, fish, or any other non-vegetarian food.

name: 1st Floor Room, mezzanine bed
description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.

name: Private 1 King Size Bedroom Flat in Murrayfield
description: Experience the Edinburgh charm in this traditional tenement flat, nestled in the vibrant Roseburn area - known for its blend of historic tenement buildings and green spaces - offering a peaceful yet convenient setting. Transport links are excellent - bus/tram links offer quick access to the centre/airport. Home to local shops, cozy cafes & essential amenities - Roseburn provides a friendly, community-focused atmosphere. Roseburn Park, runs alongside the Water of Leith - a scenic walking route.

name: The Old Gym (with parking)
description:
We've spent the last 2 years restoring this wonderful space and turning it into our family home.

Originally purpose built in the 1850's as a gymnasium, it is amazingly located in the centre of Edinburgh's "First New Town", less than 1 min walk from the junction of George St and Frederick St.

You are surrounded by all the bars, restaurants, pubs, venues, transport links and history of the famous New Town, yet on a quiet bar free one-way street.
There are 2 private parking spaces with the house.

name: Edinburgh great stay in Marchmont, 3 beds, quiet.
description: First floor flat with all essentials. Three bedrooms and a kitchen/living room. Two bedrooms have double beds, third bedroom with King size bed.  All newly furnished in 2022.  Dishwasher, microwave,  freezer, fridge. TV in lounge with Netflix.  Parking is pay and display.  Electric car charging a 5 min walk away on Thirlestane Rd. Access via KeyNest (0.8 mile away). Edinburgh council are introducing a 5% visitor levy on all stays for the first 5 nights this will be billed separately.

name: Edinburgh Castle Views! Stylish 2BD Flat, Sleeps 4
description:
Vibrant and spacious two-bedroom flat on the 4th floor with outstanding views of Edinburgh Castle.

Located on the fourth floor, this flat offers an open-plan living/ dining area, a fully fitted kitchen with all modern appliances, two comfortable bedrooms (king-size and double beds), and a fully fitted guest bathroom with a WC.

An excellent urban base to explore Canonmills, New Town, and the city of Edinburgh!
Beyond that, it becomes your tranquil hideaway with its great vibes and decor!

name: Cozy house
description: Stay in a spacious and tranquil home and forget about your worries and worries.

name: Bright room in Central Edinburgh
description:
Our home is both peaceful and centrally-located. The 1860s flat has lots of lovely features including a wood burning stove in the large shared living room. We are creatives with lots of books and pictures.

The room is bright with double bed, desk and ergonomic chair, hanging rail and drawers.

The flat is 10 minutes walk from National Museums Scotland, just by the Meadows and loads of buses. Lots of lovely cafes and restaurants in the immediate neighbourhood.

name: Murrayfield apartment
description:
Brand new property.
Located just a 5 mins walk from Murrayfield.
Direct bus routes from the city centre on the doors step.
5 minute walk from Murrayfield tram stop.
Vibrant and quirky 1 bedroom apartment with fully fitted open plan kitchen and livingroom.
Sofa bed added if extra bed space required.
Message us for personalised experiences for those special occasions.
Make amazing memories in Edinburgh with us.

name: St Christopher's Inn 8 Bed Dorm Ensuite
description: Nestled in the centre of the medieval Old Town, our hostel is in the perfect location to reveal Edinburgh’s magical charm combined with an underground party scene unlike any other city.  With incredible sights such as Edinburgh Castle, the Scottish National Galleries and the Royal Mile just a short stroll away from your bed there’s no excuse not to get out and about! Our Edinburgh hostel is also a very convenient 2 minute walk from Waverley station.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: St Christopher's Inn 8 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
description: Nestled in the centre of the medieval Old Town, our hostel is in the perfect location to reveal Edinburgh’s magical charm combined with an underground party scene unlike any other city.  With incredible sights such as Edinburgh Castle, the Scottish National Galleries and the Royal Mile just a short stroll away from your bed there’s no excuse not to get out and about! Our Edinburgh hostel is also a very convenient 2 minute walk from Waverley station.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Elegant & Sunny 2BD basement stay, Edinburgh!
description: A sunny two-bedroom flat with spacious areas for up to 4 guests. Located on the basement level, this flat offers an open-plan lounge and a fully fitted kitchen with all modern appliances. There are two comfortable bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other with a single bed, as well as a fully fitted guest bathroom with a WC.

name: Cosy flat on a bustling street
description:
Bright and spacious top floor flat on Easter Road

This is a cosy, homely flat with a unique personality. Lovely morning light coming over Arthurs seat from the living room window, and gorgeous evening light in the kitchen

The flat is on the bustling Easter Road, with lots of vibrant local bars and coffee shops nearby. We are a 10 minute walk to Holyrood park

Street parking available close by, let me know during your booking if you need tips for parking

Fully licensed for STL

EH-80329-F

name: Cosy Castle View Apartment
description: Treat yourself to a stay in this fabulous, modern apartment with great views of Edinburgh Castle. My spacious apartment provides a comfortable and relaxing home for visitors with excellent access to bus and tram routes, city centre attractions, cafes, bars and restaurants. The Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, Princess Street Gardens, the Union Canal and Edinburgh International Convention Centre are all within walking distance and there is an array of local amenities in the immediate vicinity.

name: Flat in popular Morningside area
description:
Cosy flat located in the popular Morningside area in Edinburgh. There are 2 main supermarkets within 5 minutes walking distance.
The flat comprises of a living room, a bedroom and a bathroom.

The bed is a double bed. Please note the bed is raised and you need to therefore climb up three steps (as seen in the photo) To get to it.

Complementary tea and coffee provided. You will also have access to cutlery, glasses and plates. Bedding, towels, and toilet rolls are provided.

name: The Attic Rooms (2 Bedrooms)
description:
Experience modern charm in a central Edinburgh Victorian flat! Cozy attic rooms with vaulted ceilings and skylights. Tastefully decorated bedrooms with high spec shared bathroom.
Explore historic Old Town, iconic landmarks. Convenient public transport. Ideal for a short break to Edinburgh Home has loving Spaniel and curious cat but always welcome new doggy friends

name: Stylish Victorian Apartment with free parking!
description:
What a find!
This idyllic Victorian apartment is situated a stone's throw away from the Botanical Gardens in the desirable Trinity area of Edinburgh.
Our gorgeous 2 bedroom apartment is perfectly situated with panoramic views of Edinburgh. The stylish property is only minutes from shops and restaurants.

Walk to the:
The Botancial Gardens in 5 minutes
Stockbridge/Inverleith Park in 10 minutes
Britannia Yacht in 15 minutes
Edinburgh Castle in 25 minutes
Holyrood Palace in 35 minutes.

name: Light & Bright City Stay
description: A simple but centrally-located flat just a 2 minute walk from the city centre. This light and bright flat is has a recently renovated kitchen and a spacious king bedroom. With a small dining table in the living room its an ideal property for WFH if need be while visiting Edinburgh.  There is a garden view kitchen tucked away beside the living room. This flat would be perfect for a peaceful base while attending the hustle bustle of the Edinburgh fringe.

name: Festival perfect place to stay
description: Beautiful peaceful modern aprtment. Double bedroom with your own bathrom for your solo use. Share with myself full time-working female.

name: Two bedrooms and a shared bathroom in a house
description:
Two private bedrooms and a shared full bathroom in a newly built modern house just 25 minutes from Edinburgh city centre by direct bus. Ideal for someone who needs a place to spend the night comfortably and explore the iconic city of Edinburgh and nearby areas during day.

There is no kitchen facility available.

Due to religious reasons, no non-vegetarian food is allowed to bring in the house. Eg. Eggs, fish, or any other non-vegetarian food.

name: Verton Lodge - by the Beach
description:
Spacious quiet en suite double room within a large Georgian house.
Situated on a quiet leafy street with the lovely Portobello beach at the end of the road.....2mins walk

name: 2 bedroom apartment ground floor,parking free
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: Private Bedroom Beach & City Easy Access
description:
Spacious semi detached house in Edinburgh 15 min walk to beach
Located 25 minutes by bus to the city and 15minute drive from Edinburgh airport it is perfectly located for tourists visiting Edinburgh

Numerous buses available beside property to city centre and Princes Street

Local amenities include:
Silverknowes Golf Course
Crammond Beach & Island
Lauriston House & Gardens
Newhaven Pier

Strictly no pets inside the premises

Free Parking
Free WIFI

name: Bright Stylish Modern 1 Bed Flat
description: Enjoy your stay in this bright, beautiful 1 bed flat, 15 min walk from the city centre, Hollyrood park and Leith with views of Carlton Hill. Gets afternoon/evening sun through the big double doors in the lounge with beautiful sunsets over the city.

name: Room in Arty central apartment
description:
🏳️‍🌈 🏳️‍⚧️

I prefer to host women. I am home most of the time so this listing suits busy travellers that are out morning to night. This flat is on the top floor, no lift. The kitchen is not available. Due to thin walls, this room is not for snorers.

My place is a good example of an Edinburgh tenement. Nearby are many restaurants, cafes and performance venues as well as Edinburgh university, the meadows and Arthur’s seat. This is a fun neighbourhood and a great base to explore Edinburgh.

name: Entire Stylish 2-BR Flat near Princes Street
description:
This centrally-located 2-bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Edinburgh New Town. Within a 10-13 minute walk you can reach George St, Princes St & Waverley train station.

-Conveniently located in the city centre and New Town.
-Short walk to train station, Airlink bus top and Edinburgh’s top tourist destination.
-Fully-equipped kitchen with essential appliances.
-2 Bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.
-976 sq ft.
-Stylish living room.

The licence number is EH-70517-F / EPC rating is Band C.

name: Corinthian Quay Apartment
description: Our luxury apartment at Corinthian Quay boasts a spacious living area with high ceilings, large windows, and an open balcony overlooking the Firth of Forth. The apartment is equipped with central heating, an open plan kitchen, and comfortable bedding to ensure a relaxing stay. Sleeping a maximum of 6 with two bedrooms and two bathrooms, we have a king-size room with en-suite, double room, family bathroom and double sofa bed in the living area. Every room enjoys panoramic waterfront views.

name: Two bed room, close to centre
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Charming Room in Leith Near Tram Line.
description:
Spare room with very comfy mattress and catches the morning light just right. There's a clothes rail to hang your clothes and a mirror to check yourself before heading out for the eve and also a standing desk if you need to get some work done too with high-speed wifi.

The kitchen has most mod cons apart from a microwave but I'm happy to show you how to use the gas cooker if you've not used one before.

Also close to the Ocean Terminal Tram Stop which is running 24hrs over Fringe.

name: Chic City Pad: Close to City Centre & Airport
description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips.
