Located only 10 minutes from Edinburgh Airport and excellent public transport links within a five minute walk including bus, tram and train, making this an ideal place for groups exploring Edinburgh. 5 miles from city centre with 24 hours public transport nearby.

The house has three double bedrooms, free parking, a garden with an outdoor patio, fully equipped with modern amenities; dishwasher, washing machine, two televisions, wifi etc.

name: Massive Room, King-Size Comfort
description:
Welcome to Your Spacious Edinburgh Retreat!
Massive room with king bed, sofa, and coffee table. Cozy decor, premium mattress. Close to airport (12 min drive) and tram/bus (9 min walk).

No full kitchen, but kettle, microwave & mini fridge provided for light meals & drinks.

Edinburgh Castle & Royal Mile – 4 mi (~15–20 min by car)
Edinburgh Zoo – 2 mi (~8 min)
Dean Village – 3 mi (~10–15 min)
Cramond Beach – 2 mi (~14 min)

name: Private room with shared bath
description:
A private bedroom in a newly built modern house just 25 minutes from Edinburgh city centre by direct bus. Ideal for someone who needs a place to spend the night comfortably and explore the iconic city of Edinburgh and nearby areas during day.

There is no kitchen facility available.

Due to religious reasons, no non-vegetarian food is allowed to bring in the house. Eg. Eggs, fish, or any other non-vegetarian food.

name: Riverside Stockbridge maisonette
description: A cosy maisonette apartment right by the beautiful Water of Leith river in Edinburgh's city centre. The apartment has a large living room, separate kitchen and bathroom, and stairs leading up to the bedrooms. We receive plenty of light during the day and are lucky to have a stunning, direct view of the lush trees and river just outside. My place is tucked away in a very quiet residential estate with parking, and you will be sharing it with myself and my very affectionate, friendly cat Rio.

name: Spacious double room in converted school house
description: Large double room in a detached converted Victorian former old school house near Edinburgh city centre. We have a very friendly pooch.

name: The Marchmont Residence
description:
Discover our charming self-catering holiday apartment nestled in the heart of Edinburgh, within the renowned Marchmont area, near the picturesque Meadows. This beautifully appointed 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment offers an unbeatable location.

With captivating original cornicing and high ceilings, our delightful property exudes the charm of the surroundings.

name: Stylish 1 double bed flat free parking
description:
✔ Charming flat with south facing balcony, near city centre
✔ 15-minute bus to city centre, 3-minute walk to stop
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary amenities
✔ Accessibility friendly with lift and stair free flat
✔ 15-minute walk to Harrison Park & the Canal
✔ 17-minute walk to Saughton Rose Gardens
✔ Next to Gorgie Green Lane Park
✔ 1-minute walk to Sinclair Place bus stop
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
✔ Shared gym access
✔ 704 ft2 | 65 m2

name: Cosy Edinburgh flat, front door & private garden
description:
A one bed, ground floor flat in the quiet area of Stockbridge. Stockbridge is a highly desirable area in central Edinburgh and has lots of eating & drink places, walks, parks and bus stops a short walk away.

The flat has been renovated and has a small private garden with table and chairs. Sit outside in the morning with your coffee and hear the birds. I have a galley kitchen, dining table in the living room and office desk.

name: Bothy in the city/ hot tub/ free on street parking
description:
The Bothy a self contained tiny home suitable for 2 guests.

It is situated in the garden of our family home.

It is a studio style accommodation, one room, one bed with a private en-suite.

Drylaw is a residential area that has excellent links to the airport and city centre. The distance to the airport is 5 miles, the city centre is 2.8 miles.

The hot tub is a great place to unwind after a busy day exploring beautiful historic Edinburgh.

name: The Marchfield Residence
description: Just a few minutes outside of Edinburgh's bustling city centre and you'll notice the air starts to smell fresher, streets widen into comfortable avenues and trees breathe a sigh of relief. If you'd like a respite from the buzz of the capital, then the Marchfield Residence is just right for you. Sleeping up to five guests in delicious comfort, this main door apartment even has a beautifully tranquil garden and free parking on site.

name: Warm single room for visiting Edinburgh room 4
description: Please note this room is very small room in a shared flat, so you will be sharing bathroom and kitchen 5 people. We are close to airport but to city centre is around 30 min by bus. Its ideal for people traveling on a budged. Its much better than a hostel becouse you have your own private room only sharing Kitchen and Bathroom.

name: Attic Room One
description:
Experience modern charm in a central Edinburgh Victorian flat! Cozy attic rooms with vaulted ceilings and skylights. Tastefully decorated bedrooms with high spec shared bathroom.
Explore historic Old Town, iconic landmarks. Convenient public transport. Ideal for a short break to Edinburgh Home has loving Spaniel and curious cat but always welcome new doggy friends

name: Attic Room Two
description:
Experience modern charm in a central Edinburgh Victorian flat! Cozy attic rooms with vaulted ceilings and skylights. Tastefully decorated bedrooms with high spec shared bathroom.
Explore historic Old Town, iconic landmarks. Convenient public transport. Ideal for a short break to Edinburgh Home has loving Spaniel and curious cat but always welcome new doggy friends

name: 3-BR New Town House with Patio near Princes St
description:
This self-catering holiday house is bright, spacious and furnished to a high standard with a private patio on the ground floor and balcony on the 1st floor.

- Conveniently located in central New Town - near local shops and restaurants.
- Close to Edinburgh’s top tourist destination.
- Private patio and balcony.
- 3 king size bedroom.
- Stylish duplex with fully-equipped kitchen.
- 8 - 10 minutes walk to Princes St and Waverley train station.
- Perfect for enjoying festivals in Edinburgh.

name: Double Room with private en-suite.
description:
Comfortable large private en-suite room located in the top floor of our townhouse. Centrally located on the main bus routes from the airport and city centre with day and night buses available.
Just a short walk to the beautiful beach of Silverknowles/Crammond and not too far from scenic Stockbridge.
We are a friendly family of 4 with 2 young children so accommodation would suit people looking for a place to rest around your visit to the wonderful city of Edinburgh.

name: One bedroom flat in Edinburgh
description:
One bedroom flat 30 minute walk from Princes Street and less than 10 minute walk from Haymarket station. Easy to get anywhere in central Edinburgh by foot and bus stop located right next to flat. Plenty of cafes, restaurants, and supermarkets in the area.

Suitable for one person, a couple, or two people if one is willing to sleep on the couch (extra bedding will be provided).

Photo of the kitchen to be uploaded soon.

name: Peaceful Coach House for four in Trinity,Edinburgh
description:
Relax with family and friends at this peaceful Coach House. Within the heart of the Trinity Conservation Area, this self contained 2 double bedroom, 2 bathroom annex is in a quiet residential street, sleeping 4. Lovely views into mature garden and within a stone's throw of the waterfront, with access to local parks, restaurants and pubs, and excellent bus links into both the Shore at Leith, the New Town and Old Town.
up to 2 single beds can be added for small additional charge in living room.

name: Modern Apartment in Edinburgh with Free Parking
description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for a city break in Edinburgh, with travel links at your doorstep into the heart of the city centre. It takes 10-15 minutes by bus or 5-10 minutes by car/taxi. The bus stop is just across the road.

Situated nearby the famous Pentland Hills of Edinburgh, you are a skip and a jump away from the city buzz Edinburgh is so well known for.

Also nearby is a popular retail park with all the shops and coffee spots you could ever want.

name: Modern 2 bedroom apartment in City Centre
description:
This beautiful and modern apartment is situated in the heart of Edinburgh. Well-maintained interior and exterior to ensure you have a pleasant experience. Convenience comes with a lift access and also a free secured car park is available.

Just minutes away from numerous stores, restaurants and cafes, attractions and nature.

Your Edinburgh adventure starts here in a perfect blend of homely comfort.

name: Ensuite Double room in a fabulous home
description:
This practical double room in a gorgeous large house is perfect for a couple.

With a straight bus to the city centre, and free parking available, it is suitable for anyone - driving or taking public transport. The home owner lives here, therefore this is not suitable for party goers. It is suitable for people here for work, or a sightseeing holiday. If you want peace and tranquility, plus a place to feel at home, book here.

There is an additional double room suitable for 1 upon request.

name: Charming Studio, Self Check In, Free Parking
description:
'The Snug' is a fully licensed, private apartment attached to our Bungalow with its own entrance & is ideal for couples. There are stairs to access the property. We live in a lovely residential area.
2 min walk away there is a direct bus route into Edinburgh City Centre. The bus takes approx 25 min & stops include Haymarket and Princes Street. It takes 15 min to drive to the City Centre & Edinburgh Airport, & a 12 min drive to Murrayfield stadium.
Locally there’s 2 pubs, 2 restaurant & a Co-op.

name: The Ivory Tower
description: This stylish place is close to must-see destinations. The Edinburgh Botanic Garden  , Calton Hill , Edinburgh Castle & Princes Street , Scottish National Galleries, all the theatres , and within walking distance of most Festival and Fringe destinations.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Library room
description:
Recently refurbished, the library room has use of a private bathroom off adjacent hall. The property is a 25 minute walk from Princes Street and is situated next to Murrayfield Rugby stadium and the tram network. Regular buses run into town and also buses to the airport running 24 hours from across the street.
The library room consists of a king size bed and a seating area to enjoy a refreshment. We look after Stella the dog she isn't allowed in any of the guest rooms or shower room.

name: Bright room with an amazing view
description: Relax and unwind in this peaceful and roomy space. Just climb a few steps to the 3rd floor (trust me, it's worth it, however please note there is no lift available). Make yourself at home. Whether you're just passing through or planning on exploring Edinburgh for a while, you're more than welcome here. The cozy room features a king size bed, a small desk, and a little corner perfect for unwinding after a busy day. And if you feel like chatting over a cup of coffee, I'm always happy to join you.

name: A room with a view in Abbeyhill
description:
Charming, bright flat in central Edinburgh (Abbeyhill), 10 min walk from Old Town and Authur's Seat, Leith, and Easter Rd. Lovely, sunny bedroom with a stunning view of Arthur's Seat, furnished and decorated to my slightly eclectic but mostly mid-century taste. Great spot for someone solo passing through the city or coming for a weekend city break. Just a 15 min walk to Waverly or 5 min bus ride.
I only host female guests, sorry guys!

name: Architect's home by the Castle
description: Welcome to our home in the heart of Edinburgh! We named it ‘penumbre’, as it is perhaps the brightest, most radiant place in the whole of Edinburgh. An independent self-catering apartment for up to two people in the historic city centre, the apartment is our base when we are in town, and free for you to use for when we are away for longer periods of time.

name: 2 bed city centre modern flat
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located apartment. 2 bedroom, newly refurbished central flat just a 7 minute walk from Haymarket train station and close to lots of amenities. This is a modern, cosy flat suitable for all types of guests.  Your opportunity to have a great stay in the beautiful city of Edinburgh

name: Cosy bedroom in Abbeyhill
description:
This central location is incredibly convenient for exploring Edinburgh. You'll find yourself just a short distance away from Portobello Beach and Holyrood Park, and surrounded by some of the best bakeries and cafes in town. The city centre is a 20-minute walk away, and we are located on a major bus route with frequent services that can easily take you around town.

Stay with us for a fantastic city break and meet Boo, our friendly hypoallergenic dog.

name: Splendid Apartment near Haymarket
description:
✔ Elegant flat nicely located in Dalry
✔ 883 ft2 | 82 m2
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1,5 bathrooms
✔ Fully-equipped kitchen, complete with all essential appliances
✔ 19-minute walk to Princes Street Gardens
✔ 21-minute walk to King's Theatre and Roseburn Public Park
✔ 23-minute walk to National Galleries of Scotland: Modern One
✔ 26-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ Next to Haymarket train station
✔ Public transport provides easy access to Edinburgh’s most iconic attractions

name: Charming Leith Stay
description:
Our delightful Airbnb nestled in a quaint and picturesque neighborhood invites you to experience a truly magical stay.

Unlock the door to a beautifully decorated interior, where modern comforts blend seamlessly with whimsical touches. Wander through the cobbled streets and immerse yourself in the city's vibrant energy. Iconic landmarks, cultural treasures, and delectable dining options are mere steps away, promising an unforgettable Edinburgh experience.

Embark on an extraordinary journey.

name: Edinburgh.Alexander Guest house.double room
description:
Alexander Guest House is a friendly B&B with good breakfasts, clean rooms and excellent bus access to Edinburgh city centre. Arthur’s Seat provides a beautiful backdrop.

At Alexander there is free private parking for two vehicle and free on-street parking is available nearby ,free internet access.

The house is in a residential area about 1 miles south of Edinburgh’s Old Town and the Royal Mile. Waverley Train Station on Princes Street is 1.2 miles away.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: The Shore
description: A double room overlooking the Water of Leith at the Shore. Sharing a small but perfectly formed apartment with the owner. Parking available for one car. Bus and tram stops both within a five minute walk. The Shore hosts a wide selection of cafes, restaurants and bars.

name: Entire Flat - Nice 1 bedroom near city center
description: Near city center one bedroom flat, the flat have kitchen, bathroom, living-room. Bedroom has a double bed. 10 mins to center by bus, 3mins to supermarket by walk. 3mins to Coffees shop and lots of restaurant by walk.

name: 1st release: X factor apartment
description:
Stunning unrivalled location on Royal Mile overlooking all the action and so close to all amenities. This gorgeous apartment features light airy and spacious accommodation with breathtaking vista.
Located within a heritage listed building and includes its own turret which contains a circular dining room.
The living area has amazing ceiling angles with skylights in abundance.
Master bedroom looks directly out to ‘The Tron’ tower.
Hi speed internet and new digital TV complete a unique package.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Floating City Centre Luxury Wide-Beam ‘Wee Sisters
description: This memorable place is anything but ordinary. Your own private, luxury, wide beam boat to create memories. The Wee Sisters can accommodate up to 6 adults in 2 double cabins and a sofa bed in the lounge area. The self- contained wide beam boat is the ideal base for exploring all the delights Edinburgh has to offer. She has an open plan spacious lounge area with modern kitchen and a comfortable shower room with WC and WHB.

name: Short let room
description: Short-term let available for a couple or single person. The property consists of 2 rooms – one for the host and another for the guest. Located in a peaceful area with ample free parking space. Excellent location- quick and easy access to the city center, just 10-15 minutes via bus service 22 or tram, both within a 2-4 minute walk. The nearest supermarket- 10 min walk. Shared kitchen, living room and bathroom. We are busy professionals and we spend most of our time at work.

name: GuestReady - Edinburgh Elegant home
description: Step into this sleek and stylish one-bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh. At 56m2, this modern gem has all the amenities you need for an enjoyable stay. There's free parking available right off the street. Plus, the convenient City Bypass is just a quick 5-minute drive away, making it a breeze to explore all this enchanting city offers.

name: Cosy room,King bed, scenic views
description: Welcome to Edinburgh!!! Looking for a great place to stay during your visit to Edinburgh?? We have a beautiful private room in a newly built detached house. Just 25min from city centre and 15min to airport. There is a direct bus from very near by bus stop to city centre.

name: Budget Room
description: Vintage room in a three bedroom property shared with other AirBnB guests. Unsavoury but safe location. Top quality cleaning with pristine modern bathroom and kitchen. No living room. Ideal for tourists who spent most of the time sightseeing and only looking for a place to sleep and have a quick meal during the day. Residential parking. Self check-in after 3pm. Flat is located 2min walk to the bus stop. 20 min Princess Street 40 min airport

name: Beautiful and well located flat
description:
Perfect location for enjoying all that Edinburgh has to give. 10min walk to arthurs seat, 10mins bus journey to city center and 10min car journey to portobello beach. Sainsburys within walking distance and free on street parking. Local park within 2mins walk, great location if you have a dog.

The flat is my home which i will not be residing in during your stay.

name: Newly decorated 2 bed flat
description:
Newly decorated flat in Polwarth area of Edinburgh. Easy access to old or new town via nearby bus

Newly decorated bathroom and kitchen.

2 kingsize beds in carpeted bedrooms.

Peaceful location, with lovely selection of restaurants and bars. Nearby scenic canal and a short walk to Bruntsfield or Dalry.

A 15 minute walk from Haymarket train station.

Ideal for 2 couples or 4 who don’t mind sharing 2 beds.

name: Eìte, Stockbridge
description: Light and airy four-bedroom flat in the heart of leafy Stockbridge, central Edinburgh 🍃 (sleeps 8 people)

name: 4 Bedroom, 8 bed, 3 Bathroom: Sleeps 10
description: Spacious (143sqm) Classic Georgian apartment within a conservation area. 1 triple, 1 double, 1 triple en-suite, 1 twin en-suite: 3 shower rooms in total. Perfect for the Festival and Fringe, The Old Town, Royal Mile, Princess Street and Historic Edinburgh. Short walk to The Meadows, Holyrood Park and Arthur's seat. Sainsbury's Local 70m, cafes and restaurants just round the corner. Fully fitted modern kitchen with utility. Spacious elegant dining hall and comfortable lounge with bay window.

name: Gorgie Nook!
description:
Gorgie Nook is just 2.3 miles from the city centre, featuring a spacious double bedroom, living/dining area, kitchen, bathroom and great transport links.

Local points of interest:

- Murrayfield Stadium is only a 15 minute walk by foot from the flat.
- Haymarket station is a 20 minute walk
- Edinburgh Castle is a 40 minute walk, or 15 minute bike/taxi ride away.
- National Gallery of Edinburgh (Modern One/Two) an 8-minute car ride or 30 minute walk. (Highly recommend this canal walk).

name: Entire Flat - New Town / City Centre
description:
Welcome to the Magical and Beautiful City of Edinburgh!
Located in New Town just meters from the famous Calton Hill, the room offers a cozy place to relax and rest.
Edinburgh is a perfect city to walk around and discover its history and mysteries, so a hot bath with hydromassage will be waiting for you when you get back to the flat.
In addition, the place is located in the LGBTQ+ neighbourhood of the city so at night you will have many options of restaurants, bars and nightclubs to have fun.

name: Convent grounds
description: Unique position with bus stop nearby into town

name: Bright Waterfront Room
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.


Double bedroom with private bathroom situated in the quiet Western Harbour area of Edinburgh. With stunning views and excellent transport links to the City centre, it is the perfect place to stay to enjoy a city-break without the city-costs. A short walk to Leith and Newhaven, there is also a fantastic selection of bars, restaurants, and activities right on the doorstep.

name: Tranquil Contemporary with Garden nr Vibrant Leith
description: At the end of a quiet no-through road, this beautifully refurbished, tastefully decorated property with a private garden will be your home from home. In close proximity are Newhaven harbour, the Royal Yacht Britannica and the Shore area of Leith. Royal Botanic Gardens are less than a 30-minute walk. Regular buses or the tram take you to the city centre within 30 minutes. Free on-street parking is available.

name: Central Cosy 1 bed Apartment
description: This apartment is located only minutes away from the City Centre. There are several major attractions nearby including Dean Village, The Royal Botanical Gardens, The Shore, St James Quarter and Stockbridge. The apartment is located close by to the Water of Leith Walkway. Here you can walk or cycle which links in to several parts of the city. This cosy apartment is simple but fully equipped with all the essentials for a perfect stay in Edinburgh no matter the purpose of your visit.

name: Cute Ensuite Room in Newhaven
description:
Comfy ensuite room in a quiet Newhaven flat, right by the sea. King-size bed, your own shower/toilet, and access to a chilled, shared open-plan kitchen/living area.

Great coffee spots, 24/7 supermarket, and Ocean Terminal all nearby. Tram stop and buses just outside —super easy to get around. Cycle paths are also nearby if you fancy a ride.

I’m often working or studying, you’ll have space to yourself most of the time, but I’m around if needed. Friendly, peaceful, and relaxed space to stay :)

name: Cosy double room in a new build house
description:
Relax at this peaceful place to stay. Bathroom is shared with gust if the single bedroom is occupied at the same time but it is not used by myself and my family as we have own bathroom to use.
Smoking is not permitted anywhere inside the Airbnb, please step outside to smoke if you’re a smoker.
This is a smaller double bedroom, please do not book this room if you prefer a much bigger room. However, the room has been booked by 2 guests most times.

name: The  Edinburrow
description: The Edinburrow is in a Basement suite in the New Town City Centre of Edinburgh. Minutes walking distance to train, tram & all Edinburgh attractions. It offers your own private entrance & wee basement courtyard which leads down to a double bedroom,  through to a hallway with a twin bedroom with 2 small doubles & a large bathroom. There is no kitchen but a small snug with chairs & table, fridge, nespresso coffee machine, kettle and cups & glasses. Tea & coffee pods are provided.

name: Silver room, direct bus to the city center
description:
This is a big house, with large livingroom. We live at the back of the house and rent the front 4 double bedrooms. Please book as many bedrooms as you need.
This advert is for 1 bedroom, called Silver room, where you will have a double bed.
You can also use the shared areas, such as: big shared livingroom, the breakfast corner, the shared shower room and the decking garden.
You can have breakfast or chill in the inner decking garden.

name: Brown room, Double bed, Direct bus to city center
description:
This is a double bedroom, called Brown room in our big house.
You will have a very cosy double bed with Brown decorations.
You can also use the shared areas, such as: big shared livingroom with couch and dining areas, the breakfast corner, the shared bathroom with shower and the 2 gardens we have.
We are very close to the airport and a short bus ride takes you to the city center in 20-30 mins.
Parking is free in front of the house.

name: Tranquil Haven in Murrayfield, Edinburgh
description: Welcome to my home, a bright upper villa  located on a quiet residential street in the Murrayfield area.   A perfect base for up to two guests to explore the vibrant, beautiful City of Edinburgh.  The Airlink 100 bus and tram stop are a 10/15 min walk away.  Murrayfield Stadium is a 10min walk.  West End/City Centre is a 20min walk.  Water of Leith walkway is 10mins away, great for a leisurely stroll to Stockbridge a lively neighbourhood with great cafes, restaurants and bars.

name: Charming Scandi Style Flat
description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips.
Has easy bus connections to Edinburgh City Centre and Edinburgh Airport. The drive from the flat to city centre is roughly 15 minutes whilst airport bus is just over 30 minutes.
It is also walking distance from Cramond Beach
There are plenty free parking bays available and free on street parking.

name: Cozy ground floor room in a shared flat
description: Very quiet room and neighbourhood. Big windows with natural light. 3 to 7 min walk to two main roads with many buses routes to city centre. Back garden available for thus rare sunny days in Scotland. Free parking outside the property.

name: The Merchants89 -Whiskey Galore - Studio
description:
Located on the ground floor the Whisky Galore Studio flat exudes opulence and modern elegance as part of the The Merchants89 development, offering the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication for your visit to Edinburgh.


Located in the vibrant energy of Leith, guests can indulge in an array of delights right at their doorstep; with the newly finished tramline just a stone's throw away, you can effortlessly travel to and from the airport and the bustling city centre.

name: The Merchants89 - Macallan Suite - Deluxe Studio
description:
Welcome to TheMerchants89 luxury apartments in the heart of Leith, Edinburgh. This new redevelopment of a historic listed building exudes opulence and modern elegance, offering the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.


Located in the vibrant energy of Leith, guests can indulge in an array of delights right at their doorstep; with the newly finished tramline just a stone's throw away, you can effortlessly travel to and from the airport and the bustling city centre.

name: Spacious & Homely (Licensed) Beach Flat
description: Larger than average ground floor homely apartment, private entrance and garden patio. Steps away from Edinburgh's Portobello beach with cute cafes and bars, local shops, supermarket 3 mins walk, and 20 mins by bus to City Centre, it's the perfect location for both Edinburgh City and Sea!  There is free street parking, but it is not allocated. The bedroom has a king size bed.  Sorry, we do not allow pets in this property.  This flat is fully licensed under the new Scottish licensing laws.

name: Room in Central Stylish Apartment by Hollyrood
description:
Bright, stylish central room - close to Arthur's Seat, the Old Town and 20 min walk to Prince's Street, New Town and Waverley Station +accessed by trams and buses. FREE PRIVATE PARKING. Fully licensed, No: EH-90782-F

• SLEEPS 2 FREE PARKING
• GROUND & 1st FLOOR
• 10-15 MIN walk TO ROYAL MILE, HOLYROOD PALACE & ARTHUR'S SEAT

name: One Bedroom Flat in Leith
description:
Take a break and unwind at this peaceful small flat. located on the side of Easter Rd. quiet area with no much traffic. few minutes walk to city centre. flat on the third floor in an Old building. lots of steps and no lift in there. Double bed . just perfect for two ppl.
little shower and toilet. kitchen very basic attached to living space with sofa and TV. wi fi

name: The green room in top-floor apartment
description:
This relaxing, quiet, old town and spacious apartment built in 1900 is located in Newington. The property benefits from triple glazed windows, shutters and central heating. The bedroom has fresh, clean bedding and the bathroom is shared. To walk, it's
- 5 minutes to the supermarket
- 10 minutes to Prestonfield House and golf club, bars, Salisbury Crag's, Arthur's Seat
- 15 minutes to King's Buildings, or the Meadows
- 20 minutes to town or Teviot
- 30 minutes to Blackford Hill and Waverley

name: West-End, City Centre Apartment.
description:
Central Edinburgh, west-end apartment.

The apartment is high spec, with a modern cleverly designed interior.

7 minutes walk from Haymarket station the apartment is located in a cul-de-sac
providing both a quiet but central location.
It is also close to the legal & financial district and the Edinburgh international conference centre EICC, as well as being one stop away from Murrayfield Stadium.

A perfect base to the city!

name: 2 bed 1 bath Apt, Royal  Mile
description: Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun. Beautiful flat on the 3 rd floor (sorry no lift)
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Former University Press Building: Stylish Loft Apt
description: This Double Upper New York Style loft apartment(s), used to a form the Press building for the University of Edinburgh.  Located within the city centre. The property comprises 2 independent bedroom wings and an open plan living/dining/kitchen area downstairs.  Upper floor: large en-suite bedroom, mini kitchen and roof terrace with views of the Edinburgh skyline. Downstairs: large double bedroom en-suite with jacuzzi bath. Lift - Yes. Indoor bicycle rack - Yes. All local amenities are nearby.

name: Cosy modern flat in Leith
description:
Welcome to your home away from home in Edinburgh’s coolest neighbourhood – Leith.
Just 20 minutes away from Edinburgh City Centre

This cosy modern flat offers the perfect balance of comfort and convenience. Located just moments from The Shore and Ocean Terminal, you’ll be surrounded by top-rated restaurants, beautiful riverside walks along the Water of Leith, and easy connections to the city centre.

Check-in from 3:00 PM | Check-out by 11:00 AM

name: Sea view apartment/Central Location/fast Wi-Fi
description:
Guests will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located home. We're confident that guests will enjoy the peaceful views as much as we do. The convenient amenities at our doorstep will make for a positive stay in Edinburgh, whatever your reason for visiting.
High speed internet is ideal for streaming/working from home.
Ample free on-street parking as well as good public transport links.
25 minute walk to the Edinburgh Playhouse/Princes Street.

name: Broughton Bestie
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally based apartment. Just 0.8 miles 15/20 minutes walk to St James shopping mall at the start of the city. large superstores Lidel  and Tesco, both  just minutes away. There is  Public transport outside the building which is handy. The apartment is located above a small bar which is great for a quiet drink or occasional live music on weekends.

name: Edinburgh City Pied-à-Terre
description:
A unique modern finished flat over 2 floors, just 0.5 miles from Haymarket Train Station/Airlink Bus/Tram stop from Airport. Free on street parking 0.5 miles from flat and Murrayfield Stadium just 0.9 miles from flat.

Bus stop 3 doors from flat to takes you directly into Princes Street/Edinburgh Castle and bus stop from town, stops just over the road from flat.

In the surrounding area within 5 minute walk you'll find: Lidl, Co-Op, plenty of Bars/Cafes and Restaurants, plus a Launderette.

name: The place to stay in Edinburgh
description:
Lovely double bedroom, with en-suite rain shower, within a private garden flat in the West End, Edinburgh.

Steps away from Haymarket Station, tram stop and Airlink bus.
Minutes from Princes Street and Murrayfield Stadium.

Breakfast included - details provided on arrival.

Check in is at 1600 hours.

Please note, requests for early check-in from 1400 hours are welcome however, due to commitments, are not guaranteed, in which case there are storage lockers available at Haymarket Station.

name: Double Bedroom in tow Bed flat with share kitchen
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.city centre and princess street just 10 minutes away by bus .24 hours Bus service.Bus stop is nearby .Tesco ,Local Grocery shops and take away is nearby .

name: Castle view penthouse
description: Welcome to our unique Edinburgh city penthouse. Enjoy views of Edinburgh Castle, Arthur's Seat and the Pentland hills from the wrap-around balcony, accessible from all rooms. Situated on the stunning Water of Leith, next to the beautiful Saughton Rose Gardens. This apartment has easy access to Edinburgh airport, the city centre, Murrayfield Stadium, or the countryside via car or public transport.

name: Trendy City Centre Double Room with one King bed.
description:
Stay with Anne in Edinburgh City Centre. Stylish double bedroom with king size bed and TV. Living space with TV, comfortable couches and tea/coffee facilities. Private 3 piece bathroom with walk-in shower. Free parking available.

Local Attractions (distance/ walking time)

📍Stockbridge (0.8 miles/ 15 minutes)
📍Botanic Gardens (0.7 miles /13 minutes)
📍Princess Street (1.3 miles/ 28 minutes)
📍Edinburgh Castle (1.9 miles/ 42 minutes)

Amenities:
▪️Free Parking
▪️WiFi
▪️Friendly Cat
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: 2 bed modern apartment
description:
An entire apartment in the western area of Edinburgh. Located 10 minutes from Edinburgh airport. Excellent transport links into the heart of Edinburgh via bus, tram or train.

Two double bedrooms including one en-suite. Open plan kitchen, living and dining area. Free parking available at back of property. Wi-Fi included.

name: Cosy Central Edinburgh Apartment
description: Kick back and relax in my beautiful apartment. Open and bright during the day and cosy and warm in the evenings, it’s a perfect flat to spend the day cooking and relaxing in, or coming home to after a hike up Arthur’s Seat! Only a 20 minute walk from Princes St, and situated in trendy Leith, with delicious bakeries, buzzing pubs and tap rooms, independent shops and top class eateries - you don’t have to roam far to enjoy it all. We love our flat and (our neighbours) and hope you will too!

name: the white house
description: lovely quiet area

name: LovelyGRflrFLAT/Free parking
description: Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place. Close to Edinburgh city centre, local store, pubs and restaurants.

name: Modern 2 bedroom apartment
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Quiet Room for rent central Edinburgh.
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.
Walking distance to airport trams and great bars and restaurants. Right on the edge of the newtown but with Leith and Stockbridge on your doorstep.

name: Central Flat Close to Attractions, Shops, Bus Stop
description:
Attractive Edinburgh spacious apartment in the heart of the city center.
This bright residence is ideally situated near all the conveniences and attractions the city has to offer. Within walking distance to landmarks like Edinburgh Castle, Edinburgh University campus, local supermarkets, shops, restaurants, and bars. The bathroom, recently refurbished, exudes impeccable elegance.

name: EdinburghArrandaleGuestHouseSingle Room
description:
Arrandale Guest House is a stylish, stone built Victorian villa with many traditional features such as ornate cornices, high ceilings, wide doors and large windows, making it light and spacious.
​
The Arrandale is conveniently located for most of the main attractions in Edinburgh, including the Castle, Holyrood Palace, Dynamic Earth and Royal Yacht Britannia.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

description:

name: Modern room & private ensuite by the forth
description:
Located at the end of western Harbour, a modern property on the ground floor with immediate access & views across the sea from the front door.

The room will have a double bed from 25/9/24 storage space, and your own private bathroom.

Additionally the property also has a fully furnished kitchen. There is a 2nd bathroom, shared living room , outdoor courtyard and patio

The tenants are a professional couple, in their 30s very friendly & considerate but live a quiet life.

name: Central 3BD Home, Edinburgh
description: Centrally located, this 3BD apartment in Edinburgh offers all the comforts of home. Situated just a 10-minute walk from Waverley station on Haddington Place, it boasts cozy double beds, a recently refurbished bathroom, a well-equipped kitchen with modern appliances, Wi-Fi, a dedicated office area for remote work, and a comfortable lounge with a 49" HD TV. Ideal for exploring Edinburgh, this 1800s Grade B listed property provides the perfect home base.

name: Charming 2-BR City Apartment near Old Town
description:
Located on a quiet side street in the convenient Abbeyhill area near Edinburgh Old Town and Holyrood Palace of Holyroodhouse, this well-presented 2-bedroom provides easy access to the city centre and historical attractions. The place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families.

- Fully equipped kitchen.
- Located in a quiet yet central area.
- 2 bedrooms, a shower room and spacious living room.
- Perfect for groups of 3.
- Spacious flat with 565 sq ft.

name: The Royalmile Apartment (sleeps 6)  Two Bedroom
description:
A Beautiful 2 bedroom spacious apartment set on the historical ROYALMILE the OldTown Edinburgh. 2 Double bedrooms , a large spacious lounge/dining area and a fully functional kitchen.

1 of the bedrooms has a kingsize bed and the other double bedroom has 2 king size beds.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Super Central & Cosy Private Room in West End - R8
description:
This traditional Scottish home is located in the bustling West End of Edinburgh. It is just a few minutes walk from the tram stop & the main Haymarket train station (very convenient for arriving and departing)

There is an abundance of restaurants, bars and shops right at your door & every main tourist attraction is within walking distance - you couldn’t hope for a more central location to explore Edinburgh!

I have 10 years of experience on Airbnb & over 5500 positive reviews

name: Flat 6 3/4 Self-catering Studio with bed & sofabed
description: A modern fully furnished self-catering studio apartment with main door access on a beautiful & peaceful cobbled street, close to the city centre. One double bed and one sofa bed. Full shower and kitchen, fridge/freezer, washing machine.

name: Stunning 3 bedroom Apartment, Edinburgh
description: Hey! Are you looking for a beautiful, safe, clean and affordable accommodation styled to your taste and needs? Great! WHERE TO STAY APPARTMENTS is just like it! Business travels, family trips, holiday stays, Relocation, long-term and short-term stays, We cover all this plus we always aim to deliver the best experience to our lovely guests! Check us out and book a stay with us!

name: 4 Bedroom House with Private Garden and Parking
description: Bring the whole family or your group of friends to this great 2-floor, 4-bedrooms holiday house that offers a homely & comfortable experience and privacy. Located in north east Edinburgh, approx. 3 miles from the city centre – very safe location that is regularly served by the no. 14 bus and a wider range of direct buses to the city centre and Waverley Train Station available on Niddrie Mains Road, a short walk away. There is private parking at the front of the property (2 cars) & a back garden.

name: Warm 1bed Flat Leith Walk
description: Hey! Are you looking for a beautiful, safe, clean and affordable accommodation styled to your taste and needs? Great! WHERE TO STAY APPARTMENTS is just like it! Business travels, family trips, holiday stays, Relocation, long-term and short-term stays, We cover all this plus we always aim to deliver the best experience to our lovely guests! Check us out and book a stay with us!

name: Central & Iconic Master Bedroom
description:
*CHECK-IN MUST BE DONE BEFORE 10PM- THAT’S A NON-NEGOTIABLE SORRY!

This Historical Scottish home is located just a 15 minutes walk from the East End of Princes street where all buses and trams stop if you are arriving via train or from the airport.

Every tourist attractions is within walking distance - The flat is perfect for couples or solo travelers who are looking for an affordable, central and private place to stay in Edinburgh.

name: Central & Funky Single Bedroom
description:
*CHECK-IN MUST BE DONE BEFORE 10PM- THAT’S A NON-NEGOTIABLE SORRY!

description:

name: Rare Old town Georgian beautiful airfilled escape
description: The perfectly located unique spacious and beautiful Georgian 3 bedroom flat with modern, recently renovated kitchen/bathrooms This urban city-centre apartment has easy access to everything: easy walk to Fringe venues, restaurants, tourist attractions, Royal Mile and the Castle. Climb Arthur Seat and Blackford Hill or enjoy a coffee in the garden or funky cafes nearby. Bus stop is across the street. The place is on a 2nd floor, keep it in mind if you have mobility problems and try to pack light.

name: Royal Mile Apt, 1 min from Edinburgh Castle
description:
This special place is within walking distance of nearly everything you will want to see, making it easy to plan your visit. Start with Edinburgh Castle and the World of Illusions, and a walk down the historic Royal Mile will take you to Holyrood Palace and the Scottish Parliament.

For a third person there is a sofabed in the living room.

This sunny apartment has with a living room with a TV and cable TV service, free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, a toilet/shower room - and great views.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Riverside Hideaway - Stockbridge
description: The Riverside Hideaway is a cosy, charming home from home with an enviable location. The village of Stockbridge is a true gem within the city where you will be spoilt for choice if you’re a foodie, like to get your indie coffee fix, discover independent book shops , or while away a few hours in a traditional pub or gastropub. After a day exploring the city, sit back and relax here while watching the river run by.

name: Unique Mezzanine 1 bed flat in Edinburgh
description:
Fabulously unique one bedroom mezzanine apartment within an old mill in the peaceful Shandon area to the West of Edinburgh City Centre.
Just 20 minute walk from Haymarket train station and with good bus connections to the centre of town, this is the perfect location to experience Edinburgh whilst enjoying a tranquil residential area.
The flat is within a 10 minute walk from the leafy and gorgeous Harrison park and the Union Canal. Local amenities within walking distance of the flat.

name: Private double room near Edinburgh Airport
description:
There is a direct bus that will take you to the city centre within 15 mins no 47.

Welcome to my modern home, which is complete with private double room and access to shared spaces.

Apartment offers - Comfortable living/dining space. Full access to kitchen. Complete with modern bathroom and shower.

Spring and memory foam mattress. Double fitted wardrobe.

Perfect for single or double occupancy. Free parking is available.

Directions are available via my pictures!

name: Charming 3-bedroom apartment with private garden
description: This charming apartment is in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town. The location could not be better to explore everything this wonderful city has to offer. The apartment is on the lower ground level of a Georgian era building. It is accessed via a private entrance and has a private garden to the rear. All amenities are at your door step and Edinburgh's historic landmarks are within walking distance. Princes Street is a short walk up the hill and Stockbridge is less than a 5 minute stroll.

name: Gardens Apartment
description: Stylish apartment in the city center great for people who value luxury and unique decor Perfect location 10minutes by car from the center and 15min walk to the sea Beautiful interior Can accommodate 6 guests The apartment has two bedrooms and a common space with a sofa bed a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a shower and garden with terrace Unique interior making your stay in Edinburgh a truly magical experience. Please  note this is old  build and possible noise transfer from upstairs.

name: Modern | Central | Affordable | 1GB WiFi | Netflix
description:
This superbly renovated apartment is designed with you in mind:

- Centrally Located
- Recently Renovated & Modern
- Thoroughly Cleaned
- Well Equipped
- Ultra Fast WiFi (1GB)
- Smart TV/Netflix
- Shower Amenities Included
- Washer/Dryer

The ideal place for a short break or long term. Plush bedding, a well-equipped kitchen, ultra-fast WiFi and Netflix included, so you can be at ease whether you’re trying to get work done, relaxing or looking for a good nights sleep after a day of sightseeing.

name: A flat in the Old Town
description:
Enjoy easy access to everything in Edinburgh from this centrally located rental, within walking distance to most of Edinburgh´s attractions.

There are two bedrooms in the flat and they are set up to be welcoming, comfortable and a great space to relax. One room has a double bed and the second bedroom can be set up with a king size bed or two singles.

Please note I have a dog, Fred, who normally lives in the flat. The flat is kept clean and regularly vacuumed but he is NOT hypoallergenic.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Castle View Hideaway
description:
Castle View Hideaway is a calm, cosy retreat nestled just steps from the world famous Grassmarket in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town. With its enviable location and views of Edinburgh Castle it offers the perfect city centre base.

The vibrant location, just a stone’s throw from the famous Royal Mile is steeped in history, culture and stunning architecture and you’ll find an array of independent restaurants, cafes, bars and shops on the winding, cobbled streets on your doorstep.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh Easy flat share small room 5
description:
Please note this room is a partition room very small *****please book only in absolute need******it has been carved out of a living room. The walls are hollowed and poorly insulated. Likely you will be able to hear your neighbour. This is reflected in the low price.
We are close to airport but to city centre is around 30 min by bus where bus stop is only 4 min walk

name: Cosy & Modern Apartment Near Holyrood Park
description: Enjoy views of Arthur's seat in this bright, cosy, Scandi-influenced flat just across from Holyrood Park. Perfect for remote working with fast internet speeds and within walking distance to Edinburgh's historic Old Town.

name: 1 Bed in Edinburgh (E1887)
description: This stylish, contemporary apartment is a charming urban retreat in the heart of the vibrant, trendy neighbourhood of Stockbridge, in the north of the city of Edinburgh. With spacious, bright rooms and an ideal location in a quiet cobbled lane just off the main street of Stockbridge, this place could be your Scottish home away from home.

name: Grassmarket Flat & Castle Views
description:
With breathtaking views of the iconic Edinburgh Castle, Grassmarket Studio (Websters Land) offers a perfect base to explore all Edinburgh has to offer.


Inside the accommodation there is a Wifi, TV with a DVD player, ironing facilities, and a hairdryer. There is also a full kitchen with a microwave, kettle, oven, fridge, washing machine, and a dining table.
The private bathroom has a shower above the bath and a shaver socket. Bed linen and luxury towels are provided.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Family rooms in Edinburgh (2 Adults,2 Kids)
description:
2 rooms in a family home, situated in the south of Edinburgh only 30 mins from the city centre by bus. Relax with the family at this peaceful place to stay.

Rooms only suitable for 2 adults and 2 children (12 and under)

Basic continental breakfast included in price.

Hosted by husband and wife, David & Aida.

name: Double room in Edinburgh
description:
This is a double room in a large modern home with easy access to both the city and the countryside.

Private bathroom next door.

Situated on the south of Edinburgh only 30 mins by bus to the city centre and 15 mins from Edinburgh Airport.

Hosted by husband and wife, David and Aida.

Basic continental breakfast included in price.

name: The Edinburgh Castle Suite, Princes Street, Unique
description:
Located in one of Edinburgh’s most prestigious addresses Castle Street. This modern apartment with rare North Facing Castle Views & Princess Street Views. - Only a handful of property’s in the City of Edinburgh with full North Facing Views of the Castle.

Perfect accommodation for a discerning solo traveller or a couple looking to explore Edinburgh or a romantic getaway. Situated in the heart of the city. Edinburghs New Town’s finest retail, bars and restaurants on your door step. Step free!

name: Upmarket Ground Floor Apartment in Morningside
description:
Welcome to our gorgeous 3-bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh!

Located just steps away from iconic landmarks such as the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle and the Palace of Holyrood House, this centrally situated retreat offers convenience and easy access to the city's top attractions.

With spacious bedrooms and modern amenities, our apartment provides a comfortable and stylish base for your Edinburgh stay. Book your stay today and experience the captivating charm of this remarkable city!

Charming en-suite bedroom in a recently refurbished apartment with a rich history. Nestled on the 4th floor - no elevator - of a traditional building, the ascent is rewarded with breathtaking views of Holyrood Park.
Adjacent to the Meadows and a renowned Korean restaurant, it's a unique experience.
The flat serves as a home for myself -1/2 of the week - and another respectful tenant. Therefore, we only welcome bookings from guests with good reviews and request a minimum 48-hour notice.

description: Our apartment is close to the City Centre and Leith. An ideal base to explore the City. This is a large spacious flat and we have added some lovely touches to make you feel at home and have decorated to a high standard. Being in such a central location there are many bars, restaurants and cafes and most of these are within a very short walk away.The flat is very close to the city’s transport links, including Waverley Station, bus station and airport shuttle. Lots of green outdoor space around

Boutique apartment decorated to a high standard. 15 min walk to the city centre or a short bus ride. Free onsite parking, fibre optic broadband, onsite gym, close to bars, restaurants and shops!
Great flat, for couples, solo and business travellers - families with children too.
We have added some lovely touches to help you feel comfortable.
Close to the city’s transport links.

This small double bedroom is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers looking for somewhere central to lay their head for the evening.

Every main tourist attraction is within walking distance - you couldn’t hope for a more central location to explore Edinburgh!

name: Slateford Stay with Free Parking
description:
My flat is a 12 minute walk to Murrayfield Stadium and a 10-minute bus ride to Princes Street and the Old Town. The flat is surrounded by 4 big supermarkets, delightful eateries, lively pubs, and a serene park by the canal all within arm's reach.

My apartment is spacious yet snug with personal touches. I'm a secondary school teacher from Ireland that has lived in Edinburgh for ten years. I'm happy to share tips and recommendations about my fantastic city.

name: Cosy room & private bathroom near Stockbridge
description:
🛏️ YOUR ROOM (BEDROOM 1)

Private en-suite shower & toilet
King size bed with quality mattress
Desk & chair
Tea, coffee, fresh water & small snack
Towels
Toiletries

📍 LOCATION HIGHLIGHTS

LIFT available
1min from bus stop (20min direct bus to city centre)
Near Stockbridge + Royal Botanic Garden
Supermarket - 1min Coop/5min Morrisons

🔔 THINGS TO NOTE

NO access & NO use of kitchen and living room
Some potential background noise from construction (daytime)

🅿️ PARKING

Free parking outside
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: 1 bed flat
description:
Welcome to my stylish and comfortable 1-bedroom flat, perfect for solo traveler or couples
The flat compromises of one double bedroom, Bathroom, Lounge, newly fitted kitchen.
The flat is with in walking distance of Edinburgh City Centre however public transport is available with a bus stop on the street.

This is my private residence that I let when I am away. There will be some of my personal effects around the flat, please make yourself at home and enjoy your time in the city

name: Canonmills Coorie
description:
A cosy, bright, two bedroom apartment close to everything Edinburgh has to offer. You will have access to the entire place.

One king bed and another double bed with a shower room. The livingroom is spacious and the kitchen has everything you will need, including a Nespresso machine.

The apartment is located in Canonmills, with many cafes, shops and restaurants on the doorstep, and it's only a 10 minute walk to the city centre, the stockbridge markets and the beautiful Botanic Gardens.

name: Spacious Central Main Door Flat
description: Tastefully presented and spacious maindoor flat in a traditional stone tenement, offering privacy with its own entrance. The bright, high-ceilinged ground-floor home features period cornice work, wood flooring, double glazing, and gas central heating. The kitchen includes an integrated oven and hob. Located in a vibrant area with access to attractions, artisan shops, cafes, and transport, close to Holyrood Park and St James Quarter. It has three bedrooms, a bright living area, and a shower room.

name: Beautiful flat in city centre
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Dean Village Gem with parking
description: Nestled along the Water of Leith, Dean Village provides a tranquil oasis just moments away from the city. This beautifully appointed flat offers a unique blend of historic charm and modern comfort, providing an idyllic retreat. The layout seamlessly connects the open-plan living room, dining area, and modern kitchen, providing an ideal space for simply unwinding after a day of exploring. The flat has everything you need for that home away from home feel.  The private parking space is a bonus!!

name: GuestReady - Charming Home in Old Town
description: Located in the historical area of Old Town, this is the perfect home for families/friends who wish to explore Edinburgh!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Entire Home. 3 bedroom house - 1 King, 2 singles
description: Three bed family home with free parking. The house offers a spacious space for family stay. There are multiple bus connections to the city centre and direct bus to Edinburgh Airport. Local play parks within 100m. Shops close by include M&S Food, Sainsburys and Lidl, TK Maxx, Nike Outlet Store, Next, Nando's, Macdonald's, Starbucks and Costa. The Stable Bar is a local restaurant that serves local beer and food in a traditional courtyard setting.

name: Magical Old Town 3-bedroom
description:
Incredible location | 3 Bedrooms | 2 additional beds in living room | Sleeps 8

Walk everywhere! Situated on the picturesque Cockburn Street, this sweeping Victorian street is ideally located for walkable travel, and connects Waverley Train Station with the Royal Mile.

You won't find a better location for exploring the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Prestonfield Avenue Residence.
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. Lovely ground flooe two bedroom apartment. 10 mins walk to Arthurs Seat, and Royal Commonwealth Pool, buses easy accessible to take you to the City, or its a lovely 20min walk to the Old Town of the City, and Edinburgh Castle.

Flat has two good size double bedrooms, with wooden floors, lovely lounge, seperate fitted kitchen.
Garden access to the front of te property.
Great Base to discover Edinburgh

name: Luxury New Town Apartment
description: Have fun with the whole family at this sought after New Town apartment. Situated in a World Heritage Conservation Area, this property is central in Edinburgh City Centre. You will be within walking distance to Edinburgh Castle, St James Quarter, Botanic Gardens as well as a host of shops, bars and eateries.

name: Centre of old town, walking distance to Castle
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.
You’ll be next to Holyrood Palace and the Parliament building
You can walk to the galleries , art museums and Edinburgh Castle .
You’ll have spectacular views from the building as we overlook the famous Arthur’s Seat
The city train station , Waverley station , is ten mins on foot .
We’re on the fourth floor with a lift . Your room and bathroom is away from the main apartment which allows more privacy for you
We hope to welcome you

name: Robertson Suite @ The Townhouse
description:
Stay in a beautifully refurbished Georgian townhouse overlooking a historic public park in Edinburgh.

The Townhouse has eight unique 'suites' to choose from, catering for all guests. Combining traditional elegance with modern convenience.

The property is well connected by bus and tram to the city centre and airport. The local tram stop is a short walk away.

Explore the vibrant local neighbourhood, 'The Shore', with a host of independent shops, cafes, pubs and award-winning restaurants.

name: Large West End Hideaway w parking
description: Discover elegance Drumsheugh Gardens, Edinburgh. This newly renovated 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom residence showcases an open living room, integrated kitchen, and a rear dining room. With back and front entrances, rear parking, and a delightful patio, this property seamlessly combines style and functionality. The main door entrance adds a touch of sophistication to this contemporary space, making it the perfect home in a prime Edinburgh location.

name: Comfy Double Bedroom In the Heart of the Old Town
description:
*CHECK-IN MUST BE DONE BEFORE 10PM- THAT’S A NON-NEGOTIABLE, SORRY!

The Canongate is the lower section of the famous Royal Mile, the heart of the Old Medieval Town in Edinburgh.

Every tourist attraction is within walking distance :)

The flat is perfect for single travellers who are looking for an affordable, central and private place to stay in the City Centre :)

name: Cosy Single Bedroom in the Heart of the Old Town
description:
*CHECK-IN MUST BE DONE BEFORE 10PM- THAT’S A NON-NEGOTIABLE, SORRY!

The Canongate is the lower section of the famous Royal Mile, the heart of the Old Medieval Town in Edinburgh.

Every tourist attraction is within walking distance :)

The flat is perfect for single travellers who are looking for an affordable, central and private place to stay in the City Centre :)

name: En-suite room 8
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

name: Standard ensuite B1
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. all ensuite rooms while some with kitchenettes too.  recently refurbished to very high spec whikst retaining period features. . on a 24 hour bus route to and from city centre, which take about 10 minutes to city attractions.  close to Cameron Toll shopping centre.  car park on-site. fully central heated.  you are sure to find it relaxing at Mayfield Suites.

name: Charming 2 bed by Royal Mile - Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to Your Home Away from Home
Discover a harmonious blend of historic ambience and modern convenience at our 2-bedroom flat, perfectly situated in the heart of Edinburgh's iconic Old Town. Located in a tranquil courtyard off the legendary Royal Mile, our flat promises both accessibility and privacy.
Property in LEZ Zone. Please ensure car is compliant if driving.

name: studio room 3
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space. in room kitchen for making those quick snacks

name: en-suite room 5
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

name: studio room 1
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

name: studio room 2
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips.

name: ensuite room 4
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips.  Victorian period property recently refurbished

name: Cozy Urban retreat free parking& Superfast Wi-fi
description:
Spacious Bright and clean apartment, perfect for family with kids. Friendly to wheelchair user, short bus away from downtown. 2 double beds 2sofa beds, 2 toilets and 2 showers.

Free parking outside the flat, walking distance to Holyrood Park, Royal Mile and old town. Lochend Park with lake view and kids play park are 6 mins walk way is a perfect location for exercise or leisurely stroll with convenient stores, supermarkets, shops, bars and restaurants as well as bus stops are nearby.

name: Royal Mile Apartment - Edinburgh
description: Spacious apartment above the Royal Mile with stunning views of St. Giles and Parliament Square.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bohemian Writers Retreat in Old Town
description:
✔ Inviting flat ideally located in The Old Town
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ 7-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 8-minute walk to Edinburgh Farmers' Market
✔ 9-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ 10-minute walk to St Giles' Cathedral
✔ 1-minute walk to West Port bus stop
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Basic-Quiet, Spacious 1 bedroom
description:
Discover budget-friendly simplicity in our 1-bedroom flat! With no-frills, this cozy space offers practicality without compromising comfort. Just a 15-minute bus journey to the city center, it's also conveniently close to Portobello Beach and Arthur's Seat. Sleeps 3 with a double bed and an optional pull-out Z bed. Experience Edinburgh on a budget, making the most of your stay without unnecessary extras.

We listened to guests feedback and now have a new sofa bed a new bed and mattress Sep 2025

name: Stylish Apartment in Edinburgh ‧ 5 beds 3 Bedrooms
description:
Experience the charm of staying in a newly renovated traditional Victorian apartment in Newington. It's an excellent choice for travellers, offering easy access to both Edinburgh's Old and New Towns.

Our apartment is conveniently located near the main attractions in Edinburgh and is next to the beautiful park, The Meadows. You'll find supermarkets, cafés, restaurants, and bookstores just a few minutes away, along with the convenience of good bus services for exploring Edinburgh.

name: Small single room for short city stays
description: Single room in quiet and stylish modern home, on major bus routes to Edinburgh city centre. Garden with patio and private parking.

name: Gorgeous apartment in the heart of New Town
description:
This modern and cosy apartment is located in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town, surrounded by an array of shops and mouth-watering restaurants right at your doorstep.

The charming one-bedroom apartment, ideal for up to 2 guests, features a king-size bed and is beautifully decorated with touches of Scottish charm. The spacious bedroom offers a view of the lively Hanover Street, while the open-plan lounge, kitchen, and dining area create a bright, airy atmosphere.

name: 16/ 1 Eildon Street
description:
Set within a Victorian town house built in 1900, the apartment boasts a spectacular view of the Edinburgh skyline and its famous landmarks.
The property has high ceilings, generous room sizes, solid wood flooring throughout, and some traditional features such as the ceiling cornicing.

The apartment has been refreshed and newly furnished to create a stunning space and the perfect base from which to explore this wonderful city.
STL issue number: EH-71374-F.
EPC Rating- D

name: Tasteful apt in the heart of Edinburgh
description:
✔ Charming flat positioned in the heart of Edinburgh
✔ Central location, next to the city’s most iconic attractions
✔ 1 double bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-fitted kitchen
✔ St Giles' Cathedral is a stone’s throw away
✔ Iconic Cockburn St & The Royal Mile are under a 5-minute walk
✔ 14-minute stroll to Calton Hill
✔ 18-minute walk to the renowned Holyrood Park
✔ 2-minute walk to Victoria Street bus stop
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: New central main door apartment
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Recently underwent a full refurbishment with all modern features. Main ground floor entry and only 4 bus stop rides
to town centre. 5 minute walk to fountainpark retail park with restaurants, bars, cinema, bowling, trampoline centre, arcade and much more. Ideal for singles, families, couples and friends. Bedroom comprises of a double bed and a bunk bed, total of 4 people can sleep.

name: C&E Apartment
description:
Welcome to the C&E Apartment, your ultimate Edinburgh oasis! Located in the hip Leith area, this pad is pure awesomeness!

In a nutshell: The Shore is just a skip away, packed with award-winning bars and restaurants. And guess what? The famous Royal Yacht Britannia is practically your neighbor at the Ocean Terminal Shopping Complex. Plus, the Tram is right at your doorstep, ready to zip you to Edinburgh's Historic Centre in no time!

name: Ensuite Stunning Large Secure, Seaview Room
description:
Welcome to my stunning seaside retreat located right next to Edinburgh's shoreline, offering a unique advantage of being situated very close to Edinburgh city centre while providing a tranquil escape from the noise and commotion associated with urban areas.
This spacious en suite room with attached private Bathroom offers a king-size bed, lockable door for your privacy & security and large bright windows with breath-taking views of Granton Harbour and the sea located right in front.

name: City Centre-Edinburgh 1st Floor  Castle Ter
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located apartment at Castle Terrace. You will be only one minutes walking distance to the West End of the city centre and all the various amenities.
Excellent transport links nearby with Princes Street and Haymarket/Waverly Train Stations only a short walk away.
A perfect Location for exploring Edinburgh's central landmarks.
The flat has 2 bedrooms for up to 4 people, living room, separate kitchen and shower room.

name: John’s Spare Room - Corstorphine
description:
Welcome to the booking page for my spare room!

The room has a double bed, dedicated work space, excellent Wi-Fi and access to the shared bathroom and shower.

There are excellent transport links to the city and airport (bus and tram)

Check in is from 4pm onwards (if you need earlier check in, message me and I’ll see if possible) and check out is by 10am at the very latest.

Check in will be via a lockbox which I will give the code for upon booking. Please reach out if you need anything else :)

name: Large Apartment in Central Edinburgh
description: Space abounds in this self-catering city centre apartment with an fully equipped kitchen/diner and spacious living room. Also you will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place. Also surrounded by full of great pubs, coffee houses, boutique shops, gymnasiums, cinema complexes and restaurants.

name: Very Large 5-Bed Central Flat
description:
Space abounds in this self-catering city centre apartment which features five exceptionally spacious bedrooms, three modern/designer bathrooms (one is en-suite), a large fully equipped kitchen and large spacious living room. This property is available for your entire use and an ideal base for large groups or families visiting Edinburgh.

Location can't be beaten with an easy walking distance to all the major attractions including Edinburgh Castle, Prince Street, Royal Mile, Grassmarket etc.

name: Double Room in a Central Flat
description: Space abounds in this self-catering city centre apartment with an fully equipped kitchen/diner and spacious living room. name: Stylish 2BR Flat, Heart of Oldtown, Edinburgh
description:
**2BR Central Edinburgh Apartment: A Gateway to History and Comfort**

Welcome to your sanctuary in the midst of Edinburgh's historic heart. This freshly renovated 2-bedroom apartment offers the perfect blend of modern comfort and Old Town charm.
Property in LEZ Zone. Please ensure car is compliant if driving.
