name: Lovely Flat in the Heart of Edinburgh
description:
✔ Cosy & inviting flat with superb location - in the heart of Edinburgh
✔ The flat offers views of the iconic Edinburgh Castle
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Fully fitted kitchen
✔ Right next to Edinburgh Castle
✔ St Giles' Cathedral & The Royal Mile are a 5-minute walk
✔ The National Museum of Scotland is a 7-minute walk
✔ 10-minute walk will take you to the infamous Princes St
✔ 11-minute walk to Scott Monument
✔ Edinburgh Waverley train station: 11-minute walk
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious, walk to city centre!
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Stylish City Flat
description: Experience the heart of Edinburgh in our stylish 3-bedroom apartment nestled in a vibrant neighborhood, our modern and spacious flat is situated next to the Royal Mile, placing you at the center of Edinburgh's rich history and culture. Explore the historic Old Town, Arthurs Seat and Edinburgh Castle. 5 minutes walk from Waverley Station with links to London and the Highlands.

name: 1 Bedroom Apartment in Edinburgh
description:
This stylish maisonette is situated in the wonderful Corstorphine area, with its many close by amenities and is the ideal place to stay during your trip to the capital. It is clean, modern and comfortable, situated in a quiet neighbourhood.

This place is the perfect retreat where you can relax and unwind, with use of the private garden space. You'll love the modern bathroom, well equipped kitchen with dining area along with the comfortable queen bed.

name: Spacious great sized room
description:
Guests will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.
Spacious room with excellent WiFi , desk , double bed and big wardrobe

name: K R Sweet Home
description:
Take your family on a stay and have a fantastic time together.
Tram stop is 200 meters from the apartment. Direct access from the airport.

name: large double room in a shared flat
description: This cozy shared double room is ideal for friends or a couple,a comfortable double bed, wardrobe, and a study desk. Bright with natural light and tastefully decorated, it offers a perfect mix of comfort and style for an affordable living experience.

name: Cosy corner flat off Leith walk
description:
Welcome to the Cosy Corner Flat on Montgomery! Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium and the city centre.

Nestled in the heart of Edinburgh's vibrant Montgomery Street, just off Leith Walk. There are a plethora of bars and restaurants in the area, however the kitchen is fully equipped should you wish to relax at home of an evening with a home cooked meal.

name: The Creatives collection
description: Combining The Artists Retreat and The Poets Sanctuary, two luxury apartments at Slateford House 1770, provides sleeping space for up to 10 people with ample socialising space, three bathrooms and two kitchens. The apartments are located side by side giving you the run of a whole section of Slateford House.

name: Cosy boho beach flat with a sea view
description:
Bright and spacious 2-bed, 2-minute walk to the beach, in Portobello.
🌊🌅

Open kitchen living room, 1 x double bedroom & 1 smaller with 2 single beds (trundle pull-out).

The 26 bus runs regularly to and from Edinburgh city centre. 🚌

Free parking. 🚗

Towels and bedding provided! 😊

name: The Leith Port Collection
description: Combining North Port and Port Ellen, two luxury apartments at 89 The Merchants, provides sleeping space for up to 10 people with ample socialising space, two bathrooms and two kitchens. The apartments are located side by side giving you the run of a whole floor of 89 The Merchants! Situated in the highly sought-after area of Leith in Edinburgh, these loft apartments offers a bright and spacious living space, perfect for your stay.

name: very quiet, comfy room with easy access to city
description:
A very quiet room near rivers, your own bathroom and luxury mattress. Lot of public transports nearby and two 24/7 stores.

- City center is 10 min by Taxi, 30-45min by bus, 1h by walk or 5 min by train.
- The airport is 15 min by Taxi, and 1h-1h15 by bus.

name: Beautiful 4 Bedroom Cottage - Free Parking
description: This gorgeous and spacious house, located in Edinburgh's sought-after Gilmerton/Liberton area, offers everything you need for a comfortable stay. Equipped with all the essentials you'd expect in your own home. With 4 bedrooms and 7 beds (3 king-size, 2 double, and 2 single), the house comfortably sleeps up to 12 guests.

name: Spacious Double Room in Elegant Cottage
description:
This gorgeous and spacious house is located in the excellent Gilmerton/Liberton area of Edinburgh, offering all the comforts of home. The house is fully equipped with everything you need, and expect in your own home.

The property features 4 rooms:
- Room 2: One king-size bed (ground floor)(This is the room you are booking).

name: Penthouse Apartment on Royal Mile | Three Bed
description: This spacious top-floor apartment offers comfortable accommodation for up to 6 guests, with 3 well-appointed bedrooms. The double bedroom features a double bed, the master bedroom has a king-size bed and en-suite, and the third bedroom includes two single beds. The master bedroom also provides ample storage, perfect for stowing away all your shopping and souvenirs.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Family room on garden level Edinburgh CityCentre
description: McDonald Road Edinburgh is in the heart of the city.  The house with the main door entrance is just beside the McDonald Road station of the Airport tram. This room on the Lower Ground Floor has a private bathroom/toilet. It is for a family of 3.  There is a shared kitchen and a dining room. It is nice and quiet, despite being close to all the amenities. TESCO and Sainsbury are just on the opposite of the street. It is a 15-minute walk to Calton Hill or Waverly train station.

name: Cosy flat in central Edinburgh
description:
Enjoy being in the heart of the action on Edinburgh's Rose Street, close to restaurants, bars and all of Edinburgh's main attractions- George St & Princes St are moments away, Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile within a 15 min walk.
You'll have full run of the flat, with a double and a twin bedroom, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher & washing machine, cosy living room and bathroom with shower over bath. The flat is on the top (3rd) floor of a traditional tenement building and has no lift.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Peaceful entire apartment- FREEparking Duddingston
description: Peaceful one-bedroom flat (with two beds) near Holyrood Park in east Edinburgh. Lovely considerate guests welcome; would suit 2 guests visiting the city for holidays, work or the Festival. Access to all flat amenities included - bright living room, well-equipped kitchen, fresh bathroom, shared grassy outdoor area. Free parking, fantastic walking opportunities, 15-minute (4km) bus ride or 55 min walk from City Centre, 35 mins (2km) walk from Portobello Beach, supermarket & many bus links nearby.

name: Grassmarket Apartment with Amazing Castle View
description: This centrally located apartment has spectacular views of Edinburgh Castle.  It is located within the secure gated complex of  ‘Websters Land’ at the foot of Edinburgh Castle.  Although it is situated in the Old Town, a vibrant part of the city, it is set back from the street and amazingly quiet.   An abundance of restaurants, pubs and pavement cafes are all within a minute’s walk from your doorstep as is the historic Grassmarket.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stunning Property On Leith Walk
description:
Located on vibrant Leith Walk, center to an amazing Art and Bar scene. 2 minutes walk from Tram Stop that you can get from the Airport. 20 minutes walk to Princess St. Edinburgh's best Pubs, bars and Restaurants at your doorstep. Leith has the best art/event scene in the city. Ideal for those that want to experience the true heart of the Edinburgh Fringe Festival.

Stunning and spacious property, that the whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Beautiful luxurious cottage
description: Enjoy a cosy experience at this centrally-located cottage , minutes from the beach and restaurants and bars walking distance, as well as local to Edinburgh town centre Two bathrooms , BBQ and private parking

name: Elegant 2 bed Georgian retreat close to Princes St
description: An exquisite luxury flat, forming part of a traditional Georgian townhouse.  Refurbished to the highest of standards, this spacious and charming property occupies a wonderful central yet quiet position, with the historic beauty of the capital on its doorstep and minutes from key bus and tram routes.  Luxurious bathrooms, beautiful quality furnishings, a well stocked kitchen, amazingly comfy beds and spacious rooms make this flat the perfect sanctuary to relax in after a hectic day in the city.

name: Sunshine on Leith. The River View Apartment
description: Generously-sized apartment located in the vibrant Leith area, offering breathtaking views of the Water of Leith, situated just meters away from the shore which is packed with a variety of fantastic bars and restaurants including 2 Michelin star restaurants. Just a brief 5-minute stroll from the Royal Yacht Britannia and the local tram station, providing easy access to various town locations, including the airport. This accommodation comfortably accommodates up to 6 guests. Pets Allowed!!

name: EdinburghArrandaleGuestHouseDouble Room
description:
Arrandale Guest House is a stylish, stone built Victorian villa with many traditional features such as ornate cornices, high ceilings, wide doors and large windows, making it light and spacious.
​
The Arrandale is conveniently located for most of the main attractions in Edinburgh, including the Castle, Holyrood Palace, Dynamic Earth and Royal Yacht Britannia.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: EdinburghArrandaleGuestHouseDouble Room
description:

property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Nice room in the Newhaven
description: Newhaven is situated a short stroll away from the heart of Leith, Wardie Bay Beach, and Newhaven Harbour with its excellent range of local speciality shops, cafes, and restaurants.The City Centre is accessible by bus, tram, or a 40-minute walk. The Royal Botanic Gardens, cycle paths, and sports and health clubs are also right next door. Good road links provide direct access to the Edinburgh Airport and Waverly Train Station, making commuting further afield quick and simple.

name: Lovely double room.
description:
Beautiful bedroom in nice 1930's bungalow with a garden.
Small double bed, wardrobe desk etc next to bathroom.

name: Wallace Suite
description:
Stay in a beautiful Georgian townhouse, overlooking a historic public park in Edinburgh.

The Townhouse has eight self-catering hotel suites to choose from, this being our luxury studio apartment - The Wallace Suite.

The property is well connected by tram to Edinburgh city centre and airport, with the local tram stop only a 5 minute walk away.

Explore the vibrant local neighbourhood, 'The Shore', with a host of independent shops, cafes, pubs and award-winning restaurants.

name: Double Ensuite with Bath and Garden View at Carmic
description: Carmichael at No 11 Ravelston Dykes is a charming Edwardian detached house in the prestigious Murrayfield area and offers the epitome of family run bed and breakfast accommodation. With four beautifully appointed bedrooms fine home cooked food, complimentary wifi and car parking, within easy walking distance of fabulous pubs restaurants and shops, not to mention unparalleled Scottish hospitality we create a true home away from home for all our guests. A studio flat which sleeps 4 also available.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: King Ensuite with Shower and Garden View at Carmic
description: Carmichael at No 11 Ravelston Dykes is a charming Edwardian detached house in the prestigious Murrayfield area and offers the epitome of family run bed and breakfast accommodation. With four beautifully appointed bedrooms fine home cooked food, complimentary wifi and car parking, within easy walking distance of fabulous pubs restaurants and shops, not to mention unparalleled Scottish hospitality we create a true home away from home for all our guests. A studio flat which sleeps 4 also available.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Cosy Leith Retreat - Edinburgh City
description:
Absolutely delighted to welcome guests in our property. With over a decade of tourist experience, we are thrilled to make a long-lasting memory of your experience in our beloved Edinburgh.

Cosy Leith Retreat is a spacious, light-filled and elegant property, equipped with all the amenities you would need to make the best of your stay – an idyllic setting for any occasion!

The property is part of Edinburgh’s iconic 18th century design and architecture.

name: Central Edinburgh, Quirky & Modern 1 bed apartment
description:
Enjoy a stylish stay at this centrally located place.

Situated a 5-minute walk from the Royal Mile, this recently renovated second-floor flat is surrounded by numerous cafes, restaurants, and key attractions.

Guests can embrace the atmosphere of this bustling city while enjoying peace and comfort in my beautiful home.

Within 5-30 minute walk you have: Holyrood Palace, Scottish Parliament, Carlton Hill and Arthurs Seat, Waverly Station, Edinburgh Castle, St Giles Cathedral, , Princes Gardens.

name: Private bedroom in the central
description: Very quiet private bedroom with your own shower room , in the central area Haymarket area.   Shared kitchen with one person. Usually will be a university student.  It is a very peaceful and centrally-located place. 2 shower rooms, but only one toilet so you still need to share the toilet room.

name: The Outlander Experience
description:
The Outlander Lodge is a unique experience for fans of the series to 'live the dream'.
This is our home, in a historic building and we ask you to be keep noise to a minimum in the communal areas.

When taking a shower please don't let the water flow over into the bathroom, keep your showers short (10 mins).

Small Alcove bed: If you are tall and/or mighty, pregnant check with us PRIOR to booking.

No smokers (not even occasional smokers)
No pets
No children
Maximum 2 adults occupancy
No parties

name: Entire Georgian Townhouse - Sleeps up to 25
description:
Enjoy exclusive use of our newly-refurbished Georgian townhouse, overlooking a historical park in Edinburgh.

This listing allows you to book all eight unique suites of our boutique aparthotel. The rooms range in size and all feature their own kitchenette and bathroom. Combining traditional elegance with modern convenience.

Please contact us for further information.

name: Bright and spacious 2bed apartment
description: This is a stylish place to stay in a quiet neighborhood. here you will feel at home.

name: Beautiful quiet garden escape w/ parking
description:
Beautiful and peaceful, amazing views, self- contained garden accommodation, with full use of the garden. Simple tea and coffee facilities, toaster-NO kitchen

Stunning views of Blackford hill, with walking trails with beautiful views of the city from the top. Edinburgh city is 1.5 miles to the Castle and The Royal Mile, a flat walk into town that takes 35 mins, or a short bus ride.

The accommodation is situated on the ground floor of an Edinburgh Grade 1 listed house.

name: Impressive West End Georgian Apartment
description: Stay in a renovated listed Georgian apartment in Edinburgh’s West End. Classic period features meet modern comfort, creating a bright and peaceful base close to restaurants, shops and main attractions.

name: Central location,free parking
description:
FREE parking space and Wi-Fi available.
The 2 bedroom , 2 bathrooms apartment is ideal for up to 5 guests and is centrally located -an excellent base from which to explore Edinburgh with everything very close at hand.
Located in the heart of the Edinburgh city centre and is within a short walk of all the main tourist attractions, restaurants, bars and nightlife. The apartment is only within a 15min walk of Princes Street .

name: Cosy room in Leith close to Shore and tram stop
description: A cosy room and private bathroom is offered within a flat that is very near two tram stops, and allows direct access from the airport and into central Edinburgh on the tramline.  The flat is in a block situated on a private courtyard,  and in a historic building that was originally home to a whisky business.  The flat is a five minute walk from Leith's Shore with its excellent restaurants and cafes, and directly opposite Leith Links park, where the rules of golf were first codified.

name: Lovely double room
description: Double room in a 3 bed flat which would be shared with me. The flat has a bright kitchen with every amenity you might need. There is also a bathroom with a bath tub +shower. It is located near the beautiful Pentlands and just 20 minutes away from the city centre by bus. Right in front there is a beautiful park with football pitches and a basketball court.

name: Newly Refurbished 3 bedroom flat
description:
A contemporary top floor flat in the heart of Edinburgh. Just meters away from amazing restaurants, cafes, bars and so much more.
Perfect for a weekend getaway, business trip, staycation, work-from-home alternative, or a cozy home base while exploring everything Edinburgh has to offer.

name: Beach View - Sleeps 8 - Sauna & Plunge
description: Enjoy breathtaking views of Cramond Island and the Firth of Forth from this luxurious 4 - bedroom home, just a 5-minute walk to the beach. 2 bedroom have an en-suite, the other two bedrooms share a master bathroom and two additional WCs are situated on the ground floor. Relax in the spacious lounge, cook in the fully-equipped kitchen, and unwind in the large gardens with a private sauna and plunge pool. Perfect for families, couples, or friends, and only 20 minutes from Edinburgh city centre.

name: Leith Boho Chic 2 bed with parking
description:
Our property is ideally situated right on the tram line offering hassle-free access to Murrayfield Stadium. Whether you're attending a rugby match, concert, or event, you can hop on the tram at Balfour Str stop and arrive at Murrayfield in just 40 minutes. Say goodbye to parking headaches and enjoy the convenience of a smooth and direct journey to the heart of the action.

Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish apartment on a quiet side street off the vibrant Leith Walk. The city can be eas

name: Beag Apartment Near Haymarket
description: Experience Edinburgh like a local in this creatively designed flat in Dalry, just 10 mins from Haymarket Station, 33 mins by tram from the airport, and a 34-min walk to Old Town. Close to the city but peaceful—ideal during festival season. Surrounded by great local restaurants, and fully equipped with everything for a comfy stay. The kitchen’s stocked with essentials for home cooking. Perfect for couples or solo travelers looking to explore the city.

name: Luxury Nests - City Centre 3

The property was recently refurbished to a high standard throughout and offers a perfect example of modern living. The apartment enjoys its own dedicated entrance, with generously proportioned living and bedroom accommodation.

name: Lovely 3 bed Apt with 6 beds
description:
Welcome to our modern and inviting apartment in Edinburgh - the perfect place to stay for families, friends, groups, business travelers & contractors. We welcome you to enjoy our warm hospitality.

➞ Approx. 4 min drive away to the A199 motorway.

➞ Close to Foot of the Walk tram stop.

➞ 5 min walk away from nearest supermarket & restaurant.

➞ Attractions like Royal Mile, Holyrood Park & Royal Botanic Garden are just a 10-15 minutes drive away from this property.

name: Meadowside Gem
description: Step into our charming 2-bedroom retreat, nestled near the Meadows, with Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile just moments away.  Immerse yourself in the city's rich history, go for a walk up Arthur's seat, relax in your cozy home away from home, all this is possible and more at our Meadowside Gem. Experience the perfect mix of convenience and comfort during your stay in Scotland's capital.

name: Peaceful historic flat with modern design
description:
Beautiful and spacious traditional one bedroom tenement flat in Edinburgh.

This is my home throughout the year and so it is well-suited to longer stays comes with everything you need to live comfortably like a dedicated home working space, smart TV, coffee machine, claw-footed bathtub, fully equipped kitchen etc.

The flat is well situated, close to public transport (buses and tram) linking to all major sites including the city centre, train stations, airport and Murrayfield stadium.

name: Splendid Apartment near City Centre
description:
✔ Stylish flat ideally settled in West End

description:
What a find!
This idyllic Victorian apartment is situated a stone throw away from the Botanical Gardens in the desirable Trinity area of Edinburgh. Our duplex apartment has perfect panoramic views of Edinburgh, the castle,arthur seat and the old town.
This property has 2 double bedrooms and sleeps 4 people.

Walk to the:
The Botancial Gardens in 5 minutes
Stockbridge/Inverleith Park in 10 minutes
Britannia Yacht in 15 minutes
Edinburgh Castle in 25 minutes
Holyrood Palace in 35 minutes.

name: Stylish Elegance in City's Heart
description: Explore our stunning 100 sqm apartment, a masterpiece nestled in the heart of Edinburgh's vibrant neighbourhood. Known for its cultural landmarks, lush green spaces, and lively streets, this locale is a treasure trove of discovery. The nearby McDonald Road tram Station, just a 9-minute walk away, offers easy access for those eager to explore further.

name: Extra large room in Edinburgh
description:
"When you invite people to your home, you invite them to yourself. Oprah Winfrey"
And that is the reason why I offer a peaceful, clean and welcoming atmosphere. I am here to make your stay memorable.
I am Spanish but moved to Edinburgh almost 10 years ago. I work in Finance, some days from home so my space is a very important part of my life. In my free time I like to spend days outdoors, without excuses if the sun is shining! If not, cooking and a good chat will cheer me up.

name: Edinburgh Flat
description:

Frequent bus services up the road from the flat provides quick access routes:
-10 minutes Edinburgh Airport
-10mins Edinburgh Zoo
-15mins Murrayfield Stadium for concerts/events
-25mins to City Centre
-5mins walk to Maybury Casino
The flat is also conveniently placed to excellent commuter links nearby with Bypass, M8/M9.

No parties permitted, sorry.
Happy to help with any queries!

name: Superb location: Castle view luxury on Grassmarket
description:
License no: EH-81949-F

One of the finest locations in Edinburgh, West Bow sits on Grassmarket and the most photographed street in Scotland, Victoria Street: the inspiration for JK Rowling’s Diagon Alley.

This spectacular flat is in a traditional, 1800s stone tenement, newly restored to provide a contemporary, open plan living area with picture postcard castle views.

Two double bedrooms (one can become two single beds), sleep four in cosy luxury. A stylish home-from-home, bang in the centre.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright, modern 2 bedroom house with free parking!
description:
This new, warm and thoughtfully furnished house is ideal for families or friends to stay during their time in Edinburgh. It is in a modern development near Edinburgh City Centre, which is a short 10 minute drive/ bus ride away.

In the house you will find;
- 1 King bed, 1 double bed and a sofa bed
- Super comfortable Emma mattress, fluffy pillows and plush towels
- 2 full bathrooms
- Nespresso coffee machine
- Washing machine & dishwasher
- 65" Smart TV
- Driveway to park your car
- Garden

name: Stunning views of Arthur's Seat, centrally located

Experience the spirit of Edinburgh at your own pace, style & comfort at our charming apartment featuring:
- Spectacular views of Arthur's Seat & Salisbury Crags
- Right next to the Royal Mile, Arthur's Seat, Salisbury Crags, Holyrood Palace & Park and the Scottish Parliament
- Close to all the central attractions Edinburgh has to offer
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Fast internet

I’ve been an AirBnB Super Host in Edinburgh for over four year - please check my reviews 😊

name: Cosy Bedroom
description: Located right next to a beautiful walking and cycle path, our house is surrounded by cafes, restaurants, and shopping facilities. Only a half-hour walk to Waverley train station, the old town, and Princess Street, you'll have easy access to all the city has to offer. The royal botanic gardens are just a 10-minute walk away, and Stockbridge is just 20 minutes on foot. Relax in our south-facing garden or explore the vibrant neighborhood. Just a heads up, we have a cat in case you have allergies.

name: Lovely main door flat 10 mins walk from Haymarket
description: recently renovated main door flat near haymarket Station

name: Gorgeous Full Home in Edinburgh
description:
Spacious 2 bedroom home in Edinburgh. Perfect for those looking to visit Edinburgh and the surrounding areas as a family or group. Bright bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and a cosy living/dining room. Free parking on private driveway and free WiFi included.

Many public transport options available and shops/supermarkets between 5-10 minute bus ride or 20 minute walk away. The city centre is 20 minutes away by bus - perfect for enjoying the attractions, history, nightlife and more!

name: Luxury Nests - City Centre 1
description: A beautiful luxury three bedroom apartment, less than 200 yards from one of Edinburgh's newest and most desirable tourist attractions - The Johnnie Walker Experience. The property was recently refurbished to a high standard throughout and offers a perfect example of modern living. The apartment enjoys its own dedicated entrance, with generously proportioned living and bedroom accommodation.

name: Seaside cabin in a walled garden
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil walled garden retreat within walking distance of the lively east end of Edinburgh's' New town and happening Leith. Have a wild morning swim at Wardie beach, a wander around the Royal botanical gardens, a beer at the Old chain pier or hop on the new tram at Newhaven harbor to catch a festival show.

name: Cosy suite in quiet cul-de-sac
description:
'Silverknowes Suite' is a small, newly renovated, light and airy ground floor studio with own front door, kitchenette and ensuite.
Situated in a quiet cul-de-sac, within 5 minutes walk to bus routes to the city centre and 10 minutes to the airport bus stop. By car, the city can be reached in 15 minutes.
There are beautiful nearby walks down to the Forth River front and beach.
The suite is attached to our family home but the connecting door will be kept locked ensuring your privacy.

name: Comfy very wee room with ensuite bathroom
description: Very small cosy room with en-suite shower in lovely warm welcoming shared flat. This is a spare room also used as a utility room with items stored on shelves, perhaps not suitable for people with allergies, with access to a spacious shared kitchen & lovely living room to relax in. A peaceful location on the edge of Leith. 35 mins walk/15 mins by bus to city centre, and 10 mins walk to the sea. Cooking facilities and self-service tea & coffee all included. The bed is 190cm & their are no windows.

name: *Dalkeith Manor* 19th century flat in Edinburgh
description:
Step into the full Scottish experience at Dalkeith Manor a tenement house established circa 1895 on the land of Sir Robert Keith Dick, the 7th Baronet of Lambrughton, Ayr.

This 19th-century tenement house retains much of its form and fabric. Relax and unwind next to a comforting fire in the winter or enjoy the sunshine during summertime. We have done our best to bring out the distinctive character in this historic property while furnishing it in a luxurious period style.

name: Refreshing Modern Home in South Queensferry
description: This charming two-bedroom house in South Queensferry is ideally situated in a peaceful, quiet area with convenient access to local shops, restaurants, and attractions. Whether you're planning a short-term or long-term stay in the South Queensferry area, this residence offers a perfect home-away-from-home experience.

name: 1BR. Urban Bliss in Bruntsfield
description: Experience our stylish 1-bedroom apartment in the heart of Bruntsfield’s lively high street. Surrounded by artisan cafés, boutique shops, and local bars, it’s perfect for couples seeking comfort and charm. Step straight onto Bruntsfield Links and the Meadows, or take a short walk to Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile. The best base for exploring, relaxing, and soaking up one of the city’s most desirable neighbourhoods. Book your Bruntsfield stay today!

name: Lovely space in tenement flat
description:
Want to explore this amazing city and be near the action but want somewhere peaceful to retire to at the end of the day? Then you have found the perfect place.
This is a welcoming, comfortable space with dedicated bathroom. A centrally located tenement flat shared with a husband, wife and dog called Tommy. Near to pubs, restaurants and amenities 15 mins to walk to the city centre. It is also close to both Picardy Place and McDonald Road tram stops, direct to the airport, plus various bus routes.

name: Luxury Old Town Flat on Iconic Royal Mile
description:
An impeccably restored luxurious Georgian apartment, inside a Category A listed building, facing on to the iconic Royal Mile in Edinburgh’s beautiful Old Town. The building incorporates an earlier building dating from the 1500’s.

The apartment is centrally located for all major attractions and only five minutes walk from Waverley train station and eight minutes walk from the nearest tram stop and airport connection. Most attractions are within 1 - 15 minutes walk from the apartment.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

description: This lovely studio/flat is located in the quiet residential area of Murrayfield, on Edinburgh’s west side, close to Edinburgh’s vibrant city centre. This beautiful historic city is easily accessible via a range of public transport options to and from Edinburgh Airport, Waverley and Haymarket train stations and bus routes. The property is close to Edinburgh Zoo and Murrayfield Rugby Stadium. Free on street parking.

name: Edinburgh Georgian Apartment with Private Entrance
description: Private Entrance with courtyard - stunning main door Georgian apartment in the gorgeous Inverleith area in Edinburgh, a short walk into the city centre. High end finishes throughout. Designer kitchen and bathrooms, with ensuite. 2 double bedrooms.

name: Bright & Spacious Modern Apartment
description:
My conveniently located apartment has transport links into the centre of Edinburgh, or a short walk to world-famous Murrayfield Stadium.

The double bedroom is quiet, spacious, comfortable, and has a workspace.

Earlier checkin possibly available on request (depending on previous guest checkout time) at no charge.

Ideal for solo travellers and tourists!

Reg: EH-72072-F

name: Large single room for short city stays
description: Surround yourself with style in this peaceful space, with the city centre within easy reach and the hills on your doorstep. Multiple bus routes into the city centre, running all day and night, around 20 minutes on a quiet day, a bit more during the festival or at busy times. Lots of walking opportunities in the nearby hills.  This room is for single occupancy only.

The guest room is a generous twin bedroom with plenty of natural light and comes with exclusive use of a modern private bathroom.

Each morning, guests can enjoy a complimentary breakfast featuring a selection of cereals, porridge, fresh bread or toast, croissants, ham and cheese, eggs, yoghurts, fresh fruit, juice, tea and coffee.

With views of both sunrise and sunset, and green fields behind, yet just minutes from major shops and transport hubs.

It has 3 large living spaces, 3 large bedrooms, office space+4 bathrooms.

20-30 minutes by car into Edinburgh city.

45 minutes to Glasgow.

5 minutes from Edinburgh airport. 5 minutes from the M9 / M8.

name: The Sidings: cosy retreat near Edinburgh
description:
Cosy countryside retreat with easy access to Edinburgh centre. Newly built.

Log burning stove, super insulated, south facing with views to the fields

Great local walks straight from the doorstep. We're at the foot of the Pentland Hills.

5 minutes walk to bus stop for Edinburgh (30 - 40 min ride). Or a 25 minute drive.

15 - 20 min drive to Edinburgh airport.

Traffic free cycle path to Edinburgh.

Shared garden and boot and utility room.

Electric car charging at cost.

name: Little universe
description: Have fun with your friends. It is in very quiet area . Lot of shops are around. Also we are very helpful during your time with us . I have a cat she is very friendly. There’s two main gym and pool in 10 mts walk. Take away is available anytime. Many restaurants and supermarkets very close by . 10 mts  bus to princess street, Edinburgh castles. Railway station 10 mts away by bus . Airport 20 mts by car , or bus or tram . Bus stop is 3 mts walk from home . Royal botanical garden 10 mts by bus .

name: Cosy double budget room
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

description:

Central and bus links in the door step meaning you can be in the city in 15 mins. Free Parking on Driveway.

- Bus stop within 2min walk with transport direct into the city centre!

description:
👋 Hi there! I’m Basil, I, alongside my family and close friends, work hard to maintain my flat and sure you have a welcoming and comfortable stay in Edinburgh.

The flat has a living room with a pull-out day bed (King size) and a large bedroom (double bed). As well as a fully equipped kitchen.

Sheets, towels, toiletries, hot water and heating are all provided!

Just a 10 min walk to the Royal Mile, and at the centre of the Fringe Festival, It is the ideal location to explore Edinburgh!

It's in a central location, on the edge of the Meadows park and within easy walking distance of the city's Old Town. It is bright and spacious with a fully fitted kitchen and roomy living room and can comfortably sleep up to six people.

It's beautiful and elegant inside and out and is surrounded by views over the paddocks where you can watch horses and riders train.

name: Lux room (room only)
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space..

Walk to local shops and coffee shops
Restaurants nearby

Visiting for work or leisure, it’s the perfect base to enjoy the city while having a welcoming space to return to.

description: Relax, recharge your batteries, and feel at home in a modern, clean, tastefully furnished, and safe accommodation situated in, Edinburgh. description: Relax, recharge your batteries, and feel at home in a modern, clean, tastefully furnished, and safe accommodation situated in, Edinburgh. Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

Beautiful furnished ensuite room.
Comes with a reading table and office chair. Furnished ensuite. Access to fully fitted kitchen and utility room. All basic amenities provided to make your stay comfortable and easy.

name: Writer's retreat in Bruntsfield
description:
A charming studio flat nestled in the heart of Bruntsfield, Edinburgh's literary quarter. Ideal for solo travellers or couples seeking inspiration or simply a tranquil escape, this cosy abode offers a perfect blend of comfort and convenience.

Whether you're seeking literary inspiration or simply craving a relaxing getaway, the Writer's Retreat promises a memorable stay in one of Edinburgh's most beloved neighbourhoods. Book your stay today and experience the magic of Bruntsfield firsthand.

name: Dbl Room+Private Bath, free parking, 15min to city
description:
Enjoy a relaxing stay in this bright, cozy 2-bedroom flat just 15 minutes from Edinburgh city centre. Ideal for tourists and business travellers, the flat includes:

✨ Private bathroom
🛋️ Comfy lounge to unwind
🚀 Fast WiFi — great for streaming or work
🍳 Fully equipped kitchen for self-catering
🚗 Free on-street parking
🌳 Quiet, safe area with excellent transport links

Whether you're here for sightseeing or business, this peaceful home has everything you need for a comfortable stay.

name: Funky Flat in the Old Town
description:
Right in the heart of the real Edinburgh, Old Town!

You're 5 minutes walk from central stations to the door.

By day, take a slow wander along the Royal Mile to the Castle or the Palace of Holyroodhouse listening to the bagpipes and street entertainers as you go.

By night, this place is smack bang in the middle of the best nightlife Edinburgh has to offer. Great places to eat with live music and dancing until the wee hours if you fancy.

Or just chill watching a huge TV on a big comfy sofa.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Hayloft
description: Welcome to our newly renovated loft in the heart of Edinburgh! This centrally located space offers modern comfort and convenience, just a stone's throw away from the picturesque Meadows and the esteemed University of Edinburgh. With its sleek design and prime location, our loft is the perfect retreat for exploring the city's vibrant culture, historic landmarks, and charming streets. Whether you're here for business or leisure, our loft provides a stylish and cozy base for your adventures.

name: Westfield apartments  near Murrayfield stadium.
description: Experience the charm of this spacious 3 bedroom apartment, ideally situated just a short stroll from Murrayfield Stadium and Tynecastle Stadium. With convenient access to the city center via a 12-minute bus, car, or Uber ride, and frequent bus services every 7-10 minutes. Recently refurbished featuring a new kitchen and ample space. Perfectly suited for families, business professionals, relocators, and contractors alike.

name: The Haymarket Hideaway
description:
A two-bedroom ground level colony cottage with private garden located in the heart of Edinburgh city, Haymarket. This location is situated perfect, walking distance to Grassmarket, Royal Mile and Edinburgh's city centre.

There is an abundance of fantastic local bakeries, restaurants, bars, and coffee shops in the area making it the perfect choice for a city break with everything you need at your fingertips!

name: Cosy Victorian Cottage w Parking
description: Step into our captivating and spacious garden cottage, once conceived as a billiard room and summer retreat. Nestled within, discover a haven boasting a generous double bedroom and a rejuvenating shower room. The heart of the cottage unveils a grand open living, dining, and kitchen space adorned with a luminous cupola, elegant wooden floors, exquisite stained glass windows, and the inviting warmth of a wood-burning stove. Embrace the timeless charm and comfort of this enchanting sanctuary.

name: The Piano Room
description:
A big lovely ground floor, quiet and sunny room with a piano and garden view. Healthy breakfast (muesli, natural yoghurt, fruit, toast). Free parking (available on request), dedicated bathroom with all essentials, shared kitchen. Peaceful garden to relax in or for al fresco dining if the sun is shining!
Bus stop close by with regular buses to the city centre (15 mins) or 30-50 minute walk to most tourist attractions - Edinburgh Castle, Arthur's Seat, Greyfriars Kirk etc.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Stylish Modern Central Gem in Central Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to your luxurious haven in the heart of Edinburgh. Prepare to immerse yourself in a world of comfort and sophistication in this exceptional offering.

Featuring one exquisitely designed bedroom and a stylishly appointed bathroom, this stunning property can accommodate a maximum of four discerning guests

name: Stylish flat in period home by the beach
description: Enjoy this peaceful, stylish space - a newly renovated artist-designed apartment set within an historic 200 year old townhouse, 50 yards from Portobello beach - Edinburgh’s famously fashionable seaside. You’re also only 15 minutes from the city centre by car and there’s plentiful public transport. Portobello is a thriving, highly desirable neighbourhood, with lots of cafes, bars, restaurants and independent shops. Our apartment has its own patio with views onto a park and the sea.

name: 15 mins to Edinburgh Festival, 5 mins to beach.
description:
Bring the whole family to this Edwardian Terrace in the popular beach-side suburb of Portobello & Joppa, Edinburgh.

Enjoy 2 large double rooms, one with a desk overlooking the garden and Arthur’s Seat. Free parking on a quiet road, easy access to the ring road, coastal roads & city centre by car. The train station is a 3-minute walk, with trains every 30 mins, 7 mins to Edinburgh.

Enjoy the tranquil garden or the beach, only 5 mins walk away, or a cozy night in front of the log burner.

name: Colourful Cosy 1 Bed Apartment
description: Cosy and stylish 1 bed flat tucked away next to the historic leith walk area

name: Spacious Victorian Flat
description:
Charming Victorian 2-bedroom flat in The Shore, Leith – perfect for a visit to Edinburgh. With high end furnishings, large living room, spacious kitchen, Sonos speakers, washing machine, 2 large TVs, and loads of storage. Supermarket across the road, tram 1 min away – 15 mins to city centre. Surrounded by great bars, cafés, and restaurants.

This is our family home, which we have recently decided to list on Airbnb.

name: Bright and cozy room with a private bathroom
description:
Nice and cozy room with a comfortable sofa bed in a new and peaceful house in the south of Edinburgh. The bathroom is private and right next to the room. A small wardrobe is provided, along with a kettle and complimentary tea & coffee.

The area is very quiet, and it’s easy to reach the city center by public transport (25-30 min). The bus stop is about 5-8 mins by walking.
The area is full of free parking if you have a car.

name: cosy apartment down Leith
description:
.Nice cosy apartment located down Leith seafield area , within 5 minutes walk to portobello beach and Leith links
flat is ground floor flat sleeps two persona the flat is contains living room dining area and kitchen and bedroom and bathroom ,free on street parking , bus to town just cross the road from the flat .

name: Women only. Room for 1 to 2.
description:
Take it easy and enjoy Edinburgh for a few days or, in transit awaiting a flight. Within close proximity and within short walking distance to tram, bus, and city centre. Easy access to airport.
Close to Murrayfiled Stadium for rugby and concerts. Lovely walks and gardens nearby.
This is a shared home with me and my children (2). There is an expectation of quiet time. Tea and coffee available, no cooking facilities.

name: Cosy apartment near Edinburgh city centre
description:
🌟 Bright & Peaceful Apartment near Edinburgh City Centre 🌟

Enjoy a relaxing stay just 15 mins from Edinburgh’s centre by tram, bus or taxi. This cosy apartment offers a double bed, sofa bed, bright living area and a fully equipped kitchen. Located in a friendly neighbourhood with coffee shops, supermarkets, the O2 Arena and Murrayfield Stadium nearby. Perfect for couples, friends or families seeking a quiet base close to the city buzz.

name: 3 Bed House with 6 Beds near Cramond Beach
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips.

name: Homely quiet 3 BD flat close to town, free parking
description: Relax in our peaceful first-floor, three-bedroom flat in a quiet southwest Edinburgh neighbourhood. Well connected by bus to the city centre, train stations, and the airport, with lovely walks to Craiglockhart Hill and the canal path nearby. Ideal for families, our home is child-friendly and fully equipped with everything you need, including a kitchen for a true home-from-home stay.

name: Beautiful room1F Victorian House
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Beautiful double private bathroom great location
description: Beautiful double room, breakfast included. Great location in a lovely quiet part of Edinburgh, 10 mins to City Centre and 10 mins to Murrayfield Stadium. Private new bathroom next to your bedroom,  two comfortable sitting rooms for flexible use, access to a shared kitchen and garden with patio to enjoy the evening sun. Free on-street and driveway parking with EV charger. You'll be staying in a family home with 2 adults, plus 2 part-time adult kids, and our two friendly Border Terrier dogs.

name: Lovely single room
description:
Enjoy a lovely experience at this centrally-located place.

This is a single room with a centralised shared bathroom, it offers access to a fully fitted kitchen and utility room. All basic amenities are provided to make your stay comfortable and easy.

name: St Christopher's Inn Bed in 6 Bed Dorm
description: Nestled in the centre of the medieval Old Town, our hostel is in the perfect location to reveal Edinburgh’s magical charm combined with an underground party scene unlike any other city.  With incredible sights such as Edinburgh Castle, the Scottish National Galleries and the Royal Mile just a short stroll away from your bed there’s no excuse not to get out and about! Our Edinburgh hostel is also a very convenient 2 minute walk from Waverley station.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Artists Garden Flat
description:
Double bedroom in my peaceful artists home in the vibrant neighbourhood of Portobello (Voted Best Places To Live In The UK), with plenty of cafes, shops & restaurants on your doorstep.

Flat has a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Direct access to the garden with outdoor seating and a fire pit, and 2 min walk to the beach.

I‘m a yoga teacher & artist, I love to share tea and chats with flatmates, I also honour my own solitude and quiet time and respect your space.

Licence no: EH-79933-F

name: Artists Garden Flat - entire flat
description:
Cosy & peaceful artists home in the vibrant neighbourhood of Portobello (Voted Best Places To Live In The UK), with plenty of cafes, shops, restaurants and the beach on your doorstep.

Flat has a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Direct access to the garden with outdoor seating and a fire pit, 2 min walk to the beach.

This is my home, and I am renting out the whole place while I am on holiday, I absolutely love living here and hope you will too! Mi casa, su casa!

Licence no: EH-79933-F

name: Pentland Gateway
description:
- 20 minute drive (7 miles) from Edinburgh Airport.
- Excellent public transport links to Edinburgh. 45 minutes to the city centre on the 44 bus.
- Driving by car 20 minutes.
- Traffic-free cycling routes straight into Edinburgh.
- Harlaw and Threpmuir reservoir nearby.
- Excellent pubs and restaurants within the village.
- Farmers Market every second Saturday of the month, 9am-1pm
- Ideal for families
- Enclosed garden
- Outdoor BBQ and seating for alfresco dining.

name: Double room avail Corstorphine
description: Quiet location only 1min walk away from main bus route/road into city centre from the west and airport. Less than 10mins on bus to Murrayfield which can be walked in 30. Loads of shops and restaurants within short walking distance. 2min max to bus stops to and from the city. Airport bus stop is 5mins away.

name: Modern Edinburgh Apartment with Free Parking!
description:
Experience the charm of Edinburgh with a stay at my modern apartment located near the city centre! With excellent bus links just a 3-minute walk away, travelling around the city is a breeze. Enjoy the convenience of being just a 12-minute drive from the heart of Edinburgh and a 7-minute drive from the iconic Murrayfield Stadium.

With stunning views of the Pentland Hills, make yourself at home and explore all that Edinburgh has to offer while staying in this convenient and comfortable space.

name: Edinburgh’s Arthur’s seat View
description: Edinburgh’s Arthur’s Seat View offers you an unparalleled experience nestled in the heart of Scottish Capital. Situated majestically overlooking the historic Arthur’s Seat,this property promises a stay defined by breathtaking views,convenient access to city amenities,and the tranquility of nature.Whether you are sipping your morning coffee or enjoying a glass of wine at sunset,you can bask in the beauty of Edinburgh’s most iconic landmark right from the comfort of your own private stay!

name: Double Room in Leith with private bathroom
description:
Double private room in contemporary newly refurbished apartment in Leith, with 4th floor corner views and all that Edinburgh's best neighbourhood has to offer right on the door step.
Excellent transport connections.
4 minute walk from 'The Shore' tram stop. Ride the tram into the centre of Edinburgh or directly to Edinburgh Airport.
8 minute walk to the famous Leith Shore. Walk along the canal and explore the local restaurants and bars.
All of Leith's attractions within walking distance.

name: The Middle Room in Edinburgh
description:
You'll have a great time at this comfy and peaceful place to stay.

Your room, in our family home, is cosy and comfortable with tea making facilities and access to the shared family bathroom.
Our home is located on the East side of the city with views of Arthur's Seat and the Firth of Forth. Portobello Beach is a 10 minute walk away and there are excellent restaurant, shopping & leisure facilities a short drive/ walk away.
Excellent transport links make it great for work or a city break!

name: Main door flat upto 4 sleep
description: Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.

name: Double Room In Heart Of Old Town
description:
Double room for solo travellers in the heart of Old Town, Edinburgh just off majestic Royal Mile.

Close to all major tourist attractions.

Fully equipped kitchen, shared bathroom, broadband. Free tea, coffee, sugar.

Secure entry gate and CCTV at the entrance for your peace of mind.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central, charming & comfortable.
description:
Located on a green crescent, 10 minute walk from Waverley.
Many shops, restaurants & amenities on your doorstep.
1st floor in a quiet stairwell.

name: The Hayloft
description: Welcome to our newly renovated loft in the heart of Edinburgh! This centrally located space offers modern comfort and convenience, just a stone's throw away from the picturesque Meadows and the esteemed University of Edinburgh. With its sleek design and prime location, our loft is the perfect retreat for exploring the city's vibrant culture, historic landmarks, and charming streets. Whether you're here for business or leisure, our loft provides a stylish and cozy base for your adventures.

name: Bright & central spacious flat
description: Centrally located, newly renovated home over two floors within a converted townhouse. Just off Leith Walk. Spacious, relaxing and comfortable. 2 mins walk from tram line (which goes to and from Edinburgh Airport). 10/15 mins walk to Edinburgh centre or Leith Shore area. Lots of local shops, cafes and restaurants close to property. Family friendly. Games/books/toys/lego etc can be provided for kids upon request.

name: Sensational Stay -Yeaman Place
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Centrally located 2 bedroom flat
description: 2-bedroom flat nestled on Edinburgh's Calton hill. This cozy residence boasts a prime location, offering both tranquility and easy access to the city's vibrant attractions. With spacious living areas and modern amenities, it's the perfect retreat for exploring all that Edinburgh has to offer.

name: The Gait @ Hill Square
description:
***Newly Renovated and Brand New to our Books 2024***

Welcome to The Gait @ Hill square Suites; a sublime apartment, blending a unique historic setting with modern comfort and amenities.

This spacious apartment can host up to a maximum of 8 adults across four generously sized bedrooms, and up to 2 children on roll-out beds (fees apply). The apartment is featuring elegant high ceilings and modern conveniences, while it is just minutes away from museums, attractions, restaurants, and bars.

name: Old Town Flat in Edinburgh
description: Experience the best of Edinburgh from our charming 1-bedroom flat, located in the heart of the historic Old Town. This cozy flat, in a building from the 1830s, offers a unique historic atmosphere. The double bedroom is bright and airy, while the living area provides a comfortable space to relax. Just a 5-minute walk from Waverley Station, you’ll be near Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, and vibrant shops and pubs. Enjoy Wi-Fi, heating, and all the comforts of home in this prime location.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Sensational Stay @ Torwood
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Stunning, spacious 2bedroom flat
description:
Stunning 2 bedroom, ground floor flat located in the in the heart of Leith.

Great location and amenities on your doorstep, with the central tram & bus route a few minutes walk away, making exploring the city easier and more accessible.
There is also fantastic cafes, bars, & shopping facilities with a Tesco & Lidl for all your food shopping needs.

Perfect for families, short breaks, romantic trips away and an ideal location for the Edinburgh Fringe, Christmas and new year.

name: Elegant Georgian apartment
description:
4 bed apartment in Edinburgh’s Georgian “New Town”. Perfect location 10 mins walk from both the Old Town and Stockbridge village. Beautiful original features, modern kitchen & bathrooms, separate utility & 2-desk workspace. Access to large communal garden. Note: this is our home - unsuitable for kids

• Main bedroom - Super King
•Office/ bedroom 2 - high-quality King Size sofa bed and two desks
•Bedroom 3 - King Size bed and baby’s cot
•Bedroom 4 - High quality Queen size sofa bed
•2 bathrooms

name: 2-Bed Fringe Pad in Edinburgh
description: Modern 2-bed top-floor flat in a quiet new-build, ideal for Fringe stays. Spacious, bright, and features a large corner balcony with stunning views of Edinburgh Castle and the Pentlands. Two comfy double bedrooms, fast Wi-Fi, and a fully equipped kitchen. Great transport links to the city centre, festival venues and Edinburgh airport.

name: One bed avaialble 10mins from airport
description:
Very Exclusive 1 bed 2 bathroom appt available 10 mins from Edinburgh Airport with exclusive bathrooms and kitchen use

Bus stop 2 mins walk that will take you straight to city centre ...

PLEASE NOTE MY LATEST CHECK IN IS 6PM THANKS

name: 33 Castle Terrace - Studio
description:
Between a Rock and a Beautiful Place

A timeless sanctuary in the heart of the city

Settle into 33 Castle Terrace, a space of calm and considered elegance. Enjoy all the comforts of home and relax in Scandinavian-inspired interiors, enriched with soft textures and celebrated Scottish artwork.

Just moments from Edinburgh Castle, we are the perfect choice for couples, families and small groups, keen to uncover the city’s wonders.

name: A Luxurious Wee Retreat on the Royal Mile Old Town
description:
Welcome to this charming flat nestled in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town, right on the famous Royal Mile.

- The apartment is within walking distance of top attractions such as Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, and the Scottish Parliament

- Local transport to and from the airport/train station

- Authentic Old Town experience with easy access to local eateries, shops, and entertainment venues

- Impeccably maintained space with attention to detail and cleanliness
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy room near to city centre
description: Enjoy a modish experience at this centrally-located place. Shops and restaurants 5 minutes walk away.

name: Abbey Gate: Studio 10
description: Experience the charm of Edinburgh and the welcoming Abbey Hill area in this newly refurbished, stylish studio apartment - perfect for couples, solo traveler's or close friends to explore Scotland's capital city from. With a cosy double bed, comfortable lounge area, a modern bathroom, and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Trendy Studio w/ common areas: Adults Only
description:
✔ Cosy studio at Haddington Place in a pop-up hotel nicely based near Edinburgh’s New Town
✔ 145-161ft2 | 13.5-15m2

✔ 1 bathroom

✔ Edinburgh Castle is a 26-minute walk
✔ An array of trendy cafes, restaurants, and bars nearby

name: Cosy room w/ shared spaces: Adults Only 18+
description:
✔ Charming room at Haddington Place in a pop-up hotel nicely based near Edinburgh’s New Town

name: Abbey Gate: Studio 1
description:
Experience the charm of Edinburgh and the welcoming Abbey Hill area in this newly refurbished, stylish studio apartment - perfect for couples, solo traveler's or close friends to explore Scotland's capital city from. With a cosy double bed, comfortable lounge area, a modern bathroom, and a fully equipped kitchen.

A few highlights:
* Quiet building not on the main street
* Comfortable Double bed - 135 x 190cms / 4’6 x 6’3
* Ground floor Studio - no steps for access
* Fully equipped kitchen

name: The Big Bothy
description:
A warm welcome to our tranquil haven near the heart of Edinburgh. A peaceful multipurpose double room with traditional features that offers a relaxing escape in the city! The room also has a workstation so its perfect for both holidays and work - with some of our belongings tucked away to help you feel a home away from home!

We have excellent transport links and are only a 25 mins walk to the vibrant city centre and you are less than 10 mins walk from an array of bars, cafes and restaurants.

name: Delightful Dean Village Apartment
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at my fabulous, apartment quietly situated in the picturesque Dean Village and on the edge of Edinburgh’s thriving West End, with its bars, cafés and boutique shops. A 10 minute walk to Haymarket Station, or to Princes Street and George Street, where you’ll find great shops, restaurants and bars. A 5 minute walk and you can be enjoying the grounds, galleries and excellent restaurant at the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art. Also access the Water of Leith walkway.

name: City Oasis
description:
Peaceful and centrally-located apartment with excellent bus & tram transport links to the city centre . Supermarket,Cafes & restaurant within a couple of minutes walk. Nearby park provides pleasant outdoor area.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED ON PROFILE.
ID proof required after booking, before arrival!

name: room with its own bathroom
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base. It is in the old town. Clean and tidy also quiet.  The room facing the back garden. You will have your own shower room. Shared kitchen and the living room only with one person. Other flat has own bathroom as well.  It is on the second floor. Fully furnished in high standard.  Send messages to discuss the terms and ask questions before booking.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Huge Georgian Apartment in the Heart of New Town
description:
This is a unique property in the heart of Edinburgh that holds a traditional and homely feel of a classic Georgian home. Dating back to 1806 (!), the property boasts some fantastic original features, pieces of art, a quirky little four poster bed and comfortably sleeps 5 guests across 3 bedrooms.
Located on Union Street, the apartment is next to some of the best pubs and restaurants Edinburgh has to offer. Broughton Street is just around the corner, as is the all new St. James Quarter shopping c

name: Centrally located apartment
description: One bedroom apartment well located with great transport links including the tram. Great will mean it is including bars, restaurants and café this is a perfect location for anyone visiting Edinburgh.

name: Flat in Stockbridge, Edinburgh
description:
Homely one bedroom flat in Stockbridge, Edinburgh.

Close to the city centre and a short walk away from beautiful Dean Village. Free parking available outside and multiple bus stops 2 minutes from the front door.

The flat is furbished with a brand new, fully-equipped kitchen/living area (including a dishwasher, washing machine and coffee maker to start your day right!). The bedroom has a comfortable double bed with plenty of storage and the bathroom is fitted with a powerful, waterfall shower.

name: Bright Top Floor 3 Bed 2 Bath
description: The spacious entry hall flooded with natural light welcomes you into this modern flat, providing ample space for storage. Each of the three double bedrooms, accessible from the hallway, offers brightness and comfort with ample storage options. A modern tiled bathroom features a walk-in rain shower, perfect for unwinding. The heart of the home lies in the open plan kitchen, dining, and living area—a vibrant space for gatherings. The well-equipped kitchen complements the adjacent dining area and c

name: RainForest Savers Apartment
description: A centrally located apartment in the beautiful city of Edinburgh. Run by "Rainforest Savers ", every stay contributes to tree planting and rain forest reforestation efforts. You can experience comfort while saving the world. Explore the city easily from this traditional sandstone tenement near union canal, city centre, Old Town, and the castle. Enjoy modern amenities including a fully equipped kitchen, high-speed Wi-Fi, and cozy bedrooms. Book now for a peaceful stay with a purpose!

name: Stylish Murrayfield sanctuary
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay on the leafy inner suburb of Murrayfield. Within walking distance of Edinburgh City Centre, the home has 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms.

We also have a private garden to the back where you can enjoy the lovely Scottish weather.

You'll have the whole house which is mostly the ground floor, a living room, open plan kitchen and dining space. There's one bedroom upstairs through internal stairs.

Located right next to Murrayfield stadium.

name: 3 bedroom beach house! Sleeps 6
description: Make some memories at this unique and family-friendly place. 2 minutes walk from beautiful Portobello beach with lovely restaurants and a buzzing atmosphere. Fully equipped 3 bedroom specious house which sleeps 6 people comfortably. Lovely outdoor patio and parking.

name: 4 Bed Family Home with Parking
description:
Our lovely family home is available for guests to enjoy when we're away travelling ourselves.

It's perfect for 2 families travelling together with ample space for privacy and nice communal spaces for relaxing after a day of sightseeing.

name: Abbey Gate: Studio 3
description:
