description: Experience the charm of Edinburgh and the welcoming Abbey Hill area in this newly refurbished, stylish studio apartment - perfect for couples, solo traveler's or close friends to explore Scotland's capital city from. With a cosy double bed, comfortable lounge area, a modern bathroom, and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Central Old Town Mews Home with Parking
description: Located in Edinburgh's Old Town, this is the perfect property for a romantic weekend away or friends looking to explore the city. Nestled directly below Edinburgh Castle, the Grassmarket area is a vibrant mix of history, culture, and local life, making it a must-see for anyone visiting Edinburgh.

name: Beautiful hideaway in Leith.
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful, bright and centrally-located flat nestled in Leith. A beautiful ground floor flat with everything you need to feel right at home. The tram will bring you directly from the train or the plane to the end of the street.

name: Beautiful 2 bed apartment in Edinburgh City Centre
description:
Beautifully presented two bedroom, 1 bathroom, third floor apartment which has been refurbished to an impeccable standard and boasts bright, well-balanced accommodation with immaculate décor throughout.

Situated in one of Edinburghs most stylish neighbourhoods, best-known for its independent boutiques, vintage shops, cafes and restaurants. You will also find yourself a 20 minute walk into Edinburghs City Centre.

The property is located a 25 minute drive from Edinburgh Airport.

name: The Big Room in Edinburgh
description:
Relax in this spacious & serene space!

Your room, in our family home, is cosy and comfortable with a luxurious King Size bed. Tea/Coffee making facilities are in the room & you'll have access to the shared family bathroom.
With views of Arthur's Seat and the Firth of Forth, Portobello Beach a 10 minute walk away, fantastic restaurant, shopping & leisure facilities a short drive/ walk away and excellent transport links, this is perfect for work or a city break!

name: Elegant Georgian Stay | 1st Floor | Central Access
description:
Welcome to your own cosy escape in the heart of Edinburgh. Set within a 200-year-old Georgian stone apartment in Old Town Newington, this first floor apartment blends historic character with bright cosy elegance and curated comfort.

Think tall ceilings, sash windows, and original features, paired with cozy furnishings and thoughtful touches throughout.

You’re just a 15-minute walk from the Royal Mile, and steps from some of Edinburgh’s best coffee spots, wine bars, and restaurants

name: King size bed, ensuite, free parking
description:
- Spacious, peaceful room with king-size bed and ensuite shower room. Free off-street private parking for 2 vehicles. 24 hour access to kitchen and lounge.
- 20 minute bus ride to city centre. 15 minute walk to Murrayfield Stadium. 5 minute walk to Aldi, Sainsbury's, McDonalds, Costa Coffee and The Gym. Numerous cafes nearby.
- First-floor flat in a safe development away from main roads. It is very quiet during the day and silent at night.
* Please send me a message if you have any queries.

name: Large Double En-Suite Bedroom
description:
In the Murrayfield area, a large double bedroom with en-suite, with storage, tea and coffee facilities in the room. Ideal for couples and professionals visiting the city.

On the main road from the Airport into the City Centre of Edinburgh (15 minutes), with free on site private parking. 10 minute walk to Murrayfield stadium and to Edinburgh Zoo. The bedroom is to the back of the property and is very peaceful.

Please note, no breakfast provided or access to the kitchen.

name: Flat in Edinburgh
description: Cosy flat walkable to city centre in Dalry Road.

name: Tower double bedroom in Leith
description: We live in a converted Methodist Church Hall in the heart of Leith. Built in 1932, it has been a labour of love to adapt it to a warm, welcoming and comfortable space to live in. Large and spacious, it has five bedrooms, three bathrooms and two kitchens-and one very friendly border terrier dog.

name: Cozy & Bright Stay | Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our cozy, bright, and spacious flat near Portobello Beach! Perfect for solo travelers or couples, our warm and inviting space features a lovely kitchen, free WiFi, and stunning views. Enjoy easy access to Edinburgh’s city center—just a short bus ride away, with a bus stop only 4-5 minutes from the flat. Free parking makes exploring even easier. Whether you’re strolling along the beach or discovering the city’s charm, this is the perfect place to relax and unwind.

name: Private room in a top floor flat in Morningside
description:
Cosy and spacious double bedroom in a nice and quiet neighbourhood. Conveniently located, not far from the city centre.

Surrounded by a lot of cafes, restaurants and parks. The bus stop is 2 min from the flat.

Paid parking spaces are available nearby.

P.S: The Flat is on the 3rd floor. May not be suitable if you are unable to climb up the stairs or if you have big luggage.

name: Cottage in Portobello
description:
Come and relax at the seaside in the city! This cottage is located a two minute walk from Portobello Beach. Enjoy the hustle and bustle of independent shops, cute cafes and cosy pubs.

There is the opportunity to SUP or kayak if the mood takes you! Two regaular buses will take you to the centre if you so desire.

The cosy home is full of character and please enjoy a drink on the patio warmed by the chiminea.

name: Edinburgh Riverside Retreat
description:
Amazingly central location, a 10 minute walk to the centre of Princes Street yet tucked away in peaceful Dean Village, this riverside apartment is the perfect hideaway for a trip to Edinburgh.

Picnic in the beautiful garden on the banks of the river, walk to the top historic sights and restaurants or stroll down the riverside paths to local villages.

name: Beautiful ‘wee’ flat
description: My much loved and cosy ‘wee’ flat is located within the tranquil area of The Grange, southside of Edinburgh. This location offers a very central location within walking distance of The Meadows and many other popular tourist spots, including the Edinburgh Fringe’s main venues.

name: Luxury 4 Bedroom flat near Edinburgh University
description:
This spacious and beautifully decorated 4 BR flat offers a great base to explore Edinburgh. Located in the Old Town, it is nestled between the Royal Mile and the Meadows, close to Museum of Scotland and other historic landmarks. Lots of eating out and going out places close by.

It is a stone's throw from Edinburgh Uni, with 3 min walk to Bristo Square and George Square. It's a perfect base if you are coming for a conference or a semester of study.

We offer discounts for longer term stays.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The heart of historic Old Town with Castle Views
description:
Welcome to our newly renovated, stylish apartment located in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, right in the vibrant Grassmarket area. With breathtaking views of Edinburgh Castle, this modern and chic apartment offers the perfect blend of historical charm and contemporary comfort.

Nestled in the iconic Grassmarket, you'll be just steps away from Edinburgh's top attractions, restaurants, and shops. Enjoy unparalleled views of Edinburgh Castle from the comfort of your living room.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The heart of Central Old Town with Castle Views
description:
Welcome to our newly renovated, stylish apartment located in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, right in the vibrant Grassmarket area. With breathtaking views of Edinburgh Castle, this modern and chic apartment offers the perfect blend of historical charm and contemporary comfort.

Nestled in the iconic Grassmarket, you'll be just steps away from Edinburgh's top attractions, restaurants, and shops. Enjoy unparalleled views of Edinburgh Castle from the comfort of your living room.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Oasis of calm in Edinburgh
description: Keep it calm at my peaceful flat in Bruntsfield, just to the south of Edinburgh’s historic centre. Lots of great eateries and coffee shops nearby. 20-30 minutes walk to many of the city’s major tourist attractions. This is the perfect spot for a break in this unique and beautiful city.

name: Edinburgh Lauriston 4 bedrooms 7 beds  duplex
description:
Get comfortable and enjoy plenty of extra room at this spacious place. Just a few minutes away from restaurants, bbq,bars,breveries and so much more,this apartment is perfect for weekend getaway, business trip, family friends gather.
Unbeatable location, Edinburgh castle, national musiun,national gallery,princess street and othe attactions are only 10-15 minutes on foot.
This place is in the cebtre of fringe events.

name: 3 bedroom beautiful apartment
description:
3 bedroom (3 double beds) beautiful apartment overlooking the Royal Yacht Britannia.
Two bathrooms (one en-suite), all amenities provided as well as a balcony overlooking the Royal Yacht Brittania. Excellent transport service with all local amenities in walking distance and tram outside the apartment that takes 7 mins to Princes Street.

name: Room next to Murrayfield Stadium
description:
Small double room available for one guest.

There is no use of the kitchen.

You will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. The property is located across from a tram stop and next to Murrayfield Stadium.

The home is also resident to a 5 year old ShihTzu.

name: Beautiful Apartment with Garden
description: This beautiful, spacious 1-bedroom period apartment is ideal for 2 people looking for a relaxing stay in Edinburgh. You will benefit from the private south-facing back garden for sunny days. A wood burner is available for the colder winter months. The apartment is a 2 minute walk from the bustling neighbourhood of Bruntsfield with a variety of restaurants, cafes and independent shops. Edinburgh Old Town is a 30 minute walk or 15 minute bus ride away. Murrayfield Stadium is a 30 minute walk.

name: Apartment in Edinburgh
description: Self contained ground floor annexe of hosts private house, close to Edinburgh city centre in the Duddingston/Portobello district. Guests have own private access, with no shared facilities. Very good transport links to centre of town or down East Coast. Portobello beach with lovely promenade with bars and cafes, 15 minute walk. Arthurs Seat and Holyrood park within easy walking distance.

name: Beautiful Victorian flat
description:
Double room available in a beautiful Victorian tenement.

The flat itself dates from the 1890s, and holds many of the original features - cornicing, wooden flooring, fireplace, and Edinburgh presses. The windows are large and south facing, with partial views of Calton Hill in the distance. It's a 20 minute walk from Waverley Train Station, and is situated just around the corner from bus & tram stops on the vibrant Leith Walk. There are many lovely restaurants, cafes, and bars nearby.

name: Stunning City Centre Apartment
description:
Stunning Apartment In The City Centre With Amazing Views Of Edinburgh Castle.

Based On The GrassMarket You Won't Get A better Location to Explore the Beautiful City Of Edinburgh.

5 Minute Walk To Edinburgh Castle, 5 Minutes to The Royal Mile.

Bars, Restaurants And Shops All On Your Door Step.

Property Has Been Fully Renovated.

King Size Bed

Sofa Bed

Sleeps 4
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: House with parking, near city centre, sleeps 5
description: Highly desirable 2 bedroom semi-detached house  located in the popular Bellevue area of Edinburgh, bordering the celebrated new town and 5 minutes walk to Elm Row. Princes Street and George Street are within easy walking distance. There are a number of leisure options including restaurants, theatres and cinemas. There are various local parks nearby  and the Royal Botanic Gardens and the riverbank walks along the Water of Leith are also within close proximity.

name: Elegant and Peaceful 1 BR Escape near City Centre
description:
Nestled on the lower ground floor in one of Edinburgh’s finest crescents, this lower-ground floor charming apartment offers a perfect blend of comfort and style with easy access to Edinburgh's city centre. The flat has a spacious living room, a well-equipped kitchen, a super king-size bedroom (which can also be made up as a twin room on request), and an ensuite bathroom.
- Short walking distance to local cafes, restaurants, and supermarkets
- Easy reach to Princes Street and Old Town.

name: Entire 2-Storey House with Garden in City Centre
description:
Ideally located on a quiet yet central cobbled lane, this stunning house is your home away from home. It features a spacious living area with a well-equipped open-plan kitchen, a beautiful private garden, a super-king-sized bedroom with ensuite shower room, a king-sized bedroom, Juliet balcony, and a family bathroom.
- Conveniently located in city centre - near local shops and restaurants.
- Near Edinburgh tram stop, Waverley Train Station.
- Close to Edinburgh’s top tourist destination.

name: Delightful 2-BR Retreat in Edinburgh Trinity
description:
Set on the first floor of a traditional building in the desirable Newhaven area, this charming 2-bedroom flat offers a peaceful retreat for travellers seeking a home away from home in Edinburgh. Featuring a delightful blend of modern and elegant fixtures, it boasts a spacious living room with an open-plan kitchen, bathroom, a double bedroom and a single bedroom.

-Set in a charming newhaven road in Trinity.
- Modern furnishings and a fully-equipped kitchen.
- Local restaurants and shops nearby.

name: Flat 4 - Ensuite - Sofa Bed Only, No View
description: Hi! We are lucky to live in beautiful Edinburgh year-round but you can also experience our lively, dynamic city for yourself. And why not do it in style! We are very easy going and look forward to welcoming you to our splendid apartments and the wonderful city of Edinburgh. If you have any questions at all please feel free to email us. We love to tell people about the bars, restaurants and tourists attractions that our famous city has to offer. If you love socialising, art, music, food, al

name: Entire Charming 1BR Edinburgh Apt near city centre
description:
Set on the traditional building in the desirable Stockbridge area, this charming 1-bedroom flat offers a peaceful retreat for travelers seeking a home away from home in Edinburgh. It boasts a living room, a well-equipped kitchen, a bathroom, and a king-size bedroom.

-Set in a charming Stockbridge area
-Classic furnishings and a fully-equipped kitchen.
- Local restaurants and shops nearby.
- 15 - 17 minutes walk to Princes Street

name: Spacious Central Edinburgh Balcony Apartment
description:
Centrally located, modern, family apartment in a leafy & desirable complex in Edinburgh. Short walk to beautiful Stockbridge & within walking distance of the city centre.
Two bedrooms: master(en-suite) & small bedroom suitable for 2 children.
Apartment has a wonderful balcony.
As this is our family home it is fully equipped with all kitchen appliances including dishwasher & coffee machine.
Please only request to stay if you are willing to keep our family home immaculate.
Free unlimited parking!

name: The Eyrie | 2 bedrooms in Leith | Edinburgh
description:
Located on Edinburgh Trams for direct service to EDI and Murrayfield Stadium, major Lothian Buses routes, street car parking available.

Traditional tenement apartment in the centre of Edinburgh. Fully renovated and restored to an exceptional standard, with flexible accommodation across two bedrooms plus optional sofabed.

The Eyrie is in the heart of Leith, yet offers a quiet getaway with high spec amenities. Ideal for Edinburgh Festivals, Rugby, Murrayfield Concerts, Marathon and Hogmanay.

name: Exclusive Main door apartment
description: Abercromby Place is at the Heart of the prestigious historic New Town and is an exceptional A Grade listed apartment which has been used by our large family . There are 3 large bedrooms sleeping 7 as one room has a  double and a single so perfect for children . There is one bathroom with a large bath and shower over and an ensuite with shower room. The property also has a lovely drawing room aspect and an internal dinning area beside the kitchen .

name: En suite room
description: Walking distance or short tram trip to Murrayfield. En suite bathroom with shared kitchen & living space

name: 33 Castle Terrace - One Bedroom
description:
Between a Rock and a Beautiful Place

A timeless sanctuary in the heart of the city

Settle into 33 Castle Terrace, a space of calm and considered elegance. Enjoy all the comforts of home and relax in Scandinavian-inspired interiors, enriched with soft textures and celebrated Scottish artwork.

Just moments from Edinburgh Castle, we are the perfect choice for couples, families and small groups, keen to uncover the city’s wonders.

name: 33 Castle Terrace 1 Bed+Sofa Bed
description:
Between a Rock and a Beautiful Place

A timeless sanctuary in the heart of the city

Settle into 33 Castle Terrace, a space of calm and considered elegance. Enjoy all the comforts of home and relax in Scandinavian-inspired interiors, enriched with soft textures and celebrated Scottish artwork.

Just moments from Edinburgh Castle, we are the perfect choice for couples, families and small groups, keen to uncover the city’s wonders.

name: 33 Castle Terrace Two Bedroom
description:
Between a Rock and a Beautiful Place

A timeless sanctuary in the heart of the city

Settle into 33 Castle Terrace, a space of calm and considered elegance. Enjoy all the comforts of home and relax in Scandinavian-inspired interiors, enriched with soft textures and celebrated Scottish artwork.

Just moments from Edinburgh Castle, we are the perfect choice for couples, families and small groups, keen to uncover the city’s wonders.

name: Unique small space! Bedroom and Bathroom
description:
Self contained unit, bedroom and bathroom only. This space is exclusively for you. Small space ideal for one person or fine for two (smallish!) people.

It’s basic but hopefully perfect for exploring the city

Our selling point is our location! We are right next to Carlton Hill, Holyrood Palace, Arthurs Seat and the Royal Mile

Bedroom and bathroom only, no cooking facilities but plenty of bars and restaurants nearby.

Converted New Town cellar built in 1820 as part of Edinburghs New Town.

name: lovely light, airy double room.
description:
lovely, light and airy double room with access to a terrace, 8 minute walk to murrayfield stadium and 15 minute bus to Princes street.

all the amenities you could ever need and more.

prefect for a weekend getaway.

the flat will be shared with my family but they are pretty house trained!

name: Lovely King-size bed & Central
description:
*CHECK-IN MUST BE DONE BEFORE 10PM- THAT’S A NON-NEGOTIABLE SORRY!

This Historical Scottish home is located just a 15 minutes walk from the East End of Princes street where all buses and trams stop if you are arriving via train or from the airport.

Every tourist attractions is within walking distance - The flat is perfect for couples or solo travellers who are looking for an affordable, central and private place to stay in Edinburgh.

name: Elizabeth’s home
description:
My spacious one bedroom apartment is on the third floor, which offer free TV, free WiFi, workspace and kitchen. It is about 50 square meters, located in the center of Edinburgh. Downstairs there is a breakfast restaurant (Söderberg), coffee (Starbuck) and a supermarket (Sainburry), which makes life very convenient.

This modern apartment is also a 15-minute walk from Edinburgh Waverley Railway station, a 17-minute walk from Edinburgh Castle and a 10-minute walk from the shop-lined Royal Mile.

name: Warmth with Character in Town
description: Large double bedroom with available storage. A private bathroom with Molton Brown shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hand soap & hand cream. Towels are provided as part of your stay. The court yard is available to spend time and relax. There are 2 friendly in door cats living in the main house. We are friendly and helpful hosts who will be available to answer questions and share city highlights. Other than the bedroom, private bathroom and court yard, the rest of the house is kept private.

name: Edinburgh Seaside Oasis
description:
Stylish, modern two bedroom flat in the charming seaside town of Portobello. Set across two floors, the flat has one double bedroom, one second bedroom with a single bed and a bright spacious living room/kitchen.

Portobello boasts a stunning beach and promenade, surrounded by plenty bars and restaurants.

The perfect stay for Fringe goers, providing an idyllic oasis a short trip away from the hustle and bustle of the city centre with excellent transport links.

name: Room in Beautiful Edinburgh with balcony
Cozy & Stylish Room in Edinburgh
description: Discover the charm of my stylish flat in Leith, Edinburgh. Featuring an industrial look with Art Deco touches, original art, and lush plants, it’s a cozy haven. Enjoy a private room and bath, shared living areas, and a balcony with a swing. Located 5 minutes from parks, cafes, and trams to the city center and the airport, and 10 minutes walk from Leith Shore. Perfect for relaxing with modern comforts and vibrant surroundings. Please note this is a a room in a shared flat.

name: City Centre Apartment
description:
Experience elegance and tranquility in our two-bedroom apartment, located on the first floor of a historic B-listed building. Just moments away from Princes Street, this apartment provides the ultimate city-centre convenience.

The sophisticated design breathes new life into this landmark property, ensuring a comfortable and luxurious stay. With hand selected furnishings and artwork, the apartment exudes a serene and welcoming atmosphere, offering every detail you need for a perfect experience.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central Old Town 2-bedroom Apartment
description:
Our 2-bedroom apartment is in the historic heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, in a distinctive B-listed red sandstone building.
Only a 12-minute walk from Edinburgh Waverley Train Station, it's close to major landmarks like Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, Edinburgh University, and Holyrood Palace. You'll find plenty of shops, restaurants, and bars nearby. This is an ideal place for both family vacations and business trips.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Entire city centre flat
description:
Beautiful 1 bedroom ground floor Victorian flat. The property is situated in Hillside, is just off London Road and only a 15 min walk away from Princes Street.
The property is in a perfect location for visiting the city. It is in walking distance to Leith, Calton Hill and The Old Town. LGBT friendly.

name: Great Place, ask for discounts.
description:
This is a truly beautiful room with full access to the kitchen and your own bathroom, in a lovely area (picture postcard canal walk to city centre). Why not have a little bit of luxury at an affordable price in this comfortable, spacious and unique place.

It is located in a nice quite suburb, off the main road so that you can get away and relax in peace and quite if you want too.

The entire flat was refurbished 3 years ago and is in generally good condition.

name: Victorian townhouse
description:
With 4 bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms, and a bright open plan living and dining space, which opens straight onto the walled garden, this is a great space for a family, or a small group of friends. The house has been recently renovated, keeping the features which date back more than a century, but also adding a sense of luxury to the house.

The centre of town is just a 15 minute walk away.

name: Trendy 5-bed Flat Near St Giles
description:
✔ Charming hostel apartment nicely based in Old Town
✔ 5 bedrooms
✔ 1.5 bathrooms
✔ Fully- fitted kitchen
✔ 2-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland
✔ The iconic Royal Mile is a 4-minute walk
✔ The Royal Mile can be reached in a 4-minute walk
✔ 10-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ Walking distance to all the city’s main attractions
✔ 7-minute walk to Edinburgh Waverley train station

description:
✔ Trendy hostel apartment nicely located in Old Town

neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Contemporary Flat in City Centre
description:
Find your city escape to the West End of Edinburgh and submerge yourself in the city's charm, at this stylish flat. Located on a secure and quiet residential street, Grove Street flat offers a spacious living room, two bedrooms with luxury bedding, a well-equipped kitchen with a living area, laundry facilities and bathroom.

Princess St, and a wealth of amenities; shops, supermarkets, cafes and restaurants are all nearby within a short saunter!

name: Entire Elegant 3BR Apt in Edinburgh - Newington
description:
This charming second-floor four-bedroom holiday home offers a bright, spacious interior, brimming with character, and is nestled in a tenement south of Edinburgh city centre. This delightful retreat features four bedrooms and two modern bathrooms, making it an ideal choice for couples, families, or groups of friends. It can sleep a maximum of 6 guests.

- Well-equipped kitchen.
- Good bus link to city centre, Old Town, and Waverley Train Station.
- Free on-street parking in the neighbourhood.

name: My Perfect Base
description: 'My Perfect Base' is  an 18th century one bedroom flat nestled within the heart of Edinburgh's UNESCO world heritage by Edinburgh Castle. The ideal location to explore the lively vibrant area with charming shops, restaurants, bars and stunning views of  Edinburgh Castle. Looking for an authentic old town Edinburgh stay experience? This is the place for you, with all major tourist attractions within walking distance, guests can make the most of their time in Scotlands enchanting capital.

name: Sensational Stay @Prestonfield
description:
✪BOOK TODAY with ★ Sensational Stay Serviced Accommodation ★
✪ We welcome Families, Friends, Groups & Business Travelers & Contractors at Edinburgh
✪ 2 Bedroom Apartment
✪ Sleeps Up to 6 Guests
✪ Bedroom 1 - 1 Double Sized Bed
✪ Bedroom 2 - 1 King Sized Bed
✪ Loung- 2 Single beds
✪ Free WiFi
✪ Free Netflix
✪ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✪ Amazing Discounts on Long Bookings (28+ Nights)
✪ If you have any questions please message us

name: Central 1bed apt in Leith
description:
Situated just a short stroll from the vibrant and buzzing Leith Walk, yet, our apartment provides a cozy and homely retreat for all guests.

Accommodating up to two people, our stylish and elegant flat is the ideal choice for travelers, professionals, and couples seeking a comfortable base to explore Edinburgh.

name: Modern 2 Bed Flat Near City Centre + Free Parking
description:
A warm welcome to our bright and cosy apartment situated in north Edinburgh, a short distance to the city centre! You will have the apartment to yourself with two newly furnished double rooms accommodating up to 4 guests.
The quiet neighbourhood has free on-street parking and the area boasts many local shops and bus stops just a short walk away. Only a 10-minute bus ride to the city centre with close proximity to cafes, bars, restaurants and the popular Shore area and Water of Leith walkway.

name: Room in Morningside, Edinburgh
description: Centrally located in the area of Morningside of Edinburgh which is a beautiful part of the city.  20 minute bus journey to the city centre.

name: Charming Edinburgh House
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. After a day sightseeing, come home and unwind in the garden.
This cosy, warm and charming 2 bedroom semi detached has everything you need to enjoy your Edinburgh getaway.
Whether it’s a short stay or a little longer. This gem of a house is a perfect base for your journey.

name: Hilltop House
description:
Bring the whole family to west Edinburgh for a city break next to nature!
Hilltop House is a spacious villa located in a very peaceful residential suburb of Edinburgh. Easy access to city centre, Edinburgh Zoo, Murrayfield Stadium and local shops & conveniences.
Requires minimum 3 night stay - prioritising 7-night stays

name: 4 bed in picture perfect spot
description: 4 bed, 5 mins from the airport with great city links!

name: Single bedroom EH16 area
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space. Cute room available for rent in area of Liberton
Single bedroom to let
Would suit clean
quiet living person non smoking
Parking included if needed (included in price)
On bus route to town (10 minutes to city Centre)
Washing machine facilities available
Wifi included

name: Cosy apartment in city centre
description:
Absolutely delighted to welcome guests in our property. We are thrilled to make a long-lasting memory of your experience in our beloved Edinburgh.

The Red Door Apartment is a spacious, light-filled and elegant property, equipped with all the amenities you would need to make the best of your stay – an idyllic setting for families or friends!

To create an authentic feel and comfortable place for every guest, we have tastefully decorated the space to reflect a polished, classic, and stylish vibe.

name: Double room
description: Hello, my name is Kasia and I live with my spoiled and always hungry dog. If you don’t mind having dog at home and you are able to make sure there is no food within Lilly reach, you are welcome to stay with us 🙂

name: River Haven Deluxe room with bathroom
description: Enjoy easy access to popular shops and restaurants from this charming place to stay.

name: Ensuite king bedroom near Leith
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene ensuite room.

I hope to make your stay in Edinburgh as pleasant and comfortable as possible.

This non-smoking room features a king-sized bed and an ensuite shower room. The room is on the first floor, and is accessible only by a flight of stairs. Please note this booking does not include kitchen access.

There are low hanging lights in the room so please mind your head.

The room is furnished with luxury bedding and towels for your comfort.

name: Lovely cosy room in city center
description: Welcome to our centrally located Airbnb, perfect for exploring the city! Enjoy the convenience of free parking and easy access to public transport, with a tram stop nearby offering a direct route from the airport and buses reaching every corner of the city. You'll be within walking distance of iconic attractions like Calton Hill and the Royal Mile. This cozy room provides all the comforts you need for a memorable stay in the heart of the city. Ideal for both business travelers and tourists.

name: Cosy room in the heart of Edin
description: Welcome to our centrally located Airbnb, perfect for exploring the city! Enjoy the convenience of free parking and easy access to public transport, with a tram stop nearby offering a direct route from the airport and buses reaching every corner of the city. You'll be within walking distance of iconic attractions like Calton Hill and the Royal Mile. This cozy room provides all the comforts you need for a memorable stay in the heart of the city. Ideal for both business travelers and tourists.

name: Peaceful New Town Garden Flat
description:
We have recently refurbished our home and now welcome you to come and stay in it.

It has 4 bedrooms, all with en-suites, so and a separate WC so no queuing for bathrooms! please note that the bedroom with a double bed is an internal room and so has no windows. The open plan living area has room to socialise and the kitchen is fully stocked with the basics so you can cook up a storm.

name: 4 Bedroom, 8 bed, 3 bathrooms: Sleeps 10
description: Spacious (143sqm) Classic Georgian apartment within a conservation area. 1 triple, 1 double, 1 triple en-suite, 1 twin en-suite: 3 shower rooms in total. Perfect for the Festival and Fringe, The Old Town, Royal Mile, Princess Street and Historic Edinburgh. Short walk to The Meadows, Holyrood Park and Arthur's seat. Sainsbury's Local 70m, cafes and restaurants just round the corner. Fully fitted modern kitchen with utility. Spacious elegant dining hall and comfortable lounge with bay window.

name: New Town - Bright Apartment
description: Bright and peaceful, muse street apartment located in the heart of Edinburgh.

name: Flat in Edinburgh
description: Surround yourself with style in this standout space.

name: Two bedroom flat in Leith
description:
Two bedroom flat for rent in Leith. One bedroom comes with a standard double bed and the other bedroom with a small double bed. The flat is only about 30 minutes walk from Waverley Station. Easy to reach from the airport too as the tram stop is only 10 minutes walk away. There is a lift in the building and a car park at the rear of the building.
Please don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions :)

name: Spacious double room
description:
Spacious double room in a quiet shared flat in the vibrant neighbourhood of Leith. Located near Leith Links and only a 4 minute walk to the tram offering direct links to Princes Street, Edinburgh Airport and The Shore.
Kitchen amenities include washer/dryer, fridge and freezer, hob, oven, air fryer and toaster.
You will be sharing the flat with one permanent tenant and will have your own private bathroom and living room access.
Maximum occupancy is 2 adults.

name: Quiet 1 bed close Haymarket
description: Our little apartment is perfect for those who are looking for a quiet place to stay whilst in Edinburgh. The city centre is around 30 minutes walk, Haymarket train station is about 10 minutes walk away.

name: Brand new Trinity flats
description: Enjoy the beautiful Trinity area of Edinburgh from our brand new flat with spacious lounge kitchen and covered balcony for the Scottish summer.

name: Flat 1 Trinity
description: Trinity Flats in Edinburgh blends luxury and heritage, featuring three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a modern kitchen with high-end appliances, and a spacious living room with mid-century furnishings. The master suite includes a luxurious bed and an ensuite. Each unit also offers a private balcony with garden views. Enjoy amenities like high-speed internet, cable TV, and in-unit laundry. Ideal for those seeking style and convenience in a historic setting.

name: Flat 2 Trinity - by The House of Danu
description: Trinity Flats in Edinburgh blends luxury and heritage, featuring three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a modern kitchen with high-end appliances, and a spacious living room with mid-century furnishings. The master suite includes a luxurious bed and an ensuite. Each unit also offers a private balcony with garden views. Enjoy amenities like high-speed internet, cable TV, and in-unit laundry. Ideal for those seeking style and convenience in a historic setting.

name: Stockbridge Gem
description: This peaceful and centrally-located gem is the perfect place to stay during your trip to Edinburgh.

name: Room 20 seconds to the beach
description:
Room for rent (living room) includes comfortable futon sofa bed (which folds out to a bed). Bedding and towel provided : 500m from the glorious Portobello beach, local and friendly pub on doorstep, walking distance to a range of shops, restaurants and cafes in Portobello. The place is spacious and has an excellent study area ideal for young professionals working elsewhere.

26 bus goes direct to the property from Edinburgh Waverly station.

name: Idyllic Cottage with Garden and Patio
description:
✔ Cosy newly refurbished cottage nicely nestled near Buckstone
✔ 969ft2 | 90m2
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom

Safe, quiet area right beside parkland.

description: Main door, spacious flat, wooden floorboards and high ceilings throughout. Great location in the heart of Leith, good public transport into town. Free parking also. I have a well behaved Border Terrier mix who also lives with me.

description: Enjoy a nice time at my cosy apartment perfectly situated in the heart of Tollcross and on the edge of Edinburgh’s famous Grassmarket, with its bars, cafés and Harry Potter shops. A 15 minute walk to Haymarket Station, or to Princes Street and George Street, where you’ll find great shops, restaurants and bars. A 5 minute walk and you can be walking through the historic Old Town, with easy access to the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle.

description:
Big, bright apartment in the heart of lively Leith. Sunny balcony with views to Calton Hill.

A stones throw from The Shore, nestled along the final section of the Water of Leith, offering a unique blend of old-world charm and modern amenities.

Excellent transport links with nearest tram stop 5 mins walk away. Free secure parking available for 1 car.

Ideally located for Royal Yacht Britannia, Port of Leith Distillery, Old Dr Bells Baths, The Biscuit Factory, The Kitchin, & Martin Wisharts

name: Unique 1 BDR in Edinburgh Historic New Town

description: Beautiful, recently renovated Victorian flat in the heart of Stockbridge—one of Edinburgh’s most desirable neighbourhoods. Features a stunning kitchen, spacious living room, two bedrooms, and a double sofa bed (sleeps six). Surrounded by great shops, restaurants, bars, and cafes. Short bus ride to the Old Town and city centre. Short walks to Inverleith Park, Botanic Gardens, and Dean Village. 10-min drive/25-min walk to Waverley & Haymarket train station. 20 mins to Edinburgh airport.

name: A Wee Retreat Royal Mile, Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to this wee retreat nestled in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town, right on the famous Royal Mile.

Accommodation:

This well-appointed flat provides a beautiful haven amidst the hustle and bustle of the city.
The space offers comfort and style, with modern amenities and traditional touches that reflect the character of the Old Town. Relax in the inviting living area, cook up a storm in the fully equipped kitchen and unwind in the cozy bedroom after a day of exploring the city.

This family friendly house is on the doorstep of Stockbridge with independent cafes, bars and shops.

Walking distance to Inverlieth park, Royal Botanic Gardens, Scottish National Gallery and Dean Village and easy access to Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle and the water of Leith walkway which connects much of the city.

The location is a great base to explore the city and all that the Edinburgh Fringe has to offer.

The airport is approximately 25min away.

Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay! This family-friendly ground-floor apartment sleeps 6 people in 3 bedrooms. Direct tram from Edinburgh Airport. Easy access to public transport. No designated car parking space. Self contained with own private entrance, no stair. No access to garden.

Holyrood Park is 800m away & 10 minute walk. The nearest bus stop is 4 minutes via London Rd, taking you into Princes St <10 minutes. The bottom of the Royal Mile takes less than 20 minutes on foot. A modern cosy place, it's an ideal & central location for accessing both the centre & further afield. One underground parking spot.

There’s a double bed, an open-plan kitchen and living area with a sofa and a futon sofa bed for, plus a desk and workspace. The modern shower room has a walk-in shower, and you’ll also have access to a small but sunny garden with seating.

Direct bus routes to the city centre are right outside. High-speed Wi-Fi, washing machine, and central heating all included.

Close to the Castle and the historic bustling Grassmarket and Cowgate, where most Fringe shows take place in August, our flat also has direct bus links to these areas and other city centre spots.

A 5 minute drive (15 minute walk) to Haymarket from where you can access the national rail network and tram which can take you west to the airport or east to the city centre and Leith.
15 minutes walk to Murrayfield Stadium.

Excellent and quick transport nearby. 2 mins walk to the bus stop which takes 40 mins to city centre (bus 33). 10 mins walk to another bus stop which takes you to the airport in 24 mins (bus 18). Free parking on the premise.

Dean Village is a cherished beauty spot within the heart of Edinburgh. The village’s connection to the Water of Leith Walkway, its fascinating history, and its picturesque architecture make it one of the more popular places to visit in the city.

name: 3 Bedroom tranquil ground floor flat in Merchiston
description: A spacious 3 bedroom, ground floor flat. The property is located in the prestigious Merchiston area of Edinburgh. Set within mature gardens, the flat is located within walking distance of the many amenities, bars, restaurants & open park spaces of the Bruntsfield and Morningside area. On a direct bus routes in and out of the city centre, this flat is the perfect place to base yourself to explore central Edinburgh and the surrounding area.

name: L,s
description: We’re located in the heart of Edinburgh, just a 20-minute walk or 5–10 minute bus ride from Princes Street — a perfect starting point to explore the city. From there, hop on a tour bus at the station or walk to iconic sights like Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, Old Town, and Holyrood Palace. Closer to Stockbridge, enjoy the Royal Botanic Garden, Dean Village, and Water of Leith. The area also offers great cafés, restaurants, and traditional pubs for everyone to enjoy.

name: Modern, cosy 2B in Central Edin
description: Newly converted 2 bedroom house, with shared garden, on the outskirts of Central Edinburgh is available for rental. Can accommodate up to five and has excellent transport links.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Double bedroom in newly renovated flat
description:
Enjoy the best of Edinburgh from newly renovated flat in Comely Bank. Top-range kitchen, well-decorated living space, and a peaceful vibe. You'll share the flat with me - happy to chat or leave you to enjoy your peace and quiet.

Walking distances:
2 minutes to Waitrose
10 minutes to Inverleith Park and Stockbridge
20 minutes to the New Town
30 minutes to Princess Street
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: 2Bedroom Apartment-Free Parking-2Bath
description:
Our modern, ground-floor apartment is located in a quiet residential area in Haymarket, putting you at the heart of the action while still offering a peaceful retreat.
The apartment was fully refurbished to a high standard in 2020 and features quality, contemporary furnishings.
You will be just a short walk from the historic West End, and you can stroll to Edinburgh Castle in just 20 minutes. The surrounding area is packed with shops, cafes, and restaurants, all within walking distance.

name: 1 Bedroom on quiet location, close to city centre
description:
Peaceful and centrally-located place on Leith walk.
Easy acces from the airport by tram.

name: Gorgie 2 Bedroom Apartment - Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our cosy 2-bedroom apartment in the heart of Gorgie Road, Edinburgh. Perfect for up to 4 guests, this ground-floor gem offers easy access and all the comforts of home. Each bedroom is furnished with a comfortable double bed, ensuring a restful night's sleep for all guests.

The apartment features a functional kitchen equipped with all the essentials needed to prepare a delicious meal.

name: Spacious flat with double room in Edinburgh
description:
My newly renovated flat is a one bed traditional tenement in an amazing location.

Lots of bars, cafés and restaurants nearby, as well as a supermarket.

Bus stop across the road & will take you to Princes Street in 12 mins.

But you can walk to:

Holyrood Park in 10 min
Royal Mile in 17 min
Calton Hill in 20 min
Princes St/Waverley train station in 25 mins

name: Traditional flat Scottish Kings Park
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Modern immaculate 1 bedroom flat in traditional tenement

Prime location

Bright, spacious flat 2nd floor
1 double bedroom king size bed
1 living room
Full central heating
Private bathroom with power shower & bath
Fully fitted modern kitchen
Ample storage

Superfast Broadband/ WiFi
50 inch HD TV/DVD/X box console

5 mins walking distance to Retail Park, Sports Centre & Holyrood Park
10-15 mins walk Royal Mile & Edinburgh Castle

name: 1 Bed in Winchburgh (95472)
description: A luxurious shepherds’ hut tucked away in a private orchard on a 60-acre equestrian estate. Perfect for romantic escapes, this boutique hideaway offers a peaceful rural retreat with exclusive features including a wood-fired hot tub and a sauna to unwind in style. Guests can enjoy meeting the delightful on-site Shetland ponies. The property sleeps two and is ideal for those looking for a relaxing break in an idyllic countryside setting.

name: Quiet Room in a Peaceful Flat
description:
Quiet and peaceful flat where you can rest.

This is a good sized double bedroom with 1 single bed.
It is bright and warm in a second floor flat with security door entrance.

The center can be reached by bus, car or taxi in 15 to 30 minutes. There is night bus number 30 running through the night to get you back to the flat.

Good local facilities including library, hairdresser, cinema, shops and the shopping centre Wester Hailes 10 minutes walking distance.

name: Spacious 1 bedroom flat
description:
Bright lower basement, main door flat in Stockbridge consisting of a bedroom with super king bed and fitted wardrobes and a fully tiled en-suite bathroom. To the front there is a spacious living room with dining table, sofa and tv and a modern kitchen with integrated appliances. The property benefits from an additional fully tiled cloak room toilet

0.5 miles from City Centre, ideally located for Edinburgh Fringe Festival.

name: Charming Pet Friendly Haven by Arthur's Seat
description: Nestled at the foot of Arthur’s Seat, this charming flat offers a peaceful escape with city adventures close by. Wake up to a soft light on hardwood floors, sip tea by the wood burner, and unwind in a cosy king bed or on the comfy double sofa bed. Whether you're wandering historic streets or staying in by the fire, this accommodation is your Edinburgh story—quiet, warm, and wonderfully placed. This accommodation can accommodate up to 4 adults. Dogs welcome.

name: Central one bedroom flat - cosy & leafy
description:
Cosy small flat in the heart of Leith. Close to the bustling street life of Leith walk and a 25 Minute walk to Holyrood, Arthur's seat, Princess Street and Calton Hill.

The apartment lies on the second floor of a quiet, residential apartment building on a cobbled street opposite the local park.

Local cafes, pubs, restaurants and large supermarkets are all within walking distance. The tram from the airport is a five minutes walk and takes 45 minutes door to door.

Netflix, Prime and WiFi.

name: Fabulous 1-bed getaway in Edinburgh's New Town
description: Nestled on the charming Scotland Street, our cosy 1-bedroom flat offers a unique blend of comfort, convenience, and character. Built circa 1830’s, a charming apartment, with UNESCO World Heritage Site status. Whether you're here for a romantic retreat, a solo adventure, or a business trip, you'll find everything you need for a memorable stay.

name: Superior King Room with Private Bathroom
description:
Our Superior King Room is the largest room, offering a completely individual look and feel. The room features a comfortable super-king size bed, a writing desk, a kettle, a wardrobe, a chest of drawers, a TV, and a hairdryer. Fresh bed linen is provided, along with a set of towels, including a hand towel, a bath sheet, and a face cloth. The private bathroom includes free toiletries.

Please note: the room is located on the first floor, accessible by stairs only, and it faces the main road.

name: King Room with Private Bathroom
description:
Our King Room is more spacious than our Double Room, offering extra comfort and a king-sized bed. Uniquely designed, the room features a writing desk, a kettle, a clothes rack, a chest of drawers, a TV, and a hairdryer. Fresh bed linen is provided, along with a set of towels, including a hand towel, a bath sheet, and a face cloth. The private bathroom includes free toiletries.

Please note, this room is located on the first floor and is accessible by stairs only, and it faces the main road.

name: Queen Room with Shared Bathroom
description:
Our individually designed Queen Room features a king-sized bed, a writing desk, a kettle, a clothes rack, a chest of drawers, a small dining area, a TV, and a hairdryer. Fresh bed linen is provided, along with a set of towels, including a hand towel, a bath sheet, and a face cloth. The shared bathroom is only shared with one other room and includes complimentary toiletries.

Please note: the room is located on the second floor, accessible by stairs only, and it faces the main road.

name: Single Room with Private External Bathroom
description:
Facing the quiet rear of the building, our Single Room with Private External Bathroom features a single bed, a writing desk, a kettle, a clothes rack, a chest of drawers, a TV, and a hairdryer. Fresh bed linen is provided, along with a set of towels. The private external bathroom, located just outside the room, is for your exclusive use and includes free toiletries.

Please note: the room is located on the second floor, accessible by stairs only.

name: Portobello - Beach Apartment
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. Access to Edinburgh's finest beach within a minutes walk.  Portobello has a multitude of fantastic restaurants, cafes and bars as well as a thriving Promenade at the beach. Only a short bus ride into the centre of Edinburgh.

name: City Centre Apartment with 2 Private Car Spaces
description: Discover modern urban living at its finest in this stylish 2-bedroom residence located in the heart of Edinburgh. Situated less than 2 miles from the city centre, this home boasts modern design elements and impeccable craftsmanship throughout. Enjoy spacious interiors featuring sleek finishes, a well-appointed kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, and a cosy living area perfect for relaxation or entertaining guests.

name: Ocean view flat with cozy vibes
description:
Welcome to our lovely waterfront flat with two spacious bedrooms. The master features an en-suite, and the open-plan living area offers stunning views of the ocean and Leith docks. Just a 2-minute walk to the bus stop and 10 minutes to the tram, with easy access to the city centre and airport. Enjoy nearby waterfront restaurants, a local park, and breathtaking sunsets.

Please note: this is our personal home, and we only rent it while we’re away.

name: Fabulous Art Plants Deco Home
description:
Experience the vibrant city of Edinburgh while enjoying the tranquility of city in our art decorated home. This spacious house offers a serene double-bedroom with a large window that frames a beautiful garden view. The modern bathroom features a luxurious hot bath and locally made candles, perfect for a relaxing evening.

Having lived in Edinburgh for over seven years, we have a wealth of knowledge about the city and are happy to share tips and recommendations to enhance your stay.

name: Beautiful Central Edinburgh apartment
description: Our beautiful airy first floor apartment is perfect for groups of friends or families to stay. It’s very central with coffee shops and restaurants on the same road, 5 minutes walk to the meadows park, and 10 minutes walk to the centre of town.  A great base for enjoying the city - this spacious flat is a little sanctuary to enjoy after a day in the city.

name: * The Best View in Leith! *
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for your trip to Leith / Edinburgh. Spacious and with all the facilities and amenities you require for a comfortable, homely place to stay.

name: Central Location 2 bed Apartment
description:
This flat near Abbeyhill features two bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and an outdoor balcony space. The kitchen/living space is spacious with a large sofa, table and smart tv. The apartment is conveniently located near bus stops, it's a short walk to various attractions like the Scottish Parliament Building, Royal Mile, and Waverley Station.

The apartment has plenty of off street, free parking.

name: New Decor Apartment close to Edinburgh City Center
description:
Relax with your family at this peaceful place to stay.

The flat has two bedrooms, a living room and an open kitchen. It is located in EH16 Liberton Area of Edinburgh.

We have a private car park if you like to “park and ride” especially during the festival time. However it is very close to the city center while enjoying this peaceful and cosy accommodation. 15 mins drive to Royal mile, princes street or Holyrood. If you prefer public transport, the bus stop is just at your doorsteps.

name: En-suite room in Morningside (Licence: EH-79822-F)
description:
Come stay with us (and our 2 cats) in a lovely ensuite bedroom, in the lower level of our three-storey home, a listed building dating from 1881 in the prosperous Morningside area of Edinburgh. Ideal for solo travellers or couples.

This is a traditional AirBnB, where you share our home. You will have the opportunity to benefit from our local knowledge. We won’t be offended if you prefer to keep yourself to yourself, of course.

Licence: EH-79822-F

name: Bright 2BR City Centre Apartment
description: This compact 2 BR apartment is conveniently located near Princes Street, right in the heart of the city. Within walking distance are a wide variety of shops, museums & dining, as well as Old Town and Edinburgh Castle.

name: 2 Bed Holiday home in Edinburgh
description:
Get comfortable & enjoy plenty of extra room at this spacious place. Main door apartment with private entrance and garden. The apartment is equipped with everything to make your stay comfortable, along with free street parking around the area.
Perfectly located as only 15 minutes away from Haymarket station & many bus routes with bus stop right outside. City center and Edinburgh Castle only 15 minutes away in car. Sainsbury and buzzing Gorgie at the doorstep just 2 minutes walking distance!

name: A double bedroom in Edinburgh
description: A double bedroom in a 3 bedroom house. Shared bathroom with one person, a friendly Greek! Guests are welcome to use the livingroom and kitchen.

name: Cosmic Room
description: Budget room in a three bedroom property shared with other AirBnB guests. Unsavoury but safe location. Not living room. Residential parking. Self check-in after 3pm. Flat is located close to the buses. 20 min Princess Street 40 min airport

name: Ord’s Loft - Old Town Historic Apartment
description: Ord’s Loft, situated in White Horse Close, is one of the most desirable and unique properties in Edinburgh’s old town. Positioned on the top floor of what was once the White Horse Coaching Inn, built by Laurence Ord in 1624, the loft is entered by the iconic steps seen in so many photos of Edinburgh. The outlook south over the courtyard is Holyrood Palace, Arthurs Seat, the Scottish Parliament and the Old Town while to the rear it looks up to Regent Road and Calton Hill.

name: Flat off the Walk
description: A comfortable, quiet flat in a residential area, just off Leith Walk.

name: Charming & cozy room @Edinburgh
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.


Take a stroll along the Union Canal. The picturesque waterway offers a peaceful retreat for the perfect morning jog or evening walk.


⚠ Top floor with no elevator.


NEAREST TRAIN STATIONS:

Slateford Station
0.8 miles

Haymarket Station
0.9 miles

Kingsknowe Station
1.8 miles

name: Green Room
description: Budget room in a three bedroom property shared with other AirBnB guests. Not the best  neighbourhood as pretty deteriorated but what guests state in reviews that flat itself inside is up to a high standard and compensats for its surroundings. No living room. Full access to a kitchen with all of the utensils and coffee, tea, spices, etc included. Free residential parking outside of ULEZ zobe. Self check-in after 3pm. Flat is located 2 mins walk to the buses. 20 min Princess Street 40 min airport

name: The Neuk
description: No view, no problem! Our cosy Edinburgh pad gives you space, privacy, and a perfect launchpad for adventure. Private entrance, parking, a big living room to flop into, a snug bedroom to snooze in, and a bathroom all to yourself. Buses on the doorstep, city centre a stroll away, and brilliant pubs and eats just around the corner. Your Edinburgh escape starts here!

name: Stunning two bedroom apartment in central location
description: Welcome to our stylish 2-bedroom apartment in the heart of Leith! Just a 10-minute journey from Edinburgh's bustling city centre, this modern space offers both comfort and convenience. A short 4-minute walk takes you to the nearest tram stop, and the bus stop is only a minute away, making it easy to explore the city's top attractions. Surrounded by trendy cafes, shops, and vibrant local culture, our apartment is the perfect base for your Edinburgh adventure.

name: Modern studio apartment, access to Holyrood & City
description: Welcome to your perfect urban basecamp! This brand new, stylish basement studio flat offers everything you need for a comfortable and convenient stay in the beautiful city of Edinburgh. Nestled in a quiet residential area on the edge of Holyrood Park, the flat is in the perfect location to easily access all the city highlights. Free on-street parking, supermarket within walking distance, just 15 mins on the bus to the city centre and direct bus to Murrayfield Stadium.

name: Ferry Road Apartment
description: Budget three bedroom flat. Unsavoury but safe location. Not living room. Residential parking. Self check-in after 3pm. Flat is located close to the buses. 20 min Princess Street 40 min airport

name: Tropical Room | En-suite + Breakfast Included
description: Welcome to my stunning flat while exploring the beautiful capital!

name: Spacious 2 Bedroom Apt in the heart of New Town
description: Welcome to our stunning apartment on Hanover Street in the heart of Edinburgh! This beautiful property offers comfortable accommodation for up to five guests, making it the perfect choice for families, friends, or business travellers.

name: amazing apartments - Pleasance in the City Centre
description:
This stunning modern 2 level apartment is close to the Royal Mile, making it easy to plan your visit. 1 bedroom, large bathroom with shower. Open plan living/dining area, kitchen, & WC.

Free WiFi, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video on a 4K TV. Ideal for 1-2 people.

- Arrive from 3 pm, depart up to 10 am
- We try to satisfy early check-in/late checkout requests (fees apply), & baggage drop-off (free), however, no guarantees, especially if other guests arrive/leave same day
amazingapartments co uk

name: Two rooms 3 double beds parking
description:
two bedrooms with 3 double beds. Free parking in private drive away.
First bedroom with big ensuite, 2 double beds ( one of them is king size).
Second bedroom with a double bed, shared bathroom ( usually still only used by you).
Kitchen is downstairs and shared by my family ( me , female, 50s).

Kitchen dinning area with sofas.

Back garden front garden are all private

Washing machine, no dryer. We dry clothes in the back garden .

Bedding linens included

name: Modern clean full house near beach with parking
description: Forget your worries in this spacious family home with three double bedrooms, one downstairs, two shower rooms, one upstairs and one downstairs, large patio area with enclosed garden space, modern open plan kitchen, dining, snug area, fully equipped kitchen with gas hob and electric oven, only 20-30 minutes by bus to city centre, buses are frequent and run until 23:00 from city centre, 15 mins walk to portobello beach, 24hr supermarket, shopping complex Fort Kinnaird, near A1 and Musselburgh

name: Bright and Stylish Room in Central Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to my charming flat, just steps away from Bruntsfield’s vibrant cafes, shops, and city’s historic attractions. The doubl bedroom is spacious and filled with natural light, featuring a dedicated work desk with views over the city and Pentland Hills, and a relaxing, décor.

You’ll have access to a modern, fully equipped kitchen where you can enjoy your morning coffee, and a beautifully renovated bathroom with fresh towels and toiletries.

name: Room in City Centre Georgian House.
description: Beautiful, spacious, period house, set within a lively, fashionable area of Edinburgh. The house is a stone's throw from the Usher Hall, theatres, cinemas and a variety of artisan cafes, restaurants, traditional pubs and bars. Walking distance of 15 mins to the Castle and the Old Town and Princess Street and the New Town. Excellent bus/tram services serving all parts of Edinburgh are close by, as is the beautiful Union Canal and Meadows Park for leisurely walks / cycling.

name: Heart of City: Cosy King Room
description: Stay in the heart of the city, just minutes from everything! Our beautiful, peaceful room offers stunning views and modern appliances. Enjoy quiet comfort with excellent WiFi, perfect for work travel or festival exploration. Most attractions are within walking distance, making it easy to immerse yourself in the vibrant local scene. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, our central location ensures a memorable and convenient stay. Book now and experience the best the city has to offer!

name: Contemporary Apartment in Edinburgh New Town
description:
Stay in the heart of the historic New Town in this super-central one-bedroom ground floor apartment, ideal for exploring Edinburgh on foot.

Located in a traditional Georgian building dating to 1821, our contemporary apartment features a stylish open plan living/dining area filled with natural light, adjoining a fully-equipped kitchen area. To the rear is a well-appointed bathroom with toilet, sink and shower facilities and a calm, cosy bedroom with kingsize bed to relax and recharge.

name: Shandwick Place
description:
Accommodation comprises; a large master bedroom with ensuite shower room, two further double bedrooms, a sofa bed, a bathroom with a bath, shower and WC.
There is also a large and modern open plan kitchen/living room with a breakfast bar, induction hob, oven and comfortable sofas.
Located on Shandwick Place, you are a stone's throw from Princes Street, there are a range of public transport options and numerous pubs, bars, restaurants and local food shops all on the doorstep

name: Central Mezzanine Apartment in Historic School
description: A modern mezzanine flat in a beautiful old school house. The building has been converted into stunning apartments with everything you will need for a great stay. My home is truly a unique and historic place to stay in Edinburgh.

name: 2 Bed Old Town Crash Pad
description:
Basic Accomodation in the heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town.

Large bathroom with Shower.

1min walk to The National Museum of Scotland

3min walk to Festival Theatre

5min walk to Edinburgh Waverley Station

No parking, but car parks are near by, 4 minute walk.

All bedding and one towel per person included alongside one key.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh glamping
description: Welcome to glamping Edinburgh a luxury glamping pod with a hot tub packed with all ur an amenities central to Edinburgh city centre .The local transport is a 10 minute walk to bus,tram and train stations which will take you to Edinburgh city centre with in 10minutes .The pods are located at the west side of Edinburgh surrounded by fields to give u the countryside feel with the peace and quiet but city centre only a couple of miles eh129bx 10 minutes from airport and Murrayfield stadium

name: Edinburgh glamping pod 2
description: Welcome to glamping Edinburgh a  luxury glamping pod  packed with all ur an amenities central to Edinburgh city centre .The local transport is a 10 minute walk to bus,tram and train stations which will take you to Edinburgh city centre with in 10 minutes .The pods are the west side of Edinburgh surrounded by fields to give u the countryside feel with the peace and quiet but city centre only a couple of miles away with lovely private hot tubs 10 mins from airport and murrayfield staduim

name: Beautiful City Centre Apartment
description:
Experience the best of Edinburgh from this beautifully renovated apartment, perfectly situated in the heart of the city.
Located on the iconic Grassmarket, you won’t find a better spot to explore everything Edinburgh has to offer.

🛏 Sleeps 4
• Comfortable King Size Bed
• Stylish Sofa Bed

🏰 Unbeatable Location
• Just a 5-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle

✨ Recently renovated to a high standard, the apartment offers modern comfort while showcasing stunning views of Edinburgh Castle.

name: Main door, 3 bedroom apartment
description: Recently renovated 3 bed flat,  master bedroom ensuite, and wet room main bathroom.  2 double beds, 1 single bed.  comes with separate laundry room with washing machine and separate dryer.  Wifi, towels, Netflix all included.  Main door and only a few steps from street level to enter the property through a key box.  Willowbrae is close to portobello beach approx 1 mile away, and only 2 miles away from the city centre, approx 10 min drive.  local amenity of supermarket and Hollyrood park.

name: Sunny duplex Stockbridge gem
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Traditional Edinburgh flat but fully remodelled by a master builder and award-winning architect.

3 bedrooms and one sofa bed in living room, the flat can also accomodate a child in a pull out bed. Pets are welcome with a small surcharge and there is a free guest parking space in a private parking section.

In the heart of leafy Stockbridge - the peace of a family-friendly neighbourhood with a 10 minute walk to the city centre.

name: Cosy and quite en-suite bedroom
description:
en-suite room in newly renovated flat (shared with host) with excellent connection to the city centre and to the Edinburgh Airport by bus 17.

The apartment is located close to Firth of Forth shore line within walking distance to local pubs, restaurants and shops.

You will be free to use high speed Wi-Fi, separate living room with TV, host’s Netflix account and other household items are available like: iron, hair dryer, washing machine and fully equipment kitchen.

Late check-ins are welcome.

name: The Tartan Retreat
description:
Edinburgh city break made easy!
Relax in peace in the quiet residential area of Duddingston.

This recently renovated space offers a comfortable double bed, a private en suite with a shower, and all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay.

Eat, explore, enjoy! Walk to the vibrant seaside area of Portobello, passing through Figgate Park nature reserve, or visit Holyrood Park and Arthur’s Seat.

There are regular buses to Princes Street,
making this an ideal location to enjoy Edinburgh!

name: Traditional top floor flat
description:
Beautiful flat in traditional Edinburgh terraced street. Situated on the top floor so very quiet but only a 15 minute walk to the centre including train station. From the doorstep you have views of Edinburgh Castle.
The kitchen has been newly renovated including brand new appliances.
This flat is perfect for a couple or solo travellers visiting Edinburgh.

name: Stylish & Comfy Getaway ~ 5* Location ~ King Bed!
description: This chic spot in Edinburgh's sought-after West End is an ideal retreat for couples or a relaxed business trip. Its prime location ensures you're just a minute away from the Tram, train, bus, and taxi rank, making exploring Edinburgh a breeze. Stylish decor & comfortable amenities create a welcoming atmosphere, perfect for unwinding after a day of sightseeing or meetings. Whatever the plans in the city, getting around couldn't be more convenient to enjoy everything Edinburgh has to offer!

name: A Chic Retreat in the Heart of Edinburgh
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant rhythm of Edinburgh with our thoughtfully designed one-bedroom flat, located in the prestigious Quartermile Development. Whether you're here to soak in the historic charm, explore cultural hotspots, or indulge in local delicacies, this centrally situated flat offers the perfect base for your stay.

Property in LEZ Zone. Please ensure car is compliant if driving.

name: Bohemian-Chic Flat in Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our beautiful home in Edinburgh. Our flat is located in a traditional tenement in an up-and-coming part of Edinburgh. Leith is full of hip cafes, bars and a stone's throw away from the main city attractions, while also near the port and Portobello beach. It is also close to the famous Banana flats, where Trainspotting was filmed.

We are happy to recommend our favorite cafes, bars and restaurants nearby.

There is a direct tram from the airport to the area!

name: Luxury New Town period apartment
description:
Beautifully newly renovated and fully equipped New Town flat available.

3 bedrooms (2x superking, 1x double/twin), 2 bathrooms, huge living room with separate kitchen/dining room and entrance hall.

Set up for 'work from home' if required with good Wifi throughout.

5 minute walk from George Street, 10 minute walk (downhill!) from Edinburgh Waverly, 15 minute walk to Edinburgh Castle.

Please note that the flat is on the Top Floor which means fantastic views but three flights of stairs.

name: Fantastic New Town Flat with Shared Garden
description:
✔ Splendid flat in a central location within a residential Georgian street
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Fully equipped kitchen
✔ 1-minute walk to Bellevue Crescent bus stop
✔ 16-minute walk to Scott Monument
✔ 19-minute walk to Royal Mile
✔ 20-minute walk to the National Galleries of Scotland
✔ 24-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 27-minute walk to Johnnie Walker Princes Street
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and Wi-Fi are provided

name: Luxury Flat with Castle Views in Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to this immaculate top floor flat, the perfect base for exploring Edinburgh’s Victorian-Georgian West End wonderland.
- Tastefully renovated with modern luxury amenities
- Inviting atmosphere for a comfortable stay
- Stunning views of Edinburgh’s iconic Castle
- Unique Georgian design from the 1850s
- Ideal location for enjoying the city's historic charm

name: 3-Bed Edinburgh Abode - Parking and Garden
description: The interior is dressed to the highest standard, including soft-touch linen, towels, mirrors and soft furnishings for your comfort, including parking and a garden. This stylish and comfortable home provides the perfect base from which to explore the City. This is the perfect place whether you are traveling for business or pleasure

name: Stylish 2 bedroom home
description: This stylish home is the perfect base for a visit to Scotland's stunning capital city. Located in a leafy, quiet area between the City Centre and bohemian Leith, you're never more than a short walk away from cafes, pubs & restaurants. You’ll have the fully equipped house to yourselves, including a south-facing garden with a patio, seating area, and BBQ. Perfect for exploring Edinburgh during the Fringe festival, with bus stops at the end of the road, and the tram just a 5-minute walk away.

name: Ground floor garden flat in Edinburgh with parking
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: Georgian Splendor in Central Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to this immaculate 2-floor, 3-bed apartment that blends Georgian splendor with modern luxury.
- Tastefully renovated interior
- Historic atmosphere in a central location
- Unique architectural design by Reid and Sibbald
- Spacious living areas
- Close to local attractions

name: Flat for 4
Beautiful  single room in boutique hotel
description:
Enjoy easy access to popular shops and restaurants from this charming Georgian townhouse.
Just 5 minutes from the St James Quarter with its array of boutique shops and fine restaurants, we are close to the Old Town and at the edge of the wonderful architecture of the New Town.
You will find us tucked away on a quiet street.
Our room is Room 1, with a single bed , located on the first floor.
***We also have the added benefit of early luggage drop off from 10am**

name: Arthur's Seat Nest
description: Experience Edinburgh from this bright, spacious flat with breathtaking views of Arthur's Seat right from your window. Nestled by Holyrood Park, you're just a 5-minute stroll from the Royal Mile and Holyrood Palace. Explore iconic sites like Calton Hill, Edinburgh Castle, the Old Town and Portobello Beach - all within reach. Just across the street, the Meadowbank Shopping Centre has everything you need at your fingertips, such as supermarkets, cafè and essentials.

name: Historic Royal Mile Retreat
description: Experience the charm of Edinburgh in my historic flat on the iconic Royal Mile. Located in a 400-year-old building, this cozy retreat is central and secluded. It offers a spacious bedroom with a super king-size bed, a modern bathroom, and an open-plan kitchen/living area. Perfect for Fringe festivities & exploring the city's attractions. Enjoy amenities like a smart TV, washer/dryer, coffee machine etc. Ideal for couples or small groups. Immerse yourself in the heart of Edinburgh's culture.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: One Bedroom Apartment in Gorgie
description:
Ideal for all travelers but especially perfect for young people, our apartment is surrounded by top-rated bars, restaurants, and cafes, beloved by locals and visitors alike. Experience the best of Edinburgh's lively culture and nightlife.

Top floor lovely apartment with king sized bed and a living area for ultimate comfort. Unwind in a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, hob, kettle, and all essential utensils, perfect for culinary exploration. Hot water and Heating available.

name: Exclusive House with Free Parking
description:
✔ Striking house nicely located in Stockbridge
✔ 3995 ft2 | 371 m2
✔ 4 bedrooms

name: Apartment in the OLD TOWN (2 Bedroom)
description:
The train station is 5-8 min walk as is the airport bus.

Nestled in the heart of the historic old town, this apartment offers a unique blend of classic charm and modern amenities. Situated on a picturesque cobblestone street, you’ll be within walking distance of cultural landmarks, quaint cafes, boutique shops, and vibrant local markets.

This old town apartment is a rare find, offering a blend of historical elegance and contemporary comfort.

description: Enjoy my exquisite top-floor apartment offering comfort, style, and convenience. Tastefully furnished with large windows that provide bright light and stunning views. The well-appointed kitchen is perfect for unleashing your inner chef, while the bedroom features a comfortable bed and ample storage. The modern bathroom offers a luxurious shower. Located on trendy Broughton Street, you’ll be immersed in Edinburgh’s city center with cafes, boutiques, bars, and restaurants just steps away.

description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Recently renovated to a super high standard. Close to city centre with a 5-10 minute walk into town and a 10-15 minute walk to the Royal Mile. Leith Walk and Easter Road are 5 minute walks. Uber efficient pick up spot. Required amenities within property. Surrounding areas has shops, supermarkets, bars and restaurants. Sleeps 4 adults - double bedroom along with double sofa bed. Wi-fi and smart TV if you are looking to wind down.

name: Chic 1BR Flat w/ Deck – Near Leith Walk
description: Stylish main door flat with private deck, located just off Easter Road. A quiet base steps from vibrant Leith, Holyrood Park, and Edinburgh city centre. Perfect for couples, solo travellers, or remote workers looking for comfort, privacy, and easy access to the city - ideal for Fringe visits or longer Edinburgh stays.

name: 17teen
description:
Light and spacious Kingsize room with own private bathroom inc shower and bath plus continental breakfast and private parking.
Situated in leafy west Edinburgh within easy reach of the Town Centre, Edinburgh Airport (10mins away), and road links to the North & South.
Convenient for Murrayfield stadium - on match days parking and pre-match meals can be arranged just a 15 minute walk from the game.
Perfectly located for city or countryside and a handy stop off point for touring around Scotland.

name: Stylish 1BR Leith Shore | Easy City Centre Links
description:
Enjoy your trip to Edinburgh in this snug 1BR flat in the centre of Leith, a cultural hotspot of the city. The unique location is ideally situated between the eclectic dockside bars & bistros of Leith’s Shore, and Edinburgh's city centre. City break perfection!

Abundance of transport options to the city centre & airport, with trams and buses, just a 5-min walk away.

Attractions nearby include Leith Shore, Royal Yacht Britannia, Port of Leith Distillery and Newhaven within walking distance.

name: Royal Mile Apartment
description:
This contemporary, spacious apartment is situated in a Close on Edinburgh's historic Royal Mile, in the heart of the Medieval Old Town.
It's the perfect base from which to explore everything the city has to offer. Stylish and comfortable the apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, two comfortable double bedrooms and a lovely living / dining area for socialising and relaxing. The bathroom has a large walk in shower and all towels and linens are provided for your comfort.

Please note that this listing does not offer a free parking space. If you need that, please check out our other listings in the same house.

amazingapartments co uk

Top-floor retreat in a 1700s Old Town building, opposite Festival Theatre, Scotland’s premier venue for opera, ballet and international productions, and 5 minute walk to the Royal Mile. Four flights of stairs (no lift) lead to calm views over Nicolson Square. Fully equipped kitchen, fast Wi-Fi and self check-in. An ideal base for University visits, world-class museums and Edinburgh Castle.

“Spotlessly clean, perfect location, and felt safe at night” – recent guest review

With Fort Kinnaird shopping just 1.1 miles away and Waverley Station 3.7 miles nearby, convenience is key. It is ideal for an individual or couple looking to be in the heart of the city at an affordable price. All facilities including towels and linen are provided.

Buses 3 and 30 get you to the centre in 25 mins and by car in 13 mins.

Stay in a front row view of Beautiful Edinburgh, from your windows, look up to see the stronghold still standing, timeless, proud, and unchanged!

Bruntsfield, with its vibrant cafes, restaurants, and independent shops, is only a short stroll away - as are the green open spaces of the picturesque Meadows.

The apartment is surrounded by great pubs, restaurants and walks throughout the city and the Water of Leith. Bus and Tram stops are a minute's walk away so city centre connections are perfect.
