Enjoy staying in this stylish apartment in the heart of the Medieval Old Town. Located in the lively Grassmarket area it's the perfect base from which to explore the city. The Castle and the Famous Royal Mile are a five minute walk away and all the main tourist attractions can be reached on foot but the area is also very well served by public transport for those who want to venture further afield.

Note - this is on the first floor above ground, with one flight of stairs and no elevator
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Logan's Family Rest
description: Located in the historic Restalrig Village whose name is a 15th century variant on the name Lestalric, recorded from the late 12th century. The area was part of a medieval estate owned by the De Lestalrics. This apartment is situated in the east of Edinburgh's City Centre just over 1 mile away from Royal Mile. Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place including Arthur's Seat, Holyrood Palace, The Scottish Parliment building, Portobello Beach plus more

name: Modern Home in Edinburgh
description:
The Property is situated in the Duddingston area of Edinburgh.

Walking distance from Fort Kinnaird shopping complex

We have 2 train stations within walking distance with trains running frequently into Edinburgh City Centre and also down to the Scottish Borders to places such as Galashiels and Tweedbank.

3 major bus routes run all within 5 minutes walk which can take you into Edinburgh city centre also down to North Berwick through the Golf Coast and also down to Portobello Beach

Previously Listed with 5 Star reviews.

Shared bathroom and separate WC.

Fresh towels and sheets provided

name: Private central suite
description:
Large & private bedroom & shower room with your own front door in the basement of a Georgian townhouse in central Edinburgh.

A self contained part of our home, separated from the rest of the family home by a locked door & you will have use of your private front door from the street.

The space includes a large bedroom with king size bed, sofa and seating area and facilities to make tea/coffee including Nespresso machine & pods as well as an entrance hallway and private shower room.

description:
Cosy Cellar Apartment in Edinburgh’s UNESCO World Heritage New Town
This charming one-bedroom cellar apartment offers the perfect blend of historic charm and modern comfort. Located in the heart of New Town, it features a private entrance, underfloor heating, and a stylish, compact design. With easy access to iconic landmarks like Princes Street, Stockbridge and Edinburgh Castle, plus cosy pubs and cafes nearby, it’s an ideal retreat for solo travellers or couples exploring the city.

Charming apartment on a peaceful street in Edinburgh’s UNESCO World Heritage New Town, close to Stockbridge & City Centre.
Licence: EH-69583-F
Welcome to a tranquil retreat in Edinburgh -Cumberland St.
Nestled on a peaceful street of Georgian architecture, this delightful lower ground floor flat is a perfect combination of comfort & convenience, complete with its own private entrance & courtyard. Here, you can make the most of all Edinburgh has to offer then relax in a cosy, private apartment.

A beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom basement apartment on York Place with it's own private patio space.

A perfect apartment for families or groups of friends to enjoy their time in the beautiful city of Edinburgh with some of the city's best attractions within walking distance, excellent transport connections to the airport and some wonderful coffee spots, eateries and bars close by.

name: Cosy 1 bed - Old Town View
description: A perfectly located 1st floor apartment with quiet king size bedroom and new double sofa-bed (in the living room). In the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town on beatiful Victoria St with fabulous city views onto the Grassmarket Area. Edinburgh Castle and The National Museum of Scotland are just 3-5 mins walk. Great independent shops, restaurants and relaxing cafes on your doorstep. For 'joggers', try The Meadows and for an active hike go to the top of Arthur's Seat to enjoy the City views.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh Room for female guests
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space within our family home. This room is available for female guests only due to our family composition. Join us as you explore Edinburgh, we have a beautiful garden you can enjoy and the room has a smart TV with Netflix that you can use as a guest. You are welcome to make tea or snacks in our kitchen. Breakfast / dinner can be provided for an additional charge. The family bathroom next to your room is available for your sole use when you stay with us.

name: Cosy studio in historic New Town
description: Stylish studio in a quiet area of the UNESCO heritage area of Edinburgh New Town. Walking distance from most tourist attractions and the train station. Situated on a quiet corner of an 19th century town house with it's own private entrance this studio apartment is an ideal base for exploring beautiful Edinburgh

name: Luxury flat in Stockbridge, Edinburgh
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located apartment in the heart of Stockbridge which is 15-20 minutes walk from the city centre

Main door, basement level Georgian apartment with a large sitting room that contains a modern sofa bed to host an additional 2 guests
NB
Please advise me in advance of your stay if you are a party of 2 guests whether you need use of the Sofa Bed so that I can provide the necessary bedlinen
There is underfloor heating throughout, apart from the bathroom

name: Bright & Spacious in Edinburgh
description:
You will enjoy easy access to all the main tourist sites from our centrally located flat. Set between historic Arthur's Seat and the bright modern Meadows our apartment enjoys the best of both worlds.

The central location is walkable to all the main attractions. The Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle are 15-20 minutes walk which is on the way to Princes St and the Christmas Market / Scott Monument.

Easily walkable & the main bus route servicing Edinburgh with bus stop a 3 min walk from the door!

name: JOIVY 3BR Flat in Haymarket with Free Parking
description:
✔ Charming apartment nicely nestled in West End
✔ 3 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Fully equipped kitchen
✔ Complimentary parking
✔ 5-minute walk to Haymarket transit station
✔ 10-minute walk to Johnnie Walker Princes Street
✔ 17-minute walk to the National Galleries of Scotland: Modern One
✔ 19-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 20-minute walk to Royal Mile
✔ 22-minute walk to Scott Monument
✔ 23-minute walk to National Museum of Scotland

name: Modern apartment at city-centre
description: The 3 bedroom apartment is in the heart of city centre which is a short walk (0.2 miles) from Haymarket Station where both the Airlink bus and Edinburgh Tram service direct from Edinburgh airport stop. The apartment is fully furnished with a modern decor. Ideal location to go around Edinburgh as access to buses and trains near by.

name: Best Royal Mile View 2BR Next to Edinburgh Castle
description: Welcome to our charming flat on Edinburgh’s Royal Mile! Located in the heart of the Old Town, you’re steps from landmarks like Edinburgh Castle, St Giles Cathedral and Holyrood Palace. The cosy flat features a comfortable living area, fully equipped kitchen, and two peaceful bedrooms. Explore local cafés and shops just outside your door. We’re dedicated to ensuring a memorable stay - experience the magic of Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Edinburgh Escape, Ratho.
description:
Welcome to our comfortable 3-bed bungalow in Ratho, just 40 minutes from the bustling heart of Edinburgh! Perfectly situated next to the International Climbing Centre, adventure awaits right on your doorstep. Just 10-minute taxi ride from the airport.

Explore Scotland's cultural capital, with castles, the zoo, the Edinburgh International Festival, and the world-renowned Christmas Market—all waiting for you! Celebrate Edinburgh in style and indulge in whiskey tours and scenic loch adventures.

name: Cosy southside -Less than 10 minutes to Royal mile
description:
Cosy apartment in the south side of Edinburgh, less than 10 minute walk to Royal Mile and 15 minutes to Princes Street ( 5 minute bus).

Museum 5 minute walk.

Suitable for couples or small groups with one double bed and one popup single bed.

Couch could also be used to sleep on.

name: Castle View Apartment
description: Sleeps 4-8 persons. A lovely, bright and spacious top floor 'double upper' apartment located in a superb Edinburgh City Centre location! It comprises a large and comfortable living room, a well equipped dining kitchen, 4 spacious bedrooms (1 Primary king size bedroom with luxury ensuite bath / shower, 1 king size bedroom with en-suite, 1 large double and 1 twin room. There are a total of 3 bathrooms (2 which are en-suite) and the property also benefits from Smart TV (Netflix, etc.) and Wi-fi.

name: Selfcatering entire house Edinburgh 2BR /4 guest
description:
Whole victorian house 2 bedrooms . 1 living room , 1 bathroom . Very close to Aurther seat ,15 minuets walk . Very close to Portobello beach. Aldi , Morrisons and Lidl around 10-15 minuets walk from the house.
Free parking in front of the house.
It’s great place for a family or group of friends !

name: Two Delightful Fully Licensed Rooms in the Inch
description:
Two bright, spacious Rooms with morning and evening sun and a small garden in the south of Edinburgh.

SMALL BREAKFAST INCLUDED

name: St Christopher's Inn Bed in 12 Bed Dorm
description: Nestled in the centre of the medieval Old Town, our hostel is in the perfect location to reveal Edinburgh’s magical charm combined with an underground party scene unlike any other city.  With incredible sights such as Edinburgh Castle, the Scottish National Galleries and the Royal Mile just a short stroll away from your bed there’s no excuse not to get out and about! Our Edinburgh hostel is also a very convenient 2 minute walk from Waverley station.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Modern Home Next to Murrayfield Stadium
description:
The property is located next to the Murrayfield Stadium and is close to local amenities. It is a short walk to the tram stop and is a located 10 mins away from the city centre.

The property has free WiFi and free onsite parking.

The property has 2 double bedrooms, 1 of which is an en-suite and a further 2 bathrooms. The property also has a large kitchen and living room.

There is an outdoor garden.

name: Affordable stay during Fringe
description: I have a spare room in my flat that is 24 mins to Edinburgh airport. 7 mins walk to the bus that goes to the airport. I am renting it out at a very low price to people who are seeking a good rest during fringe. And it is 2 min walk to the bus stop that goes to the city centre. Buses to the city usually takes 20 mins peak time. If you don’t mind commuting you can stay at this private room at the price of a bed in hostel. But please be respectful. I have a rabbit in the living room and a flatmate.

name: 5* Rated Luxury City Centre Apartment
description:
>🅿️ Send us a message about parking
> ✈️ 🚂 Direct Connections To Edinburgh Airport, Waverley Train station and Haymarket train station Via 1 Tram.
>🚶 15 minute walk to city centre
> 💨 Tram Stop 1 Minute From Property
> 🏰 Direct Connections to All Of Edinburgh's Historic Sites including Murrayfield stadium

name: Cosy room with breakfast in welcoming home
description: Relax in our Victorian Cottage above Newhaven Harbour, with sea views and excellent direct transport links to central Edinburgh,  Murrayfield Stadium, Ingliston and Edinburgh Airport.  Close to buses 7 and 11 (centre ), 17  (airport) and the the tram. Free on-street parking. EV charger nearby. Walking/cycle routes/parks on the doorstep. Head for a wild swim, take advantage of the thriving restaurant scene of Leith or hop on the bus to see the sites. We have a friendly cat and dog! STL EH80826-F

name: Cosy Flat in Edinburgh city , 2 beds 1 Bathroom
description: This charming and quiet self-catering apartment is located in Newington, Edinburgh. Its prime location offers excellent transport links throughout the city. Just steps away from Arthur's Seat, a 15 mins walk to the Royal Mile, and 20mins from old town, it's an ideal base for exploring Edinburgh. You'll enjoy easy access to local shops, supermarkets, and a wide selection of restaurants with5mins walk.

name: Industrial Charm, Cosy Comfort
description: Step into this stylish industrial-chic living space featuring a statement brick effect wall, a cosy leather sofa, and a beautifully set dining space. Enjoy a sleek kitchen, spa-style bathroom with underfloor heating, and a calming bedroom with plush bedding. A private mezzanine lounge adds a unique touch—ideal for relaxing or an extra guest. Warm, modern, and full of charm—this is your perfect urban escape.

name: Apartment in Edinburgh Newington
description: Newly built, modern two bedroom apartment. The flat comprises of a large open plan kitchen/living area, two bedrooms (one with en-suite) and a large main bathroom. Bedroom one has one double bed with an en-suite and bedroom two has a double bed with one single bed. There is free on street parking and a private garden. It takes around 15 mins to reach the city centre by bus. Cameron toll shopping centre is within walking distance. The area is surrounded by greenery in a peaceful neighbourhood
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: The Old Town Escape
description:
A two-bedroom second floor flat located in the heart of Edinburgh Old Town, Grassmarket. This location is situated perfect, walking distance to Princes Street, Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle and Edinburgh's city centre.

There is an abundance of fantastic local bakeries, restaurants, bars, and coffee shops in the area making it the perfect choice for a city break with everything you need at your fingertips!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Oxgang's Shabby Chic
description: Relax and unwind in this unique ground-floor flat with a private patio and garden. Nestled on the edge of Edinburgh, it offers easy access to both the city and nature. A convenient bus stop right outside will take you to the heart of Edinburgh's city centre in just 30 minutes, while the beautiful Pentland Hills are nearby for scenic walks and breathtaking views.

name: Bonnington Abode
description: Welcome to our bright and spacious two-bedroom apartment in Edinburgh's popular Bonnington area. Just a 15-minute walk from lively Leith Walk, where you can catch a direct tram to the city centre or airport, our home offers the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and tranquility.

name: Unique two bedroom flat
description: Stay in a beautiful city centre flat with views of Balmoral Hotel. Original wooden floors and period features mixed with eclectic furniture. Stylish modern conversion of old stone building with huge character. Modern stylish kitchen and bathroom with attractive styling. In trendy vibrant Leith Walk area with loads of bars and restaurants. 20 minutes walk to Princess Street with main tourist attractions at hand. 10 minute walk to the base of Arthur's Seat.

name: 2 Bed Flat in Central Edinburgh
description: This beautiful and modern apartment is situated in the heart of Edinburgh. Well-maintained interior and exterior to ensure you have a pleasant experience. Just minutes away from numerous stores, restaurants and cafes, attractions and nature. The property has two spacious bedrooms, one bedroom with three single beds, one bedroom with one double bed, two bathrooms, a bright living room and a kitchen. Secure entry system to the property. 15 minutes walk from the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle

name: Delightful Room (en-suite) Inverleith,  Edinburgh
description:
Delightful, bright double bedroom with ensuite shower, nestled in the charming Inverleith area of Edinburgh. The room offers a garden view and outlook over playing fields, creating a calm and relaxing atmosphere. Ideally located, just a short bus ride or walk from the vibrant city centre, historic sites and shopping areas. Enjoy nearby gems like the breathtaking Royal Botanical Gardens and local cafes, bars and restaurants. It's the perfect spot for a memorable stay.

License EH-80410-F

name: Room within modern apartment with park views
description:
Room within modern top floor (G,1,2,3) flat with great connections to everything Edinburgh has to offer.

Located next to Pilrig Park, 2 minutes from a bus stop and less than 15 minute walk to the Tram, both with a regular service to the city centre. There is free on street parking outside the property.

The bedroom features a UK king sized bed and a double mirrored wardrobe. The bathroom (shared with owner) has separate shower cubicle, toilet, bath and wash hand basin. Towels are provided.

name: GuestReady - Modern home near Edinburgh Castle
description: This two-bedroom apartment is perfect for couples and friends looking to stay in the city centre. It has everything you need for a pleasant stay. The property is close to various attractions such as Edinburgh Castle, good restaurants and shops, and the Edinburgh Airport, which is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Duddingston  9 Bedroom House - Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our 9-bedroom house in Edinburgh, an ideal getaway for families, groups, or colleagues, with space for up to 18 guests.

The house features six double beds, one king-size bed, a single bed in a separate room, and a large triple room that can sleep up to three guests with a combination of a double and a single bed.

The house is spread across two floors (ground and first), with a single flight of stairs connecting the levels.

name: Leafy New Town Studio
description: Cosy city centre studio flat with kitchenette located in the Moray Feu Georgian development within the UNESCO World Heritage site. Situated in a leafy residential area in New Town, and easily walkable to many of the best Edinburgh cafés, pubs, bars, restaurants, and shops. Edinburgh Castle, Old Town and the National Art Galleries are a 20-minute walk, and Stockbridge, Circus Lane, and Dean Village are a ten-minute walk. Quick and easy access from the train stations, the Airport tram and bus.

name: Homey Room for Friendly Traveler
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.Relax and unwind in our cozy room, perfect for solo travelers, couples, or guests with a small child. Enjoy a peaceful atmosphere, comfortable amenities, and a warm, welcoming space that feels like home. Whether you’re here for business or leisure, our place offers a quiet retreat with easy access to local attractions. Make yourself at home and experience true comfort during your stay!

name: Extremely central Quartermile apartment near Castl
description: Chic two bedroom Quartermile two bedroom apartment with two bathrooms (one en suite) and with open plan living area/kitchen and separate laundry cupboard with washer/drier, high speed virgin media fibre optic broadband and TV Package included as well as weekly housekeeping available and an underground secure car park on site."

name: Stylish  5 Bed in Edinburgh
description: Welcome to this spacious retreat where comfort meets modern living in Edinburgh. This stylish five-bedroom property is ideal for families or larger groups who are looking for plenty space to relax.

name: Private room
description:
nice quiet area

near to heriot watt university

name: Very centrally located chic one bed Quartermile ap
description: Stunning one-bedroom apartment in a mile room with open plan living room and separate laundry room with washer/dryer, Virgin Media High Speed Fibre Optic Broadband and TV package included, as well as weekly maid service.”

name: Luxury Room & free parking
description: Stunning bedroom (bigger than most in Edinburgh)  in a stylish Victorian house. Shared bathroom with toilet, shower, sink and huge bathtub at the end of the hall, and there are two other shared toilets downstairs. Direct bus route for many buses to the city centre (12 mins). You'll love this place because of the architecture, high ceilings, traditional furniture and quiet atmosphere. Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Large sunny room on Royal Mile
description: Located on the royal mile, in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, this bright & spacious room offers a peaceful retreat just steps from the Royal Mile. It features a comfortable Super King Size bed views of a peaceful courtyard. Guests share a fully equipped kitchen & bathroom with 1 flatmate. Enjoy easy access to cafes, restaurants, & attractions like Edinburgh Castle and Holyrood Palace. This room is ideal for couples or solo travelers seeking a memorable stay.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The West Bow
description:
PRIME LOCATION. A contemporary and spacious 2 bed apartment, situated in fantastic 'Old Town' location (just off The Grassmarket and 2 mins from Castle). Comprises a spacious living room / dining area, 2 bedrooms, a modern kitchen (with dishwasher) and bathroom with bath / shower. Wi-fi and Smart TV (Netflix ready) are also provided.

*** Under New Management by the owners and previously a very successful listing as a Guest Favourite with a score of 4.83 over 116 reviews - see listing photos ***
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious, Bright and Cosy Room
description:
This is a large sized double bedroom which is bright and warm in a second floor flat with security door entrance.
Nice south facing view over green park area.
It's well located for the airport and motorway access, free parking outside the building, easy access to public transport.
Buses 3 and 30 get you to the centre in 25 mins and by car in 13 mins.
Good local facilities including library, hairdresser, cinema, shops and the shopping centre Wester Hailes 10 minutes walking distance.

name: The Edinburgh Nest
description:
The Edinburgh Nest is a NEW cozy,comfortable,home-like space nestled within the city.The word “Nest”gives it away as a peaceful retreat where guests can unwind after exploring the lively streets of Edinburgh.
Its closeness to the Edinburgh Castle and other attractions makes it a little sanctuary within the city,a spot where guests can relax while staying conveniently close to everything Edinburgh has to offer.
The lake view is just a 3minutes walk from the property,it’s a lovely one!🤗

name: Garden Room, cosy & central
description: A fantastic base for Edinburgh exploration, stay in an 'Edinburgh Tennement' an 1820's purpose built apartment on a quiet residential road that is still only a 2 minute walk from the buzz and bustle of South Clerk Street's restaurants & shops & 5 minutes from the serenity of Holyrood Park & Arthur's Seat. Major bus links are close by and Waverley train station is a 20 minute walk, my flat is the lower ground floor. Your room has a fridge, kettle & microwave and direct garden access.

name: Bright bedroom in Edinburgh
description: Modern and peaceful apartment in Edinburgh! Stay in a private room with a spacious luxury bed and your own bathroom. Spotlessly clean, cozy, and just minutes from the tram & The Shore, it’s the perfect base to explore this wonderful city. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, fresh linens, towels, and toiletries — a warm, comfortable home for your trip.

name: BelleVue 3 Bedroom House Free car park city centre
description:
🏡Stylish 3-bed HOUSE🏡🛏️ in central Edinburgh, just 10-minute walk from Princes Street & Waverley Station.
Ideal for families, groups, or work stays.
Full bathroom upstairs
Guest toilet downstairs
Terrace
access to the city’s highlights from a peaceful, comfortable base
Ideal for families, groups, or business travellers
Free Private Parking – A rare luxury in central Edinburgh
Fully Equipped Kitchen –
Fast Wi-Fi
Washer
Unbeatable Location – Easy walk to City Centre, shops, and transport

name: 3 bed bungalow, sleeps 6, free parking with garden
description: A semi-detached house with 3 bedrooms over one level. It includes an entrance vestibule and entrance hall. The master bedroom has a bay window to the front. The lounge has a window to the rear and leads to the kitchen. There are 3 bedrooms, all fitted with wardrobes. Bathroom is fitted with 3 piece white suite with shower over bath. Externally, the front garden is monobloc, providing off-street parking. The fully enclosed rear garden mainly has hard landscaping with established borders.

name: River Haven Deluxe Room
description: This stylish place is perfect for couples or couples with small children.

name: Contemporary home in Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our stylish 3-bedroom flat on vibrant Leith Walk! Located minutes from Edinburgh’s top attractions, this modern apartment offers comfort and convenience. Enjoy a bright, open-plan living space with contemporary decor, a fully equipped kitchen, and cozy dining.

Direct connections to Edinburgh Airport via tram (40 minute journey time) Tram stop 9 minute walk 0.4 miles.

name: River Haven Comfort Double Room
description: This special home is close to everything, easy to plan your tour.

name: East Rigg Lodges - East Cairn
description: East Rigg Lodges is an adults only site offering luxury accommodation set in a spectacular location at the foot of the Pentland Hills.  East Rigg not only provides an idyllic rural location to relax and unwind but it is also easily accessible and a great location to explore Edinburgh and the Central Belt of Scotland. Our luxury lodges are a perfect base for couples who are looking to escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

name: East Rigg Lodges - West Kip
description: East Rigg Lodges is an adult only site offering luxury accommodation set in a spectacular location at the foot of the Pentland Hills. ast Rigg not only provides an idyllic rural location to relax and unwind but it is also is easily accessible and a great location to explore Edinburgh and the Central Belt of Scotland. Our luxury lodges are a perfect base for couples who are looking to escape from the hustle and bustle of working life, our lodges are ready and waiting for your arrival.

name: East Rigg Lodges - Scald Law
description: East Rigg Lodges is an adult only site offering luxury accommodation set in a spectacular location at the foot of the Pentland Hills. East Rigg not only provides an idyllic rural location to relax and unwind but it is also is easily accessible and a great location to explore Edinburgh and the Central Belt of Scotland. Our luxury lodges are a perfect base for couples who are looking to escape from the hustle and bustle of working life, our lodges are ready and waiting for your arrival.

name: Spectacular 2 bed, 2 bath in Edinburgh City Centre
description:
A beautifully presented two bed apartment, perfectly positioned in Rutland Square just a stone’s throw away from all local amenities and transport links. Recently refurbished to an exceptionally high standard.

Paid parking is available just outside the apartment though this central, best to get around on foot.

We have two bedrooms, one is a twin with two singles, the master bedroom has a a king bed and en suite bathroom

name: Bright and Cosy Flat near The Scottish Gallery
description:
✔ Trendy apartment nicely nestled in Edinburgh’s New Town
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Completely furnished kitchen
✔ Next to the Scottish Gallery
✔ 13-minute walk to Scott Monument
✔ 17-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 19-minute walk to Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh
✔ Edinburgh Waverley train station is a 17-minute walk

name: Cosy tranquility fab location
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Prime location close to Newhaven Harbour and tram. The tram stops include Edinburgh airport, Princes street and the Murrayfield stadium. Excellent bus routes into the city, 5 minutes walk to wonderful pubs and restaurants. Very close to The Water of Leith walkway. 10 minute walk to Royal Botanic Gardens. 30 minutes walk to the city centre via restaurants, pubs,galleries and antique shops. Unrestricted on street parking.

name: Bonita y céntrica habitación
description: Enjoy the simplicity of this quiet and central accommodation.

name: Fabulous, central flat with 2 double bedrooms
description: Stunning 2 bedroom flat in the heart of Georgian Edinburgh.    Easy walking distance to galleries, shopping and all the main sights. Fabulous restaurants and bars minutes away. A spacious and light flat with amazing views from the huge windows.  Just 10 mins from Waverley station and 5 mins from nearest tram stop so very accessible by train or air!

name: Double Bedroom in Wee Midterrace Home
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful, centrally-located place. Basic double bedroom available in mid-terraced house a short 15-20 min bus ride to Edinburgh. The room has a new double bed & mattress, a built in wardrobe, books, art, and is super cosy. There's a shared bathroom. There is a fruit bowl that never empties &  a constant supply of porridge downstairs. This listing is owner and rescue greyhound occupied. My bedroom is next to the guest bedroom. Basa (my rescue greyhound) is resident queen!

name: Modern Family Home In Edinburgh + Free Parking
description:
Experience the magic of Scotland in our modern home.

Perfectly located, our place offers the best of both worlds: peaceful, family-friendly and easy access to the buzz of Edinburgh. Within just 15 minutes, you can explore the charm of the Old Town, immerse yourself in the world-famous Edinburgh Festival, or unwind in nature at Dalkeith Country Park, Vogrie Park, or the Midlothian Sports Centre. It’s the ideal base for your Scottish adventure — calm, connected, and full of possibilities.

name: 5 Bed Old Town Crash Pad
description:
Basic no frills accommodation in the heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town. Perfect as a base for exploring, typical ‘crash pad style’ accommodation for up to 10 guests.

1min walk to The National Museum of Scotland

Next to The Royal Mile, Christmas Markets, Castle & Holyrood.

5min walk to Edinburgh Waverley Station

No parking, car parks are near by, 4 minute walk.

All bedding and one towel per person included alongside one key.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming Home, Great Location
description:
You're warmly invited to stay in this cosy upper villa in Edinburgh’s charming Bruntsfield/Tollcross neighbourhood!

Ideal for families, this main-door property offers leafy views from the main bedroom, a bunk room with games and toys for kids, two log burners with plenty of firewood, and a spacious private garden.

Just an 18-minute walk from Princes Street and 10 minutes from the Meadows, with a bus stop right outside, it's an ideal base for exploring both Old Town and New Town.

name: Double bed close to Murrayfield
description:
A great place for exploring all Edinburgh has to offer. Just 10 minutes by bus to all the cities' main attractions in the City Centre, Leith, Old & New Town. The area is surrounded by shops, gym, parks and Murrayfield Stadium (20 minutes walking)

We offer to our guests
- 24/7 guest support
- Tea and coffees
- Laundry facility
- Great transport links, airport tram&train station 10 minutes away
You can also use the two private gardens for a bbq or just for some relax.

name: Stunning Georgian flat in New town
description: Nestled in the heart of Edinburgh’s prestigious New Town, this elegant Georgian-style 1-bedroom flat

name: 1 Bed Apartment in City Centre - Free Parking!
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located mews style apartment. Free parking is available on site.

Located in the heart of the New Town and within easy reach of George St, Princes St and on into the historic Old Town, this little pied-á-terre provides the perfect location for a weekend city break or a mid-week trip.

The property runs on 100% renewable energy!

name: Bonnie Hotel
description: Step into luxurious living in our Georgian townhouse in the heart of historic Edinburgh. Whether travelling for work or enjoyment, you’ll appreciate our city centre location, just a stroll away from all major attractions and business centres. Conveniently located at 18 Torphichen Street at West End of New Town, a few minutes walk to Haymarket station, EICC, Princess street, Edinburgh Castle, Royal Mile and Grassmarket.

name: Charming 1 Bedroom in Edinburgh's West End
description: Welcome to your charming, private apartment in Edinburgh, accommodating up to 3 guests. The property features a well-designed sleeping arrangement with a comfortable double bed in the bedroom and a convenient single sofa bed in the living room, perfect for a couple or a small group. The entire space is dedicated solely to you and equipped with everything needed for a comfortable stay.

name: Cosy room close to city
description: A cosy room in the quiet neighbourhood close to City and easy access with transport to and from City

name: Comfy 2 Bedroom Flat City Centre
description: Cozy 2-bedroom flat in the vibrant Leith area of Edinburgh, perfect for exploring the city. The flat features a comfortable living area, fully equipped kitchen, and two spacious bedrooms. Enjoy the lively local scene with trendy cafes, restaurants, and the scenic Shore area just a short walk away. Well-connected to the city center by bus, making it easy to visit top Edinburgh attractions. Free Wi-Fi and street parking available.

name: Victorian style double bedroom
description:
We are a family of five, we have a wee chihuahua who loves people!
Please note there is just one hand towel in the room so please bring your big towel with you, if you have a limited space in your luggage we can provide you with one at an extra charge of £1 per towel .The room in on the first floor of our house. We are a very flexible family so if you need anything specific please do not hesitate to ask. ☺️
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Stylish 1-Bed Flat- Edinburgh
description: Welcome to your urban retreat nestled in the heart of Edinburgh's vibrant landscape. This stylish 1-bedroom flat offers a tranquil escape with the convenience of being just moments away from the city's most intriguing attractions, eclectic shopping experiences, and tantalizing culinary delights.

name: Safe heaven
description: peaceful and centrally-located place.just 10 minutes by bus to City centre which is available 24hrs. I'm a friendly person and most of the time I stay outside for my job. Non smoking person. Grocery shop and bus stop just 2 minutes walk. Pets allowed.

name: Attic Bedroom with Double Bed
description: Attic bedroom with double bed on first floor of bungalow

name: Cozy Room with Private En-Suite Bathroom
description:
This cozy bedroom features a comfortable double bed, a foldable desk, a built-in wardrobe, and a private en-suite bathroom with a shower, ensuring both comfort and privacy.

Conveniently located just a few minutes from The Shore tram stop, the room offers easy access to Edinburgh’s city center in around 15 minutes—perfect for exploring the city's rich history, culture, and attractions.

Guests can also enjoy a well-equipped shared kitchen and a dedicated laundry space for added convenience.

name: 2 Bed Flat Edinburgh City Centre
description:
Welcome to our stylish & modern 2-bedroom basement apartment, ideally located in the heart of Edinburgh's city centre. Just steps away from the city's top attractions, including the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, & the stunning Princes Street Gardens.

This apartment benefits from 2 kingsized bedrooms with plenty of storage, a living room with a cozy atmosphere & a fully equipped kitchen.

With high-speed Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay.

name: Charming main door flat in the city centre
description:
Our cocooning main door flat is fully equipped with anything you need for having the best trip including bathtub, kitchen, bright living room with 4 people dining table.

Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

Ideally located with 5 buses going directly to the city centre and with the tram within 5 min walk bringing you to / from the airport !

name: Spacious, modern 1 bedroom flat
description: Recently renovated spacious ground floor 1 bedroom is the perfect getaway for your city break.  Short walk from Hollyrood park and less than 2 miles to Edinburgh city centre and less than 1 mile to the beach.  With a supermarket close by our property offers you everything you need for a relaxing stay,  close enough to get too the city centre quickly to enjoy the hustle and bustle. Portibello beach is less  than 10 minutes walk away, perfect for its cafe culture and serene walks along the beach

name: Classical 19th Century Edinburgh Stair - 3 bedroom
description:
Lothian Road is in the Old Town soo close to Restaurant, bars, clubs, and Edinburgh Castle, Usher Hall, Lyceum, Traverse theatre, Princes Gardens. Johnny Walker experience is a short walk as is Princes Street
William Burn, building 1825-27. Almost symmetrical 4-storey palace block of tenements with advanced pavilion ends; shops (modern) at ground floor and flats above.

name: Private Room & en-suite
description: Welcome to our private room with en-suite in Murrayfield! Perfect for up to 3 guests, this cozy room offers complete privacy, with locked doors and blackout blinds. Our home has 3 children and a friendly dog, so you may hear some family noises. Enjoy essentials like fresh linens, Wi-Fi, and toiletries for a comfortable visit. Located in a safe neighborhood with convenient access to local shops, restaurants, and public transportation. We’re nearby if you need any tips or assistance.

name: Lovely Flat near the City Centre
description:
✔ Charming flat nicely nestled in Haymarket
✔ 646ft2 | 60m2
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Fully fitted kitchen
✔ Free parking
✔ 17-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 19-minute walk to National Galleries of Scotland: Modern One
✔ 21-minute walk to the National Museum of Scotland & St Giles
✔ 24-minute walk to Scott Monument
✔ 7-minute walk to Haymarket train station

name: Cosy Edinburgh flat
description:
Take it easy at this cosy and tranquil getaway. 15min walk to the city centre and 10 min to bottom of Arthur Seat. It’s perfectly located with plenty of caffès , restaurants, bars and shops right outside the door step. As close as it is to the busy city it provides a peaceful and quiet stay.

The property has a bedroom with a king size bed and two double sofa beds located in the living room.

Kitchen is equipped with everything that might be needed.

name: Snug Flat closeby Holyrood Park
description: A great location near to bottom of the Royal Mile It is walking distant to Holyrood Park,  Scottish Parliament, Holyrood Palace and  Dynamic Earth. It is also ideal for travel and shopping. Meadowbank Retail park across the road. Many buses to Princes St and St James Quarter only 10 minutes away. It is a great base for walking, cycling and running. However  it is also perfect for relaxing with Beer brewing , Scottish pubs and cafes all nearby.

name: Spacious, comfy 2-bedroom flat
description: This comfortable, newly renovated flat is perfect for couples, friends or small families to stay. With 2 spacious double bedrooms and a peaceful kitchen/living room, this will make a perfect base for exploring the city of Edinburgh.

name: Room in Gorgeous Flat in the Heart of the City
description:
Private room in shared charming 3rd floor Georgian flat in Edinburgh’s New Town. This bright 2-bed apartment features a modern kitchen, stylish living area, & walk-in bath. Enjoy top floor views & prime location just minutes from lively bars, restaurants & major attractions. Including popular locations: Princes St, Stockbridge, Dean Village, & Botanical Gardens.

Ideal for couples or solo travelers looking for a central, character-filled stay.

We’re waiting to welcome you 🤗

FYI: no elevator

name: Artist flat in Stockbridge, Edinburgh centre
description:
Peaceful artist's flat in Edinburgh's Stockbridge area, next door to all city-centre attractions. It is also incredibly quiet for a good night's sleep!

This flat is perfectly located for exploring Edinburgh, including New and Old Towns. It is 2 minutes from the Botanic Gardens, and right across the road from large supermarkets and 24/4 shops.

Apartment sleeps 4 guests: it has a king-sized bed in the bedroom and king-sized inflatable mattress (actually very comfy!) in the living room.

name: A Wee Retreat Cockburn, Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our stylish, one-of-a-kind apartment nestled on the iconic Cockburn Street in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town. This unique space combines character and modern comfort, featuring a chic mezzanine bedroom that overlooks the spacious and inviting living area below. With a blend of contemporary decor and classic charm, this apartment offers the perfect retreat for travelers seeking both style and convenience. Located just steps away from Edinburgh Castle & the Royal Mile.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Large Stylish En Suite Room/City Centre
description:
Large stylish room with en suite shower room.
Very central location, walk everywhere.
Abundance of restaurants, coffee shops and pubs all very close by.

Bedroom is on the top floor so there are stairs and the room is private as I sleep on the ground floor.

We can provide a travel cot for an infant.

Listing is for use of bedroom and en suite shower room only, no kitchen or laundry facilities but for longer stays I am happy to offer some flexibility on this.

Licence No' EH-83190-F

name: Large Room with private bathroom
description: Very comfortable and spacious room containing a king sized luxury bed with access to garden. Private bathroom with shower and off street parking. Great transport links with a bus stop less than one minute walk and buses are every few minutes. Ten minutes drive to Princes Street and close to supermarkets and garage. Hotel restaurant and bar and Starbucks less than one min walk.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Stylish 3-Bed New Town Flat in City Centre
description: Located in Edinburgh’s New Town, this beautifully presented flat offers three bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The open-plan living area combines classic New Town elegance with contemporary touches, including a sleek, fully equipped kitchen. Just a short walk from the St James Quarter, Omni Centre, and surrounded by vibrant bars, cafes, restaurants, Waverley train station, it offers outstanding convenience. It’s ideally positioned for Edinburgh’s Fringe and summer celebrations

name: Old Town 10 min walk, big room, garden view
description:
Ideal location for exploring Edinburgh. Big private bedroom in a comfortable, peaceful and stylish central apartment. The flat is part of a traditional Edinburgh tenement and some of the original traditional features like ceiling cornices and the Edinburgh press are still maintained. The neighbourhood is very safe and offers a variety of coffee shops and restaurants. Major tourist attractions accesible on foot. Royal Mile within 10 min walk. Bedroom view towards Arthur’s Seat
GREAT RAINSHOWER!

name: Whole flat, central , spacious
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: The Coach House Flat
description:
The Coach House flat is situated at the end of a quiet cul de sac just up the Water of Leith walkway from the Dean village, a world heritage site. The Gallery of Modern art and Dean Gallery are very close by and a fifteen minute walk will take you to the West End and Princes Street, Murrayfield rugby stadium or Craigleith Retail park.

Edinburgh is a cycle friendly city and we have free secure covered storage for your bicycle/s.

Licence No: EH-69680-F

name: Royal Mile Rooftop Hideaway with Balcony
description:
Be among our first guests at this vibrant rooftop flat above Edinburgh’s Royal Mile. Set in a UNESCO-listed 18th-century building, it offers bold design, local art, and a rare private balcony. Perfect for couples or small families, it’s peaceful, fully equipped, and just steps from the Castle, Holyrood, and Waverley Station. Accessible via traditional stone stairs, the views and charm at the top are well worth it. Book now and enjoy our limited-time launch rate!

License: EH-81962-F
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Large Ground Floor Central Apt
description: This self catering large ground floor and main door apartment comes with three bedrooms, open plan kitchen/lounge and a bathroom situated in City Centre and can reach all major attractions by walk. Also this is a step free access to our building and facilities.

name: Double room w/ private bathroom in family home
description:
A beautiful family home for 3 generations of the same family in the heart of the city. We offer a double room on the 1st floor, with a separate private bathroom. The room is across the landing from the family kitchen.

Please note: this is a family home, not a B&B.

Lewis, Kate and their two young kids live on on upper floors. Catherine (grandma) and Beau (the cat) live on the ground floor.

Breakfast is self-service. We provide: bread/toast, cereals, yoghurt, fruit, coffee, tea, fruit juice.

name: Exceptional 3 bed house — Meadows view. Central.
description:
Very special home in leafy neighbourhood with open parkland views. Exclusive use. Central & quiet. This ground floor home has its own entrance and gardens. It’s stylish and modern with historic features dating from 1880. Peaceful affluent neighbourhood, just a short ten min walk from the Old Town, Victoria Street, Royal Mile, Festival etc.
Views of Edinburgh Castle in the winter months, and a beautiful leafy view of the Meadows and mature trees during the spring and summer months.

name: Comfy flat with garden in great neighbourhood
description:
Beautiful colony apartment in Leith, a historic and popular port area. It is conveniently situated near a tram terminal and a bus stop, both of which provide frequent airport connections, a direct tram to Murrayfield Stadium, and a short bus ride to the city centre.

Walking distance to local amenities, including fine dining restaurants, charming cafes/bars, and the RY Britannia. The property features a quiet private garden, well-equipped kitchen, modern bathroom, and peaceful double bedroom.

name: Brigth and Modern flat near the city centre
description:
Modern top floor flat, clean and quiet. It’s located in Leith walk, an area well known for restaurants, pubs, cafes. Just 20 min walk to the city center and 2 min to the tram stop (Balfour street) which will connect you directly to the airport and the train station (Waverley station).Less than a minute away there are bus stops that will connect you with the whole city.
The flat is equipped with everything you need to enjoy your stay.

name: Stylish Period Flat |Mins to Royal Mile & Holyrood
description:
Live like an Edinburgh local and enjoy the privacy of a main door flat in an authentic period property 5 minutes from the Royal Mile.

Set in Edinburgh’s Abbeyhill neighbourhood, this stylish one-bedroom apartment is on a peaceful street, within walking distance of the Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace, Arthur's Seat and public transport links that can take you anywhere you need in the city.

name: Close to City Centre | Cosy Double Bedroom #2
description:
Guests love this location, within walking distance of the town centre and with great transport links around the city and to the airport.

Relax in a cosy room after a long day, equipped with table area and HD TV.

Picardy place tram stop is 5 minutes from the accommodation, the tram has a great link to the airport.

Luggage storage outside of checkin/checkout is available at a charge of £5 per bag.

name: GuestReady - Modern 2BR Home on the Royal Mile!
description: Ideally set right in the centre of Edinburgh and near to Royal Mile, you're assured to have an amazing stay with endless things to experience. As you're in the heart of the city, there is plenty of attractions such as Edinburgh's Royal Mile and the famous Worlds End Pub within walking distance. Equipped with free WiFi and city views, this spacious apartment is perfect for your ideal stay.

description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

Metrolets is a real estate company specializing in rental and short-term rental homes, offering a wide range of properties to meet diverse client needs.

name: King Size Bed | Private Bathroom | Free Parking
description:
Located in a well-maintained residential area with excellent transport links to the city centre. Just 20 minutes by bus to City Centre.

Flat is accessible via stairs only 2nd Floor (no lift access)

The Flat is shared with myself, my partner, and our lovely Fluffy Cat, so we kindly ask that guests are cat friendly.

We'll provide everything you need for a comfortable stay, along with valuable tips and local recommendations to help you make the most of your time exploring the city.

name: Cozy apartment near the City Center
description: Cozy flat in Dalry neighborhood, close to many restaurants and supermarkets. Just 10 minutes walking to Haymarket station and 20 to the city centre. Enjoy your stay in Edinburgh in a central-located place with a lovely garden views.

name: City Flat By Edinburgh Castle
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.
Flat is situated in the heart of edinburgh city center as it is just behind the edinburgh castle with back view of the monuments .its cetrally located but no noise or ongoing trafic problem. Everything is in a walking distance with great option of local food ,cafe returant etc.well connected via bus ,tram, train to go anywhere

name: Flat in the heart of Edinburgh
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located apartment beside The Meadows park. This cosy place is located within walking distance to the city gems like Grassmarket, Edinburgh Castle and Royal Mile.

name: Central Edinburgh Flat
description: Located just an 8-10 minute walk from Princes Street and 5 minutes from Leith Walk, our flat is perfectly situated for exploring Edinburgh. Enjoy a peaceful, homely space with a mini library, a spacious desk for WFH, and a cozy living room. The wraparound veranda has a BBQ. On-street parking is free on weekends, paid on weekdays. The kitchen is fully equipped, including baking essentials. This is our home, not just an Airbnb, and we hope you feel right at home too.

description: Experience comfort and convenience in this elegant double room featuring a private en-suite bathroom and tasteful décor. Ideal for couples or solo travellers seeking a quiet retreat. Just a short walk to Edinburgh's lively Grassmarket.

description: Step into comfort and charm in this warm and cosy double room, perfect for couples or solo travellers. Thoughtfully decorated with soft, neutral tones and plush bedding, this room creates a relaxing retreat after a day exploring the vibrant city. Enjoy the welcoming ambiance, natural light, private en-suite and a comfortable double bed designed for a restful night's sleep.

name: Stylish Row House Retreat With Double Bed
description: Discover the charm of Edinburgh in this delightful double room, nestled within a beautifully maintained historic guest house. With its tasteful décor, cosy atmosphere, and inviting double bed, this room offers the perfect blend of comfort and character. Located just a short walk from the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, and local cafes, this room is your gateway to the best of Edinburgh.

name: Charming Guesthouse Stay
description: Indulge in a truly charming stay in this beautifully designed double room, featuring a stunning private en-suite with a luxurious free-standing bath. Perfect for unwinding after a day of exploring Edinburgh, this elegant room combines timeless charm with modern comfort.

name: Cozy Attic Retreat
description: Welcome to The Edinburgh Guest Room, a charming and comfortable double room that promises a peaceful retreat in the heart of the city. Thoughtfully designed with a plush double bed, this room offers a relaxing ambiance for couples or solo travellers.

name: Peaceful Guest Room- Edinburgh
description: Nestled on the top floor of our charming guest house, this cosy double room offers a peaceful retreat in the heart of Edinburgh. With sloped ceilings and a warm, inviting atmosphere, it’s designed for comfort and relaxation. The private bathroom is located just outside the room, easily accessible on the same floor. Perfect for those seeking a tranquil escape, this room combines comfort and convenience for a memorable stay.

name: Double Room - Blackford area
description:
Beautifully located in a quiet area close to Blackford Hill with free parking, next to the University of Edinburgh King's building. The 2nd floor flat has views of Arthur's seat and of the Braid Hills.

Good bus routes into the City of Edinburgh within a short walking distance or a beautiful 25 minute walk.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: City Centre Apartment
description:
Basic but comfortable city centre apartment, excellent location for exploring the city on foot or by public transport.
Located in the Haymarket neighbourhood, 5 mins from Princess Street, 2 mins from Haymarket train, tram and bus links, with easy access to Murrayfield Stadium.
The apartment is on a city centre street with many restaurants and bars nearby offering excellent options for eating out and socialising.
The apartment is on the third floor of a tenement block, there is no elevator.

description: Spacious three bedroom apartment in the heart of the Old Town Edinburgh.

name: Scotapartments
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: Traditional tenement flat
description:
Ground floor flat located within walking distance to the city centre. Two bedrooms, a spacious living room and comfy beds. Perfect for a small family or friends.

The property is our family home and so is only available occasionally when we are away.

More pics to come soon.

Had to make a new listing which is why there are no reviews - all of the reviews can still be seen though if you look on my profile.

name: Lovely Stockbridge main door 1-bed apartment
description:
Beautiful super central 1-double-bed apartment right in the heart of Stockbridge. Fully furnished with lovely things - it’s a perfect place to explore Edinburgh from. Gorgeous boutique shops are all around, cafes and bars, so many relaxing walks- the water of Leith is a hop skip and a jump away, so are the botanical gardens and the famous Lannan bakery is just across the road! Transport links are amazing.
Your bedroom faces the peaceful and beautiful garden so you can have a lovely sleep 🌸🪷✨

name: Enchanting 2BD Ground Floor Flat Central Edinburgh
description:
Charming 2 bedroom ground-floor flat, just a 15 minute walk will take you to Edinburgh's historic city centre and the famous Princes Street. Boasting 2 x Double Beds / 1 x Bath / Shower / Smart TV / Dishwasher / Washer / Dryer / Work Space

Located 10 minutes walk to Leith Walk, a trendy area brimming with independent shops, cafés, bars, restaurants and more.

name: Cosy, city trendy stockbridge 1b
description:
Cozy 1-Bedroom Basement Flat in Trendy Stockbridge

Charming and spacious basement flat in the vibrant Stockbridge area, perfect for exploring local cafes, shops, and parks. The flat includes a comfortable double bedroom, modern bathroom with shower, open-plan living area, free Wi-Fi, and fresh towels. Please note: The flat is accessed via stairs and may not be suitable for guests with mobility concerns.

Feel free to reach out with any questions, Last week July all August 2025 available

name: Charming home away from home!
description: Welcome to your home away from home in our bright 3-bed flat just 10 minutes from the airport and 20 minutes by bus to the city centre, including iconic Edinburgh Castle! Enjoy a bus stop next door with services every 10 minutes. The flat features a cozy patio and garden, high-speed internet, cable TV, and a fully furnished kitchen with coffee and tea provisions. Located 5 minutes from a shopping centre. Please note, it's a no-smoking and pet-free home. Book your perfect Edinburgh getaway today!

name: Chic & Curated flat in Leith
description: Experience modern comfort in this stylish, bright and chic flat located in the vibrant heart of Leith. Recently renovated and thoughtfully curated, it blends contemporary design with cosy touches. Perfectly located near trendy cafes, bars, waterfront walks and cultural hotspots. Close to tram stops and bus stops - the ideal location for exploring Edinburgh and direct routes to the airport and train station. Your warm host is here to ensure a welcoming stay.

name: Central Georgian flat - perfect festival base!
description:
Brilliantly located, one bedroom plus double sofa bed which can be located in either of the living rooms, it comfortably sleeps up to 4. You will have exclusive use of the apartment for your stay.
Recently redecorated Georgian tenement apartment c1825.
Cosy, private bedroom with king bed. Wardrobe and chest of drawers, large windows.
Fully equipped kitchen, two living areas. Bathroom and separate toilet. Desk + monitor. WiFi + Netflix.

name: Apartment with Castle Views
description:
Relax at this cosy apartment near the city centre with stunning panoramic views of Edinburgh.

Located in the Leith area of Edinburgh there are lots of amazing options for coffee, food and drinks. Within walking distance to Edinburgh city centre and all main attractions as well as great public transport links into the city centre via bus or tram.

name: City Corner Apartment
description: This luminous and airy corner apartment boasts high ceilings, cornices, original large sash windows, and Victorian touches like an original marble fireplace. Upon entry, a spacious hallway leads to two double bedrooms, a kitchen, a generous living room, and a large family bathroom and original wooden floors throughout. The abundance of space and natural light, with the sun streaming in all day, create a truly inviting atmosphere for exploring Edinburgh. Located on Lorne Street

name: A Nice Room in Edinburgh
description: Everything you want to explore is right outside of the door of this place.

name: Luxury City Centre Apartment
description:
Enjoy a memorable and stylish experience at this centrally located apartment.

Enjoy a glass of wine whilst gazing at the majestic views over Edinburgh’s skyline, spanning from Princes Street Gardens to the St James Quarter. The beauty of the Firth of Forth and Fife is also well within view.

This is the ideal location for any visits to Edinburgh, you’ll be steps away from Edinburgh Castle, the Palace of Holyroodhouse, and an array of restaurants, cafes, shops, and cultural landmarks.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish & modern double room with patio in Granton
description:
Welcome to my stylish and modern ground floor double bedroom designed with natural colours and Scottish symbols. Bedroom has been recently refreshed with new furniture and memory comfort matterace.
Perfect connection with Edinburgh Airport (bus service 17 "Skylink" ) brings you here within 30 minutes and the bus stop is just around the corner as well as plenty of buses to the city centre (about 30 min)
Morison's superstore and Gregg's - 10 minutes walk
Seafront promenade 5 min walk.

name: Beautiful beachside 2BD apt
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Our two-bedroom apartment with double beds on a quiet street in Portobello . It boasts a fully equipped kitchen and a lovely lounge/dining area.

Just 20 minutes by bus from Edinburgh city centre, and 5 minutes walk from Portobello with its stunning beach and promenade, and excellent bars and restaurants.

name: Dochart 3 Bedroom Apartment - Edinburgh
description: Escape to the heart of Edinburgh with a stay in this charming 3-bedroom ground-floor house, perfect for families or small groups. Accommodating up to 5 guests, the property features a king-size bed, a double bed, and a single bed across its three bedrooms. The well-equipped private kitchen makes meal prep a breeze, while the cozy living room boasts a smart Tv and a dining table for gathering. The bathroom includes a relaxing bathtub, and the private garden offers a peaceful outdoor retreat.

name: A Warm and Cosy Base in Morningside
description:
Our apartment blends modern comfort with classic Edinburgh charm, offering a stylish and relaxing space for up to 2 guests. The open-plan living area is bright and airy.

The bedroom features a comfortable double ensuring a restful night’s sleep.

The bathroom is sleek and contemporary, with a towels and toiletries for your convenience.

name: Homely 2BD Flat with Garden in Central Edinburgh
description: Stay in the heart of Edinburgh’s vibrant New Town at this charming and generously sized terraced flat—just a short walk from Broughton Street’s lively cafés, Stockbridge’s village-like charm, and the trendy waterfront of Leith. With the city centre, Calton Hill, and Princes Street all within easy reach, this home offers the perfect base to explore the Scottish capital with ease. Combining classic charm with a fantastic location, this flat is a stylish city base you’ll be glad to come home to.

name: Cozy Canalside Retreat @Prime Spot & Free Parking
description: Great city centre flat, free parking, hosting up to 6 guests with brand new furnitures: comfortable double bed and memory foam mattress, and double sofa bed in the bedroom and double sofa bed in living room. 50 inch smart TV and Full fibre Wi-Fi available throughout. Bath over shower. Fully equipped kitchen. Next to Union Canal and  Meadows. Short stroll to Grassmarket, Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle, perfect for sightseeing, festivals, theatres, and restaurants. No smoking.

name: Spacious 4 DBL BR House – Group Friendly + Parking
description: Newly refurbished 4-bedroom house with unlimited free parking in a quiet area east of Edinburgh. Set over 3 floors, it features 2 bathrooms, a WC, full kitchen, fast Wi-Fi, smart TV, laundry, and a garden. Each room has a double bed, desk, and chair. Just 15–20 mins to city centre by car or 30–35 mins by bus. Direct buses to Old Town (Bus 2) and New Town (Bus 30). Easy airport access via Bus 18, Airlink 100 + Bus 30, or taxi.

name: Spacious Apartment in Edinburgh city centre
description: Spacious city centre apartment situated in central Edinburgh.  The apartment is a 10 minute walk from Waverley train station and a 5 minute walk to the tram stop to / from the Airport.  It is a short walk to St James Quarter shopping galleria and the city centre. The Playhouse Theatre is even closer as well as an excellent selection of cafes and restaurants.  Arthur's Seat and Holyrood Palace are also within walking distance with the city tour bus stopping at the end of the street.

name: Edinburgh West End Apartment
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place. Located in the exclusive West End of the city it is convenient for transport connections and close to all amenities yet has a private patio garden and access to private gardens opposite leading down to the river running through Edinburgh.

name: Not available

name: Modern Central 2 King Size Bed Flat Free Parking

It’s ideal for enjoying city live.With cafes,shops,and excellent transport links nearby,this flat offers an unbeatable blend of convenience and style, a rare opportunity not to be missed!

Situated in the heart of Bruntsfield on a quiet street, our recently renovated, peaceful flat offers the perfect balance between city exploration and relaxation. Our spare bedroom is therefore ideal for guests seeking a comfortable place to rest after enjoying everything that Edinburgh has to offer.

name: Two Bedrooms in Luxury Home
description:
Relax and unwind in this beautiful home in the leafy suburbs of Edinburgh. Guests will enjoy two double bedrooms and exclusive use of the bathroom, which has a walk-in shower and bath. Guests are also welcome to use the high-spec kitchen, utility room, dining area, WC, and outdoor seating area, which are all shared with the owner.

The property is situated beside Cammo Estate, close to Ingliston and Edinburgh Airport. There are excellent bus, train and tram links into the city centre.

name: Advocates Close Royal Penthouse
description: Stylish & private, this top-floor penthouse is located on historic Advocates Close, just steps from the Royal Mile. Offering city views and a bright, spacious layout, it's an ideal base for exploring Edinburgh. Walk to Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, the National Museum, Waverley Station, and some of the city’s best restaurants, pubs, and shops. Perfect for couples, families, or small groups looking for comfort, character, and an unbeatable location in the heart of the Old Town.

name: Beautiful room 15 min to centre,10 min to airport
Very nice room 10 min to airport,15 min to centrum
Quiet flat moments from theatre and shopping
description:
You will be staying in my flat which is in the heart of the New Town side of Edinburgh. Gayfield Square is a quiet residential area just a 5 minute walk from shops, restaurants and the theatre.

The flat itself includes a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom and bedroom that you have all to yourself.

The kitchen includes everything you need to cook comfortably. The bedroom has ample storage. The bathroom is small but functional, and I provide shampoo and other toiletries.

name: Walkable to Centre, Spacious with City Views
description:
The flat is central to the city, between fountainbridge, merchiston & slateford, it has a homely vibe in a neighbourhood surrounded by nature, away from touristy center, offering stay with the locals.

The flat is very spacious, with a large living room, bedroom, and separate kitchen. A westerly aspect provides spectacular sunsets and an open vista.

Excellent transport links:
15min walkto Haymarket station
45min tram /20min taxi from airport
20-30mins to Princess St / Castle / Murrayfield

description:
FREE PARKING | NEAR CITY CENTRE |
Located in the heart of Edinburgh, just 10 minutes from the city centre is this comfortable, cosy apartment with garden space, free parking and bus stop across the road.

The apartment comprises of 1 large double bedroom, sleeping up to 2 guests comfortably, with 1 bathroom, containing a walk-in shower. Enjoy a sizeable, clean kitchen space and breakfast. Relax in the large living area, with access to wi-fi and streaming services.

Just a 10-minute drive from the airport and 25 minutes from the city centre, our home offers both convenience and comfort. A bus stop is only a 10-minute walk away, providing direct access to the city.

description:
Super close to the beach and 15 minutes from the City centre

Very charming period style flat with a very inviting and warm interior

Finished to a high standard with lovely furniture mostly made from mango wood.

A very comfortable space for a couple or anyone looking to relax after a long day

Portobello is Edinburghs seaside town and the flat is a 2 minute walk to the main beach

Portobello is one of the most popular neighbourhoods offering an array of local independent shops and cafes

description:
A beautiful 2 bedroom en-suite ground floor flat with an additional cosy living room/office which could be used as a bedroom as I have a very comfortable large air bed, there is also a third family sized bathroom. There is a patio and free car parking.

Whilst this is my home, I do have a campervan, the dogs and I can go adventuring whilst you make yourself at home in my little oasis. Likewise, get in touch if you are just interested in renting the spare room.

name: Boutique Stay in City Centre
description: This first floor, 3-bedroom apartment with 1-bathroom and 1-ensuite is nestled in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Grassmarket. A unique blend of modern comfort and historic character. Perfect for up to 6 guests. Just a 5-minute walk from the museum and the vibrant atmosphere of Cowgate’s nightlife right at your doorstep, offering an authentic taste of Edinburgh’s spirited culture.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Webstersland Residence
description:
In the Grassmarket, peace and quiet can be hard to come by, so this flat really does enjoy the best of both worlds. Nestled at the foot of Edinburgh Castle in the heart of the Grassmarket, the flats itself has no windows facing onto the busy square so its amazingly quiet when things get lively. Its part of a secured courtyard so its safe too. In all, a very comfortable way to enjoy all that Scotland's capital city has to offer.

This third floor apartment is in a secured and gated complex with

name: Pink house in Edinburgh South
description:
Perfect Festival Base in Edinburgh
This spacious 4-bedroom house is ideal for families or groups visiting the Edinburgh Festival. Located within walking distance of the Meadows and Princes Street, with excellent bus links, it provides easy access to the city. Features include an open-plan kitchen diner, two TV rooms (one a kids’ playroom), three bathrooms (one en-suite), and a utility room. Enjoy a large garden with swings, a trampoline, and a gym.

description:
Stylish Holyrood Greens – Edinburgh
A cozy retreat near Holyrood Palace, perfect for families, workcations, or professionals! This 2-BED GROUND FLOOR apartment offers a prime location, steps from top attractions. Cabin contains one double sofa bed, desk/ workspace.

The toilet, bathroom and kitchen is outside in the house which is on the other side of the garden.

Very unique experience combining city break with tranquility and chill.

An 1890's traditional Edinburgh flat in the heart of Bruntsfield. Bruntsfield offers a plethora of restaurants, bars and cafes and is only a short walk away from the centre of Edinburgh (Old Town). The flat is perfect for those who want to come back to a cozy home on a quiet residential street yet still able to access all of Edinburgh's most loved attractions by foot.

License number: EH-81379-F

This stylish 1-bedroom flat in a residential area is perfect for couples, solo travellers, or business visitors seeking a comfortable and convenient stay. Located in the peaceful neighbourhood near Holyrood Park, the flat offers a warm and inviting space to relax after a day of exploring the city.

A lovely, quirky third floor, one bedroom apartment which is a perfect base to explore the Old Town and all of Edinburgh's historic sites - all within walking distance.
Just seconds from the Royal Mile and located on the third floor of a traditional Edinburgh apartment block built in the 1800's. The apartment is modernised with a new kitchen, bathroom and separate toilet. There's also a separate living room and double bedroom.
Equipped with everything needed for a comfortable very central stay
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

All the City Centre attractions are within walking distance and we are located less than a 5 minute walk away from Edinburgh Waverley Train Station.
We have one double bedroom, separate living room, kitchen, bathroom and some additional storage.
Wifi, heating and all the usual amenities are provided for cooking & to enjoy Central Edinburgh

Take it easy at this unique and cosy getaway suitable for 1-2 adults! We offer a very small bedroom with a double bed in a new build flat, private bathroom, plus shared common areas (kitchen/sitting room).
The neighbours are quiet and private, so this is a great spot to get a warm & restful sleep.
Whilst not right in the heart of town, it’s very accessible - 2.5 mi from the city centre - with multiple bus stops a 5 or less minute walk from the flat (and much less £ than city centre rentals!).

* Unbeatable Old Town location

* 3 minutes from Edinburgh Castle
* 12 minutes from Edinburgh Waverley Station
* 7 minutes from the National Museum of Scotland

Please note: this property faces the busy Grassmarket area in Edinburgh therefore can be noisy. We do provide earplugs.

The apartment can accommodate 3 adults maximum with one sleeping in the sofa bed
This charming suite has a shower and bath, fridge, high speed wi-fi/streaming TV and access to a rear courtyard.

name: Stylish two bedroom apartment in Stockbridge.
description:
Our home is a Grade 1 listed building built in the 1800s. A famous artist lived here and many other notable people lived on our side of the street. It's beautiful and comfortable and has everything you will need for your stay.
Whether you’re in the city for the festival or to explore the city’s rich history and culture Stockbridge is bursting with character and a charming and trendy part of Edinburgh.
There are markets, amazing restaurants, bars, pubs, parks, cafes, art, independents, ETC.

Perfectly suited for families, business travelers, or groups of friends, this stylish home provides a relaxing retreat while keeping you close to the city's top attractions.

Surrounded by fantastic eateries, it's perfect for up to six guests. It features a bright living room with a double sofa bed, 2 comfortable bedrooms, and a fully equipped kitchen. Enjoy quality linens, fresh towels, and complimentary toiletries for a relaxing and enjoyable stay. Ideal for all seeking a cozy retreat while exploring Edinburgh.

The apartment is well equipped and sleeps 4, 1 double bedroom and 1 sofa bed in the lounge, which is located next to the dining kitchen, the shower room is located directly across from the bedroom.

Fully furnished, kitchen/lounge with all white goods. Shower room recently renovated.

Easy access to both Waverley and Haymarket stations, tram and buses just steps away.


L.n.EH-83046-F

Escape to a Beautiful, Private Mews House in Edinburgh's New Town.

Nestled in a charming cobbled street, The Wee Mews offers a secluded, quiet retreat just minutes from Edinburgh's vibrant restaurants, bars, and attractions.

An original mews house which has been completely renovated into a stunning unique one bedroom apartment. It is full of thoughtful details using a mix of modern and vintage pieces collected over years to create the perfect interiors and unique guest experience.

name: Charming flat in beautiful area
description:
Sharing with a helpful host.

Beautiful location in Bruntsfield, beside parks, shops and close to the city centre.

Top bunk bed in a single room; and a double sofa bed and small double sofa bed in the living. Both in a large, spacious ground floor flat, with beautiful features and high ceilings.

Large kitchen dining area, large living area, bathroom, and study room in the single room.

There is paid parking nearby on street and in car parks; there is free parking within 500m on weekends.

name: Cosy room with Edinburgh Castle view

Enjoy a king-size bed, comfy mattress, free parking, private shower, and stunning views of Edinburgh Castle and the garden.

Just 3 min to the bus stop, 15-20 min to Edinburgh's top attractions like the Castle, Dean Village, Old Town. Your stay is in a peaceful, historical area with easy access to transport, city centre, airport, and Murrayfield Stadium.
A nature walk is nearby, and fast WiFi is included.

There are lots of restaurants, wine bars, the St James Centre and the Edinburgh Playhouse (all within a 5 minute walk).

description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. Modern, 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom. Fully furnished and equipped.

On the same floor, guests are welcome to use the fridge, kettle, toaster and microwave in the kitchen; the dining room, downstairs toilet and garden. 2 supermarkets, 2 gyms, post office, restaurant, 2 rugby clubs, takeaway, canal access and buses to town are all within a short walk.

name: 2 bedroom flat Newtown

- Restaurants, shops, and sights nearby.
