name: Male Dorm Bed Haymarket Hostel
description:
Haymarket Hostel 9-Person Male Dorm in Edinburgh’s West End.
Stay in the heart of Edinburgh at Haymarket Hostel’s 9-person male dorm, ideal for travelers looking for convenience and comfort. Situated in the vibrant Haymarket area, this well-appointed dorm offers easy access to Haymarket Train Station, a nearby tram stop, and is just a short 20-minute bus ride to Edinburgh Airport.

Dorm highlights include:
9-Person Male-Only Dorm with comfortable bunk beds
High Speed Wifi
Lockers
Communal Area

name: Private room in new build house
description: I have been a host for a 6 years plus… I just bought a new house  . The new house is 20 min away from city with car ,with train you are 12-15  min away from city centre, bus and train station 2 min away,Napier University is 11 min away ,shopping mall with lots of shops 3 min walking and cinema is 2 min away!!! Free breakfast is included ,front and rear garden check in and out anytime!!!!

name: Double room in a lovely house.
description:
Cozy Double Room in a Quiet Home – Great Location

Welcome to our clean and peaceful home in Newington! This double room in a three-bedroom house is ideal for travelers looking for a quiet stay. You’ll share with two tidy flatmates, with access to a kitchen, washing machine, and garden (smoking allowed).

Great transport links: bus stop 1 min away, shops & Cameron Toll 10 min walk. No parties, no loud noise—just a relaxing stay in a well-connected area. Message for details!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Luxurious flat in Edinburgh
description: This luxurious, spacious second floor apartment is located on George Street in Edinburgh’s New Town, just minutes from Princes Street and major attractions like Calton Hill and Stockbridge. Recently refurbished to a high standard, it features three bedrooms (king and queen-sized beds), two modern bathrooms (one with a bathtub, one with a shower), a newly furnished kitchen, and a stylish living room. This apartment offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience for your stay.

name: Female Dorm of 6 - City Based
description:
Haymarket Hostel 6-Person Female Dorm in Edinburgh’s West End.
Discover a friendly, budget-friendly stay at Haymarket Hostel in Edinburgh's West End.

This female-only 6-person dorm provides a cozy and well-appointed space perfect for solo travelers, offering both privacy and a communal experience.

With its prime location next to Haymarket Train Station and convenient access to city bus routes, exploring Edinburgh’s highlights has never been easier.

name: Female Dorm - Haymarket Central
description:
Cozy 3-Person Female Dorm at Haymarket Hostel in Edinburgh's West End.
Experience comfort and convenience in the heart of Edinburgh’s West End at Haymarket Hostel. This 3-person female dorm is ideally situated near Haymarket Train Station, airport bus routes, and just a 10-minute walk from the iconic Princes Street.

Located on the second floor, the dorm offers:

-Private En Suite for a personal space to freshen up
- Comfortable Bunk Beds ensuring a restful night’s sleep

name: Modern Studio in Edinburgh West End
description:
✔ Modern studio in the lively West End neighbourhood
✔ 451 ft2 | 42 m2
✔ 1 double bed
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Fully equipped kitchenette with all the necessary appliances
✔ 9-minute walk to St Mary's Cathedral
✔ 4-minute walk to The Usher Hall and Lothian Rd
✔ 5-minute walk to William St and Stafford St
✔ 3-minute walk to West End tram stop

name: Spacious and stylish Bruntsfield flat
description: Our spacious, bright and stylish flat is ideal for a couple, small family or small group of friends visiting Ediburgh for work or pleasure. Located in the suburb of Bruntsfield, offering plenty of local coffee shops, cafes, restaurants and boutique shops and easily accessible to the centre of town on foot or by bus.

name: Scottish ‘White House’
description:
Our large family home in Blackhall is perfect for visits to Edinburgh and beyond for families and groups.
A short journey from the airport or into town with a large outdoor space with all the ‘mod-con’s’ you will find our home a relaxing place to enjoy yourselves.
We have four large double bedrooms as well as sofa bed in the snug. A modern kitchen/diner/ sitting room, a kids play area with trampoline a sunny conservatory, large bathroom with bath and shower as well as living level WC.

name: Cosy Twin Room- Haymarket
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base. Welcome to our bright and modern twin room in the heart of Haymarket! With excellent transport links and just minutes from Edinburgh's top attractions, our space offers the perfect base for your stay. Relax in a cosy, well-maintained room featuring two comfy single beds, fast Wi-Fi, and all essentials. Perfect for friends, couples, or travellers passing through.

name: Modern Twin Room in Haymarket
description: Discover the perfect mix of comfort and convenience in our contemporary twin room, nestled in the bustling Haymarket area. Equipped with two cosy single beds, kitchenette, fresh linens, and fast Wi-Fi, this space is ideal for those looking to explore Edinburgh. Enjoy quick access to the city’s top attractions, from Edinburgh Castle to the vibrant Grassmarket. Public transport is right on your doorstep, making it a breeze to get around!

name: The King Suite - Haymarket
description: Located in Edinburgh's elegant West End, this grand apartment is our most luxurious and largest, occupying the ground floor of our beautiful Haymarket Apartments building. It is complete with a spacious bedroom with king-size bed, separate kitchen/living room with sit up bar, and a bathroom with free-standing bathtub - the perfect place to relax after a day of exploring the city.

name: Junior Suite in Haymarket
description: Welcome to our charming junior suite in the heart of Haymarket, Edinburgh! Perfectly located near vibrant cafes, shops, and transport links, this cosy retreat offers a peaceful escape with all the comforts of home. Relax in a stylishly designed space featuring a plush bed, modern amenities, and a welcoming ambiance. Whether you're here to explore the city's historic landmarks or enjoy its modern attractions, our suite is the ideal base for your Edinburgh adventure.

name: Junior Suite- Haymarket
description: Located in Edinburgh's elegant West End, a large apartment featuring high cornice ceilings, a kitchenette that separates the living area from the bedroom area and a spacious modern beautiful bathroom. Its comfortable designer sofa and white washed oak double bed make this a fabulous apartment.

name: One Bedroom Suite- Haymarket
description: Located in Edinburgh's elegant West End, this second floor apartment features lots of sunlight from six windows this room has a fresh lively feel complete with beautiful bathroom and kitchenette overlooking the city.

name: Charming One-Bed Suite Haymarket
description: Stay in the heart of Haymarket in this beautifully appointed one-bedroom suite. The apartment boasts an equipped kitchen, a serene bedroom with a comfortable bed, and a light-filled living area designed for relaxation. Enjoy the convenience of being within walking distance to Edinburgh's main attractions, including Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, and Princes Street. With easy access to public transport, this is the perfect spot for sightseeing or a business trip.

name: Central Grassmarket Apartment
description:
A recently renovated, one bedroom apartment in the heart of the Old Town Edinburgh.

Highlights include:
* Unbeatable Old Town location
* Newly renovated apartment with lots of natural light
* 3 minutes from Edinburgh Castle
* 12 minutes from Edinburgh Waverley Station
* 7 minutes from the National Museum of Scotland

Please note: this is on the Grassmarket in Edinburgh therefore can be noisy. We do provide earplugs.

The open-plan design ensures both comfort and practicality, making it a perfect choice for a relaxing stay in Edinburgh.

description:
Escape to a cosy, quiet room just moments from the heart of Edinburgh!

Bright and quiet, this room is located only minutes from The Meadows, the Royal Mile, and within walking distance of the city’s best attractions.

Perfect for singles or couples, you’ll enjoy a comfy double bed, workspace, free WiFi, and a tea/coffee station to start your day right.

With excellent transport links, affordable rates, flexible check-in, and long-stay discounts, this is the ideal base for your Edinburgh trip!

name: The Spylaw Cottage
description:
A warm and cozy house in Colinton, Edinburgh.

🏡 Apartment Features:
✔ Spacious and comfortable —— one bedroom, one living room with double bed and sofa bed, suitable for 1-3 people.
✔ Fully equipped —— with private bathroom, kitchen facilities, and private back garden to make you feel at home

🚍 Airport bus 400 direct, easy to get to and from the airport
Bus 🚌 16/45/10 direct to city centre, more convenient to explore Edinburgh
🏡 Safe and comfortable community with a perfect lifestyle for travellers travelling to Edinburgh

name: Victorian Apartment Bedroom
description: Perfect base from which to explore Edinburgh. Spare bedroom in the beautiful West End, you can hear cathedral bells and enjoy the Dean Path just 5 minutes walk away. 7 minute walk to the tram or 15 minutes walk to Princes Street. Please note, I have 2 friendly little dogs.

name: Lovely Haymarket Apartment | Central Edinburgh
description: Lovely Haymarket Apartment | Central Edinburgh

name: The Westfield Apartment
description: The Westfield Apartment is in Edinburgh, bus routes into the city centre are seconds away outside and there's many local amenities nearby (supermarkets/cafes/bars/takeaways) modern design with a large bedroom, a box room and a sofa bed.  Ideal for couples/small families visiting the city to take advantage of the many attractions Edinburgh has to offer. Street parking is available. The property enjoys a comfortable double bedroom, a box room with a single bed and a sofa bed in the living room.

name: Double bedroom in seaside flat
description: Our beautiful seaside flat is located in Portobello, a charming seaside suburb only 30 min away from Edinburgh city centre. With two miles of golden sand, our flat is the perfect place for relaxing after a busy day exploring the city. It is close to many local shops and restaurants. Ideal for travellers and people who just need the basics without the price tag of the city centre, still with easy access to the city centre. Our flat is only 2-min walk from the seafront.

name: Room in the Middle of centre
description:
A ROOM in the MIDDLE of the city is available.
There's a hill nearby, just 10 mins by foot.
Also Royal Mile is 10 mins by foot.

The flat is fully equipped with the latest equipment such as a 55" smart TV and a coffee machine.
Note, this flat is on the second floor. No lift.
Got a cat in this place so be mindful that this is an animal after all 😺 he's very friendly and likes people.

This is one room in a two bedroom flat. you have your own room and access to living room, kitchen and toilet

name: Murrayfield, Haymarket Room
description:
Located just a few minutes walk from Murrayfield Stadium on a quiet street, the room has everything you need for a city-centre stay. A short 12 minute walk to Haymarket Train Station, 8 minute walk to the Tram stop, or a 30 second walk to the bus stop where buses take you through town every couple of minutes. There is on-street parking in the area (just avoid the permit spots between 1.30-3.30pm) and park out with these spots.

I am a friendly, professional living here with my two cats.

name: Hagrid’s Hideaway - Dean Village
description:
Nestled in the historic Old Town of Edinburgh, Scotland, Well Court is a beautifully restored 18th-century tenement building that offers a unique and unforgettable Airbnb experience. This stunning apartment is perfect for couples, solo travelers, and small groups looking to explore the city's rich history, culture, and natural beauty.

Well Court is perfectly situated in the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, within walking distance to many historic sites.

The house is spread across two floors (ground and first), with a single flight of stairs connecting the levels.

There is a shared toilet-only facility, one shared bathroom with dual showerheads, and a second shared bathroom with a luxurious shower with a jet function for a spa-like experience.

description: Enjoy a unique glamping experience on Drum Estate, approx 15/20 minutes from Edinburgh’s city centre and Fringe venues. Our 5m Bell Tents include foam beds, bedding, and pillows for a restful stay. The site offers a bar, chill-out area, gaming machines, charging tables, and a firepit. With on-site parking, 24-hour security, and easy public transport, it’s a perfect retreat. Bedding is provided, with weekly changeovers, ensuring comfort throughout your stay.

name: Edinburgh Festival Glamping - Bell Tent (No2)
description: Enjoy a unique glamping experience on Drum Estate, just 10 minutes from Edinburgh’s city centre and Fringe venues. Enjoy stylish comfort with a dining area in both the kitchen and living room, perfect for relaxed meals. Nestled among cafés, shops, and restaurants, this home offers a true local experience. Whether you’re exploring the city or enjoying quiet evenings in, this bright and welcoming space is the perfect retreat in one of Edinburgh’s most sought-after neighbourhoods.

name: 5* Rated Deluxe City Centre Apartment
description:
>🅿️ Send us a message for information about parking

name: Room in Edinburgh
description:
Our Double Room with shared bathroom is designed to offer all comforts.

Featuring a double-sized bed, the room includes a writing desk/console table and seating and a wardrobe.

There is a nice bathroom with good quality shower; as well as breakfast area available in the kitchen.

The flat is just 5 minutes from The Shore and there are frequent buses to the city centre.

name: A Castle View
description:
Welcome to our stylish Home with Panoramic View of Historic Edinburgh
Our period townhouse in prestigious leafy Inverleith offers a truly outstanding view of the city, including Edinburgh Castle.
Our property in the central postcode area of EH3, also offers a blend of traditional charm and contemporary elegance. Sleeping six guests in comfort, and style.
A garden stone wall borders the tranquil expansive nursery gardens of the Royal Botanic Gardens of Edinburgh.

name: Beautiful old town hideaway
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place with great views throughout.

The property is in the heart of Edinburgh’s infamous old town, letting you fully immerse yourself in the rich and vast history of the city. The history and the hustle and bustle of the city really lets you soak in the fantastic vibes.

The apartment is close to all major amenities and is a stones throw away from all bars, clubs and restaurants, always providing you with an option to enjoy the city some way

name: Cosy traditional cottage in historic Dean Village
description: Nestled within the iconic Well Court of Dean Village, this charming former mill worker’s cottage offers a peaceful escape from life’s stresses. Situated beside the Water of Leith and surrounded by cobbled lanes, quaint bridges and storybook stonework, it blends history and romance just minutes from Edinburgh’s vibrant heart. Well Court built in the late 1800's around a vital communal water source stands as a testament to the area’s fascinating heritage and enduring community spirit

Just minutes from the vibrant Easter Road and Leith Walk, you're a 15-minute walk to the city centre or a 6-minute walk to tram and bus stops—offering direct airport access. Enjoy a stylish space, fast WiFi, Sky TV and Netflix, a super-king size bedroom, small double bedroom and a private balcony. Plus, benefit from free private underground car parking and a lift.

description:

You will be just steps away from all the iconic attractions, festival venues, bustling shops, quirky cafes and top-notch restaurants. The studio is tastefully decorated with contemporary furnishings to ensure a comfortable and relaxing stay.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Fettes - Homely 2BD in Quiet Development
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: Cosy City Centre Gem
description:
This top floor central apartment on the bustling Lothian Road will be the perfect base to explore Edinburgh.

A cosy, compact one bedroom apartment with loads of natural light.

It's only a short walk from the tram stop that connects directly to Edinburgh Airport.

Take a 5 minute walk to the Usher Hall or Edinburgh International Conference Centre (EICC). Or a short stroll (10/15 minutes) to Edinburgh Castle or Princes Street.

name: Royal Cres - Luxurious 4 bed Apt
description:
Our stylish and spacious 4 bedroom apartment is centrally located in the beautiful and peaceful Royal Crescent, Edinburgh.

Recently refurbished to a very high standard and retaining original features, we have 4 large bedrooms, 2 bath rooms (1 is an ensuite), a stunning kitchen and a lovely lounge.

The apartment is a short 10 minute walk from St. Andrews Square/Harvey Nichols and a further few minutes to Waverley train station so it is perfect for exploring the City of Edinburgh and beyond.

name: Slateford 2 Bedroom Apartment - Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our charming 2-bedroom apartment in Edinburgh, the perfect retreat for small groups, couples, or families seeking a comfortable and convenient stay in the city. This well-appointed property accommodates up to 5 guests, offering a cozy and private space for a memorable visit.

name: 3 Bed Central New Town Flat
description: Welcome to our cozy retreat on Frederick Street, right in the heart of Edinburgh! This charming apartment offers a perfect blend of historic charm and modern comfort. Enjoy a spacious living area, a fully equipped kitchen, and comfortable bedrooms. Just steps away from iconic landmarks, shops, and restaurants, you'll have the best of Edinburgh at your doorstep. Ideal for couples, group traveler's, and business visitors. Book your stay and experience the magic of Edinburgh!

name: Caledonia Spence. Scottish Flat
description: Simple Scottish inspired flat in Historic Mill Village, Juniper Green. Take a break and unwind at this peaceful flat with stunning walks and view's along the Water of Leith and the Pentland hills. Main bus link to Edinburgh City and Edinburgh Airport. Golf courses in the area are Dalmahoy, Baberton and Kings Knowe. Heriot Watt University is a 6min drive, 26min on bus and 28min walk from flat as well.

name: Modern Main Door Flat Edinburgh
description:
A modern and comfortable 2 Bedroom main door flat in Polwarth Area, with a fully equipped kitchen, Professionally serviced, Hi-speed internet, TV and bright living area
→ Ideal for families, group of friends
→ Fresh linen, towels provided
→ 2 double beds and a Sofa Bed and sleeps up to 5 people
→ Walk or cycle along the Union Canal towpath which runs from Edinburgh to Falkirk.
→ The flat is centrally located very close to small convenience stores and coffee shops and walking distance to town.

name: 1 bed apartment in Edinburgh
description: Sunny, quiet 1-bed flat in Slateford, Edinburgh. Perfect for exploring! Quick access to city centre, Murrayfield, Haymarket train station, and Edinburgh Airport. Abundance of supermarkets and diverse food options within walking distance. Relax in a bright, peaceful space after a day of sightseeing. Excellent transport links ensure a seamless stay. Enjoy the convenience and tranquility of this well-located apartment.

name: Colourful flat, 2 bedrooms
description:
Our cosy, lived-in family home is perfect for exploring Edinburgh or relaxing indoors. Tram and bus stop at the end of the street for easy access to Waverley Station and Edinburgh Airport.

Features two large bedrooms, comfy, colourful sofas, a shared garden, and a futon for a fifth guest. We have a dog, so if you have allergies, this may not be the best fit.

name: Georgian style private room
description:
We are a family of five, we have a wee chihuahua who loves people!
Please note the bathroom is not en-suite but it’s yours while you are staying with us, there is just hand towel in the room so please bring your big towel with you, if you have a limited space in your luggage we can provide you with one at an extra charge of £1 per towel .The room in on the first floor of our house. We are a very flexible family so if you need anything specific please do not hesitate to ask. ☺️
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Bright Room in a Spacious Two Bedroom flat
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm double-bed room in a modern home near the beautiful Pentland Hills. Perfect for nature lovers, hikers, or city explorers, this room offers a peaceful retreat with easy access to Edinburgh city centre and the airport – just a 2-minute walk to the bus stop.

Excellent transport links – buses to city centre & airport nearby
Cosy indoor fireplace for relaxing evenings
Lovely patio & fire pit – perfect for unwinding outdoors

name: central, en-suite double
description:
Double bed with en-suite shower, in centrally located flat with great transport links, local amenities and beautiful green spaces.

Use of shared kitchen in this friendly, modern flat. The room benefits from a large built in wardrobe, desk and stylish decor.

Easy distance to city centre and all major attractions, transport links are versatile in this area. It's a short 10 minute walk to the Meadows or 5 minutes to Blackford Hill.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Comfortable Bedroom
description:
The room in My flat offers a bright, peaceful, and comfortable stay in a family-friendly environment. The private bedroom is modern and spacious, with a king-size bed, wardrobe, and small table. You’ll have access to the kitchen and a shared bathroom, used only by me and my son, ensuring a quiet and homely atmosphere.
Located in a safe and well-connected neighbourhood, the flat is just a 15-20 minute walk from Edinburgh’s main attractions, including Waverley Station, and the Royal Mile.

name: 3 Rooms 5 guests Edinburgh Central with Kitchen
description: Located at central Edinburgh, which is just an 11-minute walk to Waverley Train Station, 9 minutes to Holyrood Palace, and 5 minutes to the historic Royal Mile. Within walking distance of the airport bus. Located next to the Old Town, Arthur’s Seat, and Dynamic Earth.

name: Luxury Apartment at Edinburgh
description: overview: Nestled in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic and cultural district, this stylish two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment is the perfect retreat for visitors seeking comfort, convenience, and elegance. Ideally located near the Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace, and the Scottish Parliament, the apartment offers breathtaking views of the iconic Arthur’s Seat and Salisbury Craggs. With Waverley Station just a short walk away, you’ll have easy access to the city's best attractions.

name: The Kings Stables
description:
A two-bedroom first floor flat located in the heart of Edinburgh Old Town, Grassmarket. This location is situated perfect, walking distance to Princes Street, Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle.

Enjoy breathtaking views of Edinburgh Castle from this stunning property. It offers a unique opportunity to experience the city’s beauty right from your window.

name: Entire cosy flat in Edinburgh
description:
Cosy funky ground floor flat within a peaceful, centre area near the canal. Near coffee shops, bars, restaurants, and parks! <3

1 bedroom has a super king size bed, a large chest of drawers and a built-in wardrobe space.

The living room is cute and cosy, where you can choose to relax on the sofa in front of the TV, or utilise the desk space to work.

The kitchen is fully equipped, so you can cook all of your own meals and wash your clothes. You can use all of the appliances.

Self check in!

name: Apartment
description: Welcome to my cosy little apartment. When booking this apartment you  will have the living room/kitchen and the bedroom. The sofa turns into a double bed. You will also have access to kitchen and bathroom. I will be on standby at any point if you need anything.

name: Super Central, Large 3 Bed Home
description:
This is a large and extremely central flat, yet it is very quiet for a comfortable nights sleep at the end of a long day. It comfortably sleeps 5 people (king size double, twin room, single room). Accessed via a private courtyard, tucked back off the cobbled stones in the centre of New Town and a 5 minute walk to Stockbridge. Guests LOVE this home due to it's location and size.
2 bathrooms are included in this property and you will need nothing while staying.

name: spacious apartment at the west end of city centre
description:
This spacious apartment is ideally located in the heart of Edinburgh's vibrant city centre.
Located within walking distance to Haymarket Train Station, with easy access to Murrayfield Stadium and Festival venues . Airport connections, tram and bus services along with an abundance of bars and restaurants are on your doorstep. Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle are only a short walk.
Finished to a high standard, enjoy the stunning traditional features of this well-equipped city escape.

name: 9-1 NetherLiberton Court
description:
Newly renovated apartment, located on the second floor, living room + kitchen + two bedrooms and bathroom, good light, living room is floor-to-ceiling Windows, good view and view.
* Room with new Standard Double queen bed, new writing desk.
* The house is equipped with refrigerator, washing machine, dishwasher, oven, microwave, drain rack, kettle, clothes rack, lamp and other facilities.
* 3 minutes walk to the large shopping mall Cameron Toll shopping Centre, banks and supermarkets
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Home in Edinburgh near the beach
description:
Perfect for those working or visiting Edinburgh for an extended stay during the festival. With a flexible layout, this home adapts to your needs while offering plenty of room to relax and unwind.

The outdoor space features a decked area and covered gazebo, creating the perfect spot for morning coffee, al fresco dining, or unwinding in the fresh air.

A short distance from the city, you’ll have easy access to all its attractions while returning to a comfortable retreat at the end of the day.

name: Boutique York Place Apartment, Central Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our beautifully refurbished, boutique apartment.

Experience the perfect blend of historic elegance and modern comforts in this exceptional Edinburgh retreat.

description:
>🅿️ Send us a message for information about parking

>🚶 15 minute walk to city centre
> 💨 Tram Stop 10 Minutes From Property
> 🏰 Direct Connections to All Of Edinburgh's Historic Sites including Murrayfield stadium.

name: The Neuk ~ A Modern Annex in Edinburgh
description:
Nestled in the heart of Edinburgh, our modern 1-bedroom annex is attached to our family home, with its own front door entrance, via a shared garden path.

The Neuk location will allow guests to enjoy easy access to a wide range of restaurants, high street shops, and entertainment facilities just 5 to 20 minutes away via excellent public transport. If you are feeling a little adventurous, you can also explore some stunning beaches on the East Coast with a 45 minute train journey away.

name: Spacious city center main door flat
description:
This spacious flat provides easy access and walking distance to Edinburgh's top attractions, including Edinburgh University, Royal Mile, and Edinburgh Castle, Old town.

The kitchen is fully equipped with all the essentials for preparing meals, and the flat also boasts a washing machine and WiFi.

There are 3 bed rooms and 1 living room, it can accommodate up to 7 guests. The furnitures are basic but clean and comfortable to stay.

name: Charming & Quiet  Apartment
description: Enjoy a peaceful stay in this third-floor apartment, perfect for business or leisure. Featuring self-check-in, a spacious lounge WiFi, and a fully equipped kitchen, it offers modern comfort. Sleep soundly in a double bed, single bed (extendable), and a sofa bed. Free parking on request,  and great transport links complete this ideal city retreat.

name: Stunning Edinburgh flat
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for couples.

name: Edinburgh’s Traditional Victorian Cottage
description:
Feel the exclusive impression of the 19th century traditional, Victorian era cottage within the Edinburgh city centre.
Where tranquility is combined with the historical value of our cosy cottage, carefully designed and furnished with the finest touches.
Your family will be close to everything what Edinburgh might offer when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: Cheerful Stays: Modern Flat 1BR
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. A lovely, bright cottage like hidden gem in the heart of the vibrant leith  area. Modern apartment, tastefully decorated with fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. ground floor main door Flat is situated next door to lots of good resultants and local buzzing streets. A prime location for all the local bars and restaurants but set back from the street and to the rear of the building so a quiet space.

name: Cosy central flat near canal
description:
I’m a tour guide in Scotland. I open my house to guest when I’m away on specific weekends.

You will be staying in my home, not a professional Airbnb/hotel owner. But the prices I offer and much lower than what you will find in central Edinburgh. I created a cosy space to unwind and will ask that you take care of my home like you would with yours.

Although she will not be in the flat when you are staying in, it is a cat ruled house…If you’re wondering why there is a cat tree😊

description: JOIVY Haymarket offers a stylish and homely experience for our guests to unwind and relax. Our cosy en-suite rooms provide everything you need for a comfortable and pleasant stay, including free Wi-Fi. Located in the centre of Edinburgh in a traditional Victorian townhouse, directly across from Haymarket Train Station and only a 20 minute walk from Princes Street. The famous Old Town, The Royal Mile and The Water of Leith are easily reached by foot or a short bus ride away.

name: Charming Studio Suite with Modern Comforts
description: Our Studio Suites offer more than your average hotel room, providing a larger open-plan space with a kitchen/dining area, a relaxing sofa, and a dedicated workspace. With ultra-comfortable beds, they’re perfect for both business and leisure.

description:
Our Studio Suites with a terrace go above and beyond the typical hotel room, offering a spacious open-concept layout complete with a kitchen/dining area, cozy seating, and a designated work area. Featuring luxurious beds, our suites are ideal for both work and relaxation.

Please note that access to a limited number of Studio Suites may require the use of stairs.

The living area is thoughtfully designed for relaxation and features a comfortable sofa, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining space.

description: Our Executive 1 Bedroom suites are designed with ample space and elegance. These well-lit interiors come with a sizable work space and entertainment area, a separate bedroom with luxury linen, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The rooms are astutely furnished with bespoke artwork by local artists.

name: Stylish 1-Bedroom Executive Suite with Terrace
description: Experience the ultimate in comfort with our Executive One Bedroom Suite. This spacious suite offers a separate bedroom for added privacy, making it the perfect choice for travelers seeking extra space and comfort. The living area is designed for relaxation, featuring a cozy sofa, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining space.

name: Executive Two Bedroom Suite
description: Our Two Bedroom Suites boast two separate bedrooms, ensuring ample space and privacy for all. The living area is thoughtfully designed for relaxation and features a comfortable sofa, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining space. Plus, the added convenience of two bathrooms makes it even more convenient for everyone.

name: Ensuite room 5 minutes from city
description:
This stylish, comfortable and spacious room is a fantastic place to stay. Great transport links from the airport and into the city centre to explore this wonderful city.

It’s situated on the tram and bus routes that take you directly into the city centre in 5 minutes.

It is also a 5 minute walk from Murrayfield Stadium, so ideal for rugby weekends or concerts.

We are also a short walk away from the O2 Academy.

name: GuestReady - Charming home in Edinburgh
description: This 2-bedroom apartment offers a comfortable and convenient stay in Edinburgh. With modern amenities, a fully equipped kitchen, and spacious living areas, it's ideal for families. The apartment is well-connected to public transport and located near local cafes, restaurants, and shops, providing easy access to the city's main attractions.

name: Cosy 2-bed flat with patio
description:
Cosy and clean 2-bed ground floor flat with private patio area. Situated in a quiet neighbourhood with easy access to city centre. Walking distance from Arthurs Seat/ Queens Park, and Portobello.

Private patio has seating / dining facility. There is also a garden behind the patio, shared with other building tenants.

Free on street parking.

Morrisons supermarket less than 5 min walk away. Tesco Express 10 min walk.
Frequent buses 4/5/44 straight into town/ city centre.

name: GuestReady - Unique hideaway in Edinburgh
description: This 2-bedroom apartment offers a comfortable and convenient retreat in the heart of Edinburgh. Featuring modern amenities, a fully equipped kitchen, and spacious living areas, it's perfect for couples or families. Enjoy easy access to iconic landmarks, shops, restaurants, and public transport, making it an ideal base to explore the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: cozy getaway in Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to our bright and cozy top-floor flat with views of Arthur’s Seat. Set in a charming traditional stone building, it’s a peaceful retreat just 20 minutes’ walk from the city centre, 15 from Holyrood Palace and close to vibrant Leith and Easter Road.
Bus stops just around the corner and the tram is 12 minutes away
Inside, you'll find fast WiFi, washer/dryer, smart TV and everything you need for a comfy stay.
Free street parking nearby.
A perfect base for exploring Edinburgh

name: Cosy-Free Parking-12mins Centre
description: Comfortable and well-located, this one-bedroom flat is just 12 minutes from the city centre, with free parking nearby. While some noise from the main road may be heard, the space remains cosy and welcoming. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, a stylish living area, and all the essentials for a hassle-free stay. Perfect for couples, solo travellers, and business trips. Shops, cafés, and public transport links are within walking distance.

name: King-size bed in big bright room
description: Lovely big bright room in a beautiful Victorian apartment, includes period details and furnishings and brand new, king size bed and mattress. Great neighbourhood location - with cafes, bars, restaurants and supermarkets on your doorstep and the meadows and the city centre a short walk away.

name: Georgian New Town Luxury Apartment
description:
Fabulous spacious bright, light apartment with open views to Royal Park garden and Calton Hill. A few minutes walk to St James Quarter and Edinburgh's city centre with amazing shops and restaurants.
Every room is beautifully presented with stylish furnishing and providing generous space.
The Georgian apartment has many original features, high ceilings, cornices individually designed,
There is a modern dining/ cooking kitchen ideal for any type of get together, friends, family and guests.

name: Little Juniper Lodge
description: Little Juniper Lodge is set in the sought after conservation village of Juniper Green which is a short bus (25mins) or car (15mins)  journey from the centre of Edinburgh. This property is ideal for families, couples or friends looking to visit Edinburgh. The stunning Water of Leith walkway is a 2 minute walk away, which also gives access to the Pentland hills & many well mapped walks. Heriot-Watt University is 2.3 miles away.

name: Holyrood Hidden Gem-City Centre 4-Bedrooms
description: Welcome to Holyrood Hidden Gem, your stylish retreat in the heart of Edinburgh! Located in the Holyrood area of the City Centre, our freshly refurbished (March 2025) 4-bedroom apartment offers a perfect blend of modern comfort and city convenience. Ideal for families and groups of friends. 24 Hour Self-Check-In, ensuring your arrival is stress-free and suited to your schedule. 🅿️Free car parking is available for our guests at the NCP Holyrood Road multi-storey car park.  *Strictly no parties*

name: Secluded Brewery Apartment next to the Royal Mile
description:
✔ Lovely 2-bedroom main door flat located in Edinburgh’s historic Old Town, the neighbourhood offers a mix of medieval charm, iconic landmarks, cozy pubs, and vibrant culture, all just steps from The Royal Mile.
✔ 65.5 m2
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom

name: Modern Apartment in Leith
description:
Welcome to your home in the heart of Edinburgh! This bright and modern one-bedroom flat features a comfortable double bedroom, a private bathroom, and a fully equipped kitchen. The living area includes a sofa that opens up into a bed, allowing the flat to comfortably sleep up to four guests.

Located within walking distance of top attractions, shops, and restaurants, it’s the perfect base for exploring the city. Enjoy fast Wi-Fi, fresh linens, and all the essentials for a relaxing stay.

name: West End Grosvenor Lux
description: This chic spot in Edinburgh's sought-after West End is an ideal retreat for couples or a relaxed business trip. Its prime location ensures you're just a minute away from the Tram, train, bus, and taxi rank, making exploring Edinburgh a breeze. Stylish decor & comfortable amenities create a welcoming atmosphere, perfect for unwinding after a day of sightseeing or meetings. Whatever the plans in the city, getting around couldn't be more convenient to enjoy everything Edinburgh has to offer!

name: Sea view holiday apartment
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: 2 Bedroom Flat in Edinburgh
description: Top floor flat situated in the heart of Edinburgh. Spacious, comfortable property in an ideal location for exploring Edinburgh with most central attractions within a walkable distance. Situated just off Leith Walk there are numerous bars, restaurants and cafes a stones throw away. Mcdonald Road tram stop is located round the corner which gives direct access to Edinburgh Airport and Murrayfield Stadium as well as other areas of the city.

name: Double Bedroom with En-suite & Free Parking
description:
1 double bedroom with en-suite in a 2 bedroom flat, in an excellent location.

Central location - City centre, Waverley train station, Holyrood park and most tourist attractions are 15 minutes drive away. Portobello beach is 11 minutes drive away. All areas are very accessible by public transport, with bus stations right outside of the block.

A range of shops within a walking distance, e.g, Lidl, Tesco Express and other corner shops & takeaways.

Both rooms will have locks.

name: Comfortable room close to city centre
description:
Forming part of a peaceful courtyard, our home is quietly located just off the busy Mayfield Gardens Road in the popular residential Newington area, south of the city centre.

Enjoy excellent bus connections to all major attractions in Edinburgh, including bus 3, 7, 8, 29, 31, 37, 47, and 49 (Mayfield Gardens stop). Reach the historic Old Town in 15 minutes!

We'd love to welcome you into our home. You will be staying in a comfortable bedroom with a king-sized bed and a premium mattress.

name: Town central modern flat
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Private room + en-suite
description:
Bright Private Loft Room in family home with Modern En-Suite by the Beach

Welcome to our home in Portobello, Edinburgh’s seaside neighbourhood.

The room is bright, quiet, and furnished for comfort, with a cosy bed and soft linens.

We’re a family of four — myself, my husband, and our two little girls (ages 1 and 2) — and we love welcoming guests to our home.

name: 89 The Merchants Little Mill
description:
Welcome to TheMerchants89 luxury apartments in the heart of Leith, Edinburgh. This new redevelopment of a historic listed building exudes opulence and modern elegance, offering the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.


Located in the vibrant energy of Leith, guests can indulge in an array of delights right at their doorstep; with the newly finished tramline just a stone's throw away, you can effortlessly travel to and from the airport and the bustling city centre.

name: City Centre Large Ensuite Room with Stunning Views
description:
Elegant large room in a traditional Victorian townhouse in Edinburgh’s West End.

Enjoy a private ensuite, a comfy king bed, and stunning views over the city skyline.

Large bay windows fill the space with natural light.

A peaceful and stylish base for exploring the city.

name: The Cooperage on the Shore
description:
The shore in Edinburgh has been rated by TIME Magazine within the top 4 coolest neighbourhoods in the world to live in. We are spoilt with fabulous restaurants, bars, cafes and deli's.

Sunny one bedroom flat in converted Whisky Bond with private parking. Kitchen/Livingroom, bathroom, and bedroom. Lots of beautiful original features. This cosy property is designed to have home comforts and lots of quirky touches.

Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located property.

name: Meadow Muse Residence
description: Meadow Residence, our charming apartment provides a serene retreat with a touch of local culture. Enjoy picturesque views and the convenience of a central location, perfect for both leisure and business travelers. This cozy sanctuary offers modern comforts within a tranquil environment, making it an ideal base to explore or unwind. Experience Edinburgh's unique charm from this delightful home away from home. Ideal for those seeking both peace and proximity to the city's vibrant life.

name: Kaimes Bright Garden Getaway
description:
Welcome to Kaimes Bright Garden Getaway, a modern and bright 4-bedroom, 2-bath retreat nestled in the tranquil hills of Corstorphine, only 15 minutes by bus to the centre of Edinburgh.

This spacious property offers an ideal blend of comfort and serenity, featuring an open-plan living space, large windows that fill the home with natural light, and stunning garden views.

name: City Center I Sleeps 4 I Parking
description: Discover modern urban living at its finest in this stylish 2-bedroom residence located in the heart of Edinburgh. Situated less than 2 miles from the city centre, this home boasts modern design elements and impeccable craftsmanship throughout. Enjoy spacious interiors featuring sleek finishes, a well-appointed kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, and a cosy living area perfect for relaxation or entertaining guests.

name: Royal Mile Neighbour Apartment
description: Stay in the heart of Edinburgh! Our spacious 2-bedroom apartment is just a 3-minute walk from the historic Royal Mile, making it the perfect base to explore the city’s rich history, vibrant culture and stunning architecture. Make yourself at home and enjoy all that Edinburgh has to offer right at your doorstep!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Modern Edinburgh 2 bed Apartment
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Offering city views, the apartment is located in the trendy Shore area of Edinburgh.

The apartment is composed of 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

The apartment is situated less than 5 minutes from the Tram stop with fantastic travel links to Airport, Edinburgh city centre and Royal Yacht Britannia.

name: Delightful 1-BR Apt with Private Entrance
description:
Enjoy our beautifully renovated apartment on Inverleith Row, a stone's throw from the Royal Botanic Garden. Located in one of the charming neighbourhood, you'll find peaceful, leafy streets and easy access to all the city's attractions.

-Double bedroom
- Fully equipped kitchen.
- Spacious living room.
- Short walk to Botanic Garden and attractions in the New Town.
- Beautiful interiors and finishes.
- Restaurants, shops and sights nearby.
- Good bus links to other part of the city.

name: Modern flat near City centre!
description:
Enjoy a comfortable stay in this stylish and conveniently located flat, just a short walk from Haymarket and Edinburgh’s vibrant city centre. Perfect for couples, small groups, or business travellers, this ground-floor home offers easy access to local attractions, restaurants, and shops.

With excellent public transport links right at your doorstep, getting around the city is simple and stress-free. Nearby supermarkets like Lidl and Co-op make it easy to grab essentials during your stay.

name: Contemporary flat perfect for couples & families
description: Modern two-bedroom, two-bathroom flat in the heart of Edinburgh on Leith Walk. Located within walking distance of shops, restaurants, and excellent transport links (5 minute walk from tram stop, 20 minute walk from Waverly Train Station) it offers convenience and comfort. This stylish property features a spacious open-plan living area with a fully equipped kitchen, two well-sized bedrooms (one en-suite), and contemporary bathrooms.

name: The Cosy Closes | Free Parking Onsite | Old town
description:
Enjoy stylish living in this centrally-located second-floor flat in Newington. Free parking is available right at your doorstep in a private car park ( request permit)

With an unbeatable location, you’re just a 10-minute walk from the high street, home to coffee shops, bars, and restaurants. Arthur’s Seat is a 5-minute walk away, perfect for outdoor enthusiasts.

This apartment is ideal for couples, families, or friends, offering comfort and convenience with easy access to Edinburgh’s sights.

name: New Town Georgian w Modern Interior on Heriot Row
description: This newly renovated (2025) 2-bedroom basement flat on Heriot Row offers a stylish and bright living space with a perfect balance of modern design and comfort. Period features abound and the property enjoys great soundproofing for such a central location. It is a high end family home with no expense spared on the refurb. The location is second to none with all attractions easily reachable on foot and an abundance of restaurants and bars within easy walking distance.

name: Comely Bank Coorie
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, recently-renovated stylish space located in an old traditional building in the affluent and bustling area of Stockbridge, Edinburgh.

A great place to base yourself for your trip to Edinburgh and surrounding areas. At only around 15-minutes by bus to the centre of Edinburgh and Waverly train station, the property is surrounded by shops, cafes, bars & restaurants - everything you will need for an enjoyable stay.

name: 1 Bedroom Apartment-Free Parking
description: Welcome to Leith, Edinburgh's historic port district, where maritime heritage meets a vibrant modern scene, offering tourists a rich blend of culinary delights, cultural experiences, and waterfront charm. The apartment is located on the Ground Floor with Direct Entrance and there is Free Parking right next the building. One bedroom with a King Size Bed and a Sofa Bed in the Living room. Free WiFi, Smart TV, Free Toiletries, Fresh Bed Linen & Towels comes as standard.

name: Bright, clean room in Leith with a view
description:
Make some evocative memories at this comfortable and well connected base. Gaze at stunning views of Arthur’s Seat, Calton Hill and Water of Leith from your bedroom window.

Leith is a destination in itself but transport links make travel in Edinburgh easy including City Centre, Murrayfield, Airport and The Royal Mile.

You can walk to the city centre in 25 minutes!

The apartment is near the visa centre. I am a transport guru so please ask for directions to anywhere and I will try to advise!

description:
✔Stylish 3-bedroom apartment located right in the heart of Edinburgh’s West End. The flat offers bright and spacious interiors, ideal for professionals or friends.

name: Main Door Quiet Studio Flat
description: Quiet located studio flat. Main door. Bedroom & Kitchen off living area. Separate Shower/Bathroom. Small private grass area outside with Bench. Flat has a bath but only for use during showering as hot water tank isn’t big enough to fill bath. Please note parking in on street parking flat doesn’t have its own dedicated space. Excellent bus service into city.  Walking distance to shore area. Cycle route close to flat.

name: Edinburgh Retreat 2 Bedrooms & steam room
Extended family home
description:
Self-catering extended family home is located in Edinburgh, just 1.4 miles from Portobello Beach and 2 miles from Arthur's Seat. This apartment provides free private parking and free Wifi. Edinburgh Waverley Train Station is 2.9 miles from the apartment and Edinburgh Playhouse is 2.9 miles away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

name: Homely 2BD Flat, Heart of Edinburgh
description: Delightful and bright, step into this 2-bedroom flat in the heart of Edinburgh’s vibrant Leith Walk area. Just a short walk or bus ride to Princes Street, the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, and Holyrood Palace, while Leith Walk itself is bustling with diverse eateries, traditional pubs, and shops. Nearby, you’ll also find theatres, galleries, and live music venues, along with supermarkets, excellent public transport links, and peaceful green spaces. Book now and experience Edinburgh like a local!

name: Cosy room close to city centre
description:
Forming part of a peaceful courtyard, our home is quietly located just off the busy Mayfield Gardens Road in the popular residential Newington area, south of the city centre.

Enjoy excellent bus connections to all major attractions in Edinburgh, including bus 3, 7, 8, 29, 31, 37, 47, and 49 (Mayfield Gardens stop). Reach the historic Old Town in 15 minutes!

We'd love to welcome you into our home. You will be staying in a comfortable bedroom with a king-sized bed and a premium mattress.

name: Edinburgh Festival Glamping
description: Enjoy a unique glamping experience on Drum Estate, approx 15/20 minutes from Edinburgh’s city centre and Fringe venues. Our 5m Bell Tents include foam beds, bedding, and pillows for a restful stay. The site offers a bar, chill-out area, gaming machines, charging tables, and a firepit. With on-site parking, 24-hour security, and easy public transport, it’s a perfect retreat. Bedding is provided, with weekly changeovers, ensuring comfort throughout your stay.

name: Elegant Flat in a Serene Edinburgh Neighbourhood
description:
Two bedroom flat located in a peaceful neighbourhood. There is fresh bedding in each room to ensure a comfortable night sleep.

Close proximity to Edinburgh Zoo and beautiful Pentland hills (good for hiking and skiing).

The place is a short walk to the tram, which you can take to get to Edinburgh city centre and airport in < 19 mins. Supermarket is walking distance.

name: Lovely room in Edinburgh centre room 2
description:
This cozy private room is located in a flat just a 15-minute walk from Princes Street and Waverley Station.
You’ll have access to a shared kitchen and bathroom, fully equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay.

Why you’ll love it here:
✨ Superb Location – Easily reach Edinburgh’s top attractions on foot.
🚉 Excellent Transport Links – The tram and bus stops are just steps away, making airport transfers and city exploration effortless.

name: Festival - Edinburgh Canongate
description:
Edinburgh Festival Flat for Rent - a Perfect Location!

Looking for the ideal place to stay during the Edinburgh Festival? This modern, fully furnished 2-bedroom flat is available for rent in the heart of the city, just a short walk from major venues. Enjoy a spacious living area, fully equipped kitchen, and free WiFi - perfect for relaxing after a day at the festival.

Prime location a close to theatres, bars, and restaurants
Sleeps up to 3 guests.

name: The Ice House
description: The spacious and comfortable 3-bedroom Ice House Apartment is set in a peaceful residential area, just a 5-minute walk from the SS Explorer. A real highlight is the tram stop located just outside, offering easy access to all the city’s main attractions. Plus, you’re only a 2-minute stroll from the vibrant bars and restaurants along the shore - making it an ideal base for both comfort and convenience while exploring the area.

name: Colourful Edinburgh flat
description:
Cozy, light-filled flat in Leith, ideal for solo travellers or couples. West-facing windows bring in beautiful sunsets.
Enjoy a well-equipped kitchen, comfy living area with sofa bed, wood-burning stove, projector, and a snug bedroom. Small bathroom with a one-person tub. Quiet area, 5-min walk to tram, close to cafés, shops, and a dog-friendly park. Access to shared garden. A perfect Edinburgh base!

name: Ladystairs 1,Royal Mile, 150m to Edinburgh Castle
description:
Ladystairs is a second floor apartment in a listed building on the Lawnmarket (the top section of the famous Royal Mile) and is approximately 150metres from Edinburgh Castle. This self-catering apartment is furnished and decorated to a very high standard to make your stay in Edinburgh as comfortable as possible.

The apartment is a pleasant walk to many other major Edinburgh attractions such as the Royal Scottish Museum and the National Gallery of Scotland.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Ladystairs 2,Royal Mile, 150m to Edinburgh Castle
description:
This self catering apartment is in a superb location on Edinburgh's Royal Mile, less than 150 metres from Edinburgh Castle. There are many attractions within a short walk including museums and attractions as well as restaurants, pubs and cafes. The flat overlooks the writer’s museum at the rear and the courtyard where Robert Burns once lived. At the front the flat overlooks Lawnmarket on the Royal Mile.

An ideal base from which to enjoy Edinburgh's many attractions.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming two story apartment.
description: This charming apartment is located in the historic Duddingston Village.  Near Arthur’s seat and Duddingston Locke.  Lots of beautiful walks and ‘The Sheip’s Heid,’ Edinburgh’s oldest pub is a 5 minute walk.  There is a lot of public transport nearby and you can reach the city centre within 20 minutes.  The property is on two floors and boasts a tv bed in the upstairs bedroom.  Historic property with original fireplace.  The property is situated in a private courtyard with great views.

name: Scotland Street Stylish Garden Studio Pvt Entrance
description:
Why Choose Scotland Street for Your Stay in Edinburgh?

This stylish garden studio apartment has been fully refurbished to an exceptionally high standard. Surrounded by windows overlooking a beautiful, classic, and tranquil garden, it offers a peaceful retreat in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic New Town.

Located just a 5-minute walk from the nearest tram stop, you can reach the apartment quickly and easily from the airport—so you’ll be relaxing in this charming setting in no time.

name: West Bow (Victoria St) just off Royal Mile
description:
West Bow is in the heart of the World Heritage site of the Old Town of Edinburgh. This truly magnificent 2nd floor (no lift) apartment is located on the famous & much photographed West Bow/Victoria Street of Edinburgh.

It is only 150 metres from entrance to Edinburgh Castle at the top of the Royal Mile. The apartment is only a few minutes walk from many other major Edinburgh attractions such as the Royal Scottish Museum and the National Gallery of Scotland.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Royal Mile Escape-Free Parking
description: Experience Edinburgh at its best from this ideally situated main door flat. Nestled at the foot of the Royal Mile—directly opposite the Palace of Holyroodhouse and Arthur’s Seat, and just steps away from the Scottish Parliament—you’ll be perfectly positioned to explore the city’s most iconic landmarks. Enjoy the convenience of local shops, restaurants, and bus stops within walking distance. Plus, take advantage of free private parking on-site and free on-street parking from 18:30 to 08:30.

name: Charming Apartment near Dean Village
description:
✔ 2 bedrooms
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Well-equipped kitchen with all necessary appliances
✔ Free parking available
✔ 11-minute walk to Fountain Park
✔ 15-minute walk to Dean Village
✔ 16-minute walk to Edinburgh Castle
✔ 5-minute walk to Haymarket train station
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7

name: Entire Apartment in Edinburgh
description:
A modern apartment centrally located in Edinburgh. Within walking distance of excellent dining, coffee shops, pubs, tourist attractions and transport links. Ideal for short breaks, business travel, local holidays, remote working, or as a comfortable base for discovering Edinburgh's many highlights.

Licence No: EH-83086-F

name: City Lights Apartment
description:
Ground floor, centrally located, this cozy apartment offers you everything you require to have an unforgettable visit to the capital of Scotland.
10 -15 minute walk to Edinburgh City center.

Fantastic cafe's, restaurant, bars and shops on your door step

name: The Boho Bide|Old town|Newington|Ground floor
description:
The Boho Bide — a stylish, laid-back retreat with eclectic charm and cosy touches. “Bide” means to stay or dwell in Scots—a warm nod to your home away from home.

This cosy 3-bedroom GROUND floor apartment is set in Newington, Old town. A vibrant, culturally rich area of Edinburgh. just a short walk from the Pleasance Courtyard, Royal Mile, and top Fringe Festival spots. Perfectly placed for exploring the city’s culture, history, and charm.

name: Castle Wynd - 1BD Castle View on Royal Mile
description: Located next to Edinburgh Castle, this bright apartment offers stunning views and is in the heart of the Old Town. Ideal for the Edinburgh Festival and city sightseeing, it's close to bars, restaurants, museums, and beautiful architecture. Princes Street and George Street are just a 10-minute stroll away. The apartment is on the ground floor accessed by a few steps. 24-hour bus service from the Royal Mile makes getting around the city easy.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Central 1 bed home (new listing)
description: Centrally -located botanics flat very close to both Edinburgh New Town and Stockbridge

name: Cozy 2BR Retreat | City Centre
description: Step into comfort and convenience with this stylish 2-bedroom apartment, ideally located in the heart of Edinburgh. Just a 5-minute walk from Haymarket Train Station, you’ll find yourself surrounded by vibrant restaurants, cozy bars, convenient supermarkets, and easy access to transport links. Thoughtfully designed with modern finishes, a fully equipped kitchen, and inviting bedrooms, it’s the perfect base for business trips, family getaways, or unforgettable city adventures.

name: Luxury City 5* Retreat - Lux Spa Bath - Romantic
description:
Welcome to the luxurious setting of this 1BR 1BA oasis with Jacuzzi Tub ideally situated mins from Princes st & The Royal Mile, from where you can marvel at the stunning views of Edinburgh. Immerse yourself in the high-end ambience of our brand-new city oasis and enjoy the opulent settings while being just a few mins walk away from famous historic landmarks

✔ Luxurious King Bedroom & Jacuzzi Bathroom
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Smart TVs
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi

name: B&B Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our cozy and stylish flat located in the heart of Edinburgh’s lively Viewforth neighborhood. Situated on St Peter’s Place, our home offers easy access to the city’s main attractions, with the Union Canal, Bruntsfield Links, and a variety of cafes and shops just a short walk away. Ideal for couples, families, solo travelers, or business visitors seeking a comfortable and convenient stay in Edinburgh

name: Spacious 2-BR Apt with Private Entrance
description:
This bright and inviting 2-bedroom apartment on Inverleith Row is perfect for a short holiday escape. Set in the Inverleith Conservation Area, it’s just an 8-minute walk from the Royal Botanic Gardens. With convenient public transport nearby, exploring Edinburgh’s city centre is easy.

- 1 double bedroom, 1 single bedroom, 1 sofa bed
- Compact kitchenette
- Modern, spacious living room
- Elegant interiors
- Near the Royal Botanic Garden
- Efficient public transport links

name: Bright & Modern Entire Central Edinburgh Apartment
description:
A charming and colourful 1-bedroom top floor apartment, situated on a quiet street in Edinburgh’s elegant New Town and city centre, this apartment is perfect for exploring Edinburgh’s many attractions.

- Located on the top floor of a traditional Georgian townhouse at Cumberland Street.
- A quick walk from Princes Street and Waverley Railway Station.
- Modern furnishings with plenty of natural light.
- Fully-equipped kitchen.
- Restaurants, shops and sights nearby.

name: Cosy Master Bedroom wth Parkview
description:
This comfy master bedroom is part of a newly renovated home and has everything you need for a relaxing stay. There's plenty of wardrobe space to unpack and settle in, plus a clean, modern feel throughout.

The room gets lots of natural light and has a calm, neutral style. Perfect for resting after a day out or working remotely in peace.

name: Peaceful home in Edinburgh
description:
Unwind in this stylish one-bedroom home, thoughtfully furnished for your comfort.

Situated just 20 minutes from the city centre, the property is tucked away in a peaceful cul-de-sac with excellent transport links and easy access for drivers. You'll find everything you need close by, including supermarkets, shops, coffee spots, restaurants, a gym, and a cinema.

The home features a bedroom, living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a main bathroom, a convenient downstairs toilet, and a back garden.

name: Quiet room in vibrant Bruntsfield, private parking
description: Lovely flat with excellent local amenities of Bruntsfield on the doorstep.  Within walking distance of both old and new town (circa 20-30 mins)

name: Casa luminosa en Edimburgo norte
description: Apartment with separate entrance, private garden with barbecue and dining area. The apartment has a spacious room with a queen size bed.  A bath with bath. Large kitchen with everything you need for cooking and laundry area.  And lastly, living room with sofa bed, and work area.  The area where the apartment is located is very quiet, with free street parking. There are several supermarkets in the area (Lidl, Morrions, Scotmid) and a pharmacy and health center.

name: Home by The Meadows, close to City Centre
description: Located just outside the city center, this lovely flat is perfect for families/friends who wish to explore Edinburgh and enjoy the peaceful greens.

name: Classic on Clerk St - Edinburgh
description:
Overlooking The infamous Meadows of Edinburgh on the one hand yet an easy walk to the popular hub of the Grassmarket festive outdoor activities and cafes leading up onto The Royal Mile. Partake in The Meadows Fringe Festival activities or take a trip to Arthur’s Seat, Holyrood Palace and the King’s Gallery.

Easy bus routes to all the tourist destinations.

We have 3 large rooms and 4 beds. We can sleep 8 on request. The large kitchen has a dining table and there is also a cosy tv room to relax

name: Entire Spacious 2-BR Apartment in City Centre
description:
This is a bright and spacious 1st-floor 2-bedroom apartment located nearby city-centre New Town, placing you perfectly to explore the best of what Edinburgh has to offer. Whether you’re looking to venture into the Old Town or New Town, convenient public transport links make it easy.
- A fully-equipped kitchen with dining area
- 1 king-size and 1 double bedroom
- Centrally located nearby Haymarket and the West End
- Spacious living room

name: Cosy cottage flat in central Edinburgh
description:
Room in peaceful wooden flat with private garden - perfect chilled home for your stay in Edinburgh!

25 min walk from Haymarket station and 35 min to princes st, excellent bus links into town too.

The space is shared with me (the owner) and my dog Ozzy! He’s a well behaved dog.

Let me know if you want advice on parking.

Shared kitchen, shared bathroom and living room

name: Victorian Villa with parking, Murrayfield-sleeps 5
description:
Nestled in the prestigious Murrayfield area this beautiful Victorian villa offers the perfect blend of classic charm and modern comfort.

With your own private entrance, 2 spacious bedrooms, a luxurious bathroom, inviting sitting room with a sofa bed you will have plenty of room to relax.

Guests also have access to a front garden and a private driveway for a car.

Located minutes away from Murrayfield Stadium and close to public transport this is an idyllic base to enjoy Edinburgh.

name: Lovely 3Bd on the Royal Mile
description: It's impossible to stay in a more centrally located flat in Edinburgh - positioned on the Royal Mile, between the castle and Holyrood Palace. Close to all amenities and transport, walking distance to Edinburgh’s main attractions, and perfect for exploring the Fringe. 3 double bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, comfortable sitting room and modern kitchen in this 19th century listed building. Set on the 2nd floor, so easy to access and far enough away from the street to limit noise.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Wonderland
description:
Hi,

Welcome to my humble home! This a new listing, I have partnered up with Edinburgh's best co-hosts to ensure you are getting the best stay you possibly can.

This is a clean, safe and quiet neighbourhood, I hope you'll keep it in that way.

PLEASE RESPECT OUR NEIGHBOURS !
AND
QUIET HOURS IN BETWEEN 22:00 - 8:00 !

Enjoy your stay at Wonderland, if you have any questions please feel free to ask ;)

The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Bright and Cosy Meadowbank Apartment
description: Enjoy your stay in Edinburgh at my cosy apartment located in lively and urban Meadowbank, within easy reach of the City Centre. The traditional Scottish space provides a comfortable and relaxing home with excellent access to bus routes, city centre attractions, cafes, bars and restaurants. There are lovely outdoor areas nearby at Holyrood Park and Arthur's Seat, perfect for a morning stroll. Several restaurants, bars and brunch places can be found in the area.

name: City Centre-Ideal Home for Visiting Edinburgh
description:
An immaculate apartment in the very heart of Edinburgh city centre. Walking distance to old town and castle

Bedroom 1
A bright and spacious room featuring a 4.2-meter-long sofa and a sturdy bunk bed—ideal for families or groups. Enjoy entertainment on a 70-inch touchscreen TV. This room accommodates 3 adults.

Bedroom 2
A warm and well-appointed room furnished with a double bed, a comfortable sofa, two study desks, and a wardrobe. Suitable for up to 3 adults.

Kitchen & Dining room

name: Clean and convenient flat
description:
Stylish, fully renovated central flat with herringbone floors and brand new kitchen, boiler and fully compliant.

Includes a spacious double bed within the living room, cosy single bedroom, full kitchen with dishwasher, oven, washer/dryer, and a bathroom with tub and shower. Fast Wi-Fi and heating throughout. Quiet building with keypad entry system.
Perfect for long stays, remote work, or exploring the city. Walk to shops, cafés, parks, and public transport.
Please message me for any info.

name: The Annandale Apt, Stunning Luxury Home, Sleeps 6
description: As soon as you walk through the main door of this ground floor, three bedroom home, you will know that it is special.

name: Peaceful 1 Bed Getaway in Restalrig, Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our lovely 1-bedroom flat located on Loaning Road, just a short distance from Edinburgh’s vibrant city centre. Perfect for couples, solo travellers, or business guests, this cozy space offers a peaceful retreat with excellent transport links, local amenities, and the charm of a classic Edinburgh neighborhood.

name: Thistle & Tide
description:
Escape to Thistle & Tide- a bright, peaceful seaside flat just a short, direct bus ride from Edinburgh's vibrant Fringe venues.
Enjoy stunning Firth of Forth views, beachfront walks just minutes away, and a spacious, homely interior with a king size master bedroom, second bedroom room/office (flexible to suit your needs), and a cosy living room with a large sofa bed.
The perfect balance of festival excitement and coastal calm awaits.

name: Charming flat close to centre
description:
Our flat is a fun place located in a lovely part of town with nice cafes and corner shops on the doorstep. There's a park less than a minute's walk away and you can walk to the city centre along the canal and through the Meadows, barely touching a road!

There is one bedroom with a double bed, a second bedroom with a comfortable futon and we can put out an airbed in the sitting room. The kitchen has 2 ovens and hob, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine. If you have allergies, we have pets.

name: City view studio by Fraser Suites
description: Discover the stunning beauty of Edinburgh from our Studio Premier apartments, which offer breathtaking views of the city's Old Town, known for its rich history and charm. Each apartment features a comfortable work desk and a well-equipped kitchenette, complete with a microwave, sink, refrigerator, and a Nespresso coffee machine.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Gorgeous double by Fraser Suites
description: The petite 19 sqm Fraser Suites Edinburgh Classic Deluxe double room is ideal for a quick business trip or a weekend getaway for single travellers or a couple. Available in double or twin room types and located on the lower ground floor, these hotel rooms in Edinburgh also come with a study area, kitchenette and a walk-in shower or bath. This makes it the perfect choice for those in search of an ensuite room to rent in Edinburgh.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: City view double by Fraser Suites
description: Enjoy the beauty of Edinburgh from our Classic Deluxe Double Room at Fraser Suites. With stunning views of the Old Town's historic spires and lively streets, these 19 sqm rooms are ideal for business trips or weekend getaways for solo travellers and couples. Available in double or twin configurations, each room features a study area, kitchenette, and a walk-in shower or bath, making it a perfect ensuite option with a view.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Homely studio by Fraser Suites
description: The Studio Executive is ideal for guests seeking a comfortable studio apartment in Edinburgh. Located on the lower ground floor, guests can enjoy a spacious living area, a work desk and a well-equipped kitchenette. It's the perfect choice for any kind of traveller.
