name: Comfy twin by Fraser Suites
description: You’ll feel right at home in your Classic Deluxe Twin Room, which comes complete with everything you need for a great stay in Edinburgh. The room, on the lower ground floor, features twin beds, a kitchenette with a fridge and an icebox, L’Occitane amenities, a shower or bath with a heated towel rail, and more.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: The Wheel House - Private Front door+Free Parking
description: Welcome to The Wheelhouse – A stylish 2-bed ground-floor apartment on the waterfront in Leith. Features king beds, large sofa bed, private entrance (no shared access), free parking, and modern design. Steps from the Royal Yacht Britannia, Ocean Terminal, Leith’s top restaurants (incl. 3 Michelin-starred), and only a 5 minute walk to  the tram—just 10 mins to city centre. The perfect base for exploring Edinburgh in comfort and style.

name: Ground Floor Main Door Old Town Flat Near Castle
description:
Welcome to our stylish, newly renovated apartment in the vibrant heart of Edinburgh! Just a 4-minute stroll to Princes Street, Grassmarket, and Fringe venues. Neighbours include Lyceum Theatre and Usher Hall. Nestled among top restaurants, cafés, local markets, and excellent transport links.

A spacious city retreat sleeps up to 8, featuring 3 elegant bedrooms with flexible bed arrangements—ideal for families or groups. Ground floor access with only 2 steps.

Your unforgettable stay starts here!

name: Spacious Two Double bedroom apartment
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place.
Good base for exploring Scotland with free parking. Very good access to city center which is just 20 mins away.
Airport - 10 mins away
Bus stop just 100 m from apartament. Another 4 bus stops 200 m away
Shopping center with bank, post, many shops, barber, gym, cinema, pub and restaurant. Is just 200 m away.
Fast broadband
Netflix
Live tv

name: Elegant Central City Retreat
description: Stay in a charming and spacious flat right in the heart of Edinburgh. Step outside to find cafés, shops, and restaurants, or stroll through the Meadows to reach the Old Town. Excellent bus links are nearby too. The flat has a comfortable living room and a large kitchen to relax or cook in. Your private room is compact but functional, with a single bed and everything you need for a restful stay. A stylish, central base to enjoy beautiful Edinburgh on foot.

name: Near Tram! Edinburgh City Centre 2 Rooms + Parking
description:
Convenient - Edinburgh city centre!

Steps from restaurants, pubs, and supermarkets!

1 min walk to Balfour tram/bus (direct airport link)
15 mins walk to Calton Hill & St James Quarter
25 mins walk to the Royal Mile

Two-level layout with 2 double beds & 2 bathrooms

Spacious living/dining room

Includes FREE PARKING! (It can be hard to find parking in the city centre😉)

Note: 3rd-floor walk-up (no lift - many Edinburgh flats have no lifts).

name: Cosy one bedroom flat in centre of Edinburgh
description:
This special place is perfectly located making it easy to plan your visist. It's only 15 minutes walk from most iconic Edinburgh places like Royal Mile , Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, Arthur Seat or Princess Street.

You will have flat for yourself but since people in this building need to sleep at night or have small children- no loud music or partying is allowed! But then, there is no need to bring party home - you have everything you need just outside the door within 15 minutes walk!

name: Edinburgh Skylight - Elegant City Centre Home
description: Beautifully restored Victorian home blending period charm with modern comfort. Full of natural light, featuring three elegant bedrooms, spacious living room, bright open-plan kitchen/dining with underfloor heating and quality appliances, bathroom, WC, laundry room, luxury furnishings, and stylish fittings. City centre location, near amenities, landmarks, the University, and scenic parks.

name: Private room close to the city centre and nature
description: Minimalist bright double bedroom with light throughout the day and a stunning view of the Pentlands.

name: The Edinburgh Castle View Suite, Princess Street
description:
Chic apartment with Iconic Edinburgh Castle Views

Stay in the heart of Edinburgh on Castle Street just off prestigious Princes Street, with breathtaking, north facing views of the Castle.

This stylish, step-free studio is perfect for a romantic escape or solo city break, surrounded by top shops, bars, and restaurants.

Your five-star city retreat awaits.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Lovely studio flat close to city
description:
Our newly renovated studio flat is a lovely base for your holiday to Edinburgh. Our compact lounge / bedroom with separate kitchen and shower room has everything you need to make the most of your time here. Easy walk or bus ride from Haymarket with some lovely bars and restaurants close by, we offer a convenient and clean space to stay.

City of Edinburgh Licence number EH-83114-F

name: 3BR | Mid-Century Near City Centre w/ Free Parking
description:
Stylish, spacious 3-bed flat perfectly located for the Edinburgh Fringe! Free underground parking. 13 mins bus ride from the Haymarket and city centre.

Fully licensed flat.

This beautifully decorated home and workspace has everything you need—fast Wi-Fi, smart TV, full kitchen, and all amenities.

Well connected by public transport, it’s ideal for Fringe performers, festival-goers, families or anyone looking to explore the city in comfort and style.

name: Beautiful attractive home fre parking near Airport
description:
Relax with peaceful Spacious bungalow, with two-bedroom kingsize beds. located in Corstorphine Edinburgh , a five-minute drive to Edinburgh City centre, and only 5 minutes drive to Edinburgh Airport.

The property itself has, two large bedrooms with king size beds, a large peaceful lounge and a 55" smart TV. High-speed internet, with free on street parking

This property is at the high end of quality in the marketplace.
Ideal for the whole family to stay at this beautiful peaceful holiday let.

name: Bright & Elegant Portobello Stay
description: Stylish one-bedroom flat on Portobello High Street, just a short stroll from the beach. Ideal for professionals, business travellers or small families. Features a modern kitchen, open-plan living, comfy sofa, full bathroom with bath and rainfall shower, plus separate WC. Free on-street parking available. Close to cafés, shops and direct links to Edinburgh city centre. Enjoy coastal charm with all the comforts of a well-equipped city base.

name: Buck 'N Ben
description: Take a break and unwind at this peaceful oasis. A little peace of paradise away from the city centre hubub but within a short commute. Surrounded by lovely woodland and hill walks and only 20 minutes by bus into the city centre. A real oasis of a retreat in Edinburgh.

name: Melville Street Townhouse
description:
Stunning 4 bedroom Georgian Townhouse with lovely garden & free private parking.

Located in the heart of Edinburgh's prestigious New Town's West End, this exquisite 4 bedroom Georgian townhouse on Melville Street offers a blend of period elegance and contemporary style. The property boasts four spacious double bedrooms, each accompanied by an en-suite bathroom with shower, providing ample privacy and luxury for residents. The whole property was renovated and restored only a few years ago.

name: Well Court Cottage-Dean Village
description:
Step back in time in our charming flat, located within the historic Well Court of Dean Village—a quiet oasis in the west end of the city centre.

Its warm cottage-like vibes, art-filled walls, antique decor, wooden ceiling, and a wood-burner stove make it perfect for cosy evenings.

Experience a stay in this 19th century landmark and send greetings to your loved ones on one of our unique postcards (photographed by us) using a dip pen and ink—just like a Victorian traveller.

name: 2BR Flat by The Shore
description:
Relax in this stylish, well-located 2-bedroom flat in the heart of Leith’s vibrant Shore district.

Set just steps from Leith’s waterfront, you’ll be surrounded by top-rated restaurants, cosy cafes, and unique shops. Great public transport links make it easy to reach Edinburgh city centre, historic sites, and festivals. This space offers comfort, style, and unbeatable convenience.

Perfect for couples, families, or business travelers!

name: 34 Simpson loan
description: This house is located in Edinburgh Cosmic Center, and there are many restaurants and supermarkets downstairs. It is very convenient to go to various scenic spots.

name: 2 bedroom, 4 beds -Grassmarket
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stunning flat,New Town, Edinburgh-perfect location
description: Luxury flat in the heart of New Town with tennis courts to the rear & leafy garden to the front. Bellevue Crescent is a 10 min walk to the city centre and a 2 min walk to the Water of Leith linking George V park & vibrant Stockbridge. A min walk away is bustling Broughton Street which is inundated with excellent restaurants & bars, Broughton Market & butcher, fishmonger, live music pubs & boutique shops. The property itself is quiet, peaceful & in the most perfect location to explore Edinburgh.

name: Charming City Retreat-Sleeps 6 with private Garden
description: Discover Edinburgh from this cosy, family-friendly home just 20 minutes from the city centre. With comfortable beds, a fully equipped kitchen, and plenty of space to relax, it’s the perfect base after a day exploring the castle, museums, and local parks. Enjoy the private garden, free parking, fast WiFi, and easy self check-in. Sleeps 6 – your home away from home for the whole family.

name: Sun room  - Ryehill on Leith
description:
The sunroom - A sunny room on the 1st floor of a beautiful double upper colony townhouse situated in East Edinburgh.

Situated in East Edinburgh, perfect for those looking for a quiet retreat from the busy / noisy centre that’s still within easy reach.

I live with my cute dog - she loves people so much and absolutely a sweetheart - however if you are not fond of dogs she can stay elsewhere over short stays.

You will share the bathroom with one other person.

name: Haymarket apartment-Ideal for the festival
description: This well-presented second-floor flat in Haymarket offers a great base for exploring Edinburgh, within walking distance of the West End and city centre. Ideal for visitors or professionals, it features a welcoming hall with secure entry and storage. The spacious living room has traditional Edinburgh Press and Cornicing. The well-equipped kitchen includes a hob, oven, microwave, and washing machine. The bedroom offers built-in storage, with a modern shower room and separate WC.

name: Get cosy at the Coorie Inn
description:
Unusual self contained flat adjacent to main house. Recently refurbished from a late Georgian fruit store. Free on-street parking. Excellent public transport links to city centre& Portobello beach: adjacent bus stops for reliable service to the city centre; 10min walk to trams; 40min walk to city/ beach.
Small lounge with TV and stove; kitchenette with fridge, microwave, toaster, blenders and instant boiling water tap; shower room; small bedroom with Kingsize bed, clothes hanger, and storage.

name: Brunstane House - 15 mins to City Centre
description: Welcome to Brunstane House! Discover tranquility & convenience just 15 mins from Edinburgh's vibrant centre, or a quick 10 min train ride. Enjoy free parking & explore with ease. Our open-plan kitchen & dining area, with modern appliances & garden views is perfect for dining altogether. Relax in the cosy living room with Smart TV. With stylish bedrooms, en-suites, & a charming garden with patio, Brunstane House is ideal for families or groups. Experience luxury & comfort for your Edinburgh stay!

name: Central Edinburgh Private Garden with Parking
description: Hey! Are you looking for a beautiful, safe, clean and affordable accommodation styled to your taste and needs? Great! WHERE TO STAY APPARTMENTS is just like it! Business travels, family trips, holiday stays, Relocation, long-term and short-term stays, We cover all this plus we always aim to deliver the best experience to our lovely guests! Check us out and book a stay with us!

name: Leith Walk 1 Bedroom Apartment
description: Hey! Are you looking for a beautiful, safe, clean and affordable accommodation styled to your taste and needs? Great! WHERE TO STAY APARTMENTS is just like it! Business travels, family trips, holiday stays, Relocation, long-term and short-term stays, We cover all this plus we always aim to deliver the best experience to our lovely guests! Check us out and book a stay with us!

name: Stunning Stockbridge Charm! Edinburgh's hotspot!
description:
Lovely, charming room in the beautiful and peaceful and centrally-located area of Stockbridge!

The flat is just a street back from the midst of bustling shops, cafes, bars, restaurants and minutes walk from Edinburgh City Centre (8 mins) BotanicGardens (5 mins)

Quiet surroundings but just a hop away vibrant stocky B! One of the most beautiful parts of Edinburgh

Walking round is easy, safe and pleasurable. The apartment is ideal for individual, couples and business travellers

name: Entire Georgian Flat @ the Foot of Leith Walk
description:
Be one of the first to stay at our apartment on the Foot of the Walk in Leith. Offering one of the best and rare views in the city, looking up the full length of Leith Walk to Calton Hill.
The tram stop is just outside the flat with direct transport links to the airport and the city centre.
You’ll be right beside the local's favourite pubs and restaurants in Edinburgh’s - a more authentic Edinburgh vibe that’s a little less touristy. Just a stone’s throw from the Shore and the Water of Leith.

name: Roseburn Retreat 2B FREE Parking
description: Enjoy this modern 2-bedroom apartment with a fully equipped kitchen, cosy living area, and free private parking. Set near a main road for easy access (some traffic can be hard), it’s just a short walk to the tram, Murrayfield Stadium, and 10 minutes from Haymarket by foot. Perfect for city breaks, work trips, or event weekends, with everything you need for a comfortable stay in a quiet, residential setting.

name: Pilrig Heights 2 Bedroom Apartment - Edinburgh
description:
This charming and well-presented Edinburgh flat comfortably hosts up to 4 guests, making it a perfect base for couples, families, or small groups exploring the city.

There are two beautifully furnished bedrooms—one with a king-size bed and the other with a double bed. One of the bedrooms includes an ensuite bathroom, providing added privacy and convenience. Each room offers a quiet and restful space to unwind after a day of sightseeing.

name: The Jewel Box, Luxury 4 Bed 3 Bath Penthouse Apt
description: This unique place has a style all its own.

name: Central Cosy Room in Quiet Area
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Elegant and eclectic boutique residence
description:
Beautiful pied a terre in the heart of Edinburgh's UNESCO heritage New Town.

We would be delighted to welcome you to this peaceful and stylish haven. Only two streets away from famous George and Princes Street yet it feels miles away from the hussle and bussle of city life.

Your own boutique place sits amid Georgian splender with Queen Street Gardens across the road, full of trees to bring bird song to the mornings and dappled light in the evenings.

name: Luxury 5 Bed 7 Bath Retreat Edinburgh with Parking
description:
Welcome to our 5-bedroom detached home, located in the heart of Edinburgh. Features five large bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom.There is a bright and contemporary open-plan kitchen, dining, and living area.
There's also a separate lounge for quieter moments, and a balcony offering a peaceful spot to enjoy the fresh air.
A fully enclosed private garden, outdoor seating, children’s playhouse, trampoline, swing set , off-street parking, and a driveway for up to three cars.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Central Edinburgh Private room with en-suite.
description:
Welcome to your cosy and stylish private en-suite room, perfectly located just minutes from the heart of Edinburgh. Situated within a family home, this beautiful space offers complete privacy with its own entrance and secure key safe access. The internal door to the main house remains locked at all times to ensure complete privacy and independence during your stay.

Ideal for single guests or couples, the room features a luxurious king-size bed, a comfortable sofa, TV, a kettle and fridge.

name: The Humble Gem in City Centre
description:
Spacious bright newly renovated 2 bedroom flat, perfect for family with kids and friends. Close to all amenities, short bus/tram away from downtown. 2 double beds in bedrooms and a futon sofa bed in living room. Comfortable hosting up to 4 and maximum capacity 6.

Free street parking outside. Walking distance to holyrood park, royal mile and old town. Lochend park short walk away, supermarket Lidl and frequent bus routes etc are just around the corner with shops, bars and restaurants nearby.

name: Spacious 2BR  Ground Floor Apt in Edinburgh
description:
Designed with style, this luxurious 2-bedroom apartment is situated on Upper Gray Street in the Newington area in Edinburgh. You’ll find the perfect balance between a peaceful residential area and the bustling Edinburgh city life. You’re ideally placed with excellent public transport links nearby.
- 1 king-size bed and 1 double bed
- Fully equipped open-plan dining and kitchen space
- 0.6 miles to the University of Edinburgh (Old College).
- Local shops and supermarket nearby.

name: Spacious 3-BR Ground Floor Apt in Edinburgh
description:
This ground-floor holiday apartment with a private entrance is located in the heart of Edinburgh and one of the most sought-after residential areas near lively Marchmont and Meadows.

- Stylish, comfortable, and convenient 3-bedroom apartment that can accommodate up to 6 guests.
- Short walking distances to the cafe, bakery, restaurants, green-grocer, supermarkets, park, and Old Town.
- The Edinburgh Old Town is only 15 - 20 minute walk.
- Ideal for leisure and business trips.
- 1386 sq ft.

name: The Cozy Lodge. 3.5 miles away from city center
description:
Welcome to your home away from home! Nestled in a quiet, safe neighborhood, our cozy and comfortable flat is perfect for families or anyone seeking peace and relaxation.

With spacious living areas, a fully equipped kitchen, kid-friendly amenities, and thoughtful touches throughout, this home offers everything you need for a restful stay. Nearby parks, Museums, and family attractions are just minutes away, making it the ideal spot to explore and create lasting memories

name: The Courtyard Apartment
description:
Enjoy a stay in our centrally-located courtyard apartment, just 10 minutes from George Street & 5 minutes walk to Stockbridge. Less than 2 minutes to the popular tourist spot, Circus Lane.
Our newly refurbished apartment is both spacious and modern with a private courtyard with seating & lighting.
The whole space has been lovingly restored with a high end dining kitchen & stunning shower room.
The kitchen includes all mod cons plus a wine fridge.

name: Private Retreat with Garden, Near Western General
description: Welcome to Sheil-In', a serene and stylish studio hosted by Joe and Sheila in leafy Craigleith Hill. Unwind to the gentle sounds of nature and relax in the charming shared garden with their friendly and well-behaved dog and cat. The studio has a shower room, a well-equipped kitchenette with microwave and air fryer, and a comfortable living area with a sofa bed and workspace. Ideal for visiting the Western General Hospital, Fettes College, Inverleith, and Stockbridge, with excellent transport lin
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: West Edinburgh - Bright, Stylish 2BD with Parking
description:
Newly renovated, bright and modern 2-bedroom apartment suitable for couples or families in a quiet area with easy access to Edinburgh City Centre, Murrayfield, Edinburgh Airport. Lovely communal garden area and free private car parking on site.

Nearby walking paths to Corstorphine Hill, Local Pubs & Restaurants and Edinburgh Zoo. Regular Bus Services to/from Edinburgh City Centre, Edinburgh Airport and Murrayfield Stadium - a perfect location for Music Concerts or Scottish Rugby Matches.

name: lovely bungalow, sunny garden
description: Home from home. You will have at your disposal, a sunny south facing private garden with outdoor dining space, private parking, 2 bedrooms with super king size bed and small double sofa bed, spacious living room and fully equipped kitchen, sky TV/broadband, ample storage. Located conveniently close to a large park, train station (9 minutes to city centre), bus stops (10 minutes to airport, 25 minutes to city centre), tram stops, Tesco and Lidl supermarkets within walking distance. Welcome!

name: Truly Central, Princes St near Castle
description: Quiet Mews flat right in the centre of Edinburgh, 4 minutes walk from Princes St. Easy access to many trendy bars, restaurants and popular tourist attractions (10 minute walk from the Castle steps, art galleries and theatres). Close to the airport bus and tram lines. Your Juliet balcony overlooks the cobbled peaceful lanes of 1800 Edinburgh. Perfect accommodation for the Edinburgh Festival, Christmas and New Year.

name: Cosy Double Room near City Centre
description:
Peaceful Double Room with Kitchen and Garden Access.
Relax in a bright double room in our quiet Craigmillar home—just 20 mins from Edinburgh city centre in frequent bus routes. Includes private bathroom, light kitchen use, garden access, and free on-street parking. The room features: double bed, desk and spacious wardrobe. Book a 5★ massage on-site via Samsara Deep Relax. Great for solo travellers, couples, or co-sleeping families.
STL Licence No: EH-86799-F - EPC Rating C

name: P & N Apartments
description: Wake up inspired to explore from this charming beautiful centrally-located apartment, featuring two double rooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a bathroom, and a private free parking space.  Many surrounding amenities, and a bustling nightlife, making it a desirable place to stay.  We are at the main bus root, and its walking distance 3min to Supermarket, 15min to Princes Street, 10min to Old Town, and 16 min to the Edinburgh Castle to enjoy the panoramic view.  Welcome to Edinburgh!

name: Charming 1 bed - prime location
description: This charming, traditional Scottish home is nestled in the vibrant Tollcross area of Edinburgh, just a stone's throw from the iconic Meadows—Edinburgh's central hub during the renowned Fringe Festival. Conveniently located only a 15-minute walk from both the tram stop and Haymarket train station, you'll also find bus stops just around the corner, making it easy to explore all corners of the city.

name: Comfortable room with views and balcony
description: This is a centrally located room in a comfortable apartment in a quiet residential area on the edge of the UNESCO-listed New Town. The room has an en-suite bathroom and a balcony with outstanding views of Calton Hill, Arthurs Seat and the Castle. We are treated to such sweeping views because we are on floors 3 and 4. On the other hand, being on these levels isn't so good from the accessibility point of view so please consider this. We also have a friendly cat - we hope you aren't allergic!

name: Modern,Ground floor 2 Bedroom Flat
description:
Modern and well-located two-bedroom apartment in the heart of Leith , close to shops , cafes , and public transport . The property includes a bright living room , fully equipped kitchen , two comfortable bedrooms , and a modern bathroom. Ideal for professionals & small families seeking easy access to the city .Edinburgh Playhouse and Royal mile nearby.
With free WiFi, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

name: Large Victorian Apartment
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Cosy room with view
description: You will be close to everything when you stay at this comfortable room in a quiet residential area on the edge of the UNESCO-listed New Town. The flat is on Floor 3 and has sweeping views of Calton Hill and Arthur's Seat. On the other hand, it is a long walk up the stairs (no lift) so this is something to consider. We have a friendly cat - we hope you aren't allergic!

Very regular buses and trams into city centre in under 15 mins.

Beautiful parks nearby or walk along the Water of Leith to famous Dean Village, stunning views.

Local restaurants within 10 min walk.

description: Spacious 2-bedroom flat in central Edinburgh, located on the third floor of a traditional building on Lochrin Place. Features a bright living room, separate kitchen, one en-suite bedroom, two further bedrooms, and a family bathroom. Just a short walk to The Meadows, Grassmarket, and local cafés. Perfect for families, friends, or business travellers looking for comfort and convenience in the heart of the city.

name: One Central Edinburgh Room for Rent
description: A bright and comfortable room available in a shared apartment, located in a quiet area just a 15-minute walk from Princes Street. The flat is shared with friendly flatmates and includes a shared bathroom and fully equipped kitchen. Ideal for students or professionals looking for a peaceful stay in the heart of Edinburgh.

name: Twin room in Edinburgh central
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Number 95
description:
Number 95 is a contemporary 3-bedroom detached bungalow located in a peaceful neighbourhood just a few minutes walk from Portobello beach. It is ideal for couples, friends or families seeking a comfortable and relaxing stay.

The modern and minimalist interior creates a tranquil and restful environment - a large secure rear garden and a golf course is all that lies between you and the setting sun.

name: Room in Spacious Flat Edinburgh
description:
Bright and clean, spacious 2 bedroom apartment located in a quiet cul-de-sac.
Main door apartment with great transport links to the heart of Edinburgh's bustling city centre.
Full apartment or single room available for booking.

name: Elegant 4-bedroom flat near Edinburgh Castle
description:
SUMMARY
✔ Мodern 4-bedroom flat situated in the heart of the city centre
✔ 4 spacious bedrooms
✔ Living room with 1 extra bed
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ А modern, fully equipped kitchen

✔ Princes Street, the main shopping street, is only 5 minutes away
✔ The property is ideally situated for the Fringe Festival
✔ Usher Hall (Stop XA) bus stop is right across the street

name: Cosy one bedroom ground floor flat with a garden
description:
Stay at quiet residential area with a front and back garden. Its not a place for the parties or if you are looking for one. Its a quiet neighbourhood with lovely neighbours.
10min walk from local woods and the river. 15min drive from Edinburgh Airport and 15min drive to city centre. Easy public transport to town available.

name: Spacious 2 Bed Flat Royal Mile, City Centre
description:
Enjoy your stay in this modern 2-bed flat located on Calton Road, just minutes from Edinburgh Waverley Station, the Royal Mile, and Calton Hill. Perfect for city explorers and festival-goers alike!

🚶‍♂️ 3 mins to Royal Mile & Old Town
🚶‍♂️ 3 mins to nearest bus stop
🍽️ Surrounded by local cafés, pubs & shops
🌆Princes Street 6 mins
🏰Edinburgh Castle 15 mins
⛰️Holyrood Palace & Arthur's Seat 15-20 mins

Your perfect base for discovering Edinburgh's history, culture, and charm!

name: Historic Victorian Flat, Heart of Edinburgh
description:
Stay in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town in this listed Victorian property. This flat is situated on Edinburgh’s picturesque Victoria Street - known for being the most photographed street in Scotland due to its breathtaking architecture, and being the inspiration for Diagon Alley.

Here, you are only minutes from Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile, Waverley Train Station, and the majority that Edinburgh has to see.

The property is newly renovated, in keeping with the original style.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Comfortable Leith Free parking
description: Unwind in this cosy 2-bed flat in the heart of Leith, perfect for families or small groups of up to 5. Enjoy the comfort of a welcoming living space, a fully equipped kitchen, and free parking – a rare perk in such a central location. Whether you’re here to explore Edinburgh or just relax, you’ll feel right at home with everything you need for a stress-free stay. Comfortable beds, modern amenities, and a warm, homely feel await. Book now for a relaxing getaway!

description: Discover comfort and convenience in this serene 2-bedroom apartment, perfectly situated in central Edinburgh. Featuring inviting beds, a well-equipped kitchen, and contemporary essentials, it’s designed to make you feel at home. With iconic landmarks such as the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle just a short stroll away, you’ll be ideally placed to explore the best the city has to offer. Reserve your stay today for a truly unforgettable experience!

description:
>You will be living with a long term flatmate

blackout curtains

> Shops and cafes nearby

name: Beautiful 2 bed in vibrant Leith
description:
This unique place has a style all its own.This unique place has a style all its own.

Located between the lively and vibrant Leith and Edinburgh New and Old Town, the property is within easy walking reach to the City Centre and all local attractions.

The Shore is a short walk down Leith Walk which benefits from a super cool little village of its own.

The area as a whole has recently benefitted from regeneration and the property has been refurbished throughout. 2 double bedrooms, modern shower

name: Luxury Reno 1 Bed Nr Bruntsfield
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

This newly renovated apartment has been thoughtfully refurbished throughout with the spacious double bedroom to the rear of the building so you can be sure of a good night’ sleep.

The apartment is on the ground floor and benefits from its own front door.

We have a lovely King Size bed, new furnishings throughout, modern bathroom, speedy Wi-Fi and smart TV’s in the living room and bedroom.

Luxury crisp white linens and soft fluffy towels.

name: Trendy new Reno'd central Pad
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this newly renovated 1-bedroom apartment. The fresh and spacious double bedroom and restful night’s sleep.

The fully equipped open-plan kitchen and living area provide a perfect hub for a weekend getaway or a business trip, complete with Wi-Fi.

With luxury white linens, soft fluffy towels, and toiletries provided, comfort is guaranteed. The apartment is just a 7-minute walk to Fountain Park Complex, 10 minutes to the Meadows, and 20 minutes to Princes Street.

name: Chic New 1 Bed near The Meadows
description:
This unique 1-bedroom apartment boasts a style of its own, newly renovated with fresh, contemporary furnishings for the perfect city break.

Located on the ground floor, it features of a private front door.
Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi, and a smart TV for your entertainment.

Complimentary towels, hotel-quality linen, and toiletries are provided. Just a 7-minute walk to Fountain Park Complex, 10 minutes to the Meadows, and 20 minutes to Princes Street.

name: The Royal Neighbour - Edinburgh City Centre Home
description:
Stay Beside Royalty – A Charming Flat in the Heart of Edinburgh

Step into the heart of historic Edinburgh and wake up every morning to the majestic view of the King’s official Scottish residence – the iconic Palace of Holyroodhouse. Nestled right next to the Holyrood Art Galleries, our lovingly curated flat offers a truly royal experience, where timeless beauty and modern comfort meet.

This hidden gem is ideal for couples, families, or small groups of up to five guests.

name: Lovely Room in Edinburgh
description:
You will be comfortable in this spacious and unique space.

It’s in the south of Edinburgh, which is 5-6km away from the city center.

It has many buses to go to the city center, Bus 4, 5, 11, 15, 16, 101, 27. And it has Bus 18 directly go to the EDI airport.

name: Bright 2 Bedroom Apartment in Edinburgh
description:
A stylish bright and comfortable 2 bedroom apartment on the second floor of a traditional Edinburgh tenement in vibrant Bruntsfield. Surrounded by cafés, shops, bars, and restaurants, everything is on your doorstep.

Thoughtfully furnished and well-equipped, the flat retains original features like decorative cornicing.

Sleeps up to 3 with a king-size bed and pull-out single sofa bed. A warm, welcoming space to relax and enjoy Edinburgh.

name: 2 bedroom, 2 bath, 6 beds
description: Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.

name: Modern Holyrood Family Retreat
description: Charming mid-terraced home in peaceful Willowbrae, just minutes from Holyrood Park and Arthur’s Seat. Blending traditional red sandstone features with modern comforts, it offers a stylish kitchen, cosy cinema room, and private front and rear gardens. Close to local shops, cafes, and great transport links—perfect for a relaxing Edinburgh stay for the whole family.

name: Large room in 299-year-old Royal Mile flat
description:
Step into history and experience Edinburgh from the heart of its Old Town.

Our flat is located in a beautifully preserved Grade A listed building dating back to the early 18th Century. Tucked just off the Royal Mile in Riddle’s Court, you’ll be staying minutes from Edinburgh Castle, surrounded by centuries of stories, architecture and culture.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: New Build 2 Bed Home
description:
High-spec 2-bed new build home, completed in 2023. Belstan Cottage is ideal for exploring Edinburgh. Two spacious double bedrooms with storage on the ground floor, plus a large luxury bathroom. Upstairs, enjoy open-plan living with a wood-burning stove, balcony, and a well-equipped luxury kitchen.
Living room has double sofa bed.

name: 2 Bedroom | Free Parking | Garden
description:
If you are visiting Edinburgh for the Fringe or just using this as a stepping stone to explore the rest of Scotland, this Davidson's Mains flat can be your home away from home!

The flat boasts a homey feel with a bright living room, full kitchen, bathroom with a shower and bathtub, and 2 king sized bedrooms.

The flat is walking distance to the local grocery store (Tesco), pharmacy, pub, cafe, Lauriston Castle, and so much more! Edinburgh city centre is just a 25 minute bus ride away.

name: Amazing Murrayfield House with parking and garden
description:
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun.

Close to city and airport in an exclusive neighbourhood next to rugby stadium.

180sqm modern home with 4/5 bedrooms and plenty of communal space and huge gardens with parking.

name: The Robin House in Ravelston
description:
Welcome to The Robin House at Ravelston-a
charming and tranquil two-bedroom home
nestled in one of Edinburgh's most desirable leafy
neighbourhoods near Murrayfield and Stockbridge. Combining comfort, style, and a
beautiful private garden, this is the
perfect base for a relaxing city break or longer
stay.

name: Cozy DBL room in Hoteliers Home
description: Cozy double room in a family-friendly home. Well-equipped, clean, and comfortable. Shared bathroom. Non-smoking. Bus stop right outside – 15 mins to city centre, 10 mins to airport. Hosted by an Indian hotelier with years of hospitality experience.

name: Bright Double Bedroom
description: Cosy double room in a bright shared flat off Broughton Rd. 10-min walk to Waverley, 5-min to airport tram. Near historic pubs & top restaurants. Share with myself, my partner Juliette, and our friendly ginger cat, Gigino. Access to kitchen, living room & bathroom. Fast Wi-Fi, fresh linens, and homey vibes. Optional home-cooked dinners available for an extra charge!

name: Apartment
description: Beautiful two-bedroom flat just a stone’s throw from the Meadows and a short walk to the city centre. Combining timeless original features with modern convenience this is a perfect base to explore the vibrant city of Edinburgh and surrounding neighbourhood of Tollcross.

name: Refurbished two bed mews property in Bruntsfield
description: Enjoy this lovely peaceful refurbished two bed, two bath mews property overlooking the Bruntsfield park and next to great cafes, bars, restaurants and shops. Within walking distance to the castle and all the attractions Edinburgh has to offer.

name: Central Haven in New Town
description:
Welcome to Central Haven in New Town, your perfect retreat in the vibrant heart of Edinburgh!

This is a modern two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment on the 4th floor of a lift-served block of flats located on the fringe of the New Town. It offers high-standard décor and exceptional amenities. The apartment is bright, inviting and tastefully decorated. It has a fully-equipped kitchen and a comfortable living area.

This is a safe and peaceful location. 🅿️Free residential parking is available.

name: Iconic Royal Mile Flat, Old Town
description: Escape to this charming Old Town retreat just off Edinburgh’s Royal Mile. With high ceilings, soft natural light, and views over a quiet cobbled courtyard, it’s perfect for couples seeking a peaceful, romantic stay. Stroll hand-in-hand to the Castle, enjoy cosy cafés, then unwind in your elegant, character-filled flat. Book now to immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of Edinburgh’s history from one of its most iconic addresses
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Sunny city center flat
description: Relax in this peaceful and centrally-located place. Ideal if you need a location close to Waverley station, from the living room you can see a park. There is a guy in the house who rents a room, almost always at work and very kind.

name: Luxury Wood panelled GF Flat
description:
Experience a luxurious stay in this warm wood-panelled flat in Edinburgh's West End.

- Comfortably furnished with high-quality decor
- Bright and spacious living room for relaxation
- Fully equipped kitchen and dining area for entertaining
- Beautiful curved bay window with views of Eglinton Gardens
- Bedrooms feature comfortable beds and luxurious linens
- Modern bathrooms with creative interior lighting

Book now for an unforgettable stay!

name: Unique stay in Tintin the camper
description:
Static City Glamping
Quiet street. City Location

A simple & unique alternative stay in Edinburgh

Or arrange a campsite stay at your chosen location in & around Edinburgh & we will drop the camper off.

Tintin offers tranquillity & a relaxing space. Comfortable, with all the little luxuries incl heating.
Fully equipped Kitchen & Bed with bedding.

Please Note, only Public bathroom facilities available. Showers 7min walk.

Inexpensive
Guests with Good Reviews Only
More info on request..

name: Lovely Family Room in Quiet Home
description:
Beautifully decorated Family Room, sleeps 3 adults + 1 young child. Great for families or a small group.

Includes light kitchen use, garden access, bathroom and toilet access, and free on-street parking.

The room features: double bed, single bed, toddler bed, and wardrobe. Book a 5★ massage on-site via Samsara Deep Relax.

Relax in a bright, cosy room in our quiet Craigmillar home—just 20 mins from Edinburgh city centre in frequent bus routes.

STL Licence No: EH-86799-F - EPC Rating C

name: Stylish 2-Bed Flat in Edinburgh with Great Views
description: Step into this bright 2-bed flat in central Edinburgh, where high ceilings and natural light create a welcoming vibe. Relax in the cozy lounge or enjoy sweeping city views. Just a 5-minute stroll to Princes Street Gardens and iconic landmarks like Edinburgh Castle. With West End station nearby and shops, cafes, and attractions close by, convenience is at your doorstep. The ideal base for your Edinburgh stay!

name: Perfect for couples
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.
This one bedroom property set close to good range of local shops and transport links in a much sought after part of town. The property comprises of a well appointed lounge, lovely kitchen, bathroom and shower apart. One double bedroom. The property further benefits from a good standard of décor and furnishings.
This best accommodates couples for a lovely stay here in the city of Edinburgh
Book your partner an unforgettable stay

name: Large, Bright Private Room near Center
description:
Spacious room with double bed on quiet Iona Street, just off Leith Walk in traditional Edinburgh building, second floor.

20 minutes stroll from Edinburgh central, and 3 minutes walk from nearest tram which connects through to the airport.

Great spot to explore the city from and rest a little.

Guests will have access to a fridge, kettle and microwave but not a full kitchen.

WiFi available.

name: Modern Flat Close To Edinburgh City Centre
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space in a quiet residential area of South Edinburgh. This flat is on a well connected bus route with only 20 minutes into Edinburgh’s city centre ideal for accessing the Fringe Festival areas and local shops are 5-10 minutes on the bus as well.

Also there is some lovely walks and views nearby.

name: Edinburgh Mid-Century Apartment
description:
Quiet 1960's flat, on the outskirts of Stockbridge in North West Edinburgh. It is 3rd floor and south facing, so seems remarkably sunny all year round. It is a 2 bed flat, newly renovated throughout with a balcony, large sunny living room and new kitchen. Double glazed and with central heating and a lift, it is an incredibly comfortable and easy flat.

We are close to museums, galleries, parks and excellent restaurants. Or hop a bus or taxi and be in the centre of town in under 10 minutes.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Craigleith, Orchard Brae and Crewe Toll

name: Hotel vibe with home warmth/close to the center
description:
Perfectly located for major events such as the Edinburgh Festival Fringe, Royal Edinburgh Military Tattoo, Christmas Market, Hogmanay, and graduation weeks.
This peaceful private room in a centrally located flat is ideal for solo travellers or couples. Just a short walk from key sights, cafés, pubs, markets, buses and trams via Leith Walk.
Cosiness, comfort, spotless cleanliness, a convenient location, and truly personalised service — everything to make you feel at home in Edinburgh.

name: Gilmerton D Ave
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

name: Charming Mews Flat in CityCentre
description: Welcome to our cozy mews house on 1 Dublin Street Lane North, a stylish retreat near Edinburgh's city center. Featuring a comfortable living area, fully-equipped kitchen, modern bathroom, and a charming bedroom, this home is perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring. Located in a quiet lane yet steps away from the Royal Mile, George Street, and local cafes. Amenities include high-speed Wi-Fi, kitchen essentials, and fresh linens. Ideal for a memorable Edinburgh stay!

name: Central Hidden Gem - city centre
description: Enjoy a stylish and comfortable stay in this bright, centrally located flat—just a one-minute walk from George Street. Tucked away in the heart of the city, this hidden gem features two cosy bedrooms, a dedicated study, and a spacious, light-filled living room—perfect for relaxing after a day of work or exploring Edinburgh.

name: Edinburgh Pleasance Apartment 4 bedrooms 7 beds
description:
The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.
Step into our stylish, centrally located apartment in the vibrant heart of Edinburgh. Enjoy modern amenities, comfortable living spaces, and convenient access to the city's top attractions.
Our apartment is ideally located just a short walk from Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, and Princes Street Gardens. Enjoy easy access to public transportation, including buses and trams."

name: Montgomery Mews in Leith
description:
Nestled in a traditional Edinburgh tenement on charming Montgomery Street, this one-bedroom flat is full of character and perfect for travellers looking to experience the city like a local. With high ceilings, original features, and a touch of vintage flair, the space blends historic charm with modern comfort.

Located just a short walk from Leith Walk, the flat offers easy access to the city centre, The Shore, and some of Edinburgh’s best independent cafes, pubs, & restaurants.

name: New Town Retreat by leith Walk-Free Parking
description:
Modern Comfort Near the Heart of Edinburgh – Walk to Calton Hill & Princes Street!

Welcome to our stylish and cosy 2-bedroom flat in a quiet residential development just a short stroll from the vibrant centre of Edinburgh. Located in the sought-after Dryden Gait area (EH7), this modern flat is perfect for couples, solo travellers, or business visitors who want the best of both worlds: calm, comfortable living with easy access to the city's main attractions.

name: A room in city centre Luxury Apt
description:
A room in a stylish, central and charming mews house in the west end of Edinburgh's New Town. Your room is a well-apportioned double bedroom with exclusive access to a modern bathroom and open-plan kitchen-dining-living room.

Airport Bus Stop Shandwick Place (0.5 mi)
Waverley Station (0.9 mi)
Haymarket station (1 mi)
Edinburgh Castle (1.2 mi)
Princes Street (0.6 mi)
Stockbridge (0.2 mi)

Check-in is from 2pm. Guests can drop off their luggage if they arrive in the city before 2pm : )

name: City buzz, relaxing, quiet room in a peaceful home
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located double room with a lovely garden.

We will share our house, except the summerhouse, office, conservatory and sheds.

Please no pets, no kids, no smoking, no vaping, no partying, no extra guests and only sensible drinking.

The bathroom is on the first floor, next to the bedroom

name: Wemyss Hideaway in New Town
description: Modern and stylish 2-bed, 2-bath apartment in Edinburgh’s New Town. Sleeps 5 with a king, double, and sofa bed. Open-plan kitchen, lounge, and private patio. Ensuite in master bedroom. Basement-level with stairs from street. Just minutes’ walk to George Street, Stockbridge, and all major city centre attractions. Everything is within easy walking distance; ideal for exploring Edinburgh’s shops, restaurants, and cultural highlights.

name: 2nd Floor Apartment. 2 Bedrooms
description:
Converted Crabbies Ginger Ale Warehouse. Pleasant courtyard on entrance. Flat located on 2nd floor, stairs are fairly shallow (please note there is no lift here )
Private parking available on request.
Comfortable and close to all local amenities and public transport.

name: Great Double Room on 2nd Floor
description:
Great Double Bedroom in converted Crabbies Ginger Ale Warehouse close to all amenities and convenient public transport. Spacious lounge area. Very pleasant Courtyard on entrance. Flat located on 2nd Floor (no lift).
Private parking space available on request.
This is a 2 bedroom place but am only letting the 1 bedroom out so will pretty much have the whole place to yourself but I may occasionally be there.

name: Modern 2-Bed, 2-Bath flat with Balcony & Views
description:
Modern 2-Bed, 2-Bath Apartment with Balcony & Beautiful Views!

Welcome to your home away from home. This spacious, modern third-floor apartment offers comfort, convenience, and stunning distant views over to Fife from your private balcony.

Key Features
- Two comfortable bedrooms and two full bathrooms—perfect for families, friends, or business travellers
- Bright open-plan living and dining area with access to a small balcony

name: Central & Bright two Level House Close to New Town
description:
A wonderful home hosted by William in a central yet residential area of town where you can relax and enjoy your time out after exploring the city and all it has to offer its many visitors.

William offers guest parking for one car in his private driveway and an EV charging point.

This is a small dog friendly house, please see my comments under "other details to note"

name: The Sylvan Suite: 2-bed flat on the Meadows
description:
Beautiful Victorian apartment on the fringe of Marchmont, near The Meadows, and just 10 mins from Edinburgh’s Old Town.
Features two bedrooms, a modern kitchen, bathroom with jacuzzi tub, and a spacious living room with high ceilings, sash windows, and a gas fireplace. A perfect mix of period charm and modern comfort in a prime location.

name: Classic Georgian Double Upper
description: This is a classic Victorian c.1850 'double upper' (2 floors) right in the heart of Edinburgh City Centre.

name: Grand City Centre House
description: Elegant 4-bedroom Victorian apartment in Edinburgh’s West End. Features king-size beds, a master suite with sofa bed and ensuite, a grand dining room, traditional kitchen, and large living room with period details. Perfect for exploring the city’s history while enjoying modern comfort.

name: Stunning 2 Bedroom Property
description: Stunning period property, over 2 floors with beautiful south facing Patio. 2 stylishly decorated super-king and king size bedrooms with one en-suite and a separate bathroom. On a desirable residential street in the heart of Edinburgh’s City Centre. Steps away from The Royal Mile, The Playhouse and Calton Hill with beautiful views of the City.

name: Large double room next to The Meadows
description:
Perfectly situated just steps from The Meadows, one of Edinburgh's most beautiful green spaces. Enjoy peaceful walks and easy access to the city centre - just 10 minutes' walk to the Royal Mile, Princes Street, Grassmarket and other central tourist attractions.
The double room is fully furnished with comfortable double bed, work desk, chest of drawers & wardrobe.
This is a Double bed private listing in a shared flat - PLEASE BE AWARE THAT YOU WILL BE SHARING THE FLAT WITH OTHER GUESTS

name: Double room next to The Meadows
description:
Perfectly situated just steps from The Meadows, one of Edinburgh's most beautiful green spaces. Enjoy peaceful walks and easy access to the city centre - just 10 minutes' walk to the Royal Mile, Princes Street, Grassmarket and other central tourist attractions.
The double room is fully furnished with comfortable double bed, a desk, chest of drawers & wardrobe.
PLEASE BE AWARE THAT YOU WILL BE SHARING THE FLAT WITH OTHER GUESTS.

name: Cosy flat near city centre
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. 25 minutes walk from Murrafield stadium and Edinburgh Castle.
Located at the second floor (No lift), this flat has all the essentials for a cosy stay.
Union canal nearby for a peaceful and nice walk.

name: Bright 4-bed Edinburgh Home Near City Centre
description: Enjoy a stylish and spacious 4-bedroom retreat perfect for families or groups. With 3 toilets, 2 baths, and a fully equipped kitchen, this modern home offers comfort and convenience. Relax in the cozy living area with a smart TV, or unwind in bright, airy bedrooms. Nestled in a quiet area with great transport links, you’re just a short ride from Edinburgh’s top attractions. Kid-friendly, Wi-Fi equipped, and ideal for longer stays or weekend getaways.

name: 5 berth Compact Caddy - ULEZ compliant
description: The VW Caddy Maxi Life is a compact way for small groups (up to 5 people) to explore Scotland's wild beauty without the bulkiness of a large campervan. With its slender profile (1.8m wide, 4.8m long), it’s ideal for navigating the twisty roads of the Highlands and squeezing into scenic spots that bigger vans can’t reach.

name: The Photography Studio, 2 bdrm Stockbridge High St
description: Artist & photographic studio, converted into a 2 bedroom flat.  Half of our roof is glass, to let in the light from the north, the best light for us artists. With a roof terrace, and Stockbridge actually on the door step, this really is the perfect base to explore Edinburgh. Hosted in the original Airbnb way, I am on the phone as your personal guide to the city.

name: Luxury garden flat in Haymarket
description:
Luxury flat in a city centre location, including a peaceful garden.

This modern and fully furnished 2 bedroom apartment is located in a peaceful residential area. It is a 5 minute walk from Haymarket train station and within walking distance from of Edinburgh's main attractions including Princes Street, Edinburgh Castle, Johnny Walker Experience, St James Centre, Murrayfield and the Museum of Scotland. Lots of cafes , shops and a small Tesco nearby.

name: Peace in the city
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

name: 3 Bed House-Garden-Free Parking
description: Spacious 3-Bed Detached House – 2 bathrooms, 3 toilets, private garden & parking. Perfect for families, contractors & long stays. Discounts available for weekly/monthly bookings – just message us!

name: Waterfront Spacious Flat
description:
Stylish 2-bed waterfront flat with stunning views over the River Forth. Enjoy a bright open-plan living area with balcony, modern kitchen with appliances, and two double bedrooms with Juliette balconies. Includes en-suite, main bathroom, elevator, private gated parking space, and great transport links to the city centre. elevator Lift in block. Fully furnished and newly renovated for a comfortable stay. 5 Star.
** 3rd Double bed Available on Request**

name: Spacious apartment in Edinburgh
description:
Spacious 1 bedroom flat in leafy suburb of Edinburgh.

Easy access to beautiful walks along the Water of Leith and onto the Pentland Hills opposite the flat and a bus stop directly into city centre (30 minutes) right outside. Plenty of local shops, restaurants and pubs. Perfect place to experience the fringe festival and the stunning countryside Edinburgh has to offer.

Well behaved dogs allowed.

***1 king sized bed for 2 people and quality inflatable bed for extra guests***

name: Room in a Cozy Home
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.Home away from Home . Very positively energetic with peaceful vibes

name: Mmesoma Edinburghhost
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Modern 2bed Apartment Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our bright and spacious 2-bedroom flat on Hatters Lane, perfectly situated in a peaceful development just 15 minutes' walk from Edinburgh’s historic city centre and the vibrant Stockbridge neighbourhood.

name: Village vibe near city and sea.
description: A double room close to a historic castle,the coast and beach walks as well as a bus ride to the city centre and all that Edinburgh has to offer.

name: Boutique garden apartment
description: Newly refurbished self-contained apartment with own entrance. 30 minutes walk from the Royal Mile or 2 minutes walk to the nearest bus stop with multiple bus routes into the city centre. The apartment is also close to Holyrood Park and Arthur's Seat. Access is via a secure garden entrance door and then the main door to the apartment. Both doors have keypad locks with a unique code given to guests on arrival. Guests can use the patio and external dining area. Free car parking is also available.

name: Castle Apartment G2
description: Charming 2-bed apartment in the heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town, just minutes from the Castle and Royal Mile. Features a fully equipped kitchen, comfy living space, free Wi-Fi, all nestled behind the safety of a gated courtyard. Ideal for exploring the city’s historic sights, museums, and shops, not to mention fantastic food and drink. Sleeps 4. Perfect for couples, friends or small families looking for a central and cosy base.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Charming flat in Leith, Edinburgh
description:
Kick back in this bright, peaceful 1-bed flat in Leith — perfect for travellers looking to unplug.

The flat is on the third and top floor, no lift,

📍 Location:
• Central Leith
• 35 mins walk to Portobello Beach
• Great bus links to city centre
• Local cafés, pubs and shops around the corner

🛏️ The Space:
• Double bedroom with comfy mattress
• Airy living room with lots of natural light
• Equipped kitchen
• Quiet building

name: Cosy City Centre Apartment
description:
>🅿️ Send us a message for information about parking
>🚶 20 minute walk to city centre
> 💨 Tram Stop 15 Minute walk From Property
> 🏰 Direct Bus Connections to All Of Edinburgh's Historic Sites
> 🚌 Bus stop 2 minutes from the property

name: Drummond Living
description:
A beautiful third-floor duplex 3-bedroom mezzanine apartment quietly situated close to the City Centre, within a converted Victorian school building.

This charming, rear-facing third-floor flat features a spacious and bright living room with a flat-screen TV, a double sofa, and complimentary WiFi available for guests.

The open plan kitchen is equipped with an integrated oven, hob, extractor hood, washing machine, and fridge/freezer, along with a dining table and chairs for five guests.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Bright City Centre 2 Bed Apartment
description:
Spacious, bright and well equipped City Centre 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom, basement apartment that has a modern kitchen and welcoming living room with a pull out sofa bed. Family friendly and pet friendly.

You’ll be staying on Edinburgh’s famous Easter Road with lots of independent bars and eateries on your door step. You’re also located on major bus routes and 5 minutes walk from the closest tram stop which makes this a perfect base to explore Edinburgh from.

Please note that there are stairs.

name: One-bedroom flat in Edinburgh
description:
Spacious and central one-bedroom apartment just off Easter Road in vibrant Leith/Abbeyhill, within a 35 min walk of Princes Street, Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, Holyrood + Cafés, pubs, bakeries.

Fully-equipped kitchen.

Good transport links.

Double bedroom with good storage, built‑in wardrobe; the bathroom includes shower & bath.

Free parking, washing machine, towels and linen provided.

name: Unique and quirky 3 bed flat
description:
STL Licence No EH-89025-T

This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.

Uniquely style, this large 3 bedroom, double upper has all the space you will need to make your stay in Edinburgh a success!

Spread over 2 floors with a large kitchen and 2 beautiful bathrooms, the apartment is found on the Royal Mile, with the Castle and the Palace equally distant.

Being on the 4th floor, you will be surprised at how well insulated you are from the sound of the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Grassmarket Luxury 2BR - 5 min to Castle + PS5
description:
Soak up unbeatable views of Edinburgh Castle and the lively Grassmarket from this stylish, spacious flat in the heart of the Old Town.

With luxurious bedding, 3 x 4K OLED TVs (all with Netflix), PS5, fast fibre Wi-Fi, and a beautifully equipped interior, it’s perfect for families, sightseers, or remote work. Step outside into the city’s best restaurants, pubs, museums, and historic streets — everything is on your doorstep.

name: Stylish family home in Edinburgh
description: Bright 2- bedroom home in quiet Corstorphine, just 10 mins from the airport & 15 mins to city centre. Perfect for families, groups, or work trips. Free parking, Wi-Fi, smart TV & private garden. Shops, buses & parks nearby. Comfortable, convenient, and great for exploring Edinburgh.

name: Calm Trinity Flat, Near City
description:
Enjoy a peaceful stay in this 2-bedroom flat in Trinity, one of Edinburgh’s most desirable areas. Set in a quiet courtyard, it's roughly 30 minutes walking distance to The Shore, Leith, Stockbridge, and the Botanical Gardens.

Surrounded by green spaces including Inverleith Park and close to Wardie Bay.

Excellent bus services offer quick access to the city centre and connections to the airport. Shops, cafés, and restaurants at Newhaven Harbour are nearby—perfect for city break/relaxing getaway.

name: Central Georgian Flat in Edinburgh New Town
description: Step into your elegant city retreat in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic New Town. This beautifully renovated Georgian apartment blends Scandi-inspired design with contemporary luxury – the ideal base for discovering the city in comfort and style.

name: Edinburgh 4 bedroom 2 bathroom house.
description:
EDINBURGH : 4 double bedroom 2 bathroom house with enclosed back garden. Driveway for 2 or more cars, free on road parking. Near main route into city center. Bus journey time 20 minute into city center. Corstorphine area close to shops, transport links, airport. Pets considered.
License number Eh-90022-E

name: Edinburgh 3 Bed Flat, near Princes Street
description: 3-bedroom flat in Edinburgh’s West End, just minutes from Princes Street and the city’s top attractions. This spacious Georgian property features high ceilings, a bright living area, three spacious bedrooms, fully equipped modern kitchen, and two bathrooms (one with shower, one with bathtub). Ideal for families or groups, with easy access to shops, cafés, restaurants and transport. Enjoy a peaceful stay in a stylish home right in the heart of the city.

name: Edinburgh City Centre Host
description:
peaceful and centrally-located place.on ground floor Edinburgh Tenement
Fashionable Kitchen Walk-in Wet room

name: Balloons Airbnb
description:
Balloons offers rooms to rent, quiet and equipped with everything to make you feel at home. It is perfect for a couple.
request the code on the day of arrival

name: Balloons Airbnb
description:
Balloons offers rooms to rent, quiet and equipped with everything to make you feel at home. It is perfect for a couple.
Request the code on the day of arrival

name: Balloons guest house
description:
Welcome to our house...!

Discover a cozy, quiet accommodation where you can rest after a long day. It is an apartment with three fully equipped rooms where you can feel at home. It has a fully equipped kitchen so you can prepare something to eat and drink. And a bathroom so you can take a hot shower where you will find a series of basic personal hygiene products if you need them.
The kitchen and bathroom are shared!

name: Charming double bedroom
description:
Cosy and quiet double bedroom in a new build flat, great for a short stay in Edinburgh. The flat is located in the popular Leith area packed with shops and pubs, 15 min by bus from city center.

You will have access to your private bathroom and towels are provided.

name: Cosy quiet double room in central Edinburgh flat
description: Welcome to my home in Edinburgh! I am a new Airbnb host but have done 25+ house swaps on Home Exchange with all 5* ratings (you can search for me there). My home is a cosy sanctuary but very centrally located. It is 1 minute walk to Balfour St tram stop which connects directly to the city centre and Edinburgh airport, and you can walk to city centre in 20mins. It is currently available during the Edinburgh festival in Aug 25, the world's largest performance arts festival - a great time to visit!

name: Locke Studio - Panoramic View at Eden Locke
description:
Stay in our Locke Studios with the addition of panoramic views across Edinburgh. With around 28m² of space, these studios have it all (and more). ‏‏‎
‏‏‎ ‎
You’ll have a comfy 150cm x 200cm UK king-size bed, as well as an iconic green L-shaped sofa for relaxing on. A fully-equipped kitchen with marble dining table, hob, washer/dryer, fridge/freezer and dishwasher, as well as lots of designer cooking gear.
‏‏‎ ‎
Disclaimer: The apartment in the picture might not be the one you stay in.

name: Modern  Royal Mile 2 bed Flat Edinburgh
description:
Spacious and comfortable 3-bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Royal Mile. Perfect for families or groups, this charming flat offers plenty of room to relax after exploring the city. Just steps from Edinburgh Castle, shops, cafés, and iconic sights. Fully equipped with everything you need for a memorable stay in one of Scotland’s most vibrant locations.
Property in LEZ Zone. Please ensure car is compliant if driving.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Family Studio - Lower Ground at Eden Locke
description:
Bring the family to stay in our spacious apartment, complete with sofa bed. With around 28m² of space, these studios have it all (and more). ‏‏‎
‏‏‎ ‎
As well as the sofa bed, you’ll have a comfy 150cm x 200cm UK king-size bed. A fully-equipped kitchen with marble dining table, hob, washer/dryer, fridge/freezer and dishwasher, as well as lots of designer cooking gear.
‏‏‎ ‎
Disclaimer: The apartment in the picture might not be the one you stay in.

name: Luxury Modern Apartment. Central.
description: An exceptional luxury apartment in Edinburgh’s most desirable development. In Edinburgh’s Old Town, you're right beside The University of Edinburgh, Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile, Meadows and all the main attractions. Leafy views, lots of light and located in a in a very peaceful & safe locale. Supermarkets, Swedish and Italian cafes, an Asian supermarket, and a Starbucks are all sited within the residential development and make for a very comfortable, convenient stay.

name: Spare room to rent during Fringe
description:
Spacious spare room at the top of the house with a lovely view, that you are welcome to stay in during the festival.
We are a family with 2 teenagers and 2 dogs - despite this, we manage to keep our home clean and uncluttered.
As we have 2 bathrooms, we are able to offer you sole use of the best bathroom.
Within 30 mins walk of most festival venues.
Our place would be a place for you to take a break, and get a good night's sleep.
See our feedback - we are good, attentive hosts.

name: Cosy Nest Entire Flat in Edinburgh
description: Cosy and peaceful one-bedroom flat with everything you need. King size bed in main bedroom and a queen size bed in the living room if needed (all bedding provided)

name: Hope Park 3 Bedroom Apartment - Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to the Hope Park 3 Bedroom Apartment, a stylish and spacious property in Edinburgh’s vibrant Southside. This fully private residence accommodates up to 6 guests.

It features three bedrooms, each with a comfortable double bed, ideal for families, friends, or business travellers.

Guests have exclusive use of a bright living area and a modern kitchen equipped with an oven, fridge, microwave, washing machine and all essential utensils.

name: Cosy& Central 2  Bedrooms Apt
description:
Welcome to our peaceful two-bedroom apartment, ideally located close to Edinburgh's city center. Perfect for those who appreciate a quiet retreat, this cozy space offers a serene atmosphere for relaxation.
Free residential parking is available, though it can be full, so we can't guarantee a spot upon arrival. All furnishings and equipment are in excellent condition, including a Smart TV for your entertainment.
Experience comfort and convenience in our lovely apartment!

name: The Old Town Sanctum
description:
A two-bedroom second floor flat located in the heart of Edinburgh Old Town. This location is situated perfect, walking distance to Princes Street, Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, Chambers Street and Edinburgh's city centre.

There is an abundance of fantastic local bakeries, restaurants, bars, and coffee shops in the area making it the perfect choice for a city break with everything you need at your fingertips!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Spacious Apartment in Edinburgh
description:
Spacious two bedroom apartment with a private balcony and free parking, nestled on a quiet residential road. The flat is less than a 15 minute walk from several Edinburgh sights including, Arthur's Seat, Holyrood Palace, and Carlton Hill.

Leith Walk and Easter Road are a couple of minutes away where you can find independent cafes, bars and shops.

Waverly Station is a 20-25 minute walk away, and only a 5 minute walk from the tram, which goes directly to the airport!

name: Modern Pet Studio, Central EDI
description:
Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base. Just a 20 min walk (0.8miles) to city center and 1 mile to Waverley Station.

You will also have easy access to public transport with a bus stop conveniently located just across the street. Restaurants and pubs line Broughton Street, as well as 2 grocery stores within 1 block (Tesco and Lidl).

This dog-friendly neighborhood is also a short distance to the Water of Leith and Warriston walking path for a stroll.

name: Spacious 2BR Home by Portobello Beach
description: 🏡 Spacious 2BR Home by Portobello Beach | 15 Mins to City Centre

name: Cosy room above Dean Village
description:
Cosy double room in a mews flat above Dean village. Central location and 15 min walk to Princes street & Stockbridge.

Perfect for a couple, two friends or solo traveler. Private bathroom for our guests with bath/shower. Lock on the bedroom and bathroom door, lock box for easy access to the property.

name: The Briery Home
description:
Enjoy garden views at this spacious, modern 3-bedroom house in the heart of Edinburgh. The property features a private main door entrance and a private garden with stunning views of Arthur's Seat. Located just 700 meters from the Royal Mile, it offers a perfect blend of comfort and convenience.

Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and private check-in and check-out, along with complimentary WiFi throughout the property.

name: Charming Flat Near Arthur’s Seat
description:
2-Bedroom Flat Near City Centre | Free Parking + Ensuite
Welcome to your home away from home at Willowbrae Road, Edinburgh – just minutes from the city centre!
2 spacious bedrooms (one with private ensuite)
Free on-site parking.
Lift access & secure entry.
Supermarkets within walking distance.
Excellent transport links to the city centre.
Located near Arthur’s Seat and Holyrood Park.
Perfect for families/friends/business travellers looking for a relaxing and convenient stay.

name: 2-Bed, 2 Bathroom flat with Sofa Bed in Edinburgh
description: Welcome to your Edinburgh home-from-home! This bright, comfy 2-bed flat in Slateford has everything you need—two cosy double bedrooms, a sofa bed for extra guests, one ensuite, and a main bathroom. Whip up meals in the fully equipped kitchen, unwind with WiFi and Smart TV, and enjoy easy links to the city centre. Perfect for family adventures, city breaks with friends, or a comfy base after a busy day exploring the sights!

name: Victorian apartment
description: Visit the heart of Edinburgh by staying in this central 2nd floor townhouse. Located a 15 minute walk from both Haymarket and Waverley train stations and princes street, as well as a 5 minute walk to the nearest tram stop. This spacious West End home makes an ideal family stay during the fringe festival, and a base for exploring wider Scotland.

name: Beautiful Double Room
description: Charming 2-bedroom tenement just 10 minutes by bus from Edinburgh city centre. Set beside peaceful woodland with walking trails to Cramond Beach and Dean Village. Supermarkets and a PureGym are just a 5-minute walk away. The perfect base for exploring the city and enjoying nature. Please note that the postcode is EH4 3NE not EH4 2BN. Google maps is currently updating.

name: Entire Charming 2-BR New Town Apt on Barony Street
description:
Located on the eastern end of Edinburgh’s New Town, this elegant and charming 2-bedroom apartment on Barony Street offers a peaceful retreat just moments from the city’s vibrant centre. With excellent transport links via Lothian Buses, you're ideally placed to explore Edinburgh’s iconic attractions - from the historic charm of the Old Town to the grand Georgian architecture of the New Town.
- 2 comfortable double-bedrooms
- Spacious living room
- Compact kitchen and dining space

name: GuestReady - Charming stay in Edinburgh
description: This beautiful 1-bedroom apartment offers comfortable, modern living in a desirable Edinburgh location. Situated within easy reach of local amenities, public transport, and green spaces, the apartment provides a perfect blend of city convenience and residential calm.

name: Charming Old Town Apt Just Steps from Royal Mile
description:
Tucked away in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town, this cozy one-bedroom basement apartment offers unbeatable access to the city’s most iconic sights. Located just 10 steps from the legendary Royal Mile and only a 3-minute walk from Waverley Station, it’s the perfect base for exploring everything Edinburgh has to offer—whether you're here for history, culture, or a weekend getaway.

Come stay and experience the charm of Edinburgh from a truly central and inviting spot.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: In the heart of Edinburgh
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place. Walking distance is everywhere. Lots of cafes and restaurants. Train station is near. Bus stop is bottom of the stairs.

name: Corstorphine Taigh Beag
description:
Welcome to Corstorphine Taigh Beag, a self-contained garden retreat in one of Edinburgh's most sought-after areas.
Our open plan guest suite offers comfort & tranquillity with modern amenities, a well-equipped kitchen, accommodation for up to 4 guests & free WiFi.
Enjoy easy access to local shops, cafés, and restaurants, with the city centre just a 15-minute bus ride away.
Private driveway access & ample street parking are available.
Perfect for exploring Edinburgh's attractions and festivals.

name: Bright Double Room in Leith • Near Tram + Shore
description: Peace, light, and good sleep in the heart of Leith. This is your bright, quiet base in one of Edinburgh’s most vibrant neighbourhoods — where art, food, and history meet the sea. The room is peaceful, spotless, and full of natural light. With blackout curtains, a comfy bed, and a desk for planning your next move, it's ideal for solo adventurers and couples on city breaks or short work trips.

name: Modern Vintage Bliss near Calton Hill
description: Modern Vintage Bliss near Calton Hill is charming retreat located in a peaceful neighborhood just a short stroll from Edinburgh's vibrant city center. Our unique property features a delightful blend of modern and vintage decor, creating an inviting atmosphere for relaxation. Walking distance to major attractions, historical sites, and picturesque parks. Experience the best of both worlds with the tranquility of a quiet area and the excitement of Edinburgh right at your doorstep!

name: Cool Studio in the New Town
description:
Cool studio flat in Edinburgh’s Georgian New Town. Fully furnished to suit a single or couple visiting the city. It has a double bed.

This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. You can walk everywhere and don’t need a car, as it’s 10 minutes walk from Waverley Station and the tram stop/bus station at St Andrew's Square. The lower ground floor studio is on Scotland Street; in the heart of the New Town, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

name: Peaceful Home in Granton Harbour
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space. This apartment is located at Granton Harbour where you can enjoy evening walks at the beach, park with a playground and great restaurants nearby. The apartment is located in quite residential area and is well connected by public transportation with airport and city center.

name: Licensed room in Edinburgh
description:
Welcome to Edinburgh.

A bright spacious, lovely and cozy double bedroom, full of morning sun, in a quiet residential area that is 15 minutes by car and 30 minutes by bus to city centre, the Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle and Waverley Station. Excellent transport link to Edinburgh airport with direct bus.

5 minute walk to several takeaway restaurants, grocery shops and a chemist. 15 minutes walk to closest supermarket.

Direct bus from the Airport: Number 18.

name: Edin City Centre, Entire 4 Bedroom Aprt, 8 people
description:
A wonderful four bedroom main door entrance apartment located in central Edinburgh. Fully renovated to a very high standard! Accommodation comprises; a bright kitchen with integrated appliances including an oven, hob, dishwasher, fridge/freezer, washing machine and dryer.
Spacious living area along with four double bedrooms with wardrobe space and all rooms are equipped with smart Led flat screen wall-mounted tvs.

2x bathrooms with shower/bath and bidet shower house.

name: Modern Home near Murrayfield. Garden & Parking
description:
On main route to city from the airport and 10 minutes walk to Murrayfield stadium.
Walking distance to Corstorphine village, tram line and easy access to city centre by bus.
Close to network of dedicated walking and cycling routes spanning the city, and beside Corstorphine Hill nature reserve.

This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips.
Easy access to airport and city , or plenty of space to relax in the large garden with outdoor dining area.

name: The Nest
description:
Spacious 3 bedroom apartment large superking, double and twin bedroom. One bathroom.


There is around 20 steps upto the landing to reach the front door.

Central with store below, also a chip shop, a shopping centre with all different kinds of shops, coffee shops/ restaurants a 5 minute walk.

Bus routes right outside the property taking you to city centre, portobello beach is a 20 minute walk/5 minute drive would recommend. It’s great to walk along the promenade with a coffee.

name: Bright 4-bed Edinburgh Home Near City Centre
description: Enjoy a stylish and spacious 4-bedroom retreat perfect for families or groups. With 3 toilets, 2 baths, and a fully equipped kitchen, this modern home offers comfort and convenience. Relax in the cozy living area with a smart TV, or unwind in bright, airy bedrooms. Nestled in a quiet area with great transport links, you’re just a short ride from Edinburgh’s top attractions. Kid-friendly, Wi-Fi equipped, and ideal for longer stays or weekend getaways.

name: Modern peaceful house with private garden.
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.

Stylish and peaceful 2-bedroom home sleeping up to 4 guests with a double bed, sofa bed, and large couch. Features a private garden with deck, table, chairs, firepit, 2 bathrooms, piano, guitar, workout gear, board games and a smart TV. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, desk space and stunning views of the Pentland Hills. Free parking included. Just 15/20 mins to city centre or airport, with a bus stop 5 mins away. Your perfect home away from home!

name: Modern Room with Balcony.
