description:
Escape from the city centre with a peaceful stay in this double or twin bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. Private balcony where you can watch the sun go down at the end of the day. Large back garden with several seating areas to enjoy.
Located in Currie that benefits from local shops, cafés and pubs. Enjoy walks along The Water of Leith or venture up to the Pentland Hills.
Located close to bus routes and train station for easy journeys to the city centre.
Close to Heriot Watt University.

name: Three bedroom house
description: Three bedroom house in quiet neighbourhood in the south of Edinburgh. 30 minutes from the city centre by bus. Front and rear garden, driveway space for two cars and garage space for one car.

name: Sleek Canalside Stay in Edinburgh
description:
Sleek and stylish 1-bed property in vibrant Fountainbridge.

Enjoy a comfy double bed, modern bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, stylish living space with superfast Wi-Fi.

Situated right on the doorstep of Fountainbridge, you're just moments from artisan cafes, cinemas, restaurants, and the tranquil Union Canal. Only a 15-minute walk is the buzzing Grassmarket, and the historic sights of the Old Town and Edinburgh Castle.

With self check-in available, make this your Edinburgh base!

name: Luxury City Centre Oasis - 5* Location - by Sovo
description:
Welcome to this luxurious 1BR 1BA oasis with easy access to the iconic Princes Street (5min), scenic Calton Hill, historic Royal Mile, tasty restaurants, shops, and many more attractions and landmarks. The flat's design, comforts, amenities, and fantastic location provide everything you need to relax, recharge, entertain, and have a perfect Edinburgh stay!

✔ Comfortable Double Bedroom
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fireplace
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Smart TVs
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi

Learn more below !
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Elegant Apartment with Castle View
description:
✔ Elegant 1-bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town
✔ 577 ft² | 53.6 m²
✔ 1 bedroom
✔ 1 bathroom
✔ Newly refurbished interiors with south-facing aspect
✔ Just off the vibrant Grassmarket
✔ Wi-Fi available
✔ 2-minute walk to Princes Street Gardens
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels provided
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: City Center Gem-4Bd House!
description: Live the Edinburgh dream! This charming 4-bedroom home offers an unbeatable location with the city center on your doorstep. Ideal for families, professionals, and larger groups seeking ample space and vibrant city living. Explore Edinburgh by foot, with everything you need just moments away!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Fountain park get away
description:
Welcome to my clean, cozy home in Fountainbridge! You’ll be sharing with me, a friendly and respectful live-in host. The room is fully furnished, with shared access to the kitchen, bathroom, and living space. Shops, cafes, and Fountain Park (cinema, gym, restaurants) are just a short walk away. Perfect for students or professionals looking for a central, comfortable stay. Feel free to reach out with any questions!
Thanks

name: Stunning 3 bed basement flat
description: FESTIVAL LET - stunning 3 bed (all ensuite) basement apartment with courtyard in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town & 2 minutes walk to the vibrant Stockbridge. The property has access to a lovely private gated garden seconds from the front door. Perfectly located for the Festival the property is ideal for performers or a family / group who are wanting to enjoy the festival, and is well positioned to see the many other historic, culinary and natural beauty spots in this great city of Edinburgh.

name: central, beautiful, double room
description:
Double bedroom in peaceful, centrally located flat with great transport links, local amenities and beautiful green spaces.

Use of shared kitchen and bathroom in this friendly, modern flat. The room benefits from a built in wardrobe, desk space and tea making facilities, while blackout blinds help for a well needed lie-in.

Easy distance to city centre and all major attractions, transport links are versatile in this area. It's a short 10 minute walk to the Meadows or 5 minutes to Blackford Hill.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Blackford, West Mains and Mayfield Road

name: Room in Quirky Old Town Flat
description:
Nestled between historic cobbles and natural wonders. Welcome to a vibrant, character-filled room just a short walk away from Edinburgh’s Royal Mile and Arthur’s Seat, near the beating heart of the Old Town. Whether you’re here to explore nature or soak up the city’s cultural buzz, this spot offers both serenity and excitement.

🏳️‍🌈 LGBTQ+ Friendly Space.
🌸 Safe stay for women travellers.
💛 Everyone is welcome.

name: Supersize room
description:
Close to tram and bus stop
10 minutes to airport and 10 minutes to city by tram

name: Canon St Central
description:
Looking for a practical, no-frills base while exploring Edinburgh? This clean and simple 2-bedroom on Canon Street offers great value and a fantastic location.

The flat includes two bedrooms and while there’s no separate living room or TV, guests will find everything they need for a straightforward and comfortable stay. Ideal for those who plan to spend their time out and about enjoying Edinburgh.

Within walking distance of the Royal Botanic Garden, Stockbridge, and the city centre.

name: Traditional and Stylish 2BD Flat in Morningside
description: Bright and stylish 2-bed flat in the heart of Morningside, just a short walk from The Meadows , Bruntsfield and Edinburgh city centre. Features a fully equipped kitchen, comfy living area, and modern bathroom. Ideal for couples, friends, or business stays. Surrounded by cafés, shops, and green spaces, with great transport links nearby. A peaceful home base to enjoy the best of Edinburgh.

name: Elegant stay in Edinburgh
description: Enjoy a warm, elegant stay in this beautifully designed two-bedroom flat in Marchmont. Featuring high ceilings, period details, a chic living space, and a modern bathroom, it’s the perfect blend of classic Edinburgh charm and contemporary comfort. Just minutes from The Meadows, cafes, and city attractions.

name: Roseburn Place Apartment near West End
description:
Stylish 2-Bed Flat Near Haymarket Train Station & Edinburgh City Centre – Minutes from Tram, Airport Bus Link & Murrayfield Stadium

Welcome to your home away from home in the heart of Edinburgh! This bright and comfortable two-bedroom flat is perfectly located just minutes from the city centre, with excellent transport links right on your doorstep. Whether you're here to explore the historic Old Town, visit Edinburgh Castle, or enjoy an event at Murrayfield stadium this flat is simply perfect .

name: Designer Georgian Apartment in Edinburgh New Town
description: Enjoy understated luxury in our restored Georgian apartment (built in 1820) - located in Edinburgh’s New Town.  Our home features a well-equipped kitchen with (5-burner gas stove, 2 ovens, microwave, & dishwasher), a bathroom with luxury stone bathtub,  a separate designer shower room with a walk-in shower. The bedroom has a king size bed & walk-in wardrobe. The apt. boasts a spacious living & dining area and laundry room with both a washer & dryer. Centrally located & nestled on a quiet street.

name: The Caledonian @ Haymarket
description:
Welcome to your home away from home on Caledonian Road! This beautiful newly renovated ground floor apartment blends modern comfort with classic Edinburgh charm, making it the perfect base for exploring the city.

Just a short walk from Haymarket Station, the apartment offers easy access to Edinburgh’s top attractions, including the Castle, Princes Street, and the Old Town.

Whether you're visiting for work or pleasure, you'll love the blend of style, convenience, and location provided.

name: Single room in 3 bed house
description: Nice sunny and neat single room with direct bus connection to airport and train station, it's in a quiet residential area 5 minutes walk to bus stop and supermarket, 20 minutes bus ride to city centre, free parking at the back of the house.

name: New Town Cottage.
description: Experience a unique stay in a charming  mews cottage located in the tranquil cobbled streets of the  New Town. This A-listed treasure beautifully combines character with modern amenities. Upon entering, you're greeted by a bright, airy sitting room featuring French doors that open to a secure garden. The thoughtfully designed kitchen includes a cozy breakfast bar and leads onto a convenient shower room. On the lower level, you'll find two inviting double bedrooms and a well-appointed bathroom.

name: Craig’s Lair – Boho Jungle
description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. Tucked away in Edinburgh’s charming West End, this cosy lair is full of character, think rich wood, leafy greenery, and treasures from around the world. Unwind in the copper bathtub, relax among earthy textures, and enjoy a peaceful escape just a short stroll from Princes Street, Dean Village, and the city’s best cafés and shops.

name: Modern 2 bedroom Flat - 15 mins from city centre
description:
Experience the beauty & history of Edinburgh in this spacious & stylish ground floor 2-bedroom main door flat
✔️Located in the north of the city centre
✔️2.6 miles from Edinburgh city centre & well connected by direct public transport.
✔️5 min walk to efficient bus links
✔️2.9 miles from Murrayfield stadium - direct bus links.
✔️Walking distance to Botanic gardens & Stockbridge
✔️Less than 5 min walk to supermarket & local shops
✔️Less than 10 min walk to modern hotel with gym, spa & pool

name: Ensuite in a modern flat
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Central Fringe Festival Flat
description: Amazing stay in Edinburgh! Super comfortable, which feels like home. Easy to find, great location – close to everything! The neighbourhood is really safe, and having a lock on the doors. The place is very clean and organized. Plus, two bathrooms and a kitchen is a huge bonus. Check-in and check-out are easy. Perfect for exploring Edinburgh, especially during Fringe Festival!

name: 2 Steel's Place
description: Spacious main door flat in the bustling Morningside area and within walking distance of the city centre

name: Private and Prestigious Luxury Home
description:
SUMMARY
✔ Premium and Spacious 6-bedroom luxury house nestled in the prestigious neighbourhood of Ravelston, Edinburgh
✔ 5,600 ft² | 520 m²
✔ 6 bedrooms
✔ 5 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped open-plan kitchen and dining area
✔ Situated in a quiet residential area surrounded by greenery
✔ 10-minute walk to West End of Edinburgh City Centre
✔ Wi-Fi: Fast (40–100 Mbps)
✔ Private garden and outdoor seating area
✔ 1 free private parking for 1 car on the driveway and paid on-street parking for maximu

name: Central Edinburgh Room for Rent
description: A bright and comfortable room available in a shared apartment, located in a quiet area just a 15-minute walk from Princes Street. The flat is shared with friendly flatmates and includes a shared bathroom and fully equipped kitchen. Ideal for students or professionals looking for a peaceful stay in the heart of Edinburgh.

name: Stylish Spacious Flat | Great Location + PS5
description: Stylish and well-equipped flat in central Edinburgh with a large lounge, two big-screen TVs, a PlayStation 5, and lots of natural light. A perfect base for couples, families, or professionals.

name: Bright Cosy Room On the Meadows
description:
Large room available in a central Newington flatshare during the Fringe. Just a few minutes from the Meadows and Arthur’s Seat, with great access to festival venues, bars, pubs and restaurants.
10 minute walk from bristo square
20 minute walk from waverley
40 minute bus from the airport
The flat has a quiet, secluded garden and fire pit at the back and a private patio at the front. Friendly, relaxed atmosphere in a spacious flat with two young professional flatmates and up to two other guests.

name: Central Old Town Apartment Near Castle
description:
Discover the charm of Edinburgh’s Old Town in this stylish third floor apartment, just moments from the Grassmarket, Royal Mile, and Castle. Enjoy good views, a well-equipped kitchen, a peaceful bedroom, fast Wi-Fi, and a cosy lounge—ideal for relaxing after exploring the beauty of Edinburgh and the historic centre.

Blending historic character with practical comforts, this one-bedroom flat is great for solo travellers, couples, or business guests seeking a central, authentic Edinburgh stay.

name: Bright, sunny top floor flat
description: [August availability only] Perfectly located for walking to festival venues, with bus and tram stops just around the corner. Being on the top floor, it’s peaceful and quiet. The kitchen, with its big table and brand-new window, is the heart of the home. The living room has a cozy window seat overlooking beautiful oak trees—perfect for morning coffee. And for those chilly Edinburgh nights, the new wood burner will keep you warm and snug.

name: Stylish Flat by Arthur’s Seat
description: Stylish, newly renovated 1-bed flat in the heart of Abbeyhill, steps from Holyrood Park, Arthur’s Seat, and the Royal Mile. This bright, modern space features a sleek kitchen, cozy living area, and calming Scandi-style decor. Perfect for couples or solo travellers looking to explore Edinburgh’s historic centre, local cafés, and green spaces. Fast Wi-Fi, smart TV, and self check-in included.

name: Two bedroom flat just off Leith Walk
description: Bright, peaceful two-bedroom flat with balcony set over two floors. Great location just off Leith Walk between central Edinburgh and The Shore. Excellent transport links, buses run regularly along Leith Walk and there’s a tram stop two minutes away with direct service to the airport.

name: Festival Glamping - Orchard Park
description: Enjoy a unique glamping experience on Drum Estate, approx 15/20 minutes from Edinburgh’s city centre and Fringe venues. Our 5m Bell Tents include foam beds, bedding, and pillows for a restful stay. The site offers a bar, chill-out area, gaming machines, charging tables, and a firepit. With on-site parking, 24-hour security, and easy public transport, it’s a perfect retreat. Bedding is provided, with weekly changeovers, ensuring comfort throughout your stay.

name: Central Dalkeith road apartment
description:
Located in Newington, with public transport located directly outside,
2.3km away from city centre. Spacious property with three bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a comfortable living room. With Edinburgh’s historic old town located 6mins away by car.

With a 10min walk to Hollyrood park with royal commonwealth pool near by. And Edinburgh university halls near by.

The royal mile is a 20min walk, Cameron Toll shopping centre 10mins away. This apartment is perfect to explore what Edinburgh has to offer.

name: Heart of the City – 3 Bedroom Oasis
description: Welcome to your perfect retreat in the very heart of Edinburgh! This spacious 3-bedroom oasis is just a one-minute walk from vibrant Princes Street and located in a prime neighbourhood near the trendy St James Quarter—you will have the best of the city at your doorstep! The apartment is very centrally located yet wonderfully peaceful. Inside, you will find a bright, tastefully decorated space with a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable living area and all the essentials for a relaxing stay.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cozy 1 double bedroom in Leith
description: Cozy 1 double bedroom in leith. Access to lots of local amenities (corner shops) and 5 min walk away from Leith Walk where you can find a plethora of local cafes and restaurants! Good transport links. Bus stops around the corner (less than 5 min walk) that take you into central. Tram stop (less than 5 min walk) that takes you straight to the airport (~30 mins).

name: Cosy double room w/ shared areas
description:
Double bedroom within a spacious and homely residence within Edinburgh city centre.

On street parking available
Fully furnished
Wi-fi available
10 minute walk from Haymarket train station
Local amenities, shops and transport links on the doorstep
Peaceful residential area with access to a private garden at the rear of the property

name: Charming Edinburgh Apartment in the Heart of the C
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Cosy Georgian Stockbridge Flat
description: Top floor (second floor) Georgian townhouse flat. Nestled in the heart of Stockbridge with incredible light all day and amazing views of the city. Set in a leafy, quiet but central part of Stockbridge. A stones throw from the famous Lannan bakery, water of Leith walkway and Inverleith park. A perfect relaxing retreat for a couple or solo traveller.

name: Central 3 bed apt on Rose street
description:
This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.

Locates on a busy pedestrian street, where there are a lot of pubs, bars and restaurants. Fantastic view of castle is just minutes away. You will be in the centre of everything.

name: Leith Luxe Retreat
description: Modern 1-bedroom flat in vibrant Leith, just minutes from the city centre and well-connected by nearby main roads. Bright and stylish, the space features an open-plan living area, fully equipped kitchen, and a comfortable bedroom – ideal for solo travellers or couples. Enjoy easy access to shops, cafés, and the Shore's lively waterfront. A great base to explore Edinburgh with comfort and convenience.

name: Spacious Premium King Room in New Town, Edinburgh
description:
Luxury large private room in a quiet Canonmills/New Town flat, just a short walk to the city centre and Stockbridge. You’ll share a bathroom and shower in the hall with the live-in host.

The flat is clean, simple, and ideal for solo travellers or couples.

Please note there’s no full kitchen, but a kettle available for light use.

Great cafés, shops, and bus links nearby. Friendly host happy to offer local tips while respecting your space

name: Cosy room in Edinburgh
description:
Your cosy Edinburgh nest awaits! This snug, private bedroom includes a comfy double bed, storage and access to shared bathroom (no living room/ kitchen). Just 25 minutes by bus to the Royal Mile, making it an ideal base for exploring. Peaceful residential area - perfect for solo travellers or couples. Strictly no parties or smoking!
We do own a kitten, just so you know :) She will not be allowed in your room!
We can’t wait to welcome you to Edinburgh!

name: Spacious Edinburgh Apartment
description:
Traditional bright and sunny Edinburgh tenement flat situated at the top of Easter Road - a neighbourhood full of independent shops, cafes, pubs, restaurants and more. A 12 minute walk from Arthur's Seat and even closer to the bottom of Canongate.

The property benefits from a large bay-windowed living room, a box room/study with storage and a quiet rear-facing bedroom and kitchen-dining room.

A beautiful property for individuals or couples visiting Edinburgh for leisure or for work.

name: Gorgeous 2 bed apartment
description: Charming 2-bed 19th-century tenement flat beside peaceful woodlands, rich with wildlife. Explore scenic nature trails right from the door, leading across Edinburgh. Just 10 mins by bus to city centre, 15 mins to Cramond Beach. Dean Village is a 25-min walk, with a retail park and gym just 5 mins away—perfect for nature lovers and city explorers alike.

name: Flat in Edinburgh
description:
A bright, welcoming flat ideally situated between the city centre and Leith. Located directly next to McDonald Road tram stop, making it easy to travel around Edinburgh. There are many bars, restaurants and cafes on the doorstep, and Edinburgh city centre is a short 10 minute walk away.

A spacious apartment with one double and one sofa bed. The flat is equipped with everything you need for your stay in the city.

name: Contemporary 5 bed townhouse
description: Enjoy a stay at this luxury townhouse - spread across three floors, thoughtfully renovated to a high specification and a wonderfully central location - a perfect spot to enjoy your time in Edinburgh from.

name: Edinburgh Charm Apartment near Springfield Lane
2 bed top floor renovated flat
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located flat, Just 10 mins on the bus to the city centre.  On the top floor (3rd floor, no lift) a traditional tenement. Stones throw to Hollywood park, and less than 2 miles to  portobello beach.  The apartment has 2 double bedrooms and a kitchen living-room, modern bathroom, very peaceful and great views over Edinburgh. fully equipped with wifi / netflix , washing machine and modern bathroom. Supermarket very close by along with great transport

name: Cosy private double room
description:
Cosy Private Double Room near Edinburgh City Centre

Welcome to your home away from home in beautiful Edinburgh!

This listing is perfect for solo travellers, couples, or business guests. It offers a comfy double bed, fresh linens and towels, toiletries, hair dryer, TV and free high speed Wi-Fi.

Located in a quiet area just 10 minutes from the city centre via tram, bus or car.

name: Double room with sofa bed
description:
Spacious sun-filled double bedroom looking onto our private garden. Ideal for couples or families planning to enjoy hogmany activities, but looking for somewhere quiet to retreat to.

Enjoy a light breakfast, relaxing garden with dome, and shared access to bathroom, kitchen, and living room.

We have a sofa bed that would suit a child or adult.

Close to nature and local amenities.

Frequent buses (3, 7, 29, X29, 18) to city centre and airport.

name: Two double rooms with private bathroom
description:
2 Private Double Bedrooms, Private Bathroom

Perfect for friends, families, or small groups planning to enjoy hogmany activities, but looking for somewhere quiet to retreat to.

You’ll have exclusive use of two private double bedrooms and a private bathroom, plus shared access to our kitchen, living room, garden and dome.

Light breakfast included (tea, coffee, toast & cereals)

Free on-site parking

🐾 Meet Maisie, our playful dog who is very good with children.

name: Urban Retreat with Free parking
description:
Our home is set in a peaceful residential area beside a lovely park, yet only 5 minute walk to local shops and cafes.
The tram is just short walk away, offering direct links to the airport and city centre for easy exploring. You’ll be close to some Edinburgh’s best-loved pubs and restaurants, where you can enjoy authentic, less touristy vibe. The Shore and the scenic Water of Leith are just short stroll away-perfect for discovering otherside of the city.

name: Lovely double bedroom
description: Bring yourself to this great place with lots of room and fun visit to beautiful city centre of Edinburgh.

name: Cozy Edinburgh Bungalow  every 5 min buses to city
Festival Flat
description: Enjoy all of Edinburgh's Summer attractions from this lovingly decorated central apartment in a beautiful listed building just around the corner from the castle. A perfect base for the Fringe Festival or Summer holidays.

name: Super Central Edinburgh Festival - Room A
description:
Super Central Flat - 10 min walk to most festival venues
Fantastic Views of Meadows, Edinburgh castle
Family welcome for real taste of Edinburgh life, but very private accommodation and bathrooms
Please note that we have a pet dog (Simba) who will also be in the property

name: One bedroom flat, central Edi
description:
Step into this beautifully characterful tenement flat nestled in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic Old Town. With high ceilings and sash windows, the space marries traditional charm with modern comfort.

Just a short stroll to Princes Street, the Royal Mile, Grassmarket and many other Edinburgh city centre attractions. You’ll be surrounded by cafés, artisan shops, charming restaurants and pubs alongside superb transport links. The perfect base for sightseeing, working or soaking up the Fringe!

name: Luxury Retreat by Beach, Sauna + Plunge - Sleeps 4
description:
Unwind in total luxury just 5 minutes from the shores of Cramond Beach and 15 minutes from central Edinburgh. This fully renovated two-bedroom, three-bathroom home offers the rare mix of city access, coastal calm, and spa indulgence — complete with private wood burning sauna and cold-water plunge.

Perfect for couples, families, executives, or anyone looking for a restorative escape with high-end comfort and privacy.

name: Stylish 2BR Near Arthur’s Seat & Waverley Station
description: Stay in this stylish and bright 2BR flat just minutes from Edinburgh Waverley Station. Perfect for exploring the Royal Mile, Holyrood Park & Arthur’s Seat, all within walking distance. The stylish open-plan living features a modern kitchen, dining space, and comfy lounge with natural light. Ideal for families, friends, or business stays, with high-speed WiFi, and ergonomic desks for remote work. A welcoming base to enjoy Edinburgh’s top sights and vibrant city life.

name: Clean 3 bed flat, main door
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. Flat is basic but clean and located on quiet residential area, 3 bedrooms , living room , kitchen and 1 shower room.

name: A nice cosy flat close to centre
description: A perfect blend of comfort and convenience in a peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Leafy villa in conservation area Central Edinburgh
description:
This is a glorious first and second floor maisonette in a listed villa forming part of a Victorian house situated on a leafy street in the Grange conservation area of Edinburgh.

The two public rooms have high ceilings and large windows, benefitting from afternoon and evening light. the four bedrooms have glorious views out to Arthur's Seat.

The property is accessed via two flights of steps to the first floor front door.

There is 350MB fibre broadband throughout; an ideal corporate let.

name: Castle Suite Apartment Luxury Two Bed, So Central!
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Extremely central & spacious flat
description:
A very spacious 3 bedroom flat available for booking.
The flat is located in the heart of Edinburgh. Less than a 5 min stroll to Princess Street & just a 0.4mile walk to the entrance of Edinburgh Castle.
The flat is exactly how you see in the photos. Lovely working sauna to relax after the long days on your feet around the city.
Please feel free to message me with any questions you may have.
I look forward to hosting you and being part of your visit to Edinburgh.

name: Cosy Haven in Central Edinburgh
description: Welcome to your cosy home in Edinburgh! The flat is in a great location: right next to the Meadows park and situated in the heart of the Fringe. Surrounded by cafes, restaurants and shops; there are great transport links and it is within 15-20mins walk of the Grassmarket, the Royal Mile and Edinburgh City Centre.

name: Accomodation West Edinburgh
description:
At Hillview Drive , our accommodation offers the perfect blend of comfort and convienience .
Located just 20 mins from Edinburgh`s vibrant city center , our property is well-connected by excellent public transport links , making your exploration of the city effortless.

name: Elegant georgian apartment close to attractions
description:
Located on the beautiful old cobbled roads of Edinburgh New Town, this quiet Georgian flat is situated in the heart of Edinburgh and is your perfect starting point for that couples get away, business trip or holiday with friends.

With it being a short 5 minutes walk from Edinburgh's bustling St James Centre, a 10 minute walk to Princes Street and Edinburgh Waverly Station and a 15 minute walk to the Royal Mile, you'll find your self stuck in the thick of Scotland's city of Culture and Art.

name: Urban Oasis Apartment
description: Stay in this centrally-located place for your family to enjoy the convenience of being close to everything.Three spacious double bedrooms and a sofa bed in the living room can accommodate up to 8 people.Super convenient surroundings.

name: cozy wee flat.
description:
Enjoy a memorable visit when you stay in this unique place.. my own personal abode.
2 mins walk to bustling high street.
500 steps to beach.
private balcony with view of Arthur's seat.
original decor .
original working fire place.. minimum 2 night stay

name: Cozy single bedroom in Leith
description: Cozy 1 bedroom flat available in Leith. Located on leith walk with access to lots of local amenities (corner shops) and a plethora of local cafes and restaurants. Great transport links with bus and tram stops around the corner (~5 min walk or less). Tram takes you straight to the airport in ~30 mins. Please note this is a shared flat with myself and other guests. Shared bathroom with complementary toiletries. Kitchen comes with all utensils and washing machine) and feel free to cook!

name: At the heart of the Shore area.
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this contemporary apartment, at the heart of the Shore area. With Tram access to the entire city just a 1 minute walk away, free parking, in a new build development, a short stroll from the areas famous restaurants and coffee shop culture.

name: Central cosy, single room
description:
This is my little single room that I am renting out, and should be a perfect base during the festival time in Edinburgh. It's simple but clean and cosy.

You'll have storage space, and access to the kitchen/ living room area.

It's quiet, secure and has a super comfy bed and plenty of storage available. Prepare to sleep like a log after a long day!

name: Cozy Flat in Edinburgh!
description: Relax in this bright, cozy flat in quiet West Edinburgh. Perfect for couples, families, solo travelers, or remote workers. Just 4 miles to the city centre (about 25 mins by bus) and 5 miles to Edinburgh Airport (about 20 mins by bus). Enjoy a comfy bedroom, balcony, kitchen, bathroom and on-street parking. Close to Murrayfield Stadium, shops, Corstorphine Hill, Edinburgh Zoo, and great transport links to the old town, university and new town. A peaceful base for work or sightseeing.

name: Modern room in Portobello, Edinburgh
description:
Modern first floor flat a short walk from Portobello high street and beach, which offers lots of cafes and restaurants and the perfect place to escape central Edinburgh.

The flat is a 5 minute walk from Aldi with a bus stop which takes you directly to Edinburgh city centre in 20 minutes and operates 24/7.

The flat is very bright, spacious and fully equipped inc. coffee machine. There is also free parking in the development. You will have a double bedroom with access to a private bathroom.

name: Balfour flat
description: Leith Walk is one of Edinburgh’s most vibrant and eclectic streets, stretching from the heart of the city centre down toward the historic port district of Leith. Lined with a mix of traditional tenements, independent shops, cafés, bars, and international eateries. This bustling street is well-connected by public transport, providing a link to key destinations, including Princes St and Edinburgh Airport. If you're commuting, sightseeing, or heading out for coffee, my flat is a well-placed option

name: Home away from Home
description: Stay in this homely cosy peaceful room with a beautiful Forrest/garden view. Edinburgh tall sash windows and thoughtful decor. This room is a quiet sanctuary tucked in the middle of the city. Main road access + regular bus links  + airport/rail access can be found on the street. Easy walk to main tourist hot spots such as Royal mile, Arthur’s seat and Edinburgh Castle within short walking distance. The neighbourhood is a friendly residential area with plenty cafes & bars nearby. Fringe access 🏡

name: Budget low attic for one
description:
This is a small, cosy room with sloping ceiling wall. It is suitable for a single traveler under 1.80m tall.

Just 3 min to the bus stop, 15-20 min to Edinburgh's top attractions like the Castle, Dean Village, Old Town. Your stay is in a peaceful, historical area with easy access to transport, city centre, airport, and Murrayfield Stadium.
A nature walk is nearby, and fast WiFi is included.

Please note: no access to the kitchen or living room, but microwave use can be arranged.

name: Sharp & Modern apartment near Cramond in Edinburgh
description:
Step into your home away from home in this bright, stylish apartment designed for comfort and convenience. Perfect for couples, families, or friends travelling together.

You’ll be close to the excitement of the city centre of Edinburgh, but without being too far from somewhere you can escape to for some peace and quiet.

Nearby, Cramond Village offers stunning views of the Firth of Forth, a popular choice for those who head here to walk and cycle on the beachside paths.

name: Central and Large Mews House
description:
Welcome to our listing for your perfect home to enjoy & explore Edinburgh

3 Bed
3 Bathroom
Large Open Plan Kitchen with High End Appliances.

Our home sits at the end of a quiet and secluded street with no through traffic and can be incredibly peaceful for such a central location. The home benefits from various amenities including super fast broadband internet (200MB), 70 Inch TV with Netflix, Office with Printer, Washing Machine, Clothes Washer & Dryer.

name: Cosy and bright double room with breakfast
description:
Bright, cosy, and quiet double bedroom with breakfast in a flat shared with the owners.

Breakfast included: we offer a help-yourself breakfast comprising bread, a selection of spreads, cereals and tea/coffee between 7-10 am.

We live in a residential area with excellent transport links to the centre (20 min by bus or tram) and 10 min walk from Murrayfield stadium. (Bus 2 min walk and tram 5 min walk).
Access to communal spaces (kitchen, bathroom and living room) shared with us.

name: Immaculate Central Maindoor Gem-Easy access
description: Beautifully renovated central ground floor flat, with easy access. Most comfortable hosting up to 4, maximum hosting 6 guests with brand new flooring, painting, kitchen, bathroom and all furnitures. 1 bed, 2 sofa beds, 43 inch smart TV and Full fibre Wi-Fi available throughout. Next to Union Canal and Fountain Park retail/ entertainment compound. Short stroll to Grassmarket, Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle, perfect for sightseeing, festivals, theatres, and restaurants.

name: NEW to AirBnB - Lovely stylish New Town home
description: My flat is very central, only 6 minutes walk to George Street and very close to the gorgeous shops and market in Stockbridge. It’s been featured in four interior design magazines and is beautifully decorated throughout. It is on a no through street so it’s very quiet. It’s normally a home and is only on air bnb for the festival so it is in very good condition. I’m looking forward to hosting you! Thanks Sally

name: Cosy & Super Central Apartment in Leith - F10
description:
This traditional Scottish home is located in the bustling city centre area of Leith Walk on Elm Row. It is just a few minutes walk from the tram stop & the main Waverley train station (very convenient for arriving and departing)

There is an abundance of restaurants, bars and shops right at your door & every main tourist attraction is within walking distance - you couldn’t hope for a more central location to explore Edinburgh!

I have 12 years of experience on Airbnb & over 7000 positive reviews

name: Cosy Meadows room
description: Enjoy a cosy and welcoming stay in this stylish 3rd floor tenement flat centrally located for the meadows, Edinburgh's old town and city centre

name: Super Central King Bed Private Room on Elm Row-R22
description:
This traditional Scottish home is located in the bustling city centre area of Leith Walk. It is just a few minutes walk from the tram stop & the main Waverley train station (very convenient for arriving and departing)

There is an abundance of restaurants, bars and shops right at your door & every main tourist attraction is within walking distance - you couldn’t hope for a more central location to explore Edinburgh!

I have 12 years of experience on Airbnb & over 7000 positive reviews

name: Murrayfield Gem
description:
Stylish, self-contained, light-filled apartment in quiet Murrayfield, just minutes from the city centre. Sleeps 5 with 2 double bedrooms and a sofa bed. Features a unique atrium-lit hallway, brand new kitchen and bathroom, and stunning views of Murrayfield Stadium and the Pentland Hills. Easy access to trams, buses, and Water of Leith walkway. Perfect for couples, friends, or families seeking a bright, comfortable city retreat.

Not suitable for children under 8 or people with mobility issues

name: Central Edinburgh Prime Luxury
description:
This exquisite City Centre apartment complex is located directly off to the side of Princes Street, only 40 meters away, with views out over the streets of Edinburgh and the Castle.

Located on the top floor of the building and stretching further via internal stairs up to the master bedroom with has it's own en suite bathroom.

There's two further bedrooms, each with twin beds, a main bathroom and a sofa bed in the living room.
Elevator access

High Speed wifi and luxury finishes throughout.

name: Double room in 2 beds Flat in Edinburgh
description: Located in a quiet and peaceful residential area, walkable distant to the Murrayfield Stadium; less than 15-20 minutes by public transport to city centre.

name: Beautiful New Town Mews
description: This unique mews house is in the heart of central Edinburgh on a quiet lane within the renowned New Town. This house is the ideal base for exploring the capital city.  The accommodation is over three floors with private patio area that enjoys afternoon and evening sun. The lower level provides a spacious lounge/dining space with sliding doors which lead out to a small rear private patio area. On the upper bedroom floor there is a king size bed with French doors opening to a Juliet balcony.

name: Cozy private room/Great location
description:
Cozy Private Room in Peaceful Flat
Comfortable, clean room in a quiet flat with easy access to public transport and shops. Ideal for solo travelers or professionals. Shared access to kitchen, bathroom & living area. Wi-Fi, fresh linens, and towels provided. Host on-site, respectful of your privacy. A calm, homely space for short or extended stays. Message with any questions!

name: Central two bedroom apartment beside Meadows.
description:
Bright & Central Two-Bedroom Flat in the Heart of Newington, Edinburgh

Welcome to our charming two-bedroom flat, ideally located in the vibrant Newington area of Edinburgh.

Whether you're here for a weekend getaway or a longer stay, this spacious and light-filled apartment offers the perfect home base to explore the city's historic sights and local gems.

name: Modern Studios with Kitchen & Ensuite
description:
✔ Private studios in a peaceful canal-side location in central Edinburgh
✔ Fully furnished with ensuite bathroom and kitchen
✔ Max occupancy: 2 guests per studio
✔ Ideal for couples, solo travellers, and remote workers
✔ Access to multiple shared amenities: lounge, courtyard, cinema room, and more
✔ Essentials, linens, towels provided
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Wi-Fi included
✔ Key pick-up at Grove House Hotel by Joivy (70-72 Grove St) – open 24/7

name: Elegant Town house in Edinburgh
description: Spacious 4-bedroom home on Hailes St with 1 king, 1 double, and 3 single beds—ideal for families or groups. Features 2 bathrooms (including an en-suite), a fully equipped kitchen, and a private backyard with outdoor dining. Quiet location with easy access to central Edinburgh. Perfect for a comfortable and convenient stay!

name: Albion Gardens room
description:
Sharing flat with private room and bath
“Bright, sunny room opposite Arthur’s Seat. Private bathroom, peaceful stay with stunning views.”
5 minutes from city centre

name: Edinburgh city center home!
description:
Notice: we re at central location and walking distance to everywhere.
Due to the peak season, The pictures of the rooms are real.
Please note that the room must pass through the stairs as shown in the picture, so if you cannot accept climbing the stairs, please do not book a room.

Host can only meet u up by appointment. Pls inform us the meet up time as soon as possible! There's no self-check in !
Heavy delay will need to be rescheduled another meeting time. Thank u for ur understanding.

name: Homely 2-Bed FREE PARK
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful, homely 2-bed flat in Edinburgh. The apartment features two spacious bedrooms with one king-size bed and two single beds, along with two modern bathrooms for added comfort. Lovingly decorated with a warm, lived-in feel, it offers a fully equipped kitchen to make you feel right at home. Free parking is included, making it easy to explore Edinburgh and beyond. Perfect for families, friends or colleagues looking for a comfortable stay in the city.

name: Coastal 1 Bed Steps to Beach Free Park
description: Charming 1-bed flat just steps from Portobello Beach! 2nd Floor, no lift - Sleeps 4 with comfy double bed plus 2 singles in living room. Fully equipped kitchen, bright bathroom with bath/shower, Wi-Fi, smart TV. Walk to cafés, shops, and the promenade; take a quick bus to Edinburgh city centre. Perfect for couples, friends, or families seeking a cosy seaside escape with easy access to city sights. Enjoy the best of beach life and vibrant Edinburgh in this welcoming flat!

name: Cosy private room in city centre
description: En-suite bedroom with king-size bed. Walking distance to Edinburgh centre

name: Cosy 2-Bed Flat in Central Edinburgh
description: Enjoy the conveniences of central Edinburgh from the comfort of our friendly flat.  The flat has two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a double sofa bed in the sitting room. We have a kitchen with direct garden access and also a seating area out the front of the flat to enjoy a morning coffee on a sunny day. Around the corner are an array of coffee shops and restaurants along Leith Walk and Easter Road.  Situated at the base of Carlton Hill, wake up to morning walks for stunning views of the city.

name: Beautiful two bed in New Town
description: Experience classic Edinburgh living in this elegant 2-bedroom flat on. Featuring a huge, light-filled living room, stylish kitchen, and a modern bath, this Georgian home blends period charm with contemporary comfort—perfect for relaxing after exploring the city

name: 4Bed 2Bath Luxe + Home Cinema
description: This 4-Bed Luxe + Home Cinema offers the perfect mix of space, comfort, and style. Ideally located close to the city centre, it features four beautifully designed bedrooms, two bathrooms, private parking, and a dedicated home cinema for cozy nights in. The elegant interiors and high-end touches create a homely yet luxurious feel. Whether you’re unwinding after a day of exploring or spending quality time with loved ones, this home has everything you need for a relaxing and memorable stay.

name: Cosy private room in city centre
description: En-suite bedroom with king-size bed. Walking distance to Edinburgh centre

name: Chic 2-Bed Near Centre
description: Modern and quiet 2-bed flat, 2nd floor, perfectly located just a 5-minute tram ride to Edinburgh city centre. Sleeps up to 5 guests with 2 comfortable double beds and a sofa bed (not as comfortable in the living area, please request it in advance). Enjoy a bright, open-plan kitchen and lounge, a stylish bathroom, fast Wi-Fi, and a smart TV. It is ideal for families, friends, or business travellers looking for a peaceful stay with easy access to the city’s top attractions, shops, and restaurants.

name: Entire apartment near Old Town
description: (Entire place) This beautiful apartment is only 10 minutes walk to the Royal Mile (Old Town), Holyrood park, the Scottish Parliament. Also near the Meadowbank  shopping centre (Sainsbury, Lidl, KFC, other shops). You will have the entire place, not shared. Perfect for the Fringe festival.

name: Stylish 1 bed flat in Leith
description:
This bright and stylish 1 bed 1 bath flat is tucked away in vibrant Leith - one of the city’s most buzzing neighbourhoods, packed with cafes, restaurants and character.

The flat offers:

One double bedroom
Open-plan living and dining area
Fully equipped modern kitchen
Fast WiFi and smart TV
Located a short stroll from the Shore and just a quick bus or tram ride into the city centre

name: Cosy Ground Floor 3BR Apartment in Leith Edinburgh
description: Welcome to our stylish ground-floor apartment in the vibrant heart of Leith! This spacious and comfortable home is ideally located for discovering Edinburgh’s top sights. Enjoy a scenic 20-minute walk to the Royal Yacht Britannia or Princes Street, with the historic charm of the Old Town just beyond. Perfect for couples, friends, or solo travelers looking to explore the city from a lively and well-connected neighborhood.Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Fabulous City Centre 4-Bed Retreat
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips. A spacious 4-bedroom flat for up to 8 guests, it features 4 bedrooms with a shared shower room and a luxurious jacuzzi bath in another. Located in Edinburgh’s vibrant West End, you’re steps from Princes Street, Haymarket, the Usher Hall, and trendy bars and cafes. Perfect for large families or groups exploring the city with comfort and style. Enjoy elegant interiors, city views, and a relaxing, homely atmosphere.

name: Comfortable 2 Bedroom Apt. on Thistle Street
description: Experience the charm of Edinburgh from this delightful apartment on Thistle Street, ideally situated in the heart of the city.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Free Parking | Sleeps 6 | Central | Good Location
description:
Located just 10 minutes from the heart of Edinburgh, this bright and comfortable apartment offers a private driveway, garden area, and convenient access to public transport.

Ideal for groups or families, the property features three double beds and sleeps up to six guests. The bathroom includes both a shower and a bathtub for added comfort. Enjoy a spacious kitchen with dining area and a large, inviting living room, perfect for relaxing after exploring the city.

name: View Colony Room!
description: Stay here for The spectacular Peace of The city to enjoy your space in one of The Oldest Colony in Edinburgh.

name: 3-Bedroom Home w/ Peaceful Garden
description:
Relax in this peaceful 3-bedroom home with a private garden, just a 15 minutes bus from both Edinburgh Airport and the city centre.

Beach is a 5-minute walk in one direction, and local shops are just 5 minutes in the other. Ideal for families, groups, or Fringe Festival visitors, guests can enjoy the comfort of a full home with a kitchen, cosy living space, and free Wi-Fi, and on-street parking. A quiet, well-connected base for your Edinburgh stay.

name: Cozy cabin with private hot tub
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. With exclusive use of hot tub.
Only 15min to Edinburgh city centre by train and 1hour to Glasgow centre
Regular bus service into city centre (every 15min) a 30min journey.
5min walk to local shops, bakery, pharmacy and pub.
7min walk from water of leith walk way.
Harlaw reservoir and the pentland hills are only 12min drive away or around an hour walk.
Close to Herriot watt university- 5 min drive or 25min walk
15min from Edinburgh airport on

name: Sensational Stay@ Fountainbridge
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Fantastic New Town apartment with private parking
description:
Super central, stylish and modern 2 bed flat with tiled walk in shower room, combi boiler and modern amenities throughout. All linen provided.
Private parking available.
Close to Leith Walk/Picardy Place tram stops, 5 minutes walk to Edinburgh Playhouse & St James Quarter and 10 minutes walk from Edinburgh Waverley Train station & Princes Street.

Walking distance to various shops, independent restaurants & bars (Leith Walk & Broughton Street) as well only 1.5miles to trendy Stockbridge.

name: Dean Village Riverside
description:
Nestled in the heart of the Dean Village conservation area along the banks of the Water of Leith is this spacious townhouse set over three levels. Boasting superb water views, a balcony, a garage and a private rear garden. This delightful family home is in a tranquil, yet well-connected central location.

Walking distance to the Old Town, New Town, Stockbridge, Botanic Gardens, Princes Street, Edinburgh Castle, museums, galleries and Murrayfield Stadium for Rugby and concerts.

name: Cozy Apartment
description:
Tranquil 3rd floor apartment in an excellent central location with views of historic Edinburgh. Friendly, energetic vibe in the local area. Award winning restaurants and grocers less than a minute from your doorstep. Ideal for all visits to Edinburgh, leisure or business.
(No elevator - only stair access)

name: Room in Edinburgh 1
description:
This charming , double room offers the perfect blend of modern comfort and classic style ideal for travelling a peaceful and yet vibrant base no far away from the city.

One full bathroom shared with guests in the other room and the host.

name: Newly Renovated Flat Edinburgh - 2 x Beds
description:
Newly renovated flat in Edinburgh - 1 Double bed, 1 x Double sofa bed

Free Parking

Central to all of Edinburgh key attractions:
Murrayfield Stadium 1.2 miles
Princes Street 1.9 miles
Royal Mile 2.7 miles
Edinburgh Castle 2.6 Miles
Hillend Ski Centre 4.5 Miles
Edinburgh Airport 6 Miles

name: Outstanding home in Edinburgh.
description: Very spacious home with a short distance to Murrayfield and city centre. Local shop across the road for those last minute groceries. Large enclosed back garden and a spacious hallway. A truly relaxing and enjoyable place to stay with a pool table included! Bus stop within a 2 minute walk and shopping centre close by.

name: Stunning 3Bed | Balcony | Free Parking
description:
Spacious and newly furnished 3 Bedroom apartment with balcony in Edinburgh. Free parking and 10 minutes to City Centre. Great for travellers, families and those on business alike!

Step out and get easy access to public transport to Edinburgh's famous city centre including sites such as Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile, The Grassmarket, Princes Street and so much more!

Next to large supermarkets and petrol stations for your convenience.

Smart TV & Free WIFI :)

name: SuperB castle 3 bedroom house
description: Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place. With two double bedroom and one single bedroom. All families , youth couple , professionals , retired guests with a comfortable stay

name: Cosy & Central Private Room in Modern Flat - R4
description:
This traditional Scottish home is located in the bustling West End of Edinburgh. It is just a 1 minute walk from the tram stop & the main Haymarket train station (very convenient for arriving and departing)

There is an abundance of restaurants, bars and shops right at your door & every main tourist attraction is within walking distance - you couldn’t hope for a more central location to explore Edinburgh!

I have 12 years of experience on Airbnb & over 7000 positive reviews

name: Elegant 2BR Apartment on Leven St
description:
Modern 2-bedroom apartment in central Edinburgh, just a 15-minute walk from the Castle. Ideal for couples, families, or business travellers seeking a stylish, well-located base with easy access to shops, restaurants, and transport.

License Number: EH-89936-T

name: Charming Edinburgh Apartment with City Views VERY
Cosy Stockbridge Home with Inverleith Park Views
description:
Welcome to our cosy home in the wonderfully cosmopolitan Stockbridge. Our location is the perfect base to explore the loveliest parts of Edinburgh with gorgeous old shops, cafes and bakeries just outside.

We have space for a maximum of four people in our home with one bedroom and a comfy double sofa bed in the sitting room which can become a second bedroom for your stay if required!

name: Cozy 1 bed Flat 5 Mins to City
description:
Welcome to our bright and spacious ground-floor flat on vibrant Leith Walk, just a 5-minute from Edinburgh city centre.

The flat features a large bedroom with a comfy double bed and wardrobe, a separate living room with a pull-out sofa bed and modern furnishings throughout. Enjoy a newly renovated wet room with walk-in shower and separate WC. The kitchen includes an oven, cooker, microwave, washing machine, and essentials.

just steps from tram stops and local shops Tesco & Best One 0.3 miles

name: Comfortable 2BR Relax & Explore
description: Welcome to your peaceful Edinburgh retreat! This bright and modern 2-bedroom flat is perfect for families, couples, or friends looking for a quiet stay with easy access to the city centre and Portobello. Located on the third floor (please note there is no lift), our home offers a comfortable space to relax after exploring Edinburgh’s historic sights.

name: Edinburgh Escape by the Meadows
description:
Our little Edinburgh escape by the Meadows is stylish, family-friendly, and full of heart. This is our beloved home-from-home; a bright and beautifully renovated ground-floor flat tucked just off Edinburgh’s leafy Meadows. When we’re off adventuring, we open it up to guests who we hope will feel as relaxed and content here as we do.

It’s perfect for couples, families with younger children or solo travellers looking for a comfortable base right in the heart of the city.

name: Modern city centre flat in Edinburghs Newtown
description:
Welcome to our modern, newly renovated flat in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic New Town. This stylish and fully equipped apartment offers the perfect base to explore everything the city has to offer.

The flat is bright, comfortable. You’ll have everything you need for a relaxed stay, including a modern kitchen, cosy living area, fast Wi-Fi, and a comfortable bed.


Located on a lively and central street, you’ll find great pubs, restaurants, cafés, and boutique shops right outside your door.

name: Edinburgh Old Town Apartment
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Great place to have a Base when visiting the City of Edinburgh. in the Heart of the Old Town. 10mins walk from Castle, Holyrood Palace and Scottish Parliament outside your door. Five mins walk to Arthur's Seat. lots Public transport if need to go anywhere in the City. Airport Bus available to High Street, or 10mins walk from Edinburgh Waverley Train Station.
You won't be disappointed.

name: Lochend Living
description:
Lochend Living is a bright and spacious apartment with lift access. It offers beautiful views of Lochend Loch at the front and the City of Edinburgh at the back.

The apartment is located in a quiet cul-de-sac two miles from the city centre and close to the local amenities on offer on Easter Road and Leith Walk. The area boasts a diverse array of small local retailers, cafes, and restaurants, providing a cosmopolitan atmosphere.

name: Edinburgh Central Cozy Flat
description:
Welcome to our spacious 3rd-floor flat in the heart of Edinburgh!

Just minutes from the Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace, and Fringe Festival fun. Sleeps up to 8 with 2 king beds, 1 double bed, and a comfy air bed on request. Enjoy a full kitchen, fridge/freezer, and separate shower and toilet. Perfect for families and groups looking to explore the city in comfort.

*Please beware, elevator is not available in the building.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 2Bedroom Apartment-Free Parking
description: Your first-floor apartment is in Liberton, a residential Edinburgh suburb, only 20 minutes by car from the city centre. Enjoy easy access with a bus stop just a 2-minute walk away. The apartment offers two double bedrooms, a living room sofa bed, free WiFi, toiletries, fresh linen, a fully equipped kitchen, a Smart TV, and free private parking.

name: Arthur's Seat Vista Apartment
description:
Wake to **stunning Arthur's Seat views** from your window! **Brand-new, stylish 1-bed apartment** in prime **Pleasance**. Steps from the Royal Mile (5min), Holyrood (10min), & vibrant cafes. Enjoy designer decor, a sleek kitchen & luxury bath. Your perfect city escape with iconic scenery!

✨ **Unbeatable Location**
🏔️ **Direct Volcano Views**
🆕 **Recently Renovated**

Ideal for couples & solo & family adventurers

name: Central Gem 24" Walk to centre
description:
Welcome to your cosy and stylish Edinburgh base in Waverley Park, 24 minutes walk from Princess Street. This 1-bedroom flat blends character with comfort, ideal for couples, solo travellers, or business guests looking for a quiet stay near the city centre.

Inside, you'll find warm touches, traditional furnishings, and everything you need to settle in and feel at home. peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Cosy & Central Free Parking
description:
Bright, well-equipped two-bedroom flat located on the first floor (please note: no lift access). This spacious apartment sleeps 4 and comes with free parking (on a first-come, first-served basis), a real bonus in the city!
Ideal for couples, families, or working travellers, you’ll enjoy a cosy living space with a smart TV, a fully equipped kitchen, and two comfortable bedrooms with fresh linen and towels provided. Fast WiFi and a modern shower room ensure a relaxed and connected stay.

name: City Centre Victorian 3-Bedroom
description: Beautiful Victorian flat in peaceful and upscale Marchmont, just 15 mins walk to the Royal Mile and National Museum. Overlooks The Meadows park with playground—perfect for families. 2 double beds, 1 single bed, plus a fold-out bed (on request). Sleeps up to 6. Safe area with shops and restaurants nearby. Fast Wi-Fi, fully equipped kitchen, washing machine. A charming, quiet retreat close to everything!

name: Entire Stylish and Chic Hideaway in Stockbridge
description:
Located in Stockbridge in the New Town Conservation Area, this sophisticated first floor 1-bedroom apartment on Henderson Row offers the perfect base for a holiday city escape. Well-served by Lothian Buses, the apartment makes it easy to discover Edinburgh’s most iconic attractions. Whether you're wandering the cobbled streets of the Old Town or admiring the grandeur of the New Town’s Georgian heritage.
- Comfortable double bedroom
- Open plan living, dining and kitchen space
- Walk-in shower

name: Beautiful Edinburgh flat.
description:
A very central Georgian flat, the main reception area is a former ball room, with 4m+ high ceilings and drawing room windows.

Two double rooms and one bunk room with 6 beds, it’s ideal for families.

Just a few minutes from the Haymarket tram stop, it’s perfect for those flying into Edinburgh airport, or arriving by train into Haymarket.

name: 11" Walk Royal Mile Cosy for 4
description: Welcome to your cosy Edinburgh retreat, just an 11-minute walk from the iconic Royal Mile. This top-floor (third floor, no lift) flat is full of charm and perfectly located in the heart of Edinburgh’s lively Southside. It's an ideal base for solo travellers, couples, friends, or a small family. Inside, you’ll find two peaceful bedrooms – one with a double bed and another with a single – offering comfort and privacy for up to three guests.

name: Luxury Flat with Bay Window Views
description:
Welcome to this luxury 1st floor flat with stunning views of the West End.
- Recently renovated with high-standard furnishings
- Bright and spacious living room for relaxation
- Fully equipped kitchen with Aga for meal preparation
- Beautiful bay window overlooking Eglinton Gardens
- Comfortable bedrooms with luxurious linens
- Unique modern bathrooms with creative lighting
- There is also a beautiful snug room to read and relax.

name: Single room in Craiglockhart
description:
We are offering a single room in our family home in Craiglockhart, Edinburgh. This would be suitable for anyone visiting Edinburgh for work, holiday or just passing through. There are convenient bus routes to the city centre (20 mins), airport (30 mins) and easy access to local countryside ( 10 mins drive).

We are dog and child friendly.

Continental breakfast can be offered at an additional cost.

We have further single and double rooms listed if more space is required.

name: Spacious Georgian Flat in Edinburgh New Town
description: Welcome to your spacious and stylish city sanctuary, perfectly located in the heart of Edinburgh’s historic New Town. Our recently renovated Georgian apartment offers generous living areas and a seamless blend of Scandi-inspired interiors and modern luxury. Our central location means, it’s the perfect base to explore the city.

name: Cosy double room
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Bus stop only 1 min walk, 20-25 min on the bus to the city centre and about 15 to Murrayburn stadium, 10 min walk shopping centre by the river. The room is in a 2 bedroom flat on the second floor floor. As you can see I have 2 wee doggies , they are both friendly and loves people. Shared bathroom with shower , big kitchen and living room with tv. Also have some umbrellas whenever needed;)

name: Newly renovated, stylish 3-Bedroom House
description:
*new to Airbnb, August 2025

- amazing public transport links to the city & airport!
- 5 min walk to South Gyle train station, 4 minute train to the city centre
- 10 minutes to/from airport by bus/taxi (bus runs every 10 mins, 24/7)
- 10 minutes to Murrayfield
- 10 minutes to Edinburgh Zoo
- 10 minutes to Cramond beach

For the past 2 years we have been renovating our little piece of the city, making our house a home we absolutely love. We hope you love it too!

name: Lothian Living
description:
This convenient studio property is superbly located property in The University area of the UNESCO World Heritage Old Town of Edinburgh, 5 minutes walk from the famous Royal Mile.

This is a highly desirable central location for anyone wanting to make the most of their stay in the City. The majority of historic sights are within a short walk and the area abounds with Restaurants, Bars and Cafes. It is an active area and may be more suitable to guests wanting to enjoy the night-time activities
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Ground floor  flat in central Edinburgh
description: Central location , 10 mins walk to Royal Mile.  Many local shops and restaurants nearby

name: Central Edinburgh Prime Luxury
description:
This exquisite City Centre apartment complex is located directly off to the side of Princes Street, only 40 meters away, with views out over the streets of Edinburgh and the Castle.

Located on the top floor of a fully refurbished apartment building, the property has a main bedroom with a king size bed, a twin bedroom with two single beds and a sofa bed for one.

Elevator access

Open plan kitchen / living room and walk in shower room.

High Speed wifi and luxury finishes throughout.

name: Inmaculate 2 bed main door villa, private parking
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space, and enjoy Edinburgh in this Inmaculate 2 bed main door villa with private parking and garden close to Fetes College, local amenities and plenty of regular bus services on your doorstep. If you choose to drive, you’ll have private driveway ( 14 minutes drive to Princess street)
There is a lovely large private sunny garden,with conservatory and a patio area,
perfect for summer nights.
The property is on the 200 bus route from the airport.

name: Gilberstoun house
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. Beautifully Presented quiet area with many wonderful walks and sights close by. Railway is a 5 minute walk from the property along with bus routes  to eastlothian Edinburgh and more.  Only a 10 minute walk away.

name: Sunny 1BR in Central Stockbridge, Edinburgh
description: Discover your cosy Edinburgh getaway in the heart of charming Stockbridge. This inviting one-bedroom flat combines comfort and convenience, offering the perfect base to explore the city's historic landmarks, lively cafés, unique boutiques, and scenic parks. Whether you're here to unwind or dive into city life, this thoughtfully furnished space has everything you need for a relaxing and memorable stay.

name: The Lothian Apartment
description:
This convenient studio property is superbly located property in The University area of the UNESCO World Heritage Old Town of Edinburgh, 5 minutes walk from the famous Royal Mile.

This is a highly desirable central location for anyone wanting to make the most of their stay in the City. The majority of historic sights are within a short walk and the area abounds with Restaurants, Bars and Cafes. It is an active area and may be more suitable to guests wanting to enjoy the night-time activities
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Double Bedroom central location
description:
1 room in a 2-bed flat, in a central location. Shared facilities.

Central location - City centre, walking distance from Leith Walk, The Shore Tram station, Ocean terminal, Royal Britannia and most tourist attractions are 15 minutes drive away. Portobello beach is 10 minutes drive away. All areas are very accessible by public transport, with bus stations right outside of the block, lots of restaurants & cafes nearby.

A range of shops within a walking distance, e.g, Lidl, Tesco, etc

name: Double bed in central Edinburgh
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: Prime Central Edinburgh 3 bed
description:
This exquisite City Centre, purpose built apartment complex is located directly off to the side of Princes Street, only 40 meters away, with views out over the streets of Edinburgh and the Castle.

Located on the second floor of a purpose built apartment block, the property has three bedrooms (a master bedroom with en-suite and two further Twin bedrooms. We have an open plan kitchen living room which also has a sofa bed.

Views out to the Castle

High Speed wifi and luxury finishes throughout.

name: Prime Central Edinburgh 2 bed
description:
This exquisite City Centre apartment complex is located directly off to the side of Princes Street, only 40 meters away, with views out over the streets of Edinburgh and the Castle.

Located on the 2nd floor of a fully refurbished apartment building, the property has a main bedroom with a king size bed, a twin bedroom with two single beds and a sofa bed for one.

Elevator access

Open plan kitchen / living room and walk in shower room.

High Speed wifi and luxury finishes throughout.

name: Bright and Spacious 4-Bed Flat
description:
This bright and spacious four-bedroom apartment is the ideal base for groups or families visiting the city. Fully equipped kitchen and fast Wi-fi. Three of the bedrooms feature king-sized beds, while the fourth has a double bed and its own en suite.

The apartment is filled with natural light and a stylish modern touch throughout.

A bus stop just 90 seconds from the front door gets you to the Royal Mile in around 25 minutes, and Straiton Retail Park is a 20-minute walk for all your essentials.

name: Comfy 1BR Flat-Near City Centre
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: Stylish 1 BR The Shore, Leith
description:
Welcome to your cosy base in Edinburgh! This bright and stylish 1-bedroom flat is set in a characterful converted whiskey bond building in the heart of The Shore, Leith —one of the city’s most vibrant neighbourhoods.

The property is directly on the tram line giving easy and efficient commuting to the city center, train stations and airport.

Perfect for couples, solo travellers, or small families, the flat sleeps up to 4 guests with a comfy king-size bed and a pull-down sofa bed in the lounge.

name: Double Room on Easter Road
description:
I am a working professional and live with my dog.

We are located on vibrant Easter Road, just a 15-minute walk from the historic Royal Mile and Princes Street. Excellent public transport links are right outside your door, with frequent buses to the city centre, Leith, and beyond.

Enjoy nearby cafés, pubs, and shops, or take a short stroll to the trendy Shore area or Holyrood Park.

Perfect for solo travellers, couples, or business visitors. Fast Wi-Fi, fully equipped kitchen.

name: Central & Comfy single bedroom
description:
*CHECK-IN MUST BE DONE BEFORE 10PM- THAT’S A NON-NEGOTIABLE SORRY!

This Historical Scottish home is located just a 15 minutes walk from the East End of Princes street where all buses and tram stop if you are arriving via train or from the airport.

Every tourist attractions is within walking distance - The bedroom is perfect for solo travelers who are looking for an affordable, central and private place to stay in Edinburgh.

name: Edinburgh city luxury art apartment with garden
description:
Newly listed: Enjoy our home in the heart of Edinburgh’s leafy West End, a prime location for exploring Scotland’s capital city (limited availability whilst we travel this summer!)

Just a short walk from Haymarket Station, and with excellent transport links to Edinburgh Airport and Waverley Station—the apartment offers easy access to Edinburgh’s top attractions, including Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street, and the Old Town. Perfect for attending Edinburgh's world-renowned festivals and events.

name: Prime Central Edinburgh 2 bed
description:
This exquisite City Centre apartment complex is located directly off to the side of Princes Street, only 40 meters away, with views out over the streets of Edinburgh and the Castle.

Located on the first floor of the building with elevator access.
Two bedroom apartment, one bedroom with a kingsize bed and en suite bathroom, a further twin bedroom and main bathroom, hallway and open plan kitchen living.

Sofa bed in the living room sleeps 1.

High Speed wifi and luxury finishes throughout.

name: City Centre Luxury Studio for 2
description:
This exquisite City Centre apartment complex is located directly off to the side of Princes Street, only 40 meters away. This is the perfect central base for exploring!

Located on the first floor of the building this beautiful open plan studio apartment is the height of luxury with elevator access, Air-con and newly renovated throughout.

We have a king size bed and open plan living area, separate kitchen and bathroom with walk in shower

High Speed wifi and luxury finishes throughout.

name: Prime Central Edinburgh 1 bed
description:
This exquisite City Centre apartment complex is located directly off to the side of Princes Street, only 40 meters away, with views out over the streets of Edinburgh and the Castle.

Located on the first floor of the building and accessed via an elevator, this is a lovely one bedroom apartment with king bed, living room and sofa bed for one.

Separate kitchen, bathroom and hallway with storage.

High Speed wifi and luxury finishes throughout within a fully renovated building as of 2025.

name: Comfortable 2br Apt – Leith | Citi Living Scotland
description:
Comfortable 2br Apt – Leith | Citi Living Scotland

Your cosy base in the heart of Leith

This welcoming ground floor 2-bedroom apartment offers simple, comfortable accommodation in one of Edinburgh’s most vibrant neighbourhoods. Just a short stroll from Leith Walk, the flat is ideal for travellers who value location, convenience, and ease.

name: Royal Mile- Newly refurbished 2 bedroom apartment.
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this new fully refurbished centrally-located apartment on historic Royal Mile.

Fully equipped kitchen with washing machine
Shower and WC

2 spacious bedrooms-1 King 1 double

Living room which looks out on to the Royal Mile.

The flat is located within a 10 minute walk from Waverley train station.

Edinburgh castle and Holyrood Palace are both a short walk away.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Meadowbank Close to City Centre
description:
You'll have a great time at this comfortable place to stay. Unusual apartment with bed being in Mezzamine, in bedroom, and above kitchen. 2 mins Walk to Local transport, 15 mins walk to High Street, round Holyrood Park.
Lovely base to visit Edinburgh

name: Spacious flat in lively Leith
description:
A spacious, cosy, and comfortable 1-bed flat. Immerse yourself in the vibrancy of Leith with great cafés, bakeries and a park just around the corner.

With a recently refurbished kitchen, it is ideal for couples, friends and business travellers looking for a convenient and comfortable base in Edinburgh. Perfectly located within 1 min walk of a bus stop, 7 min walk to the tram stop and 24 min walk to the city centre.

name: Castle view room with private en suite
description: A beautiful en-suite double room in a listed property within Edinburgh's UNESCO World Heritage zone. The flat is at the heart of Festival territory and is minutes' walk from major tourist attractions, including Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, Princes Street Gardens and the Dean Village. The Traverse and Lyceum theatres, Usher Hall and Filmhouse are seconds away, Murrayfield is nearby and eateries and bar options abound, from Michelin-starred restaurants to the historic pubs of the Grassmarket.

name: 1 Bedroom/Open Living Room Apt.
description: Stylish 1-bedroom apartment in central  Leith in Edinburgh, ideal for tourists or business travelers. Features a modern kitchen, cozy living area, high-speed Wi-Fi, and self-check-in. Walking distance to Edinburgh Castle, Royal Mile, shops, and transport links. Perfect for short stays, remote work, or romantic getaways. Professionally managed for comfort and convenience. The apartment offers comfort to up to 4 people, maybe 4 plus a child.

name: Sunny & spacious top floor flat
description:
Brand new to Airbnb!

Lovely 1 bed flat in vibrant Stockbridge, right by the Sunday Farmers Market. Walk 2 mins to Circus Place, 15 mins to the city centre and 15 mins along the Water of Leith to the stunning Dean Village. You'll be spoilt for choice of bars, restaurants, cafes and shops.

Stockbridge is often referred to as the best place to stay in Scotland and we agree!

Please note, there is a lift, however, there are internal stairs so the property is not accessible for wheelchair users.

name: Spacious flat with castle view
description:
Enjoy the view of the Meadows and Edinburgh castle from our 3rd floor flat in Marchmont. Or listen to some vinyl in the kitchen cocktail corner.
Easy access to the city centre and all festival locations.
Excellent amenities on the doorstep: artisan cafés, restaurants, independent shops and pubs.
This is our home and it is fully equipped. It has a new bathroom, and the bedrooms and living room have been refurbished. Period features throughout. Only available during holiday periods.
NB: no lift!

name: Flat, Arthur Seat view, walking distance to Castle
description:
Stay in a charming Victorian flat in Edinburgh’s vibrant Southside, with stunning views of Arthur’s Seat and the Crags.

This cozy, compact space sleeps four, with two rooms, a kitchen, separate shower and WC.

Centrally located: 5-min stroll to the Meadows, 15 mins to the Royal Mile, and 20 mins to Waverley Station. Surrounded by shops, cafés, and a great bus network—perfect for exploring the heart and soul of the city.

name: Portobello Retreat
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. This newly-renovated Victorian home provides the charm of old Edinburgh with the amenities of new. A perfect choice for those who like to retreat to quiet comfort after enjoying the buzz of the city centre. Located just 1 minute from Portobello beach and 15 minutes from the city centre, the property has a beautiful sun-drenched garden and its own entrance. The perfect place to relax, work remotely, or coorie in with a good book.

name: City centre | Newly refurbished
description:
Newly refurbished city centre flat with 3 large bedrooms, Dining table, TV, a sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen, and a spacious shower room.

Perfect for families, professionals, or group stays. Located just minutes from Princes Street, Edinburgh Castle, and the Royal Mile.

Includes WiFi, fresh linen, towels, and a starter pack of tea, coffee, and sugar. Everything you need for a comfortable stay in the heart of Edinburgh!

name: Stylish Victorian Flat in Leith
description:
Welcome to Your Leith Walk Getaway

Our Bright, stylish flat in the heart of vibrant Leith Walk is Just minutes from cafes, Bar, Restaurants and shops. Also the tram line with easy access to the city centre and Edinburgh Airport. Features a comfy double bedroom, modern open-plan living space, fully equipped kitchen, and contemporary bathroom. Perfect for couples, solo travellers, or work trips. Your ideal base for exploring Edinburgh with comfort and convenience. Access via a communal staircase

name: Central 2-BR Apt in Old Town near Royal Mile
description:
Nestled amid the rich tapestry of Edinburgh’s medieval and Georgian architecture, this stylish two-bedroom apartment on St Mary’s Street offers vibrant and convenient base just moments from Waverley Station and all of Edinburgh’s iconic landmarks and attractions

- Two bedrooms (1 double, 1 twin room with 2 single beds) .
- Excellent public transport networks nearby and easy access from Waverley Station
- Located on St Mary's St just off from Royal Mile.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Large 'cosy' room, for groups.
description:
Hey there,

a large private double bedroom, with a box room, sofa that can be converted, and space for a camper bed or two at a pinch

I am often away for a few days so list my room on here - please be aware that the absurd decorations and clutter in the closed drawers are mine
Very much a real human backpackers room like in the early Airbnb days, aimed at similar folks but open so get in touch to chat.

So a cheap(ish) & cheerful personal place!
Cat and garden chickens included, gratis.

name: Peaceful room by the Shore Leith
description:
Peaceful double bedroom located by the vibrant Shore area of Leith. Spacious third-floor bedroom is within a quiet and well-kept flat.

You'll have access to a dedicated private bathroom, as well as use of living room/kitchen/shared garden area. The flat is ideally located nearby to bars, restaurants and cafes, with convenient bus and tram links to the city centre.

There is on-street paid parking (free on weekends) across the road.

name: Modern flat in Edinburgh
description: Spacious modern double room with private bathroom. Excellent transport links to city centre of Edinburgh. Located 15 minute drive from Edinburgh Airport.

name: Perfect flat with free parking!
