description: This recently refurbished 1-bedroom flat with its private entrance, features beautiful herringbone hardwood floors throughout creating a warm, homely atmosphere. There’s a cosy dining nook, a comfortable lounge area to unwind in, and a private garden at the back where you can enjoy a coffee and some peace and quiet. Plus, parking right outside is free. It’s a simple, stylish space that’s perfect whether you’re here for a short stay or a longer visit.

name: A quiet double room, central.
description:
Hello there,
we've a private double room, garden facing so no street noise, that can be used to accommodate folks travelling through, and at a pinch a few friends! Family friendly also (friendly chickens in the garden to visit for lil ones).

Place is aim at being peaceful and a base for your adventures into the city, I'll probably be around to help out if you've questions or anything.
Stocked kitchen etc, treat as your own.

(please put chicka in your msg so we know you've read the listing)

name: Elegant Georgian Retreat - Views of Arthur’s Seat
description: Step into timeless luxury at this exquisitely restored Georgian townhouse on Edinburgh’s prestigious Regent Terrace. Designed in the 1820s by celebrated architect William Playfair, this historic home blends Georgian grandeur with warm, contemporary comfort — a truly unique stay in the heart of the capital.

name: Cosy Retreat by Arthur's Seat
description: Top floor flat located in the Meadowbank area of Edinburgh, just a 30-minute walk from the city centre. A few minutes walk from the iconic Arthur’s Seat, you’ll have the perfect mix of city convenience and nature’s beauty right at your doorstep.

name: Bedroom 20 min walk to city
description:
Elegant small Double Room.

Unwind in a beautifully appointed small double bedroom. This inviting room offers comfort and style in equal measure, perfect for solo travellers or couples seeking a restful stay.

Shared Bathroom Access
Guests have access to a clean, well-maintained shared bathroom located in the hall— ideal for a relaxed morning routine.
License number EH-90514-E

name: New York Style Loft Apartment
description: Stunning New York style loft in Edinburgh’s vibrant Leith district; spacious, and perfect for groups.

name: New to the market modern 2 bed
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located property.
This accommodation comprises of 2 double bedrooms one with double bed and the other triple bunks, modern kitchen, bathroom and large lounge with dining area.
Close to all transport links
Only 10 minute drive from the city centre.
This is a no smoking flat.

name: Room in Edinburgh (Summerhall / Meadows)
description:
Double room with king size bed in a beautiful centrally located apartment at the heart of the Fringe Festival.

We are directly opposite the Summerhall Arts Centre. Other major venues including George Square / Pleasance are a short walk away.

Green space is easily accessible including the Meadows, Holyrood Park and Edinburgh's famous Arthur's Seat.

Our Georgian tenement building contains stylish period features including original shutters and kitchen range.

Access via one flight of stairs.

name: Simpson Loan [429]
description: Welcome to Simpson Loan [429], a stunning sixth-floor apartment boasting an unrivalled location in the very heart of Edinburgh. Overlooking the iconic Meadows and offering far-reaching views towards the Pentland Hills, this beautifully appointed home is part of the award-winning Quartermile development — a stylish fusion of luxury living, vibrant cafés, and historic architecture, all set within the grounds of the former Edinburgh Royal Infirmary.

name: City centre apartment
description: Just ten minutes walk from Princes Street, this stylish and homely apartment is ideal for those coming to Edinburgh for sightseeing or enjoying the city's vibrant nightlife.

name: Cosy flat in Edinburgh
description:
Cozy, sunny ground-floor flat in Edinburgh with private parking and great bus links (25, 19, 34, 21) – only 15 mins to the city centre.
Walkable to vibrant Leith with cafes and shops nearby. The flat is bright, comfortable, and accessible.
Please note there’s only one bathroom, and I live here, but I’m usually out most of the day, so you’ll likely have the space to yourself. Happy to share local tips if you’d like!

name: New Town luxury 1 bed apartment
description:
This incredibly spacious one bedroom apartment is available for short and mid term stays. The property has enormous dimensions and can sleep 3 people between the King bed in the main bedroom and sofa bed in the living room.
The best part of the property is the location, being in central New Town Edinburgh but on a beautiful peaceful and quiet Street.
Hotel quality linens, speedy WiFi and within walking distance to central Edinburgh and the Old Town but also with close proximity to Stockbridge

name: Cozy Double bedroom with private bathroom and WC.
description: Good double bedroom with Toilet and Bathroom for stay in City Centre. The accomodation is 10 minutes walk from Haymarket station and 10 minutes walk from Murrayfield stadium. Old town can be reached by 30 minutes walk or 15 minutes on the bus. There is a bus stop right outside the flat and there are 24 hours bus from Haymarket train station.

name: Edinburgh Old Town Apartment
description: Welcome to the heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town! Just a short walk from the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle, this charming apartment (non-smoking) is tucked on a quiet street, offering central access and peaceful rest. Cafés, restaurants,  supermarkets, and bus stops are just moments away. Inside, enjoy a bright space with a double bed, a sofa bed, and fully equipped kitchen. A few steps down from the entrance, it feels like the first floor with lot of natural light, plus a TV and internet access.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: Stylish 2br Apt – Leith | Citi Living Scotland
description:
Stylish 2br Apt – Leith | Citi Living Scotland

Welcome to your Leith getaway

This modern and spacious ground floor 2-bedroom apartment offers the perfect home base in one of Edinburgh’s most vibrant neighbourhoods. Located just off Leith Walk and minutes from The Shore, it’s ideal for families, couples, or business travellers looking to explore the city with ease.

name: Peaceful Fringe Escape
description:
Bright double room in quiet ground floor flat in Leith, just off Pilrig Park.

Calm retreat from the festival buzz, with a bus stop 2 mins away for easy access to town.

Shared bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, built-in wardrobe, fresh towels and linens provided.

Free on-street parking.

You’ll be sharing with me and my friendly cat.

Ideal for performers or visitors looking for a restful stay during the Fringe.

name: Basic Room, central
description:
Hey there folks,

I have a private double bedroom to offer, feel free to get in touch if you are interested.

We're in the middle of the city, the bustling bohemia of Leith Walk, linked by tramway to airport with a bus to everywhere else and a 10 minute walk to the Old Town.

Is a (semi) cheap alternative for backpackers/digital nomads, we're not a hotel though so be aware, but cheap(ish) and cheerful.

Comes with friendly garden chickens!
<3
p.s. Please put 'Chicka' at top of your message.

name: Cosy new home in Murrayfield
description:
Our newly refurbished flat offers you a perfect base to explore Edinburgh. Located in popular Murrayfield area, it's easy to get around: 15 mins bus/tram journey to Princes Street, 20 mins bus/tram from the airport, and popular Edinburgh Zoo, Murrayfield Stadium are both 10-15 minutes walk away.

With 2 double bedrooms, our house comfortably accommodates 4 people. Free on street parking available.

I'm available via airbnb message / phone call and happy to help during your stay

name: Stylish 2BR Central Edinburgh | Walk to Attraction
description:
Welcome to your cozy and modern home-away-from-home, just minutes from the heart of Edinburgh! ✨🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿

Perfect for couples, families, friends, or working travelers — this stylish 2-bedroom flat has everything you need for a comfy stay.

name: Cosy 1 Bedroom Apartment next to Fountain Park
description: Welcome to this charming one-bedroom apartment—perfectly suited for couples, solo travellers, or business guests. Thoughtfully designed to accommodate up to two guests, the flat features a comfortable double bed in a cosy bedroom, offering a relaxing space to unwind after a day of exploring Edinburgh.

On one side of the flat you can take in the views of Calton Hill in the morning summer sun  with your coffee &  evening sun downers with view to the Firth of Forth on the other! About flat is  the perfect base for the festival, Hogmanay or any events happening on the centre of the city.  Not suitable for anyone with a cat allergy.

Situated in the vibrant and historic Leith district, this lovely apartment is the perfect base for discovering Edinburgh’s charm. Just a short walk from the buzzing Shore area, you'll find an excellent selection of waterfront restaurants, cosy cafés, traditional pubs, and independent shops. You’re also close to the Ocean Terminal shopping centre and the famous Royal Yacht Britannia—two local highlights not to miss!

The area is rich with local cafés, grocery stores, and parks, providing a peaceful base that’s only moments from the city’s energetic centre and festival.

With its central location just 1.5 miles from the city centre, guests can enjoy the best of the capital without the hustle and bustle. Comfortable, well-connected, and full of charm—this flat is a fantastic place to stay, whether you’re here for work, leisure, or both. This cosy and stylish flat offers comfort, convenience, and a true local experience.

name: Stylish Top-Floor Flat - Leith
description: Welcome to our stylish and peaceful 1-bedroom flat located in a traditional Edinburgh tenement in the vibrant neighbourhood of Leith. Perfect for solo travellers, couples or working professionals, the flat blends historic charm with modern comfort, just minutes from The Shore, Leith Walk, and easy tram access into the city centre.

name: Modern, ground floor, 3-bedroom flat - Stockbridge
description:
Welcome to your perfect Edinburgh retreat in charming Stockbridge! This stylish 3-bedroom home features, main door, open plan living, fantastic kitchen & elegant decor. Unwind in the unique oak Japanese bath or enjoy the garden with an outdoor decking—perfect for dining or relaxing.
Enjoy some of Edinburgh's best cafes, markets & scenic walks. With easy access to Edinburgh’s cultural sites, this inviting home is ideal for both short stays & extended visits. Comfort, style and space await you.

name: Central Festival Apartment
description:
Spacious Central 4-Bedroom Festival Apartment – Prime Edinburgh Location

Located in the heart of Edinburgh, just minutes from major festival venues, this bright and generously sized 4-bedroom apartment offers the perfect base for exploring the city during the world-famous festival.

The flat features a large, kitchen with a breakfast bar—ideal for relaxed morning starts—and a grand drawing-room complete with a dining table for entertaining or winding down after a day of performances.

name: Spacious family friendly central 3 bedroom
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

Nearby the City Center and Old town, our lovely 3BR Apartment is perfect for families and friends visiting the beautiful city. Fully equipped for a comfortable stay, you'll also find that the property is surrounded by plenty of Edinburgh's greatest attractions, making it the perfect base for an Edinburgh trip.

name: 2BR Flat Near Princes Street
description: Stylish 2-bed flat in Edinburgh’s prestigious West End—just a short stroll to Fringe venues, Princes Street, Dean Village, and Haymarket. Enjoy bright bay windows, high ceilings, and elegant décor. The flat features a spacious lounge, modern kitchen, 2 large double bedrooms, and a sleek bathroom. Perfect base for Fringe shows, city sights, shopping, and dining. Ideal for couples, friends, or business travelers seeking comfort and location during the Festival buzz.

name: Luxury New Town City Centre Stay
description: Experience luxury in the heart of Edinburgh’s New Town. This elegant 3-bed flat offers Georgian charm with modern style, just steps from top Fringe venues, theatres, cafes, and bars. Featuring a spacious open-plan living area, two sleek bathrooms, and a stylish shower room, it’s the perfect base for Fringe adventures or a city escape. Only a 10-minute walk to Waverley Station and moments from St James Quarter and Omni Centre. Ideal for groups, families, or business stays.

name: 1 bed flat apartment
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base.

description: Escape to this beautifully converted courtyard apartment in a private family estate on the edge of Ratho — just 20 mins from Edinburgh and 10 mins from the airport. Nestled discretely beneath the Main House and recently renovated with warm stylish interiors, modern comforts and thoughtful touches to make you feel right at home, this family friendly retreat offers private outdoor space,  serene views and old-world charm.  Ideal for those seeking a peaceful haven with easy access to the capital.

description: Welcome to our lovely cozy house next to Murrayfield Stadium, which offers a great base to explore Edinburgh at a competitive rate. Nestled in a lovely quiet neighbourhood, with excellent public transport links, 15 mins tram/bus journey to Princes Street.  20 mins tram/bus to the airport. 10 mins walk away from the hotspots such as Edinburgh Zoo and Murrayfield Rugby stadium, as well as beautiful Saughton Park and Gardens with children’s playground, adult sport facilities and athletic tracks.

- Elegant interiors and beautiful finishes

- Fully-equipped kitchen
- Maximum of 8 guests

Fully equipped kitchen, bedding and towels supplied with electric shower over the bath.

description: Beautiful sea-view room in a lovely two-bed flat, a literal stone's throw from the beach. Enjoy the lovely district of Portobello, stroll along the prom, or hop on a short bus ride to the centre of Edinburgh.

Just 12 mins from Haymarket Station and steps from restaurants, bars, a cinema, and the scenic Union Canal. Easy walk to city centre. Ideal for couples, friends, or work trips—your perfect base to explore Edinburgh!

Located off the Royal Mile in the Heart of Edinburgh. 10mins walking from waverley station

The space
The apartment features 2 comfortable Double bedrooms, living room/kitchen/bathroom.

The flat is on a quiet street on the ground floor of a gorgeous tenament building. You'll have access to your own private single bedroom, as well as the shared living room, kitchen, bathroom and garden.

My friendly dog is also here whenever I'm in the flat, but comes to work with me in the day time.

name: Stylish 1BD w Parking in Portobello

Includes a private parking space, fully equipped kitchen, cosy living area, and fast Wi-Fi. Easy access to Edinburgh city centre. A peaceful coastal escape in a vibrant neighbourhood. New to Airbnb – be one of our first guests!

Located within a 2 min walk to Newhaven tram stop & buses into town taking 15 mins or 25mins to Murrayfield. Nearby amenities and supermarkets.
Water of Leith/ Leith for pubs/restaurants.
Renting cheaper as decor un-finished and NO WiFi

The location also benefits from regular bus links and ease of access to Edinburgh Waverley Station.

The house has private parking and is just a short walk to bus and tram stop, taking you to the city centre in 20 minutes and the airport in 15. The nearby Water of Leith and Union Canal also offers a scenic walking or cycling route into town.

You'll be sharing the home with me and my friendly cat, Alistair. Ideal for solo travellers, couples, or small families looking for a quiet, well-connected place.

8km from the airport, 4km from the zoo, 6km from Murrayfield stadium, 8km from the Castle and excellent transport links to the city centre. Train to the city is a 3 minute walk away - the train gets you there in 5 minutes.

Contemporary mews house close to Edinburgh’s Old Town with private parking.

Set on a quiet cobbled lane off the main street, it offers 2 double bedrooms, 1 single bedroom (on request), 2 modern bathrooms, and a large additional study.

Bright open-plan living, modern kitchen, and south-facing balcony. Both double bedrooms have built-in storage. Peaceful shared garden access. A short walk to shops, cafes, and Waverley Station & Old Town (0.5 miles). Ideal for families & city breaks.

It provides a wonderful base to enjoy the city with fully equipped kitchen and living room for you to enjoy home cooking as well as to unwind with smart tv after a busy day’s exploration in Edinburgh.

name: revamped apartment on the edge of city center
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.
10 minutes bust journey into the heart of Edinburgh. fantastic location for any main events in Central Edinburgh.
free street parking. situated on the east edge of the city center.

Two spacious, newly refurbished rooms with a fabulous shared shower room for the unique use of up to four guests. Shared use of a beautiful, well-equipped kitchen & living room with owner living onsite.

Located just by the Ocean Terminal tram stop, we are just 15 minutes from the centre of town by public transport and a stones throw from the many attractions of Leith. During your stay, you’ll share the apartment with us and our friendly little whippet Billie. You’ll have a dedicated bathroom but please note this is a bath with a European style hand shower attachment.

name: New! City apartment in nature.
description:
This unique place has a style all its own.

Clean simple space between the city and nature.

Free bicycle, free yoga space in the secret garden, free parking, free love.

Morningside, is an exclusive area on the sunny southside of Edinburgh. Enjoy good transport options to the centre of town where many events are happpening throughout the summer. Public transport, a bicycle ride along the canal or a leisurely strole around 2.5 miles from the city centre can be a thoroughly enjoyable journey.

This large 3 storey, newly renovated house is 3 miles from the Royal Mile, Edinburgh city centre. Would suit 2 families, workers in the city and many others!

Good regular bus routes to the centre!

Full kitchen, dining table seating up to 8 guests and lounge furniture seating up to 8 comfortably, possibly more. Wi-Fi!
Free parking on street and surrounding streets.

The property has a bathroom, shower room and additional downstairs water closet.

The flat provides a warm and inviting home-away-from-home, ideal for families, couples, or business travelers seeking comfort, style, and unbeatable access to Edinburgh’s best amenities.

name: Forth Street Residence
description: Welcome to your perfect home base in the heart of the city! You'll be steps away from top city center attractions, popular tourist destinations, as well as a fantastic selection of shops and restaurants. Whether you're visiting for leisure or business, this central location makes getting around the city easy and enjoyable.

There is an abundance of fantastic local bakeries, restaurants, bars, and coffee shops in the area making it the perfect choice for a city break with everything you need at your fingertips!

Beautiful centrally located apartment with one bedroom (king size bed) at the heart of the Fringe Festival.

We are directly opposite the Summerhall Arts Centre. Other major venues including George Square / Pleasance are a short walk away.

Green space is easily accessible including the Meadows, Holyrood Park and Edinburgh's famous Arthur's Seat.

Our Georgian tenement building contains stylish period features including original shutters and kitchen range.

Access via one flight of stairs.

name: 2BR Festival Flat in City Centre
description: Stylish 2-bed flat in Edinburgh’s prestigious West End—just a short stroll to Fringe venues, Princes Street, Dean Village, and Haymarket. Enjoy bright bay windows, high ceilings, and elegant décor. The flat features a spacious lounge, modern kitchen, 2 large double bedrooms, and a sleek bathroom. Perfect base for Fringe shows, city sights, shopping, and dining. Ideal for couples, friends, or business travelers seeking comfort and location during the Festival buzz.

Modern room in quiet flat that is within easy reach of the Fringe and amenities. With gorgeous views over the Edinburgh skyline, chic meets cosy in the communal spaces while your bedroom is an oasis of calm amongst the festival mayhem. With a spacious bathroom, powerful shower and useful features like washer & drier you'll find everything you need in this Edinburgh apartment.

We sleep 2 comfortable in a double bed, with the option of a sofa or air mattress for a 3rd guest.

name: 3 Dbl BR, Perfect Festival Location, Free Parking
description:
20% off already applied to final few days of Aug 2025.
Welcome to your perfect Edinburgh adventure pad; a vibrant, newly refurbished, 3-bedroomed ground-floor flat in the heart of Edinburgh.
With a spacious, brand new, fully equipped kitchen and large comfortable lounge, this flat is the perfect location for upto 6 people who wish to visit Edinburgh
Free private parking included for 2 cars.
The flat is a 2 minute walk from a McDonald Rf tram stop, providing direct access to Edinburgh Airport.

name: Dean Village.
description: Every visitor knows to visit the Edinburgh Castle, walk the Royal Mile, eat haggis, climb Arthur’s Seat, and go whisky tasting. But there are sights off the main tourist trail that are so worth your time. One of these underrated but incredibly scenic spots is Dean Village.

name: Park Royal Apartment
description: Welcome to beautiful  home in the heart of Edinburgh, just steps from the Old Town! Enjoy the luxury having a balcony with an incredible view on Arthur's Seat and a free parking space. This is not just a holiday let; it’s a warm and inviting space where laughter echoes and memories are made. Bask in morning sunlight, or cozy up in our elegant living area after exploring the city's charm. Savor the history and beauty of Edinburgh, knowing you have a warm retreat awaiting you.

name: Perfect Spot in Edinburgh | Free Secure Parking
description:
✅ Stylish and comfortable flat in a prime Edinburgh location

name: The Learmonth-Elegant & Historic, Slps 6 with Lift

Experience stunning sunsets from our charming Victorian flat in historic Newhaven. A true local escape, our second-floor home is perfectly located for exploring Edinburgh. The airport tram is just a 1-minute walk away for a seamless city connection!

Stroll 5 minutes to the harbour for famous fish & chips, or walk 15 minutes to the vibrant pubs of The Shore. The Royal Yacht Britannia is nearby. A large Asda is just across the road. The perfect base to explore!

(Note: No wheelchair access)

Guests also have access to a shared kitchen, living room, and a shared toilet just outside the room. A peaceful and central base to explore the city while enjoying your own space.

Perfect for families or groups, the house features spacious living areas, a fully equipped kitchen, and cosy bedrooms. Located in a quiet neighbourhood with easy access to the city’s top attractions. A perfect base for exploring historic Edinburgh!

The private bedroom is tiny but comfortable, with a a single bed that can be converted into a king size bed and a wardrobe. Located in a safe and well-connected neighbourhood, the flat is just a 15-20 minute walk from Edinburgh’s main attractions, including the Royal Mile

name: 2Bed Flat in Leith-Free Parking
description: Relax in this 2-bedroom Leith apartment, just a 20-minute walk from Edinburgh city centre and the St James Quarter. With two double beds and a sofa bed, it accommodates up to 5 guests. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, fresh linen, towels, and toiletries. We also offer free WiFi and free parking for one car.

name: Double room for rent in Slateford Edinburgh
description: My spare room is available for rent in my recently renovated ground floor flat. Private garden and drive way. There is also a double sofa bed available. It is a 2 minute walk from a retail park and a 24 hour Asda. Within a 5 minute walk you can find a train station that gets you into Waverley in 7-9 minutes. Additionally there is a bus every 8 minutes and it takes around 20-25 minutes to city centre. The room locks for additional privacy and I work long hours therefor won’t be around much.

name: Room with a View
description: A charming city room with a view, perfect for exploring Edinburgh. Share a bathroom with just one other guest and enjoy the comfort of a welcoming base in a central location. Step outside and the best of the city is at your feet, historic sights, shops, cafés, and vibrant nightlife. Whether you are here for culture, work, or leisure, this bright and convenient room offers everything you need. Book your stay and make the most of Edinburgh’s charm right from your doorstep.

name: Double Room Ensuite - Burnet Point
description:
Destiny Student - Burnet Point is situated in the heart of Edinburgh's vibrant cultural district, just a few minutes walk away from The Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace and Arthur's Seat. This purpose built student campus accommodation offers modern, comfortable accommodation for travelers from across globe staying Edinburgh.

Staff at Destiny Student – Burnet Point are on hand 24 hours per day to check guest in, book tours/tickets and offer friendly advice on how to get around Edinburgh .

name: Double Room Ensuite (No kitchen) - Burnet Point
description:
Destiny Student - Burnet Point is situated in the heart of Edinburgh's vibrant cultural district, just a few minutes walk away from The Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace and Arthur's Seat. name: a peaceful new town houseroom in city center EH1
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place in EH1 3PX.
There's a 4 bedroom 2.5 bathroom new town house, quiet, peaceful,fashionable, fully fitted kitchen, comfy private bathroom and super fast wifi. Very central, You can 5 minutes walk to the railway station square, airport-tram or St. Andrews Sq. bus station; 10 minutes to Waverley train station and Princes St., Stockbridge or Canonmills, walk distance to city center and hill for exploring in Edinburgh UK.

description:

⭐ 15 Mins to Edinburgh Zoo & Murrayfield Stadium ⭐

name: Costa del Roberto
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.
shops right next door a bus stop 2 minutes away.
The bus takes you to the west end of Edinburgh in 10 minutes.
The airport is 25 minutes away by taxi thanks 😊

name: Central Location | Stylish 2 Bed Space | 5 Guests
description:
This gorgeous Haymarket apartment offers 2 comfortable double bedrooms plus a sofa bed.

With 1 modern bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and a bright, inviting living space, it’s the ideal base for your stay in the city.

Perfectly located near Haymarket station, you’ll find world-class attractions, shops, restaurants, and transport links right on your doorstep. Whether you’re here to explore, relax, or work, this flat has everything you need for an unforgettable stay!

name: Quirky and Creative Old Town Apartment
description: This funky apartment is filled with 19th century character, and adorned with a curated collection of antiques, thrifted treasures, colourful décor, and lush plants. It’s an eccentric, maximalist space created for guests to enjoy. The location is truly special: on a tranquil cobbled street with direct access to Edinburgh’s best nature spot, Arthur seat, whilst just minutes from the city’s main attractions.

name: Charming 1-Bedroom in Old Town & Royal Mile
description:
Stay in the heart of Edinburgh at this stylish 1/2-bedroom apartment, just a 3-minute walk from Waverley Station and steps away from the Royal Mile.
You’ll have the city’s best right at your doorstep.

The apartment comfortably hosts up to 3 guests with a double (king bed) bedroom and sofa bed in the living room.

A separate dining room and kitchen are available.

Enjoy stunning views of Calton Hill from the living area, while the bedroom & kitchen look out onto the charming Secret Garden.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street

name: 2 bedrooms in a Townhouse
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space on the first floor of a townhouse.  Your will have 2 bedrooms and your own bathroom on the first floor with access to the living room and kitchen on the same floor.  On bedroom has a double bed and the other bedroom has 2 single beds, perfect for a small group or family who want to book the same place.  There will be another 1/2 guests on the 2nd floor who you may bump into in the kitchen, however they have their own living space and bathroom.

name: Stylish Private Room
description:
Traditional Edinburgh home directly opposite Haymarket Station – a perfect base whether you’re arriving by train, tram, airport bus, or taxi.

You’ll be in the heart of the West End, with everything just a short walk away – shops, restaurants, bars, and the city’s key attractions.

Your private bedroom features a comfortable double bed, a desk for getting some work done, and access to shared spaces in a well-kept city flat.

Book your stay and enjoy Edinburgh like a local.

name: Charming City Flat for Couples & Families
description: Welcome to our charming one-bedroom flat on MacDonald Road, perfect for couples or small families with little ones. The flat offers a comfortable double bedroom, cozy living area, well-equipped kitchen, and a dedicated workspace for remote work. Located close to shops, cafes, and great transport links, it’s an ideal base to explore Edinburgh’s historic sights, vibrant culture, and beautiful parks while enjoying all the comforts of home.

name: Edinburgh Staycay
description: Stay in the centre of Edinburgh in this fantastic 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment. With space for up to six guests, a modern open-plan layout, and everything you need for a comfortable stay, it’s the perfect base for exploring the city.

name: Airy Apartment Close to Leith Links Park
description:
✔ Charming 3-bedroom flat, tucked away in Edinburgh, close to Leith Links Park
✔ 3 bedrooms
✔ 2 bathrooms
✔ Well-equipped kitchen
✔ 18-minute walk to Leith Links
✔ Next to Pilrig Park
✔ Edinburgh Waverley for 19-minute walking distance
✔ An extensive area guide is provided, and we are available 24/7
✔ Essentials, linens, towels, and WiFi are provided

name: Student Only Charming Studio at Kings Stables Road
description: 🌟Welcome to Kings Stables Road - perfect for students at the University of Edinburgh. It offers modern studios just 0.6 miles from the city centre. With the popular Grassmarket area only a short walk away, you’ll have easy access to cafés, shops, and student-friendly spots. Ideally located opposite the iconic Edinburgh Castle, over half of the rooms enjoy views of this UNESCO World Heritage site. Combining convenience and comfort, it’s an ideal base for study and city living.

name: Student Only Lovely Studio at Buccleuch Street
description: 🌟Live in the heart of Edinburgh’s student scene! Just 0.8 miles from the city centre and a 5-minute walk to the University of Edinburgh central campus, these modern apartments are designed for comfort and style. Step outside to find cafés, restaurants, shops, comedy clubs, theatres, and galleries, or head into the Old Town for the city’s best nightlife. With King’s Buildings a quick bus ride away, you’ll have everything you need—study, social, and city life—all on your doorstep.

name: Welcome to Ferry Road Hideaway!
description:
Welcome to Your Home Away From Home!

Set in a quiet, friendly, and secure neighborhood—just steps from a nearby police station—this cozy garden flat offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience.
Relax in spacious living areas and enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, kid-friendly amenities, and a private garden ideal for morning coffee or evening unwinding. Whether you’re planning a romantic getaway or a family stay, this flat has everything you need for a comfortable visit.

name: *NEW* 3 Bedroom Home in Edinburgh. Near Airport.
description: Stylish newly refurbished 3-bedroom upper flat boasting a spacious separate living room and modern kitchen. Complete with a private driveway and ideally located for quick, easy access to Edinburgh city centre — perfect for professionals or families alike.

name: Leith's Bright Abode
description:
Welcome to your home away from home in the vibrant Leith area of Edinburgh. This modern second-floor apartment is perfect for couples, solo travellers, or remote workers looking for a comfortable base in the city.

Located in lively Leith, you’ll be just a short stroll from the Shore, packed with waterside cafés, bars, and award-winning restaurants. Excellent bus links and walking routes connect you quickly to Edinburgh’s city centre and main attractions.

name: Spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment In Central Edinburgh
description: This newly renovated, main door 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Edinburgh is the perfect place to stay during your trip to the capital! Located very central & within walking distance of the town centre, it's the perfect place to be situated during your stay. As well as having a private entrance, the apartment is very spacious and has a fully kitted out kitchen & bathroom, along with quality furniture in the living area & bedrooms- comfort will be no issue for you! I hope to welcome you soon!

name: Spacious 2 Bed Flat in city centre
description:
Enjoy your stay in this modern 2-bed flat located on Calton Road, just minutes from Edinburgh Waverley Station, the Royal Mile, and Calton Hill. Perfect for city explorers and festival-goers alike!

🚶‍♂️ 3 mins to Royal Mile & Old Town

Your perfect base for discovering Edinburgh's history, culture, and charm!

name: Modern Villa in Edinburgh Private Garden & Parking
description: Charming 2-bedroom Edinburgh lower villa with a private garden and free on-site parking for 2 cars. Sleeps 4 in a king and double bed. Modern bath, bright living area, and a fully equipped kitchen. Enjoy fast Wi-Fi, Smart TV, and central heating. Outside, a seating area for relaxed evenings. Quiet, family-friendly street with easy transit access—perfect for couples, families, or friends exploring Edinburgh. Free parking on the driveway.

name: 1 bedroom house Murrayfield Edinburgh
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

Room for a small car in front driveway and free on street parking, pet friendly, enclosed yard, on bus route into City Centre, Roseburn park and stones throw away.

name: Central two bedroom flat in Newington free parking
description:
The second floor simple and basic flat suited in old Town in popular Newington area within walking distance to main Edinburgh university campus and most of famous attractions. The flat is closed to Royal Mile by walking 10 minutes. The space is prefect for 2-4 persons, maximum sleep 6 persons with 2 persons use a double sofabed in the livingroom. Free parking is available with provided parking permit.
You will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: Edinburgh Stay Escape
description:
Bring everyone together in this spacious Edinburgh flat, just 10 minutes from the city centre. With room for up to 9 guests, it’s designed for group stays, family trips, or city getaways with friends. Three double beds, two singles, and a sofa bed provide flexible sleeping arrangements.

The added bonus of free on-site parking, a rare find this close to Edinburgh’s centre!

name: Central Stockbridge Stay
description: Experience Edinburgh from this spacious double bedroom on the third floor, with views of Edinburgh Castle and vibrant Raeburn Place. Just a 15-minute walk to Princes Street, enjoy award-winning dining at Scran & Scallie and the popular Raeburn Bar with its inviting outdoor seating area. Explore unique shops in Stockbridge, plus the local market every Sunday just steps away. The room fits a baby’s cot and includes access to a bathroom with a shower and toilet. Perfect for your stay!

name: Northfield 1 Bedroom Apartment with Sofa Bed
description:
Welcome to our cosy 1-bedroom apartment, which comfortably accommodates up to 2 guests. The bedroom features a plush double bed for a restful night’s sleep, while the bright and inviting lounge includes a double sofa bed, making it a perfect choice for couples, friends, or small families looking for a comfortable base.

Inside, you’ll have the convenience of your own private, fully equipped kitchen, complete with everything you need to cook and enjoy meals at home.

name: The Maree
description:
Just 10 minutes from Edinburgh City Centre, this spacious apartment offers garden space, free parking, and excellent public transport links.

Inside, you’ll find 3 double bedrooms, 2 single beds, and a sofa bed, comfortably sleeping up to 9 guests. There are 2 modern bathrooms, each with a walk-in shower.

The property boasts a large, well-equipped kitchen and dining area, plus a generous living room with Wi-Fi.

name: Charming West End Flat
description: A simply stunning 2nd floor traditional apartment located in the wonderful West End of Edinburgh, finished to a very high standard, the flat consist of a wonderful bright open plan Lounge/kitchen with stunning views, Double bedroom, and luxury shower room. No more than 10 mins walk away to the City Centre & Princes Street.

name: Historic Mews House 2BR in Edinburgh City Centre
description:
Location, location, location!

Set in the heart of Edinburgh's New Town, this historic coach house, located behind the famous Oxford Bar in Ian Rankin's 'Rebus' novels.
Edinburgh's main attractions, are all within walking distance from the house. 20min walk to the Edinburgh Castle.
Cocktail bars/restaurants and international shops are to be found on George Street which is round the corner from the house.

Comfortably sleeping 4 and over two floors enjoy the space of a historic house in the town.

name: 3BR Sleeps 6 • Free Parking • City & Beach
description:
You are very welcome to our beautiful 3-bedroom semi-detached home, designed with your comfort in mind. Whether you’re here as a family, a group of professionals, tradespeople, or tourists, you’ll find everything you need for a relaxing stay.

It’s set in a quiet neighborhood near Edinburgh’s city centre, with direct buses to Princes Street (15–25 mins), Portobello Beach (8 mins), and Haymarket Station.

name: Airport Home | Free Parking | Sleeps 6 | Near City
description: Welcome to this beautifully designed 3-bedroom townhouse located in a peaceful private estate, yet still just minutes from the heart of the city. Whether you're a work team, contractor group, family, or group of friends visiting Edinburgh, this home has been carefully set up to give you all the space, comfort, and convenience you need: for short breaks or long-term stays.

name: Garden flat with own entrance, Stockbridge
description:
Self-contained, stylish and comfortable garden flat with private entrance and garden space in charming heritage area in Stockbridge colonies.

Decorated to a high standard and fully equipped for a comfortable stay.

Walking distance to Princes Street / Waverley Station and many of the city's attractions. Botanic Gardens close by.
The space
Self contained, stylish and comfortable garden flat in the heart of Stockbridge.

name: Central 2-Bed Flat near Edinburgh’s Highlights
description: Find calm in the city at this bright 2-bedroom flat, perfectly placed in Edinburgh’s historic heart. Step outside and wander to the Old Town, Edinburgh Castle, or the National Galleries—all just minutes away. The flat is tucked in a peaceful spot, so you can rest easy after a day exploring, yet Waverley Station is nearby if you want to roam further. Whether you’re here for art, history, or adventure, this space is your cosy retreat in the city.

name: happy rooms
description: Take a break and unwind at this peaceful oasis. close to Edinburgh old town by bus 10 mins and shops next door it's perfect and easy happy booking thanks Robert

name: Decadent Castle-Side Escape
description: Experience a truly astounding location: within steps of Edinburgh Castle, hidden cobbled closes, ancient gothic architecture, and centuries of history. By day, explore the winding streets and gothic spires; by night, return to your private boutique sanctuary. This apartment is designed for those who seek something beyond the ordinary. It is a gothic romance brought to life, with medieval, Renaissance and Celtic accents, crafted for an immersive experience in the heart of Edinburgh’s Old Town.
neighbourhood_cleansed: Old Town, Princes Street and Leith Street
